<p>22a.2</p>gi phyag ces bya ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ga la der zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ro/ /thal mo sbyar nas zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das la gus pas so/ /bcom ldan 'das nyid la zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad ces
<p>22a.3</p>gsol to zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang byin gyi rlabs dang / stobs dang gzi brjid dang byin gyi rlabs kyis so/ /gsol to zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das la mig mi bzang gis gsol ba btab pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang
<p>22a.4</p>gi 'khor ro/ /klu 'dab bzangs kyi gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul zhes bya ba ni/ mi yi lus la sbrul gyi mgo/ /la la mi yi lus 'dra ba/ /la la bya yi gzugs su ston/ /mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te zhes bya ba ni nad pa'i mtshan nyid 'di lta ste/ 'og ma'i tshig go/ /skyigs bus
<p>22a.5</p>'debs shing zhes bya ba ni dgra rims nad kyis btab cing rlab col zer ba'o/ /dbugs kyang 'byin zhes bya ba ni glo 'byin zhing dbugs nang du sdud mi shes pa'o/ /de bzhin dbugs kyang grang bar 'gyur/ /zhes pa ni/ rims kyis btab cing lus grang zhing / /lce lkugs rkang lag rengs
<p>22a.6</p>pa'o/ /rdul zhing zhes bya ba ni dper na nyi tshan gyis rdul bzhin no/ /sbu ba kha chu 'byung zhes pa ni ra dug zos pas skyugs pa bzhin no/ /yang na chang 'thungs nas na zhing skyugs pa bzhin du'o/ /phyi phyir gnyid ni log par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni yang nas yang gnyid kyis log cing rgyu nad
<p>22a.7</p>kyis btab pa'o/ /kha dog ldan zhing dpa' ba ste/ /zhes bya ba ni nad kyi mtshan nyid de ldog pa dang 'brum bu dang sha ro'o/ /de bzhin 'dar zhing zhes bya ba ni khong na tshad pa yod pa'o/ /rgyug par 'gyur zhes pa ni smyo zhing phyi ru 'bros pa'o/ /sen mo dag kyang ston par bgyid/ /ces pa ni khong
<p>22b</p>
<p>22b.1</p>gcong nad kyis btab nas sen mo gzhan la ston pa'o/ /dog sar mchis shing zhes pa ni sa gzhi lta zhing snying mi dga' ba'o/ /du bar bgyid pa ni snyod cing snying du 'dre 'jug cing lceb 'dod pa'o/ /de la zhes bya ba ni klu'i gdon tshar gcod pa'o/ /gang gis tshar gcod ce na/ stong chen mo'i
<p>22b.2</p>rig sngags kyis gcod pa'o/ /sngags kyi tshig mchis zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang gi tshig go/ /'jig rten mgon po zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /bdag ces bya ba ni rgyal po spyan mi bzang ngo / /gson zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid dang
<p>22b.3</p>sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / stobs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / zhu ba phul ba'o/ /s+yAd ya the dan zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ stong chen mo'i rig sngags so/ /kra ka mi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang zhes bya ba ni klu'i gdon gyi rgyal po'o/ /ming dang
<p>22b.4</p>zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma dang / rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang ngo / /stobs zhes bya ba ni rig sngags 'di'i mthu'o/ /dbang phyug dang zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi dbang phyug brgyad kyi phyir ro/ /byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba ni sems can la'o/ /
<p>22b.5</p>bdag gi gdon gnod pa ni klu'i gdon no/ /gnod pa thams cad zhi bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ nad pa la sogs pa ste/ rgyal po spyan mi bzang gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bshad pa de nas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
<p>22b.6</p>tshe zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ 'khor thams cad kyi mdun du zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rgyal po bzhi dang lha ru bcas pa'i mdun du'o/ /seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba ni bdag med pa la gsum ste/ de yang mtshan nyid
<p>22b.7</p>med pas med pa ni kun du brtags te/ de ltar brtags pa'i dus nyid na/ /des stong pa'i phyir ro/ /de na mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bdag med pa ni gzhan gyi dbang ste/ de ltar brtags pa dang mi mthun pa ste/ rkyen gzhan la rag las shing skye ba'o/ /rang dang spyi'i mtshan
<p>23a</p>
<p>23a.1</p>nyid kyis bdag med pa ni yongs su grub pa ste/ thog ma nyid nas brtags pa des stong pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar bdag med pa gsum po de nyid kyis kun skrag par byed pa bdag nyid dam/ nyam mi nga ba'i phyir seng ge'i sgra'o/ /bsgrags pa ni 'khor la bshad pa'o/ /da ni
<p>23a.2</p>stobs bcu zhes bya ba ni de yang gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i stobs ni/ dge ba spyad pas mtho ris kyi gnas yin la/ ngan song rnams min pa ni 'dod pa gzhan gyi dbang ngo / /log par spyad pa ni ngan song gi gnas yin gyi mtho ris kyi gnas ma yin pa ni mi 'dod pa gzhan gyi dbang ngo
<p>23a.3</p>zhes bya ba la sogs pa mkhyen pa'o/ /dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa'i mkhyen pa'i stobs 'di ni dbang po rnon po de'i rigs can yin/ 'di ni rtul po nyan thos kyi rigs can yin pa la sogs pa mkhyen pa'o/ /khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa ni sa bon gyi don te/ 'di
<p>23a.4</p>ni nyan thos kyi rigs sam skal ba'am bag chags can no/ /'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa chen po la sogs pa mkhyen pa'o/ /mos pa sna tshogs pa mkhyen pa ni gang zag gi nyan thos la mos pa/ 'di ni theg pa chen po la mos pa la sogs pa mkhyen pa'o/ /bsam gtan
<p>23a.5</p>dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs ni bsam gtan bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mthar gyis
<p>23a.6</p>gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'khor ba'i chos dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos la ma lus pa'i lam mkhyen pa ste/ go rims ltar sbyar ro/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa ni bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa'i las dang mi g.yo ba'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam
<p>23a.7</p>par smin pa 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bu thob pa la sogs pa mkhyen pa'o/ /thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa ni 'dis ni mngon par mtho ba thob pas thams cad kyi lam mo/ /'di ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i nges par legs pa thob cing bgrod par byed pa'i lam la sogs
<p>23b</p>
<p>23b.1</p>pa mkhyen pa'o/ /sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa ni sngon gyi yul 'dir las 'di lta bur blangs te pha ni 'di la ma ni 'di/ 'di lta bu la sogs pa zhib tu mkhyen pa'o/ /'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba mkhyen pa ni gang zag 'di dus 'di mi tshe rgyu 'di lta bu zhig gis shi 'phos nas
<p>23b.2</p>yul 'di'i rigs 'di lta bu zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba la sogs pa mkhyen pa zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa ni bdag gis sdug bsngal shes so/ /kun 'byung ba spangs so/ /'gog pa mngon du byas so/ /lam rgyud la skyes so zhes bya ba la sogs pa mkhyen pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa
<p>23b.3</p>bzhis 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas nas de la chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs
<p>23b.4</p>pa'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam
<p>23b.5</p>par spyod pa dang / khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bcas pa'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrog go/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ chos dang ldan pa bskor bar
<p>23b.6</p>mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas nas/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan
<p>23b.7</p>su yang rung ste/ chos dang ldan pa bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas nas/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan
<p>24a</p>
<p>24a.1</p>su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs
<p>24a.2</p>po che'i gnas su dam bcas pa'o/ /'khor gyi nang na seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan pa bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar
<p>24a.3</p>bya'o/ /gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos yongs su bstan pa de dag la brten nas/ bar chad kyi chos su 'gyur ro zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan pa rgol
<p>24a.4</p>bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pas/ bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du
<p>24a.5</p>seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan pa bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa byung
<p>24a.6</p>ba rtogs par gyur pa de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par gyur pa de dag la nan tan byas nas sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba mi 'byung ngo zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par
<p>24a.7</p>rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du
<p>24b</p>
<p>24b.1</p>seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ste bzhi po de dag ni mi 'jigs pa'o/ /
<p>24b.2</p>'khor gyi zhes bya ba ni dgra bcom pa lnga brgya'o/ /nang du seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis stong pa'i sgra'o/ /khyu mchog lta bu ni 'phags pa kun dga' bo'o/ /rgya chen po zhes bya ba ni nam mkhas ji ltar khyab par stong pa'i sgras khyab pa'o/ /stong pa'i sgra des ci'i don byed ce na/ 
<p>24b.3</p>sems can thams cad grol bar byed pa'o/ /yang dag par zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa ste chos kyi sku'o/ /chos kyi sku ste dper na ci dang 'dra na/ ri bong gi rwa bzhin no/ /brjod du ni mi rung / dngos por ni med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ni chos kyi sku'i dpe'o/ /bsgrags so zhes bya ba ni dngos
<p>24b.4</p>su ste/ gzugs sku gnyis kyis don byed pa'o/ /gzugs sku gnyis ni dper na g.yag gi rwa bzhin no/ /g.yag gi rwas ni dngos por yang snang la 'bigs par byed pa'i don gyi phyir ro/ /de'i phyir na gzugs sku rnam gnyis kyis ni yod pa'i don byas so/ /chos skus ni med
<p>24b.5</p>pa'i don byas/ yod pa dang med pa'i don byas pa'i phyir na stong pa nyid kyi sgra bsgrags pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i zhes bya ba ni 'od srungs kyis spyo ba brgyad kun dga' bo la byas pas tshangs pa'i phyir na tshangs pa'o/ /'khor lo bskor zhes bya ba ni bka'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o/ /sde
<p>24b.6</p>zhes bya ba ni bdud kyi rigs bzhi'o/ /mthu dang zhes bya ba ni so so'i nus pa'o/ /gzhon pa la ni lha mi'i bu'i cha byad do/ /bcas pa ni bdud kyi rigs bye ba dung phyur phrag bco lnga'o/ /bdud kyang gcig gis rab tu btul zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /de
<p>24b.7</p>la dang po bzhi la lha'i bdud ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas na/ bdud kyi rgyal po dga' rab dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / bdud mo pad+mo gzi ldan ma/ 'khor 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi/ bdud kyi rigs bye ba dung phyur phrag bco lnga yod de/ de la lha'i rigs su skyes pas lha'i
<p>25a</p>
<p>25a.1</p>bu yin la zhi ba de thar pa'i srog gcod pa 'phags pa'i nor 'phrogs pas kyang bdud yin no/ /de lta na bdud kyi rigs bye ba phrag dung phyur bco lnga yod pas bar du gcod do/ /des chod na 'khor 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis bar du gcod do/ /de yang gcig sbyin
<p>25a.2</p>pa'i bar/ gcig gis bzod pa'o/ /gcig gis brtson 'grus kyi bar du gcod pa'o/ /des kyang mchod na bdud kyi rgyal po dga' rab dbang phyug dang / bdud mo pad+ma gzi ldan ma chags pa'i mda' lnga 'phen te/ gdung skem ra ro myos dang smyo/ /mda' lnga yin par shes par
<p>25a.3</p>bya/ /de lta bu'i tshul gyis bar du gcod pa'i phyir na bdud do/ /nyon mongs pa'i bdud ni 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa ste/ de rnams ma zhi ba'i rnam pa bskyed pas/ nyon mongs pa yin la/ bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i bgegs byed pas 'phags pa'i nor
<p>25a.4</p>'phrog pa'i bdud kyang yin no/ /phung po'i bdud ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la bya ste/ de nyid spungs pas na phung po'o/ /de nyid na ba dang rgas pa 'khogs pa la sogs pa'i bar du gcod pas bdud do/ /'chi bdag gi bdud ni dngos su rang gi tshe 'di'i 'phen pa zad nas 'chi ba yin
<p>25a.5</p>pa la de'i phyag rgya ma 'am rtags su 'gro ba rnams kyi bdud rang gi lhag pa'i phyogs na gnas zhes pa ste/ gshin rje'i rgyal po be ba swa ta zhes bya ba/ lus po mi'i lus la mgo bo seng ge'i mgo bo can/ mig rtsa dmar po gcig gnas te/ de 'chi ba la dbang byed pas na 'chi bdag
<p>25a.6</p>kyang yin la der Ar+ya'i nor 'phrog pa thar pa la bgegs byed pas bdud kyang yin no/ /de ltar yang 'gro ba rnams ni do nub 'di bya nang par 'di byed las gzhan yang 'di bya sems pas na/ gshin rje'i rgyal po mig rtsa dmar bas ma rungs snyam pa dgod par byed ces pas so/ /de rnams
<p>25a.7</p>btul ba dang ldan pa ste/ de yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa ste/ de yang dang po ni rdo rje gdan gyi spo la sangs rgyas pa'i tshe bdud dga' rab dbang phyug gis rig nas bdud mo pad+ma gzi ldan ma dang bcas pa mya ngan gyi khang bar zhugs/ de'i tshe 'khor rnams kyis smras pa gtso bo ci'i phyir na
<p>25b</p>
<p>25b.1</p>mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs mya ngan byed ces pa dang / gtso bos smras pa 'jig rten 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na/ gzhon nu don grub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/ de sangs rgyas nas 'dod pa'i khams stong par 'gyur ro/ /bdag cag mnga' ris gang la bya ste/ de'i
<p>25b.2</p>phyir na mya ngan byed zer te/ 'khor rnams kyis smras pa/ mya ngan ma byed de bas bar du gcod ces smras so/ /dang po bdud kyi bu mo shin tu mdzes pa bzhi sprul te/ b+ha ga bAn la chags pa skye ba'i phyir na gtang bas/ b+ha ga bAn mi sdug pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/ rgan mo
<p>25b.3</p>mi sdug pa sprang mo zhar ma lta bu bzhi ru gyur to/ /de nas 'khor 'jig rten pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mtshon cha'i char phab pas/ b+ha gas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ me tog gi char du gyur to/ /de nas sprul pa'i tshogs khro bo dpag tu med pa rnams kyis/ oM
<p>25b.4</p>ya mAn+ta ka hUM zhes brjod pas/ 'tshe ba rtogs shig pa'i sgra nam mkha' khyab par bsgrags pas bdud 'khor thams cad dbang du bsdus so/ /mthong tsam cig nas bdud dga' rab dbang phyug dang pad+ma gzi ldan shor ro/ /de nas lha'i bu'i bdud btul bar gyur te/ de nas tho rangs
<p>25b.5</p>rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nyon mongs pa rkang la gnas pa dang / spyi la gnas pa thams cad spangs te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas nyon mongs pa'i bdud btul bar gyur to/ /de nas chu bo nai rany+dza na'i 'gram du dka' thub lo drug mdzad pas rdzud cing rid
<p>25b.6</p>par gyur pa la tshong dpon gyi bu mo legs skyes mas ba lnga brgya'i 'o ma gdus pa drangs pas/ sku gser gyi brtan pa phyis pa ltar song / sha med/ khrag med/ rgas pa med par gyur to/ /de ltar na phung po'i bdud btul/ /de nas lo brgyad cu na sku mya ngan las 'das pa la bram
<p>25b.7</p>ze su ka tos gsol ba btab/ sku tshe ring bar dbang mnga' brnyes pa'i rtags su lo gnyis bzhugs pas 'chi bdag gi bdud btul lo/ /de nas don dam par btul ba ni/ de ltar na bdud bzhi snang ba nyid rang gi ye shes de de lta bur snang ste/ sna tshogs su snang ba sprul pa'i sku/ 
<p>26a</p>
<p>26a.1</p>de lta bur de yang rang rig par rig pa longs sku/ de nyid btsal na gang du yang ma rnyed pas/ stong pa 'od gsal ba chos kyi sku'o/ /sems can thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni/ snying rje'i sgo nas so/ /rig sngags zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid de/ de yang kun gzhi rnam par
<p>26a.2</p>shes pas nye bar len pa'i rgyu byas/ stobs rnam pa lngas lhan cig skyes pa'i rkyen byas/ kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gnas 'gyur ba me long lta bu'i ye shes te/ stong pa mtha' dag dang bral ba'i don rtogs pas/ rig sngags mtshan nyid pa ste/ de'i mtshon cha me long lta bu'i ye
<p>26a.3</p>shes/ mtshon pa stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma ste/ sku mdog dang zhal phyag gi rnam par byung ba'o/ /de sku mdog ni mthing ga zhal gsum pa ste g.yas kyi zhal zhi ba dkar mo dregs pa'i tshul dang ldan pa'o/ /g.yon dmar mo rgod pa dbang gi tshul dang ldan pa'o/ /dang po'i
<p>26a.4</p>zhal mthing ka khro mo ste/ drag po'i tshul dang ldan pa'o/ /zhal gsum pa ni sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par dag pa'o/ /phyag drug zhabs gnyis na gnod sbyin pho mo gnon pa'o/ /gnod sbyin pho ni srid pa'i ngo bo'o/ /mo ni 'das pa yin te srid pa dang 'das pa rnam par 'joms
<p>26a.5</p>pa'o/ /phyag drug pa zhes bya ba ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnam par dag pa'o/ /g.yas kyi dang po ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ bar ma na ral gri/ tha ma na dgra sta'o/ /g.yon gyi dang po ni sdigs mdzub zhags pa/ bar ma na rtse gsum/ tha ma na lcags kyu'o/ /g.yas na rdo rje zhes bya ba ni
<p>26a.6</p>ye shes rnam par dag pa'o/ /ral gri zhes bya ba ni/ shes rab yin te nyon mongs pa gcod pa'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi nyes pa rnams thub pa'i phyir dgra sta'o/ /rdo rje zhags pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis bcings pa'o/ /sdigs mdzub ni ma lus sems can sdang ba rnams la
<p>26a.7</p>sdigs mdzub bo/ /srid pa gsum du song ba'i nyon mongs pa 'bigs par byed pas na mdung rtse gsum mo/ /mche ba gtsigs pa/ kha gdangs pa/ dbu skra gyen du 'bar ba/ spyan gsum pa/ dbu la thod pa lngas brgyan pa/ rgyan thams cad ni rin po che dang / sbrul gyis
<p>26b</p>
<p>26b.1</p>brgyan pa/ stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs su bcas pa/ smad g.yogs ni stag gi sham thabs can/ nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa'o/ /thams cad ces bya ba ni rigs lnga'i rang bzhin no/ /nga la zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das la'o/ /nyon zhes bya ba ni
<p>26b.2</p>bcom ldan 'das kyi tshig go/ /s+yAd ya the dan zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste zhes bya ba'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni rig sngags ston pa'i tshig go/ /rig sngags zhes bya ba ni a saM ge la sogs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid du gshegs pas na de bzhin
<p>26b.3</p>gshegs pa ste/ de bzhin nyid ni stong pa nyid spros pa dang bral ba ste/ de yang dang po byung yang de'i ngang las byung la/ bar du gnas kyang der gnas/ tha mar 'gags pa'am thim pa yang de'i ngang las thim pa'i phyir te chos kyi sku'o/ /yang de bzhin nyid rtogs pas te stong pa nyid
<p>26b.4</p>spros bral rtogs shing rig pa'i phyir te longs sku'o/ /yang de bzhin du gshegs pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ mar me mdzad la sogs pa dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ mdzad pa bcu gnyis la sogs pa'i sgo nas sems can gyi don la gshegs pas de
<p>26b.5</p>bzhin gshegs pa ste/ sprul pa'i sku'o/ /mtshan dang zhes bya ba ni sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ /stobs dang ni stobs bcu'o/ /dbang phyug dang zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa brgyad dam gsum la dbang thob pa ste/ mi 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang / lha'i 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba'i
<p>26b.6</p>sdug bsngal la dbang thob pa'i phyir ro/ /byin gyis zhes bya ba ni stong chen mos byin gyis brlabs so/ /bdag la zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa'o/ /bde legs su gyur cig swA hA zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /de dag rgyal po chen
<p>26b.7</p>po bzhi'i cho ga'i skabs te gsum pa'o// //sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung thos nas/ /zhes bya ba ni seng ge'i sgra yin te seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba ni stong chen mo'i rig sngags 'di'i sgra'o/ /thos zhes bya ba ni 'byung po thams cad kyis so/ /phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong
<p>27a</p>
<p>27a.1</p>bdag /ces pa ni brgya byin dang / dri za dang / me lha dang / gshin rje dang / srin po dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha dang / gnod sbyin dang / dbang ldan dang / tshangs pa dang / sa'i lha mo'o/ lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / rlung
<p>27a.2</p>lha'i gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / yi dgas kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / 
<p>27a.3</p>lus srul po'i gdon dang / skem byed kyi gdon dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / ma mo'i gdon dang / tsa mi ka'i gdon dang / nam gru'i gdon dang / me lha'i gdon dang / nag po'i gdon dang / nag
<p>27a.4</p>po chen po'i gdon dang / ri khrod kyi gdon dang / zas su sha za'i gdon rnams so/ /de dag ni gtso bor gyur ba rnams so/ /bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu'o/ /'jigs dang skrag dang dngangs 'gyur te/ /zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyis skrag pa'i phyir ro/ /thal mo sbyar nas 'khod
<p>27a.5</p>par gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / skrag par 'gyur bas na thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /'byung po'i tshogs ni lhag ma rnams/ /dngangs 'khrugs rod rod por gyur nas/ /zhes bya ba ni/ stong phrag dang ni brgyad cu dang / /
<p>27a.6</p>de 'tsham dag ni nyi shu brgyad/ /dngangs zhes bya ba ni/ dbugs ma thon pa'o/ /'khrugs pa zhes bya ba ni dran pa stor ba'o/ /rod rod por gyur zhes bya ba ni rengs pa'o/ /rab tu 'byer byed cing zhes bya ba ni khros pa'o/ /phyogs bcur zhes bya ba ni so sor gcig la mi sdod par
<p>27a.7</p>'bros pa'o/ /sgra bo che yang sgrogs par byed/ /ces bya ba ni/ bred pa'i skad chen po 'don par byed pa'o/ /rgyal po chen pos zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'o/ /de shes nas zhes pa ni mngon par shes pas 'byung po bred pa mthong ba'o/ /gsang ba gsum ni dam tshig ste/ rdo
<p>27b</p>
<p>27b.1</p>rje lta bu'i dam tshig chen po'o/ /yang dag smra zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log par 'byung po la smras pa'o/ /kye ma zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba'o/ /ma ni rgyu ba'o/ /rig sngags zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa'o/ /rig sngags che zhes bya ba ni stong pa'i lam ting nge 'dzin rdo rje lta
<p>27b.2</p>bu thob pas che ba'o/ /stong chen zhes bya ba ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rang bzhin nam/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas skyed par byed pa'i yum chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /rab tu 'joms byed ces pa ni/ 'byung po la sogs
<p>27b.3</p>pa bar du gcod pa thams cad 'dul ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa de/ /zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed brgya phrag stong gis gsungs pa'o/ /thos nas 'byung po skrag gyur te/ /zhes bya ba ni/ /stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i rig sngags kyi sgra thos nas
<p>27b.4</p>skrag pa'o/ /dper na rab tu 'bar ba'i me/ /zhes bya ba ni bskal pa chen po dus kyi me/ yang na ni me chen po 'bar ba'i nang du til gyi mar blugs pa lta bu'o/ /til mar ngar btags ral gri bzhin/ /zhes bya ba ni dper na nyi tshan la ral gri'i sne mo nyi ma la bsregs nas til mar
<p>27b.5</p>byugs nas brgyab pas thams cad gcod pa bzhin du/ stong chen mo'i rig sngags 'dis kyang / 'gro ba rigs drug gi sdug bsngal gcod pa'i phyir ro/ /rig sngags spu gri'i so 'dra ba/ /zhes pa ni dper na spu gris skra rnams rtsa ba nas bzhar ba bzhin du bgegs thams
<p>27b.6</p>cad phyir phud pa'i phyir ro/ /yang na ni rig sngags 'di'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'gro ba rigs drug gi rgyun bcad nas byang chub la dgod pa'i phyir ro/ /gau ta ma zhes bya ba ni drang srong gau ta ma'i tsha bo yin pa'i phyir gau ta mar btags so/ /rab bshad pa zhes bya ba ni rgya che ba'o/ 
<p>27b.7</p>drang srong gis ni legs bshad pa/ /zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'o/ /sangs rgyas zhal nas gsungs pa la/ /zhes bya ba ni bden pa'i tshig gis brgyan pa'o/ /de la gang zhig ma dad pa/ /zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mi 'gro zhing lta ba log pa'o/ /
<p>28a</p>
<p>28a.1</p>de yi bu thu bo zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum la ma dad pa gang yin pa de'i bu thu bo che'o/ /tshangs pa'i zhags pas zhes bya ba ni dus kyi zhags pa'o/ /med par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni dus kyi zhags pas bzung nas 'chi ba'o/ /me ni rab tu 'bar byas la/ /zhes bya ba ni dper
<p>28a.2</p>na/ sbyin sreg mkhan pos me sbar bzhin/ /bla dang 'og dang phyogs bzhi yang / /zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro ba rigs drug gi gnas so/ /sbyin sreg gi ni chus gtor te/ /zhes bya ba ni sbyin sreg gi chus zhes bya ba ni me long lta bu'i yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi chus rigs drug gi tsha ba'i
<p>28a.3</p>sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa'o/ /gtor te zhes bya ba ni rigs drug gi sems can la ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /nas dang yungs kar blangs nas su/ /mar gyi snying po dang sbyar nas/ /me yi nang du blug par bya/ /zhes bya ba ni dper na nas dang yungs kar dang 'dra ba'i
<p>28a.4</p>gnod par byed pa'i gdon rnams so/ /blangs pas su ni sbyin sreg mkhan pos lag par rdzas blangs pa dang 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gnod byed kyi mi rnams bkug pa'o/ /mar gyi snying po dang sbyar nas/ /zhes bya ba ni mar gyi snying po ni stong chen mo'i rig sngags so/ / 
<p>28a.5</p>sbyar nas zhes bya ba ni rig sngags dang ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu'o/ /me yi nang du blug par bya/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod pa'i gdon rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi mes blangs nas/ ye shes kyi mes bsregs pa'i phyir ro/ /legs par gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o/ /
<p>28a.6</p>'di zhes bya ba ni stong chen mo'i rig sngags so/ /thos nas zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams so/ /gal te myur du mi gtong na/ /zhes bya ba ni/ chad pa dag gis gcod par byed/ /chad pa gang yin zhe na mnar med par skye ba'o/ /thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog
<p>28a.7</p>gsum gyi bka' las 'das pa gang yin pa de lus la me 'bar ba'o/ /dper na/ mar dang yungs kar mer blugs bzhin/ /zhes bya ba ni dpe'o/ /de dag bde ba mi rnyed de/ /zhes pa ni de dag ni bka' las 'das pa'o/ /bde ba mi rnyed ces bya ba ni mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal
<p>28b</p>
<p>28b.1</p>lo/ /gnod sbyin chad pa ni zhes bya ba ni nad chen po sna tshogs so/ /sdig pa ni sems can thams cad la'o/ /de yi rtsib logs g.yas par ni/ /'bras chen nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni bka' las 'das pa de la'o/ /yang na ni gang gis gnod par byed pa de la'o/ /gnod
<p>28b.2</p>sbyin nad kyis btab pa na/ /sha bkra'i nad kyis btab par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum la ma dad pa'i gang zag de la gnod pa byas pas/ de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas gnod sbyin ku be ras chad pa chen po bzhi bcad pa'i phyir ro/ /lcang lo can gyi pho brang du/ /gzhar yang
<p>28b.3</p>'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba ni rig sngags 'di'i bka' las 'gal gyur na/ rnam thos kyi bu'i pho brang du 'ong mi ster te/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis chad pas gcod par 'gyur ro/ /lus ngan grogs dang ldan pa yi/ /khyim yang mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ /zhes pa ni 'gro ba
<p>28b.4</p>lta ci smos te/ mthong bar yang mi ster zhing / gnod sbyin rnams kyis kyang ring po nas bkag pa'o/ /'byung po mang po tshogs pa na/ /stan yang thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes pa ni gal te pho brang du 'ongs par 'gyur na/ bsdad sa med par skyes te/ 'byung po rnams kyis
<p>28b.5</p>brnyas par byed de/ sdug bsngal mang po myong ba'o/ /gnod sbyin dag gi dkyil 'khor du/ /zas skom dang yang bral bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa'i 'byung po rnams ni 'ongs par gyur kyang mi ster te/ gal te sbyin yang lcags kyi rdog po dang / /
<p>28b.6</p>me'i phung por mthong ba'o/ /de bas na lha dang / mi dang / yi dgas dang / 'byung po la sogs pa yang / rig sngags 'di'i bka' las mi 'da' ba'o/ /stong chen rab 'joms mdo sde la/ /zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po rten gyi gang zag la la zhig dkon mchog gsum la
<p>28b.7</p>skyabs su song ba/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma/ rdo rje'i rig sngags 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / bsgom pa dang / mchod pa dang / nyan pa dang / bshad pa de la/ gnod sbyin 'byung po'i bar chad byed pa de la/ spyi bo
<p>29a</p>
<p>29a.1</p>dag ni zhes bya ba nas/ de nyid du ni 'khor bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'i bar na chad pa chen po bdun gcod pa'o/ /sus gcod ce na rdo rje 'chang gis gcod pa'o/ /gnod sbyin 'byung pos bar chad byed pa de la zhes bya ba ni rig sngags 'di'i bka' las 'da' ba
<p>29a.2</p>dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba rnams la bar chad byas na sdug bsngal thams cad de'i lus la 'byung ngo / /de la rdo rje 'chang khros te/ /spyi po dag ni 'gems par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon lag na rdo rje khros te/ de'i stobs kyis 'byung po rnams la chad pa
<p>29a.3</p>bcad pa'o/ /ci'i phyir chad pa gcod ce na/ de'i rnam par smin pas a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /spu gri'i so ni rtsub mo yis/ /de yi lce ni gcod par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' las 'das pa dang / lag na rdo rje'i ye
<p>29a.4</p>shes kyi spu gris de'i lce gcod pa'o/ /mtshon cha shin tu rnon po yis/ /de yi sna dang rna ba gcod/ /zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin du/ de'i rnam smin gyis sna dang lce gcod pa'o/ /'khor lo spu gri'i so 'dra bas/ /klad pa rab tu gshegs par byed/ /ces bya ba ni nam mkha' nas las
<p>29a.5</p>kyi 'khor lo 'byung bas/ spyi bo nas lte ba'i bar du gcod pa'o/ /tho ba lcags kyis dkris pa yis/ /de yi snying la 'joms par byed/ /ces bya ba ni bar snang nas lcags kyi 'khrul 'khor gyis/ bka' las 'das pa de'i snying ni 'joms pa'o/ /rnag dang khrag ni dron mo dag /
<p>29a.6</p>de yi kha nas 'dzag par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ don snying lnga la nad zhugs shing / rnag dang khrag rtag tu 'dzag pa'o/ /rig sngags zhags pa'i chad pa yis/ /rtag tu 'khor bar 'gro ba na/ /zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du rig sngags kyis dmod pa'i zhags pa'i las des rtag tu
<p>29a.7</p>'khor bar 'khyam pa'o/ /'khor ba gnod sbyin dkyil 'khor du/ /de nyid du ni 'khor bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni de bas na 'di'i bka' las 'da' bar mi bya zhing / /sems can rnams la gnod pa mi bya'o/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu song gyur nas/ /zhes bya ba ni rig sngags 'di la gus
<p>29b</p>
<p>29b.1</p>pa'i gang zag skyong ba ste/ rgyal po bzhi po dag gis ni phyogs phyogs nas srung ba'o/ /chos kyi go cha bgos gyur te/ /bzang po'i khri la 'dug pa ni/ /zhes pa ni byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi go cha gyon pa/ seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs nas
<p>29b.2</p>sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung / /zhes bya ba ni dri za'i ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pas/ shar phyogs skyong ba'o/ /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ /zhes bya ba ni grul bum gyi ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pas lho phyogs
<p>29b.3</p>skyong ba'o/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang / /zhes bya ba ni klu'i ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pas/ nub phyogs skyong ba'o/ /byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang bcas pas/ byang phyogs skyong ba'o/ /dpal dang
<p>29b.4</p>gzi brjid 'bar ba yi/ /rgyal po dag ni phyin pa dang / /zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten du dpal dang ldan zhing / sde bo che dpung bzhi'i bdag po ste/ de'i gzi brjid kyis gling bzhi khyab pa'o/ /phyin pa ni khyab pa'o/ /de'i tshe ston pa thams cad mkhyen/ /bar snang gnas la rab tu
<p>29b.5</p>'phags/ /zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang / sems can gyi don la gnas pa ste/ nor bu rin po che dang 'dra bar 'jig rten gyi khams rang gi lag mthil du shes pa/ sems can rnams las 'phags pa'o/ /tshangs pas sprul pa'i gzhal
<p>29b.6</p>med khang / /der ni rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs/ /zhes bya ba ni tshad med pa bzhi bsgoms pas tshangs pa ste/ gzhal med khang ni sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin lha'i sku'o/ /yang na gzhal med khang ni ri rab chen por snang ba 'jig rten gyi khams tsam mo/ /de lta bu'i gzhal yas
<p>29b.7</p>khang gi nang na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin snang ba'o/ /de nas tshangs dang tshangs chen rnams/ /thal mo sbyar 'khod phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 
<p>30a</p>
<p>30a.1</p>tshangs chen rnams kyis gus par phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /dpal ldan gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ /gser gyi mchod sdong dang yang mtshungs/ /zhes bya ba ni phyi nang med par gser gyi yon tan dang ldan te/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing dpe byad bzang po brgyad
<p>30a.2</p>cus brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra zhing / yon tan gyis brgyan pa'o/ /me tog pad+ma bzhin du rgyas/ /sA la'i rgyal po bzhin du rgyas/ /zhes bya ba ni zhal pad+ma bzhin du sems can rnams la bstan pa/ shing sA la bzhin du zil gyis non pa'o/ /nyi ma
<p>30a.3</p>dang 'dra zla nya la/ /skar ma rnams kyis yongs bskor zhing / /zhes bya ba ni dregs pa ni nyi ma lta bu ste/ 'jam pa ni zla ba nya ba'i 'od zer lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa 'khor rnam bzhi ni skar ma lta bu'o/ /thub sku gser gyi kha dog la/ /mtshan rnams
<p>30a.4</p>kyis ni yongs su bskor/ /zhes bya ba ni sku gsung thub cing 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba/ sku la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'o/ /'jig rten mes bo tshangs pa yis/ /'jig rten sgron ma bstod byas te/ /zhes
<p>30a.5</p>bya ba ni stong spyi phud kyi rgyal po tshangs pas kyang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba nas sgrol ba/ stong gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal zhing bstod do/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/ /'jig rten skyong la 'di skad smras/ /
<p>30a.6</p>zhes bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gtso bo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ phyogs skyong bcus kyang zhus pa'o/ /'jig rten skyong gi 'khor rnams kyis/ /rjes su bstan pa ma thob ste/ /zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
<p>30a.7</p>'di/ yid bzhin nor bu rin po che 'dra ba ste/ 'jig rten skyong ba dag gis kyang 'di dang gzhan du mtshungs pa med pa'o/ /gang phyir 'di las sangs rgyas dang / /rang sangs rgyas dag 'byung 'gyur zhing / /zhes bya ba ni stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i lam 'di nas/ rin po che shel dang / 
<p>30b</p>
<p>30b.1</p>'dra ba ste/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa gang yang 'byung ba'o/ /'di las nyan thos rnams kyang skye/ /lha rnams dag kyang skye bar 'gyur/ /zhes pa ni nam mkha' las char byung ba bzhin du/ /'di'i sgo nas gang yang 'byung ba'o/ /rig byed yan lag drug mthar phyin/ /bram ze rnams kyang
<p>30b.2</p>skye bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni rtag pa'i chos drug yin te/ de yang sngar bshad pa bzhin du lta ba drug go/ /de rnams mthar phyin cing grol ba ste/ 'di'i sgo nas skye gnas bzang po bram ze'i rigs thob pa'o/ /drang srong skal ba chen po dang / /dge sbyong bram ze 'di las skye/ /zhes bya ba
<p>30b.3</p>ni stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i sgo nas lta ba thams cad 'byung ba'o/ /khyed cag snying las chung byed pa/ /mi yi skye dgu gnod par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams 'jigs skrag byed pa/ mi rnams la byams pa dang / snying rjer ldan pa'o/ /tshangs pa yi ni
<p>30b.4</p>tshig thos nas/ /'jig rten skyong gis tshig smras pa/ /zhes bya ba ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i tshig thos nas/ 'byung po rnams la phyogs skyong ba bcus smras pa'o/ /tshangs pa dang ni thub chen po/ /zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang
<p>30b.5</p>sangs rgyas dang / sems can thams cad bskyed pa'i ma stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i rig sngags 'di yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bdag gis ri rab bsgul byas shing / /zhes bya ba ni phung po'i gnas skabs so/ /ri rab de yi rgya dang ni/ /'phang dang grwa bzhi'i zur rnams dang / /zheng
<p>30b.6</p>la khru bzhi 'phang la bzhi/ /mu khyud zur brgyad sho 'dra ba/ /steng du dkyil 'khor legs par bri/ /sa tshon lngas ni yang dag tu/ /stong chen rab 'joms dkyil 'khor yang / /gru bzhi sgo bzhi ka ba brgyad/ /twa ra rnam bzhi rta babs rgyan/ /dra phyed rin chen la sogs pa/ /
<p>30b.7</p>gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan rnams/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lha mo dang / /mkhas pa dag gis bri bar bya/ /'bras sam bag phye la sogs pas/ /mkhas pa dag gis yang dag bya/ /ri rab gzugs ni sho 'dra ba/ /lha dang lha min 'byung po'i gnas/ /de lta bu yi gnas
<p>31a</p>
<p>31a.1</p>bcas la/ /lha dang lha min 'byung po dang / /de rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /rgyal po dang ni rgyal po'i 'khor/ /blon po dang ni blon mo dang / /gang dag de rnams gnod pa dang / /'byung po yi dgas sogs gnod dang / /byad stems dang ni 'thor ba dang / /
<p>31a.2</p>ro langs sbod gtong gtong ba dang / /zos pa dang ni skyugs pa dang / /grib ma ngan dang ltas ngan dang / /bri nyes dang ni bsgom nyes dang / /smad nad dang ni nyin gcig dang / /nyin gnyis gsum pa bzhi pa dang / /nyin bdun zla phyed zla ba gcig /nyin mo ba dang yud tsam
<p>31a.3</p>dad/ /ldang dub pa dang 'byung po dang / /mi yi rims dang mi ma yin/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan dang / /'dus pa bzhi 'gyur dag dang ni/ /de yi cho ga yang dag yin/ /nad ni bzhi brgya rtsa bzhir gyur pa las/ /rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/ /sngags btang ba dang bzlog pa
<p>31a.4</p>dang / /ma mo zor kha phur kha dang / /gshin rje la sogs gang yang rung / /de bzlog cho ga yang dag yin/ /shu ba g.yan pa mdze dang ni/ /phol mig gzhang nad 'bras dang ni/ /lhog dang me dbal bzlog pa dang / /sha bkra dmu chu khong nad dang / /glad pa na ba la sogs dang / /de yi cho ga
<p>31a.5</p>yang dag yin/ /gtso bor gyur pa nyi shu brgyad/ /stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad phrag dang ni/ /'byung po rnams kyi cho ga yang dag bshad/ /ri rab la sogs bzhi dag la'ang / /dkar po dang ni mthing ga dang / /dmar po dang ni ser po rnams/ /shar phyogs ngos nas rim bzhin du/ /
<p>31a.6</p>yang dag gis ni shes par bya/ /shar phyogs lha dang drang srong dang / /dri za'i gdon rnams gza' dang bcas/ /stong phrag brgyad cu nyi shu rtsa brgyad phrag /de rnams shar phyogs gdon rnams so/ /grul bum la sogs ma mo dang / /srin mo yi dgas gdon rnams dang / /lho phyogs la
<p>31a.7</p>ni yang dag shes/ /stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad phrag /de dag lho phyogs gdon rnams so/ /klu dang 'dab bzangs sa bdag dang / /nub phyogs dag ni yang dag shes/ /stong phrag brgyad cu nyi shu rtsa brgyad phrag /de dag nub phyogs gdon rnams so/ /gnod sbyin pho mo la sogs dang / /
<p>31b</p>
<p>31b.1</p>klu btsan la sogs gzhan rnams dang / /byang phyogs dag ni yang dag shes/ /stong phrag brgyad cu nyi shu rtsa brgyad phrag /de dag byang phyogs gdon rnams so/ /shar lho lho nub nub byang dang / /byang shar steng dang 'og dang ni/ /me yi gdon dang bden bral dang / /rlung lha'i gdon dang 'byung
<p>31b.2</p>po'i gdon/ /tshangs pa la sogs sa bdag dang / /stong phrag brgyad cu nyi shu rtsa brgyad phrag /mtshan drug la ni yang dag shes/ /steng dang 'og dang zur rnams su/ /'byung po'i tshogs ni shes par bya/ /bag phye dang ni 'bras phye'am/ /gzugs ni sna tshogs mkhas par bya/ /ba dan
<p>31b.3</p>dang ni rgyal mtshan dang / /gdugs dang me tog phreng ba dang / /'byung po'i tshogs dang bcas pa dang / /bu ram zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / /me tog dkar po la sogs dang / /sha dang khrag dang chang dang ni/ /nya sha sgog pa la sogs dang / /me tog ser po'i phreng ba rnams/ /'o ma ka ra
<p>31b.4</p>mngar gsum dang / /mar la sogs pa'i sman rnams dang / /me tog dmar po dUr ba'i phreng ba dang / /chang dang sha dang khrag rnams dang / /la phug la sogs me tog ljang gu'i phreng ba dang / /dmar po nag po mthing ga dang / /sna tshogs me tog phreng ba dang / /me dang bden bral
<p>31b.5</p>rlung dang ni/ /dbang ldan tshangs pa sa bdag dang / /sngon gyi rdzas la cha drug tu/ /yang dag gis ni shes rab la/ /mkhas pa'i sems la shes par bya/ /a kar gu gul la sogs dang / /sbrul gyi pags pa nya mgo dang / /yungs kar sgog pa bsres pa dang / /ga bur gla rtsi
<p>31b.6</p>spang spos dang / /tsan+dan la sogs sbyar ba dang / /tshil bu yungs kar bsres pa dang / /de dag la ni spos phor ro/ /khur ba chan dang thug pa dang / /de dag kun la shes par bya/ /rgya phibs bla re gdugs dang bcas/ /rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs dang / /spos sbyar yang dag me
<p>31b.7</p>tog dang / /bu ram zhal zas sna tshogs dang / /lhan cig sbyar ba'i dri rnams dang / /de rnams la ni yang dag mchod/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i dbus su ni/ /stong chen rab tu 'joms ma yang / /pad+ma'i lte bar yang dag bzhugs/ /de yi phyi rol ra ba la/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad shes
<p>32a</p>
<p>32a.1</p>par bya/ /rgyal po bzhi dang phyogs skyong dang / /gza' dang skar ma la sogs la/ /'khor lo lha rnams sgo rnams la/ /mkhas pas yang dag shes par bya/ /lnga'am gcig gam gang 'byor yang / /gang ba'i bum pa bkra shis pa/ /lnga pa'i dbus su
<p>32a.2</p>gzhag par bya/ /gser ram dngul las byas pa yi/ /'jim sogs rab gnas byas pa yi/ /mchod rten la ni mchod par bya/ /mtshams gcod yul 'khor srung ba dang / /bkra shis la sogs gang yang rung / /de bzhin du ni byas nas ni/ /the tshom med de yang dag yin/ /slob
<p>32a.3</p>dpon lnga'am gcig kyang rung / /yang dag gis ni rim pa bzhin/ /'byung po rnams ni dgug par bya/ /stong chen rab tu 'joms ma yang / /phyogs bzhi'i mtshams su rgyun mi 'chad/ /slob dpon dgongs pa gsum ldan pas/ /ngag ma 'dres par bzlas par bya/ /zhes bstan pa'o/ /
<p>32a.4</p>sa yang rnam par bzlog byas la/ /zhes bya ba ni phyogs skyong ba bcus tshangs pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar zhus pa'o/ /stobs dang ldan zhing ri rab thogs par nus te/ sa gzhi yang 'khrugs par nus shing / /'jig rten gyi khams kyang ldog par
<p>32a.5</p>nus pa'o/ /rgya mtsho la ni thug pa rnams/ /rnam par sbyang ba nyid du bya/ /zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs nas go rims bzhin du/ phyi'i khor khor yug tsam bdag gi dbang du 'gyur te/ steng dang 'og tu yang de bzhin no/ /'jig rten khams de sbyong bar byed cing 'dul bas na sbyang ba'o/ /
<p>32a.6</p>zhags pa dam po ma nyams pas/ /nyi ma zla ba rlung rnams dang / /zhes bya ba ni mdo sde zhags pas de dang de ldan pas yang 'dren pa'o/ /skar ma dag ni thams cad kyang / /bdag gis su ni bcing bar bya/ /zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas/ /smin drug la sogs
<p>32a.7</p>pa'i rgyu skar rnams bcing ba'o/ /gang dag rab tu sdang byed cing / /'jig rten la ni phan mi byed/ /ces bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu zhing / /gnod pa skyel ba rnams la rig sngags kyi bcing ba lngas bcings pa'o/ /de dag la ni thams cad du/ /
<p>32b</p>
<p>32b.1</p>phyogs kyang snang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gnod pa skyel ba'i 'byung po rnams/ phyogs bcu rnams su gnas pa'i sa med par/ /sdug bsngal drag po myong ba'o/ /'jig rten lha dang bcas pa de/ /'byung po rnams kyi phyir smod de/ /zhes bya ba ni lha dang klu dang lha ma yin la
<p>32b.2</p>sogs pa/ bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu po rnams/ phyir 'gyed cing 'dor mi gtong ba'o/ /'byung po mi yi skye dgu la/ /gnod par byed cing 'tshe bar byed/ /ces bya ba ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin/ byang chub sems la gnod pa'o/ /gang dag sngags dang sman rnams dang / /
<p>32b.3</p>rig sngags las ni 'da' byed pa/ /zhes bya ba ni 'di la gus par byed cing dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i gang zag dang / sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed ces rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa rnams so/ /'di la sngags kyi dam pa ni/ /pha rol gnon pa ston par
<p>32b.4</p>byed/ /ces bya ba ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma 'dis kyang / gsang sngags kyi tshig ston pa tsam gyis ni/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyi stobs 'phrog pa'o/ /rig sngags las ni 'da' ba'i 'khor/ /kun du chad pas bsdigs byas te/ /zhes pa ni phyag
<p>32b.5</p>mtshan dang sku mdog ston pa ni/ ded dpon dag ni nyi shu brgyad/ /re re la yang stong phrag brgyad cu brgyad cu'o/ /'di dag gi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dkar po dmar po ser po dang / /ljang gu dang ni mthing ga dang / /la la dkar ser dmar ser dang / /la la ser nag ljang nag dang / /
<p>32b.6</p>mgo bo ser po mjug ma nag /smad dkar stod gnag khra bo'i gzugs/ /sna tshogs gzugs te phyed gzugs so/ /lag na rdo rje 'khor lo thogs/ /gtun shing dang ni rtse gsum mo/ /la la ral gri lag na thogs/ /gtor ma rwa dang mdung thung thogs/ /'phang mdung dang ni nar
<p>32b.7</p>tsa dang / /la la dbyug pa thogs pa dang / /rtse gcig dang ni mdung rings thogs/ /mdung dang mda' gzhu lcags kyu dang / /la la mda' rings ga ge dang / /cha lang dang ni rol mo'i tshogs/ /pi wang gling bu glu len cing / /gnod sbyin pho mo glu len cing / /yan lag lnga dang ldan pa yis/ / 
<p>33a</p>
<p>33a.1</p>rol mo'i tshogs ni la la byed/ /la la mi lpags gon pa dang / /mi mgo lag na thogs pa dang / /mi yi rgyu mas thod kyang byed/ /la la mi yi rus pa thogs/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang sna tshogs phyag mtshan dang / /'byung po'i tshogs su shes par bya/ /sku mdog dang phyag mtshan
<p>33a.2</p>bstan pa'o/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga ru/ /thal sbyar 'khod nas 'di skad smras/ /zhes bya ba ni 'byung po'i gnas ston pa'o/ /skya snar bu ni ka ba na/ /grong khyer bzang na byang phyogs na/ /bya rgod phung po'i rgyal po'i khab/ /rgya mtsho mtha' yi bar gyi sar/ /lan gsum bar
<p>33a.3</p>du 'gro byed grong / /mkha' lding rgyas pa sped pa nas/ /rgyal khab dang ni ser skya'i gnas/ /shAkya'i tog na gar ltam par/ /sgra gcan dang ni tsir da na/ /mnyan yod dang ni gnas dang bcas/ /rgya mtsho'i gnas dang yangs pa can/ /gyad yul dang ni g.yog 'dor dang / /tsam pa
<p>33a.4</p>yul dang 'jug sgo can/ /sgo drug dang ni zangs kyi 'dab ma can/ /brang gis 'gro na 'brog gnas dang / /'bru mangs na ni mchog tu srungs/ /srung ba can dang gso ba'i mtha'/ /bsnyen ngag 'grong khyer gnas dang ni/ /chu mchog na ni 'chi med zhag /rnga bzangs dang ni gzi can dang / /
<p>33a.5</p>ri ldan grong khyer phyogs mtshams dang / /'od ma'i 'gram dang ka ling ka /'gro 'joms dang ni mi thub gnas/ /mdun khab gnas dang phreng ba brtsigs/ /rtad mar na dang ma rdzogs pa/ /snyems pa can dang ma rgyal gnas/ /gnas bcas dang ni zhi ba'i grong khyer dang / /'jigs
<p>33a.6</p>byed dang ni brang 'gro dang / /rdo grong dang ni shing gi grong khyer na/ /kha dog can dang tshangs par ldan/ /ba glang 'dzin dang rdo 'jog dang / /bong srungs sel dang ri la gnas/ /ldan grogs dang ni hro nu'i dang / /dga' ba dga' byed grong khyer na/ /rlung gi sa dang 'phyang 'gyur na/ /bcom
<p>33a.7</p>brlag na dang lang ka dang / /rab nyams dang ni mdzod 'dzin dang / /rnam rgyal ldan dang bcom brlag na yang gnas/ /ma la ya dang rtse 'dzin dang / /po 'dra na dang rab tu gnas/ /pi tang ka le dang ni rlabs ldan dang / /sna nas thung dang gso ba'i mtha'/ /dga' byed dang ni lag pa dang / /
<p>33b</p>
<p>33b.1</p>pu mtshan dang ni mdzod 'dzin dang / /pho brang ngan dang g.yog 'khor dang / /'gram ldan phung po grong khyer drug /mtha' man dang srung ba can/ /ba lang 'jog dang phyogs mtshams na/ /gdugs 'dra na dang grong khyer gsum/ /tshang tshing gcig dang u dum+WAr/ /kau shAm+bI dang zhi ldan na/ /
<p>33b.2</p>sbrul gyi gdugs dang g.yo 'dzin na/ /gyen du 'gro dang thob byed na/ /grong ldan tshol ba lang chen mdzod/ /lha yi g.yul dang g.yul 'gyed ldan/ /dgra ngan zhing dang rgyal gnyis na/ /de nyid dang ni rab brten dang / /don grub grub dang don gnas dang / /'gro 'joms dang ni sbom po nyid/ /
<p>33b.3</p>seng ge'i stobs dang sde bo che/ /de bzhin gzhan gyi grong dang ni/ /tsam pa dang ni ri mangs dang / /ba lang 'byor dang grong khyer dang / /gnas dang khwa la kau shAm+bI/ /bzang po can dang dam pa can/ /mching bu dang ni ma la ya/ /tshang tshing gnas dang ma rgyal gnas/ /chu mchog dang ni sen d+ha ba/ /
<p>33b.4</p>'gro ldan dag dang ser skya'i gnas/ /gzhan snyas dang ni sgo gnas dang / /dbu ma'i sde dang bzang mdzes dang / /grong khyer snying dang mya ngan sa/ /khyus 'gro dang ni nga rgyal brag /'jig byed dang ni kha che'i yul/ /ral pa can dang grong dang ni/ /kha che'i yul gyi sa mtshams na/ /sa la
<p>33b.5</p>gnas dang spu yi mtshan/ /dkyil 'khor bstan dang ka bu sha /dga' ba'i tshang dang ni nam bsrung / /ngan pa dang ni tho gar yul/ /grong bcas pa dang rgya mtsho gnas/ /grong khyer gsum ni spu yi gnas/ /gra mi ngar dang sing ga la/ /ne tso bzhin dang 'og na gnas/ /pun d+ha gar
<p>33b.6</p>dang grong khyer che/ /'jigs pa bzhin dang chu dang ldan/ /rtogs po'i yul dang ka ta ka /'phral ring 'phral dang u rgyan yul/ /thong shol ngan dang mya ngan na/ /yo ga na dang dga' dang ldan/ /phung po'i dbang dang chung ma can/ /rgyal po'i khab dang yangs pa ni/ /gnas te dug
<p>33b.7</p>sbrul dang ni lcang lo'i grong / /dga' ba'i grong dang lha las babs pa dang / /de dag ni 'byung po'i gnas bstan pa'o/ /sbrul gyi gang gis 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor kun/ /zhes bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gyu ba'i 'byung po rnams/ nga'i bka' las ma 'das
<p>34a</p>
<p>34a.1</p>na/ pho brang lcang lo can du skye ba thob pa'o/ /'di bshad pa na mi nyan pa/ /de dag chad pa bshad par bya/ /zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka'/ /rig sngags kyi bden pa'i dmod mos rlag par byed pa'o/ /tshangs pas sprul pa'i mdo sde ste/ /sangs rgyas
<p>34a.2</p>zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni tshad med pa bzhi'i sgo nas gnas pa/ byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /phan tshun du ni bltas byas na/ /bai DUr+ya dang gser dngul dang / /zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams kyi gzhal yas khang lta
<p>34a.3</p>na sdug cing rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /mu tig rnams dang shel dag dang / /spug dang rdo yi snying po dang / /zhes bya ba ni mu tig dmar po dkar pos dra ba byas pa/ sa gzhi dang rtsig pa shel las byas pa/ spug dang rdo'i snying pos ka tan dang / ka ba byas pa'o/ /rin
<p>34a.4</p>chen bdun gyis brgyan pa yi/ /rtsibs stong kha dog gser 'dra ba'i/ /zhes bya ba ni sgo bzhi ka ba brgyad/ twa ra rnam bzhi ni gzhi gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis phra byas pa'o/ /shing rta rnam pa bzhi byas pa/ /bzo rnams kun dang ldan pa ste/ /zhes bya ba ni/ /shar
<p>34a.5</p>phyogs seng ge'i shing rta dang / /twa ra rnam bzhis mdzes pa'o/ /de bzhin du go rims bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ /glang po che dang / rta dang / ri dgas sha rtu la'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la 'gro/ /rgyal po dag ni der bzhugs nas/ /zhes bya ba ni yang na shing rta de dang ldan
<p>34a.6</p>zhing / /nam mkha' la rgyu'o/ /'byung po'i dkyil 'khor nyid du dong / /sa ni gser gyi phye ma la/ /zhes bya ba ni sems kyis sprul pa'i gzhal yas khang dang 'dra ba/ /lta na sdug pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs su snang ba'o/ /me tog dag gis bkang byas nas/ /mgul par ltung
<p>34a.7</p>dang skud pa dang / /zhes bya ba ni sa gzhi yang me tog gis bkang ba/ pho brang yang me tog gis snang ba ste/ 'byung po dang 'byung mo rnams me tog gis mgo la brgyan pa ste/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spyod pa'o/ /zhags pa dag kyang gdags byos la/ /phyogs kyi sa ni ji snyed pas/ / 
<p>34b</p>
<p>34b.1</p>zhes bya ba ni 'byung po de rnams kyang tshangs pa'i thag pas bcings te/ sa dang bar snang la rgyu ba rnams la'o/ /'byung po thams cad khrid shog ces/ /gnod sbyin gyi ni ded dpon kun/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gnod pa byed pa'i 'byung po rnams/ /kun kyang zhags pas drangs pa'o/ /phyogs bcu
<p>34b.2</p>dag tu dgye bar bya/ /zhes bya ba ni phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'byung po rnams dgye ba'o/ /stong chen rab tu 'joms pa yi/ /mdo sde yi ni dam pa 'di/ /zhes bya ba ni seng ge'i sgra lta bus dam pa rnams kyi dam pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i
<p>34b.3</p>'jig rten bar du 'byung / /lha rnams kun gyis rnam par bsams/ /zhes bya ba ni chos sku'i rang bzhin nam mkha'i rang bzhin thams cad khyab pa/ sems can rnams kyi yum lta bu'o/ /stong chen mo yi lus kyis su/ /gnod sbyin dang ni srin po btul/ /zhes bya ba ni rig sngags
<p>34b.4</p>kyis lus ngag yid gsum gyis kyang ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'o/ /lus ngan po yi tshig thos nas/ /gnod sbyin gyi ni ded dpon stong / /zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po ku be ra'i tshig thos nas/ gnod sbyin ded dpon stong phrag gnas pa'o/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu song nas su/ /
<p>34b.5</p>gsang ba po la drag tu bsgo/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin de rnams kyang / bka' stsal pa'i tshig snang ba'o/ /thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad/ /dri za las byung gdon gyi tshogs/ /zhes bya ba ni thub pa ni sangs rgyas la zhus pa'o/ /dri za'i ded dpon gyi gdon phyogs der 'khod pa dag go/ /
<p>34b.6</p>shar phyogs cha na 'khod pa dag /mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun/ /zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs nas gnod par byed pa/ rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas bcings pa'o/ /bcing pa lnga yis bsdams pa yis/ /'byung po mang po nga la nyon/ /zhes bya ba ni ye shes lnga'i
<p>34b.7</p>zhags pas bsdams pa ste/ dri za'i gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rnams/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis bka' stsal pa'o/ /thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad/ /grul bum las byung gdon gyi rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni thub pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar zhus
<p>35a</p>
<p>35a.1</p>pa'o/ /grul bum gyi ded dpon la sogs pa/ rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas 'dren pa'o/ /lto phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag /mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun/ /zhes bya ba ni lho phyogs nas glags tshol zhing sems can la gnod pa byed pa rnams/ 
<p>35a.2</p>rig pa'i zhags pas bcings pa'o/ /bcing pa lnga yis bsdams pa yi/ /'byung po mang po nga la nyon/ /zhes bya ba ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gti mug la sogs pa de de'i bsdams pas bcings pa ste/ ma rungs pa'i gdon la sogs pa rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos 'dul
<p>35a.3</p>ba'o/ /thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad/ /klu las gdon du gyur pa rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni thub pa ni sangs rgyas la zhus pa/ klu'i ded dpon du gyur pa/ nub ngos na 'khod pa'o/ /nub phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag/ /mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun/ /zhes bya ba ni ma rungs
<p>35a.4</p>pa'i klu dang sa bdag la sogs pa/ rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas bcings pa'o/ /bcing pa lnga yis bsdams pa yi/ /'byung po mang po nga la nyon/ /zhes bya ba ni nub ngos nas glags tshol zhing / sems can rnams la gnod pa ste/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis
<p>35a.5</p>bcings pa bsdams nas/ /rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang gis klu'i gdon la sogs pa la chad pa gcod pa'o/ /thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad/ /gnod sbyin las ni gnod gyur pa/ /zhes bya ba ni thub pa ni sangs rgyas la zhus pas te/ gnon sbyin gyi ded dpon rnams byang ngos na
<p>35a.6</p>gnas pa'o/ /byang phyogs cha 'dir 'khor ba dag /mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun/ /zhes bya ba ni byang ngos nas glags tshol zhing / sems can la gnod par byed de/ /de rnams kyang rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas bcings pa'o/ /bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa
<p>35a.7</p>yi/ /'byung po mang po nga la nyon/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyi gdon la sogs pa/ ye shes lnga'i bcing pas bsdams te/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos bus chad pas gcod pa'o/ /lus ngan gyi ni bu thu bo/ /kun du rgyal ba mi la zhon/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon sde bo che
<p>35b</p>
<p>35b.1</p>rnams yin te/ 'dir yang gnod pa byed pa rnams so/ /de yi drung na 'khod pa yi/ /gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu dag /ces bya ba ni rnam thos kyi bu che shos la 'khod pa'o/ /bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas/ /mdo sde'i zhags pas rab tu drangs/ /zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon
<p>35b.2</p>tan lnga'i bcing pas bsdams pas/ rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas bsdams pa'o/ /de nyid kyi ni bu gnyis pa/ /skyed pa po zhes rnam grags pa/ /zhes bya ba ni rnam thos kyi bu che shos kyi 'og ma'o/ /de yi drung na 'khod pa yi/ /gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni
<p>35b.3</p>bu de'i 'khor ded dpon sde bo che rnams so/ /bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas/ /mdo sde'i zhags pas kun du drangs/ /zhes bya ba ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyis bsdams shing / rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas bcings pa'o/ /de nyid kyi ni bu gsum dang / /de yi
<p>35b.4</p>ming ni gdon po che/ /zhes bya ba ni rnam thos kyi bu mtha' ltag go/ /de yi drung na 'khod pa yi/ /gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon sde bo che rnams so/ /bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas/ /mdo sde'i zhags pas kun du drangs/ /zhes bya
<p>35b.5</p>ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas bsdams pa/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos bcings pa'o/ /de nyid kyi ni bu bzhi pa/ /de yi ming ni bum bu'i lto/ /zhes bya ba ni rnam thos sras kyi bu tha ma'o/ /de yi drung na 'khod pa yi/ /gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni bu de'i 'khor
<p>35b.6</p>ded dpon sde bo che rnams so/ /bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas/ /mdo sde'i zhags pas kun du drangs/ /zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyang ye shes lngas bsdams shing / rig sngags kyi zhags pas bsdams pa'o/ /dbang phyug chen po lha chen po/ /lag bzhi pa la stobs po
<p>35b.7</p>che/ /zhes bya ba ni g.yas gnyis na tri shU la dang / bum pa spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ g.yon gnyis na phreng ba dang mchod sbyin mdzad pa/ stobs dang gzi brjid dang ldan pa khams gsum la dbang byed pa'o/ /de yi drung na 'khod ba yi/ /gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams/ /zhes bya
<p>36a</p>
<p>36a.1</p>ba ni dbang phyug chen po'i 'khor rnams zhes bya ba ni ded dpon du gnas shing sde che ba'o/ /bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas/ /mdo sde'i zhags pas kun du drangs/ /zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas bsdams shing / rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas
<p>36a.2</p>bsdams pa'o/ /'byung po 'joms pa'i ri la ni/ /'byung po thams cad lhags nas su/ /zhes bya ba ni rigs mi gcig ba'i gdon thams cad gnas pa'o/ /'joms pa ni rig sngags kyis 'joms pa'o/ /rig sngags thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /rig sngags 'di ni kun du
<p>36a.3</p>bsam/ /zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' bzhin thams cad la khyab pa/ sems can dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa skyed pa'i yum lta bu'o/ /chad pa mi bzad drag po ste/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ /zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi sangs
<p>36a.4</p>rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa/ gzhan rnams kyis mi thub pa dmod mo'i chad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas la ni gus par ni/ /thams cad 'di la skyabs su song / /zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la skyabs su 'dong zhing zhes bya ba ni/ dam ba'i chos
<p>36a.5</p>rig sngags la gus pa'o/ /g.yo med par ni rjes zhugs shing / /thams cad med par gyur ta re/ /zhes bya ba ni brdzun mi smra bar sems can mi slu bas te/ stong pa'i rang bzhin du snang ba'o/ /de nas thang cig tsam gyis ni/ /'byung po mang po thams cad lhags/ /zhes bya ba ni
<p>36a.6</p>gzugs sna tshogs su snang ba'i 'byung po rnams kyang / /rig sngags kyi ye shes zhags pas drangs nas/ phyogs bzhir snang ba'o/ /ri rnams dang ni g.yang sa dang / /rgya mtsho dang ni mtsho rnams dang / /zhes bya ba ni 'byung po'i gnas ni de rnams dang ldan pa'o/ /klung dang 'bab
<p>36a.7</p>chu lu ma dang / /dba' klong dag na gang 'khod dang / /zhes bya ba ni de dang ldan pa'i gnas su bsdad cing / sems can rnams la gnod pa byed pa'o/ /skyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang / /kun dga' dang ni nags rnams dang / /zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams gnas gcig tu mi/ 
<p>36b</p>
<p>36b.1</p>gnas te/ gzugs sna tshogs su snang ba'o/ /mchod rten gnas dang grong gi gnas/ /shing ljon drung na gang gnas dang / /zhes bya ba ni gnas de dang de la gnas shing / 'jig rten khams su rgyu ba'o/ /grong khyer sgo dang grong rnams dang / /grong rdal dang ni ljongs rnams dang / /
<p>36b.2</p>zhes bya ba ni 'byung po tshan gcig ni grong dang grong khyer rnams su rgyu zhing / sems can rnams la glags tshol ba'o/ /rgyal po'i pho brang sgo rnams dang / /gzhal med khang na gnas pa dang / /zhes bya ba ni tshan gcig kyang rgyal po la gnod pa byed pa rnams/ gnas der bsdad cing
<p>36b.3</p>glags tshol ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor dag dang dur khrod dang / /de bzhin lha khang rnams dang ni/ /zhes bya ba ni tshan gcig ni lha khang rnying pa la chags shing dge ba la bar chod byed pa'o/ /mtshams dang sho gam gnas rnams dang / /khang stong dang ni gram sa dang / /zhes bya ba ni de dang der
<p>36b.4</p>ldan pa'i gnas su bsdad cing / gzugs mi gcig par snang ba'o/ /gnod sbyin gang rnams bla 'og dang / /phyogs bzhi dang ni mtshams rnams nas/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin de dang ldan pa ni/ /phyogs mtshams brgyad du gnas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin bye ba stong rnams ni/ /
<p>36b.5</p>rig sngags zhags pas bkug pa rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ stong phrag de dang de yod pa/ /ma rungs pa yi 'byung po rnams/ /rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas 'dren pa'o/ /rdza rnga dag ni brdungs nas su/ /la las sda zlum ngag ni brdungs/ /zhes bya ba ni sgra la dga' ba'i
<p>36b.6</p>gnod sbyin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab par snang ba'o/ /pi wang gling bu khar ba'i rnga/ /stobs chen dag ni sgra 'byin te/ /zhes bya ba ni tshan gcig kyang rol mo la dga' zhing / sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o/ /rol mo'i sgra dbyangs sna tshogs dang / /glu dang gar
<p>36b.7</p>rnams byas nas su/ /zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams slu ba'o/ /dbang po zla ba chu lha dang / /ba ra d+h+wa dza skye dgu'i bdag /ces pa ni gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon sum cu rtsa gnyis su gnas shing / /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba dag go/ /mi ldan pa dang kun du lta/ /mngon shes
<p>37a</p>
<p>37a.1</p>gangs can rdzogs pa dang / /zhes bya ba ni de rnams la yang de'i sder bcas shing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu ba'o/ /tsan+dan dang ni 'dod mchog dang / /mgul pa mdzes dang mgul nges dang / /zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyis kyang sems can gyi don
<p>37a.2</p>byas shing / rig sngags la gus pa'o/ /skye dgu'i bla mar gyur pa dang / /lha las byung ba'i ma ldan dang / /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyi tshan de dang der ldan zhing / nam mkha' dang / sa steng sa 'og tu rgyu ba'o/ /dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/ /mi rgyal rgyal ba khyu mchog dang / /zhes bya
<p>37a.3</p>ba ni sde po cher grags shing stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin phung bu lnga zhes bya/ /g.yer ma dang ni nyi zer dang / /zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa/ yud tsam gyis stong gsum khyab pa'o/ /nya lcibs dang ni ral gyi bu/ /kun kyi bshes dang grags 'dzin dang / /zhes bya
<p>37a.4</p>ba ni 'byung po sde tshan de dang ldan pa/ ral gri bzhin du rno ba'o/ /'brog gnas dang ni yid bzangs dang / /khab rna dang ni ri sul kha/ /zhes bya ba ni sde bo che nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ de rnams yang gzugs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'o/ /lnga 'dzin dang ni khab bzangs dag /
<p>37a.5</p>sde dang dpung dang bzhon par bcas/ /zhes bya ba ni stobs dang ldan pa sde bo cher grags pa'o/ /lha dang klu dang dri za dang / /gnod sbyin 'byung po lha ma yin/ /zhes bya ba ni gdon rigs mi gcig pa lha'i gdon la sogs pa stong phrag brgyad cu'o/ /nyin gsum pa yi smyo byed dang / /de
<p>37a.6</p>bzhin bzhi pa'i rims dag dang / /zhes bya ba ni nad sna tshogs gtong zhing smyo bar byed pa rnams yin te/ de rnams yang gzhan mi thub pa stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /'jig rten 'tshe ba gang yin pa/ /gnod sbyin 'byung po ma rungs rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
<p>37a.7</p>'jig rten gyi khams skad cig yud tsam thang cig gis rgyu ba/ /sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed pa'o/ /phyogs bzhi nas ni bkug nas su/ /bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams la/ ye shes lnga'i zhags pas bcings
<p>37b</p>
<p>37b.1</p>pa'o/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga ru/ /thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad smras/ /zhes bya ba ni 'byung po de rnams kyis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar/ gus bar byas nas zhus pa'o/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/ /
<p>37b.2</p>zhes bya ba ni bdud bzhi 'joms pa la dpa' ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu pos sku la brgyan pa/ sems can rnams la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba/ snying rje dang byams pas khyab pa/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rgyal khyod la
<p>37b.3</p>phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni 'byung po de rnams kyis zhabs la gus par phyag 'tshal te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la/ chos kyi rgyal srid mdzad pa'o/ /de dag gi ni mdun rgyug pa/ /'byung po gnod sbyin lus po che/ /zhes bya ba ni che ba ri rab dang mnyam pa/ chung
<p>37b.4</p>ba ba spu'i rtsa mo tsam/ de dang der ldan pa'i 'byung po rnams rgyu ba'o/ /lag pa bzhi pa ma rungs pa/ /rkang mangs dang ni rkang gcig pa/ /zhes bya ba ni mda' dang gzhu dang ral gri mdung rnams thogs pa/ stong tsho gcig gi rkang pa yod pa/ rkang gcig ni gnyis sbrel nas rgyu ba'o/ /rkang
<p>37b.5</p>bzhi pa dang rkang gnyis dang / /rkang pa bsgreng la spyi'u tshugs dang / /zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i 'byung po yang spyi bo'i gtsug gis 'gro zhing / sems can rnams 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /de bzhin du rkang bzhi rkang gnyis kyang 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /lus mang mgo bo gcig pa dang / /lus
<p>37b.6</p>gcig pa la mgo bzhi dang / /zhes bya ba ni gzugs che zhing 'jigs su rung ba bzhin mi sdug ba rnams so/ /mig mang po la lus phyed dang / /mig gcig lto ni bcu gnyis dang / /zhes bya ba ni rkang gcig lag gcig lus su snang zhing / /lus de la mig mang po yod pa ste/ 'byung po
<p>37b.7</p>gzhan yang lto ba ri bo lta bur gnas pa/ mang po bsdebs pa mig gcig tu snang ba'o/ /bong bu rnga mo glang chen mgo/ /lag pa bsgreng la mgo btud dang / /zhes bya ba ni gzugs mi'i gzugs la mgo bo sna tshogs su snang ba/ rkang pa dang lag pa sgreng bar byed pa'o/ /mtshon cha'i so dang
<p>38a</p>
<p>38a.1</p>mtshon cha'i lag /mtshon cha'i rkang pa srin po rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni de kun gyi yan lag dang ral gri dang / mda' gzhu dang mdung la sogs par snang ba'o/ /zangs kyi skra dang zangs kyi so/ /zangs kyi mig dang zangs kyi lag /ces bya ba ni shin tu dmar ba 'jigs su rung
<p>38a.2</p>ba ste/ mtshon cha bzhin du snang ba'o/ /zangs kyi tho ba rkang pa dang / /zangs kyi sna dang zangs kyi kha/ /zhes bya ba ni mtshon cha mi 'jigs pa 'dzin pa/ rkang pa yang tho ba'i tshul du gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin du kha la sogs pa yang zangs kyi skra bzhin du snang ba'o/ /rkang lag kun du 'bar ba
<p>38a.3</p>dang / /mi yi lus su gnas pa rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni me bzhin du 'bar te/ des kyang mi la zhe sdang la sogs pa 'bar bar byed pa'o/ /sgur zhar lba ba gsum yod pa/ /mig mi sdug la kha glal ba/ /zhes bya ba ni bong thung zhing lus po sgur te/ de'i ske la sba ba gsum yod pa/ 
<p>38a.4</p>lus po zha zhing kha gdangs pa/ mchu sngon por sang ba 'jigs pa'o/ /chu srin stag gi gzugs dang ni/ /gzugs mi sdug dang kha ral po/ /zhes bya ba ni mi'i lus la mgo brnyan du yod pa/ kha gdangs shing mi sdug pa'o/ /mchu 'phyang po dang so yon po/ /rab tu sdug pa'i khro gnyer
<p>38a.5</p>can/ /zhes bya ba ni gdong pa yo ba/ de bzhin du mchu dang so yo ba'o/ /khro bar gnas shing sems can la 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /gsus po che dang bum sna po/ /rna 'phyangs po dang rna ba med/ /ces bya ba ni gsus pa ri rab tsam snang ba/ rna ba gos su gon pa/ rna ba bcad
<p>38a.6</p>pa'i 'byung po rnams so/ /lag ring dang ni rna ba ring / /sna yi rtse dang lag rtse ring / /zhes bya ba ni lag pa brkyang bas dpag tshad brgyar slebs te/ snas lus khebs te glang po che'i sna dang 'dra ba/ de bzhin sor mo yang ring ba'o/ /lus skams lus ni ring ba dang / /skra ring rab tu
<p>38a.7</p>brgyan pa dang / /zhes bya ba ni shin tu nag pa/ shing lpags skams pa dang 'dra ba/ /ring ba ni ring ba pas kyang ches ring ba lus rnams kyang skra ring bas brgyan pa'o/ /rkang pa mid pa phra ba dang / /dri nga ba dang bum lto po/ /zhes bya ba ni yan lag gi tshigs rdog por yod pa/ rkang
<p>38b</p>
<p>38b.1</p>pa phra bas te/ dri mi zhim pa mnam pa/ gsus pa ri bo tsam yod pa'o/ /yan lag chu srin 'dra ba dang / /gtun shing tho ba 'dra ba'i lto/ /zhes bya ba ni lag pa dang rkang pa yang chu srin 'dra ste/ gzugs ring ba/ rked pa nyag pa/ nag por snang ba'o/ /gnam lto ba dang sna bo
<p>38b.2</p>che/ /gyen du brdzes skra rab tu dmar/ /zhes bya ba ni sna yar 'khyil pa glang po che'i sna 'dra ba/ khab kyi rtse mo dang 'dra ba'i skra dmar zhing 'bar ba'o/ /mgo bo che la gzhu mgrin po/ /rked pa sgur po bum lto bo/ /zhes bya ba ni 'byung po la la ni gzhu bzhin du ske sgur bas te/ de bzhin du
<p>38b.3</p>yan lag dang lus po rnams kyang sgur ba'o/ /ri rab rtse mo bsgul nas su/ /me mdag gi ni char pa 'bebs/ /zhes bya ba ni gzi brjid dang / stobs dang ldan zhing / /ri rab dang sa g.yo bar byed pa ma rungs pa'i char 'bebs pa'o/ /ljon shing ri dang rdo ba dang / /sprin gyi tshogs kyi
<p>38b.4</p>mdog 'dra ba/ /zhes bya ba ni la la gzugs bzang bar gnas pa/ gzhan rnams yang bzhin mi sdug pa'o/ /dung dang rnga chen rdza rnga dang / /grul bum rnga bran rnams kyi sgra/ /zhes bya ba ni sgra dang rol mo la dga' ba gar sna tshogs dang ldan pa'o/ /'jigs pa'i sgra ni rab tu 'byin/ /ming
<p>38b.5</p>po che la bong bu'i sgra/ /zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi rtse mo nas gling bzhir thos pa'i sgra/ sgra des sems can 'jigs pa'o/ /nag po sngon po ser po dang / /dmar ser me ltar dmar ser dang / /zhes bya ba ni bzhin mi sdug pa gzugs sna tshogs su snang ba/ bskal ba'i me'i 'od dang 'dra ba'i 'od
<p>38b.6</p>zer snang ba'o/ /khab 'dra'i spu dang ral gri'i skra/ /dmar po'i khrag gis bskus pa rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni shin tu rno ba lus dang mgo rnams la khyab pa/ kha yang khrag gis bskus pa'o/ /mi ro dag ni khyer nas su/ /za bzhin du ni rnam par rgyug /ces bya ba ni mi rnams la 'tshe bar byed
<p>38b.7</p>cing srog 'phrog pa rnams yin te/ glags tshol zhing 'phrang kha bsgugs pa rnams yin no/ /so rnon lag pa dmar po dang / /mchu ni khrag gis bskus pa dang / /zhes bya ba ni mche ba ring ba mtshon 'dra ba ste/ sems can rnams kyi lag pa dmar por snang ba/ khrag 'thung ba la dga' ba'o/ /
<p>39a</p>
<p>39a.1</p>lus phyed dag ni zos pa dang / /mkhal snying dang nang grol gyis/ /zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed pas/ sha dang khrag la dga' ba dang / /don snying lnga la dga' ba'o/ /snyim pa shin tu bkang ba dang / byis pa dag ni za bzhin du/ /zhes bya ba ni mi rnams kyi
<p>39a.2</p>ni srog 'phrogs nas don snying rnam pa lnga phyung nas za bar byed pa'o/ /mer mer po dang srog chags kyi/ /rkang lag rnams kyi stobs kyang 'phrog /ces bya ba ni byang chub sems chags su mi ster bar za ba/ ma'i mngal nas gzi brjid 'phrog pa'o/ /keng rus kyi ni lus kyis su/ /skye bo
<p>39a.3</p>mang po skrag par byed/ /ces bya ba ni pags pa dang sha med pa dang rus par snang ste/ de lta bu'i gzugs kyis kyang 'tshe bar byed pa'o/ /khrag gis rab tu bkang ba yi/ /mi yi pags pa thogs nas su/ /zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams kyi khrag 'jib cing / mi yi pags pa gon
<p>39a.4</p>pa'o/ /mi bzad dug gis kun bskus te/ /phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyug /ces bya ba ni bsam pa dang / mthong ba dang reg pa dang / mche ba'i dug rnams kyis bskus pa/ stong gsum gyi stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyug pa'o/ /grong khyer rnams kyi sgo rnams dang / /khyim
<p>39a.5</p>nas khyim du rnam par 'thor/ /zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams la glags tshol ba/ grong dang grong khyer grong rdal du rgyu ba'o/ /rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa rnams/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu 'khrug par byed/ /ces bya ba ni 'byung po rnams kyi mdze dang phol mig la sogs pa nad bzhi brgya
<p>39a.6</p>rtsa bzhi gtong ba'i bdag po'o/ /de ltar de na rgyal po yi/ /gdon dang 'jigs pa chen po rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang 'byung po'i gdon de rnams 'dul ba'o/ /lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang / /rig sngags zhags pas rab tu bsdams/ /zhes bya ba ni
<p>39a.7</p>stong chen mo'i rig sngags kyis/ 'byung po rnams rang dbang med par bkug pa'o/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/ /zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa la sogs pa nyon mongs pa 'dul ba la dpa' ba'o/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
<p>39b</p>
<p>39b.1</p>gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang pos sku la brgyan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du byed pa'o/ /thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams kyis kyang gus par phyag 'tshal te/ stong gsum gyi
<p>39b.2</p>chos kyi rgyal srid mdzad pa'o/ /grong khyer grong dang yul 'khor dang / /pho brang 'khor du rgyu ba dang / /zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rgyu ba'i dus tshod ni snga dro shar gyi phyogs nas rgyu/ nyi ma phyed na lho nas rgyu/ nyi ma smyur nas nub kyi phyogs su rgyu/ nyi ma smyur nas ma nub bar du byang gi phyogs nas rgyu/ 
<p>39b.3</p>nyi ma nub nas sa sros bar du shar lho mtshams su rgyu/ srod 'khor nam phyed bar du srin po'i phyogs nas rgyu/ nam phyed skya rings tshun chad nub byang phyogs nas rgyu/ skya rings shar nas nam langs tshun chad byang shar mtshams nas rgyu/ de dag dus rgyu ba ni/ mchod phyir lhags kyang 'tshe
<p>39b.4</p>ba mod/ /tshes grangs dag la rgyu ba rnams/ /de dag mi la 'tshe bar byed/ /tshes gcig dang ni bcu gcig la shar gyi phyogs nas chu tshod bzhi'i bar du rgyu/ tshes gnyis dang bcu gsum la lho'i phyogs nas chu tshod brgyad rgyu/ tshes gsum dang bcu gnyis la chu tshod bcu'i bar du nub
<p>39b.5</p>kyi phyogs nas rgyu/ srod 'khor tsam tshes bzhi dang bcu bzhi la nam phyed nas chu tshod drug byang gi phyogs nas rgyu/ tshes lnga dang bcu drug la ni nyi ma dros nas shar lho mtshams nas chu tshod bdun rgyu'o/ /tshes drug dang dgu la chu tshod sum cu tham pa lho nub mtshams nas snga dro nas rgyu'o/ /
<p>39b.6</p>tshes bdun dang bcu tham pa'i dus su nub byang mtshams nas snga dro nas chu tshod bco lnga la rgyu'o/ /tshes brgyad dang gnam stong la byang shar nas snga dro nas chu tshod bcu gnyis bar du rgyu'o/ /de dag ni 'byung po rgyu ba'i dus bstan pa'o/ /gnod sbyin ma rungs mdangs 'phrog pa/ /snying rje med cing
<p>39b.7</p>khrag 'thung ba/ /zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed cing srog 'phrog pa ste/ 'byung po de rnams sha dang khrag la dga' ba'o/ lus chen 'jigs pa chen po ste/ /stobs po che la sgra yang che/ /zhes bya ba ni lus ni ra rab dang mnyam pa/ stobs kyis ni ri rab bsgul ba/ /
<p>40a</p>
<p>40a.1</p>skad kyang drag po'i tshul du snang ba'o/ /mgrin bcu po la mig stong po/ /gdon chen mig ni dmar po rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni mgo re re la mig brgya brgya yod pa ste/ mig de yang dmar por snang zhing 'jigs su rung ba'o/ /'khor ni mang po rnams btang ste/ /lag na
<p>40a.2</p>mtshon thogs rab tu 'jigs/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin ma rungs pa mang por snang zhing / ral gri la sogs pa'i mtshon cha mang po thogs pa'o/ /sbrul gyi pags pa thogs pa dang / /lag bzhi lag na sgron me thogs/ /zhes bya ba ni dug sbrul gyi pags pa gon pa/ mi gsal
<p>40a.3</p>ba gsal bar byed pa kha nas me 'bar zhing 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /lag na mtshon dang dbyig pa thogs/ /rdo rje'i mdung rtse lag na thogs/ /zhes bya ba ni 'byung po ma rungs pa rnams kyang / lag na mtshon sna tshogs pa thogs shing 'jigs su rung ba'o/ /rab tu drag pa'i dmag
<p>40a.4</p>brgal nas/ /phyogs bcu kun du skrag par byed/ /ces bya ba ni dpung mang po dang ldan zhing phyogs bcu dag tu 'khod pa ste/ de dag gis kyang sems can rnams la 'jigs pa dang skrag par byed pa'o/ /sdang ba'i gnas na 'khod pa yi/ /gsang ba po ni dad kun yang / /zhes
<p>40a.5</p>bya ba ni sems can rnams la sdang ba/ rgya cher gnod pa skyel ba'o/ /mi yi 'jig rten 'di dag tu/ /skyes pa bud med gzhan yang 'dzin/ /zhes bya ba ni stong gsum gyi mi rnams la 'byung po de rnams kyis 'tshe bar byas pa'o/ /sha khrag dron mor bcas pa la/ /rnam par
<p>40a.6</p>'khrul zhing 'dod pa'i gzugs/ /zhes bya ba ni mi rnams kyi srog gcod cing sha dang khrag la dga' ba'o/ /seng ge dang ni stag dang rta/ /ma he ba glang bong bu rnga/ /zhes bya ba ni gzugs mi gcig pa byol song rnams kyi gzugs su sprul pa'o/ /glang po che yi gzugs 'dra
<p>40a.7</p>dang / /dom dang gzig dang spyang ki dang / /zhes bya ba ni de dang der ldan pa'i gzugs su snang zhing / sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed pa'o/ /khyi dang wa dang ra dag dang / /byi la byi ba sbre'u'i gzugs/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod pa skyel ba'i dus su gcan gzan gyi gzugs
<p>40b</p>
<p>40b.1</p>su sprul pa'o/ /bse dang phag dang sre mong dang / /nya dang rus sbal dag gi gzugs/ /zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyang sna tshogs su snang ba/ rmi lam yang de bzhin du snang ba'o/ /kha cig dag ni sram gyi gzugs/ /khwa dang 'ug pa khu byug dang / /zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i gzugs su snang
<p>40b.2</p>zhing gnod pa cher skyel ba'o/ /bya rgod khra dang nya mid bcas/ /rma bya ngang pa thi ba dang / /zhes bya ba ni de'i gzugs su ston cing / skad mi gcig pa mang po 'don pa'o/ /khrung khrung dang ni bya rnams dang / /kha cig bya gag gzugs rnams su/ /zhes bya ba ni 'jigs su rung ba
<p>40b.3</p>ma rungs pa rnams yin te/ ltas dang rmi lam ngan par byed pa'o/ /gnod sbyin rnams ni mi yis mthong / /'dab bzangs bya yi tshul gyis kyang / /zhes bya ba ni 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs ston pa/ sems can rnams la skrag par byed pa'o/ /skye bo mang po skrag byed cing / /zhes bya
<p>40b.4</p>ba ni skyes pa bud med byis pa rnams la skrag par byed pa'o/ /kha cig mi yi mgo can la/ /lus ni bya gag bong du 'dra/ /zhes bya ba ni 'jigs su rung ba'i 'byung po rnams kyang / mi'i mgo can la byol song gi lus so/ /kha cig mtshon gyis rab tu 'tshe/ /lus dang bral ba nyid du
<p>40b.5</p>snang / /zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs mtshon gyis 'tshe zhing / khrag khrug la dga' ba'o/ /rnam par 'khrugs shing 'dod la mos/ /rgyu ma'i phreng bas rab tu dkris/ /zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la dga' zhing sems 'khrugs par byed pa ste/ yan lag mi'i rgyu ma'i phreng
<p>40b.6</p>bas brgyan pa'o/ /rtse gsum mdung gis rab 'debs shing / /srog chags rnams la gnod par byed/ /ces bya ba ni 'jigs su rung ba'i 'byung po de dag kyang snying rje dang bral ba'o/ /mi bzad pa yi dbugs 'byin cing / /skye dgu 'di dag skrag par byed/ /ces bya ba ni ske ba che
<p>40b.7</p>zhing skad che ba ste/ sgra des sems can rnams skrag pa'o/ /srog chags rgyud rnams ji snyed par/ /sna tshogs kyi ni gzugs su snang / /zhes bya ba ni nya la sogs pa'i sems can gyi gzugs su snang zhing / gzugs mi gcig pa mang po snang ba'o/ /kha cig dag ni ri yang thogs/ /
<p>41a</p>
<p>41a.1</p>la la ral gri 'khor lo thogs/ /zhes bya ba ni stobs dang ldan zhing ri rab theg par nus pa/ mtshon rnon pos 'tshe bar byed pa'o/ /grangs ni brgya phrag stong rnams te/ /dbyug pas bsdigs shing kha drag pa/ /zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams sde chen por gnas shing
<p>41a.2</p>sems can rnams la chad pa chen po gcod pa'o/ /mig chung ba la bzhin mi sdug /srin po'i so ni rno ba dang / /zhes bya ba ni bzhin mi sdug pa kha dang so rnams yo ba'o/ /sna dang rna ba bcad pa dang / /lce bcad gdong ni gnyer ma can/ /zhes bya ba ni gzugs ngan par snang zhing / dbang
<p>41a.3</p>po rnams ma tshang ba'o/ /rkang lag dag ni gtubs pa dang / /mgo bo bcad pa'i srin po rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni mgo bo med par brang nas gdong pa snang bas te/ tshigs rnams la yang gdong pa snang ba'o/ /skabs ni rab tu tshol bar byed/ /sdig pa can rnams gzi brjid 'phrog /
<p>41a.4</p>ces bya ba ni sems can rnams la glags tshol zhing / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi dpal 'phrog pa'o/ /mi yi lus rnams dag la ni/ /rab tu phra ba'i gdon du snang / /zhes bya ba ni mi'i lus la zhugs nas mi dga' ba'i sems dang / lceb pa'i sems
<p>41a.5</p>dang ldan par byed pa'o/ /spu yi bar dang nad rnams dang / /de bzhin rma yi kha rnams su/ /zhes bya ba ni ba spu'i bar du 'dzin cing / rma med pa rma yod par byas te/ rma'i nang rul bar byas nas/ phyi subs nas nang na tsha chen po dang ldan par byed do/ /lhags pa de dag thams cad
<p>41a.6</p>kyang / /rig sngags zhags pas rab tu drangs/ /zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams bcings pa'o/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/ /zhes bya ba ni de dang der ldan pa'i 'byung po
<p>41a.7</p>rnams kyis kyang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gus par phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos srid du mdzad cing / stong gsum gyi chos
<p>41b</p>
<p>41b.1</p>kyi rgyal por snang ba'o/ /ri yi rgyal po ri rab dang / /zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod yon lnga la spyod pa bzhin/ 'byung po rnams kyang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas spyod do/ /ji ltar spyod ce na/ gzugs mthong bas mdangs 'phrog pa dang / sgra snyan po thos nas 'dzin pa dang / dri zhim po tshor nas 'dzin pa
<p>41b.2</p>dang / ro zhim po myangs nas 'dzin pa dang / lus reg pas 'dzin pa dang / de dag kyang gang na gnas she na/ ri rab khor yug la gnas nas 'dzin pa'o/ /de bzhin kho ra khor yug dang / /bya rgod phung po gshol mda' 'dzin/ /zhes bya ba ni dbus kyi ri bo mchog rab nas/ phyi'i kho ra khor
<p>41b.3</p>yug la thug pa'i ri bo chen po la gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams so/ /de bzhin du bya rgod phung po dang / ri bdun la sogs pa'o/ /spos ngad ldan dang gangs kyi ri/ /sna tshogs sde dang pa N+Da pA/ /zhes bya ba ni de yang 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i ri rnams so/ /na la ngA yi ri
<p>41b.4</p>gnyis dang / /dpal gyi ri yi rtse mo ni/ /zhes bya ba ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi lho phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /gang dag shin tu mthor 'phags dang / /ri bo de dag kun la yang / /zhes bya ba ni lha dang lha ma yin rnams 'tshogs shing / 'byung po'i tshogs rnams 'dul ba'o/ /lha
<p>41b.5</p>dang drang srong gang gnas pa/ /de dag thams cad mi dga' zhing / /zhes bya ba ni stong chen po rab tu 'joms ma'i gzi brjid kyis/ ri rab de rnams na gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams yid mi dga' ba'o/ /'jigs pa'i yid kyis mya ngan byed/ /bye ba stong gi lha dag dang / /bye ba phrag brgya'i
