<p>41b.6</p>lha rnams dang / /zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ 'dar zhing kyi hud ces sgra 'byin pa'o/ /lha yi bu mo skal chen dag /thal mo rab tu sbyor bar byed/ /ces bya ba ni rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'jigs pas gus par sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thags bzangs ris
<p>41b.7</p>dang sgra gcan dang / /tshim par byed pa'ang der phyin to/ /zhes bya ba ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po la sogs pa yang / rig sngags kyi dmod mos bkug ste/ gus par sangs rgyas la 'dud pa'o/ /lha min bye ba phrag stong dang / /lha min bye ba phrag brgya dang / /zhes bya ba ni de yang lha ma
<p>42a</p>
<p>42a.1</p>yin gyi grangs/ 'byung po la gtogs pa rnams so/ /de dag bu mo 'phrul ldan pa/ /mang po kun kyang thal mo sbyar/ /zhes bya ba ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i bu mo la sogs pa yang / rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'khod pa'o/ /rab tu
<p>42a.2</p>gnas dang rgya mtsho dang / /zhes bya ba ni phyi'i rgya mtsho la gnas pa dang / sa 'og dang nam mkha' la rgyu zhing / ma rungs pa'i klu dang sa bdag rnams dang / rigs bzhir gnas shing phyogs bcu dag tu 'khod pa'o/ /klu yi rgyal po gzi can dang / /zhes bya ba ni sa rim pa bdun gyi 'og
<p>42a.3</p>na gnas pa ste/ de'i 'khor sha za dang 'byung po rnams yod de/ mi'i dri tshor ba tsam gyis mdangs 'phrog pa'o/ /klu'i gnod pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o/ /klu yi rgyal po ma dros dang / /dga' bo nye dga' gnyis po dang / /zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa bzhin du klu'i rgyal po rnams
<p>42a.4</p>kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi drung du 'khod pa'o/ /rdo rje blo gros pak+Shu dang / /gang+gA dga' bo sin+d+hu mtsho/ /zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyang mtsho ma dros pa la gnas shing / gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas par rgyu ba'o/ /bya yi rgyal po 'dab bzangs dang / /rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs byed dang / /
<p>42a.5</p>zhes bya ba ni de yang rgya mtsho gting na gnas pa rnams yin te/ de rnams sangs rgyas kyi drung du 'khod pa'o/ /stong phrag bye ba'i klu rnams dang / /bye ba brgya yi klu dag dang / /zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi 'khor du bcas pa sa bdag klu dang bcas pa rnams so/ /de dag bu mo skal chen
<p>42a.6</p>rnams/ /thal mo rab tu sbyor bar byed/ /ces bya ba ni klu'i bu mo de yang grangs de dang ldan par gnas shing / sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'khod pa'o/ /nyi ma zla ba gnyi ga yang / /skar ma'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor/ /zhes bya ba ni de yang bar snang du rgyu zhing / rig sngags
<p>42a.7</p>kyi dmod mos 'khod pa'o/ /gser gyi me tog yan lag na/ /ma ga d+hA na 'jigs byed pa/ /zhes bya ba ni de yang gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas shing / rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'khod pa'o/ /gso ba'i mtha' na mi thod can/ /ko sa la na rab tu dkar/ /zhes
<p>42b</p>
<p>42b.1</p>bya ba ni yul ma ga d+hA na gnas shing / stong gsum rgyu ba'o/ /bzang po'i yul na kha spu can/ /gyad kyi yul na grags pa 'dzin/ /zhes bya ba ni de yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi nub phyogs su gnas shing / sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed pa'o/ /lnga 'dzin pa na skrag byed pa/ /rta
<p>42b.2</p>skye ba na mig dmar gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni 'byung po'i gnas de dang ldan pa ni/ sems can la gnod par byed par grags pa'o/ /srung byed pa na ser skya ste/ /sems pa na ni mig ser po/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon gnas de na gnas shing / skad cig mas thams cad
<p>42b.3</p>rgyu ba'o/ /be'u la phan bum pa'i lto/ /dga' ba'i yul na ring por skyes/ /zhes bya ba ni gnas de dang ldan zhing gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas pa la rgyu ba'o/ /ba lang 'dzin na rab tu 'joms/ /dung yul na ni nyi ma'i grogs/ /zhes bya ba ni gnas de dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi spyan
<p>42b.4</p>sngar 'khod pa'o/ /ljongs chen rnams kyi gnod sbyin ni/ /brjod pa bcu drug de dag dang / /zhes bya ba ni 'byung po gnas can du gnas pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ rig sngags kyi zhags pas 'dren pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin che/ /chos skyong rab tu dkar ba dang / /zhes bya
<p>42b.5</p>ba ni ri rab rtse mo la gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'o/ /ser skya rab mdzes khyab 'jug dang / /bum lto gsus pa zlum po dang / /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin de rnams yang ri rab kyi khong seng lho ngos na gnas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba la gnod par byed pa'o/ /chu srin bden
<p>42b.6</p>pa 'chang ba dang / /lnga ldan rgyal ba khyu mchog dang / /zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyang lho'i 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas shing / gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas par rgyu ba'o/ /gnod sbyin chen po dbang phyug che/ /lag pa bzhi can stobs po che/ /zhes bya ba ni ti se'i gangs la gnas shing / sems
<p>42b.7</p>can rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa'o/ /sde pa rab tu 'dul ba ni/ /mthu bo che la stobs po che/ /zhes bya ba ni 'byung po de dang der ldan pa ni/ stong gsum rgyu ste rig sngags kyi zhags pas 'dren pa'o/ /gshin rje gshin rje'i pho nya dang / /bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa dang / /zhes
<p>43a</p>
<p>43a.1</p>bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mo dang / bdud kyi lha rnams yang 'dren pa'o/ /gnod sbyin bye ba'i g.yog 'chang ba/ /gnod sbyin de ming 'phrog po yin/ /zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi mi rnams la gnod pa skyel zhing gzi brjid dang 'od 'phrog pa'o/ /sha ri ta ni
<p>43a.2</p>sder bcas dang / /ri yi bu mo gnod sbyin ma/ /zhes bya ba ni de yang gzi brjid che zhing sa la gnas pa'o/ /gzi brjid chen mo 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /'phrog ma zhes kyang grags pa dang / /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin srin mor grags pa dang / ma'i mngal nas bu 'phrog pa'o/ /
<p>43a.3</p>gdol pa mo ni gtum mo yang / /bu rnams lnga brgyas bskor ba dang / /zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams bu lnga brgya dang ldan pa'o/ /mi sdug nag mo karka ti/ /pad+ma dang ni pad+ma can/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin mo de rnams yang / rig sngags kyi dmod mos sdod par mi nus te/ sangs rgyas
<p>43a.4</p>kyi spyan sngar 'khod pa'o/ /me tog so dang sa ga dang / /srin mo bong bu'i sna can dang / /zhes bya ba ni srin mo de rnams lho phyogs na gnas shing sems can rnams la gnod pa byed pa'o/ /tsan+dan dang ni khyab 'jug len/ /seng ge ser skya dmar ser po/ /zhes bya ba ni de dag ni
<p>43a.5</p>gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon du gnas pa/ byis pa'i gdon bco lnga'i gtso bo rnams so/ /glang po klu yi so can dang / /ri bshes drag po'i mche ba can/ /zhes bya ba ni de dang de ldan zhing sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o/ /srin mo so bzang yod pa dang / /tshangs pa len dang
<p>43a.6</p>khyab 'jug len/ /zhes bya ba ni ming der grags pa sems can la gnod pa/ skad cig mas gling bzhir rgyu ba'o/ /gnod sbyin ha la ha la dang / /gnod sbyin rnam pa'i mchu can dag /ces bya ba ni gnod sbyin 'di dag kyang / lcang lo can gyi pho brang du gnas shing / rnam thos kyi
<p>43a.7</p>bu'i 'khor du gnas pa'o/ /mdung dang mda' gzhu kun thogs shing / /mi rta ba lang ri dgas rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni mtshon sna tshogs thogs shing / sems can rnams la gnod pa byed pa'o/ /za zhing 'tshe ba de dag ni/ /phyogs rnams kun du rgyug cing 'dong / /zhes
<p>43b</p>
<p>43b.1</p>bya ba ni sems can rnams la glags tshol zhing srog 'phrog pa rnams so/ /sa 'di rab tu g.yo bar byed/ /nags tshal rnams kyang rab tu skems/ /zhes bya ba ni ri rab 'gul bar byed cing / rgya mtsho yang skems par byed pa'o/ /ri rnams kun nas g.yo bar byed/ /skye dgu 'di dag
<p>43b.2</p>'tshe byed cing / /zhes bya ba ni tshe'i bar chod byed/ sems can rnams la 'jigs skrag byed pa'o/ /phan tshun nas ni 'du ba dag /rig sngags kyis ni drangs nas lhags/ /zhes bya ba ni de dang der ldan pa'i 'byung po rnams la/ rig sngags kyi bcing ba lnga'i dmod mo'i zhags pas
<p>43b.3</p>bsdams pa'o/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/ /zhes bya ba ni 'byung po de rnams kyis kyang / 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga ru/ /gus pas phyag 'tshal nas bstod pa'o/ /thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag
<p>43b.4</p>'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i chos kyi srid mdzad cing / dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga ru/ /gus pas phyag 'tshal bstod pa'o/ /zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams kyis so so rang rang gi sgo nas/ chos kyi
<p>43b.5</p>rgyal po la zhu ba phul ba'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni 'byung pos smras pa'i don de nas so/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos bus/ /'jig rten mgon la 'di skad gsol/ /zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyis zhus pa'o/ /
<p>43b.6</p>bdag gi phyogs cha byang phyogs su/ /rgyal po'i gnas su sprul pa ni/ /zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi byang phyogs na mnga' mdzad cing / byang phyogs skyong bar byed pa'o/ /lcang lor ldan pa yid du mchi/ /de bas bdag ni lcang lo'i bdag /zhes bya ba ni lta na sdug cing mdzes par snang ba yid du 'ong
<p>43b.7</p>bar gnas so/ /rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can/ /lha rnams kun gyis bsam par gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni las kyi lhas byin gyis brlabs pa/ rin po che'i gzhal yas khang du snang ba'o/ /phyir shin tu mthon po can/ /rin chen kun gyis brgyan pa lags/ /zhes bya ba ni rin po che
<p>44a</p>
<p>44a.1</p>sna bdun las byas pa/ rgya phibs dang ldan pa/ bdun thog yod pa'o/ /'phang du dpag tshad bcu drug ste/ /gser gyi rgyu las bgyis pa lags/ /zhes bya ba ni thog re re la dpag tshad bcu drug bcu drug ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyis phra byas pa'o/ /phyogs bzhi lcog ni re re
<p>44a.2</p>la'ang / /gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje dag /ces bya ba ni sgo bzhi dang ldan pa phyogs re re nas srung mar snang ba'o/ /kun nas rab tu gnas par gyur/ /lag na mtshon cha legs par sprul/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin pho mo mang po gnas shing / mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa'o/ /rgyal
<p>44a.3</p>po'i pho brang de yi sgo/ /bzhi pa gtod par bgyis pa ni/ /zhes bya ba ni ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes pa/ rgyan rnam bzhis lta na sdug pa'o/ /gcig ni gser las bgyis pa'i sgo/ /gnyis pa dngul las bgyis pa lags/ /zhes bya ba ni thog re re la yang sgo bzhi bzhi dang ldan pa'o/ /
<p>44a.4</p>gsum pa shel gyi sgo mo lags/ /bzhi pa gser gyis rnam par spras/ /zhes bya ba ni rim pa bzhin du rin po che rnams kyis byas pa'o/ /grong khyer de yi nang dag na/ /skyed mos tshal gyi me tog rgyas/ /zhes bya ba ni rdzing bu dang / me tog gi ra ba chu las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes
<p>44a.5</p>pas brgyan pa'o/ /de yi nang na gzhal med khang / rin chen sna bdun sna tshogs mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin pho rnams spyod pa byed pa'i gzhal yas khang snang ba'o/ /rin chen sna tshogs ljon shing dang / /bya bran sna tshogs skad kyang 'byin/ /zhes bya ba ni de'i skyed mos tshal dang rdzing
<p>44a.6</p>bur/ khrung khrung dang khu byug la sogs pa bya sna tshogs kyi skad kyis mdzes pa'o/ /me tog sna tshogs legs par bkram/ /sna tshogs spos kyis byugs pa lags/ /zhes bya ba ni chu dang thang las skyes pa'i me tog ku mu ta dang puN+Da rI ka la sogs pas brgyan pa/ yan lag brgyad
<p>44a.7</p>dang sbyar ba'i pog phor dang ldan pa'o/ /gnod sbyin mo ni 'joms ma dang / /glu dang rol mos rab tu brgyan/ /zhes bya ba ni lta na sdug pa rgyags ma dang ldan pa she dag rnams kyis/ rol mo sna tshogs la spyod pa'o/ /dpal gyi dam pa nyams su myong / /der ni 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor
<p>44b</p>
<p>44b.1</p>der/ /zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga phun sum tshogs pa de rnams la spyod pa'o/ /gang dag 'khor zhing mchis pa dag /rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa ste/ /zhes bya ba ni yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'dod pa gang yang 'byung ba'o/ /chos 'tshal ba dang chos spyod pa/ /zhes
<p>44b.2</p>bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bka' nyan nas/ mi la sogs pa sems can gang la yang gnod pa mi skyel zhing sdom pa gsum la gnas pa'o/ /srog chags rnams la 'tshe mi bgyid/ /zas dang skom gyis mi brel te/ /zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams la dga' zhing / 
<p>44b.3</p>byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'o/ /skye dgu mi bzad gzhan dag ni/ /longs spyod chen po tshol bgyid cing / /zhes bya ba ni mi'i tshogs rnams la phrad par dga' zhing / phun sum tshogs par byas nas skyong bar byed pa'o/ /phyogs bzhi kun du rnam par lta/ /grong khyer sgo yi
<p>44b.4</p>gom yo dang / /zhes bya ba ni mi'i grong khyer gyi phyogs bzhi nas srung zhing / de rnams mtho bar dga' ba'o/ /bza' shing ra ba nags tshal na/ /gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po'i tshogs/ /zhes bya ba ni gang dag gang du gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams la rig sngags 'di'i dmod mos 'khod
<p>44b.5</p>pa'o/ /bye ba stong phrag brgya mchis pa/ /de dag thams cad mdo sde yi/ /zhags pas drangs te brlag par bgyi/ /zhes bya ba ni gang yang rung ba gnod pa rnams la/ rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas 'dul bar byed pa'o/ /rgyal po'i pho brang dbus na ni/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i gnas
<p>44b.6</p>gyur pa/ /zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i dbus su/ dmigs pa med pa'i pho brang snang ba'o/ /bsil ba'i rdzing bus bskor ba ste/ /tsan+dan nags kyis 'khor ba lags/ /zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams la bsil bar byed pa'i ye shes kyis bskor zhing / byams pa dang snying rje'i
<p>44b.7</p>nags tshal gyis bskor ba'o/ /kun nas dpag tshad drug cu ste/ /khang pa brtsegs pa sprul pa dag /ces bya ba ni sems can gyi gzhal yas khang du snang zhing yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'o/ /gcig ni gser las bgyis pa ste/ /gnyis ni dngul las bgyis pa lags/ /
<p>45a</p>
<p>45a.1</p>zhes bya ba ni phyi nang gnyis su med par rin po che gser dngul las byas pa'o/ /gsum pa bai DUr+ya las bgyis/ /bzhi pa gtsang dang shel gyi rgyu/ /zhes bya ba ni chos mi 'gyur bar snang bas bai DUr+ya ste/ phyi nang gnyis su med par gsal ba ni shel lta bu'o/ /lnga pa mu
<p>45a.2</p>tig dmar po ste/ /drug pa rdo yi snying po lags/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje pha lam las byas pa'i seng ge'i khar mu tig gi dra ba'i phreng bas te/ de yang mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'o/ /bdun pa spug las bgyis pa ste/ /brgyad pa rin chen bdun las
<p>45a.3</p>bgyis/ /zhes bya ba ni rin chen dra ba dang dra ba'i yon tan gyis brgyan pa'o/ /bud med stong phrag brgya dag kyang / /de dag re re kun na gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o/ /lhab lhub sna tshogs mchog dag dang / /cha byad sna tshogs
<p>45a.4</p>mang pos brgyan/ /zhes bya ba ni tshad med pa bzhi'i rgyan gyis brgyan cing mdzes pa'o/ /glu dang rol mo sna tshogs dang / /bzo yi gnas la mkhas pa mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni zag pa zad pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing / sems can rnams kyi las 'joms par byed pa la mkhas pa'o/ /
<p>45a.5</p>de lta'i rab tu dga' ba yis/ /bde zhing tshim pa'i yid du gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing bde bar gnas pa'o/ /de na bdag ni rgun skyems dang / /'dod pa dag gis rab myos pas/ /zhes bya ba ni de yang 'byung po la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i yon
<p>45a.6</p>tan lnga la spyod cing / 'dod pa'i zhags pas bcings pa'o/ /bdag gi 'khor rnams 'phyan bgyid cing / /phyogs bcu dag tu 'jigs pa skyed/ /ces bya ba ni rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i 'khor tshan gcig kyang / sdig la dga' bas sems can la 'jigs skrag byed pa'o/ /bud
<p>45a.7</p>med dag dang skyes pa dang / /de bzhin khye'u dang bu mo dang / /zhes bya ba ni gzi brjid 'phrog pa she dag go/ /mngal na gnas pa 'jigs par byed/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas gtogs pa la'ang 'tshe/ /zhes bya ba ni mer mer po dang nur nur po rnams 'phrog cing dud 'gro rnams kyi srog
<p>45b</p>
<p>45b.1</p>'phrog pa'o/ /skar ma dag dang nyi zla dang / /gtum pa'i gza' rnams gnod par bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni zla ba nyi ma mi snang bar byas shing / bza' ba dang btung ba rnams 'phrog pa'o/ /lo thogs bon 'bras bu dang / /me tog sman dang zas skom dang / /zhes bya ba ni 'byung po de
<p>45b.2</p>rnams kyis kyang dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang ser ba gtong ba'o/ /mi rnams kyi ni dpal 'phrog cing / /mthon po rnams kyang dma' bar bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni gzi brjid dang phun sum tshogs pa 'phrog par byed pa/ phyug po ltogs por gtong ba dag go/ /'jig rten dag la nongs
<p>45b.3</p>pa rnams/ /dmag dang 'thab mo shar gnyer dang / /zhes bya ba ni khrag khrug la dga' bar byed pa'am/ mi'i 'jig rten gyi sems rnam par byed pa'o/ /tshig gam zhig gam gsad bya ba/ /de kun 'byung po'i rnam par gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni khrag khrug la sman ma byas shing / 
<p>45b.4</p>mi rnams kyi srog 'phrog pa'o/ /sbed cing stor bar bgyid pa dang / /zlog par bgyid cing rgod par byed/ /ces bya ba ni 'byung po de rnams bzung nas/ zas dang skom yang mi 'ju zhing bzlog ste/ sbed pa ni nad sna tshogs gtong zhing sems yang stor bar byed pa'o/ /res 'ga'
<p>45b.5</p>yang sems smyo bar byed pa'o/ /byed pa rgod pa'o/ /'jigs par byed cing lta bar bgyid/ /dgrar 'gyur ba yang ston par bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni skyes pa bud med khye'u bu mo rnams la rims dang yams nad gyis btab cing / 'jigs skrag byed cing bla 'chol smra ba'o/ /lta
<p>45b.6</p>ba ni dran pa stor zhing nam mkha' dang sa gzhi la lta ba rnams te/ sems mi dga' bar byas nas ngu ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o/ /sdig pa'i rmi lam mthong bar bgyid/ /nyal ba dag la gnod par bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni shin tu 'jigs pa'i rmi lam dang / mi dge ba'i ltas ston te/ 
<p>45b.7</p>skyes pa la mor sgyur cing gnod la/ bud med la phor sgyur cing gnod pa'o/ /sgo nas se gol sgra 'byung zhing / /mi dran brjed de za bar bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni grong dang grong khyer du rgyu zhing / se gol tsam gyis khrag khrug byed do/ /khrag khrug gi sman mas za ba dang 'thung
<p>46a</p>
<p>46a.1</p>bar byed pa'o/ /mdza' bo gnyen bshes gzugs dag tu/ /dga' zhing bka' mchid smra bar bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni tshe 'di dang phyi ma yang / mdza' bo dang gnyen bshes su skyes shing mi de la gnod par byed pa'o/ /bu mo sdu gu'i gzugs dag tu/ /'dod la spyod
<p>46a.2</p>pa dga' bar bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni mdzes sdug pa bu mo'i gzugs su byas nas/ byang chub sems dang tshe 'phrog ma'o/ /nyi ma skar ma'i gzugs dang ni/ /zla ba'i gzugs su gda' bar bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni rmi lam dang ltas la yang de lta bu'i rmi lam rmi pa'o/ /rlung dang skar
<p>46a.3</p>mda'i lce gzugs su/ /tshe la gnod par de dag gda'/ /zhes bya ba ni phyugs chen por gyur cing / nam mkha' nas 'brug sgra dang glog babs te/ bar snang la 'od chen po snang ba'o/ /skar ma'i tshogs dang 'dra ba dag /'jigs par bgyid pa wa dang khyi/ /zhes bya ba ni dngos
<p>46a.4</p>po dang rmi lam la yang / gcan gzan gyi gzugs su sprul nas gnod pa'o/ /rnam par sprul nas ljon shing dang / /mchod rten dag gi gnas na gda'/ /zhes bya ba ni gnas de dag tu gnas shing / sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o/ /skyes pa gzhon nu'i gzugs
<p>46a.5</p>mdzes pas/ /'bar zhing shing rta'i sgra yang 'byin/ /zhes bya ba ni 'byung po de rnams kyis khye'u dang bu mor skyes nas/ pha ma dag la gnod par byed pa'o/ /shing rta'i sgra ni skad sna tshogs su 'byung ba'o/ /gnas rnams dang ni shul dag tu/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rjes kyang ston/ /
<p>46a.6</p>zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang 'od dang rdzu 'phrul ston pa'o/ /grong khyer dag dang khyim rnams kyi/ /sgro yang gnod sbyin de dag 'byed/ /ces bya ba ni 'byung po de rnams kyi phyir 'brang zhing / grong dang grong khyer rnams la gnod par byed de/ sgo phug dang 'phrang kar bsdad cing 'dzin
<p>46a.7</p>pa'o/ /srog dang lus kyang blang bgyis shing / /lam ngan kun du bskor bar bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni lus la na tsha drag por byas shing / srog 'bral bar bgyid pa'o/ /bskal pa bdun gyi bar du yang rjes snyag pa'o/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag dang / /rnam pa sna
<p>46b</p>
<p>46b.1</p>tshogs sgra rnams dang / /zhes bya ba ni gzugs sna tshogs su sgyur zhing / kha dog sna tshogs sprul pa'o/ /rnam pa sna tshogs nad rnams kyis/ /lus la na bar gnas par ston/ /zhes bya ba ni mdze dang lhog pa phol mig la sogs pa'i nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi ston pa dag go/ /nad rnams
<p>46b.2</p>kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang / /phyin ci log tu ston par byed/ /ces bya ba ni rlung dang bad kan mkhris par ston cing / bad kan rlung dang mkhris par ston te rtsa 'khrug par snang ba'o/ /ji snyed 'jig rten rang bzhin dag /thams cad log par de dag ston/ /zhes bya ba ni stong gsum
<p>46b.3</p>gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis rgyu zhing / sems can rnams la 'tshe ba phyin ci log par ston pa'o/ /rig sngags zhags pas drangs bas na/ /de dag kun kyang 'dir mchis so/ /zhes bya ba ni stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i dmod mo'i
<p>46b.4</p>zhags pas ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams bcings pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po bshad pa'i de nas so/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu/ /zhes bya ba ni byang phyogs kyi gdon gnod par byed pa rnams la chad pa gcod pa'o/ /langs te thal mo rab sbyar nas/ /zhes
<p>46b.5</p>bya ba ni 'khor gyi nang nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar langs so/ /zhabs la 'khor lo'i mtshan mnga' ba/ /gser gyi mchod sdong 'bar ba bzhin/ /zhes bya ba ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa/ chos kyi phung po'i rang bzhin gyi
<p>46b.6</p>sku'o/ /'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa po/ /thub pa chen po me dang 'dra/ /zhes bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na chos kyi rgyal por snang ba bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od do/ /stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi ni/ /gnod sbyin gsang sngags mi bzad can/ /
<p>46b.7</p>zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis stong chen mo'i rig sngags zhal nas gsungs pas/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams brlag par byed pa'o/ /byang phyogs cha yi phyogs cha gnas/ /byang phyogs dag tu gnod par bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni gnod sbyin 'byung po ma rungs pa
<p>47a</p>
<p>47a.1</p>rnams so/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/ /de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad/ /ces bya ba ni stong chen mo'i rig sngags kyi chad pas gcod pa'o/ /s+yAd ya the dan zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ gang la zhe na rig sngags 'di'o/ /byang phyogs su bdag bde
<p>47a.2</p>legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni bdag nye bar mtshon pa'o/ /bde legs ni sems can thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig pa'o/ /de dag ni rgyal po bzhi dang phyogs skyong ba bcu'i chad pa sgres pa ste/ tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang / /'jig rten skyong ba dbang phyug che/ /
<p>47a.3</p>zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa la sogs pa gzugs khams kyi lha rnams dang / brgya byin la sogs pa 'dod khams kyi lha rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bcu po dang / gnas gtsang ma dang dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang / gnod sbyin ded dpon thams cad dang / /'phrog
<p>47a.4</p>ma'i bu dang bcas pa dang / /zhes bya ba ni mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon lngas rtsen dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya'o/ /bdag gi me tog spos dag dang / /sbyin sreg 'di ni blang bar gyis/ /zhes bya ba ni rgyal
<p>47a.5</p>chen rnam thos kyi bus/ sems can gyi don du de dag 'bul ba'o/ /de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang / /gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang / /zhes bya ba ni lha de dag gi mthu'i nus pa'o/ /nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rlung mkhris bad kan la sogs pa
<p>47a.6</p>nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi 'joms pa'o/ /bdag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig swA hA zhes bya ba ni/ /gang zag 'di la gus par byed pa nad dang 'jigs pa las thar ba'o/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod
<p>47a.7</p>la/ /zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus kyang / mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku la brgyan pa'i sprul pa'i sku la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni stong
<p>47b</p>
<p>47b.1</p>gsum gyi stong 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi rgyal srid mdzad cing / chos kyi rang bzhin gyis khyab ste/ de la sku gsung thugs kyis gus par phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /rgyal chen yul 'khor srung ba yang / /langs te thal mo sbyar btud nas/ /zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar
<p>47b.2</p>gus par 'dud pa'o/ /me tog lta bur rgyas gyur cig /ka la ping+ka'i sgra dbyangs can/ /zhes bya ba ni zhal pad+ma rgyas pa dang 'dra ba/ dbyangs gsal ba la phra ba'o/ /khu byug dang ni rma bya'i sgra/ /rnga dang 'brug gi sgra sgrogs pa/ /zhes bya ba ni sgra gsal ba yid du 'ong ba/ rol mo'i
<p>47b.3</p>tshogs dang ldan pa'o/ /thub chen gnod sbyin srin po dang / /dri za stong phrag drug cu bzhi/ /zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs na 'khod pa'i 'byung po rnams so/ /shar gyi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas/ /shar phyogs pa la gnod par bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni ma rungs pa de rnams la
<p>47b.4</p>rig sngags kyi dmod mos chad pa gcod pa'o/ /'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni/ /de dag thams cad bdag gis bshad/ /ces bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis zhus pa'o/ /
<p>47b.5</p>gang zhus na/ dri za la sogs pa'i srog snying rig sngags snying pos zhus pa'o/ /gsang sngags ni 'di lta ste/ d+hA ra Ni la sogs pa'o/ /shar phyogs su bdag bde legs su gyur cig swA hA zhes bya ba ni gang dag 'di la gus pa shar phyogs su gnod pa dang / 'jigs pa
<p>47b.6</p>mi 'byung ba'o/ /'di yang yul 'khor srung gis gsungs pa ste/ tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa ni/ /gong du bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de dag gi gzi brjid dang mthu'i dbang gis/ gang zag nad dang 'jigs pa las thar pa'o/ /phyag 'tshal skyes
<p>47b.7</p>bu dpa' khyod la sogs pa ni gong du bshad pa bzhin bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po/ /thal mo sbyar te de nas langs/ /zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar gus pas thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs/ /smra ba
<p>48a</p>
<p>48a.1</p>thams cad rab 'joms pa/ /zhes bya ba ni rin po che rang gi lag mthil du snang ba dang 'dra ba 'jig rten gyi khams thugs rjes lta ba/ rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo bdud bzhi 'joms pa'o/ /the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa/ /'jig rten thams
<p>48a.2</p>cad rnam 'dren pa/ /zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa'i ngo bo nyid nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms pa'o/ /ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis 'jig rten gyi sems can mtho ris su 'dren pa'o/ /grul bum yi dgas srul po dag /stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i grul bum
<p>48a.3</p>la sogs pa rig sngags kyi chad pas gcod pa'o/ /lho phyogs cha yi phyogs na gnas/ /de dag byung la gnod par bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni lho phyogs na 'khod cing gnod par byed pa'o/ /'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni/ /de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad/ /ces bya ba ni yang dag par
<p>48a.4</p>rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos zhus pa'o/ /gang zhus she na/ grul bum la sogs pa'i srog snying rig sngags kyi las kyi snying po'o/ /gsang sngags ni 'di lta ste/ shAn+ti shAn+ti la sogs pa'o/ /lho phyogs su bdag bde legs su gyur cig
<p>48a.5</p>swA hA zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag 'di la gus pa la lho phyogs kyi nad dang 'jigs pa mi 'byung ba'o/ /tshangs pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de dag gi gzi brjid dang dbang phyug gis gang zag gi nad dang 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o/ /phyag 'tshal
<p>48a.6</p>skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ /sogs pa ni/ gong du bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /rgyal po mig mi bzang ba yang / /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas langs/ /zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar gus par 'dud pa'o/ /sprin chen seng ge chen po pa/ /che ba'i che ba rgya mtsho
<p>48a.7</p>che/ /zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa med pa seng ge bzhin du spyod pa sems can sprin gyi char bzhin don byed pa'o/ /rgya mtsho bzhin du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /gsung ba chen po dpa' chen po/ /g.yul chen rab tu 'joms mdzad pa/ /zhes bya ba ni smra ba'i seng ge stobs dang ldan pa nyon mongs
<p>48b</p>
<p>48b.1</p>pa'i g.yul chen po 'joms pa'o/ /klu dang 'dab bzangs gsang ba po/ /stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi dag /ces bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i klu'i gdon la sogs pa rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i chad pas gcod pa'o/ /nub kyi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas/ /de nas byung nas gnod par
<p>48b.2</p>bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni nub ngos nas 'khod nas de dag nas byung ba'o/ /'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni/ /de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad/ /ces bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang gis zhus pa'o/ /gang zhus she na/ klu rnams
<p>48b.3</p>kyi snying po'o/ /rig sngags kyi las kyi snying po'o/ /gsang sngags ni 'di lta ste/ ba tri ba ra tri la sogs pa'o/ /nub phyogs su bdag bde legs su gyur cig swA hA zhes bya ba ni/ gang dag nub phyogs [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]'jigs pa dang / nad la sogs pa dang bral ba'o/ /tshangs pa la
<p>48b.4</p>sogs pa ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no/ /de dag gi mthu dang gzi brjid kyis kyang gang zag gi nad dang 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la sogs pa ni/ gong bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de nas ni tshig gi bar gyi de nas so/ /tshangs pa dang ni tshangs
<p>48b.5</p>chen yang / /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas langs/ /zhes bya ba ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas kyang 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar 'dud pa'o/ /tshangs pas bkrus pa dag pa'o/ /rig byed kun gyi pha rol zhes bya ba ni/ mi dge ba bcu spangs shing dge ba bcu dang du blangs te/ 
<p>48b.6</p>tshad med pa bzhi'i sgo nas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /skye bo dga' mdzad sman pa'i rje/ /'jig rten thams cad gso mdzad pa/ /zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mes por mdzad pas de'i don mdzad pas dbang du bsdu ba'o/ /gnod sbyin srin po gang gi rnams/ /phyogs
<p>48b.7</p>dang phyogs mtshams gnas pa rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni phyogs bcu na bsdad pa'i 'byung po rnams rig sngags kyi dmod mos chad pa gcod pa'o/ /sa yi 'og dang sa yi steng / /nam mkha' dag la gnas pa'i gdon/ /zhes bya ba ni sa bdag tu gnas pa bar snang la rgyu ba ma rungs
<p>49a</p>
<p>49a.1</p>pa'i 'byung po rnams so/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/ /de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad/ /ces bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas zhus pa'o/ /gang zhus she na/ 'byung po rnams kyi
<p>49a.2</p>gnyen po rig sngags kyi las kyi snying po'o/ /gsang sngags ni 'di lta ste/ b+h+ra me b+h+ra ma go She la sogs pa'o/ /phyogs bcu dag tu bdag bde legs su gyur cig swA hA zhes bya ba ni/ /gang zag 'di la gus pa la phyogs thams cad kyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ba'o/ /tshangs pa
<p>49a.3</p>dang ni brgya byin la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ /gong du bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de dag kun gyi mthu'i nus pas gang zag la 'jigs pa dang / nad thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /rlung las gyur dang mkhris las gyur/ /bad kan las gyur 'dus las gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni
<p>49a.4</p>'di'i rkyen gyis mdze nad bco brgyad du 'byung ste/ de rnams kyis kyang 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o/ /nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur/ /bdag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig swA hA zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag gang yang 'di'i nus pas nad bzhi brgya
<p>49a.5</p>rtsa bzhi dang 'jigs pa brgyad dang bral ba'o/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la sogs pa ni gong bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de yan chad ni 'byung po'i gnas skabs bshad pa ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po'i cho ga bshad pa'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan
<p>49a.6</p>'das 'di snyam du dgongs te zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi sems can gyi don la snyoms par zhugs te/ yang na thugs rjes gzigs nas 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can la don bya sems pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni zhes bya ba ni/ gang+gA'i klung
<p>49a.7</p>gi bye ma snyed tsam mo/ /yang 'di nas sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dad sel ba dang / gser thub dang / 'od srungs dang / shAkya seng ge rnams zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal srid ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gyi don la
<p>49b</p>
<p>49b.1</p>dgongs nas chos kyi rgyal srid byed pa'o/ /ci'i phyir 'jig rten du byung ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni/ shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa las byung ba ni ma yin no/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon du song ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byas pa'i phyir zhes pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni zhes
<p>49b.2</p>bya ba ni/ 'das pa dang da ltar bzhugs pa dang / ma byon pa rnams so/ /grong khyer ni zhes bya ba ni/ sa gcig tu bshad pa la bya/ grong rdal ni che ba'i phyir ro/ /ljongs ni lcags ri dang bcas pa'o/ /grong dang zhes bya ba ni chung ba la sogs pa'o/ /khyim na zhes bya ba ni/ sems can
<p>49b.3</p>no/ /sems can gcig gi bar gyi don gyi phyir/ 'jig rten du byung ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams byung ba'o/ /gang gi phyir byung zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi lha dang bcas nas byung ba'i phyir ro/ /bcas nas byung zhes pa ni/ 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can gyi don du byung
<p>49b.4</p>ba'o/ /bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i don du zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten mi la gang yang 'byung ba'i phyir/ de'i don du sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs rje'i spyan gyis lta
<p>49b.5</p>ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed tsam mo/ /'jig rten du byung ste zhes pa ni/ /gcig gi don du ma yin no/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /de ni zhes bya ba ni sangs
<p>49b.6</p>rgyas bcom ldan 'das so/ /dper na zhes bya ba ni/ sman pa mkhas pa'i dpe'o/ /sman pa mkhas pa mchog tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni/ gcig gi don du ni ma yin no/ /gang gi phyir zhe na sems can gyi don byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gso ba la brtson pa zhes bya ba ni/ yon tan dang ldan
<p>49b.7</p>pa'o/ /sman pas shes par bya ba bzhin du bslab pa zhes bya ba ni/ yon tan ni rig pa bslabs pa'o/ /rgyal po gcig gi don du byung ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po'i don du ma yin no/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis rgyal srid byed pa'i
<p>50a</p>
<p>50a.1</p>phyir ro/ /yang na sems can gyi don byed do/ /yul gcig gi don du byung ba ma yin pa nas zhes bya ba ni/ grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang / ljongs rnams su rgyu ba'o/ /sems can gcig gi zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer yangs pa can no/ /rab tu
<p>50a.2</p>byung zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'o/ /ma yin pa dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni/ theg pa chung ngu ma yin pas/ theg pa chen po yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi sems kyis 'khor ba la gnas pa'i sems can rnams 'don pa'o/ /
<p>50a.3</p>phyogs gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ /bzhugs pa'i phyogs de zhes bya ba ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'o/ /de dag tu zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi don no/ /mi rnams dang / mi ma yin
<p>50a.4</p>pa dag kyang rnam par 'tshe bar mi bya bar sems kyis zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sems kyis dgongs nas/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi don du bzhengs so/ /gang gi phyir zhe na/ mun nag byung ba'i phyir ro/ /nga yang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'o/ /
<p>50a.5</p>yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po zhes bya ba ni/ zheng dang chu ru dpag tshad lnga bcu'o/ /rgya che ba yangs pa skye po mang po'i tshogs 'du ba/ 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba/ shing ljon pa rnams phyogs phyogs na yod pa/ skyed mos tshal phyogs nas brgyan pa/ skyed mos tshal re re yang
<p>50a.6</p>rdzing du re re dang bcas pa/ rdzing bu'i nang na me tog pad+ma dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / ut+pal dang / ku mu da la sogs te/ dri zhim po'i me tog skye ba/ chu de yang tsan+dan la sogs pa'i dri zhim pa skye ba/ rdzing bu de rnams kyi nang na/ bya'i tshogs yod pa/ ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang / khrung khrung
<p>50a.7</p>dang / sa ra sa la sogs pa yod pa/ skyed mos tshal de rnams na thang las skyes pa'i me tog dri zhim pa dzA ti'i me tog dang ku mu da dang / tsam pa ka dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / sngon po dang / mthing ga dang / le brgan la sogs pa'i dri zhim po skye ba/ skyed mos tshal
<p>50b</p>
<p>50b.1</p>gyi 'gram nas 'bras bu can gyi shing skyes pa/ a 'bras kyi shing dang / 'jam 'bras kyi shing dang / star ga dang / u nu'i shing dang / se ba dang / rgya'i se ba dang / shug pa dang / rgya shug dang / shing bal po se'u dang / u dum+WAr dang / ner 'go'i shing la sogs pa'i shing yod do/ /grong khyer
<p>50b.2</p>yangs pa can gyi phyogs phyogs na mchod rten gyis bskor ba/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dar ba/ dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma'am/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa de bzhin srung ba/ bram ze'am/ bram ze mo'am/ 
<p>50b.3</p>rgyal po 'am/ rgyal mo'am/ btsun mo'am/ btsan mo'am/ rje rigs sam/ dmangs rigs la sogs pa'am/ skye bo mang po 'dus pa'am/ byol song ngam/ phyugs la sogs pa mang po yod pa/ grong khyer chen po yangs pa can no/ /gal bder zhes bya ba ni grong gi nang
<p>50b.4</p>du'o/ /yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i skye bo'i tshogs zhes bya ba ni/ lits+tsha bI la sogs pa'i bram ze'o/ /phal po che'i don yang byas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ grags pa chen po byung ba'o/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ mun nag chen po byung ba dang / mu ge byung ba dang / nad sna tshogs
<p>50b.5</p>byung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang byas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi don yin no/ /mnyam du dgongs te zhes bya ba ni/ /sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsgom pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid du bsgoms pa'i rting la'o/ /bcom ldan
<p>50b.6</p>'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe zhes bya ba ni nyi ma shar ba'i dus so/ /chos gos dang / sham thabs dang / lhung bzed bsnams te zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stan las langs te gsil byed dang lhung bzed thogs nas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las babs nas grong khyer
<p>50b.7</p>yangs pa can la kha bltas pa'o/ /dge slong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang thabs cig tu zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las shod du gshegs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pas mchod pa byed pa'o/ /mi mjed kyi bdag
<p>51a</p>
<p>51a.1</p>po tshangs pas lha'i gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te zhes bya ba ni lha'i rdzas dang / me tog dang mchod pa la sogs pa 'bul te lha'i bu tshangs pa dang tshangs chen dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu la sogs pas mchod pa byed pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la g.yas rol nas
<p>51a.2</p>phul lo zhes bya ba ni lha dang mi la sogs pa gus pa byas nas 'bul ba'o/ /yang na ni bcom ldan 'das gar gshegs pa'i sar/ lha'i za 'og dang / dar dang / sa gzhi la bting nas gshegs pa'o/ /phul nas bcom ldan 'das la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par
<p>51a.3</p>gyur to zhes bya ba ni/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs pa dang tshangs chen la sogs pas/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang dri la sogs pa'i char 'bebs pa'o/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ lha'i bu
<p>51a.4</p>dbang phyug chen po'am/ khyab 'jug gam 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la g.yon rol nas phul lo zhes bya ba ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i bu dang / bu mo rnams kyis kyang phul lo/ /phul nas bcom ldan 'das la rdul yab kyis
<p>51a.5</p>g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i za 'og dang dar la sogs pa dogs la bting ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang re re zhing lha'i gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal chen gyi lha rnams dang lha'i bu mo re re blangs nas phul ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la snam logs
<p>51a.6</p>nas phul zhes bya ba ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du yin te/ me tog gi char phab pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'khod par gyur to zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i bu dang bu mos lha'i za 'og dang / dar la sogs pa dog sa la bting ba'o/ /lha'i bu
<p>51a.7</p>dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa so so nas lha'i gdugs dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang lha mo dang gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin mo la sogs pas so so'i lag nas phul ba'o/ /nyan thos rnams la phul nas zhes bya ba ni sngon du bcom ldan 'das la phul nas/ nyan thos rnams la yang bkur sti byas pa'o/ /de
<p>51b</p>
<p>51b.1</p>lta bu'i grags pa dang bkur sti dang brnyes par bya ba brnyes nas zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bya rgod phung po'i ri las shod du babs te zhes bya ba ni grong khyer yangs pa can gyi sems can gyi don du'o/ /
<p>51b.2</p>yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der gshegs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ yangs pa can gyi mi rnams kyis mthong nas/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang rol mo'i tshogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rnams la sdun du zhu'o/ /grong khyer yangs pa can gyi grong dang / grong bar dang / 
<p>51b.3</p>grong gi phyi rol dang / ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / mu tig dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / dra ba dang / dra ba phyed ba dang / /bsil yab dang / rnga ma dang / rnga ma dkar po dang / dar dpyangs dang / bla re dang / dog sa la za 'og dang / dar bting
<p>51b.4</p>ba dang / grong bar du zur zur bkra shis bum pa gang ba yang dag par gzhag pa'o/ /yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu byon pa dga' nas lits+tsha 'am lits+tsha'i chung ma'am li ts+tsha'i bu'am bu mo'am/ lits+tsha'i 'khor pho'am/ 'khor mo'am/ 
<p>51b.5</p>nye ba rnams la dga' ba'i sems dang ldan no/ /sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba ni/ dper na mi cig btson du bzung ba dang btson thon nas sdug bsngal dang bral ba lta bu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shin tu mdzes pa zhes bya ba ni/ dper na bu mo gzhon nu ma bag mar 'gro ba
<p>51b.6</p>bcas pa lta bu ste yang na dbyar ka'i nam mkha' la nyi zla shar ba lta bu'o/ /skar ma rnams ni nyan thos la sogs pa lta bu ste/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la mdzes pa'o/ /dad par 'os pa zhes bya ba ni/ dper na bu gces pa tshong la song nas/ yun ring por lon nas ma dang phrad pa
<p>51b.7</p>lta bu'o/ /dbang po zhi ba zhes bya ba ni/ mu stegs shin tu nga rgyal che ba bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong nas dad pa skyes pa dang 'dra ste/ yang na ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang bral ba'o/ /thugs zhi ba zhes bya ba ni sems mi 'phro ba lta bu'o/ /dbang po dul ba zhes bya ba ni gzugs
<p>52a</p>
<p>52a.1</p>sgra dri ro reg bya dang bral ba'o/ /thugs dul ba zhes bya ba ni/ brnab sems gnod sems log par lta ba las bral ba'o/ /dul ba dang zhi gnas kyis zhes pa ni/ nyan thos kyi tshul du gnas pa'o/ /dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa zhes bya ba ni/ pha rol tu phyin
<p>52a.2</p>pa bcu ste de la sbyin pa ni sems can rnams yongs su 'dzin pa ste de la yang gsum/ zas skom dang nor bu dang / 'bru la sogs pas sems can rnams tshim par byas te/ mgu bar byed pa dang / phan skyabs dang dpung gnyen gyis sems can rnams 'jigs skrag las dbugs phyung ste
<p>52a.3</p>mgu bar byed pa dang don dang yi ge dang brda'i sgo nas sems can rnams nyon mongs pa las grol bar byas te mgu bar byed pa'o/ /tshul khrims ni de dag la mi gnod cing phan par sems pa ste/ de la gsum bcas pa dang rang bzhin gtso bo'i sgo nas gzhan las gnad pa las ldog
<p>52a.4</p>par dam bcas pa'i sems can thams cad dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la sogs pa'i sgo nas dka' bar byed pa'i dam bcas pa'i sems bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la sogs pas sems can gyi don byed par dam bcas pa'i sems brtan pa'o/ /bzod pa ni bsran bya'i dngos po la
<p>52a.5</p>mi skrag cing sran tshugs pa sems pa'o/ /de la yang gsum ste/ chos la sems pa'i phyir rtag tu sdug bsngal ba la sran tshugs pa dang / gzhan gyi gnod pa byas pa la mi skrag cing sran tshugs pa'i shes pa dang chos nyid stong pa nyid spros bral don la mi skrag cing sran tshugs pa'o/ /
<p>52a.6</p>brtson 'grus ni dge ba la spro ba'i shes pa'o/ /de la yang gsum ste/ bsgrub bya'i dngos po de ltar sgrub par dam bcas pa'i sems pa dang / de nyid nyams su len pa'i sems pa dang / bsgrub bya de nyid mthar ma phyin par mi gtong ba'i sems pa'o/ /bsam gtan ni dmigs
<p>52a.7</p>pa la rtse gcig pa'o/ /de la yang gsum ste/ mi mthun phyogs kyi bying rgod dngos por yang ma byung la dogs pa yang yod pa'i tshe spong ba'i sems mnyam pa nyid la rgyun du gzhag /blan te bzhag pa'i sgo nas mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan khyad par can sgrub pa dang / 
<p>52b</p>
<p>52b.1</p>bying rgod byung gi dogs pa yang yod kyang / dngos su ma byung ba'i sems rnal du zhugs pa'i skabs dang / bying rgod sems byung yang ma byung gi dogs pa yang med pa'i sems lhun gyis grub pa'i skabs na lus kyi 'byor ba stod nas me byung smad nas chu brub pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas
<p>52b.2</p>sems can don byed pa'o/ /shes rab ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'o/ /de la yang gsum ste/ sgra thos nas rtogs pa dang / rig pa nges pa'i shes rab kyis sgra don la spyad pas don rtogs pa de lta bu'i don bsgoms pas blo phul du byung ba skyes pa'o/ /thabs ni dge ba chung ngu byas
<p>52b.3</p>pa yang mi zad par chen por byed pa ste/ rang gi skyon dge ba chen po chung ngur 'gro ba dang / mi zad pa zad bar 'gyur ba spong ba dang rang gi dge ba la sems 'jug pa'i thabs shes pa dang / rang gi dge ba'i 'bras bu myur du smin pa'i thabs shes pa'o/ /smon lam ni 'dod pa'i gnas
<p>52b.4</p>su rang gi dge ba stobs pa'o/ /de la yang gsum ste/ rang gi dge ba de phyi ma la sogs pa la rgyun mi 'chad par smon cing de yang sems can thams cad kyi don du bsngo ba dang / bdag gang du skye ba der sems can rnams 'dod chags med pa zhe sdang med par gyur cig ces sems sbyong ba
<p>52b.5</p>dang bdag gang du skye ba der ma btab pa'i lo thog skye ba sman dang me tog phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing khams rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig ces smon lam gdab pa'o/ /stobs ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs zil gyis gnon pa'o/ /de la yang gsum ste/ mi dge ba'i las kyi
<p>52b.6</p>dbang du mi 'gro zhing zil gyis gnon par mi nus shing phar la zil gyis gnon pa dang / bdud dang rgol ba rnams kyis tshur zil gyis gnon par mi nus la phar zil gyis gnon pa'o/ /ye shes ni dngos po de shes pa'o/ /de la yang gsum ste/ gnyis su snang yang mi snang la zhen
<p>52b.7</p>pa med pa dang snang ni snang la zhen pa med pa dang / nyan thos la sogs pa gang gis 'dul ba dang / de dang der ston pa'o/ /de ltar bcu po de rnams re re la yang gnyis gnyis te/ sbyin pa yin la pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa dang sbyin pa yang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa yang yin pa'o/ /de
<p>53a</p>
<p>53a.1</p>yang sems can thams cad kyi don du bsngo ba dang / byams pa dang snying rje'i rnal 'byor gyis zin pa dang / bla na med pa'i rgyur bsngos pa de ni/ sbyin pa yang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa yang yin pa'o/ /de las bzlog pa ni sbyin pa yang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'o/ /de
<p>53a.2</p>ltar tshul khrims la sogs pa yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /sbyin pa yang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa la gnyis te/ sbyin bya'i rdzas la sems pa mi dmigs pa dang / sbyin bdag mi dmigs pa dang / len pa mi dmigs pa'i shes rab kyis zin pa ni lo ka las 'das pa g.yeng ba
<p>53a.3</p>las 'phags pa'i phyir 'das pa'o/ /'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ni lo ka las mi g.yo ba 'phags pa'i phyir na 'jig rten pa'i de ltar tshul khrims la sogs pa la yang sbyar ro/ /nges pa'i tshig ni sbyin pa nyid kyis pha rol tu phyin par byed pa'i phyir na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
<p>53a.4</p>phyin pa ste/ gzhan la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /ming gi rnam grangs pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni mchog tu phyin pa zhes bya/ mthar phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /'o na 'bras bu sku gsum mam chos kyi dbyings ye shes dang rgyu pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis tha dad du mi 'gyur ram zhe na/ pha rol tu
<p>53a.5</p>phyin pa bcu ni chos can la chos dbyings ye shes sam sku gsum ni chos nyid kyi tshul du gnas pa'am/ chos dbyings ye shes ni rten la/ pha rol tu phyin pa ni brten pa'i tshul du gnas pa tha mi dad pa'o/ /dbang po dben zhing zhes bya ba ni/ dbang po ni mig gi dbang po'o/ /yang na ni
<p>53a.6</p>gom pa bdun gyi bar du spyi lta ste/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ /khugs pa zhes bya ba ni sems yin te/ nyon mongs pa la sogs pa yang dag par spangs pa'o/ /glang po che ltar shin tu dul ba zhes bya ba ni/ glang po che ni dpe yin te glang po che dul ba ltar yang dag par
<p>53a.7</p>rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gzugs la sogs pa 'dul ba'o/ /mtsho ltar dang zhing zhes bya ba ni/ mtsho ni shin tu rgya che ba gting ring ba ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dpag tu med pa'o/ /rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba ni/ rnyog pa ni dri mas te dri ma ni nyon
<p>53b</p>
<p>53b.1</p>mongs pa la sogs pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma dang bral ba'o/ /rnam par gsal ba zhes bya ba ni/ ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa rnam par gsal ba ste/ yang na ni ye shes lnga rnam par gsal ba dang ldan pa'o/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
<p>53b.2</p>kyis sku legs par brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang / phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba dang / phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho
<p>53b.3</p>ba dang / sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba dang / zhabs legs par mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba dang / ri dgas e na ya'i byin pa lta bu dang / phyag brla drang por slebs pa dang / gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang / gser
<p>53b.4</p>gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa dang / spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang / seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa dang / phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng
<p>53b.5</p>gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa dang / ljags shin tu yangs pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang / tshems shin tu dkar ba dang / tshems mnyam pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba dang / spyan
<p>53b.6</p>dkar nag phyed pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di ltar/ rus pa'am ba so la gzugs brkos pa dang 'dra ba mnga' bas phyag
<p>53b.7</p>dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o/ /zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing zhabs zhum pa med pas zhabs shin tu gnas so/ /ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel bas/ phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba'o/ /shing bal gyi
<p>54a</p>
<p>54a.1</p>g.yeng bu ltar shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'o/ /zhabs dang phyag dang mgur gyi lhun shin tu mtho bas/ phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring ba'o/ /rting pa ring bas rting pa yangs pa'o/ /sku lag pa mdun du 'phags la drang bas sku
<p>54a.2</p>che zhing drang ba'o/ /pus mo'i lha nga dang long bu mdzes par nub pas/ zhabs legs par mtho ba'o/ /spu gyen du g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bas yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'o/ /ri dgas e na ya'i byin pa lta bu dang / smin ma dang ldum bu dar ba ltar drang zhing mnyam pa la rim
<p>54a.3</p>gyis gzhol bar grub cing byin pa zlum pas ri dgas e na ya'i byin pa lta bu'o/ /brla drang por bzhag ste ma btud kyang phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga la reg pas/ phyag brla drang por slebs pa'o/ /glang po dang rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin tu mdzes
<p>54a.4</p>par sbubs su nub pas/ gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o/ /shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gser gyi kha dog go/ /gser dang dngul shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i kha dog tu 'dug pa sku la rdul gyis ma gos pas mdog shin tu 'jam
<p>54a.5</p>pa'o/ /shin tu rnam par phye ba'i spu re re skyes shing / gnyis su med pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba'o/ /me tog kun+da dang zla ba dang 'o ma dang ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la/ nyi ma dang zla ba rgyas pas kyang 'phags pas 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spus smin mtshams shin tu rgyas
<p>54a.6</p>pas zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa'o/ /ro stod che bas seng ge'i ro stod do/ /mgul pa rgyu legs par lhu 'brel zhing lhun zlum pas/ phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'o/ /gser gyi gtan pa shin tu phyis pa ltar shin tu phrag so legs par grub pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'o/ /rlung dang
<p>54a.7</p>mkhris pa dang bad kan gyis ma nyams shing rnam par shes pa 'dra ba med pas ro bro ba'i mchog go/ /sku chu zheng 'dom du mnyam pas/ shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa'o/ /spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs par g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan zhing dbu mnyam zhing legs par grub pa la/ 
<p>54b</p>
<p>54b.1</p>mdzes pa mnga' bas dbu'i spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o/ /me tog ut+pal dmar po'i 'od mnga' ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug cing shin tu yangs pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'o/ /tshangs pa dang bya ka la ping+ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs so/ /'gram pa me
<p>54b.2</p>long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing / mdzes par skyes te yid du 'ong bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o/ /me tog kun+da dang dung gi bcag 'phro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas tshems shin tu dkar ba'o/ /tshems la mthon dman med pas tshems mnyam pa'o/ /
<p>54b.3</p>tshems la bar mtshams ma dod pas tshems thags bzang pa'o/ /bla 'og dgye dgu med pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'o/ /dkar nag cha ma 'dres pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mdog dmar pos ma g.yogs pas/ spyan dkar nag phyed pa'o/ /rdzi ma bla 'og shin
<p>54b.4</p>tu legs par gnas la ma 'dzings ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'o/ /de la bla ma la bsu skyel dang chos nyan pa la sdod pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten rjes su sgrub pa la sogs pa la phu dung byas pas/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/ de ni 'khor
<p>54b.5</p>shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas so/ /yi dam la brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste de ni mi g.yo zhing shin tu brtan pa'i snga ltas so/ /sbyin pa dang ngag snyan pa dang / don spyod pa dang don mthun pa'i bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi goms par byas pas zhabs dang phyag dra bas 'brel ba ste/ 
<p>54b.6</p>de ni myur du 'du ba'i lnga ltas so/ /bza' ba dang bca' ba dang btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba byin pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho ba ste de gnyis ni bca' ba dang bza' ba dang / btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba mthong ba'i snga ltas so/ /bcing
<p>54b.7</p>ba bkrol ba dang srog gi rim gro byas pa dang / srog gcod pa spangs pas sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang bas te de ni sku tshe ring pa'i snga ltas so/ /dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang / gzung ba mngon par spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas zhabs kyi gong
<p>55a</p>
<p>55a.1</p>mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba ste de ni mi mnyam pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga ltas so/ /rig pa dang bzo'i las rim gror byas shing gzhan 'byin pa dang / bdag gis blangs pas/ ri dgas e na ya'i byin pa lta bu ste/ de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas so/ /bdog
<p>55a.2</p>cing yod pa'i nor blangs nas mi 'gong bar gtong zhing med ces ma byas pas phyag brla drang por slebs pa ste/ de ni yo byad la mnga' ba dang 'dul ba'i snga ltas so/ /grogs po dang / mdza' bshes dang gnyen pa ma phye ba dang / bye bar 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa la
<p>55a.3</p>yang dag par bskul ba dang / gsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsrungs pas gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa ste/ de ni bu mang ba'i snga ltas so/ /stan dang / gos dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gzhal med khang bzang po byin pas gser gyi kha dog dang / /mdog
<p>55a.4</p>shin tu 'jam pa ste/ de gnyis ni na bza' dang / gdan dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po thob pa'i snga ltas so/ /'du 'dzi spangs pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / pha ma dang / phu nu la sogs pa rnams la/ tshul dang 'dra ba'i rim gro
<p>55a.5</p>byas pa dang / btsun par byas pa dang bcol ba rna ba la ma gzan pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste/ de ni mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltas so/ /mi snyan pa zer zhing mi smon pa dang / snyan par smra zhing legs par bshad pa mthun par 'dzin
<p>55a.6</p>pas seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa ste/ de ni thub pa med pa'i snga ltas so/ /na ba rnams la rtsi dang rim gro dang / sman pa dang nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang / rim gro byas pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog ste/ de ni nad nyung
<p>55a.7</p>ba'i snga ltas so/ /skyed mos tshal dang / 'khor dang / ltung ba dang / rdzing bu dang / rgal dka' ba'i zam pa dang / kha zas dang / phreng ba'i gnas dang / stegs dang / gtsug lag khang bya ba la sogs pa la gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du gtong zhing bdag gis gzhan byin pa ste/ 
<p>55b</p>
<p>55b.1</p>shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang dbu'i spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/ de ni mnga' chen po mnga' ba'i snga ltas so/ /yun ring por tshig snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde ba'i smra ba smras pas ljags shin tu srab pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs te de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan
<p>55b.2</p>pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so/ /gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes pa ni yongs su shes shing rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang / mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang / zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang / gtang mi bra zhing rnar snyan pa dang / ma 'khrugs
<p>55b.3</p>shing btsal ba'o/ /yun ring po nas tshig 'khyal ba spangs shing / dus su smras pas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/ de ni tshig kun gyis mnyan pa'i snga ltas so/ /rim gror bya ba dang / brnyas pa med pas gnyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas tshems shin tu dkar ba
<p>55b.4</p>dang mnyam pa ste de 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas so/ /yun ring po nas bden zhing phra ma med pa'i tshig smra bas tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba ste de ni 'khor dbyer mi phyed pa'i snga ltas so/ /pang gis 'khyud pa bzhin du nye bar
<p>55b.5</p>bsam pa med la ma chags mi sdang ba dang / rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta bas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so/ /de dag ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so// //dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus shin
<p>55b.6</p>tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni gang zhe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben ba ste/ sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa'o/ /gnyen bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sen mo'i mdog
<p>55b.7</p>snum pa yin/ rigs dang rgyud mthon por byung ba ste/ sen mo mtho ba yin/ tshul la kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ba ste/ sor mo zlum pa yin no/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu tshogs pa ste/ sor mo rgyas pa yin no/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste/ sor mo rim gyis grub pa
<p>56a</p>
<p>56a.1</p>gzhon pa yin no/ /thugs dang gsung dang sku'i phrin las dang / 'tsho ba shin tu dben pa ste rtsa mi mngon pa yin no/ /nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grol ba ste/ rtsa bar mdud pa med pa yin no/ /shin tu dben pa'i chos mnga' ba ste/ long bu mi mngon pa
<p>56a.2</p>yin no/ /mi mnyam pa thams cad las grol ba ste/ zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa yin no/ /mi'i seng ge ste seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin no/ /mi'i glang po ste glang po che'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin no/ /ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pa ste/ ngang pa'i stabs su bzhud pa
<p>56a.3</p>yin no/ /mi'i khyu mchog ste khyu mchog gi 'gros su bzhud pa yin no/ /mthun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste/ g.yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin no/ /lta na mdzes pa ste mdzes par bzhud pa yin no/ /rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste/ ma yo bar bzhud pa yin no/ /tshul rnam par dag
<p>56a.4</p>pa yon tan ston pa ste sku shin tu legs pa yin no/ /sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu sbyangs pas te/ sku shin tu sbyangs pa yin no/ /chos rim gyis ston pas te sku rim gyis gzhol ba yin no/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs shin tu gtsang ba dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu gtsang ba yin no/ /rang bzhin gyis
<p>56a.5</p>thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pas te sku shin tu 'jam pa yin no/ /rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa mnga' ba ste/ sku shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /chos dang 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dpe byad bzang po shin tu rdzogs pa yin no/ /yon tan yangs shing bzang ba ston pa ste sku che zhing
<p>56a.6</p>mdzes pa yin no/ /sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku legs par mnyam pa yin no/ /mchog tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa ste/ sku shin tu gzhon pa yin no/ /rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku la zhum pa med pa yin no/ /mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
<p>56a.7</p>cad byang ba ste/ sku shin tu rgyas pa yin no/ /yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste sku shin tu mkhregs pa yin no/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nying lag legs par ston pa ste/ /yan lag dang nying lag gtsang mar mdzes pa yin no/ /gzigs pa shin tu rnam
<p>56b</p>
<p>56b.1</p>par dag pa ste/ snang ba rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa yin no/ /tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ phyal zlum pa yin no/ /'khor ba'i legs nyes thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ phyal shin tu byang ba dang ldan pa yin no/ /nga rgyal gyi de'u bcom pa ste/ phyal ma zhum pa
<p>56b.2</p>yin no/ /chos zad pa rnam par zlog pas te phyal phyam mer 'dug pa yin no/ /chos zab mo shin tu thugs su chud pa ste lte bzab pa yin no/ /mthun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba yin no/ /slob ma kun la mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' ba
<p>56b.3</p>ste/ kun nas mdzes pa yin no/ /thugs shin tu gtsang bas te/ sku sbyong ba shin tu gtsang ba yin no/ /chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste/ sku la sme ba med pa yin no/ /shing bal ltar yang ba rab tu 'thob pa'i chos ston pas te/ phyag shing bal ltar
<p>56b.4</p>'jam pa yin no/ /rang gi skye bo dang phal ba la byams pas dge sbyong chen po mnyes pa ste phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin no/ /shin tu zab cing brtan par bzhugs pas bzhugs pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin no/ /bzod pa'i yangs pa ston pa ste phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin no/ /bslab
<p>56b.5</p>pa'i gnas ha cang mi ring bar 'char ba ste zhal ha cang yang mi ring ba yin no/ /gzugs brnyan 'jig rten thams cad du dgye ba ste/ zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan ma yin no/ /'jam pa sngon du gtong zhing 'dul ba ste/ ljags shin tu 'jam pa yin no/ /yon tan phra ba'i tshogs
<p>56b.6</p>dang ldan pa ste/ ljags shin tu srab pa yin no/ /byis pa so so'i skye bo 'dod chags pa rnams kyis chos dang 'dul ba gting dpag par dka' ba ste/ ljags shin tu dmar ba yin no/ /glang po chen po'i sgra dang 'brug gi sgra lta bus nyes pa mi mnga' ba ste/ glang po che'i nga ro dang 'brug gi
<p>56b.7</p>sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa'o/ /snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa'o/ /srid par kun du sbyor ba las 'das te/ tshems mche ba shin tu zlum pa yin no/ /skye bo rno ba rnams 'dus pas te/ tshems
<p>57a</p>
<p>57a.1</p>mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin no/ /chos dang 'dul ba shin tu dkar ba ste/ tshems mche ba shin tu dkar ba yin no/ /sa phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/ mche ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /rim gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste/ tshems mche ba
<p>57a.2</p>rim gyis gzhol ba yin no/ /shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pa ste/ shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin no/ /'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma mnga' ba ste/ shangs shin tu gtsang ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos phul du yangs pa mnga' ba ste/ spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin
<p>57a.3</p>no/ /gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ spyan rnam par dag pa yin no/ /sems can gyi tshogs shin tu bsags pa ste rdzi ma stug pa yin no/ /lha dang lha ma yin dang skyes bu dang na chung mchog gi mig dkar nag phyed pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar
<p>57a.4</p>byas te/ spyan dkar nag phyed cing pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa yin no/ /rtag tu yangs pas gzigs pa ste spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin no/ /'jam pa dul ba la mkhas pa ste smin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /skyon thams cad mkhyen pa ste smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang ldan no/ /
<p>57a.5</p>dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis sems snum par gyur pas skye bo 'dul ba ste smin ma snum pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan pa mnga' ba ste snyan legs shing snyan shal ring ba yin no/ /nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las rnam par rgyal ba ste snyan mnyam pa yin no/ 
<p>57a.6</p>sems can bsam pa mnyam pa 'bul ba ste snyan gyi dbang po mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/ zhal dbral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /phas kyi rgol ba shin tu dul ba ste/ zhal dbral ba yangs pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /
<p>57a.7</p>smon lam dam pa shin tu rdzogs pa ste dbu shin tu rgyas pa yin no/ /g.yul gyi bung ba rnam par zlog pa ste/ dbu bung ba ltar gnag pa yin no/ /mthong ba dang bsgom pa spangs pa'i bag la nyal zad par bya ba ste dbu stug pa yin no/ /thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs
<p>57b</p>
<p>57b.1</p>su chud pa ste/ dbu 'jam pa yin no/ /rtag tu mi 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/ dbu skra mi 'dzing ba yin no/ /brlang ba'i gsung yongs su bral ba ste/ dbu skra mi rtsub pa yin no/ /byang chub kyi yan lag spos kyi me tog gis skye bo mthun par bsgrubs pa ste/ dbu la dri zhim pa yin no/ /
<p>57b.2</p>sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang bkra shis dang dga' ba 'khyil bas brgyan pa yin no zhes bya'o/ /shing sA la'i rgyal po ltar zhes bya ba ni/ shin tu skye legs pa yal ga mang ba lo ma rgyas pa/ dper na dbyar ka tshad pa che ba'i dus su tshad pa la
<p>57b.3</p>'jigs nas shing des kyang mi la phan thogs te/ de bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang 'gro ba rigs drug sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin nyid du gshegs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa
<p>57b.4</p>ste/ de bzhin nyid ni stong pa nyid spros pa dang bral ba ste/ de yang dang po byung yang de'i ngang las byung ba/ bar du gnas kyang der/ tha mar 'gags pa thim yang de la thim pa'i phyir te chos sku'o/ /yang na de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ste/ stong pa nyid spros bral rtogs shing / rig pa'i
<p>57b.5</p>phyir longs sku'o/ /yang de bzhin du gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ mar me mdzad la sogs pa dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis mdzad pa bcu gnyis la sogs pa'i sgo nas sems can don la gshegs pa ste sprul pa'i sku'o/ /sku rnam par spras pa zhes bya ba ni shing
<p>57b.6</p>sA la'i lo ma rgyas pa ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang yon tan gyis spras pa'o/ /nyi ma ltar 'od zer gyi dra bas kun du 'gyed pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'od zer ni nyi ma bdun gyi 'od zer dra ba ste/ nyi ma de bzhin du 'od zer khyab pa bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid
<p>57b.7</p>kyis khyab pa'o/ /'od zer ni dra ba kun du 'gyed pa ci'i phyir zhe na don med par dra ba 'gyed pa ma yin no/ /'on kyang rgyal po'i khab na rgyal po sbyin pa sar ri rgyal khrims yin pa dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i dus na baiDUR+Ya DUr+ya shel zhes bya ba'i lha khang na bzhugs te dus
<p>58a</p>
<p>58a.1</p>gcig na bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi don byed la dgongs nas bsod snyoms mdzad de tshong dpon chen po bkra shis dpal dang / yum dpal ldan grags ma zhes bya ba ste/ yo byad phun sum tshogs pa me tog gi ra ba dang skyed mos tshal la sogs pa kho'i gnas ni
<p>58a.2</p>shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang / sems dga' ba dang / tshong dpon de'i slob dpon mu stegs gcer bu yin te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas de'i khyim du bsod snyoms la gshegs te/ de nas tshong dpon yab yum dad pa skyes nas/ yang dag par rdzogs
<p>58a.3</p>pa'i sangs rgyas ma byon pa de ring 'dir byon pa shin tu legs so/ /chos ston drangs/ bkur sti byas/ yo byad la sogs pa phul nas/ de nas tshong dpon gyi chung ma nad pa de bcom ldan 'das la gzigs su phul lo/ /tshong dpon gyis de skad smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das ni
<p>58a.4</p>mngon par shes pa mdzad de 'di'i lus la ci skye zhe na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshong dpon 'di'i lus la skyes bu dam pa skye'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan pa myur du thob
<p>58a.5</p>pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs pa dang tshong dpon dga' ba'i sems dang ldan no/ /bcom ldan 'das la phyag lan gsum btsal nas yang bkur sti la sogs pa byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs so/ /gshegs pa'i dus su mu stegs
<p>58a.6</p>gcer bu dang 'phrad do/ /gcer bu'i sems la nga'i yon bdag gau thams phrogs so snyam nas/ nang du phyin nas tshong dpon la smras so/ /kye tshong dpon gau ta ma ci la byon smras pas/ tshong dpon gyi zhal nas/ bcom ldan 'das bsod snyoms la byon pa lags/ dad pa skyes
<p>58a.7</p>nas bkur sti byas pa yin nga'i 'di'i nad pa gzigs su phul ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'di'i lus la skyes bu dam pa dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa myur du 'thob pa skye'o gsungs so/ /gcer
<p>58b</p>
<p>58b.1</p>bu'i mtshan nyid ni mngon par shes pa gcer bu ra'i 'phongs la thal lcag brgyab pas gcer bu ra dang 'dra ba bzhi lnga lnga 'thon pa de bzhin du mtshan nyid dang 'dra ba'i gcer bus brdzun po smras so/ /kye tshong dpon gau ta ma'i 'dod pa yin/ kye bu dang skye ste skyes ma thag nas
<p>58b.2</p>ma gsod pa de'i rting la khyod kyi yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad zad par byed pa de'i rting la pha bsad nas kho rang rab tu byung ba yin/ de lta bu skye ba yin/ khyed kyis myur du ma bsad na/ de bzhin du khyod la de dag myur du 'ong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyis nub mo'i dus su chung ma'i gsus
<p>58b.3</p>pa phyag gnyis kyis mnyes so/ /mnyes pas mo ma bzod nas skad ngan chen po byung ngo / /de nas khyim mtshes dang nye ba la sogs pas thos nas/ ra mda' byas pas de'i nub mo dbugs dang ma bral lo/ /yang phyi de nub mo'i dus su me tog gi ra ba yod pa'i skyed mos tshal gyi dbus su khang
<p>58b.4</p>pa cig gi nang du yang khrid nas chung ma'i gsus pa mnyes so/ /mnyes pa dang bud med de na tsha chen po byung bas dbugs chad do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyis kha skad bsgyur nas smras so/ /nga'i chung ma de yang byis pa ma thon par gum mo zhes smras so/ /mya ngan gyi tshul yang byas de nas mu stegs
<p>58b.5</p>gcer bu'i tshogs rnams kyang rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ srang ga'am srang ga chen po'am/ grong ngam grong khyer chen po'am/ grong rdal la sogs pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal po skyes bu rnams gau ta ma'i brdzun po la tshong dpon de'i bud med la bu khye'u ga re mo yang shi/ gau ta
<p>58b.6</p>ma'i brdzun po la sems can thams cad dad pa skyed de skad bzhin du gcer bu'i tshogs rnams yang nas yang du smra zhing dril bu dkrol zhing ba dan phyar zhing yar 'gro mar 'gro byas so/ /gcer bu'i tshogs rnams kyang rang dong skyes so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bai DU r+ya'i ri shel gyi
<p>58b.7</p>gtsug lag khang gi nang du seng ge'i gdan la rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' dang dgra bcom pa'i nyan thos dang dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma'am/ 'khor gyi dbus su ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /yang dag par
<p>59a</p>
<p>59a.1</p>rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer gyi dra ba nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa stong gsum gyi stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams chen po khyab po/ /kun du khyab po/ /yang 'od zer gyi dra ba de ba spu re re la 'du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu re re'am mdzod spu nas 'od
<p>59a.2</p>zer gyi dra ba nyi ma bdun shar ba dang 'dra ba nam mkha' la 'phro'o/ /de nas 'od zer de yang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sogs pa dga' ldan nam sum cu rtsa gsum mam rgyal chen gyi lha'am/ 'od zer gyi dra bas kun du khyab po/ /'od zer gyi dra ba de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
<p>59a.3</p>kyi mdzod spu la 'du'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas la/ mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kye
<p>59a.4</p>lags/ gang gi sems can gyi don lags/ mtshan nyid gang lags/ rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das zhes smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin de las langs te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/ /
<p>59a.5</p>tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom pa nyan thos dang / dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor rnams dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du 'gro ba lags/ gzhon nu 'od zer skyes dgra bcom pa yang dag par byung bas
<p>59a.6</p>gshegs par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i stan las langs te/ gtsug lag khang nas phyir gshegs so/ /de bzhin du dgra bcom pa rnams kyang gshegs so/ /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 
<p>59a.7</p>rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / rgyal chen gyi lha rnams dang / lha ma yin dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang lha'i rol mos bcom ldan 'das la sngun du bsu ste/ lha rdzas kyi dri bzang po dang / me tog gi char phab bo/ /de nas rgyal po chen po gzugs can snying pos thos
<p>59b</p>
<p>59b.1</p>nas rgyal po dang rgyal po chen po 'khor dang bcas pa yang gshegs so/ /de'i rting la gcer bu'i mtshan ma'am tshong dpon gyi 'khor ram/ ro de gla la gshegs so/ /de bzhin du rgyal po'i khab kyi skye dgu 'am skye dgu'i bdag po la sogs pa dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du gshegs so/ /
<p>59b.2</p>bsil ba'i tshal du slebs nas/ phyogs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos la sogs pa bzhugs so/ /phyogs gcig tu gcer bu dang mu stegs pa bsdad do/ /de nas ro bsregs pa'i sa nas skad byung ngo / /skad byung ba dang pad+ma skyes so/ /pad+ma'i steng na gzhon nu 'od
<p>59b.3</p>zer skyes zhes bya ba skyes so/ /shin tu skye legs pa dgra bcom pa'i cha byang dang ldan pa de me'i nang du de lta bu skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon la smras pa/ kye tshong dpon khyod kyi bu 'di lags so zhes smras so/ /tshong dpon gyis gcer bu la kha
<p>59b.4</p>bltas nas langs dogs byed do/ /de nas gcer bus tshong dpon la smras so/ /kye tshong dpon me'i nang du gang yang / shi nas me la bsregs pa la/ /khyod kyi bu ni gang las skyes/ /me yi nang du 'gro na ni/ /khyod ni nges par tshig par 'gyur/ /zhes brjod pas 'gro ma nus so/ /de nas
<p>59b.5</p>bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal to/ /kye rgyal po chen po gzhon nu long la spyon cig ces brjod pa dang / rgyal po chen pos blangs nas/ me'i nang nas khyer nas 'ongs so/ /me de yang shin tu bsil ba tsha ba'i dngos po med do/ /yang
<p>59b.6</p>dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis blangs nas/ byin gyis brlabs nas/ dgra bcom pa gzhon nu 'od zer skyes zhes bya bar mtshan btags so/ /de nas gzugs can snying pos blangs te/ lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pas kyang bltas so/ /ngo mtshar che'o/ /mi
<p>59b.7</p>rnams kyis kyang ngo mtshar che'o zhes ltad mo bltas so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pas/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi char phab bo/ /lha'i rol mos mchod pa byas so/ /mu stegs gcer bu'i tshan pa de pham mo/ /bdud pham mo/ /'od
<p>60a</p>
<p>60a.1</p>zer gyi dra ba kun du 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i nges tshig go/ /mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan mo ni dpe yin te/ de bzhin du mtshan mo'i me ni shin tu gsal bas mtshan mo zhes bya ba'o/ /ro bo'i spo la me'i phung po chen po rab tu 'bar ba dang 'dra zhing zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>60a.2</p>dper na mi zhig gis ri bo chen po la 'bar ba mthong bzhin du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gser gyi ri bo nas gshegs pa mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni/ gser zhes bya ba ni/ yon tan dang ldan pa'o/ /ri bo chen po ltar zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'o/ /lha ma me lhan ne zhes bya ba ni 'od zer
<p>60a.3</p>sna tshogs so/ /rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni/ mun nag gi nang nas me 'bar ba mthong ba bzhin du mthong ngo / /gshegs pa ni grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dbus su'o/ /mthong ba ni lits+tsha bI rnams kyis so/ /mthong ma thag tu zhes bya ba ni gus pa'i sems kyis
<p>60a.4</p>bcom ldan 'das la'o/ /yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams bcom ldan 'das la sems dad par gyur nas zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas sems de 'khril bar 'gyur ba'o/ /sems dad par gyur pa de dag ces bya
<p>60a.5</p>ba ni grong khyer yangs pa can gyi mi rnams so/ /byi dor byed pa zhes bya ba ni dad pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por/ lam gang nas gshegs pa'i lam de 'phyag cing chag chag 'debs zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
<p>60a.6</p>gshegs pa'i lam la gzhan rnams kyis kyang tsan+dan la sogs pa'i dri zhim po'i chus sa gzhi rnam par dag par byas so/ /byi dor legs byas me tog 'thor/ /zhes bya ba ni sa gzhi mthon dman med par byas la me tog sna tshogs kyis sil mar bkram la me tog phreng ba'i dra
<p>60a.7</p>bas brgyan pa'o/ /dar gyi lda ldi dang / dril bu dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis brgyan te zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer gyi phyogs bzhir yang bar snang gi phyogs su de rnams 'phyar ba'o/ /bdug spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs nas zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>60b</p>
<p>60b.1</p>grong khyer gyi phyogs dang mtshams su bdug spos sna tshogs kyi bog phor gzhag pa dang bum pa gang ba bzhag pa'o/ /ga la ba der song ste ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dbus su'o/ /zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni/ grong
<p>60b.2</p>khyer yangs pa can gyi mi rnams dang lits+tsha bI rnams kyis phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni phyag 'tshal gyi rting la'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i ri mo can me tog pad+ma'i snying po ltar 'jam pa zhes bya ba ni lits+tsha bI'i mgo la reg
<p>60b.3</p>ba'o/ /sngon legs par spyad pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni skyes bu'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus legs par brgyan pa'o/ /gzhon sha chags shing zhes bya ba ni lo bcu gnyis pa'i sha lta bu'o/ /'jam pa ni lus ngag yid gsum 'jam
<p>60b.4</p>pos nyi ma'i 'od zer bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni nyi ma bdun gyi 'od zer dang ldan pa'o/ /'od zer brgya phrag mang po kun du 'phro ba zhes bya ba ni/ mdzod spu'am ba spu'i bu ga'am lte ba'i gnas sam dbu'i gtsug tor ram ljags sam sna'i bu ga'am/ snyan nam
<p>60b.5</p>spyan gyi sgo nas sems can gyi don la 'phro ba'o/ /dri ma med pa'i phyag gis zhes bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'o/ /lits+tsha bI rnams kyi mgo la byugs te zhes bya ba ni bram ze chen pos gsol ba btab pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phyag spyi bor bzhag nas
<p>60b.6</p>byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bya ba ni rjes su dran pa drug go/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni lits+tsha bI byin gyis brlabs zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i nang du gshegs pa ni/ grong khyer gyi dbus su nam gyi gung thun la zhes
<p>60b.7</p>bya ba ni yi dgas rgyu ba'i dus su'o/ /sgo skyes kyi gzhi zhabs kyis mnan nas zhes bya ba ni/ dbang po'i phur pa la zhabs yang dag par bzhag pa'o/ /phyogs bzhir gzigs te zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'o/ /phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas zhes
<p>61a</p>
<p>61a.1</p>bya ba ni/ sngon du song ba ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa'o/ /na bza' bla gos gsol te zhes bya ba ni/ mdzes pa'i chos gos phrag la gzar nas zhes bya ba yin no/ /bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log
<p>61a.2</p>pa'o/ /phyi ma'i dus na zhes bya ba ni/ sku mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /dge slong ma la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ bstan pa srung dgos pa'i dus su ste bkur sti byed pa'o/ /gang su yang rung ba dag ces bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' lcang lo can rnams kyis bkur sti byed par 'gyur ro/ /
<p>61a.3</p>de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la mchod pa byed pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar yod pa rnams kyi/ sku gzugs dang gdung dang ring bsrel lta bu'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa gdon thams cad
<p>61a.4</p>las thar bar byed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin bdud bzhi po pham par byed pa/ bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa yang dag par 'grub pa/ sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms par byed ma/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams rlag par byed ma/ 
<p>61a.5</p>chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi skur snang ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya 'di zhes bya ba ni/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma 'di yang 'das pa'i
<p>61a.6</p>sangs rgyas 'od srungs la sogs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis bsrung zhing / phyag rgya'i rgyas btab pa de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa la sogs pa yin no/ /de ltar yang shAkya thub pa la sogs pas bsrung zhing phyag rgya'i rgyas
<p>61a.7</p>btab pa'o/ /'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing ston pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang kha ton du sngags dang mdo 'don pa dang / kun chub par byed pa de dag la zhes bya ba ni/ rgya cher chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / 
<p>61b</p>
<p>61b.1</p>gus par 'di las rgya cher spel nas bla mar byas/ mchod par byas pa'o/ /yams kyi nad dang 'jigs pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'ching ba dang / kha mchu dang / shags dang / tha na phra ma dang sdig pa mi dge ba sdug bsngal ba'i
<p>61b.2</p>las kyis mi tshugs shing 'tshe bar byed pa thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni greng yangs pa can gyi dbus su 'khor gyi nang du bka' stsal pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni/ mnyam pa nyid du khyab pa'i
