<p>81b.3</p>ni bco lnga'o/ /gdugs re re zhing rig sngags bklag go zhes bya ba ni/ snga dro'i dus su bya'o/ /yang na rgyun mi 'chad par bklag go/ /de ltar na yang yul 'khor yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ dbang blang ngo / /khrus bya'o/ /bkra shis brjod/ gdon no/ /rol mo la
<p>81b.4</p>sogs bya'o/ /bkra shis kyi rdzas gdon par bya'o/ /de dag ni grong khyer bsrung ba'i cho ga'i gnas skabs te bdun pa'o// //de ltar grong dang grong khyer la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gang yang rung ngo / /yang na nad pa'i khyim mam phyugs lhas rnams nyal nyil ma mchis par bgyis
<p>81b.5</p>te zhes bya ba ni/ legs par phyag dar byas nas/ ba'i rnam lngas gtor te/ hom khum zlum por byas nas/ cho ga ji bzhin du gtor bar bya'o/ /rdzas ni til dang mar la sogs pa'i rdzas/ ku sha la sogs pa yang de bzhin no/ /seng ldeng dang rgya shug la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ zhi ba'i
<p>81b.6</p>shing gang yang rung ba/ dog sa la me tog sil ma bkram ste zhes bya ba ni/ hom khung la sogs pa la gtor bar bgyi'o/ /sgo g.yas g.yon nas dri sna tshogs la zhes bya ba ni/ gang ba'i bum pa yang g.yas g.yon du gzhag go/ /dri dang me tog la sogs pa phul ba ste/ de
<p>81b.7</p>bzhin du me lha la khrus bya'o/ /sa bon thams cad mar gyis bskus te phyogs bzhir gtor bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ sarba pA paM da ha na badzra shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ chab sgor tshon skud sna tshogs bre bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ mda' dang mdung dang / ral gris bskor bar bya'o/ /dud 'gro'i
<p>82a</p>
<p>82a.1</p>skye gnas su gyur pa dag ni bton la slar yang gzung bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ dud 'gro rnams phyir btang ste/ yang gzhug par bya'o/ /yang na bgegs gang gnod pa'i ming byang bcug la/ me la gtang bar bya'o/ /rig sngags kyang bklag par bgyi'o zhes bya
<p>82a.2</p>ba ni/ gtsang sbra la brten te rgyun mi 'chad par bklag par bgyi'o/ /yi ger bris sam zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'o/ /mdud pa mdud de zhes bya ba ni srung skud do/ /mthon po'i khar btags la mchod par bgyi zhes bya ba ni/ mchod rten chen po'i rtse mo'am/ rang nyal ba'i steng ngam/ 
<p>82a.3</p>ya them la gdags pa'am/ gdung gi logs la gdags pa tsam gyis kyang / gnod byed dang nad thams cad la sogs pa yang mi tshugs pa'o/ /nad pa'i mdun du sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sam zhes bya ba ni gser ram dngul lam zangs sam/ ras ris la sogs pa/ sangs
<p>82a.4</p>rgyas kyi ring bsrel lam zhes bya ba ni zangs sam dngul la sogs pa las byas pa'i mchod rten nam/ rin po che'i snod du bzhag la/ bum pa zhabs phug la/ dri'am sman la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la/ khrus gsol bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs pa ni sngon du bshad
<p>82a.5</p>pa bzhin no/ /tshangs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs sam zhes bya ba ni/ dkyil 'khor yang dag par bris la bgyi'o/ /yang na bag phye'am 'bras phye la sogs pa las gzugs byas la/ dkyil 'khor la yang dag par gzhag go/ /phyag rgya bzhi bgyis la gzhag par bgyi'o zhes
<p>82a.6</p>bya ba ni/ phyag rgya bzhi ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stong chen mo yin te/ dar ram ras sam shing shun la sogs pa la cho ga bzhin du bris la/ nad pa la yang dag par gdags so/ /me tog sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang zhes bya ba ni/ mchod pa sna tshogs kyis phyag rgya
<p>82a.7</p>bzhi'i mchod pa bya'o/ /tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon dang / 'phrog ma la sogs pa'i ming gis zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyi ming dang gzugs byas nas mchod pa dang ming byas nas ar+g+ha bya'o/ /
<p>82b</p>
<p>82b.1</p>dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / rig sngags la sogs pa la yang dag par mchod do/ /gzungs kyang ngag ma 'dres par bklag par bya'o/ /de rnams kyi stobs dang dbang phyug dang / byin gyi rlabs
<p>82b.2</p>kyis bdag la bde legs su gyur cig /bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas dang rig sngags dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba rnams so/ /nad pa rnams nad thams cad las thar bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad la sogs pa'o/ /
<p>82b.3</p>de bzhin du byas na the tshom med do/ /nad pa'i zas dang skom dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i sngags bton nas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /sman rnams kyang rig sngags 'dis btab ste stsal bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni phyi nas 'dod pa'i sngags btabs nas/ bden pa
<p>82b.4</p>yang dag par bdar bar bya'o/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams sangs rgyas tshe/ /'jig rten skyong ba phyogs bzhi nas/ /zhes bya ba ni rdzogs sangs rgyas ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams so/ /'jig rten skyong ba ni brgya byin la sogs pas te/ de rnams yang phyogs bcur
<p>82b.5</p>skyong ba'o/ /snod bzhi dag ni blangs nas su/ /bde bar gshegs la phul ba dang / /zhes bya ba ni dang po bde bar gshegs pa rnams la 'bul te/ gnyis pa phyogs skyong la sogs pa la sbyin pa'o/ /mthu yis gcig tu sprul mdzad pa/ /lha yi snod mchog de dang ni/ /
<p>82b.6</p>zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing dag pa'i snod du'o/ /bdud rtsi 'dra ba'i sman gyi rnams/ /ston pa'i phyag na bsnams gyur pa/ /zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas byung ba/ rig sngags kyi nus mthu'i bdud rtsi'o/ /bden pa'i tshig ni de dag
<p>82b.7</p>gis/ /sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur bar shog /ces bya ba ni nad pa'i zas dang sgom dang sman la sogs pa 'di'i byin rlabs kyis bdud rtsir 'gyur ba'o/ /de bzhin lha mo 'phrog ma yis/ /lha rdzas dge ba a ru ra/ /zhes bya ba ni nad pa rnams kyi ma lta bu/ lha mos
<p>83a</p>
<p>83a.1</p>kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la a ru ra phul ba'o/ /blangs nas ston la rab phul ba/ /bdud rtsi 'dra ba'i sman gyi rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni de phul ba'i bden pas kyang / 'dir nad pa la bdud rtsir snang ba'o/ /bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gis/ /nad pa
<p>83a.2</p>rnams kyi nad sel zhing / /zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi bden pas nad rnams sel bar byed pa'o/ /nyes pa thams cad 'phrog par byed/ /sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur par shog /ces bya ba ni rig sngags kyi stobs dang gzi brjid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis
<p>83a.3</p>bdud rtsir snang ba'o/ /sangs rgyas rnam gzigs gzi brjid dang / /gtsug tor can gyi stobs rnams dang / /zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi dus su 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnam gzigs gzi brjid kyis/ sems can gyi don byas pa de bzhin du gtsug tor can gyi stobs kyis sems can gyi
<p>83a.4</p>don byed pa'o/ /thams cad skyob kyi bden tshig dang / /log dad sel gyi ting 'dzin dang / /zhes bya ba ni bskal pa gnyis pa'i dus su sangs rgyas thams cad skyob kyi bden pas sems can gyi don byas te/ de bzhin log dad sel gyi ting 'dzin gyis kyang don sems can gyi byas pa'o/ /
<p>83a.5</p>gser thub kyi ni ye shes dang / /'od srungs kyi ni rdzu 'phrul dang / /zhes bya ba ni bskal pa gsum pa'i dus so/ /bder gshegs gser thub kyi ye shes kyis sems can gyi don byas pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis sems can gyi don byas pa'o/ /shAkya seng ge'i mthu
<p>83a.6</p>rnams kyis/ /sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur par shog /ces bya ba ni bskal pa tha ma snyigs ma lnga'i dus su/ bder gshegs shAkya thub pas/ mthu'i stobs kyis sems can gyi don byas pas/ de rnams kyi bden pas 'dir yang sman rnams bdud rtsir snang ba'o/ /nad pa shar phyogs
<p>83a.7</p>kha bstan pa/ /sman rnams nye bar stsal bar bgyi/ /zhes bya ba ni bden pa 'di'i tshig dang / rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kha don du byas pas nad pa la bdud rtsi sbyin par bya'o/ /de yi [(]tshen [,]tshan [)]rig sngags 'di/ /zhes bya ba ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar mo g.yas na rdo rje dang
<p>83b</p>
<p>83b.1</p>g.yon na rin po che 'dzin pa/ spyan gsum dbu la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhi ba'i gzugs can zhabs phyed skyil du bzhugs pa/ pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i gdan/ nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la don byed pa/ rdo rje'i rigs la stong
<p>83b.2</p>chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'o/ /lag mthil gzhag ste bklag par bgyi/ /zhes bya ba ni rig sngags rgyal mo de bzhin du bsgoms nas/ rig sngags kyi zhal nas 'byung ba bzhin du bsgom par bya'o/ /rig sngags gang zhe na/ s+yAd ya the dan 'di lta ste/ sngags ni kha de kha de la sogs pa'o/ /rlung las gyur
<p>83b.3</p>dang mkhris las gyur/ /bad kan las gyur 'dus las gyur/ /nad rnams thams cad rab bcom ste/ /zhes bya ba ni de gsum gyis gzhi blangs pa/ nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi po rnams kyang / bden pa'i tshig dang rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyis nad thams cad bcom zhing bde bar 'gyur ro/ /
<p>83b.4</p>bdag la rtag tu bde legs shog /ces bya ba ni nad pa dang mtha' yas kyi sems can thams cad do/ /rims nad la sogs pa sel ba'i cho ga ste brgyad pa'o// //byad dang ro langs dang ldan pa'i las rnams la/ skyes pa'am bud med gdugs zhag gcig smyung bar bgyis
<p>83b.5</p>pa zhes bya ba ni sngags gtang ba dang / sbod gtong gtang ba dang / mdze dang phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / dug dang dug sbyar ma dang sman dang sman nyes pa dang / sa bdag la sogs pa'i nad thams cad smyo ba dang / 'bog pa la sogs pa bcom pa'o/ /rab tu bkrus pa shin tu brgyan pa
<p>83b.6</p>zhes bya ba ni/ byad kyis phog pa dang / slob dpon yid bzhin no/ /des dog sa la me tog sil ma bkram ste zhes bya ba ni/ sngon gyi dkyil 'khor bshad pa la brten la/ slob dpon mkhas pas cho ga yang dag par bya ste/ de bzhin sta gon gyi cho ga'o/ /mchod pa rnam pa lnga
<p>83b.7</p>la sogs pa byas nas/ ye shes sems dpa' yang de bzhin no/ /ar+g+haM la sogs pas yang dag par mchod do/ /spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs la zhes bya ba ni/ byad kyis phog pa dang / bum pa rnams la bdug pa dang / de bzhin du lha rnams kyang yin no/ /seng ldeng dang rgya
<p>84a</p>
<p>84a.1</p>shug rigs gnyis kyi zhugs bus te zhes bya ba ni/ thab khung zur gsum khru gang tshad du byas pa/ nag po'i sum brtsegs sor bzhi byas pa'o/ /pad+ma gsum pa phyi logs su byas pa nang du yang de bzhin du yin te/ me lha nag po khro bor nag po la zhon pa/ g.yas na
<p>84a.2</p>ral gri /g.yon na sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'dzin pa/ kha gdangs pa/ me'i mdog kyang de bzhin no/ /sa bon thams cad phyogs bzhir gtor bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni rdzas ni til la sogs pa yin te/ sha sna tshogs dang / khrag sna tshogs dang / 'bru sna tshogs dang / dus kyi
<p>84a.3</p>me tog gang yang rung ste/ bag phye'am 'bras la sogs pas gzugs byas la/ ling+ga dag kyang de bzhin no/ /zhugs kyi nang du yang gtor bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ rdzas de rnams dgang gzar blugs gzar gyis re mos blugs par bgyi'o/ /rtsa ba thams cad dang me tog thams cad
<p>84a.4</p>tshon skud sna tshogs la brgyus te zhes bya ba ni/ dug gi me tog sna tshogs dang byad gang gnod pa'i ming rus sam/ mtshon cha la sogs pa'i rtse mo la btags la/ phyogs bzhir gdags so/ /de bzhin du byad kyis phog pa'i mgul du yang gdags so/ /ral gri'am mdung
<p>84a.5</p>rtse gsum pa'am/ mdung ngam mda' la gdags par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ hom khung gi zur du bzhi bzhi btsugs la/ sngar bshad pas gdags pa'o/ /spos chab sna tshogs sbyangs te/ bum pa chen po'i nang du blugs la/ gang byad kyis phog pa de'i mgul bar skud
<p>84a.6</p>pa des bcings te bum pa'i chab kyis bkru bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ stong chen mo'i gzhung bzhin du bzlas pa byas nas mtshon cha rnams sna gcig btags la gcig byad phog pa'i ske la gdags so/ /de nas stong chen mo'i rang bzhin bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la sku gsung thugs
<p>84a.7</p>dag par bya'o/ /skud pa yang mtshon gyis bcad de zhugs kyi nad du dor ro zhes bya ba ni/ stong chen mor bsams la/ rig sngags kyi ral grir byin gyis brlabs nas/ byad dang ro langs sngags su bsams la/ bsreg par bya'o/ /stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i mdo 'di
<p>84b</p>
<p>84b.1</p>yang brjod par bgyi'o zhes bya ba de'i dus su phyogs phyogs su dag ma 'dres par gdon par bya'o/ /de nas bden pa bdar la/ mchod par bgyi'o/ /gang dag sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos dang / /zhes bya ba ni sku gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / lhag pa
<p>84b.2</p>mthong nas sems can gyi don byed pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi bden pa ste/ /dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sems can gyi don byed pa/ de bzhin du nyan thos rnams kyis kyang bden pa bzhi'i sgo nas don byed pa'o/ /tshangs dbang dang ni 'jig rten skyong / /gnod sbyin ded dpon dbang phyug dang / /
<p>84b.3</p>zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan dbyug gu gsum dang rdo rje dang / 'jig rten skyong ba so so'i phyag mtshan gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon bzhin te/ dbang phyug chen po'i rtse gsum mo/ /de bzhin gnod sbyin stobs chen dang / /'phrog ma'i bu dang bcas pa dang / /zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi
<p>84b.4</p>so so rang rang gi stobs dang gzi brjid do/ /de dag mthu dang gzi brjid kyis/ /ro langs las rnams chad gyur cig /ces bya ba ni/ byad dang / ro langs dang / sngags dang / sbod gtong dang / dug dang dug sbyor dang / de rnams chad pas bcad par 'gyur ba'o/ /rdo rjes rin chen phug pa
<p>84b.5</p>dang / /me yis bud shing bsreg pa dang / zhes bya ba ni rdo rje pha lam gyis mu men la sogs pa phig ste/ de bzhin du mes kyang thams cad bsreg pa'o/ rlung gis sprin ni 'thor ba dang / /nyi mas nags tshal skems byed pa/ /zhes bya ba ni bar snang gi sprin mthug po yang rlung gis gtor
<p>84b.6</p>nas/ mi snang bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin du nyi mas kyang rgya mtsho skems pa'o/ /bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gis/ /byad stems las rnams tshig par shog /ces bya ba ni de bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' yang bden te/ de rnams kyi gzi brjid dang stobs rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyis/ 
<p>84b.7</p>byad dang ro langs la sogs pa tshig pa'o/ /spos dang me tog sna tshogs kyis/ /sdig pa thams cad nges par bsal/ /zhes bya ba ni spos la sogs pa gsal te/ rig sngags 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/ /sdig pa thams cad sreg par byed pa'o/ /s+yAd ya the dan zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags
<p>85a</p>
<p>85a.1</p>yin te/ rig sngags ni gang zhe na/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis ba/ sku mdog nag mo/ spyan gsum pa dbu skra ser po/ dbu la thod pa lngas brgyan pa/ g.yas na ral gri gdengs pa/ g.yon na lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa zhabs pus btsugs su bzhugs pa/ g.yon
<p>85a.2</p>pa'i zhabs brkyang ba/ nyi ma'i gdan gyi steng na gnod byed gnon pa/ bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa/ rgyan sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ zhal gdangs pa mche ba gtsigs pa/ khro gnyer dang ldan pa/ rdo rje rigs ma dang / stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'o/ /rig sngags ni rig
<p>85a.3</p>sngags kyi zhal nas byung ngo / /brlag par bya'o/ /gsad par bya'o/ /bcom par bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /sngags ni hu me hu me la sogs pa'o/ /de bzhin du byas na the tshom med do/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so/ /lha thams cad kyi gsang sngags 'di dag gis byang
<p>85a.4</p>dang / ro langs dang sman dang sngags dang / dug dang dug sbyar ma rnams gcad do/ /bshig go/ /pham par byas so/ /pha rol pham par byas so zhes bya ba ni/ bden pa'i tshig de dag dang rig sngags kyis bsad/ dmod mos 'tshig par byed pa'o/ /byad dang ro langs la sogs pa'i
<p>85a.5</p>cho ga'i gnas skabs te dgu pa'o// //lnga pa dang / shu ba dang / smyo ba dang / 'bras dang / 'brum bu dang / rkom po dang / dug 'thungs pa la sogs pa las thar bar 'tshal ba zhes bya ba ni/ dang por rang gi phyag gis bgyi'o/ /gnyis pa chus gdab bo/ /gsum pa dUr bas
<p>85a.6</p>bya'o/ /bzhi pa rtswa ku shas bya'o/ /lnga pa rma bya'i sgros sel lo/ /drug pa mtshon gyis brdeg go/ /bdun pa rang gi sos bya'o/ /de bzhin du byas na the tshom med do/ des ma sos na las kyi rnam par smin pa yin te gang gis kyang mi sos so/ /lhog pa yang de bzhin bya'o/ /dug za
<p>85a.7</p>bar 'gyur na chu la btab la 'thung du gzhug go/ /shin tu khrus bgyis pa brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod chags dang / 'gog pa la sogs pa spang bar bgyi'o/ /stan bzang po'i steng du mchis te zhes bya ba ni/ sa bdag gi nad kyis btab pa yin te/ lus bde ba dang / ngag bde
<p>85b</p>
<p>85b.1</p>ba dang / sems bde bar byas la/ bzlas pa rgyun mi 'chad par bya'o/ /rig sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ ngag ma 'dres par rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i mdo gdon par bya'o/ /de nas bden pa brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi
<p>85b.2</p>brjid dang / /rang rgyal ngag gi gzi brjid dang / /zhes bya ba ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi gzi brjid kyis dug bcom ste rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang sku'i don byed pa'o/ /dgra bcom dag gi mthu dag dang / /gsang sngags 'dzin pa thams cad dang / /zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dgra
<p>85b.3</p>bcom pa rnams kyis kyang / nyon mongs pa bcom ste/ gsang sngags 'dzin pa yang gzi brjid dang ldan pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu yi shes rab dang / /maud gal bu yi rdzu 'phrul dang / /zhes bya ba ni nyan thos kyi tshogs su gyur pa la/ shes rab la grags pa dang rdzu 'phrul la grags pa'o/ /
<p>85b.4</p>ma 'gags pa yi mig dang ni/ /'od srungs sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / /zhes bya ba ni nyan thos de gnyis la yang mthong bar grags pa dang / sems can la byams par grags pa'o/ /kau N+Di n+ya'i sngar thos dang / /kun dga' bo yi thos pa dang / /zhes bya ba ni nyan thos su gyur pa de
<p>85b.5</p>gnyis kyang / sangs rgyas kyi bka' thos pa dang / thos pa mang po byas pa'o/ /tshangs pa yi ni byams pa dang / /brgya byin gyi ni dbang rnams dang / /zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams lta zhing / sum cu rtsa gsum la sogs pa dbang du 'dus pa'o/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i yul rnams
<p>85b.6</p>dang / /dbang phyug chen po'i stobs dag dang / /zhes bya ba ni phyogs bcu skyong bar byed pa de'i bdag por gnas pa/ lha dbang phyug chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /ded dpon rnams kyi nus mthu dang / /'phrog ma'i gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul dang / /zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten
<p>85b.7</p>khams su mthu che bar grags pa/ 'phrog ma'i bu dang bcas pa yang / 'jig rten gyi khams skad cig mas rgyu ba'o/ /de dag rnams kyi mthu dang gzis/ /bdag gi dug ni dug med shog /ces bya ba ni/ gang gis dug la sogs pa 'thung ba ni de rnams kyi mthu dang
<p>86a</p>
<p>86a.1</p>gzi brjid kyis dug gis mi tshugs shing / nges par bcom mo/ /dug med dug rnams 'joms byed pa/ /gsang sngags tshig rnams de lags so/ /zhes bya ba ni gsang sngags ni/ ha ri ke shi Ni la sogs pa'o/ /stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i gsang sngags kyi
<p>86a.2</p>tshig gis dug gsum nges par 'joms pa'o/ /gsang sngags tshig rnams de lags so/ /zhes bya ba ni rig sngags ni gang zhe na/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog ljang gu spyan gsum pa/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ cung zad khro mo g.yas na ral gri dang rma bya'i sgro 'dzin pa/ g.yan pa na rdo rje
<p>86a.3</p>dang sbrul 'dzin pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad ni sbrul dang bcas pa/ zhabs phyed skyil du bzhugs pa'o/ /nyi ma'i gdan gyi steng na mtha' yas dang / 'jog po mnan pa'o/ /'od nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa/ rdo rje'i rigs ma stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'o/ /'bras dang rma dang
<p>86a.4</p>shu ba dang / /g.yan pa dang ni 'brum bu dang / /lhog pa dang ni g.ya' ba ni/ /bdun pa lags te rab tu bcom/ /zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten nang gi dug gsum ma spangs pas phyi'i dug gsum pa de dag 'byung ste/ 'dir yang gsang sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'di dag nges
<p>86a.5</p>par bcom mo/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ /zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags kyis ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan no/ /de dag ni dug chen po zhes bya ba'o/ /zhe sdang gis ni mi la phrag dog la sogs pa byas te/ de dag kyang dug
<p>86a.6</p>chen po zhes bya'o/ /gti mug ni ma rig pa yin te/ de dag kyang dug chen po yin no/ /yang na sku'i dug /gsung gi dug /thugs kyi dug dang gsum mo/ /sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'am/ /'jig rten gyi dug gsum mam/ rang gis rang dug btang ba'o/ /yang na ni
<p>86a.7</p>rang gis rang sel du btub ste/ 'jig rten gyi dug gsum ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi sel lo/ /bcom ldan sangs rgyas dug mi mnga'/ /zhes bya ba ni rang gis rang gi dug bcom ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dug bcom pa'o/ /de bas na dug
<p>86b</p>
<p>86b.1</p>mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba'o/ /sangs rgyas gzi brjid dug bcom mo/ /zhes bya ba ni dug ni gsum yin te/ 'gro ba'i dug dang / 'dug pa'i dug dang / byams pa'i dug dang gsum mo/ /'gro ba'i dug la bzhi ste/ tshor ba mthong ba/ reg pa khas blangs pa bzhi'o/ /'dug pa'i
<p>86b.2</p>dug nas las skyes pa ste/ sam ya 'bum sde'o/ /byed pa'i dug ni/ sbyor ba la sogs pa ste/ dper na kham phor gyi nang du mar dang sbrang rtsi mnyam par byas nas zhag bdun bzhag ste/ mchod rten gyi mdun du mchod par bya ba dang / sbyin sreg bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / dus
<p>86b.3</p>khyad par du 'phags pa ni/ rig sngags bklag par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ de dag gi tshul khrims dang ldan par bgyis la/ rig sngags gdon par bgyi'o/ /me tog la sogs pa mchod pa lnga dang ldan par bgyis la/ 'byung po dag la yang gtor ma sbyin no/ /tshes brgyad
<p>86b.4</p>kyi tshe na ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i skyes bu dag ces bya ba ni/ rgyal po'i gzugs su byas nas mchod par bgyi'o/ /rgyal po chen po rnams kyi mdun na de la sems bar zhes bya ba ni/ sngon du bshad pa bzhin du/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i mchod par bya'o/ /ming nas kyang 'don par
<p>86b.5</p>bgyid do zhes bya ba ni yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / spyan mi bzang dang / rnam thos sras dang / mchod pa yang dag par bya'o/ /tshes bcu bzhi'i tshe na rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag nyid mdun na sems par bgyid do zhes bya ba ni/ yang nas yang du mchod pa
<p>86b.6</p>la sogs pa bgyid do/ nad la sogs pa 'tshe ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa'o/ /ming nas kyang 'don par bgyid do/ /tshes bco lnga'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag nyid/ sems par bgyid cing ming nas kyang 'don par bgyid do zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag gang gis
<p>86b.7</p>de bzhin du byas par gyur na/ nad dang sdug bsngal gyis mi tshugs te/ dus dus su rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kyang 'khor bar 'gyur ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos zhes bya ba ni/ sems ma dad pa gang gis kyang / 'di la gus par byas na tshugs par yang mi
<p>87a</p>
<p>87a.1</p>'gyur ro/ /stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di zhes bya ba ni/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi brgyud pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/ phyag rgya bzhi'i rgyas gdab pa'o/ /len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / ston pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa de ni/ 
<p>87a.2</p>srog chags 'byung po thams cad la snying brtse zhing / phan par bgyid pa lags so zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can rnams tshad med pa bzhi'i sgo nas lta ba dang / gzhan yang 'di'i bslabs pas/ byams pa dang snying rjer ldan pas so/ /btsun pa
<p>87a.3</p>bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang de la zhes bya ba ni/ bslab pa'i gzhi bzung zhing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa rgyal po chen po dag la yang gus par byas na/ don 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gos dang zas dang / mal cha dang stan dang na
<p>87a.4</p>ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad rnams kyis/ mi brel bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du byas par 'gyur na/ sems can rnams kyang bde bar 'gyur zhing / nad rnams dang 'bral bar 'gyur ba'o/ /sems can thams cad kyis kyang / bsti stang bgyid bar 'gyur
<p>87a.5</p>zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can rnams kyang gus par byas pa'o/ /rgyal po dang blon po rnams kyis kyang / bla mar bgyi ba dang / rim gror bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyid par 'gyur ba lags so zhes bya ba ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin du de dag gis kyang lus
<p>87a.6</p>ngag yid kyis gus par byas pa'o/ /gzhan mu stegs can dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / spyod pa can dang / kun du rgyu dang / mdza' ba dang / mi mdza' ba dag gi nang du mchis kyang mchod par 'gyur lags so zhes bya ba ni/ mu stegs kyi rigs lta ba mi
<p>87a.7</p>gcig pa sum brgya drug cu yod kyang drug tu bsdus te/ drug po gnyis su bsdus pa'i lta ba rnams kyis kyang 'dir gong du bshad pa bzhin du gus par byas pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa des gtsang mar bgyis te zhes bya ba ni/ yul 'dzam bu'i gling
<p>87b</p>
<p>87b.1</p>gi dbus su mi'i lus su skye ste/ rigs las 'phags pa rgyal po dang bram ze dang rje'u rigs su skye'o/ /lus gtsang ba dang / gos dang rgyan dang mal cha dang / stan dang yo byad khyad par can dang gtsang mar bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ mi dge ba bcu spangs shing phun sum tshogs pa/ dkon
<p>87b.2</p>mchog gsum rjes su dran pa'o/ /yul ngan pa rnyed par mi bgyid yul ngan pa'i mdza' bo dang brten par mi bgyid/ /yul ngan pa na gnas pa la bsngags par mi bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ mtha' 'khob tu ni mi skye zhing / de dag gi mi rnams dang / gnas pa dang phrad par mi 'gyur
<p>87b.3</p>ba'o/ /gang 'byung po'i gdon gyis zin pa'i mdun du stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di dran par gyur na zhes bya ba ni/ rims nad dang / yams nad dang de la sogs pa thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang / smyo 'bog la sogs pa thams cad las thar bar
<p>87b.4</p>'gyur ro/ /de la rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag nyid/ bsrung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ bzhi po de dag kyang stong chen mo la gus par byed pa ni mi nus so/ /'khor de dag gis kyang byed ma nus so/ /skyob pa dang sbed par byed par 'gyur lags so zhes bya ba ni/ gang gis gnod par byed
<p>87b.5</p>par 'gyur na yang mthong bar mi nus so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar na stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i mdo sde 'di mthu che ba zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po med pa dngos po dang bral ba rang bzhin du dag pa/ nam mkha'i ngo bo bzhin du yin te/ brjod pa yang med brjod du yang
<p>87b.6</p>med do/ /gang gis rang gi khyim du mtshan gcig gam/ nyin gcig kyang rung yang dag par bsams na zhes bya ba ni/ 'di'i gzhung bzhin du bsgom pa dang / ting nge 'dzin 'chang ba dang rgya cher 'phel ba'o/ /de la lo gcig bar du mi ma lags pas glags rnyed par mi
<p>87b.7</p>'gyur lags so zhes bya ba ni/ yud tsam du gus par byas na yang / 'di skabs ma phyi gnyis la chad/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams so/ /'jig rten skyong dang zhes bya ba ni/ me lha dang / srin po dang / rlung lha dang / dbang ldan dang / gshin rje dang / gnod
<p>88a</p>
<p>88a.1</p>sbyin dang / sa bdag rnams so/ /dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba ni/ u ma de ba lha yin te/ yab yum gnyis dang ngo / /gnod sbyin ded dpon thams cad dang / /zhes bya ba ni ded dpon nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang / mthu bo che nyi shu rtsa brgyad do/ /de rnams
<p>88a.2</p>kyi ded dpon du gyur pa ni gsum yin te/ nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang / sa la rgyu ba dang / sa 'og la rgyu ba gsum mo/ /nam mkha' la rgyu ba ni tshangs pa'o/ /sa la rgyu ba ni khyab 'jug chen po'o/ /sa 'og la rgyu ba ni dbang phyug chen po'o/ /'phrog ma'i bu dang bcas pa
<p>88a.3</p>yang / /zhes bya ba ni 'phrog ma'i bu ni lnga brgya ste/ yab ni gnod sbyin pa ny+tsi ka'o/ /'phrog ma'i bu dang bcas pa la gnod pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta bu yin te/ nyal nas rdul zhing skrag par bgyid/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sgra yang 'byin/ /tshig pa za zhing rdul bar byed/ /
<p>88a.4</p>rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs bstan pa/ /'khru bar byed cing skyug par byed pa de dag 'phrog ma'i bu'i mtshan nyid do/ /de dag gi cho ga ni bshad par bya'o/ /sngon du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la sogs pa byas nas/ rig sngags ni bklag par bya'o/ /yas stags
<p>88a.5</p>ni shal nya sha bkal nas/ chan dang chang dang khur ba la sogs pa gtor ma la bzhag nas/ chang bu gsum yang mar gyis byugs la ha ri te zhes bya ba'i ming bton la gtang ngo / /de nas byis pa khye'u mang po bos la/ 'bru chan nam sran ma'i chan btsos la/ byis pa
<p>88a.6</p>la ston mo bya'o/ /de ltar byas na the tshom med do/ /thal mo dag ni rab sbyar nas/ /zhes bya ba ni de dag rnams kyis thal mo sbyar nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mdun du'o/ /sgra skad gcig tu 'di skad gsol/ /zhes bya ba ni de dag rnams kyis skad gcig tu byas nas/ bcom
<p>88a.7</p>ldan 'das la zhu ba phul ba'o/ /nyi ma stong ltar gsal ba'i 'od/ /ces bya ba ni stong chen po rab tu 'joms ma'i gzi brjid dang / mthu dang stobs de bzhin du yin no/ /zla ba nya ltar 'od gsal ba/ /zhes bya ba ni zla ba nya ba bzhin du 'od gsal ba de bzhin du/ 
<p>88b</p>
<p>88b.1</p>stong chen mo rab tu 'joms mas kyang / sems can thams cad la 'od gsal ba'o/ /lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ /zhes bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bgegs rnams rjes gcod pa la drag po ste/ yang na stong gsum gyi stong gi 'jig rten gyi
<p>88b.2</p>khams kyi sems can thams cad skyob pa la drag pa'o/ /khyod dang 'dra ba yang ma mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni sngon du yang ma byung ste/ phyi nas kyang 'ong ba ma yin no/ /legs sam legs par sbyar na ni/ /zhes bya ba ni 'di la dad pas 'dzin pa rnams la bkra shis pa'i rgyu yin
<p>88b.3</p>no/ /gnod sbyin srin po rnams 'joms pa/ /zhes bya ba ni sems can la gnod pa thams cad 'joms pa'o/ /rgyal srid thar bgyid ces bgyi ba/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de la gus par byed pa thams cad la kho'i rgyal srid las thar ba'o/ /rig sngags rgyal srid rab sbyor ba/ /zhes
<p>88b.4</p>bya ba ni de dag ni rtse mo ste/ bsrung ba gang gis kyang khyad par du 'phags pa'o/ /de gang zhe na/ 'khor bar gnas med mya ngan 'das med do/ /gnyis ka med cing sdug bsngal 'joms byed pa/ /rig sngags rgyal mo drag ma yin/ /stong chen gyi ni 'jig rten na/ /srung ba'i
<p>88b.5</p>mdo sde dam pa lags/ /zhes bya ba ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyis yang dag par gsungs pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams khyab pa/ 'di srung ba dang skyob pa byed pa la'o/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/ /zhes
<p>88b.6</p>bya ba ni skyes bu rnams kyi dam pa stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ chos spyod pa la 'dud pa'o/ /thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal nas/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de nyid du ni mi snang gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni de nyid ni de kho na
<p>88b.7</p>nyid do/ /myong 'gyur snang ni ming gi gtso bo ste/ de dag kyang mi'i nang nas byung ba'o/ /yon tan gyi gnas skabs te bco lnga ba'o// //de nas zhes bya ba ni/ phan yon bshad pa'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das nub ka'i dus kyi tshe zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi
<p>89a</p>
<p>89a.1</p>'khor dge slong la sogs pa la bka' stsal pa'o/ /nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'dul ba la sogs pa bka' yin te/ gsang ba la gnas bka' stsal ba'o/ /dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong lnga bcu
<p>89a.2</p>la sogs pa'o/ /dge slong dag stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i mdo sde longs shig ces bya ba ni/ dad pa skyed la gus par gyis shig ces bya'o/ /chongs shig /lhogs shig /ston cig /kun chub par gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gus par gzhan rnams kyis kyang rgya cher 'phel
<p>89a.3</p>ba'o/ /de lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la/ yun ring po'i don la phan pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ 'di la de bzhin du byas par gyur na/ 'jig rten 'di dang phyi ma la yang bde bar gnas pa'o/ /dge slong dag nga'i dge slong gang la la
<p>89a.4</p>zhig gis stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma zhes bya ba ni/ 'di dang gzhan yang mtshungs pa med de/ 'di la gang gis kyang gus par 'dzin pa'o/ /mdo sde 'dis shing skam po la skud pas bcings na zhes bya ba ni/ 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang rjes su yi rang ba la sogs
<p>89a.5</p>pas dad pa skyes nas de bzhin du tshe thung ba rnams la tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /bkra mi shis pa ni shis par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba mi thob pa rnams rgyal bar 'gyur ba dang / bu med pa bu rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gang gi sgo nas kyang 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/ /de las lo ma dang
<p>89a.6</p>me tog dang 'bras bu rnams skye bar 'gyur na/ rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lta ci smos te zhes bya ba ni/ gzhi bems po yang de bzhin du snang ste/ byang chub sems dang ldan pa mi la sogs pa'i sems can yang / tshe thung ba rnams tshe ring bar byed pa/ longs spyod
<p>89a.7</p>med pa rnams longs spyod dang ldan pa 'gro ba rigs drug gi sdug bsngal yang 'joms par byed pa'o/ /sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so zhes bya ba ni/ da ltar byas pa da ltar 'byang ba'o/ /dge dang mi dge ba de bzhin de yin te/ dper na zhag tu lon
<p>89b</p>
<p>89b.1</p>pa'i 'o ma bskol du mi btub pa de bzhin du/ dge ba dang mi dge ba yang de bzhin yin no/ /des na sngon gyi las ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la dge slong de dag
<p>89b.2</p>gis/ 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong rnams kyis zhu ba phul ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde chen po lnga gsungs pa ni/ 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnams te/ 
<p>89b.3</p>de bzhin du ye shes rnam pa lnga'i sgo nas kyang yod de/ skye mched drug dang khams lnga'i sgo nas yang yin no/ /stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma dang / rma bya chen mo dang / so sor 'brang ma dang / bsil ba'i tshal dang / gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'o zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje
<p>89b.4</p>dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs su zhugs so/ /yang na 'dul ba'i dbang du byas na phal chen pa dang / thams cad smra ba dang / gnas brtan pa dang / mang pos bkur ba dang / gcig ni rigs la mi gtogs
<p>89b.5</p>te/ yang na rigs thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid yin no/ /yang bstan pa'o/ /bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / gdol ba'i rigs so/ /de dag kyang kri ya'i dbang du 'gyur na/ bram ze'i rigs zhes bya'o/ /de dag ni
<p>89b.6</p>sems can gyi don la byas te/ grong khyer yangs pa can du gsungs pa dang / rgyal po rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab nas gsungs pa dang / dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du gsungs pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i yul du
<p>89b.7</p>gsungs pa dang bya rgod phung po'i ri la gsungs pa dang de dag ni mdo chen mo lnga yin no/ /zas sna lnga ni zhes bya ba ni sha dang 'dres pa'i zas yin te de yang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag zas rnam pa lnga
<p>90a</p>
<p>90a.1</p>yongs su spongs la chongs shig ces kyang bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ zas rnam pa lnga ni dug dang 'dres pa'i zas yin te/ de yang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las byung de dang mi ldan pa ni zas nyung ba'o/ /zas bsod snyoms la brten te rab tu byung shig
<p>90a.2</p>ces gsungs na zhes bya ba ni/ re re mi 'gro zhing rab tu byung ba zla ba dang 'grogs shing gnas pa bsod snyoms kyi zas kyang chags pa med par gsum du bgo ste/ rang za ba dang yi dgas dang gzhan la dbul ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das zas rnam lnga dang ma 'dres pa'i bsod
<p>90a.3</p>snyoms ni nyung / 'di ltar zas rnam lnga dang 'dres pa de ni mang lags na zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la zas kyi don du zhus pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de la bdag cag gis ji ltar nan tan du bgyi zhes bya ba ni/ gal te zas rnam pa
<p>90a.4</p>lnga lhung bzed du lhung bar gyur na/ thabs ci bdog ces pa'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ zas rnam pa lnga'i don la dge slong rnams la phan pa'i phyir gsungs pa'o/ /'di skad ces
<p>90a.5</p>bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba phul ba la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /dge slong dag de nyid kyi phyir/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i mdo sde 'chang ba des zhes bya ba ni/ sdig pa dag kyang mi
<p>90a.6</p>chugs te/ zas sna lnga dag kyang med do/ /rma med pa'i nor bu zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag pa'i don yin te/ yang dag pa'i don ni gang zhe na/ gnyis su yang med gnyis su brtags pa yang med do/ /so sor brtags pa yang med do/ /gzungs zhes bya ba bdag nyid
<p>90a.7</p>srung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma 'di yang / dge slong rnams la yang dag par gsungs te/ de yang zas rnam lnga srung bar byed pa'o/ /chongs shig /des bsod snyoms len pa'i tshe/ zas la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ 
<p>90b</p>
<p>90b.1</p>zhes bya ba ni/ 'di la rnam par rtog pa med par/ rig sngags 'dis sel ba'o/ /zas rnam lnga dang 'dres pa'i bsod snyoms la yang zas rnam lnga ma 'dres so snyam pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ gal te rgyus med pa'i sems can rnams kyis dad pas bsod
<p>90b.2</p>snyoms la byon par gyur na/ de'i don la mi dmigs par bsam pa'o/ /'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'dus byas ni byas pa'i chos yin te/ de yang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bur snang ba'o/ /mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes
<p>90b.3</p>dang zhes bya ba ni/ rmi lam lta bu skyu ma lta bu de yang / lus kyi sdug bsngal du shes par bya'o/ /sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba 'di sgyu ma lta bu yang dmigs pa stong pa nyid du snang ba'o/ /zas rnam
<p>90b.4</p>lnga po ga la yod/ /zas rnam lnga ba su yi yin/ /zhes bya ba ni zas kyi gnas kyang med cing bdag 'dzin pa yang med pa'o/ /su zhig zas rnam lnga po za/ /zhes bya ba ni 'dzin mkhan med cing gzung bya yang ma grub pa'o/ /de bas na zas kyi ming yang med do/ /
<p>90b.5</p>brjod du med pa'o/ /sems can yang med do/ /sems can ga la yod/ sems can dmigs su med do zhes bya ba ni/ dge ba yang ma grub cing / mi dge ba grub pa yang med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i ye shes su
<p>90b.6</p>snang ba'o/ /des zas rnam lnga dang 'dres na/ tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga la bdag bsrung ba bya ste zhes bya ba ni/ gal te rnam par rtog pa skye bar gyur na/ rig sngags 'di'i thabs kyis srung bar byed pa'o/ /rgyal rigs kyi bu mo zhes bya ba
<p>90b.7</p>ni sngon du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa/ gtsang sbra la brten la kha shar phyogs su bltas la 'khal du gzhug pa'o/ /legs par srung ba shin tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni/ lo brgyad lon pa/ gzhan rnams dang ma 'grogs pa shin tu gtsang sbra la
<p>91a</p>
<p>91a.1</p>brten pa'o/ /nyin zhag gcig zas bcad pa/ bslab pa'i gzhi bzung ba zhes bya ba ni/ smyung bar byas shing za ma srung ba'o/ /skud pa dmar po bzhi sgril du 'khal du bcug la zhes bya ba ni/ ras dang shing bal gyi skud pa kha dog
<p>91a.2</p>bsgyur ba la bu mo des 'khal ba'o/ /gsang sngags 'dzin pa rig sngags dran par bya ste/ skud pa de la mdud la zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag gis gzhung bzhin du mchod pa la sogs pa bya ste/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang / bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom par bya'o/ /skud pa
<p>91a.3</p>de mtshon gsar pas gcad de zhes bya ba ni/ mtshon gzhan ma bcad pa'i mtshon gyis dum bu bdun du byed pa'o/ /rin po che'i snod dam lcags kyi snod kyang rung ba chus bkang ste zhes bya ba ni/ gser ram dngul la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i snod du tsan+dan la sogs pa'i dri
<p>91a.4</p>zhim po'i chus bkang ba'o/ /me tog dag gis khyab par khrom la zhes bya ba ni/ snod gyi nang du me tog sna tshogs kyis mchod par bya'o/ /bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdugs te zhes bya ba ni/ a ka ru la sogs pas bdug par bya'o/ /yang na sngon du bshad pa'i cho ga
<p>91a.5</p>bzhin du rig sngags yang dag par mchod la/ cho ga bzhin du bklag par bgyi'o/ /snod kyi nang nas skud pa de slar 'byor te ma byung gi bar du rig sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan dang dag ma 'dres par gsang sngags 'don par bya'o/ /de yang lag pa la
<p>91a.6</p>bcings la zhes bya ba ni/ skud pa nam 'byor ba dang / bsod snyoms pa'i dge slong rnams srung ba'o/ /tshig 'di skad du brjod do zhes bya ba ni/ bden pa bdar ba'o/ /bram ze rnams kyis bslus nas su/ /shAkya seng ges skyob pa la/ /zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa
<p>91a.7</p>phrag dog gi dug can/ mu stegs kyi rigs can gyis bslus pa'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa shAkya seng ge yang thams cad skyob pa'o/ /dpal sbas kyis ni dug can gyi/ /bsod snyoms dag ni phul ba dang / /zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi dus su ma ga d+hA'i bdag po dpal
<p>91b</p>
<p>91b.1</p>sbas kyis phul ba'o/ /de las de ni blangs nas su/ /ston pas dug ni bsal nas gsol/ /zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi dus su yang dug dang 'dres pa'i zas de yang / rnam par rtog pa med par rig sngags kyi yon tan gyis sel ba'o/ /bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yis su/ /
<p>91b.2</p>zas ni bdud rtsir gyur par shog /ces bya ba ni bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bden pa dang / rig sngags kyi nus mthus/ zas la dug med par snang ba'o/ /rnam par gzigs la lha gang dang / /gtsug tor can kun skyob pa dang / /zhes bya ba ni sems
<p>91b.3</p>can la byams pa dang snying rjes lta zhing / sangs rgyas gtsug tor can gyis kyang 'gro ba rigs drug la skyob pa'o/ /log par dad pa sel ba dang / /stobs chen lha gang dad pa dang / /zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas log dad sel gyis kyang stobs dang ldan zhing bdud rnams btul
<p>91b.4</p>ba'o/ /gser dang dpal ldan 'od srungs dang / /shAkya yi ni seng ge la/ /zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas de rnams kyang dpal dang ldan te/ dmigs pa med pa'i ye shes snang ba'o/ /rab dad lha yi dbang po dang / /tshangs dbang sum cu'i dbang phyug dang / /zhes bya
<p>91b.5</p>ba ni gzugs khams dang 'dod khams la dbang byed pa/ gzi brjid dang stobs kyis so/ /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang / /nor bu bzang dang dbang phyug che/ /zhes bya ba ni phyogs bzhi skyong zhing phyogs la dbang byed pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon thams cad
<p>91b.6</p>la dbang byed pa'o/ /srin mo nag mo chen mo dang / /de bzhin gdol ba gtum mo dang / /zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan ba bsrung zhing bzang la dga' ba rnams so/ /me tog dang ni bdug pa dang / /bdag gi sbyin sreg 'di bzhes shig /ces bya ba ni 'dir
<p>91b.7</p>yang gang zag gis sbyin ba'i mchod pa de rnams bzhes par zhu'o/ /de dag tshim zhing mchod gyur nas/ /bdag gi kha zas byang bar mdzod/ /ces bya ba ni de rnams kyi zhal du gsol te/ bdag gi bsod snyoms yang zas lnga dang ma 'dres pa'o/ /zas lnga dag dang 'dres
<p>92a</p>
<p>92a.1</p>pa yang / /bdag la ma 'dres mdzad du gsol/ /zhes bya ba ni de dag gi nus pas zas lnga dang ma 'dres pa'o/ /kha zas lnga dang 'dres pa yang / /zas de kun ni bza' bar bgyi/ /zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin zas dkar po la brten pa'o/ /sa bon dag
<p>92a.2</p>ni mchog kun la/ /sa yi bcud ni zhugs pa yi/ /zhes bya ba ni sa nas skyes pa'i sdig pa'i zas su ma gyur pa'o/ /kha zas 'dres pa thams cad kyang / /bdag la ma 'dres mdzad du gsol/ /zhes bya ba ni dug dang zas rnam lnga dang 'dres par gyur kyang / rig sngags kyi nus mthus
<p>92a.3</p>ma 'dres pa'o/ /ji ltar skud pa bcad bsregs pa/ de lta bu yang slar 'byor ba/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bden pa des kyang zas rnam lnga dang 'dres par mi 'gyur ba'o/ /de ltar zas rnams 'dres pa yang / /zhes bya ba ni/ bde gshegs kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi bden
<p>92a.4</p>pas/ zas 'dres pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ba'o/ /ma 'dres par ni bdag la mdzod/ /ces bya ba ni rig sngags kyi bden pa yin te rig sngags sku gzugs ni gang zhe na/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar mo/ /spyan gsum pa dbu la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas can/ 
<p>92a.5</p>g.yas na rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa/ g.yon na rdo rje dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /zhabs phyed skyil du bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i gang na nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa/ rdo rje'i rigs ma stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'o/ /gsang sngags
<p>92a.6</p>ni gang zhe na/ s+yAd ya the dan/ 'di lta ste/ gsang sngags ni kha kha me/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /kha zas lnga dang 'dres pa yang / /ji ltar ma 'dres zas bzhin du/ /gang gis ji ltar skud bsregs pa/ /zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang rig sngags kyi nus mthus skud pa de yang
<p>92a.7</p>'byor ba/ zas rnam pa lnga yang rnam par rtog pa med pa'o/ /de 'dra'i bden pa mdzad du gsol/ /zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i snying po ste/ yang rig sngags gdon par bya'o/ /s+yAd yA the dan/ 'di lta ste gsang sngags ni ka la le la sogs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang
<p>92b</p>
<p>92b.1</p>gtsug tor can/ /bde gshegs kun skyob sangs rgyas log par dad sel dang / /zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bzhi po de dag kyang / sems can gyi don byas nas thugs rje'i spyan gyis gzigs pa'o/ /gser thub 'od srungs shAkya thub pa gau ta ma/ /bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba la
<p>92b.2</p>skyabs su mchi bar bgyi/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas gsum po de dag gis kyang / sems can rnams kyi don byas nas thugs rje'i spyan gyis gzigs pa'o/ /yon tan dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas gang zag gi skyabs su 'gro ba'o/ /mi mchog bdun po de rnams
<p>92b.3</p>kyi ni sku rnams la/ /me tog dag dang spos rnams kyis ni mchod par bgyi/ /zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin mi'i tshogs sogs pa'i dam pa de rnams yang mi'i tshogs rdzogs pas sangs rgyas pa/ de'i yon tan dang ldan pa mi'i mchog bdun po de 'dud pa'o/ /lus
<p>92b.4</p>dang yid dang rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni/ /de dag rnams la skyabs su nye bar mchi bar bgyi/ /zhes bya ba ni gang zag rab tu gus par byed pa'i sems kyis/ sangs rgyas de rnams la bskyab cing gus par byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul che dang ldan pa de dag la/ /
<p>92b.5</p>lha gang mngon par dang ba rab tu yod pa yi/ /zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan zhing thams cad mkhyen pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o/ /lha nge mgu zhing yid ni rab tu dga' gyur ne/ /zhes bya ba ni bka' de rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis thams cad dga' zhing bde bar gyur
<p>92b.6</p>pa'o/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis bdag la srung du gsol/ /zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang sems kyis kyang / sems can thams cad bsrung ba ste/ /dam pa'i chos 'di gus par byas na ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir mi
<p>92b.7</p>ldog pa dang / 'jig rten na yang dag par song pa dang / yang dag par zhugs pa dang 'jig rten na dgra bcom ba'i 'bras bu thob pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams dang / sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i zhing khams thob pa ste/ de bzhin du nyan thos dang / 
<p>93a</p>
<p>93a.1</p>rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu yang yin no/ /lha tshe ring po'i yul du mi skye ba dang / mtha' 'khob dang rigs ngan gyi yul du mi skye ba dang chom rkun dang rkun ma dang ngan song gsum nas thar pa dang de dag kyang rig sngags la dad pa skyes pa yin no/ /de'i tshe na lha dang mi'i yul
<p>93a.2</p>dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus na bram ze 'am rgyal rigs sam/ gang gi rigs bzang ba la skye bar 'gyur ro/ /nam skyes pa'i dus su yang chos 'di dang 'grogs par 'gyur ro/ /da lta'i tshe na yang 'jigs pa las skyob pa dang / sba ba dang srung ba dang mtshams gcod pa la
<p>93a.3</p>sogs par yang 'gyur ro/ /gza' dang rgyu skar dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang ltas ngan pa dang / byad dang ro langs dang dug dang dug sbyor ba dang / sbod gtong dang sngags dang 'byung po rnams kyang 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bsod snyoms kyi cho ga'i gnas skabs te bcu drug pa'o// //
<p>93a.4</p>bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma 'di/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo la gtad pa'o/ /dge slong de dag yi rangs te zhes bya ba ni/ dgra bcom pa'i nyan thos lnga brgya dang / byang
<p>93a.5</p>chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / /tshangs chen gyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po brgya byin dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / rgyal chen rigs
<p>93a.6</p>bzhi'i lha rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang / gnod sbyin ded dpon nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang / gnod sbyin mthu bo che nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa lnga brgya dang / mi'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang mi rnams la sogs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
<p>93a.7</p>gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi mdun du gsungs so/ /stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i 'bum 'grel dag pa lnga pa/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i 'grel pa/ las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
<p>93b</p>
<p>93b.1\] ]/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA ma yu ri bid+yA rA dz+nyI sU tra ta TI kA nA ma/ bod skad du/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i mdo'i 'bum 'grel zhes bya ba/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa'i sku ni bde chen po/ /rtag tu gzhan gyi don
<p>93b.2</p>mdzad pa/ /dpal ldan ye shes rang bzhin can/ /thub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi shes mun pa bsal ba'i phyir/ /nga yis yang dag don bsam la/ /rig sngags 'bum 'grel bshad par bya/ /'di skad ces bya ba ni chos sku ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
<p>93b.3</p>rgyas kyi bka'o/ /bka' de ni phyin ci ma log pa ste/ de yang sku gsum gyi rang bzhin no/ /chos sku ni stong pa nyid de/ mi dmigs pa'i ye shes so/ /de ni chos sku'o/ /de'i rang bzhin gyi grib mas me long lta bu'i ye shes te/ sgyu ma lta bu'i sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o/ /
<p>93b.4</p>de'i rang bzhin gyis stong gsum khyab pa ste/ sprul pa'i skus sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /de yang shAkya seng ge'o/ /'di ltar ni shAkya seng ge'i bka' ste/ de bas 'di skad ces bya'o/ /bdag gis zhes bya ba ni/ kun rdzob kyi rang bzhin te/ kun rdzob kyi chos de ni yang
<p>93b.5</p>dag par log pa'o/ /log pa ni sgyu ma dang / chu shing dang / chu zla dang / smig rgyu dang / chu'i chu bur dang / chu'i dbu ba dang / rmi lam dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / de brgyad ni log pa'i kun rdzob kyi sgyu ma'o/ /yang dag pa'i kun rdzob ni don byed nus pa ste/ 'byung
<p>93b.6</p>ba bzhi'i rang bzhin la sogs pa'o/ /de'i rang bzhin ngo bo ni kun dga'o/ /thos pa zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di thos pa'o/ /de yang mi dmigs pa'i ye shes rang bzhin med pa'o/ /yang na sems can gyi don mdzad cing ye shes lnga shar bar
<p>93b.7</p>byed pa'o/ /de lta bu'i ye shes ni sus thos she na/ kun dga' bos thos pa'o/ /dus gcig na zhes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / lha dang mi la sogs pa tshogs pa'i dus so/ /bcom ldan
<p>94a</p>
<p>94a.1</p>'das zhes bya ba ni/ bzhi bcom drug ldan 'khor ba mya ngan 'das/ bzhi ni dang po 'chi bdag gi bdud bcom ste/ de zhe sdang bcom ba'o/ /gnyis pa phung po'i bdud bcom ste/ 'dod chags bcom pa'o/ /gsum pa nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcom
<p>94a.2</p>ste/ gti mug bcom pa'o/ /bzhi pa lha'i bu'i bdud bcom ste/ phrag dog dang ser sna bcom pa'o/ /ldan pa zhes bya ba 'di ni dpal dang mtshan nyid dang / gnas dang 'khor dang gdan dang yon tan dang drug go/ /yang na pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'o/ /
<p>94a.3</p>'das pa ni mya ngan las 'das te/ nyon mongs pa lnga las 'das pa'o/ /mnyan yod na zhes bya ba ni yul ma ga d+hA yin te/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gnas so/ /yang dag pa'i gnas ma nor ba'o/ /mnyan yod kyi grong khyer gyi tshad ni dpag
<p>94a.4</p>tshad lnga dang ldan pa ste/ skyes bu mang po bde bar gnas pa/ shAkya thub pa'i chos 'dzin pa dus dus su char 'bab pa'o/ /de'i kho ra khor yug na skyed mos tshal dang rdzing bu dang / shing ljon pa rigs mi gcig pa mang po yod de/ rdzing bu dang skyed mos tshal de la yang 'dod
<p>94a.5</p>pa'i yon tan lnga la spyod cing bde bar gnas pa'o/ /rdzing bu de'i gzhi ni rin po che sna bdun las grub pa ste/ gser dang dngul dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / ma ra ka ta dang / puSh+pa rA ga dang bdun no/ /rdzing bu de'i chu de yang dri zhim zhing tsan+dan gyi chu dang 'dra ste/ 
<p>94a.6</p>blta na sdug pa/ dang la yang rnyog pa med pa'o/ /chu de las skyes pa ni/ puN+Da rI ka dang / ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pal dmar po dang / ku mu ta la sogs pa me tog sna tshogs yod de/ kha dog dkar po dkar pos mdangs phye ba/ kha dog mthing kha mthing khas mdangs phye ba/ 
<p>94a.7</p>kha dog dmar po dmar pos mdangs phye ba/ kha dog ser po ser pos mdangs phye ba/ kha dog ljang gu/ ljang gus mdangs phye ba/ chu de'i nang na bya sna tshogs yod de/ ngang ser dang / ngang skya dang / krung krung dang / so bya rog po la sogs pas skad sna tshogs 'byin cing snyan
<p>94b</p>
<p>94b.1</p>pa'o/ /skyed mos tshal de la yang me tog sna tshogs yod de/ me tog kun+da dang / dzA ti dang / ka ko la'i me tog dang / tsam pa ka'i me tog dang / me tog dmar po dang / ser po la sogs pa thang las skyes pa'o/ /yul de'i kho ra khor yug na/ shing sna tshogs yod de/ 
<p>94b.2</p>tsam pa ka'i shing dang / klu'i shing dang / tsan+dan dkar po'i shing dang / tsan+dan dmar po'i shing dang / shing sA la dang / shug pa dang / rgya shug dang / kha rdzu ra la sogs pa'i shing sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o/ /shing de'i grib mas sems can thams cad bde bar
<p>94b.3</p>gnas pa'o/ /rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na zhes bya ba ni/ mnyan yod kyi rgyal po'i rgyal bu ste/ de'i skyed mos tshal ni me tog sna tshogs yod pa/ blta na sdug pa shin tu mtshar ba'o/ /dpag tshad gnyis yod pa/ shing sna
<p>94b.4</p>tshogs kyis mdzes pa'o/ /yul de'i sems can rnams 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spyod cing tshal de la rtse ba'o/ /de bzhin du rgyal bu yang yin no/ /tshong dpon mgon med kyis bzhengs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sbyin par 'dod pa/ bkra shis pa'i sa btsal te/ 
<p>94b.5</p>gzhan nas ma rnyed pas de yang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi skyed mos tshal na bzang ngo sems so/ /de nas tshong dpon mgon med kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ ngas ni dge ba byas pa'i sa ni khyod kyi tshal bkra shis pa ngas nyo yi zhes pa'o/ /rgyal bus smras pa/ nga'i tshal 'di ni khyod
<p>94b.6</p>kyis nyo nus sam/ gser gyi pha gus brtsegs nas de khengs pa'i gser 'dod de khyod kyis 'jal bar nus sam/ de'i thog tu yang nga'i ming 'jug nus sam zhes smras pa'o/ /de nas tshong dpon gyis gser gyi phung po byas nas gzhal te/ rgyal po gser gyi phung po ma 'dod de/ 
<p>94b.7</p>gser brdungs nas pa gu byas pa'o/ /de nas tshong dpon gyis sa gzhi der gser gyi pha gus brtsegs te rgyal bu la gzhal ba'o/ /de'i steng las gzhi de ru rin po che sna bdun gyis kun dga' ra ba byas te/ sgo bzhi sum thog tu byas pa/ phyogs phyogs su ka bas rnam
<p>95a</p>
<p>95a.1</p>par mdzes pa/ ka ba de yang rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa/ gdung dang phyam yang gser dang dngul las byas pas sum thog kyang de bzhin no/ /glo skar phyi nang yang rin po che sna bdun las byas shing mu tig gi dra bas brgyan pa ste/ phyogs gzhan yang de
<p>95a.2</p>bzhin no/ /phyogs re re la yang dpag tshad re re yod cing / phyi nang gnyis ka yang rin po sna bdun las byas pa'i ri mos mdzes shing blta na sdug pa'o/ /kun dga' ra ba de la yang phyogs bzhi na sgo re re yod de/ da yang rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa'o/ /sgo re re la yang seng ge
<p>95a.3</p>gnyis gnyis yod de/ seng ge de rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'o/ /de bzhin du ka ba gnyis gnyis kyis mdzes shing / chu srin twa ra Na dang / bya khyung ga ru Da dang / ri dgas sha ra Na dang / shang shang sa ra na la sogs pas mdzes shing rta babs bzhis phyogs
<p>95a.4</p>bzhi nas mdzes pa'o/ /rta babs de yang rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'o/ /kun dga' ra ba de'i thog na/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs sna tshogs kyis phyogs bzhi nas brgyan pa'o/ /mu tig dang / rin po che dang / dril bu g.yer kha dang / dril bu yang gser
<p>95a.5</p>dang / dngul las grub pa ste/ de rlung gis btab pas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i sgra'i rol mo mkhan mkhas pas rol mo'i sgra skad sna tshogs 'byin pa bzhin no/ /kun dga' ra ba'i ra ba rin po che bai DUr+ya las byas pa ste/ mtshams bzhi byi ru las byas pa'o/ /de'i phyi
<p>95a.6</p>nang yang de bzhin no/ /kun dga' ra ba de'i phyi logs na skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de/ de bzhin du rdzing bu dang bcas pa'o/ /skyed mos tshal dang rdzing bu la yang me tog chu skyes thang skyes sna tshogs yod de/ dri zhim zhing blta na sdug pa/ dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar
<p>95a.7</p>po dang / ljang gu dang / sngon po la sogs pas mdzes pa'o/ /de bzhin du bya rnams kyang skad sna tshogs 'byin pas mdzes shing / shing ljon pa sna tshogs pa yang de bzhin no/ /tshong dpon mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba'i nges tshig ni/ rus las btags pa'o/ /yang na
<p>95b</p>
<p>95b.1</p>dge ba'i rtsa ba thogs pa med par sbyin pas na zas sbyin zhes bya'o/ /rgyal bu'i tshal las grub pas rgyal byed tshal zhes bya'o/ /tshong dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das la phul bas mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya'o/ /de bas na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
<p>95b.2</p>dga' ra ba na zhes pa'o/ /bzhugs te zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dgra bcom pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang mi la sogs pa dang / thabs cig tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
<p>95b.3</p>phrag bye ba brgyad cu rtsa bzhi thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / mthu chen po thob pa/ rdo rje chen po rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas kyi
<p>95b.4</p>zhing rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po kun du ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i chos bstan pa/ sna tshogs mnyam pa nyid mnyam zhing rgya che la zab pa dang / spobs pa dang / cho
<p>95b.5</p>'phrul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa rgya chen po'i sprin gyis mchod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang dang mngon par shes pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam
<p>95b.6</p>dang / sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / byams pa'i stobs dang / bden pa dang / yongs su byang ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha stag 'di lta ste/ 
<p>95b.7</p>byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / kun du bzang po dang / nyi ma grags pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / rdo rje grags pa dang / 
<p>96a</p>
<p>96a.1</p>'jam dpal grags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /nyan thos chen po nyis brgya lnga bcu thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ 
<p>96a.2</p>srid par kun du sbyor ba chad pa/ yang dag pa'i ye shes sems shin tu rnam par grol ba rdzu 'phrul stobs dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu chen po thob pas/ lta ba chags pa med pa thams cad kyang dri ma dang bral ba/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag
<p>96a.3</p>chags kyi sa bon bsregs pa sha stag 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa
<p>96a.4</p>dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang / de dag la sogs pa nyan thos rab tu mang po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha
<p>96a.5</p>ma yin dang dri za la sogs pa mang po 'dus pa'o/ /rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba'i dbus su/ rin po che rdo rje pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ seng ge'i khri gang zhe na/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
<p>96a.6</p>'das gang du gshegs pa'i sar 'byung ba'o/ /rin po che dang / rdo rje pad+ma'i khris kun dga' ra ba mdzes pa dang / rin po che dang / mu tig dang / dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba du ma sil sgra 'byung / rdo rje dang rin po che du ma'i stegs bu la rtsa ba legs par brten pa/ rdo rje rin
<p>96a.7</p>po che du ma chu srin gyi kha nas byung ba'i mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba dang / 'dam pa'i gnam rten bcug pa/ rin po che du ma'i snying po can/ chags pa'i rin po che ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / in+d+ra nI la chen po dang / mdun nas 'od zer chen po bar
<p>96b</p>
<p>96b.1</p>snang la khyab pas kun nas mdzes pa dang / rin po che rdo rje thur mas brgyan pa'i gdugs yu bas bstod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i grib mas bsgribs shing bskyabs pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing du mas brgyan pas mdzes pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i pad+ma'i khri la kun dga'
<p>96b.2</p>ra ba'i dbus na bzhugs te/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs ni rnam par brgyan/ zla ba nya ba ltar 'jig rten thams cad la ni sdug par snang / dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shin tu rgyas shing chos ston te/ 
<p>96b.3</p>tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ /tshig 'bru bzang po/ /ma 'dres pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /spyi gtsug ni sems can thams cad kyis blta bar
<p>96b.4</p>mi mthong / bdud kyi las thams cad las ni des par rgyal/ de kho na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thugs su chud/ ye shes kyi spyan lnga ni mnga'/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mchog dang ni ldan/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni
<p>96b.5</p>ldan/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad ni bcom/ grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa ni 'phags/ khyu mchog dang seng ge sgra ni sgrogs/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun nas bsal/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med dpag tu
<p>96b.6</p>med par sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dka' ba spyod pas mngon par grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
<p>96b.7</p>gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku brgyan pas mdzes shing rin po che rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gnas dang 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas skabs te dang po'o// //de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>97a</p>
<p>97a.1</p>bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos la sogs pa'i 'khor bzhi tshogs pa'i tshe na'o/ /mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na zhes bya ba ni/ 'dzam bu'i dbus kyi grong khyer chen po mnyan yod na/ 
<p>97a.2</p>rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ni sngon 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi bzhugs gnas yin te/ de yang mar me mdzad dang / sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dad sel dang / 
<p>97a.3</p>gser thub dang 'od srungs dang bdun la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs gnas so/ /de bzhin du nyan thos dgra bcom pa rnams dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams gnas pa'o/ /ma
<p>97a.4</p>'ongs pa'i byams pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /da ltar yang shAkya seng ge bzhugs shing sems can gyi don mdzad cing chos ston pa'o/ /lha dang lha ma yin dang mi dang mi ma yin pas mchod par 'os pa'i gnas byang chub kyi zhing khams bla na med pa
<p>97a.5</p>yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang byang chub 'grub pa'i gnas so/ /dge slong sa ri zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na gnas shing gsar du rab tu byung ba'o/ /gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab pa/ rab tu byung
<p>97a.6</p>nas ring bo ma lon pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'dul ba'i chos ma mnyan pas/ btsun pa'i spyod lam mi shes pas dge slong gi spyod lam mi byed cing rtse ba la dga' ba'o/ /bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pa zhes bya ba ni rab tu byung nas zhag bdun lon te/ bsnyen par rdzogs par ma
<p>97a.7</p>shes pas gzhan dang spyod lam ma mthun pa'o/ /chos 'dul ba 'dir 'ongs nas ring por ma lon pa zhig gnas pa de zhes bya ba ni/ rab tu byung nas zhag bdun lon te/ lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa dang / lus ngag yid gsum 'dul ba'i bya ba mi shes pas zag pa zad pa'i dge
<p>97b</p>
<p>97b.1</p>'dun gyi gnas su byon nas/ rang gi sten la mi 'dug cing rang dgar gnas pa'o/ /dge 'dun gyi bsro khang bya ba'i phyir shing gshegs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong sa ri zhes bya ba de cang mi shes pa'i phyir na/ dge 'dun gyi bsro khang la rtsed mo rtser phyin no/ /shing rul pa'i ser
<p>97b.2</p>ka zhig nas sbrul nag po chen po zhig byung nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'dul khrims nyams pas de'i rnam par smin pas mche ba'i dug can/ klu gdol ba'i rigs dug rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ sbrul nag po'i gzugs can/ mig na mthong ba'i dug yod pa/ bsam pa'i dug can
<p>97b.3</p>reg pa'i dug yod pa dug rnam pa bzhi dang / rigs rnam pa bzhi dang / gang gi dus na zhe na/ nyams pa dang gang zag gi bya ba'i bsam pa gtang ba dang / klu de'i rigs kyis kyang tshor te/ rigs ni bram ze yin te/ log pa'i dus kyang de'i dus na 'byung ste/ dug kyang de'i dus su chud
<p>97b.4</p>do/ /de la bsam pa'i dug ces bya'o/ /mthong ba'i dug ni nyams pa dang gang zag dang gang zag gi rdzas rnams mthong ste/ de mthong ba tsam gyis khros shing mthong ba tsam gyis thal bar brlag pa'o/ /log pa'i dus kyang de yin te/ de'i rigs ni rgyal rigs so/ /reg pa'i
<p>97b.5</p>dug ni de mthong ba tsam gyis reg ste/ de ni mche ba'i dug ces bya'o/ /rigs ni rje'u rigs so/ /kha rlangs kyi dug ni/ bsam pa dang mthong ba dang reg pa'i sgo nas 'byung ste/ bsam pa btang ba tsam gyis kyang kha rlangs kyi dug 'byung zhing / mthong bas kyang de bzhin no/ /reg pa lta
<p>97b.6</p>ci smos te/ kha rlangs kyi dug ni gzhan dang mi 'dra'o/ /mi srun te gdol ba'i rigs can/ kha rlangs kyi dug de nag po'i dug ces bya'o/ /de'i rigs ni sbrul nag po'o/ /shing gshegs nas byung zhing 'jigs su rung ba/ dug rnam pa bzhi'i rang bzhin/ dge slong sa ris ma tshor
<p>97b.7</p>bar byung ngo / /rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong la zin pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ mi srun pa sbrul nag pos kyang dge slong sa ri brtul zhugs nyams pa/ mche ba'i dug gis zin pa'o/ /de ni glo bur gyis nyams pa yin no/ /lus sbrid nas sa la 'gyel te zhes bya ba ni/ dug gi nus pas mdog shor
<p>98a</p>
<p>98a.1</p>zhing / lus thams cad skrangs shing sems la dran pa med cing / kha nas kyang dbugs ma thon no/ /dge slong sa ri de yang nad chen pos btab cing sdug bsngal chen pos nyen pa'o/ /dbu bar skyug cing mig kyang bskyur nas nyal ba dang zhes bya ba ni mche ba'i dug gis
<p>98a.2</p>btab bas/ 'chi ba'i dus la bab cing mig shor zhing lce yang rdog por song ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni byams pa dang snying rje che zhing thos pa che ba/ sems can thams cad la snying rje mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ 'dul ba'i sgo nas
<p>98a.3</p>dgra bcom pa rnams la bsnyen bkur mdzad pa/ sdom pa la gnas shing / snying rje dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ni/ dge slong ri nad kyis btab pa mthong ngo / /mthong bas rings pas bcom ldan 'das ga la der song ste zhes bya ba ni/ sbrul nag pos zin pa mthong ste/ 
<p>98a.4</p>thabs mi rnyed cing thabs kyi don la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong sa ri snying rje zhing bcom ldan 'das la gus pas phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan
<p>98a.5</p>'das la'o/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang mi la sogs pa'i
<p>98a.6</p>dbus su'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong sa ri'i don du bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba phul ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ rang bzhin gyis btsun pa ste/ de yang sku gsung
<p>98a.7</p>thugs thul zhing / mi dge ba bcu spangs shing dge ba bcu dang du len pa ste/ sems can gyi don du rang bzhin gyis rab tu byung ba'o/ /de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can la snying rjes khyab pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ni gti mug
<p>98b</p>
<p>98b.1</p>dang / zhe sdang dang / 'dod chags dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog dang / de rnams bcom zhing 'khor ba las log pa'o/ /yang na bag chags kyi shes bya'i sgrib pa bcom pa'o/ /ldan pa ni skal ba dang ldan pa'o/ /'das pa ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /mnyan
<p>98b.2</p>yod na zhes bya ba ni/ yul ma ga d+hA'o/ /rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba 'di na zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dgra bcom pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma
<p>98b.3</p>la sogs pa'i gnas/ yang na dngos grub kyis gces pa'o/ /dge slong sa ri zhes bya ba ni bram ze'i rigs las bos pa ste/ dge slong yang rab tu byung ba'i ming grags pa'o/ /de gnyis 'dzom pas na dge slong sa ri zhes pa'o/ /gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab pa zhes bya ba ni/ lo
<p>98b.4</p>bcu gnyis lon pa ste/ gzhon nu'i dus su rab tu byung zhing 'dul ba ni mi shes pa'o/ /rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa zhes bya ba ni/ rab tu byung nas zhag bdun lon pa/ dge slong gi spyod pa mi shes pa/ rtse ba la dga' ba'o/ /bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pa
<p>98b.5</p>zhes bya ba ni/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas zhag gcig lon pa'o/ /chos 'dul ba 'dir mchis nas ring po ma lon pa zhig gnas pa de zhes bya ba ni/ lus ngag yid gsum 'dul bas na 'dul ba ste/ chos kyang de nas gnas pa'o/ /'dir mchis nas ring po ma lon pa dge
<p>98b.6</p>slong gi spyod pa mi shes shing / gzhon nu'i spyod pa la gnas pa'o/ /dge 'dun gyi bsro khang bgyi ba'i slad du shing gshegs pa dang / shing rul pa'i ser ka zhig nas sbrul nag po chen po zhig byung nas zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong sa ri rtsed mo la phyin pa ste/ klu
<p>98b.7</p>gdol ba'i rigs mche ba'i dug can 'jigs su rung ba dug rnam pa bzhi'i rang bzhin can/ shing rul pa gshegs pa'i nang nas byung ba'o/ /rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong la zin pa dang zhes bya ba ni glo bur gyi rnam par smin pas gzung bas so/ /lus sbrid nas dog sa la 'gyel te
<p>99a</p>
<p>99a.1</p>zhes bya ba ni/ phyogs rnams mi shes shing / lus po thams cad skrangs shing 'gas par gyur pa'o/ /dbu bar skyug cing lus kyang bsgyur nas nyal zhing mchis na zhes bya ba ni/ mig 'dzums mi shes shing lus kyang rengs nas kha nas dbugs kyang mi thon pa'o/ /
<p>99a.2</p>btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis ji ltar nan tan bgyi zhes bya ba ni/ sngags dang thabs ci yod ces pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i dge slong sa ri sbrul nag pos zin pa'i gnas skabs te gnyis pa'o// //de skad ces gsol pa dang
<p>99a.3</p>zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong sa ri'i don la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa'i rting la'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa/ 
<p>99a.4</p>stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gyi don la/ kun dga' bo'i drung du 'khor bzhi dang chas te khyu mchog dang seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas khyod song la zhes bya ba ni/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa
<p>99a.5</p>dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi drung du rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o/ /de bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa ste/ de bzhin
<p>99a.6</p>du ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o/ /da ltar yang ngas kyang gsungs te/ khyod kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la brten la mdzod cig ces pa'o/ /de bzhin du gshegs pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ yang
<p>99a.7</p>na ngo bo nyid dang bral zhing bde ba chen po thob pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin thob pa/ de 'dra'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la nyon la gsungs shig ces pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya
<p>99b</p>
<p>99b.1</p>chen mo 'dis zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags ni rnam pa gnyis te/ phyi'i rig pa dang / nang gi rig pa'o/ /phyi'i rig pa ni/ rig pa rnam pa lnga mkhyen cing / yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi lam nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad nas rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o/ /nang gi rig pa
<p>99b.2</p>ni yang dag pa'i ye shes te/ ngo bo nyid dang bral zhing shes rab kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i ye shes so/ /rgyal mo ni thams cad las rgyal te/ de yang bdud rnams kyis mi tshugs shing 'khor ba bcom pa'o/ /chen mo ni nam mkha' bzhin du khyab ste/ sems can gyi don
<p>99b.3</p>la thugs rjes khyab pa'o/ /rma bya ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sogs pa'i sems can la snying rjes khyab nas rig pa'i lam nas 'jug pa'o/ /yang na rma bya ni sku gsum gyi rang bzhin yin te/ nam mkha'
<p>99b.4</p>lta bu ni dmigs pa'i rang bzhin chos kyi sku'o/ /de'i grib ma ni sgyu ma lta bur longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o/ /des sems can la don byed cing nam mkha' lta bur khyab ste sprul pa'i sku'o/ /yang na rma bya ni yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis phyi'i dug dang nang gi dug bcom zhing
<p>99b.5</p>zas su dug za ba'o/ /'dis ni sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byed pa ste/ gzi brjid che ba dang / mthu che ba dang / stobs dang ldan zhing / ngan song gsum 'joms pa ste/ sems can bde la 'god pa'o/ /'di zhes pa rma bya chen mo'o/ /dge slong sa
<p>99b.6</p>ri la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gdon rigs mi gcig pa stong phrag brgyad cu zhes pa dang / de bzhin du gdon re re la'ang yin te/ nad rigs mi gcig pa bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi/ nad kyi rigs gcig pa la yang de bzhin no/ /dug rnam pa bzhi srung zhing ngo / /dge
<p>99b.7</p>slong sa ra le mche ba'i dug bcom zhing nyams pa thams cad skong ba'o/ /de bzhin du gzhan gyi dug kyang srung bar byed pa'o/ /srung ba gyis shig ces pa ni sems can thams cad dang dge slong sa ri la'o/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba ni rig sngags 'di'i gzi brjid kyis/ dug dang / 
<p>100a</p>
<p>100a.1</p>'byung po dang / nad dang / nyams pa dang / sdig pa dang / ngan song gsum na gnas pa sbed pa'o/ /yang na snga ba ni/ sdug bsngal thams cad las thar zhing gzhan rnams kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ sdug bsngal las bskyab
<p>100a.2</p>pa ste/ chad pa thams cad bcom zhing 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las skyob pa'o/ /yongs su gzung ba dang zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar byed cing / 'jigs pa la ma btang ste/ mi dge ba bcom zhing / dge ba gzung ba'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya
<p>100a.3</p>ba ni sdig pa thams cad bcom zhing 'byung po la sogs pa thams cad las bsrung ba ste/ mi dge ba bcom zhing dge ba la bskyang ba'o/ /zhi ba dang bde legs su gyur pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ nad dang / 'byung po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa zhi bar byas shing / sdig pa
<p>100a.4</p>thams cad bcom zhing 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las thar ba'o/ /'di'i gzi brjid kyis bkra shis shing / nad thams cad bcom zhing gang nas gang du yang bde legs 'byung ba'o/ /chad pa spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i gdon la sogs pa'am/ rgyal po'am/ rkun ma dang / 
<p>100a.5</p>chom rkun nam/ chu dang me'am/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad dam/ mkha' 'gro'am/ ma mo'am gshin rje'am/ de la sogs pa thams cad spangs shing / bde bar gnas pa'o/ mtshon cha spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ khrag khrug kun gyi sdug bsngal
<p>100a.6</p>thams cad spangs pa ste/ de la sogs pa glo bur gyi mtshon cha spangs pa'o/ /dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni mche ba'i dug la sogs pa spangs te/ de rnams kyis mi tshugs shing dug bcom pa'o/ /dug gsad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ nang gi dug gsum phyi'i dug gsum
<p>100a.7</p>ste/ nang gi dug gsum 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug go/ /'dug pa dang / byas pa dang / 'gro ba'i dug go/ /de rnams bsad cing ye shes rnams shar bar byed pas so/ /mtshams gcad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ kho ra khor yug tsam mtshams gcad de/ 'di'i
<p>100b</p>
<p>100b.1</p>nus pas nye bar mi nus so/ /sa bcing ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ phyogs mtshams steng rnams bcings te gang gi ngos nas kyang glags tshol bar mi byed pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'dis lha'i gdon la sogs pa thams cad bcom zhing nad la sogs pa las thar bar
<p>100b.2</p>byed pa'o/ /lha'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni brgya byin gyis gtso bo byas pa/ lha'i gdon rigs mi gcig pa stong phrag brgyad cu'o/ /lha'i gdon ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog dkar mo phyag na rdo rje 'dzin cing / glang po che la zhon ba'o/ /klu'i gdon dang zhes bya
<p>100b.3</p>ba ni/ klu rigs mi gcig pa stong phrag brgyad cu ste/ de yang bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang ngo / /de bzhin du sa bdag dang sa srin la sogs pa yang yin no/ /klu'i gdon ni sna tshogs kyi gzugs yin te/ sku mdog sna tshogs su
<p>100b.4</p>gnas shing zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ phyag na sbrul zhags 'dzin cing / dbu la sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang bcas pa'o/ /lha ma yin gyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thags bzangs ris kyis gtso bo byas pa lha ma yin stong phrag brgyad cu ste/ de'i sku mdog dang
<p>100b.5</p>phyag mtshan ni sku mdog mthing ga phyag na dbyug to bsnams shing / ku be ra la zhon pa'o/ /khro bo'i tshul du gnas shing 'khrug pa la dga' ba'o/ /rlung lha'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ rlung lha'i gdon rnam par rgyal byed la sogs pa ste/ rlung lha'i gdon stong phrag brgyad
<p>100b.6</p>cu gzugs mi gcig pa gang nas gang du rgyu ba'o/ /sku mdog sngo skya/ phyag na ba dan 'dzin zhing sha ba la zhon pa'o/ /nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po stong phrag brgyad cu la sogs
<p>100b.7</p>pa/ bya'i gzugs sna tshogs mi gcig pa'o/ /mi'i lus la bya'i mgo gnas shing mdog ser po'o/ /mig dmar zhing mchu mthing ga'o/ /gshog pa yod cing dbu la rwa gnas pa'o/ /dri za'i gdon dang zhes pa ni/ dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga ba la sogs pa ste/ dri
<p>101a</p>
<p>101a.1</p>za'i gdon stong phrag brgyad cu/ gzugs mi gcig pa sna tshogs gnas shing / glu dang bro la dga' ba ste/ sku mdog ser po phyag na pi wang bsnams pa'o/ /mi'am ci'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ ljon pa la sogs pa yin te/ mi'am ci'i gdon stong phrag brgyad
<p>101a.2</p>cu ste/ mgo rta mgor gnas shing / lus mi'i lus po la/ mdog ni mgo dmar po/ /lus ser po phyag na gling bu bsnams pa'o/ /glu la dga' zhing dbyangs bzang po dang ldan pa'o/ /lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ lto 'phye'i rgyal po gser can la sogs pa yin
<p>101a.3</p>te/ lto 'phye'i gdon stong phrag brgyad cu gzugs sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / mi'i lus la sbrul gyi mgo can no/ /sku mdog ni mthing ga /lus dmar ba la phyag gnyis cha lang 'dzin pa'o/ /sgra'i tshogs la dga' zhing / gar yang skad cig gis sgyur ba'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi
<p>101a.4</p>gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po sor mo lnga pa yin te/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon stong phrag brgyad cu dang / gzugs sna tshogs gnas shing chang la dga' ba/ sku mdog ser po/ phyag na rin po che'i dbyug to bsnams pa'o/ /srin po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ bden
<p>101a.5</p>bral gyi rgyal po 'jigs pa la sogs pa yin te/ srin po'i gdon stong phrag brgyad cu dang / lho nub na gnas shing phyi'i rgya mtsho'i 'gram na gnas pa/ mdog nag po/ phyag na ral gri 'dzin pa/ srin po'i gdon sna tshogs bsdus pa'o/ /yi dgas kyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>101a.6</p>yi dgas kyi gdon gsus chen la sogs pa yin te/ yi dgas stong phrag brgyad cu/ gzugs mi gcig pa gnas shing / mdog nag po skra dang sen mo ring ba/ 'jigs su rung ba ste/ rus pa la pags pas g.yogs pa'i gzugs dang 'dra bas phyag na thod pa bsnams
<p>101a.7</p>pa'o/ /sha za'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ sha za sum gyur la sogs pa yin te/ sha za stong phrag brgyad cu/ sha za mi gcig pa gnas shing / phyi ba'i gdong can mdog sna tshogs gnas shing / lag na gri gug thogs shing nad sna tshogs gtong ba'o/ /'byung po'i gdon dang
<p>101b</p>
<p>101b.1</p>zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po'i 'bras bu gsum pa la sogs pa yin te/ 'byung po'i gdon stong phrag brgyad cu/ gzugs sna tshogs gnas shing thal ba'i mdog can/ thal ba'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /grul bum gyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ grul bum gyi gdon mgrin pa
<p>101b.2</p>gsum pa rnams yin te/ grul bum gyi gdon stong phrag brgyad cu/ gsus pa che zhing bzhin mi sdug pa/ mgo bo che la mig g.yo ba'o/ /mdog ljang nag tu rab tu gnas shing dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o/ /srul po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ srul po'i gdon stong phrag brgyad cu/ 
<p>101b.3</p>phag pa'i mgo can te/ lus ni phag pa'i mdog can/ ba spu yang khab dang 'dra ba/ phyag na mi mgo 'dzin pa'o/ /lus srul po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus srul po'i gdon stong phrag brgyad cu/ phag mgo lnga lnga yod pa/ phag gi mgo bo de yang dkar po dang / 
<p>101b.4</p>dmar po dang / ser po dang / nag po dang / ljang gu'o/ /lus ni thal ba'i mdog can te/ lag na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /skem byed kyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ skem byed kyi gdon de yang stong phrag brgyad cu ste/ spyang ki'i mgo can la mi'i lus po yod/ spyang ki bzhin
<p>101b.5</p>du lus kyang khra bor gnas te/ mda' gzhu 'dzin cing / sems can rnams 'dar bar byed pa'o/ /smyo byed kyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ smyo byed kyi gdon stong phrag brgyad cu wa'i mgo can te/ mdog wa bzhin du yod cing mi'i lus po ste/ phyag na zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /
<p>101b.6</p>grib gnon gyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ grib gnon gyi gdon stong phrag brgyad cu ste/ mi'i lus la khyi'i mgo can/ mdog dmar po lag na 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /brjed byed kyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ brjed byed kyi gdon stong phrag brgyad cu gnas shing / mi'i lus
<p>101b.7</p>po la byi la'i mgo can/ mdog nag po ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /gnon po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yod de/ dred mo'i mgo can la/ mdog ni ser mo lag na dgra sta 'dzin pa'o/ /skar ma'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ de yang rgyu skar nyi shu
<p>102a</p>
<p>102a.1</p>rtsa brgyad yin te/ smin drug dang ni snar ma dang / /mgo dang lag dang nab so dang / /rgyal dang skag ces bya ba'o/ /mchu gre dbo dang me bzhi dang / /nag pas ri sa ga'o/ /lha mtshams dang ni snron dang snrubs/ /chu stod dang ni chu smad dang / /gro zhun byi zhun bdun rnams
