<p>122a.3</p>'byung zhing / /mi snyan brjod de za bar bgyid/ /mdza' bo gnyen bshes gzugs dag tu/ /gda' zhing bka' mchid smra bar bgyid/ /bu mo sdug gu'i gzugs dag tu/ /'dod la spyod la dga' bar bgyid/ /nyi ma skar ma'i gzugs dag dang / /zla ba'i gzugs su gda' bar bgyid/ /
<p>122a.4</p>rlung dang skar mda' lce gzugs su/ /de la gnod pa de dag gda'/ /skar ma'i tshogs dang 'dra ba dag /'jigs par bgyid pa wa dang khyi/ /rnam par sprul nas ljon shing dang / /mchod rten dag gi gnas na gda'/ /skyes pa gzhon nu'i gzugs mdzes pas/ /'bar zhing shing rta'i sgra
<p>122a.5</p>yang 'byin/ /gnas rnams dang ni shul dag tu/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rjes kyang ston/ /grong khyer dag na khyim rnams kyi/ /sgo yang gdon chen de dag 'byed/ /srog dang lus kyang blang bgyis shing / /lam ngan kun du bskor bar bgyid/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag dang / /rnam
<p>122a.6</p>pa sna tshogs sgra rnams dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs nad kyi rnams/ /lus ni na bar gnas par ston/ /nad rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang / /phyin ci log tu ston par bgyid/ /ji snyed 'jig rten rang bzhin dag /thams cad log par de dag ston/ /yang na 'byung po de rnams mi'i 'jig rten
<p>122a.7</p>la gnod par byas nas glags tshol zhing grong ngam grong khyer du rgyu na/ mtshan nyid de bzhin du yin te/ /grong khyer grong rdal yul 'khor dang / /pho brang 'khor du rgyu ba ni/ /gnod sbyin ma rungs mdangs 'phrog pa/ /snying rje med cing khrag 'thung ba/ /lus che 'jigs pa chen po ste/ /
<p>122b</p>
<p>122b.1</p>stobs po che la sgra yang che/ /mgrin bcu po la mig stong po/ /gdon chen mig ni dmar po rnams/ /'khor ni mang po rnams btang ste/ /lag na mtshon thogs rab tu 'jigs/ /sbrul gyi pags pa thogs pa dang / /lag bzhi lag na sgron ma thogs/ /lag na mtshon dang
<p>122b.2</p>dbyug pa thogs/ /rdo rje mdung rtse dbyug pa thogs/ /rab tu drag pa'i dmag rgal nas/ /phyogs kun du ni skrag par byed/ /sdang ba'i gnas na 'khod pa yi/ /gsang ba po ni dad kun kyang / /mi yi 'jig rten 'di dag tu/ /skyes pa bud med gzhan yang 'dzin/ /sha
<p>122b.3</p>khrag dron por bcas pa la/ /rnam par 'phrul zhing 'dod pa'i gzugs/ /seng ge dang ni stag dang rta/ /ma he ba lang bong bu rnga/ /glang po che yi gzugs 'dra dang / /dom dang gzig dang spyang ki dang / /khyi dang wa dang ra dag dang / /byi la byi ba spre'u yi gzugs/ /bse dang phag
<p>122b.4</p>dang sre mo dang / /nya dang rus sbal dag gi gzugs/ /kha cig dag ni sram gyi gzugs/ /khwa dang 'ug pa khu byug dang / /bya rgod khra dang nya mid bcas/ /rma bya ngang pa thi ba dang / /khrung khrung dang ni bya rnams dang / /kha cig bya gag gzugs rnams su/ /gnod sbyin rnams ni mi
<p>122b.5</p>yis mthong / /'dab bzangs bya yi tshul gyis kyang / /skye bo mang po skrag par byed/ /kha cig mi yi mgo can la/ /lus ni bya gag bong bu 'dra/ /kha cig mtshon gyis rab tu 'tshe/ /lus dang bral ba dag tu snang / /rnam par 'khrugs shing 'dod la mos/ /rgyu ma'i phreng
<p>122b.6</p>bas kun du dkris/ /rtse gsum mdung gis rab 'debs shing / /srog chags rnams la gnod par byed/ /mi bzad pa yi dbugs 'byin zhing / /skye dgu 'di dag skrag par byed/ /srog chags rgyud ni ji snyed pa/ /sna tshogs kyi ni gzugs su snang / /kha cig dag ni ri yang
<p>122b.7</p>thogs/ /la la ral gri 'khor lo thogs/ /grangs ni brgya phrag stong gnas te/ /dbyug pas bsdigs shing kha drag po/ /mig phyung ba la bzhin mi sdug /srin po'i gzugs ni sngo ba dang / /sna dang rna ba bcad pa dang / /lce bcad gdong ni gnyer ma can/ /rkang lag
<p>123a</p>
<p>123a.1</p>dag ni gtubs pa dang / /mgo bo bcad pa'i srin po rnams/ /skabs ni rab tu tshol bar byed/ /sdig pa can rnams gzi brjid 'phrog /mi dag gi ni lus rnams la/ /rab tu phra ba'i gdon du snang / /spu yi bar dang gnad rnams dang / /de bzhin rma yi kha rnams su/ /
<p>123a.2</p>lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang / /de bzhin du lha pho mo dang / klu pho mo dang gnod sbyin pho mo la sogs pas skad cig thang cig la/ sems can la 'tshe bar byed pa nad sna tshogs gtong zhing 'byung po rnams kyis kyang glags tshol ba'o/ /glags tshol bar 'dod cing glags lta na
<p>123a.3</p>yang glags mi rnyed de zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i gdon dang bcas pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang gnod par byed mi nus shing / rtsar yang 'ong mi nus kyi/ glags tshol ba lta ci smos so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
<p>123a.4</p>sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa/ /gzi brjid che ba stobs dang ldan pa/ 'byung po rnams kyi gnyen por gsungs pa'o/ /de bas na glags tshol bas mi rnyed pa'o/ /lha ni lha 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas/ gnon po ni gnon po
<p>123a.5</p>'du ba'i gnas su ma yin no zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis 'du bar mi nus shing 'byung po rnams kyang so sor 'khyams te/ gnod par mi nus shing / rtsar nye bar mi nus pa'o/ /gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di las 'gal bar byed na zhes bya ba ni/ gal te
<p>123a.6</p>glags tshol ba rnams rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das par gyur na/ sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa 'thob ste/ dmyal ba mnar med du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dmyal ba de las thon nas yang nas yang du gzhan du dmyal bar 'pho'o/ /de'i mgo bo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du
<p>123a.7</p>tshal pa bdun du 'gas so zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos mdze'am phol mig gam/ lhog pa'am 'bras la sogs pa rnams kyis btab nas/ shi ba'i dus su tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/ /gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag kyang yid la bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams
<p>123b</p>
<p>123b.1</p>kyi gnyen po ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gsang sngags kyi thabs bshad par bya'o/ /slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /dang por dgug pa/ gnyis pa bskrad pa/ gsum pa mnan pa/ bzhi ba bsreg pa'o/ /
<p>123b.2</p>gang gnod pa'i 'byung po rnams/ rig sngags kyi nga rgyal byas nas/ phyag g.yas g.yon gyis dgug pa'i phyag rgya bya ste/ rdo rje khu tshur yang dag par bcas la/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis dgug pa'i tshul du'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags la/ oM badzra aM ku sha dzaHla rig
<p>123b.3</p>sngags kyi gsang sngags btags la dgug par bya'o/ /ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams/ oM dang rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi/ /rig sngags smon gyis 'dug mi nus/ /ri rab dur khrod pho brang dang / /rgya mtsho lung stong shing gcig dang / /nags tshal dag dang rgya gram dang / /ri yi
<p>123b.4</p>rtse mo mchod rten rtsa/ /khron pa dag dang chu mig dang / /mtsho chen dang ni tshal gnas dang / /de bzhin grong khyer grong gnas dang / /grong rdal dang ni pho brang dang / /ri yi rtse mo nam mkha' dang / /bar snang chu dang sa la gnas/ /de bzhin sa 'og lam la gnas/ /dzaHhUM baM hoH'i
<p>123b.5</p>phyag rgya yis/ /'byung po mang po rig sngags dgug /'byung po ma rungs pa rnams rig sngags kyi phyag rgyas dgug pa'o/ /yang bskrad pa ni/ yungs kar ske tshe dang bsres la/ ra bar tsher ma can gyi shing bu ste/ mdzod dang khyim gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sa blangs la ske tshe dang
<p>123b.6</p>yungs kar bsres la yang bden pa'i tshigs bcad bton la/ bde gshegs rnams kyi gzi brjid kyis/ /gtsug tor can gyi stobs rnams dang / /thams cad skyob pa'i bden tshig dang / /log dang sel gyi ting 'dzin dang / /gser thub kyi ni ye shes kyis/ /'od srungs kyi ni
<p>123b.7</p>rdzu 'phrul lo/ /shAkya seng ge'i brtson 'grus so/ /'byung po de dag brlag par shog /u tsa ta ya phaT rnams kyis/ /rig sngags snying po de btags la/ /rnga bo che dang 'khar rnga dang / /de la sogs pa sgra yi tshogs/ /de brdungs 'byung po bskrad par bya/ /me tog sna tshogs
<p>124a</p>
<p>124a.1</p>gtor ma dang / /rtsa ba sna tshogs lo ma dang / /'bru sna chu dang bcas pa dang / /'ongs pa'i phyogs su bskyal bar bya/ /de bzhin bskrad nas mnan par bya'o/ /gro ga la sogs shing lo la/ /'byung po'i gzugs dang 'khor lo bcas/ /de yi nang du ming byang bri/ /yungs
<p>124a.2</p>kar lan tshwa ske tshe dang / /shang tshe dug rdzas ro thang dang / /de rnams bcug la dril bar bya/ /rabs chad mdze thod nang du gzhug /sngar bshad dgug gzhug 'byung po la/ /rig sngags la ni stam+b+ha ya gdags/ /lam mam rgya gram mchod rten 'og /pho khrom sar ni mnan par bya/ /de bzhin
<p>124a.3</p>mnan la bsreg par bya/ /tsan+dan la sogs dri rnams kyi/ /de yi chus ni lus rnams bkru/ /smyung bar byas nas gos gtsang gyon/ /seng ldeng shing la zhugs phul la/ /'bru dang rtsa ba sna tshogs dang / /gnod byed gang la ming btags la/ /zhugs kyi nang du gtor bar bgyi/ /
<p>124a.4</p>gsang sngags la ni me sngags gdags/ /'byung po'i rnam pa ma lus bsreg /gtor ma me tog lo ma dang / /chos skyong la ni sbyin par bya/ /de nas bden pa'i tshig bshad 'di/ /yang dag gis ni brjod par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid kyis/ /rang rgyal dag gi gzi brjid dang / /
<p>124a.5</p>dgra bcom pa yi mthu dag gis/ /gsang sngags 'dzin pa thams cad dang / /shA ri'i bu yi shes rab dang / /maud gal bu yi rdzu 'phrul dang / /ma 'gags pa yi mig dang ni/ /'od srungs sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / /kauN+Di n+ya'i sngar thos dang / /kun dga' bo yi thos pa
<p>124a.6</p>dang / /tshangs pa yi ni byams pa dang / /brgya byin gyi ni dbang rnams dang / /'jig rten skyong ba'i yul rnams thob/ /dbang phyug chen po'i stobs dag dang / /ded dpon rnams kyi mthu dag gis/ /'phrog ma'i gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul ldan/ /de dag rnams kyi mthu dag gis/ /
<p>124a.7</p>bdag gi gnod byed bsreg par shog /'byung po dug dang dgra bo dang / /bdag gi 'jigs pa thams cad dang / /sangs rgyas bden pa de rnams kyis/ /sems can dag dang bdag rnams dang / /sdig pa thams cad bsreg par shog /gsang sngags tshig rnams bden
<p>124b</p>
<p>124b.1</p>par shog /de bzhin du yang nas yang du gsang sngags la me'i sngags btags la bsreg par bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags ni gang zhe na kun gzhi rnam par dag pa ste/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /mtshon pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so/ /mtshon byed ni
<p>124b.2</p>rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'o/ /rdo rje'i rigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o/ /nam mkha'i khams so/ /yid kyi skye mched do/ /zhe sdang gi rang bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan no/ /spyan gsum pa zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ khro gnyer
<p>124b.3</p>can kha gdangs pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ 'jigs su rung ba/ sku mdog nag mo/ /yan lag thams cad rin po che dang sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ sham thabs stag gis byas pa/ g.yas dang po na rdo rje rtse lnga gdengs pa/ de'i 'og ma na ni ral gri/ g.yon dang po na sdigs mdzub
<p>124b.4</p>dang zhags pa/ de'i 'og ma na lcags kyu/ zhabs g.yas bskum pa g.yon brkyang ba gnyis na ma rungs pa'i 'byung po thams cad mnan pa'o/ /nyi ma'i gdan la me yi 'od/ skra ser po gyen du'o/ /me ltar 'bar ba rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan de ni thod pas brgyan pa'o/ /
<p>124b.5</p>dbu'i spyi bo'i gtsug na rma bya'i sgro lngas brgyan pa/ de ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing khro mor bsam mo/ /de bzhin du rig sngags kyi gsang sngags yid la bya'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ i li mi li
<p>124b.6</p>ki li la sogs pa'o/ /gsang sngags 'di'i tshig la 'gal na/ shi ba'i dus su mgo bo tshal par 'gas shing / shi ma thag mnar med par 'gro ba'o/ /bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni gang zag sems can rnams la'o/ /sba ba dang yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya
<p>124b.7</p>ba ni/ khams gsum na rgyu ba'i 'byung po thams cad sba ba'o/ /de bzhin du bskyab pa yang yin no/ /yongs su gzung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dper na rang gi nor gzhan du mi ster ba bzhin no/ /'byung po de rnams la yang mi ster ba'o/ /yongs su bskyang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig
<p>125a</p>
<p>125a.1</p>sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ glang chen smyon pa bzhin du thub pa med pa'o/ /zhi ba dang zhes bya ba ni 'byung po thams cad dang nad zhi bar byed pa'o/ /bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ bkra shis shing nad rnams bcom pa'o/ /chad pa spang ba dang
<p>125a.2</p>zhes bya ba ni 'byung po de rnams kyis glags tshol bar 'dod pas glags mi rnyed pa'o/ /mtshon cha spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ /rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'byung po de rnams la nus pa med de gzi brjid 'phrog pa'o/ /dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po rnams kyi kha rlangs kyi
<p>125a.3</p>dug reg pa dang mthong ba rnams so/ /dug gsad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ de'i rang bzhin gyi dug phyung ste/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos dug gsad pa'o/ /mtshams gcad pa dang zhes bya ba ni 'byung po de rnams la gcad de/ rig sngags 'di'i gzi brjid kyis dpag tshad gcig gi bar
<p>125a.4</p>du 'ong bar mi nus pa'o/ /sa bcing ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ sa 'og tu mnan cing dpag tshad gcig tu 'ong bar mi nus pa'o/ /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni 'byung po de rnams kyi sdug bsngal bral zhing / dus ma yin par 'chi ba med pa'o/ /ston brgya mthong bar
<p>125a.5</p>shog shig ces bya ba ni/ yang nas yang du tshe bsnan cing nad rnams kyis mi tshugs te/ bkra shis shing tshe ring ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i 'byung po rnams glags tshol 'dod pa ma rnyed pa'i skabs te drug pa'o// //'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni 'og tu lta ste 'og
<p>125a.6</p>tu gang bltas she na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar yod pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rjes su yi rang zhing byin gyis brlabs pa/ dgra bcom nyan thos rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /'jig rten gyi lha dang bcas pa yang / tshangs pa dang brgya byin dang / gnod
<p>125a.7</p>sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po mthu chen sum cu rtsa gnyis dang mthu chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'jig rten skyod ba bcu dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po sor mo lnga pa dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya dang bcas pa yang lha'i gdon la sogs pa/ bgegs
<p>125b</p>
<p>125b.1</p>dang 'byung po'i rigs su gyur pa stong phrag brgyad cu phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o/ /gzhan yang de lta bu rnams kyi rjes su yi rang zhing gnyen por gnas pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyis gso ba'i sman dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'dir ni dug gi rang bzhin gyis zas ma
<p>125b.2</p>legs pa 'byung ba ste/ zas ma legs pa ni rnam par rtog pa las 'byung ba'o/ /rnam par rtog pa ni dug lnga'o/ /dug lnga ni gti mug yin te/ gti mug gi rang bzhin gyis zhe sdang byung ngo / /zhe sdang las 'dod chags byung ngo / /'dod chags las nga rgyal byung ngo / /nga rgyal las
<p>125b.3</p>phrag dog byung ngo / /de lnga 'dus pas 'jig rten gyi dug gsum la 'dus te/ 'jig rten gyi dug gsum ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang gsum mo/ /de'i rang bzhin gyis 'khor ba'i rgyu ste/ 'khor ba la phyi'i dug gsum byung ngo / /phyi'i dug gsum ni 'jig rten
<p>125b.4</p>pa'i las las byung ba'o/ /de yang 'gro ba dang bsdad pa dang byed pa'o/ /'gro ba'i dug ni bsam pa dang / mthong ba dang reg pa dang kha rlangs so/ /bsam pa la yang gnyis te/ reg pas bsam pa dang / mthong nas bsam pa'o/ /reg pa la yang gnyis te/ nga rgyal gyis
<p>125b.5</p>reg tu 'gro ba dang / rang bzhin gyis dbang du med par reg tu 'jug pa'o/ /mthong ba la yang gnyis te/ rang dad pas mthong ba dang / reg nas mthong ba'o/ /kha rlangs la yang gnyis te/ mche ba dang / dbugs rang bzhin gyis dpag tshad gnyis gnyis la slebs pa'o/ /
<p>125b.6</p>de'i rim pa bzhin du rigs la yang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs so/ /de bzhin du yang bram ze'i bram ze dang / rgyal po'i rgyal po dang / rje'u'i rje'u dang / dmangs rigs kyi dmangs rigs ni gdol pa'o/ /dus ni snga dro dang / nyi ma phyed
<p>125b.7</p>dang / sum cha gcig dang dgongs mo'o/ /srod dang nam phyed dang / sum cha gcig dang tho rangs so/ /rim pa bzhin klu rnams rgyu ba'o/ /bram ze'i rigs kyis snga dro zin na ni/ nad bad kan gyi dus yin te/ gcong dang tshigs rnams na zhing mig ser te/ skyug par 'dod cing dang
<p>126a</p>
<p>126a.1</p>ga mi bde'o/ /rgyal po'i dus ni nyi ma phyed yin te/ mkhris pa'i dus so/ /mchin pa la nad babs shing mig dmar ba'o/ /ro stod mi bde zhing mgo na ba ste/ lhog pa dang 'bras dang tshad pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma sum cha ni rje'u rigs kyi dus yin te/ 
<p>126a.2</p>nad chu ser gyi dus so/ /grang shum byed cing lus po thams cad 'dar ba'o/ /srod la phol mig dang / sha bkra dang tshigs na zhing mkhal ma skrang ba'o/ /dmangs rigs kyi dus ni dgongs mo ste/ mgo mjing rengs shing na ba ste/ rkan 'khal zhing skad 'gags te rna ba 'on
<p>126a.3</p>zhing mig dmar/ kha dog skya ba/ mig 'gul zhing lus po thams cad 'gul ba'o/ /lus po skabs skabs su sbrid cing rkang lag lji ba ste/ snying mi dga' zhing lus po grang / sha ror song zhing shu ba 'byung ste/ skra rnams 'byi zhing lus po skrangs pa'o/ /rus pa dang rkang
<p>126a.4</p>las byung ba ni/ yang dmangs rigs kyi nad yin te/ lus po skam zhing dang ga 'gags pa ste/ sme ba 'byung zhing g.yan pa'i nad kyis thebs pa'o/ /de bzhin du rigs gzhan la yang shes par bya'o/ /'gro ba'i dug ni klu'i rigs yin te/ mche ba'i dug kyang klu'i rigs
<p>126a.5</p>shes te/ sems can las shes par bya'o/ /yang bsdad pa'i dug la rtsa ba dang lo ma las byung ba'o/ /rtsa ba las byung ba ni btsan dug dang / bong nga nag po dang / ra dug dang / thar nu dang / re'u lcag dang / thang phrom dang / bong dug dang / ri sho ma dang / 'ji dug la
<p>126a.6</p>sogs pa'o/ /de la lo ma'i dug ni de rnams kyi lo ma'o/ /de zos pa'i nad ni shi ba dang / grang ba dang / smyo ba dang / brgyal ba dang / nar nus pas so/ /de ni bsdad pa'i dug gi nus pa'o/ /da byed pa'i dug ni rgya tsha shing kun dang sums pa'i sha'o/ /de'i nad kyis snying mi
<p>126a.7</p>dga' ste/ snying la byung ba'o/ /bong phrug gi sha dang 'ug pa'i sha shing kun dang ngo / /de yan lag la babs te/ grang shum byed cing tsha ba skye ste/ rta'i mchin pa dang / chu bya'i sha dang / thar nu rnams so/ /de lus la babs te rus pa 'gags par 'gyur ro/ /yang na zas
<p>126b</p>
<p>126b.1</p>mi legs pa yang sbyor ba'i dug yin te/ sbrang rtsi dang mar gnyis mnyam por byas nas 'khar phor gyi nang du zhag bdun bzhag ste/ de yang byed pa'i dug go/ /mkhris pa la tsha ba btang na de yang dug yin te/ rlung la grang ba gtang ba yang dug go/ /'jig rten pa'i dug 'di ni rang bzhin
<p>126b.2</p>rang las 'byung ste/ ma rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis rang la rang gnod pa'o/ /slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ gti mug dang ni 'dod chags dang / /zhe sdang rang bzhin rang dug ste/ /'jig rten pa yi dug gsum 'di/ /phyi yi dug kyang de las byung / /
<p>126b.3</p>'gro dang bsdad dang sbyor ba dang / /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gyis/ /phyi yi dug ni 'joms par nus/ /rig sngags gzi brjid de 'joms nus/ /gti mug 'dod chags zhe sdang dang / /rang gi sems kyis bcom pa la/ /gzhan gyis de ni mi choms so/ /bdag gis
<p>126b.4</p>de ni bor bar bgyi/ /de skad ces gsungs so/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo dug gi gnyen po 'di/ dug gsum gso ba la yang dag par nus pa'o/ /gsang sngags dang sman dang ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag gis gso bar bya ba'o/ /'gro ba'i dug gso ba ni/ nad pa
<p>126b.5</p>la rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs la/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags la 'jug pa'o/ /ltor btang ba'i sman ni/ mu zi dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / ram nye ba'i rtsa ba'i khu ba dang / de rnams ltor btong ba'o/ /grang ba che na tsha ba gsum dang / tsha
<p>126b.6</p>dang bsres pa sbrang rtsis sbyar la btang ngo / /chu ser babs na thal ka rdo rje dang / ba ku la dang / se 'brum gyi phyi skogs dang bsres la btang ngo / /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags zhag bdun bsgrub par bya'o/ /phol mig dang lus po gas par gyur na mu zi dang mar nag bskol
<p>126b.7</p>la dug dang 'bras bu gsum dang bsres la ser ka rnams la byug go/ /byab par 'dod na dang po phyag gis bgyi ste/ gnyis pa rtswa dUr bas bya'o/ /gsum pa rtswa ku shas te/ bzhi pa rma bya'i sgro'o/ /lnga pa rang gi sos dug dbyung ngo / /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma
<p>127a</p>
<p>127a.1</p>bya chen mo'i nga rgyal gyis byas la/ shu ba dang / g.ya' ba dang / mdze dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa dang / me dbal dang / lhog pa dang / 'bras dang / sha bkra dang / dmu chu dang / 'brum bu dang / sha ro la sogs pa'i mdze'i rigs thams cad
<p>127a.2</p>la de bzhin du bya'o/ /byug pa dang / bdug pa 'dod na/ sngar bshad pa'i nag po'i sbyor ba la bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin mnyam par bzlas pa drag po la 'jug go/ /de bzhin du 'gro ba'i dug gso ba'i bya thabs so/ /bsdad pa'i dug gso ba ni/ sngo ma hA ra tsa dang / 
<p>127a.3</p>chu grang mo la sbyar nas/ sngags lan bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad btab la 'thung du gzhug go/ /'di ni btsan dug dang bong nga nag po'i gnyen po'o/ /ra dug la 'bras bu gsum dang lcags phye btab la/ bu chung 'o ma 'thung ba'i
<p>127a.4</p>chu'am/ rang gi chu la btab la 'thung du gzhug go/ /des ni btsan dug kyang thub po/ /sribs shing gi 'bru gu la 'bras bu gsum gyis bya'o/ /smyo bar gyur na skyur mo'i chu rtsa'am khu ba blud do/ /de ni thang phrom gyi gnyen po'o/ /gas par gyur na mar
<p>127a.5</p>nag dang / gu gul dkar po dang sbyar la byug go/ /skrangs par gyur na thang phrom gyi rtsa ba dang / ri sho ba'i rtsa ba dang / dug rang dang sbyar la mnan no/ /gzhan yang thams cad chu grang la btab la btung bar bya'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags kyi
<p>127a.6</p>gsang sngags bton la bya'o/ /de ni bsdad pa'i dug gso ba'i bcos thabs so/ /da ni byed pa'i dug gso ba ste/ byed pa'i dug ni sbyor ba'i dug go/ /yungs kar ma tshig par brngos la/ brdung ba byas la lto stong la gtang ngo / /de bzhin du zhag gsum bzhi btang
<p>127a.7</p>bar gyur na/ lo gcig bar du thub pa'o/ /sha tshan gsum dang skyer ba dang / se rgod pa'i bar shun dang / a ru ra dang / ra dmar mo'i khrag dang ri lu byas la btang ngo / /'dis ni lo gsum gyi bar du thub ste/ lo gcig the tshom mi za bar thub bo/ /sha dug byung na sga chung
<p>127b</p>
<p>127b.1</p>dang tshal chu grang mo la btab la btung ngo / /rin po che'i dug byung na lcags phye dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / ldum bu re ral dang / sgog gcig ma dang / d+ha du ras sbyar la bya'o/ /'di ni sbyor ba'i dug gso ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo
<p>127b.2</p>'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa/ ma 'ongs pa rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /da ltar gyi shAkya thub pas gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /thabs shes rab dbyer med pa'o/ /kun gzhi rnam par dag pa'o/ /
<p>127b.3</p>stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te/ thabs kyi ngo bo ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo pad+ma'i rigs so/ /phung po ni 'du shes kyi phung po ste/ khams ni me'i khams so/ /skye mched ni lce'i skye mched do/ /rang bzhin ni 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin no/ /sangs
<p>127b.4</p>rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog dmar ba/ cung zad khro ba/ yan lag thams cad sbrul gyis brgyan pa dang po'i phyag g.yas g.yon na mtha' yas dang 'jog po'i ngo bor sbrul bsnams pa/ rig sngags kyi rang bzhin rma bya gser
<p>127b.5</p>du snang ba gnyis phyag 'og ma gnyis na bsnams pa'o/ /zhabs g.yas bskum pa g.yon brkyang pa'i zhabs kyis pad+ma dang ka ra ru tra mnan pa'o/ /pad+ma'i steng na nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no/ /yang dag par rdzogs
<p>127b.6</p>pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las spros pas/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di/ dug gi gnyen po klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi bdag po'o/ /dug gi gnyen po'i snying po ni gang zhe na/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags 'di/ gzhan rnams kyis
<p>127b.7</p>kyang mi thub cing / 'byung po rnams kyi yang gnyen po'o/ /sngags kyi tshig 'di lta ste/ tsid tre tsid tra mu le la sogs pa'o/ /rgyal ba rnams gzigs mya ngan 'tshang la gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de yang 'khrungs pa'i
<p>128a</p>
<p>128a.1</p>dus su yang / shing byang chub kyi shing mya ngan 'tshang gi 'og tu'o/ /sems can gyi don la yul ma ga d+hA la rdo rje gdan la bzhugs pa'i dus su/ /byang chub kyi 'og tu'o/ /srod la bdud btul te/ tho rangs sangs rgyas pa'i dus su/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
<p>128a.2</p>'di dran par rnyed pa'o/ /de'i bden pas 'gro ba'i dug dang / bsdad pa'i dug dang / byed pa'i dug nges par bcom mo/ /rgyal ba gtsug tor pad+ma dkar po'i drung / /zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can ni/ byang chub kyi shing pad+ma dkar po'i tshal
<p>128a.3</p>gyi 'og tu 'khrungs te/ de bzhin du rdo rje gdan la bzhugs pa'i dus su/ byang chub kyi shing pad+ma dkar po'i 'og tu srod la bdud btul te/ tho rangs mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de'i dus su rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di yid la byas te/ de'i bden pas
<p>128a.4</p>'gro ba'i dug dang / bsdad pa'i dug dang byed pa'i dug rnams nges par bcom mo/ /thams cad skyob pa sA la'i drung na gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob de yang 'khrungs pa'i dus su yang shing sA la'i 'og tu 'khrungs te/ 
<p>128a.5</p>sems can gyi don la yul ma ga d+hAr/ rdo rje gdan la bzhugs pa'i dus su byang chub kyi shing sA la'i 'og tu srod la bdud btul te/ tho rangs mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dran pa nye bar gzhag nas/ sangs
<p>128a.6</p>rgyas thams cad skyob pas kyang rig sngags [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la rjes su yi rangs shing de'i dus su 'gro ba'i dug dang bsdad pa'i dug dang / byed pa'i dug nges par bcom mo/ /bram ze 'khor ba 'jig ni shiR+Sha'i drung / /zhes bya ba ni yul ma gad+hA'i chu bo gang+gA'i
<p>128a.7</p>lho phyogs kyi 'gram na bram ze mo 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba ni yum yin te/ de'i dus su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi shing shiR+Sha'i 'og tu sku 'khrungs/ rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i dus su yang byang chub kyi shing shiR+Sha'i 'og tu'o/ /sems
<p>128b</p>
<p>128b.1</p>can gyi don du srod la bdud btul te/ tho rangs mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de'i dus su yang skad cig mas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la rjes su yi rangs te/ sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig sems can gyi don la 'gro ba'i dug dang / bsdad pa'i dug dang byed pa'i
<p>128b.2</p>dug nges par bcom mo/ /sangs rgyas gser thub u dum+WA ra'i drung / /zhes bya ba ni yul ma ga d+hA'i drang srong gi rigs su skyes nas/ byang chub kyi shing u du m+WA ra'i 'og tu 'khrungs te/ de bzhin du rdo rje gdan la bzhugs pa'i dus su yang srod la bdud btul zhing tho rangs mngon par
<p>128b.3</p>rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de'i dus su yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la rjes su yi rangs shing bden pa'i tshig gis kyang 'gro ba'i dug dang / bsdad pa'i dug dang byed pa'i dug nges par bcom mo/ /'od srungs n+ya gro d+ha yi drung na gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni yang dag par
<p>128b.4</p>rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs 'khrungs pa'i dus su n+ya gro d+ha'i rtsa bar 'khrungs te/ rdo rje gdan la bzhugs pa'i dus su yang de bzhin no/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di la rjes su yi rangs shing rig pa'i nus pas sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis kyang 'gro ba dang bsdad pa dang / byed pa'i
<p>128b.5</p>dug gsum nges par bcom mo/ /shAkya thub mchog khyad par gnas drung du/ /zhes bya ba ni grong khyer ser skya'i nang na rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras sems can gyi don la dga' ldan nas yum sgyu ma chen mo'i lhums su zhugs nas 'khrungs pa'i dus su byang chub kyi shing drung gi
<p>128b.6</p>'og tu 'khrungs te/ 'khrungs ma thag tu pad+ma bdun skyes so/ /de yang sems can gyi don la gom pa bdun bor te/ chu bo nai rany+dza ra'i drung du dka' thub lo drug mdzad pa'o/ /gnyis pa rdo rje gdan du byang chub kyi shing gnas kyi drung gi 'og tu/ rtswa ku sha'i gdan bting nas srod la bdud
<p>128b.7</p>btul nas tho rangs mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de'i tshe de'i dus su sngon gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag cing chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong nye bar gzhag nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la rjes su yi rangs pa'o/ /gsum pa wA rA Na sIr bden pa bzhi'i chos kyi
<p>129a</p>
<p>129a.1</p>'khor lo bskor ba'o/ /bzhi pa mu stegs rigs gcer bu dang rtsod pa'o/ /lnga pa lha'i yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du byon nas lha rnams dang spyod pa mdzad pa'o/ /drug pa spre'us sbrang rtsi phul ba'o/ /bdun pa sku mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /dang po dga' ldan
<p>129a.2</p>nas byon nas yum sgyu ma lha mdzes kyi lhums su zhugs nas btsas pa ni brgyad pa'o/ /de bas na 'khrungs ma thag tu me tog pad+ma brgyad dang ldan pa'o/ /de'i bden pa dang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ 'gro ba'i dug dang bsdad pa'i dug dang byed pa'i dug gsum bcom
<p>129a.3</p>pa'o/ /phyin nas byang chub mchog thob 'gyur/ /gau ta ma zhes bya ba ni/ dus dang po na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi bstan pa ste/ de'i dus su sa gzhi shel las byas pa 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i tshe tshad kyang stong du gnas so/ /gnyis pa sangs
<p>129a.4</p>rgyas gtsug tor can gyi bstan pa la sa gzhi ni gser las byas pa'o/ /mi'i tshe lo ni lnga brgya thub po/ /dus gsum pa la sangs rgyas thams cad skyob pa'i bstan pa la sa gzhi ni dngul las byas pa ste/ /mi lo ni phyed dang sum brgya thub pa'o/ /dus bzhi pa la sangs
<p>129a.5</p>rgyas log par dad sel gyi bstan pa la/ sa gzhi ni in+d+ra nI la las byas pa'o/ /tshe lo brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/ /dus lnga pa la sangs rgyas gser thub kyi bstan pa la/ smon lam stobs kyis gser gyi sa gzhi/ mi'i tshe lo yang stong tsho gcig go/ /dus drug pa la sangs
<p>129a.6</p>rgyas 'od srungs kyi bstan pa ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyis gzhi/ rin po che sna bdun la longs spyod do/ /mi lo lnga brgya'o/ /dus bdun pa ni tha ma'i dus yin te/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa ste/ sngon gyi dus su sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi bstan pa la/ 
<p>129a.7</p>sangs rgyas nyid la dang po'i smon lam btab pa'o/ /de'i tshe de'i dus su sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi bstan pa la lha dang lha ma yin sde brgyad dang mi la sogs pa'i sems can gyis mchod pa'o/ /de'i dus su yang sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bram ze'i lus su skyes nas ni
<p>129b</p>
<p>129b.1</p>nyi ma'i 'od ces pa'o/ /de'i bu pho zla ba'i 'od du mtshan btags pa'o/ /sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la dad pa skyes nas mchod pa byed du phyin pa lha dang mi la sogs pa mang pos bkag nas ma thar te sangs rgyas zhal yang mthong bar ma thob pa'o/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyis de
<p>129b.2</p>mngon par shes nas sems can gyi don la char drag po 'bebs pa'o/ /sems can thams cad char la gab nas bram ze des sangs rgyas kyi zhal mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas bram ze'i phru gu nyi ma'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas mar me mdzad nags gseb na bzhugs pa la dad pa
<p>129b.3</p>skyes nas mgo bo'i steng du bzhag go/ /de'i tshe de'i dus su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis bskal pa tha ma'i dus su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya seng ger 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /de ltar yang sa gzhi ni sa'i sa gzhi ste/ sems can yang
<p>129b.4</p>bcos dka' ba mtshon sna lnga'i dus/ /chos 'dul ba mngon pa theg pa chen po'i dus/ pha rol tu phyin pa gsang sngags kyis 'dul ba'i dus so/ /mi'i tshe lo yang brgya nyi shu tham pa/ gzugs kyang khru phyed dang bzhi dang ldan pa'o/ /de'i dus su yang dag par rdzogs
<p>129b.5</p>pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa dar zhing / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la sems can thams cad rjes su yi rangs shing gus par bya ste/ de'i nus pas kyang dug thams cad bcom pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag la/ /zhes bya ba
<p>129b.6</p>ni sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dang sel dang / gser thub dang / 'od srungs dang / shAkya thub pa ste/ de'i bden pa dang stobs dang gzi brjid kyis sems can thams cad kyi don byas shing dug bcom mo/ /
<p>129b.7</p>mngon par dad pa'i lha gang 'khod pa dag ces bya ba ni/ de dag gi nus pas kyang lha rnams la sogs pas kyang 'di la dad pa bgyis pa gang yang tshe ring zhing nad thams cad dang bral te/ dug thams cad kyi 'jigs pa las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams de dag yid
<p>130a</p>
<p>130a.1</p>dga' mgur gyur nas zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa dang / rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin la sogs pa bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po rnams kyang mgu bar gyur cing / sems can de la grogs byed par
<p>130a.2</p>'gyur ro/ /rtag tu dge zhing zhi bar 'gyur bar byos/ /zhes bya ba ni thog ma tha ma bar du dge bar gyur cig /da ltar yang dug thams cad 'joms shing rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ngag nas byung ste/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa
<p>130a.3</p>ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ 'du shes kyi phung po me'i khams mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes lce'i skye mched zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dmar mo spyan gsum pa/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ rgyan rnams thams cad sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ na bza' la dug gis brgyan pa/ 
<p>130a.4</p>klu mtha' yas dang 'jog po mnan pa/ de bzhin du pad+ma dang pad+ma chen po phyag gis bzung ba/ nyi ma'i gdan dang 'od dang ldan pa/ cung zad khro ba'o/ /dug bcom pa'i rig sngags gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas spros pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ 'og tu lta ba'o/ /
<p>130a.5</p>rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ i li mi li ki li la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni dge slong sa ri dang sems can thams cad kyi don du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa'o/ /rma bya chen mo 'di dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshangs pa'i
<p>130a.6</p>lha la sogs pa gzugs khams kyi lha rnams so/ /sman ni rig sngags kyi gsang sngags so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab cing brjod du med pa'o/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang dga' ldan dang / 
<p>130a.7</p>'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing / sman chen por gsungs pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang zhes pa ni/ ri bdun gyi lha rnams dang sman chen por byas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bshad pa ste/ 
<p>130b</p>
<p>130b.1</p>zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin chen po seng ge'i ral pa can la sogs pa bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyis yang nas yang du gsungs pa'o/ /gang sman chen po 'di dag gi ming 'dzin pa la dga'
<p>130b.2</p>zhing / rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis 'ongs na zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i bka' las 'das pa/ gang sdug bsngal thams cad thob cing dmyal ba mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i mgo bo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so zhes
<p>130b.3</p>bya ba ni de'i bka' las 'das pa de'i tshe 'di'i mgo bo 'gas te/ lus kyang dum bu dum bur zhig go/ /shi nas kyang skyes ma thag tu dmyal ba mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal thob cing / de'i sdug bsngal las bral nas kyang / dmyal ba pad+ma chen po ltar gas par skye'o/ /
<p>130b.4</p>rig sngags ni gang zhe na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyi bo'i gtsug nas 'phros pa/ sku'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes/ gzugs kyi phung po me'i khams/ mig gi skye mched ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin mtshon bya ni ye shes te/ de yang shes rab kyi rang
<p>130b.5</p>bzhin no/ /mtshon par byed pa ni thabs so/ /de gnyis su med pa'i sku ni zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog dmar ba/ g.yas mthing ga /g.yon ljang gu/ /spyan gsum pa rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ lus thams cad sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ rma bya la zhon pa/ phyag
<p>130b.6</p>g.yas dang po na rdo rje/ 'og ma na rma bya'i sgro bsnams pa'o/ /tha ma na mda' bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon gyi dang po na rin po che/ bar ma na zhags pa/ tha ma na gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /dug gi me tog gi na bza' gsol ba/ zhi ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi
<p>130b.7</p>gsang sngags ni 'di lta ste/ 'og tu blta'o/ /bka' 'di ni kI ra ti mu le la sogs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i dug bcom pa'i gnas skabs te bdun pa'o// //rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog /ces bya ba ni 'gro ba rigs drug la
<p>131a</p>
<p>131a.1</p>lha'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa de yang bde legs su 'gyur te/ de bzhin du mi la sogs pa'i sems can/ rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog /ces bya ba ni dud 'gro la sogs pa'i sems can rnams dang ste/ sdug bsngal ni gcig gis
<p>131a.2</p>gcig za ba'i sdug bsngal rnams te/ de yang zhi bar byas shing yi dgas rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal yang zhi bar byas so/ /lam du zhugs rnams bde legs shog /ces bya ba ni gang zag 'di la gus par byed pa gang dang gang du phyin pa der bde zhing / slar log
<p>131a.3</p>kyang bde ba'o/ /phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog /ces bya ba ni rang gi khyim du slebs nas kyang bde bar gyur cig /lus thams cad kyang nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung la bde legs shing / /khyed cag kun
<p>131a.4</p>du bde legs shog /ces bya ba ni nyal ba'i dus su yang rmi lam dge bar rmi zhing / mi dge ba rnams mi rmi/ de bzhin du nyin mo yang dge ba'i sems su gnas shing / nyon mongs pa rnams mi skye ba'o/ /de bzhin du nyi ma phyed kyang yin no/ /de bzhin du nyin mtshan yang yin
<p>131a.5</p>no/ /de dag sdig par ma gyur cig /ces bya ba ni gang zag 'di la gnas pa ni skye ba bdun du tshe rabs dran zhing / 'di'i nus pas sdig pas mi gos pa'o/ /nyi ma thams cad dge ba yin/ /zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi nus pas mi dge ba las skyes kyang dge bar 'gyur ro/ /
<p>131a.6</p>rgyu skar thams cad bzang po yin/ /zhes bya ba ni mi bzang ba ni skag dang bra nye'o/ /'bring po'i mchu dang snubs so/ /de las skyes pas kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ rgyu skar thams cad bzang po'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul che/ /zhes bya ba ni 'das
<p>131a.7</p>pa dang ma 'ongs pa de ltar yod pa'i gzi brjid kyi stobs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis sems can thams cad bde ba'o/ /yang na nam mkha' bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyis khyab pa'o/ /dgra bcom thams cad zag pa zad/ /ces bya ba ni/ bdud bzhi bcom zhing bag chags kyi sgrib
<p>131b</p>
<p>131b.1</p>pas ma gos pa ste/ de bzhin du nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'o/ /bden pa'i tshig 'dis kun du bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' bden pa dang / rig sngags [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]gzi brjid kyi stobs kyis/ kun nas kun du bde legs su
<p>131b.2</p>'gyur ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis zhes bya ba ni rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dad sel dang / gser thub dang / 'od srungs la sogs pa'i 'das pa'i sangs
<p>131b.3</p>rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams kyis kyang / rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa/ de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa rnams kyang byams pa la sogs pa'o/ /da ltar shAkya thub pas gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /de rnams kyi bka' nas gsungs
<p>131b.4</p>te/ gzi brjid che zhing 'byung po rnams kyi gnyen po'o/ /bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni gang zag gus par byed pa sba ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sdug bsngal thams cad las grol 'dod pas sba ba'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro ba rigs drug gi
<p>131b.5</p>sdug bsngal las skyob pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ mi dge bcu bor nas/ dge bcu 'dzin pa'o/ /yongs su bskyad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ci byas pa rgya cher 'phel ba'o/ /zhi ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ bar chad med cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
<p>131b.6</p>ci byas pa gang yang zhi bar 'gyur zhing bsam pa 'grub pa'o/ /bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshe da ltar yang bde bas te/ de bzhin du phyi ma yang bde ba'o/ /chad pa spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po dang / 'byung po yin te/ de la sogs pa'i
<p>131b.7</p>chad pa thams cad spong ba yin no/ /mtshon cha spong ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dper na g.yul du zhugs pa'i dgra las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug 'thungs pa dang dug zos pa dang / phol mig dang g.yan pa dang me dpal la sogs pa'i dug
<p>132a</p>
<p>132a.1</p>thams cad 'byin pa'o/ /dug gsad pa dang zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'i dug dang bsdad pa'i dug dang byed pa'i dug dang gsum bsal nas phyi nas dug nad mi ldang ba'o/ /mtshams gcad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'dis phyogs mtshams steng 'og thams
<p>132a.2</p>cad rig sngags kyi nus pas 'byung po rnams 'ong mi nus pa'o/ /sa bcing ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni sa g.yo ba'i sdug bsngal yang mi 'byung ste/ gzhan yang ri dang khang pa la sogs pa yang mi rdib pa'o/ /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ tshe thung ba ring
<p>132a.3</p>bar byed cing nad thams cad dang bral nas bde bar gnas pa'o/ /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig ces bya ba ni/ bza' ba dang btung ba phun sum tshogs shing / ma shi'i bar du g.yog dang ldan zhing bu tsha thams cad dang ldan pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni yang
<p>132a.4</p>dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can gyi don la bka' stsal ba'o/ /gnod sbyin gang dag rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin chen po dag dang zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i 'byung po la sogs pa'o/ /gang dag ri'i rgyal
<p>132a.5</p>po ri rab dang zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du rgyal po bzhi la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / mthu chen sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ /gang dag ri'i rgyal po gzhan rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ ri'i rgyal po ma la ya dang / dpal gyi ri dang / ri nag po la sogs pa'o/ /
<p>132a.6</p>yang na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang bcas pa'i gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams so/ /'brog rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ de la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams te/ yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong
<p>132a.7</p>la gnas pa'o/ /'brog chen po dang zhes bya ba ni de bas kyang che bas na chen po ste/ 'byung po rnams kyang de bas kyang che ba'o/ /klung rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ gang+gA dang / sin+d+hu dang / si ta dang / pak+Shu dang / chu bo chen po nai rany+dza ra la sogs pa de lta bu'i chu klung rnams la
<p>132b</p>
<p>132b.1</p>yod pa'i gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams so/ /klu chen po rnams dang zhes bya ba ni phyi'i rgya mtsho chen po ste/ de la gnas pa'i klu dang gnod sbyin dang sa bdag la sogs pa'o/ /sman ljongs rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ rdzing bu rnams yin te de la gnas pa'i 'byung po sa bdag dang
<p>132b.2</p>sa srin la sogs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po la gnas pa'i rdzing bu rnams so/ /sman ljongs chen po rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ de bas kyang che bas na chen po'o/ /'bab chu rnams dang zhes bya ba ni ba lang spyod dang dbyangs ldan dang / sbrang rtsi'i blo gros la sogs pa'i 'bab
<p>132b.3</p>chu la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams so/ /lteng ka rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ chu'i khron pa rnams te de la sogs pa chu mig la gnas pa'i sa srin dang sa bdag 'byung po gnod sbyin rnams gnas pa'o/ /lu ma rnams dang zhes bya ba ni de'i lteng ka na gnas pa'i mtsho chen
<p>132b.4</p>po ste/ de klu las bab pas na lu ma'o/ /de la gnas pa'i 'byung po dang / klu'i rgyal po rnams so/ /ri'i phug rnams dang zhes bya ba ni stong bar du gnas pa'i ri rnams la rgyu ba'i yi dgas rnams so/ /yang na gdong pa lta bar mi nus pa'i 'byung po rnams so/ /dur khrod rnams dang
<p>132b.5</p>zhes bya ba ni dur khrod ni ngang pa dang / rma bya'i sgro dang / gsal shing dang / ro langs dang / mes bsregs pa la sogs pa'o/ /de la gnas pa ni gnod sbyin dang 'byung po la sogs pa'o/ /dur khrod chen po rnams dang zhes bya ba ni bsil ba'i tshal dang / ko la ha ra dang / 'byung po ro
<p>132b.6</p>langs la sogs pa'i dur khrod chen po rnams dang / de bas kyang che zhing 'byung po rnams che ba'o/ /bzhi mdo rnams dang zhes bya ba ni lam gyi rgya gram na gnas pa ste/ de la gnas pa'i 'byung po'o/ /grong rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ de ni chu la gnas pa'i 'byung po
<p>132b.7</p>rnams te/ ma rungs pa thams cad byed pa/ sems can la gnod cing grong la rgyu ba'o/ /grong khyer rnams dang zhes bya ba ni de bas kyang che ba ste/ 'byung po yang de bas che ba'o/ /lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni 'brog gi 'brog gnas te/ de la ba lang gnas
<p>133a</p>
<p>133a.1</p>pa'i gnas so/ /de na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams so/ /skyed mos tshal rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ pho dang mo rgyu ba'i gnas/ de bzhin du 'byung po yang pho mo rgyu ba'i gzugs su byas nas rgyu bar byed pa'o/ /nags rnams dang zhes bya ba
<p>133a.2</p>ni srin po yi dgas rnams rgyu ba ste/ de la gnas pa'i ma rungs pa rnams so/ /nags tshal rnams dang zhes bya ba ni chu'i bar na gnas pa ste/ de'i nang du rgyu ba'i 'byung po rnams te/ yang na rgya mtsho'i bar na gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams so/ /lam rnams dang zhes
<p>133a.3</p>bya ba ni/ 'gro 'dug byed pa la 'tshe bar byed cing ma rungs pa'i 'byung po ste/ de bzhin du rtag tu rgyu ba'o/ /lam gol ba dag na gnas pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ sems can lam log par 'khrid cing lam log par ston pa rnams so/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>133a.4</p>bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la yang nas yang du gsungs pa'o/ /gnod sbyin gang dag lcang lo can gyi 'khor na gnas pa de dag gis kyang zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon rnam thos sras kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag /pho brang de na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin
<p>133a.5</p>'khor bcas rnams so/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni gang zag dad pa skyes pa rnams dang / rig sngags 'di 'chang ba dang / 'chang du yod pa dang / klog pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / sgom pa dang / rgya cher
<p>133a.6</p>spel ba dang / de rnams la sogs pa yang dag par srung bar byed pa'o/ /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di'i nus pas lo brgya lon par gyur kyang / gzhon nu'i tshul du bzhugs shing nad rnams thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /ston brgya mthong bar
<p>133a.7</p>shog shig ces bya ba ni/ dge ba'i dus su dge ba nus shing / de bzhin du za ba dang 'thung ba yang nus pa'o/ /rig sngags 'di yang sems can thams cad la thugs rje che zhing gzugs skur snang ba'o/ /gzugs sku de yang thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa/ zhal
<p>133b</p>
<p>133b.1</p>gsum phyag bzhi pa sku mdog mthing nag tu bzhugs pa/ g.yas dkar ba g.yon dmar ba/ khro mo dbu skra ser po sbrul gyis bcings pa/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan/ spyan gsum pa/ yan lag sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri dang rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon
<p>133b.2</p>sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa dril bu'o/ /g.yas brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum pa/ zhabs kyis gnod sbyin pho mo mnan pa/ pad+ma'i steng du nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags 'di lta ste/ 'byung po rnams kyi snying po
<p>133b.3</p>ni ha re ni la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni shAkya thub pas yang nas yang du gsungs pa'o/ /shar phyogs na dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung dri za thams cad kyi bdag po zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab kyi lcog shar phyogs na yod pa/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ 
<p>133b.4</p>sku mdog dkar po/ /phyag g.yas na 'khor lo bsnams pa/ g.yon pi wang bsnams pa/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams shar phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /'khor
<p>133b.5</p>dri za stong phrag du ma yod pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor gyi mtshan ma ni/ glu len zhing ni bro brdung ste/ /rgyan rnams la yang dga' bar bgyid/ /brkam pa ma mchis mang bar smra/ dgod par bgyid cing khro bar 'gyur/ /skom par 'gyur la mig dmar te/ /rtag tu rims kyis 'debs par
<p>133b.6</p>bgyid/ /mig kyang 'byed par mi bgyid de/ /rgyab kyis phyogs shing nyal bar bgyid/ /'khor 'bum phrag du ma de dag kyang sems can la de bzhin du gnod pa byas shing / rang gi mtshan nyid kyang de bzhin no/ /dri za rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas te zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>133b.7</p>de dang ldan pa dri za rnams la rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dbang du 'dus shing / gzhan sems can rnams la gnod par mi byed pa'o/ /shar phyogs kyi rgyal po'am gdon rnams gnod par 'gyur na/ tshes bcu bzhi'am nya 'am brgyad la sogs pa la me tog gam spos
<p>134a</p>
<p>134a.1</p>sam mar me'am dri'am/ lha bshos sam mchod pa'i rtsas rang gis ci rigs pa bsogs la/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'am/ shar phyogs kyi rgyal po yul 'khor srung la sogs pa/ shar phyogs na gnas pa'i rgyal po dang gdon rnams
<p>134a.2</p>mchod par bgyi'o/ /yang rol mo'i rdzas ni gdugs dang ba dan dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa'i rol mo'i rdzas so/ /gtor ma'i rdzas la ni/ bu ram dang bsres pa'i zho dang / zho zan dang / 'bras kyi chan dang / 'bras las byas pa'i khur ba dang / de la
<p>134a.3</p>sogs pa ci rigs pa bsogs la dri sna tshogs zhim pos mchod cing / me tog dkar po'i phreng ba dang / dog sa la me tog dkar po bkram la/ yang dag par mchod par bgyi'o/ /gang shar phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyob par byed pa de yang zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>134a.4</p>sa dang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa de lta bu'i yul 'khor srung gi rgyal po/ shar phyogs kyi sems can rnams skyong ba'o/ /bu dang bcas zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang 'khor rnams kyi'o/ /tsha bo dang bcas/ spun
<p>134a.5</p>dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ ded dpon dang bcas/ mngag pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas zhes bya ba ni/ de dag rnams kyis sems can gyi don byas shing rgyal po dang / 'khor rnams kyi tsha bo la sogs pa'i
<p>134a.6</p>'bum phrag du mar gnas pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo ni/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog dkar mo/ phyag g.yas na ral gri'o/ /g.yon sdigs mdzub
<p>134a.7</p>dang rma bya'i sgro bsnams pa'o/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad rin po ches brgyan pa/ lo bcu gnyis ma'i cha byad can/ zhi bar bzhugs shing pad+ma'i steng na zla ba'i gdan/ 'od kyang de bzhin te/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin can/ 
<p>134b</p>
<p>134b.1</p>mtshon byed ni shes rab ste/ mtshon pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bdag nyid do/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi gzugs kyi phung po sa'i khams mig gi skye mched do/ /de lta bu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gang zag bdag gis 'chang bar 'gyur na/ yang dag par srung zhing sdug
<p>134b.2</p>bsngal thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa rnams kyis glags tshol ba la sba ba'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ nad thams cad dang ma rungs pa rnams kyis bzung ba las bskyab pa'o/ /yongs su gzung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig
<p>134b.3</p>pa'i sems can rnams kyis gzung bar 'dod pa/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis bzung nas glags mi rnyed pa'o/ /yongs su bskyang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis gang gi 'jigs pa dang sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral zhing 'jigs pa thams cad dang
<p>134b.4</p>bral ba ste/ rgya chen bskyang bas na yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni zhi ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba ste/ de nye bar bzhag pas na bde ba'o/ /bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni bde ba phun sum tshogs shing sdug bsngal
<p>134b.5</p>thams cad dang bral zhing nam skyes pa'i dus su yang bde ba'o/ /chad pa spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i gdon gyis chad pa gcod par 'dod pa la/ de'i gzi brjid kyis spang ba'o/ /mtshon cha spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan rnams kyis mtshon btab nas/ mi bde
<p>134b.6</p>ba dang mi phog pa'i phyir na spang ba'o/ /dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ mdze dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa dang / wa ba dang / sha bkra dang / me dbal la sogs pa mdze rigs bco brgyad sel ba'o/ /dug gsad pa dang zhes bya ba ni de rnams mi ldang bar bya ba'i
<p>134b.7</p>phyir na gsad pa'o/ /mtshams gcad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags mi rnyed de/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags gar bzhag pa'i sar/ 'byung po rnams kyis 'ong mi nus pa'o/ /sa bcing ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni rig sngags kyis sa
<p>135a</p>
<p>135a.1</p>la reg nas sa bcing bar gyur na rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang ldan pa'o/ /lo brgya mtsho bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ nad thams cad dang bral zhing bde bar gnas pa'o/ /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig ces bya ba ni/ phun sum tshogs shing bde bar gnas pa'o/ /
<p>135a.2</p>tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste 'og tu blta'o/ /dri za'i snying po rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ su ru su ru su ru la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni dge slong sa ri dang sems can rnams la bka' stsal pa'o/ /lho phyogs na grul bum gyi rgyal po 'phags
<p>135a.3</p>skyes po zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab kyi lho phyogs na gnas pa 'jig rten lho phyogs skyong ba/ sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa/ sa dang po thob pa/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing ga /g.yas dbyug to/ /g.yon rin po che bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis
<p>135a.4</p>brgyan pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ bzhin mi sdug pa/ khro bor gnas pa'o/ /grul bum thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor grul bum stong phrag du ma yod pa zhes bya ba ni/ grul bum yi dgas kyi gdon rnams kyi bdag po ste/ de bzhin du ma mo rnams kyang yin no/ /
<p>135a.5</p>de rnams kyis btab pa'i mtshan ma ni/ shin tu skom gyis 'debs par 'gyur/ /g.yeng bas btab cing lta bar 'gyur/ /bzhin yang dmar por gda' bar 'gyur/ bskums nas sa la nyal bar 'gyur/ /kha dog ngan cing lus kyang skem/ /skra dang sen mo ring ba ste/ /
<p>135a.6</p>dri ma can la dri mi bda'/ /brdzun dang kyal ka smra bar bgyid/ /grum bum gyi gdon 'bum phrag du ma gnas pa ni/ sems can rnams la gnod par bgyid cing rgyal po'i 'khor du gnas pa'o/ /grul bum rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ grul bum gyi
<p>135a.7</p>gdon de rnams dbang du sdud cing / sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o/ /de rnams kyi mchod pa'i rdzas ni gong dang mthun no/ /tshes grangs yang gong dang mthun no/ /gtor ma'i rdzas la khrag gam chang ngam sha'am nya'am sgog pa'am la phug gam/ sran chan nam
<p>135b</p>
<p>135b.1</p>khur ba'am bu ram gyi thug pa'am/ khrag gi gtor ma me tog ser po'i phreng ba dang / dog sa la me tog bkram la/ lho phyogs na gnas pa'i rgyal po rnams mchod par bya'o/ /gang lho phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed cing zhes bya ba ni/ grul bum gyi rgyal po
<p>135b.2</p>'phags skyes po ri rab kyi lho phyogs yongs su srung zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la srung bar byed pa'o/ /de yang bu dang bcas/ tsha bo dang bcas/ spun dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ ded dpon dang bcas/ mngag pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/ g.yog dang
<p>135b.3</p>bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / 'khor 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas/ de rnams kyi bu dang tsha bo la sogs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo ni thabs
<p>135b.4</p>shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /ye shes mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa tshor ba'i phung po'o/ /rin chen gyi rigs chu'i khams sna'i skye mched ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog ser po/ phyag g.yas na ral gri /g.yon na rma bya'i sgro bsnams pa'o/ /sangs
<p>135b.5</p>rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ rgyan thams cad rin po ches brgyan pa'o/ /spyan gsum pa zhabs phyed krung du bzhugs pa/ nyi ma'i gdan dang 'od dang ldan pa/ de'i 'og tu pad+ma'i gdan la khro mor bzhugs pa'o/ /gang zag gang zhig 'di la gus par gyur na/ rgyal po bzhi dang 'khor
<p>135b.6</p>rnams kyis kyang de la srung zhing skyob par byed do/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /tar+ya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste 'og tu bltas te/ 'og tu lta ba ni gang zhe na/ grul bum gyi gdon gyi snying po rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ be lu ke
<p>135b.7</p>la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa'o/ /nub phyogs na klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab kyi rtse mo'i nub phyogs kyi lcog la bzhugs te/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten skyong ba/ klu rnams
<p>136a</p>
<p>136a.1</p>kyi bdag po sa dang po thob pa/ byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa rnams so/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog dmar ba/ g.yas na sbrul gyi zhags pa/ g.yon na pad+ma bsnams pa/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ 
<p>136a.2</p>cung zad khro bor bzhugs so/ /klu thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor 'bum phrag du ma yod pa zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po spyan mi bzang yang klu dang sa srin sa bdag rnams yin te/ de rnams kyis btab pa'i mtshan ma ni/ skyigs bus btab cing dbugs kyang 'byin/ /de bzhin dbugs
<p>136a.3</p>kyang grang bar 'gyur/ /rdul zhing kha chu dbu bar 'byung / /phyi phyir gnyid kyis log par 'gyur/ /kha dog ldan zhing dpa' ba ste/ /de bzhin 'dar zhing rgyug par 'gyur/ /sen mo dag kyang ston par 'gyur/ /dog sar mchis shing ngu bar byed/ /de bzhin du sems can rnams
<p>136a.4</p>la mtshan ma btab nas/ rang gi mtshan ma yang de dang 'dra ba'o/ /klu rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas te/ de rnams dbang du 'dus shing 'jig rten nub phyogs song ba de rnams mchod pa'i rdzas gong dang mthun te/ tshes grangs kyang gong dang mthun no/ /gtor ma'i rdzas ni mngar
<p>136a.5</p>gsum dang dkar gsum 'o thug dang gro chan dang gro'i khur ba 'o ma las byas pa'i gtor ma me tog dmar po'i phreng ba me tog sil ma dog sa la bkram la/ klu sman la sogs pas mchod par bya'o/ /gang nub phyogs skyong zhing yongs su srung bar byed pa de yang zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>136a.6</p>rgyal po spyan mi bzang des kyang ri rab kyi nub phyogs na yongs su skyong zhing sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o/ /bu dang bcas pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang gi bu la sogs pa dang / 'khor rnams kyi bu la sogs pa'o/ /rig sngags
<p>136a.7</p>kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog dmar mo/ phyag g.yas na ral gri/ /g.yon rma bya'i sgro bsnams pa'o/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum
<p>136b</p>
<p>136b.1</p>pa/ rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes/ pad+ma'i rigs 'du shes kyi phung po/ /me'i khams/ lce'i skye mched/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin/ mtshon byed ni thabs/ mtshon bya ni shes rab/ de gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin no/ /de lta bu'i lha mo la
<p>136b.2</p>gus par gyur na/ gang zag de la srung bar byed cing sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sba ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ 'og tu blta'o/ /gang blta zhe na/ klu rnams kyi snying po rig
<p>136b.3</p>sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ be du ri be du ri zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /byang phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu zhes bya ba ni/ byang phyogs kyi rgyal po lus ngan po yin te/ ri rab kyi rtse
<p>136b.4</p>mo'i byang phyogs kyi lcog la bzhugs te/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams skyong ba'o/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog ljang gu/ phyag g.yas na ral gri/ /g.yon na ne'u le'i rkyal pa bsnams pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad rin po ches brgyan pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs
<p>136b.5</p>pa'o/ /gsus pa che zhing stong chung ba khro bor bzhugs pa'o/ /gnod sbyin thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma yod pa zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po lus ngan po gnod sbyin thams cad kyi ded dpon gyi 'khor rnams so/ /'khor de dag gis btab pa'i mtshan
<p>136b.6</p>ma ni/ phyi phyir ldog cing 'jigs par 'gyur/ /smra bar 'gyur zhing khro bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gnyid kyang log par 'gyur/ /yang na shin tu khro bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu gyen du lta bar 'gyur/ /skar ma dag la snyegs par bgyid/ /nub mo shin tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /rtag
<p>136b.7</p>tu 'dar zhing sgra yang 'byin/ /gnod sbyin gyi rang bzhin yang de bzhin no/ /gnod sbyin rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas te zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma gnas pa rnams la mnga' mdzad/ byang phyogs skyong ba'o/ /gang byang phyogs srung zhing yongs su
<p>137a</p>
<p>137a.1</p>skyong bar byed pa de yang zhes bya ba ni/ sa dang po thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams byang phyogs skyong bar byed pa/ sems can rnams la gnod par mi byed pa'o/ /bu dang bcas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rgyal po lus ngan po bu la sogs pa dang / 
<p>137a.2</p>'khor rnams kyi bu la sogs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di yang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog ljang gu phyag g.yas na ral gri/ g.yon na rma bya'i sgro bsnams pa'o/ /
<p>137a.3</p>las kyi rigs bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes/ 'du byed kyi phung po rlung gi khams yid kyi skye mched ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa rgyan thams cad rin po ches brgyan pa/ nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa/ de'i 'og na pad+ma'o/ /zhabs
<p>137a.4</p>phyed krung du bzhugs pa/ /khro bor bzhugs pa'o/ /gang zag 'di la dad par gyur na/ srung bar 'gyur zhing ma shi bar bde bar gnas pa'o/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin no/ /tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ gang lta zhe na 'og tu blta ba ni gnod
<p>137a.5</p>sbyin gyi snying po rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ sau ri sau ri la sogs pa'o/ /shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung / /zhes bya ba ni 'bum phrag du ma dri za dang bcas shing / shar phyogs skyong ba'o/ /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>137a.6</p>grul bum gyi 'khor 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas shing / lho phyogs srung ba'o/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang / /zhes bya ba ni klu'i 'khor rnams 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas shing / nub phyogs skyong ba'o/ /byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/ /zhes bya ba ni
<p>137a.7</p>gnod sbyin gyi 'khor 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas nas byang phyogs srung ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la gus par byed cing srung ba btags na/ rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas nas srung ba dang sba ba la sogs pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /
<p>137b</p>
<p>137b.1</p>rgyal po chen po 'di bzhi dag//ces bya ba ni 'khor rgyal po chen po bzhis byas shing / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gtso bor byas pa'o/ /dog sa sa gzhi bzang po la/ /me long dbyibs bzhin mkhas pas byas/ /de steng tshon lngas bri ba la/ /mdzes par byas
<p>137b.2</p>nas yang dag bri/ /gru bzhi sgo bzhi twa ran bzhi/ /dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma la/ /rig sngags rgyal mo yang dag bzhugs/ /sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab bzhi la/ /rgyal po bzhi yang bzhugs pa'o/ /de bzhin gser gyi pad+ma la/ /mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi yang dgod/ /sgo bzhi dang
<p>137b.3</p>ni zur rnams la/ /phyogs skyong bcu yang dgod par bya/ /rdo rje ra ba'i phyi rim la/ /rgyal chen bzhi yi 'khor rnams dgod/ /de bzhin 'byung po la sogs dang / /mkhas pas yang dag bri bar bya/ /rgyal po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi bya thabs so/ /de nas bum pa'i bya thabs ni/ /
<p>137b.4</p>mtshan ma legs pa mgrin pa ring / /nag po ra ri spangs pa dang / /mchu 'phyang lto ba che ba dang / /dar ram ras sam gang yang rung / /mgrin pa yangs par bcing bar bya/ /rin chen lnga dang 'bru lnga dang / /sman lnga dri lnga snying po lnga/ /chu gtsang gis ni legs par dgang / /gdugs
<p>137b.5</p>dang ba dan rgyal mtshan dang / /lo ma lnga dang ldan pa dang / /bkra shis brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ /de rnams kyis ni brgyan nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su yang dag gzhag /snying po'am nye ba'i snying po'am/ /de'i sngags kyis bum pa lhag par byed pa'i cho ga byas la/ 
<p>137b.6</p>dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor bskyed pa yang phyis bshad pa bzhin du bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi'i 'khor gyis/ nad kyis btab pa de sngar bshad pa'i snying po'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du srung ba byas na/ rgyal po chen po bzhis
<p>137b.7</p>kyang 'jig rten skyong zhing nad pa yang skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan/ /zhes bya ba ni gling bzhi'i ri rab dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na grags pa'o/ /phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar byed/ /ces bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
<p>138a</p>
<p>138a.1</p>rgyas rnams kyi chos skyong ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po thob nas sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'o/ /sde bo che la stobs po che/ /zhes bya ba ni dri za dang grul bum dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / de rnams kyi ded dpon te/ de rnams la che bar mdzad cing 'jig
<p>138a.2</p>rten la grags pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /pha rol dgra rnams rab tu 'joms/ /zhes bya ba ni lha dang lha ma yin gyi yul la pha rol 'dul ba'o/ /gzhan gyis mi thub thub par dka'/ /zhes bya ba ni gzhan 'jig rten gyi lha rnams kyis mi thub pa stobs che ba dang ldan pa'o/ /
<p>138a.3</p>rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /zhes bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams skad cig mas khyab cing sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'o/ /de bzhin du/ kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan/ /zhes bya ba ni so so rang gi kha dog dang ldan zhing / de bzhin grags
<p>138a.4</p>pa yang yin no/ /rdzu 'phrul che zhing lha min dang / /lha yi yul yang myong bar byed/ /ces bya ba ni lha dang lha ma yin gyi spyod pa la yang rtsod par nus shing / pha rol gyi dgra rnams 'dul ba'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig
<p>138a.5</p>ces bya ba ni rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor bcas dang / gang zag bdag la srung bar byed pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di/ mtshon bya ni shes rab ste mtshon byed ni thabs so/ /rgyal mo bdag nyid do/ /rin po che'i rigs mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/ tshor ba'i phung
<p>138a.6</p>po chu'i khams/ sna'i skye mched ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid/ zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ sku mdog ser mo/ g.yas mthing ga /g.yon dmar ba zhal dang po sgeg pa/ g.yas khro ba/ g.yon 'dzum pa/ zhal re re la spyan gsum dang ldan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan/ dbu
<p>138a.7</p>la rin po che'i rdo rjes brgyan pa/ rgyan thams cad rin po ches brgyan pa'o/ /phyag g.yas dang po ral gri/ /'og ma na rdo rje rin po che/ g.yon dang po 'khor lo/ 'og ma na rma bya'i sgro tha ma gnyis na mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o/ /zhabs rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa/ sna tshogs
<p>138b</p>
<p>138b.1</p>pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i gdan/ nyi ma bdun dang ldan pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ bcu drug lon pa'i cha byad can thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa gang zag dag gis gus par byed pa'o/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sdug bsngal thams cad sba ba'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya
<p>138b.2</p>ba ni/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bskyab pa'o/ /yongs su gzung ba dang zhes bya ba ni mi dge bcu spangs nas dge ba bcu la gzung pa'o/ /yongs su bskyang ba dang zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa bcom nas yon tan skyong ba'o/ /zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes
<p>138b.3</p>bya ba ni/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar 'gyur te/ yang dag pa'i don thob nas mtho ris kyi ngo bo nyid thob pa'o/ /chad pa spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni bdud bzhi rnams kyi chad pa spangs nas ye shes shar ba'o/ /mtshon cha spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mtshon cha
<p>138b.4</p>spang ba'o/ /dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug lnga shar ba la des bsil bar byed pa'o/ /dug gsang ba dang zhes bya ba ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyis dug lnga gsad pa'o/ /mtshams gcad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig pa'i ngo bo bsad nas/ ye shes kyi ngo bo
<p>138b.5</p>la 'jug pa'o/ /sa bcing ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dge ba la 'jug pa'o/ /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di'i gzi brjid kyis nad med cing shi ba'i dus kyis mi gos ba'o/ /ston brgya mthong bar
<p>138b.6</p>shog shig ces bya ba ni/ ye shes des sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'o/ /tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste gang lta zhe na rig sngags kyi gsang sngags bsam gyis mi khyab pa blta'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ e le me le la sogs pa'o/ /rig sngags
<p>138b.7</p>kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i rgyal po bzhi'i cho ga'i gnas skabs te brgyad pa'o// //kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas kun dga' bo la yang nas yang du bka' stsal pa'o/ /khyod kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi ming
<p>139a</p>
<p>139a.1</p>zung shig ces bya ba ni/ lus ngan po'i bu bzhi po'i ming brjod cing / sems can rnams la yang dag par bsrung ste/ 'di'i nus pas gnod sbyin chen po de rnams kyis kyang gang dang gang du srung bar byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni 'og tu blta'o/ /'og tu gang
<p>139a.2</p>blta zhe na/ gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po lnga po blta ba'o/ /lus ngan gyi ni bu thu bo/ /zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po lus ngan pa'i bu chen po lnga po de dag ste/ gzi brjid che zhing stobs dang ldan/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha min gyi g.yul yang
<p>139a.3</p>bkye ba'o/ /kun du rgyal ba mi la zhon/ /phrugs su ldan na gnas pa ste/ /lha yi bden pa gsol ba'o/ /zhes bya ba ni de'i kha dog ni dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / nag po dang / de rnams ni zhal re re phyag gnyis gnyis so/ /phyag g.yas
<p>139a.4</p>rnams na 'khor lo dang mdung dang dgra sta dang / rtse gcig dang lcags kyu bsnams pa'o/ /phyag g.yon pa rnams na rin po che'i myu gu bsnams pa/ gnod sbyin de rnams ni sems can gyi don mdzad cing / srog chags rnams la gnod pa mi byed pa'o/ /kun du rgyal ba dang / 
<p>139a.5</p>mi la zhon pa gnyis ni shar dang lho skyong ba'o/ /phrugs su ldan na gnas pa ste/ /lcang lo can gyi pho brang na gnas pa lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi bka' las mi 'da' ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa srung ba/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di/ 
<p>139a.6</p>rjes su dran zhing rig sngags la gus par byas pa'o/ /kun du rgyal dang mi la zhon gnyis kyis kyang nub phyogs dang byang phyogs skyong ba'o/ /sor mo lnga pas ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi pho brang skyong ba'o/ /des kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung
<p>139a.7</p>ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ srung ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / klog pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / rgya cher spel ba dang / gus par byas nas 'chang ba dang / bsgom pa dang / tshig gcig kyang 'don par gyur na/ tshe 'dir yang gnod sbyin de rnams kyis srung bar 'gyur
<p>139b</p>
<p>139b.1</p>ro/ /tshe phyi ma la yang srung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di'i gnyen po'i rig sngags ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog ljang gu las kyi rigs bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes 'du byed kyi phung po rlung gi khams lus kyi skye mched/ ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid spyan gsum pa cung zad khro ba rigs lnga'i dbu
<p>139b.2</p>rgyan can yan lag thams cad sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ g.yas na sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa/ g.yon pa na rma bya'i sgro bsnams pa'o/ /rma bya la zhon pa'o/ /de lta bu'i rig sngags la gang zag gis gus par byas na gnod sbyin de rnams kyis kyang skyong ba'o/ /sba ba la sogs pa
<p>139b.3</p>zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags gnod sbyin gyi snying po ni/ ba le la sogs pa'o/ /skya snar bu na 'khor ba 'jig /ces bya ba ni gnas ni skya snar bu/ gnod sbyin ni 'khor ba 'jig go/ /de yang
<p>139b.4</p>'dzam bu'i gling gi lho phyogs na gnas so/ /phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dkar po g.yas 'khor lo/ g.yon sdigs mdzub bo/ gzhan gyis mi thub dka' ba na/ /zhes bya ba ni yul ni rgya gar gyi nub phyogs yin te/ gnod sbyin gzhan gyis mi thub pa ni zhal gcig
<p>139b.5</p>phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog ser po/ g.yas ral gri g.yon thod pa'o/ /grong khyer bzang na gnod sbyin brag /ces bya ba ni de ni gnas yin te/ gnod sbyin gyi sku mdog ni mthing nag /g.yas g.yon gnyis ni gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /shed kyi bu ni
<p>139b.6</p>byang phyogs na/ /zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi byang phyogs na sgra mi snyan na gnas pa stobs dang ldan pa/ gzi brjid che ba'o/ /de'i kha dog ni/ gser dang 'dra ba/ g.yas na dbyug to g.yon na pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje rgyal po'i khab/ /ces bya ba ni rgya gar gyi yul
<p>139b.7</p>grong khyer dbus na rgyal po'i khab kyi lho phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /sku mdog mthing ga /g.yas rdo rje g.yon sdigs mdzub bo/ /bya rgod phung por gnas bcas pa/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje ni/ pho brang bya rgod phung por byas nas khams gsum du skad
<p>140a</p>
<p>140a.1</p>cig mas rgyu ba'o/ /rgya mtsho'i mtha' yi bar gyi sar/ /lan gsum bar du 'gro byed pa/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya mtsho dang bya rgod phung po gnyis la/ lan gsum gsum rgyu ba'o/ /skad cig mas 'dzam bu'i gling bar nas rgyu ba'o/ /stobs che zhing ni gzi
<p>140a.2</p>brjid che/ /dpag tshad bcur na rnam par gnon/ /zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi stobs dang 'gran par mi nus pa/ gzi brjid kyang de bzhin no/ /lus kyi tshad ni dpag tshad bcur sprul pa'o/ /gnod sbyin mkha' lding rgyas pa na/ /zhes bya ba ni rgyu ba ni nam mkha' la rgyu ba ste/ gnas pa
<p>140a.3</p>ni ma la ya'i rtse mo na'o/ /gzugs bya dang 'dra ba lus ser po gshog pa nag po/ /mjug ma yang nag po/ /mchu sngon po ring ba/ lag pa dang rkang pa sder mo ring ba mig ser ba/ g.yas g.yon gnyis na sbrul za ba'o/ /skad cig mas dpag tshad lnga brgyar 'phur nus pa'o/ /
<p>140a.4</p>sna tshogs sbed pa gnas sgo na/ /zhes bya ba ni de yang 'dzam bu gling gi lho phyogs na gnas sgo zhes bya ba'i yul na'o/ /gnod sbyin de'i sku mdog ni/ shin tu dmar ba/ khro ba'i tshul du yod pa/ phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis na mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin pa ku la'i
<p>140a.5</p>rgyal khab na/ /zhes bya ba ni gnas ni rgyal po'i khab kyi dbus na'o/ /sku mdog ni ljang gu'o/ /bzhin mi sdug pa/ gzugs thung ba/ phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis na nor gyi rkyal ba 'dzin pa'o/ /sde bo che la stobs po che/ /zhes bya ba ni ba ku la ni 'khor mang po yod pa/ gzi
<p>140a.6</p>brjid dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa'o/ /gnod sbyin nag po nye nag po/ /ser skya yi ni gnas na gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni chu bo gang+ga'i 'gram shar phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin nag po nye nag po/ /de bas kyang nag pas nye nag po/ /gnod sbyin de gnyis kyang
<p>140a.7</p>phyag gnyis gnyis/ g.yas pa na rin po che 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon ne'u le'i rkyal pa bsnams pa'o/ /thub pa chen po shAkya'i tog /sangs rgyas thub pa gar bltams par/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya gar yul gyi dbus chu bo gang+ga'i lho phyogs na/ der sangs rgyas gnas pa'o/ /phyag gnyis
<p>140b</p>
<p>140b.1</p>sku mdog gser gyi mdog can rab tu byung ba'i gzugs su bzhugs pa'o/ /rkang bkra bo ni dgra can la/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya gar gyi yul dbus/ lho nub [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]mtshams na'o/ /gnod sbyin de'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ sku mdog mthing ga /g.yas g.yon gnyis rtse
<p>140b.2</p>gcig dang / dung bsnams pa'o/ /tsi ra ta na dbang phyug che/ /zhes bya ba ni 'dzam bu gling gi nub phyogs na gnas te/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog sngo skya phyag g.yas pa gnyis na phreng ba dang bum pa/ g.yon pa gnyis na tri shU la dang a 'bras bsnams pa'o/ /spyan
<p>140b.3</p>gsum pa ral pa'i thor tshugs can no/ /mnyan yod na ni phur bu'o/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya gar yul gyi dbus kyi grong khyer na/ rgyal bu mgon med mdun na'o/ /gnod sbyin phur bu ni/ sku mdog dkar po/ /g.yas g.yon gnyis na mda' gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /gnas
<p>140b.4</p>bcas na ni rgya mtsho gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin rgya mtsho ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis te/ sku mdog dkar po sbrul gyi zhags pa'i 'dzin pa'o/ /yangs pa can na rdo rje mtshon/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya gar yul gyi dbus kyi grong khyer na gnas pa'o/ /sku mdog ser po rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /
<p>140b.5</p>spre'u ltar dmar ser gyed yul na/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya gar gyi phyogs ngos na yin te/ gnod sbyin de ni sku mdog dmar po/ phyag na gtun shing 'dzin pa'o/ /wA rA Na sIr nag po che/ /zhes bya ba ni de yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus chu bo gang+ga'i 'gram na'o/ /gnod sbyin nag po chen
<p>140b.6</p>po ni zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ sku mdog mthing nag spyan gsum pa'o/ /g.yas pa gsum na ral gri gri gug rtse gsum mo/ /g.yon pa gsum na tsan+dan gyi be con dang thod pa zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /blta na sdug pa tsam pa na zhes bya ba na ni/ rgya gar yul shar phyogs na shin
<p>140b.7</p>tu byad mtshar ba gnod sbyin blta na sdug gi gnas so/ /sku mdog dkar po phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin khyab 'jug sgo can na/ /zhes bya ba ni phyi'i rgya mtsho'i 'gram mo/ /sku mdog ljang nag phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa gnyis na/ 'khor lo dang / a 'bras/ g.yon pa
<p>141a</p>
<p>141a.1</p>gnyis dbyug to dang / dung bsnams pa'o/ /'dzin pa po ni sgo drung na/ /zhes bya ba ni de yang rgya mtsho'i 'gram na yin te/ sku mdog ser po phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis na/ ut+pa la'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /'jigs byed zangs kyi 'dab ma can/ /zhes bya ba ni lho nub kyi
<p>141a.2</p>mtshams rgya mtsho'i 'gram na'o/ /sku mdog dmar skya g.yas ral gri/g.yon sdigs mdzub bo/ /brang gis 'gro na 'joms pa po/ /zhes bya ba yin te/ rgya gar gyi byang ngos na'o/ /gnod sbyin dmar skya phyag na rtse gsum bsnams pa'o/ /'brog na gnod sbyin 'brog
<p>141a.3</p>gnas po/ /zhes bya ba ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi thang stong rnams la gnas pa/ sku mdog nag po phyag g.yas na ral gri/ g.yon na zhags pa'o/ /ser skya bo ni 'bru mangs na/ /zhes bya ba ni de yang rgya gar yul gyi dbus su/ gnod sbyin mdog ser skya/ phyag na dbyug to bsnams
<p>141a.4</p>pa'o/ /'phags rgyal na ni nor srung ba/ /zhes bya ba ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su'o/ /gnod sbyin sku mdog ser po phyag drug pa g.yas pa gsum ni phyag 'tshal ba dang / nor gyi snye ma dang / mchod sbyin no/ /g.yon pa gsum na po ti dang / 'bras kyi snye ma dang bum
<p>141a.5</p>pa'o/ /srung byed na ni nor 'byor pa/ /zhes bya ba ni yul de'i lho phyogs na'o/ /gnod sbyin sku mdog ser po g.yas na rin po che'i bum pa bsnams pa/ /g.yon na gser gyi bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /gso ba'i mtha' na gso ba pa/ /zhes bya ba ni nub kyi phyogs na gnas
<p>141a.6</p>te/ gnod sbyin gso ba po ni/ sku mdog ljang gu phyag na ne'u le bsnams pa'o/ /dga' bo nye dga' grong khyer gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni yul dbus na'o/ /de gnyis kyang sku mdog ser po/ sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /phreng ba 'dzin pa khyu mchog na/ /zhes bya ba ni
<p>141a.7</p>de yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus na gnas te/ gnod sbyin gyi kha dog ni dmar po phyag na gser gyi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /kun dga' 'chi med sa zhag na/ /zhes bya ba ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi shar phyogs na'o/ /sku mdog ser po phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /mche ba dkar ba
<p>141b</p>
<p>141b.1</p>dngos bzang na/ /zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi shar phyogs na gnod sbyin mche ba can gnas te/ sku mdog dkar po/ phyag g.yas na 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /me brtan pa ni gzi can na/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya mtsho'i bar na gnas pa ste/ gnod sbyin gyi kha dog ni mthing nag
<p>141b.2</p>tu yod pa/ phyag na lcags kyu bsnams pa'o/ /rin chen ri ldan grong khyer na/ /zhes bya ba ni ri bo chen po'i bar na grong khyer blta na sdug gi dbus na/ rnam par rgyal ba'i gzhal yas khang gi srung ma'o/ /gnod sbyin de ni stobs dang ldan pa/ gzi brjid che ba'o/ /de'i sku
<p>141b.3</p>mdog dang phyag mtshan ni sku mdog nag po/ g.yas na gri gug g.yon na thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /nor gyi bu ni phyogs mtshams gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin rnam thos kyi bu yin te ri rab kyi phyogs mtshams na gnas pa'o/ /sku mdog ser po/ g.yas na rin
<p>141b.4</p>po che'i myu gu/ g.yon na bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /smin drug bu ni gzhon nu zhes/ /'jig rten grags pa skye yod na/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin de ni sku mdog dmar po'o/ /g.yas na rtse gcig /g.yon phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /de'i 'og ma'i gnod sbyin ni thal ba'i
<p>141b.5</p>mdog can lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /'od ma'i 'gram na lag brgya pa/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gdan gyi lho phyogs nags gseb na'o/ /gnod sbyin shin tu 'jigs pa sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag na dgra sta ba bsnams pa'o/ /ka ling+ka na shing rta che/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya gar
<p>141b.6</p>yul gyi lho phyogs so/ /gnod sbyin de'i sku mdog ni dkar po phyag na rtse gsum bsnams pa'o/ /thul bar dka' ni 'gro 'joms na/ /zhes bya ba ni de yang dbus kyi nub phyogs su'o/ /kha dog ser po phyag na bum pa dang bil ba bsnams pa'o/ /srid sgrub nags na srid
<p>141b.7</p>sgrub pa/ /zhes bya ba ni dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi nags na'o/ /gnod sbyin de'i sku mdog ni sngo skya phyag na dbyug to bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin 'joms pa 'dun khang na/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya gar yul gyi byang shar mtshams na gnas so/ /gnod sbyin gyi sku mdog ni ser
<p>142a</p>
<p>142a.1</p>skya ste/ gser gyi rgyal bu 'dzin pa'o/ /phreng ba srung na ri brtsegs pa/ /zhes bya ba ni gser gyi ri rab kyi steng gi byang phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin mdog ser po lag na phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /rta dmar na ni bzang po pa/ /zhes bya ba ni de yang dar
<p>142a.2</p>cig gi yul yin te/ gnod sbyin sku mdog dmar po phyag na lcags kyu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /ma rdzogs pa ni thams cad bzang / /zhes bya ba ni yul de yang rgya nag po'i byang phyogs na mi nyag ces bya'o/ /de na gnod sbyin de gnas te/ /gnod sbyin de'i sku mdog
<p>142a.3</p>phyag mtshan ni g.yas na 'bras kyi snye ma 'dzin pa/ g.yon na nor kyi rkyal pa 'dzin pa'o/ /snyems pa can na skyong ba po/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya nag po'i shar phyogs na gnas te/ de yang khri stan gyi yul na'o/ /de na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin gyi phyag mtshan ni/ g.yas na ral gri
<p>142a.4</p>'dzin pa/ g.yon na nor gyi bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /ded dpon nor gyi dbang phyug go/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon ni rnam thos sras yin te/ /nor gyi dbang gis rnam thos kyi yang ded dpon no/ /ma rgyal rgyal na mche ba gtsigs/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya nag po'i
<p>142a.5</p>yul na gnas pa ste/ de ni rgya nag po'i srung mar 'gyur zhing khrims rnams gnod sbyin des byas pa'o/ /de'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ g.yas dbyug to g.yon na zhags pa'o/ /kha dog ni dmar nag go/ /gnas bcas na ni nor bzang po/ /zhes bya ba ni de yang
<p>142a.6</p>lcang lo can gyi gnas na gnas la/ gnod sbyin de'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ /sku mdog dkar po g.yas na rin po che'i snod/ g.yon na gser gyi myu gu'o/ /zhi ba zhi ba'i grong len na/ /zhes bya ba ni de ni bal yul gyi gnas yin no/ /gnod sbyin ni zhal bzhi pa/ phyag
<p>142a.7</p>brgyad pa sku mdog dkar po dang sngo skya dang ljang gu dang mthing nag tu gnas pa'o/ /phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis na phreng ba dang skyabs sbyin/ yang g.yas g.yon gnyis na rtse gsum dang phreng ba/ de'i 'og gnyis na 'khor lo dang dbyug to'o/ /tha ma gnyis na rtse gsum dang
<p>142b</p>
