<p>142b.1</p>thod pa'o/ /zhi ba bzang po 'jigs byed na/ /zhes bya ba ni mtsho ma dros kyi byang ngos na'o/ /gangs kyi ri na yod pa ste/ gnod sbyin de ni yab yum du bcas pa sku mdog ser po/ /g.yas kyi phyag na tri shU la/ g.yon na phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ /yum gyi phyag na ut+pa la
<p>142b.2</p>bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin dbang po dbang grong na/ /zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi rtse mo pho brang blta na sdug pa na'o/ /gnod sbyin de ni rdo rje 'dzin pa/ sku mdog ser po'o/ /me tog tog ni rdo grong na/ /zhes bya ba ni de ni dpal gyi ri na gnas te/ gnod sbyin de ni gzi brjid che zhing
<p>142b.3</p>stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /phyag g.yas na phreng ba 'dzin pa/ g.yon na bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /kha dog dkar po'o/ /shing pa shing gi grong khyer na/ /zhes bya ba ni de yang ri ma la yan yod pa ste/ de ni tsan+dan shing gi bsung ba'o/ /gnod sbyin de'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ 
<p>142b.4</p>mdog sngo bsangs su yod pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri yod pa/ g.yon na phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ /kha dog can ni ser skyar gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni yul bod yul na bzhugs te/ bod yul dbus na'o/ /gnod sbyin de ni g.yas na 'khor lo/ g.yon na gshol mda'
<p>142b.5</p>'dzin pa'o/ /sku mdog ljang gur gnas pa'o/ /nor bu bzang dang gang ba bzang / /zhes bya ba ni rnam thos sras kyi 'khor pho brang lcang lo can na gnas pa'o/ /de gnyis kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni kha dog gser po dang / dkar po'o/ /g.yas rnams na rin po che'i myu
<p>142b.6</p>gu dang nor gyis gang ba'i bum pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na nor gyi rkyal pa dang 'bru sna tshogs kyis gang ba'i bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /sbu na gnyis tshangs pa ldan pa'o/ /zhes bya ba ni nor bu bzang dang gang ba bzang gnyis te/ gzi brjid che zhing nor phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /ba
<p>142b.7</p>lang 'dzin na 'joms pa po/ /zhes bya ba ni gnas bal yul gyi byang ngos yin te/ gnod sbyin de ni shin tu khro zhing gdug pha'o/ /phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis na tri shU la dang dgra sta 'dzin pa/ kha dog nag po'o/ /rab tu 'joms pa rdo 'jog na/ /zhes bya ba ni
<p>143a</p>
<p>143a.1</p>de'i lho phyogs na yod de/ shin tu stobs che zhing sems can rnams la gnod pa byed pa'o/ /de'i kha dog ni ljang gur yod pa/ bzhin mi sdug pa/ g.yas ral gri g.yon zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin chen po bod srung sel/ /zhes bya ba ni bod
<p>143a.2</p>yul du gnas te/ gnod sbyin de yang srung ma la dga' zhing gnas pa g.yas na dgra sta g.yon na zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /kha dog thal ba'i mdog can no/ /skyugs pa yi ni ri la gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi lho phyogs na gnas pa stobs po che la gzi brjid ldan de'i kha
<p>143a.3</p>dog phyag mtshan ni/ kha dog dmar po gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /gsum sbas 'gram pa ldan dogs na/ /zhes bya ba ni lang+ka'i lho phyogs na rgya mtsho'i 'gram na'o/ /gnod sbyin de ni gdong dmar po spre'u'i gzugs su yod pa'o/ /g.yas pa khu tshur g.yon sdigs mdzub
<p>143a.4</p>bo/ /ho nu na ni 'od byed pa/ /zhes bya ba ni lang+ka'i nub phyogs na rgya mtsho'i bar na'o/ /gnod sbyin mdog ser po/ g.yas na a so ka'i shing thogs pa/ g.yon na zhags pa thogs pa'o/ /dga' ba can dang 'phel byed pa/ /zhes bya ba ni yul ma ga d+hA'i lho nub mtshams na
<p>143a.5</p>gnas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin de ni rdo rje 'dzin cing kha dog mthing gar gnas pa'o/ /dga' ba 'phel byed grong khyer na/ /zhes bya ba ni de'i shar phyogs na gnod sbyin zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas na nor gyi rkyal bu bsnams pa g.yon na sbrul gyi zhags pa/ kha dog
<p>143a.6</p>ljang gu'o/ /rlung gi sa na rlung ldan pa/ /zhes bya ba ni 'dzam bu gling gi chu klung gang na yod pa'i sa na yod de/ skad cig mas khyab cing chu klung gang na yod par mnga' mdzad pa/ de'i sku mdog phyag mtshan ni/ phyag g.yas na dbyug to 'dzin pa/ g.yon sdigs mdzub po/ /
<p>143a.7</p>kha dog khra bor yod pa/ smad sbrul du yod pa'o/ /'phyang bar gyur na 'thab dga' ba/ /zhes bya ba ni de yang rgya nag po'i nub phyogs na grong khyer rtsod ka na'o/ /gnod sbyin zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dmar po g.yas na ral gri g.yon zhags pa bsnams
<p>143b</p>
<p>143b.1</p>pa'o/ /'og ma gnyis na mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o/ /gnod sbyin des skad cig mas khyab nas/ rtsod pa'i sems dang ldan par byed pa'o/ /bcom brlag na ni bong bu ba/ /zhes bya ba ni yul lang+ka ni rgya mtsho'i 'gram na yod pa/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i tshul can sems can la
<p>143b.2</p>gnod cing sha khrag za ba/ de'i kha dog ni dmar nag go/ /phyag na sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /lang+ka na ni bum pa'i lto/ /zhes bya ba ni 'dzam bu gling gi lho nub mtshams yin te/ gzugs ni dpag tshad bcu yod pa/ shin tu gnag la 'jigs pa lang+ka'i bdag po'i
<p>143b.3</p>nu bo/ /phyag brgyad yod pa g.yas na ral gri /bar pa gnyis 'khor lo dang shak+ti /tha ma na mda'/ g.yon dang po na zhags pa 'phang mdung dgra sta rtse gsum mo/ /gnod sbyin de ni stobs che ba ri rab tsam sgul ba'o/ /gnod sbyin nyi 'od rab nyams na/ /zhes bya ba
<p>143b.4</p>ni nam mkha' la rgyu ba nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams khyab pa gzi brjid che ba/ de'i kha dog ni dmar po/ phyag g.yas g.yon na dung dang pad+ma dmar po bsnams pa'o/ /skad cig mas 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu ba'o/ /ko sa la ni ri mgo bo/ /zhes bya ba
<p>143b.5</p>ni yul ma ga d+hA'i lho phyogs na gnod sbyin stobs ldan yod de/ 'od nyi ma shar ba dang 'dra ba/ shin tu dmar ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba'o/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas 'khor lo g.yon zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /rnam par rgyal dang rnam
<p>143b.6</p>rgyal ldan/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin de yang pham par mi 'gyur zhing / gzhan rnams kyi sa mi thub pa'o/ /dkar po bcom brlag yul na gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin de ni spun lnga gnas te/ dpag tshad ring dang 'jigs pa dang rna ba can dang gzugs can dang bum sna lo/ 
<p>143b.7</p>de rnams kyi kha dog ni dkar po dang / nag po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu'o/ /phyag mtshan ni 'khor lo dang / dbyug to dang / mda' gzhu dang / 'phang mdung dang / mdung rings rnams so/ /gnod sbyin gang ba ma la yar/ /zhes bya ba ni ma ga d+hA'i
<p>144a</p>
<p>144a.1</p>lho phyogs rgya mtsho'i 'gram na ri bo ma la ya na de'i mnga' bdag tu mdzad pa kha dog dkar po/ /phyag na tsan+dan gyi be con 'dzin pa'o/ /ti se gangs na mi 'am ci/ /zhes bya ba ni mda' stod na gnas te gnod sbyin rta mgo can gnas pa/ kha dog dmar po dbyug to
<p>144a.2</p>'dzin pa'o/ /sprin gyi phreng can pon+t+ra na/ /zhes bya ba ni li yul na gnas pa ste/ gnod sbyin sprin gyi mgo can/ phyag na nyi ma dang zla ba bsnams pa'o/ /rab tu gnas na dum bu pa/ /zhes bya ba ni de yang u rgyan na gnas pa ste/ gnod sbyin de'i kha dog ni dkar po phyag g.yas g.yon
<p>144a.3</p>gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /pi tang+ka l+yar yang dag byed/ /ces bya ba ni bod yul dbus chu shar nas nub tu 'bab pa'i sa na gnas te/ gnod sbyin de ni kha dog dmar nag /lag pa gnyis na tsan+dan gyi be con 'dzin pa'o/ /de'i sa phyogs kyi srung mar grags pa'o/ /
<p>144a.4</p>rlabs dang ldan na bde byed pa/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin de sems can rnams kyis bsgrubs par gyur na/ mthu dang ldan zhing dngos grub ster ba'o/ /sna nas byung na gnod sbyin mdzes/ /zhes bya ba ni bod yul dbus chu shar phyogs su 'bab pa'i sa/ chu klung byang nas lhor
<p>144a.5</p>'bab pa de'i mdo na gnas pa'o/ /skad cig mas 'jig rten khams rgyu nus pa/ dang po shar phyogs nas byung nas/ /rab tu byung ba'i tshul du gnas pa/ de ni sems can rnams la gnod pa drag po byed pa ste/ gnas de'i srung mar gnas pa'o/ /gso ba'i mtha' na
<p>144a.6</p>ma chags pa/ /zhes bya ba ni de'i byang ngos na gnod sbyin kha dog dkar po can yod de/ de yang sa bdag gi tshul du yod pa/ de bas kyang skad cig mas 'jig rten khams rgyu nus pa/ kha dog dkar po sbrul zhags 'dzin pa'o/ /dga' byed de ni pha dga' ba/ /zhes bya ba ni de ni
<p>144a.7</p>khams kyi yul na gnas te/ de yang pha spad du yod pa/ sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa/ de grub par gyur na phyug por 'gyur ro/ /de gnyis kyi kha dog ni nag po dang ser po gnyis kas nor gyi rkyal pa bsnams pa'o/ /dpa' dang gser gyi lag pa dang / /zhes bya ba
<p>144b</p>
<p>144b.1</p>ni rgya gar gyi yul lho phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /shin tu stobs dang ldan pa/ gzhan rnams kyis mi thub/ gser gyi mdog can gser gyi bum pa gang ba bsnams pa'o/ /ka ling+ka na lto 'phyang po/ /zhes bya ba ni de yang rgya gar yul gyi dbus kyi lho phyogs na gnod sbyin kha dog nag po phyag na
<p>144b.2</p>'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /ko sa la na nag po che/ /zhes bya ba ni yul ma ga d+hA na yin te/ gnod sbyin nag po chen po yin te de yang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog nag po g.yas gri gug g.yon thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /dge ba dge ba'i pho brang na/ /zhes bya ba ni de yang rgya gar gyi
<p>144b.3</p>dbus na'o/ /gnod sbyin dge ba ni sems can rnams la gnod pa mi byed sdig pa mi byed cing dge ba la gnas pa'o/ /de ni dge ba'i sems kyis me tog gi snod 'dzin pa kha dog dkar po'o/ /wA rA Na sIr skyong ba po/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya gar yul gyi dbus wA rA Na sI na gnod sbyin kha dog dmar
<p>144b.4</p>po dbyug to dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /'gram ldan phung por rna ba bzang / /zhes bya ba ni bod yul rtsad na gnas pa ste/ gnod sbyin de yang rna ba che ba bum lto kha dog nag pa/ g.yas na nor gyi bum pa/ g.yon na ne'u le'i rkyal pa bsnams pa'o/ /grong khyer drug na nor gzhan po/ /zhes bya
<p>144b.5</p>ba ni grong khyer yangs pa can dang ka ling+ka dang / rgyal po'i khab dang / mnyan yod dang / wA rA Na sI dang / tsam pa ka dang drug la skad cig mas rgyu ba'o/ /shin tu stobs dang ldan zhing yul de'i srung mar gyur pa/ kha dog gser gyi kha dog can g.yas na rin po che'i myu gu /g.yon na bum pa
<p>144b.6</p>bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin stobs can mtha' ma na/ /zhes bya ba ni de yang bal yul gyi mtha' khob na gnas te/ /sems can la gnod pa byed pa kha dog nag po sbrul gyi zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /srung ba can na mthong dga' ba/ /zhes bya ba ni 'brog gnas thang stong rnams la gnas te/ sems can
<p>144b.7</p>la dga' bar byed pa'o/ /kha dog sngo bsangs su yod pa/ /phyag na bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /ba lang 'joms na gtsug phud can/ /zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi nub phyogs kyi gling na gnas pa'o/ /kha dog dmar po pad+ma dang nor gyi rkyal pa 'dzin pa'o/ /phyogs mtshams na ni thal mo dga'/ /
<p>145a</p>
<p>145a.1</p>zhes bya ba ni gling bar bzhin gnas pa ste/ gnod sbyin de yang skad cig mas rgyu zhing gling rnams khyab pa'o/ /de ni mdog nag pa 'khor lo mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /gdugs 'dra na ni dkris pa po/ /zhes bya ba ni de yang yul dbus na'o/ /gnod sbyin kha dog
<p>145a.2</p>dkar po phyag na gdugs bsnams pa'o/ /grong khyer gsum na chu srin 'dul/ /zhes bya ba ni yangs pa can dang / mnyan yod dang rgyal po'i khab dang gsum mo/ /de la res rgyu zhing stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /zhal gsum phyag drug pa sku mdog nag po/ g.yas pa rnams na gri
<p>145a.3</p>gug dang ral gri rtse gsum mo/ /g.yon rnams na thod pa zhags pa dgra sta'o/ /de gsum ni grong khyer gyi srung ma'o/ /tshang tshing gcig na mig yangs pa/ /zhes bya ba ni bal yul gyi mthil na gnas pa ste gnod sbyin mig gcig tu gnas pa sa bdag gi rigs kha dog nag po
<p>145a.4</p>zhags pa nag po dang sbrul zhags bsnams pa'o/ /u rum+WA rar sgo nga'i 'od/ /ces bya ba ni rgya gar shar phyogs na'o/ /gnod sbyin de ni mdog dkar po me tog pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /kau shA m+bI na lhun gyis grub/ /ces bya ba ni grong khyer chen po lho phyogs na gnod sbyin kha dog ser
<p>145a.5</p>po phyag g.yas na shing thog g.yon ne'u le bsnams pa'o/ /rnam par snang byed zhing ldan na/ /zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs kyi gling na gnas pa gnod sbyin de mdog dkar po 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /sbrul kyi gdugs na dga' ba po/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya gar yul gyi nub ngos na
<p>145a.6</p>sbrul yul na gnod sbyin de yang sbrul gyi gdong pa can yul de'i khrims mdzad pa'o/ /g.yo ba 'dzin na ser skya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni yul de'i lho ngos na gnod sbyin kha dog ser skya gnas pa'o/ /de'i phyag na bum pa dang sbrul zhags bsnams pa'o/ /gyen du 'gro na ba ku la/ /
<p>145a.7</p>zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs ko la ha ri'i dur khrod na/ gnod sbyin ba ku la ni sku mdog shin tu 'jigs pa'o/ /gnas der mtshan mo 'gror mi btub/ phyag bzhi pa g.yas g.yon gnyis ni mi'i pags pa 'phyar ba'o/ /de'i 'og gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa bsnams
<p>145b</p>
<p>145b.1</p>pa'o/ /gang po snying po thob byed na/ /zhes bya ba ni dur khrod de'i phyogs na keng rus bya ba'i dur khrod do/ /gnod sbyin ha la ha la zhes pa gnas so/ /de'i sku mdog mthing ga /be con dang thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /grong rdal tshol ba rnga mong na/ /zhes bya ba ni stag gzig gi yul yin te/ gnod
<p>145b.2</p>sbyin rnga mo'i mgo can/ mdog ljang gu dgra sta dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /glang chen brjod pa 'dul ba mchog /ces bya ba ni rgya gar yul gyi shar phyogs b+hang ga la na/ glang chen gyi mgo can gnod sbyin kha dog dkar po/ dgra sta dang phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /chu lha'i yul na
<p>145b.3</p>gzhu brtan po/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas pa ste/ gnod sbyin de ni kha dog dkar zhing dung bsnams pa'o/ /g.yul 'gyed ldan pa grong khyer rgyal/ /zhes bya ba ni ma ga d+hA'i grong khyer so mtshams na/ gnod sbyin de yang gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ stobs dang ldan pa/ kha dog
<p>145b.4</p>dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas g.yon mtshon sna tshogs bsnams pa'o/ /sgra ngan zhing na gnod sbyin rgyal/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya gar gyi yul nub phyogs na gnod sbyin len pa/ de la byin par gyur pa na/ nyung bar byin yang 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i kha dog ni shin tu dkar ba gser
<p>145b.5</p>gyi snod 'dzin pa'o/ /gnyi dang rgyal ngan rgyal gnyi na/ /zhes bya ba ni de'i byang phyogs na yod de gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon du grags pa/ de'i kha dog ni nag mo/ g.yas na rin po che g.yon na nor gyi rkyal bu'o/ /gnod sbyin mor grags de nyid na/ /zhes bya ba ni de gnod sbyin mo spun bzhi gnas te/ chen
<p>145b.6</p>mo ni bal yul na gnas la 'bring mo gnyis ni mang yul dang 'gram na gnas te/ chud thag ni bod yul dbus na gnas so/ /de rnams kyi kha dog ni nag mo/ ser mo dmar mo/ ljang gu'o/ /de rnams kyi phyag mtshan ni/ gri gug dang / thod pa dang / dgra sta dang / rtse gsum mo/ /
<p>145b.7</p>g.yon pa rnams na kha T+wA ga bsnams pa'o/ /gtum chen gser gyi 'og pag can/ /zhes bya ba ni spun de bzhi ka yang khro mor gnas pa/ gser gyi 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /gnod par byed dang don grub dang / /zhes bya ba ni gtsang gi yul na gnas te de ni spun gnyis yin te gnod pa
<p>146a</p>
<p>146a.1</p>dang phan pa byed pa kha dog ni dkar po dang / nag po phyag g.yas na gri gug dang thod pa/ g.yon dbyug to bsnams pa'o/ /'byung bar byed pa nags na gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya mtsho'i 'gram zangs gling gi nags gseb na'o/ /kha dog nag po phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams
<p>146a.2</p>pa'o/ /'gro ba drug pa 'gro 'joms na/ /zhes bya ba ni ma ga d+hA'i yul gnod sbyin rkang drug pa yod pa/ de'i kha dog ni dmar po g.yas na 'khor lo g.yon zhags pa'o/ /ka ba na ni ka ba nyid/ /ces bya ba ni de'i byang phyogs na gzugs che la nag pa dgra sta dang thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /
<p>146a.3</p>seng ge'i stobs na gnod sbyin gang / /zhes bya ba ni phyi'i rgya mtsho'i tshal na/ seng ge'i yul na gnod sbyin seng ge'i gdong can gnas pa/ phyag bzhi pa sku mdog dkar po/ g.yas gnyis na 'khor lo dang a 'bras 'dzin pa/ g.yon gnyis dbyug to dang dung bsnams pa'o/ /seng
<p>146a.4</p>ge stag stobs med byed gnyis/ /zhes bya ba ni seng ge'i gling dpag tshad lnga brgya'i lho phyogs na/ stag gdong can gyi gling na gnod sbyin stag ces bya ba/ gnod sbyin thams cad stag gi gdong pa can/ phyag bzhi bzhi/ g.yas pa rnams ni dbyug to dang lcags kyu/ g.yon
<p>146a.5</p>gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /bye ba 'bab na sde bo che/ /zhes bya ba ni de'i byang phyogs dpag tshad lnga brgya na/ khyi ling zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi gdong can gnas pa'o/ /de'i mdog nag pa phyag na dgra sta bsnams pa'o/ /de bzhin gzhan gyi grong las
<p>146a.6</p>rgyal/ /zhes bya ba ni 'dzam bu gling na 'khor zhing rgya gar dbus su gnas pa kha dog dmar po phyag na gtun shing bsnams pa'o/ /me tog so ni tsam pa na/ /zhes bya ba ni de yang rgya gar yul gyi shar phyogs na/ gnod sbyin kha dog dkar po phyag na dgra sta bsnams pa'o/ /
<p>146a.7</p>mnyam dga' ba ni ri mangs na/ /zhes bya ba ni ri nag po dang ma la ya dang dpal gyi ri dang bya rgod phung po'i ri la sogs pa skad cig mas rgyu zhing ri'i rtse mo rnams la 'dug pa/ stobs dang ldan zhing gzi brjid che ba'o/ /nam mkha'i mdog can phyag na zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /
<p>146b</p>
<p>146b.1</p>ba lang sbyor na gnod sbyin ri/ /zhes bya ba ni nub phyogs ba lang spyod kyi ri mtshams na/ gnod sbyin kha dog nag pa/ yul de'i srung mar gyur pa/ g.yas g.yon gnyis na bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /grong khyer na ni sde bzang po/ /zhes bya ba ni ma ga d+hA'i grong khyer yangs pa can na/ 
<p>146b.2</p>'khor g.yog mang po yod pa/ stobs dang ldan pa/ kha dog ser ba/ g.yas na rin po che bsnams pa/ g.yon bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /gnas dang bcas na lag pa dpa'/ /zhes bya ba ni chu bo gang+gA'i 'gram shar phyogs na ri bo la gnas pa/ wa kim zhes bya bar
<p>146b.3</p>grags pa'o/ /de'i srung mar gyur cing stobs dang ldan pa/ kha dog dmar po phyag na dbyug to bsnams pa'o/ /kha la sbyin na bde byed pa/ /zhes bya ba ni chu bo gang+gA'i 'gram na/ mo 'ge ri zhes bya ba'i yul na/ gnod sbyin mdog nag la be con 'dzin pa'o/ /kau shAm+bIn tshegs med
<p>146b.4</p>pa/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya gar yul gyi so mtshams na/ gnod sbyin kha dog ljang nag go/ /g.yas na tri shU la g.yon kha T+wAM ga bsnams pa'o/ /bzang po can na bzang po pa/ /zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi byang phyogs sgra mi snyan na/ gnod sbyin kha dog ser po g.yas ral gri g.yon
<p>146b.5</p>bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /skya snar can gyi bu na ni/ /gnod sbyin 'byung po'i gdong zhes bya/ /zhes bya ba ni 'dzam bu gling gi dbus na me tog gi ra ba na/ gnod sbyin me tog can yod pa'o/ /sku mdog ser po phyag na ut+pa la sngon po bsnams pa'o/ /mching bu na ni mya ngan med/ /ces bya
<p>146b.6</p>ba ni de'i shar phyogs na me tog a sho ka'i ra ba la gnod sbyin kha dog nag po/ phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /ma la gnas na sha thang ba/ /zhes bya ba ni he ma la ya'i lho phyogs tsan+dan gyi nags gseb na sku mdog dmar skyar gnas pa/ phyag na rtse gcig pa bsnams pa'o/ /tshang tshing gcig
<p>146b.7</p>na don grub pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bal yul gyi lho phyogs ko ba ya ga na/ gnod sbyin glang po che'i mgo can phyag bzhi pa sku mdog dkar po/ g.yas gnyis na dgra sta dang zhags pa/ g.yon gnyis na tri shU la dang lcags kyu'o/ /ma rgyal rgyal na dman pa po/ /zhes bya ba ni dur
<p>147a</p>
<p>147a.1</p>khrod d+he'u ta ko tra na/ gnod sbyin sku mdog dmar po sha khrag la dga' zhing thod pa bsnams pa ste/ 'jig rten mkha' 'gro rnams kyi srung ma'o/ /chu mchog na ni muny+dza'i skra/ /zhes bya ba ni lang+ka'i phyogs na spre'u rnams kyi grong khyer na gnod sbyin stobs ldan gnas pa'o/ /
<p>147a.2</p>de'i sku mdog phyag mtshan ni/ a sho ka'i shing bsnams pa/ kha dog dmar po'o/ /sen da pa na nor bu'i gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya gar yul gyi u traN+Da pu ri na/ gnod sbyin bai DUr+ya'i mdog can/ phyag na nor bu bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin mi bzad 'gro ldan dag /ces bya ba ni
<p>147a.3</p>rgya gar yul gyi lho nub mtshams na gnas te/ gnod sbyin de yang mche ba gtsigs pa/ 'jigs su rung ba/ sku mdog dmar nag /g.yas na dbyug to g.yon zhags pa'o/ /ser skya yi ni gnas na gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni de'i lho phyogs kyi gnas na gnod sbyin ser skya'i mdog can/ 
<p>147a.4</p>g.yas g.yon gnyis na nor gyi rkyal pa bsnams pa'o/ /ba lang 'dzin dang gzhan brnyas dang / /zhes bya ba ni gang+gA'i chu 'gram na/ gnod sbyin ba lang mgo can/ mdog nag po phyag g.yas na dgra sta/ g.yon sdigs mdzub bsnams pa'o/ /sgo ba gnas can rtag pa dang / /zhes bya ba
<p>147a.5</p>ni phyi'i rgya mtsho'i 'gram na khyab 'jug gi yul na gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon kha dog thal ba'i mdog can/ g.yas na be con/ g.yon 'bras kyi snye ma bsnams pa'o/ /dbu ma pa yi gnod sbyin dag /ces bya ba ni 'dzam bu gling gi dbus na gnas pa/ sems can rnams la gnod pa mi
<p>147a.6</p>byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dga' ba/ gnod sbyin blta na sdug pa kha dog gser gyi mdog can rtag tu mchod byed rnams la'o/ /grags pa chen po bzang mdzes na/ /zhes bya ba ni ri bo rtse lnga na 'jam dpal gyi spyan snga na/ gnod sbyin nyi ma grags pa de'i kha dog ser po/ 
<p>147a.7</p>phyag na dbyug to mig can 'dzin pa/ 'jam dpal gyi srung ma'o/ /grong khyer snying por dgras dogs pa/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya gar yul gyi shar phyogs na gnas te/ gnod sbyin bai DUr+ya'i mgo can/ phyag gnyis na me tog ku mu ta 'dzin pa'o/ /mya ngan sa na rmongs byed pa/ /
<p>147b</p>
<p>147b.1</p>zhes bya ba ni rgya gar yul gyi ba len+d+ra na gnas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin de ni mdog sngo skya rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /khyus 'gro na ni gnod sbyin grags/ /zhes bya ba ni 'gro la dga' zhing skad cig mas khyab pa'o/ /de bzhin du gnod sbyin bsam gyis mi khyab pa gnas pa/ sku mdog sna
<p>147b.2</p>tshogs can/ mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa'o/ /ma rungs pa yang de bzhin te/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin de yang snga ma bshad pa bzhin no/ /nga rgyal bral dang lha rtse ba/ /zhes bya ba ni 'dzam bu'i gling na rgyu zhing / sems can rnams la nga rgyal byed pa de nyid kyi kha dog ni ser po dang ljang
<p>147b.3</p>gu'o/ /phyag mtshan ni rin po che dang ral gri'o/ /'jigs sbyin na ni yid 'jigs pa/ /zhes bya ba ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi zur gyi lho phyogs na/ gnod sbyin chen po stobs ldan pa de'i kha dog ni nag po ste/ ma rig pa'i dbang gis gnod sbyin gyi kha ni srid pa tsam yod pa de ni srin
<p>147b.4</p>po las kyi gshin rje zhes bya'o/ /kha che'i yul na 'od byed pa/ /zhes bya ba ni de ni gnod sbyin dbyangs ldan te/ de'i sku mdog ni gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ spyan gsum pa phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa gnyis na po ti dang mchod sbyin/ g.yon pa gnyis na phreng ba dang bum pa spyi blugs so/ /
<p>147b.5</p>blo dman pa rnams stod par byed pa'o/ /gtum po ral pa can grong na/ /zhes bya ba ni phyi'i rgya mtsho'i 'gram na lang+ka mgrin bcu'i srung ma ral pa can zhes bya ba/ sku mdog mthing nag /zhal gsum phyag brgyad pa g.yas rnams na ral gri gri gug /dgra sta rtse gsum mo/ /g.yon
<p>147b.6</p>rnams na sdigs mdzub thod pa/ zhags pa lcags kyu'o/ /skad cig mas dpag tshad lnga brgya tsam rgyu ba'o/ /kha che'i yul gyi so mtshams na/ /zhes bya ba ni mnga' ris dang kha che'i yul gnyis kyi mtshams na'o/ /gnod sbyin dbang chen dbyangs ldan pa de'i sku mdog ni dmar ser/ 
<p>147b.7</p>phyag g.yas na po ti/ g.yon phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ /lngas rtse na zhes ni bya ba gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya dang / de'i yab ni pany+dzi ka'o/ /'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya ni dga' ba la sogs pa'o/ /de la bu ni lnga brgya ste/ /zhes bya ba ni kha dog sna tshogs su gnas
<p>148a</p>
<p>148a.1</p>pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa'o/ /sde bo che la stobs po che/ /zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis mi thub gzi brjid ldan/ 'khor g.yog mang po dang ldan pa'o/ /lngas rtsen gyi ni bu thu bo/ /zhes bya ba ni bu chen po de ni rgya nag na gnas pa/ rgya nag po'i pho brang na
<p>148a.2</p>gnas pa/ srung ma der mdzad pa'o/ /sku mdog ser po/ g.yas na rin po che'i myu gu 'dzin pa/ g.yon na bum pa gang ba bsnams pa'o/ /rgya yul gyi ni sa la gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin chen po de ni rgya nag po'i yul na gnas pa'o/ /phrag pa'i mig ces bya ba ni/ mdzod
<p>148a.3</p>ldan na ni spun dang bcas/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya mtsho'i dbus na gnas pa spun gnyis sa bdag gi tshul du gnas pa'o/ /de gnyis kha dog ni nag po dang dmar po ste/ de gnyis kyi g.yas na 'khor lo dang / dbyug to/ g.yon na sbrul zhags bsnams pa'o/ /ka ling+ka na mche ba rkang / /
<p>148a.4</p>zhes bya ba ni phyi'i rgya mtsho'i 'gram lho phyogs na pho brang gser yul gyi dbus na/ 'jigs su rung ba'i gnod sbyin dmar skya'o/ /g.yas na ral gri g.yon na mi mgo bsnams pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor stan na dkyil 'khor ro/ /zhes bya ba ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus na gnod
<p>148a.5</p>sbyin dkyil 'khor can gnas pa/ de yang sku mdog dkar po g.yas g.yon gnyis na pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /ga bu sha na lang+ka'i bdag /ces bya ba ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi lho nub mtshams na gnas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin de ni mgrin pa bcu pa/ zhal gcig ni rta mchog gi dbu lta
<p>148a.6</p>bu'o/ /phyag brgyad pa sku mdog mthing ga /g.yas rnams na ral gri mda' 'khor lo/ g.yon na zhags pa gzhu/ tha ma gnyis na pi wang bsgyur ba'o/ /'od can dga' ba'i tshang tshing na/ /zhes bya ba ni bal yul gyi lho phyogs na ko ri na ya ka'i shar phyogs kyi nags dun gnod sbyin ma
<p>148a.7</p>sku mdog dkar mo/ g.yas na ut+pa la g.yon na nor gyi rkyal bu bsnams pa'o/ /nam mkha' srung na chos skyong ba/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya gar yul gyi lho phyogs gser yul na phyi'i rgya mtsho'i 'gram na gnas pa/ g.yas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti/ g.yon na me tog pad+ma
<p>148b</p>
<p>148b.1</p>bsnams pa'o/ /lag pa chen po ngan pa na/ /zhes bya ba ni de'i byang phyogs na gnod sbyin kha dog dmar po g.yas pad+ma dmar po g.yon bum pa gang ba bsnams pa'o/ /rnam thos bu yi bu dpal ldan/ /rgyal ba khyu mchog rgyal po'i bu/ /zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi
<p>148b.2</p>rgyal po byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams skyong ba sems can rnams kyi don byed pa pho brang lcang lo can la mnga' mdzad pa/ phyag gnyis pa sku mdog gser gyi mdog can/ g.yas na rin po che sna bdun gyi myu gu /g.yon na bum pa nor gyis gang ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyi khri la bzhugs pa'o/ /
<p>148b.3</p>gnod sbyin bye bas yongs bskor zhing / /tho gar gyi ni yul na gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni lcang lo can gyi pho brang na dpal ldan rnam thos sras ni gnod sbyin gyi rigs mi gcig pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing / nam mkha' la nyi zla skar mas bskor ba bzhin du'o/ /'gror bcas ri dang
<p>148b.4</p>gangs can dag /ces bya ba ni yul wA rA Na sI'i nub phyogs na/ chu bo gang+gA dang sin+d+hu gnyis 'dus pa'i sa na gnod sbyin chen po de gnas so/ /de'i kha dog ni sngo skya zhal gcig phyag drug pa g.yas g.yon gnyis thal mo sbyar ba/ de'i 'og gnyis na rtse gsum dang mchod sbyin g.yon gnyis na phreng ba dang bum pa spyi
<p>148b.5</p>blugs bsnams pa'o/ /spyan gsum pa glang la zhon pa'o/ /sin+d+hu yi ni rgya mtshor gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs kyi phyi'i rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas pa gnod sbyin de'i kha dog ni dkar po sbrul gyi zhags pa dang rin po che'i myu gu bsnams pa'o/ /grong khyer gsum na rtse gsum lag /ces bya
<p>148b.6</p>ba ni sa 'og sa steng sa bla gsum na gnas pa gnod sbyin legs ldan thal ba'i mdog can phyag g.yas na rtse gsum g.yon phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ /ka ling+ka na rab 'joms pa/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya gar dbus na gnod sbyin kha dog nag po gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /tshigs
<p>148b.7</p>lnga ser po 'gro lding na/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gdan gyi lho phyogs na gnod sbyin sku mdog ser po phyag na bum pa gser gyis bkang ba bsnams pa'o/ /sing ha la na nor gyi bdag /ces bya ba ni sing ga'i gshol mda'i yul phyi'i rgya mtsho'i tshal na gnod sbyin de gnas pa kha dog gur
<p>149a</p>
<p>149a.1</p>gum gyi mdog can/ phyag g.yas na rin po che'i snod dang / gser gyi rkyal bu bsnams pa'o/ /ne tso'i bzhin ni 'brog na ste/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gdan gyi nags tshal chen po na gnod sbyin kha dog dmar nag phyag na ral gri zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /'gro'am ma ci ni 'og na
<p>149a.2</p>gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni gnas ni sa 'og /'gro'am ci ni ming / kha dog ni sngo bsangs phyag g.yas na sbrul zhags g.yon dung bsnams pa'o/ /smad sbrul lo/ /pad+ma dkar po'i 'od gsal ba/ /zhes bya ba ni de ni gzugs khams na gnas pa ste/ de'i kha dog ni dkar po/ 
<p>149a.3</p>g.yas na phreng ba/ g.yon na bum pa spyi blugs bsnams pa'o/ /grong khyer che na brtse ba can/ /zhes bya ba ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas na gnod sbyin chen po gnas pa'o/ /kha dog ser po/ g.yas na skyabs sbyin g.yon na rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /'jigs pa sbyin na rab 'jigs
<p>149a.4</p>pa/ /zhes bya ba ni lho nub kyi mtshams phyi'i rgya mtsho'i 'gram lang+ka pu ri na gnod sbyin thal ba'i mdog can g.yas ral gri g.yon zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /chu dang ldan na dmar ser gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni ma dros kyi mtsho 'gram na gnod sbyin chen po gnas pa ni sku mdog
<p>149a.5</p>dkar po phyag na sbrul gyi zhags pa dang pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /bad+bad bskyed bad+ba Da/ /zhes bya ba ni bal yul gyi byang phyogs na chu dgas kyi nags gseb na gnod sbyin kha dog ljang nag phyag bzhi pa g.yas gnyis na 'khor lo dang a 'bras/ g.yon gnyis na dbyug to dang dung
<p>149a.6</p>bsnams pa'o/ /'dod pa sbyin na ma dang ldan/ /zhes bya ba ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi byang phyogs na/ gnod sbyin 'dod pa zhes bya ba gnas te/ 'dod pa'i lha mo lnga dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas na 'dod pa'i mda' lnga bsnams pa/ g.yon me tog gi gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /nya'i
<p>149a.7</p>rgyal mtshan dang / chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa'o/ /bu mo 'jug na rab sad pa/ /zhes bya ba ni wA rA Na sI'i shar phyogs na seng ge lha'i yul du gnas pa'i gnod sbyin seng ge gnas pa'o/ /gzugs ni seng ge'i gzugs su snang ba'o/ /ka pu sha na nal ku bar/ /zhes bya
<p>149b</p>
<p>149b.1</p>ba ni de'i shar phyogs bal yul dang / rgya gar gyi so mtshams na gnod sbyin chen po khyi'i gzugs su snang ba'o/ /pha rol mtha' med rngul chu na/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya nag po'i shar phyogs gshin rje'i 'dam gseb na/ gnod sbyin kha dog dmar po phyag na me sgron dang zhags pa bsnams
<p>149b.2</p>pa'o/ /nus pa'i gnas na zhi byed pa/ /zhes bya ba ni yul ma ga d+hA'i byang phyogs na gnod sbyin gdong zhes bya ba'i gnas ni gnod sbyin chen po kha dog nag po dbyug to dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /pa lha ba na thags bzangs ris/ /zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi byang phyogs na/ gnod sbyin lha ma
<p>149b.3</p>yin bya ba gnas te kha dog dmar nag phyag na 'khor lo dang dbyug to bsnams pa'o/ /ka ta ka na dmar ser po/ /zhes bya ba ni sing ga la'i shar phyogs na/ gnod sbyin kha dog gur gum 'dra ba'o/ /phyag na rtse gcig dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /'phral ris 'phel na bzhin rgyas
<p>149b.4</p>pa/ /zhes bya ba ni nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'i 'gram na gnod sbyin mgon po zhes bya ba gnas pa'o/ /zhal bcu gcig pa thal ba'i mdog can phyag bcu gnyis pa/ dang po gnyis na mda' gzhu/ de 'og g.yas pa rnams na 'khor lo dang dbyug to dang thod pa dang dgra sta dang rtse gsum pa/ 
<p>149b.5</p>g.yon pa rnams na zhags pa dang rin po che dang / pad+ma dang ut+pal dang dung bsnams pa'o/ /u rgyan yul na ma rungs pa/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya gar gyi dbus kyi nub phyogs na gnod sbyin chen po kha dog mthing nag /gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /thong gshol ngan na bum lto bo/ /zhes bya
<p>149b.6</p>ba ni ma ga d+hA'i shar phyogs na/ gnod sbyin bum pa'i lto can bzhin mi sdug pa/ dud ka'i mdog can phyag na lcags kyu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan mya ngan na/ /zhes bya ba ni ma ga d+hA'i sa mtshams na 'dod chen zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gnas te/ sku mdog thal ba'i mdog
<p>149b.7</p>can/ phyag gnyis na mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /sna tshogs sde ni po ka na/ /zhes bya ba ni lho nub mtshams na gnod sbyin kha dog ljang gu /phyag gnyis na 'khor lo dang dbyug to bsnams pa'o/ /dga' dang ldan na sgra sgrogs bu/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya gar gyi yul byang shar mtshams
<p>150a</p>
<p>150a.1</p>na/ gnod sbyin thos grags ni sku mdog ser po phyag na mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /phung po'i bdag por dmar ser po/ /zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs ka ma rU na gnas pa ste/ gnod sbyin kha dog dkar po phyag g.yas na phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon na bum pa spyi
<p>150a.2</p>blugs bsnams pa'o/ /chung ma can na mthong dga' bo/ /zhes bya ba ni yul ko ka na'i shar phyogs na gnod sbyin stobs ldan gnas pa ni/ kha dog dmar po phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin chu srin rgyal po'i khab/ /zhes bya ba ni rgyal po'i khab kyi lho ngos na/ 
<p>150a.3</p>gnod sbyin chu srin gyi mgo can gnas te/ sa bdag gi tshul du yod pa/ sbrul gyi zhags pa dang / sdigs mdzub bsnams pa'o/ /yangs pa na ni gnas pa ste/ /'bum phrag dag ni mang po yi/ /zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin 'du ba mang po gnas pa 'jig rten gyi khams rnams khyab pa'o/ /
<p>150a.4</p>gnod sbyin rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas/ /zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras la gnod sbyin rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas te/ rgyal po chen po'i bka' las mi 'da' ba'o/ /ba lang skyong ba sbrul gdug can/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya gar gyi nub ngos na sbrul gyi yul na gnas
<p>150a.5</p>pa gnod sbyin ba lang gi mgo can/ phyag na dbyug to dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /lcang lo'i grong na lcang lo pa/ /zhes bya ba ni rnam thos sras kyi grong na lus ngan po gnas te/ sku mdog ljang gu g.yas na ral gri g.yon na bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /dga' ba'i grong na dga' ba can/ /
<p>150a.6</p>zhes bya ba ni lcang lo can gyi pho brang na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la longs spyod pa ni gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin ma rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed pa'o/ /grong gi lhas ni stobs can gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni lcang lo can gyi gnas na lha dzam+b+ha la gnas pa sku mdog
<p>150a.7</p>ser po g.yas na bI dza pU ra/ g.yon na ne+e'u le'i rkyal pa bsnams pa'o/ /lha las bab na rnam thos bu/ /rang gi sde ni yongs su skyong / /zhes bya ba ni rang gi khyim srung zhing gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon du mar gnas pa/ de rnams skyong zhing dbang mdzad pa'o/ /lcang lo can na gnas
<p>150b</p>
<p>150b.1</p>pa ste/ /gnod sbyin bye bas kun nas bskor/ /zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu yang gnod sbyin thams cad kyi ded dpon pho brang lcang lo can la gnod sbyin du ma bye ba mang pos bskor te/ rgyal po'i bka' las mi 'da' ba sngar bshad pa'i gnod sbyin rnams/ rnam thos kyi
<p>150b.2</p>bu'i 'khor du gnas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin de dag rdzu 'phrul che ba zhes bya ba ni/ sa 'og sa steng sa bla gsum du skad cig mas rgyu ba'o/ /sde che ba zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin mi gcig pa mang po 'dus pas te/ de rnams kyang mi mthun pa med pa'o/ /stobs che ba zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab bdun
<p>150b.3</p>kyang sgul nus pa'o/ /pha rol gyi dgra rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba ni/ stobs che ba dgra rnams kyis mi thub pa/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer rlag par byed pa'o/ /thub par dka' zhing gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba ni/ mthu che ba rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs dang ldan pa che bar sprul pa'i dus
<p>150b.4</p>su ri rab bas che bar sprul pa/ chung ba ni rdul phra rab tsam du sprul nus pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan te/ skad cig thang cig gis stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams khyab pa/ gnod byed dang phan byed byas pa'o/ /'od dang ldan pa zhes
<p>150b.5</p>bya ba ni/ so so'i kha dog gis 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba'o/ /kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ nag po dkar po ser po dmar po ljang gu la sogs pa'o/ /rang rang gi rigs kyi kha dog snang ba'o/ /grags pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams na grags pa'o/ /lha dang lha ma
<p>150b.6</p>yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul 'gyed de/ la la lha ma yin gyi ngos nas/ la la lha yi phyogs nas so/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po dag ste zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs sna tshogs su sprul pa/ lha dang lha
<p>150b.7</p>ma yin gyi yul na rtsod pa byed pa/ mi'i yul na yang de bzhin no/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di la mos pa'i gang zag ni/ gnod sbyin chen po de dag gis kyang bsrung ba dang bskyab par
<p>151a</p>
<p>151a.1</p>byas shing / phyi ma la yang bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni/ mtshon bya dang mtshon byed gnyis dang ldan zhes mtshon pa ni shes rab ste mtshon byed ni rig sngags so/ /de gnyis su med pa'i rig pa nam mkha' lta bur gnas pa stong par snang ba'o/ /stong pa'i nang
<p>151a.2</p>na me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu/ 'jig rten khams sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /de'i ngo bo nyid kyis snying rje dang byams pas khyab pa'o/ /de'i rang bzhin rig sngags ni zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis pa/ sku mdog mthing ga zhal dang po khro mo/ /g.yas dkar ba ni zhi ba/ g.yon dmar ba
<p>151a.3</p>'dzum pa/ rgyab ser po ni sgeg pa'i tshul lo/ /zhal re re la thod pa lnga lngas brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa/ dbu skra ser po gyen du 'bar ba/ dbu la rdo rjes mtshan pa/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas pa rnams na/ ral gri dang / rdo rje dang / mdung shing / lcags kyu dang / rtse
<p>151a.4</p>gsum dang / 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams na/ zhags pa/ rma bya'i sgro/ dgra sta/ rin po che/ pad+ma/ sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /zhabs g.yas pa brkyang pa/ g.yon bskum pas mnan pa ni/ gnod sbyin pho mo mnan pa/ pad+ma dang nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /
<p>151a.5</p>sba ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin no/ /tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags de'i snying ga nas/ hUM gi yi ges 'od zer 'phros te/ de'i 'od zer gyis 'jig rten gyi khams khyab pa stong sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
<p>151a.6</p>thams cad bcom nas/ gnod byed rnams gsang sngags re res 'joms te/ sngags re re dang 'od zer re res khro bo bcur sprul pa'o/ /khro bo bcu ni hUM mdzad dang dbyug pa sngon po dang / gshin rje gshed po/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ rta mgrin dang / mi g.yo mgon po/ bdud rtsi
<p>151a.7</p>'khyil pa dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang / stobs po che'o/ /'di lta ste ni 'og ma bzhin du'o/ /'og ma'i sngags kyis khro bo dkar po dang / nag po dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / mthing nag dang / dmar po dang / sngo skya dang / ljang
<p>151b</p>
<p>151b.1</p>gu dang / ljang nag dang / mthing gar gnas pa'o/ /de'i phyag mtshan ni/ g.yas rdo rje tho ba g.yon phur bu bsnams pa'o/ /zhabs phur ba'i rang bzhin du yod pa/ de bzhin du nam mkha'i khams su spros pa'o/ /shar phyogs kyi khro bo'i sngags ni a ka Te bi ka Te la sogs pa'o/ /
<p>151b.2</p>bdag gi mi mdza' ba rnams zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor lo bcur bris la/ drag po'i sbyin sreg gis bsreg par bya'o/ /'khor lo'i nang du gang mi mdza' ba'i ming rus bris la/ ha na ha na bcu po rtsibs la bkod la/ gzhan gsang sngags mu khyud la dgod par bya'o/ /'khor lo de
<p>151b.3</p>dril la gnyan pa'i sar mnan no/ /des grub par 'gyur ro/ /bdag la mi phan par 'dod pa rnams zhes bya ba ni/ ras sam shing shun la/ ming rus bris la bsreg par bya'o/ /sngags ni da ha da ha la sogs pa gdon par bya'o/ /'di ni shar phyogs kyi khro bo'i sngags yin no/ /bdag
<p>151b.4</p>la phyir rgol ba rnams zhes bya ba ni 'byung po'am gang yang rung ba la 'khor lo rtsibs bcu tham pa bris la/ rtsibs re re la pa tsa pa tsa zhes bya ba bris la/ dbus su ming rus staM b+ha ya btags la bri'o/ /mu khyud la sngar bshad pa'i sngags bris la/ lam rgya gram mam mchod rten
<p>151b.5</p>chen po'am dur khrod du mnan par bya'o/ /sngags kyang pa tsa pa tsa la sogs pa'o/ /de ni byang shar mtshams kyi khro bo'i sngags so/ /gzhan yang mi mthun pa'am 'byung po bskrad par 'dod na snga ma bzhin du 'khor lo bris nas sgo rtsar mnan te 'byung po'i sar ro/ /'khor lo'i
<p>151b.6</p>sngags bskrad pa'i sngags ni u tsa ta ya d+hu d+hu la sogs pa'o/ /lho'i 'o/ /bdag la mi phan par 'dod pa rnams zhes bya ba ni brgya rtsa brgyad drag po'i sbyin sreg byas la/ 'byung po dang dgra bo rnams la thun mong gi rdzas rnams gtor la bsreg par bya'o/ /sngags ni ha ha zhes bya ba la
<p>151b.7</p>sogs pa ni lho nub kyi'o/ /dza Ti dza Ti zhes bya ba ni nub kyi khro bo'o/ /bdag gi dgra bo rnams zhes bya ba ni dgra bo dang 'byung po rnams ling+ga bris nas bsreg pa'o/ /nA sha ya zhes bya ba ni dgra bo'i gzi brjid 'phrog pa'o/ /tsu lu tsu lu zhes bya ba ni nub byang gi'o/ /hi li hi li zhes bya ba ni
<p>152a</p>
<p>152a.1</p>byang gi'o/ /mi li mi li la sogs pa ni byang shar gyi'o/ /phu ru phu ru la sogs pa ni 'og gi'o/ /tsi Ti tsi Ti la sogs pas ni steng bcing bar bya'o/ /bdag gi dgra bo rnams nA sha ya zhes bya ba ni 'byung po dang dgra bo rnams bsregs nas/ sngags de rnams kyis bskrad par
<p>152a.2</p>byas nas ming rus btags nas brdungs pa'i gsang sngags so/ /'dis kyang nad thams cad sel ba'o/ /hi k+ke mi k+ke la sogs pa ni/ rig sngags kyi snying po'o/ /gzhan thams cad la bsrung bar bya'o/ /bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba la sogs pa ni/ gang zag 'di la
<p>152a.3</p>gus par byas na rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis gnod sbyin de rnams kyis kyang srung bar byed de/ dam ma nyams na grogs kyang byed par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gnod sbyin gyi gnas skabs dang 'byung po rnams 'dul ba'i gnas skabs te dgu pa'o// //kun
<p>152a.4</p>dga' bo zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas sems can gyi don la bka' stsal pa'o/ /khyod kyis gang dag phyogs bcu srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag gi ming zung shig ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan
<p>152a.5</p>pa bsrung ba gzi brjid che ba stobs dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang kha dog tu ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul yang myong bar byed pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa'o/ /shar phyogs na gnod
<p>152a.6</p>sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang dag shar phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi gnas te zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag gang gis gus par byed pa'am/ yi ge gcig tsam yod par gyur na/ shar phyogs kyi gnod sbyin de rnams kyis bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>152a.7</p>gnod sbyin rnams lta ba'o/ /ring po dang / mig mi bzang dang / gang ba bzang po dang / ser skya'o zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyi kha dog dang phyag mtshan ni dkar po dang / nag po dang / ser po dang / dmar po'o/ /phyag mtshan ni rdo rje dang / 'khor lo dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma'o/ /
<p>152b</p>
<p>152b.1</p>g.yon na yang rim pa bzhin du mdung dang / zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / rtse gsum mo/ /gnod sbyin bzhi po de rnams ni/ zhi ba'i tshul du gnas pa/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces
<p>152b.2</p>bya ba ni/ rjes su yi rang zhing bton pa tsam gyis kyang / nad thams cad dang bral zhing 'jigs pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gong bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyis kun dga' bo la gsungs pa'o/ /lho
<p>152b.3</p>phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po/ gang dag lho phyogs skyong zhing srung bar byed pa bzhi gnas te zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin chen po bzhi po de dag kyang gzi brjid che ba/ stobs dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang
<p>152b.4</p>lha ma yin gyi g.yul myong bar byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin bzhi po blta'o/ /seng ge dang nye ba'i seng ge dang / dung can dang / dga' bo zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin bzhi po de ni/ mthu che ba/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba ste/ de rnams kyi sku mdog
<p>152b.5</p>dang phyag mtshan ni/ ser po dang / nag po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu'o/ /de'i phyag mtshan ni rin po che dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang ral gri'o/ /g.yon rnams ni/ mda' gzhu dang / gtun shing dang lcags kyu dang / 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin de dag ni
<p>152b.6</p>bzhin mi sdug pa'i gzugs su gnas pa/ khro bor snang ba'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag dag gis rgya cher bstan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / yi ge gcig tsam klog par gyur pas
<p>152b.7</p>kyang gnod sbyin bzhi pos lho phyogs su skyong ba dang / srung bar 'gyur ro/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong sa ri'i don dang sems can rnams kyi don la bka' stsal pa'o/ /nub phyogs
<p>153a</p>
<p>153a.1</p>na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang dag nub phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi gnas te zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ gzi brjid che ba stobs dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang
<p>153a.2</p>ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul myong bar byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin bzhi po nub kyi ngos kyi bzhi blta'o/ /seng ge dang / seng ge'i ral pa dang / bla ma dang / ser skye'o zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin bzhi po de dag ni rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba
<p>153a.3</p>ste/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dmar po dang / nag po dang / dkar po dang / ljang gu'o/ /g.yas rnams na/ pad+ma dang / rdo rje dang / 'khor lo dang / ral gri'o/ /g.yon rnams na rtse gcig dang / to ma ra dang / 'phang mdung dang mdung rings bsnams pa'o/ /gnod
<p>153a.4</p>sbyin de rnams ni mthu che zhing cung zad khro bor gnas pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gang gis lus ngag yid kyis mos par byas nas/ sa bdag gi nad mdze la sogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /
<p>153a.5</p>bsgom pa dang / kha ton byed pa la sogs pa byas par gyur na/ nad de da ltar yang mi 'byung ste/ tshe phyi ma yang de bzhin no/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin bzhi po dag gis kyang srung ba dang / skyob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang bshad pa ni gong nas shes pa'o/ /
<p>153a.6</p>kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gyi don du gsungs pa'o/ /byang phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po gang dag byang phyogs skyong zhing yongs su srung bar byed pa bzhi gnas te zhes bya ba ni bzhi po de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung zhing gnas pa/ gzi
<p>153a.7</p>brjid che ba/ stobs dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ 'od zer dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul yang myong bar byed pa'o/ /de dag dang ldan pa'i gnod sbyin chen po rnams kyis rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o/ /
<p>153b</p>
<p>153b.1</p>'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin chen po bzhi po dag byang ngos nas blta'o/ /'dzin pa dang / 'dzin dga' dang / brtson skyong dang / khyab 'jug go zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin chen po bzhi po de dag ni/ mthu chen po dang ldan pa/ de dag gi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni ljang nag
<p>153b.2</p>dang / nag po dang / ser po dang / dkar po'o/ /g.yas rnams na ral gri dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / 'khor lo'o/ /g.yon pa rnams ni zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / rtse gsum dang / mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin chen po de dag ni khro bor gnas pa gsus pa
<p>153b.3</p>che ba sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni gang zag gis gus par byas na sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te/ yi ge gcig tsam klog par gyur na gus pa dang bcas pas
<p>153b.4</p>mtshan nas brjod par bya ste/ gnod sbyin chen po de dag gis kyang da ltar yang srung bar byed pa dang / tshe phyi ma la yang srung bar byed pa'o/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
<p>153b.5</p>kyis sems can gyi don du bka' stsal ba'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po gang dag phyogs mtshams na gnas te zhes bya ba ni shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / byang shar mtshams na gnas pa'o/ /gang dag phyogs mtshams srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi
<p>153b.6</p>po 'di dag ste zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa srung ba ste/ sems can rnams kyi don byed pa ste/ gnod sbyin de dag ni/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ stobs dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul yang
<p>153b.7</p>myong bar byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin bzhi po de dag phyogs mtshams na blta'o/ /lnga spyod dang tshigs lnga ser po dang / ri mnyam dang / gser can no zhes bya ba dang / gnod sbyin de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing / mthu
<p>154a</p>
<p>154a.1</p>chen po dang ldan pa de dag gi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni dkar po dang / nag po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu'o/ /phyag g.yas rnams na pad+ma dkar po dang / ut+pa la ser po dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / ut+pa la sngon po'o/ /g.yon rnams na 'khor lo dang / rdo rje
<p>154a.2</p>dang / dbyug to dang / ral gri rnams so/ /gnod sbyin bzhi po de yang rim bzhin du zhi ba'i tshul dang ldan pa/ drag po'i tshul dang ldan pa/ dregs pa dang ldan pa/ khro ba dang ldan pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ 
<p>154a.3</p>gang zag gang gis 'di la gus par byed na/ rjes su yi rang ba tsam dang / lus ngag yid kyis gus pa tsam gyis kyang / gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon de rnams kyis yang dag par srung ba dang skyob par 'gyur ro/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin de rnams kyis 'jigs pa la
<p>154a.4</p>sogs pa sbed pa'o/ /de rnams kyis bshad pa ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po gang dag sa la gnas te/ gang dag sa srung zhing yongs su skyob par byed pa bzhi po 'di dag ste zhes bya
<p>154a.5</p>ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba/ sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa/ gnod sbyin chen po de dag ni gzi brjid che ba/ stobs dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ 'od zer dang ldan pa dang / kha dog dang ldan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang
<p>154a.6</p>lha ma yin gyi g.yul yang myong bar byed pa dag go/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin bzhi po sa la gnas pa ltar ro/ /sa ba dang / shin tu sa pa dang / nag po dang / nye nag po'o zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing 'og nas srung bar byed pa'o/ /
<p>154a.7</p>de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni ser po dang / dmar po dang / nag po dang / dmar nag gi mdog go/ /g.yas rnams na rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / rdo rje dang / ral gri'o/ /g.yon rnams na mdung dang / zhags pa dang / 'khor lo dang / dgra sta rnams so/ /bzhi po 'di
<p>154b</p>
<p>154b.1</p>dag gis kyang sa yongs su srung zhing / sems can rnams la don byed pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gang dag gis 'di la mos shing chos byed pa dang / srung ba btags pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / 
<p>154b.2</p>yongs su gzung bar gyur na/ sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa dang / mu ge'i 'jigs pa dang / sa bdag rnams kyi 'jigs pa la sogs pa yang dag par srung zhing / da ltar dang phyi mar yang srung bar 'gyur ro/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gsang ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis srung bar
<p>154b.3</p>'gyur te/ de rnams kyi bshad pa ni gong ma bzhin no/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi don la thugs rje chen pos bka' stsal pa'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po gang dag bar snang la gnas te zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan
<p>154b.4</p>pa srung ba/ steng gi ngos na gnas pa'o/ /gang dag par snang srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi po 'di dag ste zhes bya ba ni/ gzi brjid che ba/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul yang myong bar byed pa'o/ /
<p>154b.5</p>'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin chen po bzhi po 'di dag bar snang la blta'o/ /nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / me dang / rlung ngo zhes bya ba ni mthu che ba/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dmar po dang / dkar po dang / sngon po dang / 
<p>154b.6</p>dmar nag gi mdog go/ /phyag g.yas rnams na pad+ma dmar po pad+ma dkar po ba dan dang me sbar ba bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na 'khor lo/ /dgra sta rtse gsum pa rtse gcig pa bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin de dag bar snang yongs su srung zhing / sems can rnams kyi don byed
<p>154b.7</p>pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis kyang bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la gus par byas na/ lce 'bab pa'i 'jigs pa dang / ser ba la sogs pa yang yul der 'bab par mi 'gyur
<p>155a</p>
<p>155a.1</p>te/ 'jigs pa gzhan yang mi 'byung ba'o/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs pa dang nad thams cad las thar bar byas pa'o/ /yongs su skyong ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ mngal nas btsas ka dang / btsas ma thag tu skyes nas kyang ma shi bar du skyong ba'o/ /yongs su
<p>155a.2</p>bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po dang / nad rnams dang / sdug bsngal rnams las bskyab pas so/ /yongs su gzung ba dang zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa'i mun pa spangs nas/ dge ba la sbyor ba'o/ /zhi ba dang zhes bya ba ni drag po'i tshul du gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams kyang zhi bar
<p>155a.3</p>'gyur ro/ /bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus ngag yid bde ba ste/ 'di'i nus pas lus ngag yid bde bar byed pa'o/ /chad pa spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po dang 'byung po la sogs pas chad pa spang ba'o/ /mtshon cha spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ yul gyi dbus
<p>155a.4</p>sam/ rkun ma 'am/ chom rkun nam/ de rnams kyi mtshon cha spang ba'o/ /dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ bsdad pa'i dug dang / 'gro ba'i dug dang / byed pa'i dug gsum gzhil ba'o/ /dug gsad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug gsum po de dag kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid
<p>155a.5</p>kyis/ lus la zhugs pa thams cad kyang 'joms par byed pa'o/ /mtshams gcad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyis bcing ba'i sar/ gzhan rnams kyis rgol bar mi nus so/ /sa bcing ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ des bcing ba'i sar sa g.yo
<p>155a.6</p>ba drag po byung na yang 'gul mi nus te de na yod pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang gnod par mi nus so/ /lo brgya lon pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ nad thams cad dang bral zhing bcud len gyi rang bzhin du rgas pa med pa'o/ /ston brgya mthong ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ nor phun sum tshogs pa
<p>155a.7</p>ste/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis tshe ring zhing nad rnams dang bral te/ za ba dang 'thung ba dang ldan pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong sa ri mche ba'i dug gis zin pa'i gnod pa dang / sems can thams cad mche ba'i dug gis zin pa'i don la'o/ /khyod kyis zhes bya
<p>155b</p>
<p>155b.1</p>ba ni kun dga' bo la'o/ /rgyal po rnam thos kyi chos kyi spun gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon sde bo che rnams zhes bya ba ni/ mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba la gzi brjid che ba stobs che ba/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang
<p>155b.2</p>ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul yang myong bar byed pa'o/ /gnod sbyin de rnams kyang bye ba 'bum phrag gnod sbyin 'khor du ma dang ldan pa'o/ /gang dag sems can rnams srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad mthong ba dang dga' bas te/ de la gnod par
<p>155b.3</p>mi byed cing / snying rje'i sems kyis khyab pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang 'khrugs pa rnams med par byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams skad cig mas khyab ste/ gnod sbyin mthu bo che rnams kyis kyang nad thams cad bcom zhing sems
<p>155b.4</p>can rnams la byams pa dang snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can rnams skyong ba'o/ /'jig rten la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten na rgyu ba rnams kyi ming zung shig ces bya ba ni/ mthu chen gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon sum cu rtsa gnyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
<p>155b.5</p>'jig rten gyi sems can ma lus pa la phan par mdzad pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la rjes su yi rang zhing gus par byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis blta'o/ /dbang po dang zla ba dang chu lha dang skye dgu'i bdag po dang / 
<p>155b.6</p>ba ra d+h+wa dza dang zhes bya ba ni stobs che la mthu che ba/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni ser po dang / dkar po dang / dkar ser dang / dmar po dang / nag po'o/ /g.yas rnams na rdo rje dang / ri bong gi pags pa dang / sbrul gyi zhags pa dang / pad+ma dang / ral gri'o/ /g.yon
<p>155b.7</p>rnams na mdung dang / zhags pa dang / lcags kyu dang / rtse gcig pa dang / dgra sta rnams so/ /dbang ldan dang / tsan+dan dang / 'dod pa'i gtso bo dang / mgrin ngan dang / mgul nges dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon mthu chen de rnams rig sngags kyi bka' las
<p>156a</p>
<p>156a.1</p>mi 'da' ba sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ thal ba'i mdog dang mthing nag dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po'o/ /g.yas pa rnams na rtse gsum dang tsan+dan gyi be con dang / mda' gzhu dang / dbyug to dmig
<p>156a.2</p>can dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na phreng ba dang / bum pa dang / ne'u le'i rkyal pa dang / rin po che dang / nor gyi rkyal pa'o/ /ba Di dang / nor bu dang / nor bu spyod pa dang / sgra rab dang / nye lnga po dang zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba dang / 
<p>156a.3</p>sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ljang gu dang / sngo skya dang / dmar ser dang / mthing nag dang / dkar po'o/ /g.yas rnams na 'phang mdung dang / chu gri dang / to ma ra dang / rtse gcig dang / ral gri'o/ /g.yon rnams na me
<p>156a.4</p>tog nA ga puSh+pe dang / ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / kun+da bsnams pa'o/ /ri mnyam dang / gser can dang / gang po dang / seng ldeng ba dang / g.yon can dang zhes bya ba ni mthu chen po de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba sems can gyi don byed
<p>156a.5</p>pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / nag po dang / ljang gu'o/ /g.yas rnams na rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / ral gri dang / rtse gcig bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na nor gyi rkyal pa dang / bum
<p>156a.6</p>pa gang ba dang / rin chen gyi snod dang / 'bras kyi snye ma dang / rin chen snye ma bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin ba lang skyong dang / 'brog gnas dang / mi'i rgyal po dang / rgyal ba'i khyu mchog dang / tshigs lnga ser po dang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba/ sems can
<p>156a.7</p>rnams la mi 'tshe ba'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ mthing nag dang / dmar nag dang / sngo bsangs dang / ljang nag dang / dkar ser ro/ /g.yas rnams na mda' gzhu dang / mdung dang / zhags pa dang / 'khor lo dang / dgra sta bsnams pa'o/ /
<p>156b</p>
<p>156b.1</p>g.yon rnams na mdung dang a 'bras dang / bum pa spyi blugs dang / bI dza pU ra ka dang me tog gi phreng ba'o/ /bzhin bzangs dang / gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas pa dang / dri sna tshogs dang / 'bras bu gsum pa dang / mgul gsum pa dang lcags mdung ring po dang / mi ldan pa
<p>156b.2</p>ste zhes bya ba ste/ de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i bka' las mi 'da' ba'o/ /sems can rnams kyi don byed pa/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni dkar po dang / nag po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / sngo skya dang / dmar nag
<p>156b.3</p>go/ /de rnams kyi g.yas na mdung rings dang / ral gri dang / 'phang mdung dang rtse gsum dang rtse gcig dang gtun shing dang / to ma ra'o/ /g.yon rnams na nor gyi rkyal pa dang / rin chen myu gu dang / 'bras kyi snye ma dang / rin chen snye ma dang / bum pa nor gyis gang ba dang / ne'u le'i
<p>156b.4</p>rkyal pa dang / rin chen phreng ba'o/ /gnod sbyin de dag ni gnod sbyin chen po'o zhes bya ba ni/ sems can la 'tshe ba mi byed pa sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o/ /sde rnams kyi yongs su 'dren pa zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang lha ma yin rnams kyis rtsod pa
<p>156b.5</p>las/ bye ba dung phyur rnams kyi sde bo che gzhan rnams kyis mi thub pa/ rgyal ba rnam par rgyal ba gnod sbyin rnams kyi gtso bor 'gyur ba'o/ /rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang bcas pa skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis 'khor
<p>156b.6</p>ba'o/ /'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi kha dog gis rang gsal te/ 'jig rten khams gsal bar byed pa'o/ /kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi kha dog dang ldan pa kha dog de bkrag dang ldan pa'o/ /grags pa dang ldan pa ste zhes bya ba ni/ mthu chen sum cu rtsa gnyis/ 
<p>156b.7</p>rgyal ba rnam par rgyal ba stong gsum gyi stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams kyi don byed pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i bka' las mi 'da' bar grags pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i spun te zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin de rnams dang / rdo rje spun du grags pa/ 
<p>157a</p>
<p>157a.1</p>de gnyis sangs rgyas kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ gnod sbyin 'di ni nga la rnam par 'tshe ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan yang dri za'i gdon nam/ grul bum gyi gdon nam/ klu'i gdon nam/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon la sogs pas glags tshol
<p>157a.2</p>ba'o/ /gnod sbyin 'di ni mi gtong ngo zhes gang dag la go bar byed pa 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gnod par 'dod pa'i gnod sbyin rnams/ gnod pa mi ster bar rten gyi gang zag la srung ba grogs byed pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i spun te zhes bya ba ni/ sems can la
<p>157a.3</p>'tshe bar mi sems pa/ mthu chen sum cu rtsa gnyis/ sde chen po gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnam thos sras kyi rdo rje spun no/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang nas gang du rig sngags kyi rgyal mo la gus par byed
<p>157a.4</p>na/ kha don byed pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / rgya cher spel ba dang / cho ga byed pa dang / srung ba byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bla mar byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa rnams gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon rnams kyis gang zag de la srung bar
<p>157a.5</p>'gyur ro/ /sba ba la sogs zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin de rnams kyis sba ba la sogs pa byed pa'o/ /'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dgra bo dang g.yul 'gyed pa dang / gzhan yang sems mi bde ba dang / the tshom med pa dang / nang 'thab pa dang / de rnams la yang
<p>157a.6</p>gnod sbyin de rnams kyis srung ba dang skyob par 'gyur ro/ /mtshang 'bru ba dang / 'thab mo dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan rnams kyis sems mi bde zhing mtshang 'bru bas te/ de rnams kyis mtshang 'brur mi ster te srung ba dang skyob par 'gyur te/ 'thab pa la yang de bzhin du srung
<p>157a.7</p>bar 'gyur ro/ /'gyed pa las yongs su skyobs shig ces bya ba ni/ glo bur gyi bgegs rnams dang / bdud rnams kyis 'tshe bar byed pa la yang srung ba dang skyob par byed pa'o/ /mi'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po 'am chom rkun la sogs pa'o/ /mi ma yin pa'i
<p>157b</p>
<p>157b.1</p>gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ bdud rnams glags tshol ba'o/ /lha'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa 'dod lha rigs drug gi lha rnams so/ /klu'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo la sogs pa rigs brgyad kyi klu rnams so/ /lha ma yin
<p>157b.2</p>gyi gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thags bzangs ris bye ba 'bum phrag dung phyur tsam lha ma yin rnams so/ /rlung lha'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ rlung lha'i rgyal po rnam par dga' byed la sogs pa rlung gi gdon bdun dang / bye ba khrag khrig dung phyur tsam mo/ /nam
<p>157b.3</p>mkha' lding gi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig la sogs pa bya khyung rigs lnga dang / de la sogs pa'i bye ba dung phyur tsam mo/ /dri za'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa la sogs pa de yang bye ba dung phyur tsam mo/ /mi'am
<p>157b.4</p>ci'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ lto 'phye'i rgyal po bzang po la sogs pa bye ba dung phyur tsam mo/ /gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang zhes
<p>157b.5</p>bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin chen po lngas rtsen la sogs pa 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya dang bcas pa'o/ /srin po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ srin po'i rgyal po 'jigs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bye ba dung phyur tsam gnas pa'o/ /yi dgas kyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ yi dgas 'gul 'joms la
<p>157b.6</p>sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /sha za'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ sha za gang la sogs pa du mar gnas pa'o/ /'byung po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po lnga ldan la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /grul bum gyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ grul bum 'dzin mig la
<p>157b.7</p>sogs pa du mar gnas pa'o/ /srul po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ srul po rab bzangs la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig tsam gnas pa'o/ /lus srul po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ rab bzangs chen po la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /skem byed kyi gdon dang zhes bya ba
<p>158a</p>
<p>158a.1</p>ni/ skem byed mchu rings la sogs pa 'bum phrag bdun cur gnas pa'o/ /smyo byed kyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ smyo byed nyi shu rtsa gnyis te/ sba ba sum 'gyur la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /grib gnon gyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ grib gnon 'bum la sogs pa
<p>158a.2</p>brgyad khri bzhi stong tsam mo/ /brjed byed kyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ nye ba'i bum pa la sogs pa bye ba du mar gnas pa'o/ /gnon po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnon po mig mi bzang la sogs pa bye ba dung phyur tsam mo/ /rgyu skar gyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad de smin
<p>158a.3</p>drug la sogs pa brjod kyis mi lang ba'o/ /byug pa'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ byug pa dri la dga' ba ste gser thub la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab par gnas pa'o/ /de yang mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / lha dang klu dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / 
<p>158a.4</p>mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / brjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / grib gnon dang / skem byed dang / gnon po dang / skar ma dang / byug pa'i gdon no/ /de rnams gtso bor gyur pa
<p>158a.5</p>stong phrag brgyad cur gnas te/ nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i dus su ni ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin no/ /sa steng la rgyu ba ni nyi ma'i rta bdun bzhin du skad cig mas gling bzhi khyab pa'o/ /sa 'og tu 'dzul ba ni byi ba bzhin du'o/ /de lta bu'i gdon sa bdag la sogs pa rgyu ba'i dus su sa bdag bzhin
<p>158a.6</p>no/ /de bzhin du lha'i gdon la sogs pa thams cad sna tshogs kyi gzugs su bstan nas rgyu ba'o/ /yongs su skyobs shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ mthu chen sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kyang lha'i gdon la sogs pa srung ba dang / skyob par
<p>158a.7</p>byed pa'o/ /gzi brjid 'phrog pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gdon de rnams kyis gzi brjid 'phrog pa ste/ gdon gzhan yang 'od 'phrog pa lnga la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab ba'o/ /zas su mngal la za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ ser skya mo ste yi dgas so/ /de yang bsam gyis mi
<p>158b</p>
<p>158b.1</p>khyab pa'o/ /zas su sha za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ srin mo pad+ma ste/ de la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /zas su khrag 'thung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sha za mo ma he mo la sogs pa ste bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /zas su zhag za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa srin mo sdang mo du mar gnas
<p>158b.2</p>pa'o/ /zas su tshil za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ srin mo 'jigs can bye ba tsam du gnas pa'o/ /zas su rkang za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin me 'bar ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /zas su btsas pa za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sha za gtum mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /srog 'phrog
<p>158b.3</p>pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ brjed byed ma bum pa can la sogs pa bye ba dung phyur gnas pa'o/ /zas su gtor ma za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin dri med la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /zas su phreng ba za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha mo nag mo bye ba dung phyur tsam mo/ /zas su dri za
<p>158b.4</p>pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dri za mo nag mo seng ge la sogs pa bye ba 'bum phrag du ma gnas pa'o/ /zas su bdug pa za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa srin mo nag mo snang zhes bya ba la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /zas su me tog za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ klu mo 'od zer can zhes bya ba
<p>158b.5</p>la sogs pa 'bum phrag khri tsam gnas pa'o/ /zas su 'bras bu za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa bdag chu mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /zas su lo tog za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ srin mo stobs can mo la sogs pa'o/ /zas su bsreg bya za ba dang zhes bya
<p>158b.6</p>ba ni/ sha za nag mo la sogs pa 'bum phrag khrir gnas pa'o/ /zas su rnag 'thung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa srin mo glang chen mo la sogs pa brgya stong tsam gnas pa'o/ /zas su phyi sa za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa srin mo sra ba mo la sogs pa ste bsam gyis mi khyab
<p>158b.7</p>pa'o/ /zas su gcin 'thung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po mo la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /zas su mchil ma 'thung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ ro langs mo ting+ga la sogs pa brgyad khri 'bum du gnas pa'o/ /zas su ngar snabs za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ ro langs chen
<p>159a</p>
<p>159a.1</p>mo dmar ser mo la sogs pa 'bum du gnas pa'o/ /zas su snabs za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ grul bum mo tshig pa la sogs pa bye ba dung phyur du gnas pa'o/ /zas su skyugs pa za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin mo gtum mo la sogs pa brgyad khrir gnas pa'o/ /
<p>159a.2</p>zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnon po grul bum nag mo la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /za ba de rnams kyang stong phrag brgyad cur gnas pa/ chud ba ni yud tsam che ba ni dpag tshad lnga brgyar gzugs sprul pa'o/ /de rnams kyang rdzu 'phrul dang
<p>159a.3</p>ldan pa/ sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o/ /srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la gus pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams mthu chen sum cu rtsa gnyis gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon rnams kyis kyang srung ba dang skyob par 'gyur ro/ /sba ba la sogs
<p>159a.4</p>pa zhes bya ba ni/ gong bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /gshed byed dang bsgyur ba'i las dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po rnams kyis dbugs dang bral bar byed pa ste/ de gshed 'phrog pa'i 'jigs pa'o/ /lus ngag yid kyi las sgyur ba ste/ de las sgyur ba'i 'jigs pa lus mi bde ba/ ngag
<p>159a.5</p>mi bde ba yid mi bde ba'o/ /byad dang g.yengs byed dang zhes bya ba ni/ sngon gyi las dang da ltar byas pa ste/ las kyi dbang gis ma rig pa'i sems kyis byas pa'i byad do/ /de'i dbang gis 'dar bar byed pa'i nad kyang 'byung po rnams kyis gtang pa'o zhes bya ba ni ma tshang ba dang / lhag
<p>159a.6</p>pa dang / nor ba dang / 'joms pa dang / pho nya dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan rnams kyi nus pas gtang ba'o/ /'joms pa ni de 'joms pa'o/ /ro langs dang sems sgyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sngags kyi nus pas ro langs par 'gyur ba ste/ de ma thul ba'o/ /rig pa'i sems ma
<p>159a.7</p>rig pas bsgyur ba'o/ /sbod gtong dang / bza' nyes dang zhes bya ba ni/ gshin rje'am/ ma mo'am/ 'jig rten gzhan yang bsten par byas nas dmod mo byas pa'o/ /skar ma'am/ gza' 'am/ tshes grangs sam/ skad cig ma'am/ ma mthun pa dang / chu tshod dang / dbyu gu dang / 
<p>159b</p>
<p>159b.1</p>thun tshod ma 'dzom pa'o/ /gza' rang la sogs pa sems mi mthun pa'o/ /skyugs nyes dang zhes bya ba ni/ bad kan dang mkhris pa dang / rlung gi dbang gis ma zhu ba dang mi mthun pa ste/ de skyugs na nyes pa'o/ /yang na 'byung po'i dbang gis sman ma zhu zhing skyug par byed pa ste/ skyug
<p>159b.2</p>pa ma thon pa dang / 'gags na skyugs nyes pa'o/ /gnod sgrib dang zhes bya ba ni/ de ltar ma rig pa'i dbang gis sgrib par 'gyur te/ grib ma de gnod pas gnod sgrib po/ /de'i sdig mi mthong bar byed pa sgrib pa'o/ /gnod bltas dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma smin pa la smin par byas nas
<p>159b.3</p>blta ba ste/ gnyan pa lta ba de gnod bltas so/ /bri nyes dang zhes bya ba ni/ dkyil 'khor la sogs pa sgra ma mthun pa nyes pa'o/ /bsgom nyes dang zhes bya ba ni/ ye shes bzhag nas ma rig pa bsgoms te/ yang na log min du go nas ma tshang bar bsgom pa'o/ /smad pa dang
<p>159b.4</p>zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan rnams kyis zhe sdang gi dbang gis smad pa'o/ /skrag pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs pas sems sgyur ba ste/ de yang g.yengs pa'o/ /rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rang dbang med cing nor dang zhing la sogs pa 'phrog pa'o/ /chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa
<p>159b.5</p>dang / glang po che'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ nor dang grogs la 'jigs pa ste/ de bzhin du glang po che'i 'jigs pa'o/ /me'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi khyim dang / gzhan rnams kyis 'ongs pa ste/ gru log pa dang / rab ma thar pa dang / 
<p>159b.6</p>de la sogs pa me dang chu'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa dang / mu ge'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po'am gzhan pha rol gyi dgra bo ste/ de rnams kyi 'jigs pa dang / de rnams kyi lo tog 'joms pa dang / char mi 'bab
<p>159b.7</p>pa che bar 'bab pa dang / byi ba dang / ne tsho dang / bung ba dang / ri bong dang / mchil ba dang / ser ba dang / lhags pa'i 'jigs pa la sogs pa'o/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba bcu drug go/ /seng ge dang / glang po che
<p>160a</p>
<p>160a.1</p>dang / rwa can la sogs pa dang / /mtshon dang / chu dang / me dang / rims dang / 'byung po dang / thog mda' dang / thibs 'og dang / chom rkun dang / klu dang / bcon dang / dug dang / gza' dang / g.yengs pa'o/ /sa g.yo bas 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ stong
<p>160a.2</p>gsum gyi stong 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa dus gcig tu g.yo ba ste/ de 'byung ba'i dbang gis sa g.yo bar byed pa'o/ /gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ seng ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / chu srin la sogs pa'o/ /mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>160a.3</p>rogs shes dang / grogs dang / nye ba la sogs pa'o/ /'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ nad kyis thebs pa ste/ gshin rje'i thag pas bcings pa'i dus su'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad las bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen
<p>160a.4</p>mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon dang / mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis srung ba dang / skyob par 'gyur ro/ /shu ba dang / g.ya' ba dang / mdze dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa dang / me dpal dang / lhog
<p>160a.5</p>pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ de la sogs pa mdze rigs mi gcig pa bco brgyad de/ rlung dang bad kan dang / mkhris pa dang / chu ser las byung ba'o/ /shu ba ni chu ser sha dang pags pa las 'bab pa'o/ /g.ya' ba ni rlung dang chu ser pags pa las 'bab pa'o/ /mdze ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang
<p>160a.6</p>bad kan la babs pa'o/ /'phrum bu phra mo ni tshad pa nang du shor nas mkhris pa las byung ba'o/ /mtshan par rdol ba ni rlung dang chu ser las byung ba'o/ /phol mig ni grang ba bzhin du 'byung ste rlung dang chu ser mkhris pa las byung ba'o/ /g.yan pa ni bad kan dang rlung las byung ba'o/ /me dbal
<p>160a.7</p>ni mkhris pa las byung ba'o/ /lhog pa ni mkhris pa dang chu ser dang rlung las byung ba'o/ /gzhan yang 'bras dang dmu chu dang sha bkra dang / lba ba la sogs pa yod de/ /mkhris pa dang / chu ser dang rlung las byung ba'o/ /'jigs pa las srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rig
<p>160b</p>
<p>160b.1</p>sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gzi brjid dang stobs kyis/ gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon de rnams las kyang / srung ba dang skyob par 'gyur ro/ /klad pa na ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ rlung bad kan mkhris pa gsum gyis na ba'o/ /mgo lji zhing na ba ni rlung yin te/ yang zhing g.yo ba ni bad
<p>160b.2</p>kan yin no/ /tsha zhing na ba ni mkhris pa'o/ /yang zhing stong sob pa ni rlung ngo / /lci zhing 'grib pa ni bad kan no/ /tsha zhing sto ba ni mkhris pa'o/ /de bzhin du nad gzhan la sogs pa yang shes par bya'o/ /rims nad med par gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ tshad pa las byung ba ste/ tshad pa de yang rlung
<p>160b.3</p>las byung ba dang / bad kan las byung ba dang / mkhris pa las byung ba'o/ /nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / nyin bdun pa dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / zla ba gnyis pa dang / yud tsam dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi
<p>160b.4</p>rgyal mo'i bden pas/ rig sngags de rnams kyang mi snang bar 'gyur te/ ded dpon de rnams kyang srung ba dang skyob par 'gyur ro/ /rtag pa'i rims dang zhes bya ba ni/ bad kan dang rlung 'dom pa'o/ /rims ldang dub pa zhes bya ba ni/ tshad pa dang rlung shas che ba'o/ /'byung po'i rims
<p>160b.5</p>dang zhes bya ba ni tshad pa drag por byung zhing rtsa rtsub pa'o/ /rlung las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur ba dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rlung ni g.yo bar byed pa'o/ /bad kan ni lci bar byed pa'o/ /mkhris pa ni tsha bar byed pa'o/ /'dus pa las gyur pa dang
<p>160b.6</p>zhes bya ba ni/ de gsum 'dus pas na 'dus pa'o/ /ldan pa ni gnyis gnyis ldan pas na ldan pa'o/ /rims thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshad pa'i rigs mi gcig pa bcu gnyis so/ /nad ni nad rigs mi gcig pa bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'o/ /gdon thams cad dang
<p>160b.7</p>zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i gdon la sogs pa stong phrag brgyad cu'o/ /dug thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ nang gi dug gsum phyi'i dug gsum mo/ /sdig pa thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ las dang bag chags shes bya'i sgrib pa'o/ /sdug bsngal thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ nyon mongs
<p>161a</p>
<p>161a.1</p>pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad bdag la med par gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 
<p>161a.2</p>sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ srung ba sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i/ gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi gnas skabs te bcu pa'o// //
<p>161a.3</p>kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas bka' stsal pa'o/ /sha za chen mo bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams la dbang mdzad cing / mthu dang stobs dang ldan pa ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa
<p>161a.4</p>srung zhing rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o/ /gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa na yang srung zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di'i gzi brjid kyis/ mi chags pa chags par byed pa ste/ chags nas mer mer ba'i dus su srung ba/ skyes ma thag tu
<p>161a.5</p>yang srung pa'o/ /btsa' kha dang btsas pa na yang bsrung ba dag go zhes bya ba ni/ ma skyes pa'i gong dang skyes ma thag tu yin te/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis sha za mo chen mo bcu gnyis kyis srung bar byed do/ /bcu gnyis ni gang zhe na zhes bya ba ni/ sngon gyi las kyi 'phros sha za
<p>161a.6</p>mor skyes shing / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ sha za mo chen mo bcu gnyis blta'o/ /phreng ma dang / rnam par phreng ma dang / rab tu phreng ma dang / kun du phreng ma dang / 'phrog ma dang / seng ge'i ral pa dang / spre'u ltar dmar ser dang / nag
<p>161a.7</p>mo dang / mi bzad ma dang / dung mgrin ma dang / bya rog ma dang / bum bu'i lto ste zhes bya ba ni/ de bcu gnyis po ni/ shin tu mthu che zhing stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dkar mo dang / nag mo dang / ser mo dang / dmar mo dang / ljang gu

<p>161b.1</p>dang / dkar ser dang / dmar ser dang / mthing ga dang / dmar nag dang / dkar mo dang / sngo bsangs dang / dmar ser mo'o/ /g.yas rnams na 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / ral gri dang / me long dang / ut+pa la ser po dang / ut+pa la dmar po dang / ut+pa
<p>161b.2</p>la sngon po dang / dung dang / lhung bzed dang / bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na zhags pa dang / ba dan dang / thod ba dang / dril bu dang / rtse gsum dang / dgra sta dang / lcags kyu dang / thod pa dang / ral gri dang / mda' gzhu dang / phreng ba dang / dbyug pa gsum bsnams
<p>161b.3</p>pa'o/ /sha za chen mo 'di dag rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ stobs chen mo bcu gnyis ni/ sa 'og sa steng sa bla rnams rgyu ba ni/ skad cig mas rgyu ba'o/ /'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi 'od kyis rang gsal ba'o/ /kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ rang rang gi kha dog
<p>161b.4</p>dkar po la sogs pas mdzes par ldan pa'o/ /grags pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams na grags pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul che zhes bya ba ni/ nam mkha' la bya bzhin du rgyu ste/ chu la nya bzhin te/ sa la byi ba bzhin du 'dzul ba'o/ /lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar
<p>161b.5</p>byed pa dag go zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang lha ma yin 'thab rtsod la sde bo cher grags nas/ gang gi ngos nas grogs byas na rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni gang zag 'di la gus par byed pa sha za chen mo

<p>162a</p>
<p>162a.1</p>'od zer dang ldan pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ /sba ba zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po rnams kyis glags tshol ba las sba ba'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba ni 'byung pos 'jigs pa rnams las bskyab pa'o/ /yongs su gzung ba dang zhes bya ba
<p>162a.2</p>ni/ 'byung po rnams kyis gzung bar 'dod pa mi snang bar mdzad pa'o/ /yongs su bskyad ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje'i phung po btags nas gzhan rnams kyis glags mi rnyed pa'o/ /zhi ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po dang / yi dgas rnams zhi bas dbang du sdud pa'o/ /
<p>162a.3</p>bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ bkra shis shing phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /chad pa spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams kyi chad pa spang ba'o/ /mtshon cha spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ mtshon sna tshogs kyi dbus nas kyang mi tshugs pa'o/ /dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>162a.4</p>'ong du ma bcug par sngar nas bkag pa'o/ /dug gsad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor na yod pa nus pas gsad pa'o/ /mtshams gcad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dpag tshad lnga brgya'i bar man chod bcad pa'o/ /sa bcing ba dang zhes bya ba ni 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor yan chad do/ /lo brgya
