<p>162b.3</p>mdog dang phyag mtshan ni ser mo dang / dmar ser dang / dkar ser dang / sngo bsangs dang / ljang ser dang / dkar mo dang / dmar mo dang / nag mo'o/ /g.yas rnams na me long dang / dri'i phor ba dang / rin po che'i phreng ba dang / pi wang dang / gling bu dang / rnga dang rnga rked nyag dang / rnga
<p>162b.4</p>rings so/ /g.yon rnams na lhung bzed bsnams pa'o/ /sha za mo brgyad po 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'jig rten khams na rgyu ba'o/ /'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni 'od zer gyis snang ba ste/ 'od des gzhan yang khyab pa'o/ /kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya

<p>163b.1</p>sngon mo dang / dmar nag dang / mthing nag dang / nag mo dang / thal ba'i mdog can no/ /g.yas rnams na gri gug dang / rtse gsum dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / lcags kyu dang / snying dang / sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams pa/ g.yon rnams na thod pa khrag gis gang ba

<p>163b.7</p>kyi srog snying dang / rig sngags kyi las kyi snying po'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ ha re/ kha re la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /srin po chen po sha dang khrag za ba mi dag la rnam par 'tshe ba lnga po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni/

<p>164a.1</p>phyi'i rgya mtsho'i 'gram du grong khyer lang+ka na srin po lnga po stobs dang ldan pa/ mthu che ba skad cig mas gling bzhir rgyu ba/ skyes pa pho mo la gnod pa/ sha khrag la dga' ba/ sems can thams cad la gnod pa byed pa'o/ /gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs

<p>164a.7</p>kyang 'di drag po mthong ste/ 'od de yang me lce 'bar ba'i 'od dang 'dra ba'o/ /kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni so so rang rang gi kha dog dang ldan pa'o/ /grags pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams su grags pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba zhes bya ba ni/ skad cig mas
<p>164b</p>
<p>164b.1</p>gling la rgyu nus pa'o/ /lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed ba zhes bya ba ni/ drag po'i tshul gyis g.yul las bzlog nus te/ 'thab rtsod byed pa la rem ba'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag
<p>164b.2</p>gis 'di la gus par bsrung ba dang skyabs su gsol na/ srin po de dag gis kyang mi tshugs pa/ rig sngags kyi ngo bo nyid thob pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi ngo bo gang zhe na/ thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin te/ thabs kyi ngo bo ni/ sku mdog dang phyag mtshan bstan pa/ shes rab kyi ngo bo ni bya ba nan
<p>164b.3</p>tan gyi ye shes so/ /zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa/ sku mdog ljang gu'o/ /g.yas dkar ba/ g.yon dmar ba/ spyan gsum pa/ dbu la rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyi bo'i gtsug na sna tshogs rdo rjes brgyan pa/ las kyi rigs 'du byed kyi phung po'o/ /g.yas rnams na ral gri dang /

<p>164b.7</p>pa dang / rtsod pa dang / g.yul du zhugs shing / mi rnams la 'tshe bar byed pa ste/ rims nad dang / khrag nad gtong bar byed pa dag go/ /gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa na yang srung zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gzi brjid kyis 'di
<p>165a</p>
<p>165a.1</p>la gus par byed pa tsam la/ gnod pa bcings pa ste/ gang zag gi thog ma dang / tha ma bar du bsrung ba'o/ /btsa' kha dang btsas pa na yang srung ba dag go zhes bya ba ni skyes pa'i dus nas rgas pa'i bar du bsrung ste/ glo bur gyi rkyen yang mi gtong ba'o/ /de dag kyang gang zhe na zhes
<p>165a.2</p>bya ba ni gzugs che zhing bzhin mi sdug pa gsus pa che ba/ mgo che ba/ mig kyang glog dang 'dra ba/ smin ma khro gnyer can skra kham nag gyen du gzings pa/ skad che ba sbom pa/ sems can rnams la 'jigs pa dang / skrag par byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs pa dang skrag par byed
<p>165a.3</p>pa brgyad pa'o/ /blta ba'o/ /glen ma dang / mtshams bzang ma dang / ku sha lta bu'i mig can ma dang / skra can dang / kam po dzi dang / rab mdzes ma dang / mig dmar mo dang / mi bzad ma ste zhes bya ba ni/ mthu che zhing stobs dang ldan pa ste/ mi rnams la 'tshe ba la dga' ba'o/ /de rnams
<p>165a.4</p>kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni nag po dang / sngo bsangs dang / ljang nag dang / mthing nag dang / dmar nag dang / thal ba'i mdog can dang / sngo skya dang / ljang gu'o/ /g.yas rnams na mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / rtse gcig dang / tom ra dang / gtun shing dang / 'khor lo dang / 
<p>165a.5</p>mda' gzhu dang / rtse gsum bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na zhags pa dang / sbrul dang mi snying dang / mi mgo dang / mi'i pags pa dang / rgyu zhags dang / thod pa dang / mi ro bsnams pa'o/ /dri mi zhim pa sbrul gyis brgyan pa'o/ /gcer bur gnas pa/ mi'i zhing lpags
<p>165a.6</p>gon pa'o/ /de dag ni sha dang khrag za ba zhes bya ba ni/ mdza' ba mi mdza' bar bya ste/ 'thab rtsod kyi sems bcug nas mtshon gyis mtshon 'gyed par byed pa nye ba dang me 'khrug par byed pa la dga' ba'o/ /skyes pa dang bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag kyang 'phrog pa zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>165a.7</p>de rnams dang phrad glags med pa/ gal te phrad par gyur na/ srog 'phrog pa grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ ljongs sam/ grong rdal lam/ pho brang dag la rgyu ba sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed cing / srog 'phrog pa/ khye'u bu mo mngal na yod pa yang 'phrog pa ste/ de sha khrag
<p>165b</p>
<p>165b.1</p>rnag la dga' ba'o/ /grong du zhugs pa'i khyim bdag dang / khang stong la brten pa zhes bya ba ni/ shin tu rang gi rigs sdang ba la srung ba/ stong pa'i nang du gzugs mi snang bar 'dod pa/ yang na gzugs kyi rang bzhin ma yin te/ yid kyi rang bzhin du yod pa/ gzugs mi snang ba'o/ /mun
<p>165b.2</p>pa'i 'od 'gro ba rjes su 'gro ba/ sgra 'byin pa zhes bya ba ni/ dur khrod dam/ lam rgya gram mam/ sum mdo 'am/ pho brang ngam de rnams mun pa la rgyu zhing / 'jigs pa dang / skrag par byed pa ste/ de bzhin du mi rnams la gnod pa byed pa'o/ /mi 'di rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog par byed pa
<p>165b.3</p>che ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ mi rnams kyi gzi brjid 'phrog pa/ sems can rnams la 'tshe bar grags pa/ shu ba dang / g.ya' ba dang / mdze dang / phol mig dang / sha bkra dang / 'bras dang / g.yan pa dang / dmu chu dang / de la sogs pa'i nad rnams gtong bar byed pa dag go/ /de dag ni
<p>165b.4</p>snying rje med cing / mi'i skye dgu skrag par byed pa ste zhes bya ba ni srin mo brgyad po de dag kyang sems can rnams la rtag tu 'tshe ba ste/ shan pa bzhin du sems can la byas pa ste/ sha khrag la de bzhin du dga' ba ste/ srin mo de dag ni 'jigs par snang ngo / /srin mo chen po brgyad po de
<p>165b.5</p>dag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ tshan gcig la 'tshe ba'i dus su gzugs che bar bstan te/ tshan gcig ba spu'i bu ga nas bzung nas gnod pa byed pa'o/ /'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ me dpung 'bar ba'i 'od zer dang ldan pa/ de dag gi 'od zer kha dog drug dang
<p>165b.6</p>ldan pa'o/ /kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ so so rang rang gi kha dog dang ldan pa/ de'i kha dog gis mdzes par snang ba'o/ /grags pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nang na grags pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba zhes bya ba ni/ skad cig mas gling bzhir rgyu ba'o/ /
<p>165b.7</p>lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa dag go zhes bya ba ni/ de gnyis 'thab pa'i dus su yang de rnams kyis 'thab rtsod byed pa ste/ shin tu stobs dang ldan pa/ mthu che bar grags pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung
<p>166a</p>
<p>166a.1</p>ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gis 'di la gus par byed pa'i sems can brgyad po de dag gis srung bar byed de/ gnod pa drag pos gnod par mi nus pa/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'da' bar mi nus pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni mtshon bya ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te/ 
<p>166a.2</p>shes rab lta bu'o/ /mtshon byed ni gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bdag nyid do/ /de yang rdo rje'i rigs rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o/ /ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid zhal gsum phyag drug pa sku mdog mthing gar bzhugs pa'o/ /zhal gsum du snang ba ni sku gsung thugs
<p>166a.3</p>kyi rnam par dag pa'o/ /sku mdog mthing gar snang ba ni/ byams pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /spyan gsum du snang ba ni ye shes gsum du rnam par dag pa'o/ /khro bor snang ba ni ma lus sems can yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /thod pa lnga'i dbu rgyan ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan
<p>166a.4</p>lnga bor nas ye shes lngar shar ba'o/ /dbu skra ser po gyen du 'bar ba ni theg pa sna tshogs bstan pa'o/ /dbu la rdo rjes mtshan pa ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi rnam par dag pa'o/ /khro gnyer du bstan pa ni theg pa gsum dang ldan pa'o/ /mche ba gtsigs pa ni/ kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i rang bzhin bstan
<p>166a.5</p>pa'o/ /sbrul gyis yan lag brgyan pa ni nang gi dug dang phyi'i dug bcom pa'o/ /phyag drug dang ldan pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'o/ /g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum pa ni mya ngan dang srid pas ma gos pa'o/ /zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa ni thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'i brda
<p>166a.6</p>bstan pa'o/ /pad+ma brgyad pa'i gdan ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do/ /phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /de'i 'og rdo rje bsnams pa ni/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin dag pa'o/ /tha ma gtun shing bsnams pa ni/ theg pa du ma rnam par dag pa'o/ /
<p>166a.7</p>g.yon rma bya'i sgro bsnams pa ni dug gsum rnam par 'joms pa'o/ /bar ma na zhags pa bsnams pa ni/ bdud bzhi bcing ba'o/ /tha ma na rtse gsum bsnams pa ni/ srid gsum rnam par 'joms pa'o/ /ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin rnam par bstan pa ni/ rig sngags kyi rang bzhin stong
<p>166b</p>
<p>166b.1</p>pa nyid du bstan pa'o/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes ni 'jig rten gyi khams me long lta bu ste/ sgyu ma lta bu snang ba rnam par dag pa'o/ /de lta bu'i rig sngags la gang zag dag gis mos par gyur na/ brgyad po de dag gis gnod par mi nus te/ de rnams kyis kyang mchod par 'os pa'o/ /sba ba la

<p>166b.3</p>mas bka' stsal ba'o/ /srin ma chen mo bcu bo 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing / rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs na yang srung zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi
<p>166b.4</p>bka' las mi 'da' bar byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu can sems can ma'i sa bon srung ba'o/ /btsa' kha dang btsas pa na yang bsrung ba dag go zhes bya ba ni/ rgyu'i byang chub sems dpa'i phung po lnga'i rang bzhin rgyu'i sems dpas bsrung ba'o/ /de dag kyang gang zhe na zhes bya ba ni/ bcu po
<p>166b.5</p>srin mo'i rang bzhin rnam par smin pa las byung ba sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ srin mo bcu bor blta'o/ /srin mo 'phrog ma dang / srin mo dga' mo dang / srin mo dmar ser mo dang / srin mo dung can ma dang / srin mo lus las byung ma dang / srin mo lha bshos
<p>166b.6</p>ma dang / srin mo bum pa ma dang / srin mo me tog kun+da'i mche ba can dang / srin mo 'phyang ma dang / srin mo me ste zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams ni stobs che zhing mthu che ba ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba ste/ sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ 
<p>166b.7</p>ser mo dang / nag mo dang / dmar ser ma dang / dkar mo dang / sngo skya dang / dmar mo dang / ljang gu dang / dkar ser dang / mthing ga dang / gser gyi mdog can ma'o/ /g.yas rnams na ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / dung dang 'khor lo dang / kun+da dang me tog
<p>167a</p>
<p>167a.1</p>sun+da dang puN+Da rI ka dang / ut+pal ser po bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na lhung bzed bsnams pa'o/ /srin mo chen mo bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ gong nas gong du 'gro ba skad cig mas slebs te/ char dang me 'bar bar nus so/ /'od

<p>167a.7</p>sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ ha re/ kha re la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni shAkya seng ge'i thugs rjes dgongs nas bka' stsal ba'o/ /srin mo chen mo bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /
<p>167b</p>
<p>167b.1</p>gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa na yang srung zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i sems dpa' mngal na srung ste/ de yang bar du srung / tha mar yang srung ba'o/ /btsa' kha dang btsas pa na yang srung ba dag go zhes bya ba ni ma btsas pa nas bsrung ste/ skyes nas lo brgya bcu gnyis bar du bsrung
<p>167b.2</p>ba'o/ /de dag kyang gang zhe na zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dang ldan pa/ srin mo bcu gnyis stobs dang ldan pa mthu che ba dag go/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni srin mo rnams blta'o/ /srin mo mgon med ma dang / srin mo rgya mtsho ma dang / srin mo drag mo dang / srin mo srog 'phrog ma dang / srin mo rig ma dang / 
<p>167b.3</p>srin mo gzhu 'dzin ma dang / srin mo mda' 'dzin ma dang / srin mo ral gri 'dzin ma dang / srin mo gshol 'dzin ma dang / srin mo 'khor lo 'dzin ma dang / srin mo khor yug dang / srin mo 'jigs byed ma ste zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing sems can gyi don byed pa byang chub sems
<p>167b.4</p>ma'i rang bzhin no/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ mthing ga dang / dkar mo dang / sngo bsangs dang / dmar mo dang / ser mo dang / sngon mo dang / ljang gu dang / dmar ser dang / dkar ser dang / dud ka dang / ljang nag dang / nag mo'o/ /g.yas rnams na bum pa dang /

<p>167b.6</p>dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs sna tshogs sprul zhing / rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs byed pa'o/ /'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi 'od kyis gsal ba'o/ /kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi kha dog dang mdzes par ldan pa'o/ /grags pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams na grags
<p>167b.7</p>pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ skad cig mas gang du yang 'khor ba'o/ /lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul yang myong bar byed pa dag go zhes bya ba ni lha dang lha ma yin 'thabs pa'i dus su yang rdzu 'phrul snang ba'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la

<p>168a.1</p>srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gis rig sngags 'di la gus par byas na/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis de rnams kyis srung ba dag go/ /rig sngags ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog ser mo chu'i khams/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan
<p>168a.2</p>gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dbu la rin po ches mtshan pa/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na/ rdo rje dang ut+pal ser po bsnams pa/ g.yon pa gnyis na rma bya'i sgro dang dung ser po bsnams pa'o/ /g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum pa/ zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i
<p>168a.3</p>'od dang ldan pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ gong bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ srin mo bcu gnyis kyi srog sngags dang rig sngags kyi snying po'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ ha re/ kha re la
<p>168a.4</p>sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /ma mo bcu gnyis po zhes bya ba 'di dag ni/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi khrag khrug dus su phyung zhing / lha ma yin rnams 'dul bar byed pa/ da ltar mi'i 'jig rten gyi khams [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]gnod byed dang phan byed pa'o/ /
<p>168a.5</p>gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa na yang srung zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi mar grags shing dbang phyug mar 'gyur te/ de rnams kyis kyang rgyu'i byang chub sems dpa' srung ba'o/ /btsa' kha dang btsas pa na yang srung zhing zhes bya ba ni/ dang po skye khar srung ste/ bar ma skyes nas kyang
<p>168a.6</p>srung ngo / tha ma rgas ka na yang srung ba'o/ /gang dag sems can la gnod par byed pa skrag par byed pa rnam par 'tshe ba dag go zhes bya ba ni khams gsum tsam la skad cig mas rgyu zhing bcu gnyis po de dag gis kyang / sha khrag la dga' zhing 'jig rten tsam la gnod byed dang phan byed pa'o/ /
<p>168a.7</p>de dag kyang gang zhe na zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi ma mo bcu gnyis mthu dang stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ ma mo bcu gnyis por blta'o/ /tshangs pa'i chung ma dang / drag po'i chung ma dang / gzhon nu'i chung ma dang / khyab 'jug gi chung ma dang / phag gi chung ma dang / dbang po'i
<p>168b</p>
<p>168b.1</p>chung ma dang / lus ngan gyi chung ma dang / rlung lha'i chung ma dang / gshin rje'i chung ma dang / rlung gi chung ma dang / me'i chung ma dang / nag mo chen mo ste zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba dang / rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o/ /de rnams kyi phyag mtshan dang sku mdog
<p>168b.2</p>ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'o/ /tshangs pa mo la sogs pa rim bzhin du g.yas rnams na phyag 'tshal ba dang / bum pa dang / rtse gsum dang / a 'bras dang / rtse gcig dang / phreng ba dang / 'khor lo dang / a 'bras kyi snying po'o/ /rdo rje dang / thod pa dang / nya dang / dgra sta dang / rin
<p>168b.3</p>po che dang / nor gyi rkyal pa dang / sbrul gyi zhags pa dang / dung dkar po dang / be con dang / gri gug dang / rlung 'khril dang / rtse gsum dang / rtse gcig dang / phreng ba dang / gri gug dang / rtse gsum mo/ /g.yon rnams na rim pa bzhin du/ dbyu gu gsum dang phreng ba
<p>168b.4</p>breng ba dang / thod pa dang / /phreng ba dang rma bya'i sgro'o/ /dbyug to dang dung ngo / /gri gug dang thod pa'i nang na sman phud do/ /gri gug dang thod pa'o/ /'bras kyi snye ma dang ne'u le'i rkyal pa'o/ /bum pa dang zhags pa'o/ /sdigs mdzub dang mi mgo'o/ /ba dan dang zhags pa'o/ /

<p>168b.7</p>pa ni gong bzhin no/ /ma mo de dag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing kha dog dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pas/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa dag go/ /de dag dang ldan pa'i ma mo bcu gnyis po rig sngags kyi bka' las mi

<p>169a.1</p>'da' ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog dmar mo me'i khams/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa dbu la pad+mas mtshan pa/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na pad+ma dang 'khor lo/ g.yon pa gnyis na rma bya dang
<p>169a.2</p>lhung bzed bsnams pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas brkyang ba g.yon bskum pa/ zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ ma mo'i srog snying dang rig sngags kyi las kyi snying por blta'o/ /rig sngags
<p>169a.3</p>kyi gsang sngags ni/ ha re/ kha re la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi don la thugs rje chen pos bka' stsal pa'o/ /srin po'i chung ma sha za chen mo ral pa gcig ma zhes bya ba ni/ srin po'i rgyal po lang+ka mgrin bcu'i chung ma chen mo ste/ des sems can
<p>169a.4</p>rnams la gnod pa byed pa'o/ /rgya mtsho'i ngos la gnas pa gang dag khrag gi dri tshor na zhes bya ba ni/ lho'i 'dzam bu gling gi lho nub mtshams na/ phyi'i rgya mtsho'i tshal na/ yul lang+k+ra'i grong khyer na sha za chen mos sha khrag gi dri tshor na mi srun pa'o/ /mtshan gcig la dpag tshad brgyad
<p>169a.5</p>khrir 'gro ba yod de zhes bya ba ni sha khrag gi dri'i rnam pa tshor na mtshan gcig la gang na yod pa yang len nus so/ /de bzhin du sems can rnams la gnod pa byed pa'o/ /de yang byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa na yang srung zhes bya ba ni/ de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi
<p>169a.6</p>brjid kyis srung bar byed pa'o/ /btsa' kha dang btsas pa na yang srung ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ thog ma bar dang tha ma gsum srung ste/ gzi brjid che ba/ grags pa dang ldan pa 'od zer dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul yang myong bar byed pa
<p>169a.7</p>dag go/ /de'i kha dog dang phyag mtshan ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog nag po'o/ /ral pa gcig tu yod pa/ bzhin mi sdug pa/ g.yas gnyis na gri gug dang rtse gsum g.yon gnyis na zhags pa dang thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /des kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya
<p>169b</p>
<p>169b.1</p>chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gang gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la gus par byas na sha za chen mo des kyang srung ba dang skyob par bgyid pa'o/ /rig sngags ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog ljang gu rlung gi khams spyan gsum pa/ rigs
<p>169b.2</p>lnga'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ dbu la sna tshogs rdo rjes brgyan pa/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas gnyis na ut+pa la sngon po dang / pad+ma'o/ /g.yon gnyis na pad+ma'i sgro dang gos sna tshogs pa'o/ /g.yas brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum pa'o/ /zla ba'i gdan
<p>169b.3</p>la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ sha za chen mo'i srog snying dang / rig sngags kyi bka' las kyi snying po'o/ /rig sngags kyi las kyi snying po lta ba'o/ / 
<p>169b.4</p>rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ ha re/ kha re la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ thams cad mkhyen pas sems can gyi don la yang nas yang du bsrung ba'o/ /khyod kyis srin mo rnams kyi ming zung shig ces bya ba ni sngon yang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang
<p>169b.5</p>phyug gi dus su/ zangs gling gi rgyal khams na srin mo lnga brgya yod do/ /de yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi mdo za ma tog gi mdo las shes par bya'o/ /da ltar yang srin mo bdun cu tham pa mthu dang stobs dang ldan pa sangs rgyas dang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o/ /
<p>169b.6</p>'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ srin mo bdun cur blta'o/ /srin mo ser skya ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo pad+ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo ma he mo zhes bya ba dang / srin mo dkar mo zhes bya ba dang / srin mo sbu gu can zhes bya ba dang / srin mo 'bar ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo gdung ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo
<p>169b.7</p>bum pa can zhes bya ba dang / srin mo dri med ces bya ba dang / srin mo sa zhes bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni mthu dang ldan pa/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dmar ser dang / nag po dang / thal ba'i mdog dang / dmar po dang / dkar

<p>170a.2</p>pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bsnams pa'o/ /de rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba'o/ /srin mo seng ge'i zla ba zhes bya ba dang / srin mo snar ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo 'od zer ma dang / srin mo bsreg bya za ma dang / srin mo chu lha'i chung ma dang / srin
<p>170a.3</p>mo nag mo dang / srin mo glang chen mo dang / srin mo stobs can ma dang / srin mo za ba mo dang / srin mo lag 'gro ma dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bka' las mi 'da' zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dkar mo dang / dmar mo
<p>170a.4</p>dang / dmar ser ma dang / dmar nag gi mdog dang / dkar mo dang / nag mo dang / sngo skya dang / ljang gu dang / ser mo dang / dmar ser mo'o/ /g.yas rnams na rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / 'khor lo dang / zhags pa dang / sbrul gyi zhags pa dang / gri gug dang / mdung dang / 'phang
<p>170a.5</p>mdung dang / dgra sta dang / rtse gsum mo/ /g.yon rnams na pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /srin mo de rnams kyang sems can rnams la srung ba dang / skyob par byed pa/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o/ /srin mo ma tang gi dang / srin mo dmar ser mo dang / srin mo thigs pa 'dzin dang /

<p>170b.1</p>dang / gtun shing dang / zhags pa dang / sbrul gyi zhags pa dang / bum pa dang / mda' gzhu dang / mdung rings dang / rtse gcig bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na ut+pal bsnams pa'o/ /de rnams kyis rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar gang zag srung bar byed pa'o/ /srin

<p>170b.5</p>dag la srung bar byed pa'o/ /srin mo 'gegs ma dang / srin mo snang byed ma dang / srin mo 'gro ba ma dang / srin mo sgron ma kha dang / srin mo nor 'dzin ma dang / srin mo mtshan mo nag mo dang / srin mo gshin rje'i pho nya mo dang / srin mo mche ba ma dang / srin mo yA ma dang / srin mo dri med ma dang /

<p>170b.7</p>ga dang / dmar mo dang / sngo skya dang / ljang nag go/ /g.yas rnams na nor gyi rkyal bu dang / me spar dang / dbyug to dang / thod pa dang / rin po che'i snyim dang / gri gug dang / be con dang / mdung dang / dgra sta dang / rtse gsum bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na zhags pa bsnams
<p>171a</p>
<p>171a.1</p>pa'o/ /srin mo mgo brgya ma dang / srin mo lag brgya ma dang / srin mo mig brgya ma dang / srin mo gnod byed ma dang / srin mo 'joms ma dang / srin mo byi la ma dang / srin mo zla ba ma dang / srin mo mtshan mo rgyu ba dang / srin mo nyin mo rgyu ba'o/ /srin mo zhags pa dang zhes bya ba ni/

<p>171a.6</p>ga dang / dkar mo dang / nag mo dang / dkar mo dang / dmar nag gi mdog dang / sngon mo dang / khra mo'o/ /g.yas rnams na dgra sta dang / rtse gcig rnams dang / rtse gsum dang / mche ba dang / ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / gri gug dang / ral gri dang / dung dang / mdung rings dang / 
<p>171a.7</p>'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na gtun shing bsnams pa'o/ /srin mo chen mo de dag ni rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba gang zag dag la srung bar byed do/ /srin mo chen mo bdun cu po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni/ zangs gling gi rgyal khams na 'khyams shing / mi'i 'jig
<p>171b</p>
<p>171b.1</p>rten gyi khams la gnod par byed pa/ bdun cu po de dag ni lnga brgya'i gtso mo'o/ /da ltar yang 'jig rten dbang phyug gis srin mo lnga brgya btul nas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa srung ba ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i bka' las 'da' mi nus so/ /rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ rgya
<p>171b.2</p>mtsho'i nang du me dang rlung la sogs pa gtong bar nus pa/ bud med kyi gzugs sna tshogs sprul zhing sems can la gnod pa'o/ /'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi 'od kyis rang gsal zhing / gzhan yang gsal ba'o/ /yang na de'i gzi brjid kyis gzhan rnams zil gyis gnon pa'o/ /kha
<p>171b.3</p>dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ rang rang gi kha dog gis bdun cu mdzes par snang ba'o/ /grags pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ zangs gling gi srin mo lnga brgya 'jig rten du grags pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul dang zhes bya ba ni zangs gling gi rgyal khams na gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas par rgyu ba'o/ /lha dang lha ma yin
<p>171b.4</p>gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa dag go zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang lha min gnyis kyi 'thab rtsod la grogs byed nus pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la gus par byas na 'jigs
<p>171b.5</p>pa thams cad dang bral zhing / srin mo de rnams kyis srung bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog nag mo/ nam mkha'i khams dang ldan pa/ spyan gsum/ rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ dbu la rdo rjes mtshan pa/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ g.yas
<p>171b.6</p>gnyis na rdo rje dang mchod rten/ g.yon gnyis na rma bya'i sgro dang 'khor lo bsnams pa/ g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum pa/ zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba ni gshin rje'i 'jigs pa las sba ba'o/ /yongs su
<p>171b.7</p>bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bskyab pa'o/ /yongs su gzung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sdug bsngal gyis bzung ba las thar ba'o/ /yongs su bskyang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sdug bsngal bor nas dge ba la bskyang ba'o/ /zhi ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ nyon
<p>172a</p>
<p>172a.1</p>mongs pa rnams las thar nas dge ba la gnas pa'o/ /bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus ngag yid bde ba ste/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'o/ /chad pa spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ skye ba dang mya ngan gyi chad pa spang ba ste/ de ltar yang mi gnas pa'o/ /mtshon
<p>172a.2</p>cha spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad bcom pa'o/ /dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi dug gsum gyis mi tshugs pa'o/ /dug gsad dang zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis dug lnga bsad pa'o/ /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ tha ma
<p>172a.3</p>thog ma da ltar med pa'o/ /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig ces bya ba ni/ sems can rnams byang chub la 'god par blta ba'o/ /tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'byung po'am 'jig rten phyogs skyong ba'am/ rgyal po la sogs pa'am/ rig sngags kyi snying po blta ba'o/ /rig sngags
<p>172a.4</p>kyi gsang sngags ni/ hi li hi li la sogs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i ma mo rnams kyi gnas skabs te bcu gcig pa'o// //sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo swA hA zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rabs bdun la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab
<p>172a.5</p>pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa la sogs pa ste/ da ltar bzhugs pa shAkya seng ge'o/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /gang gis phyag 'tshal zhe na/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i gang zag gis phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /swA hA ni gang gi rten cing 'brel ba'i dngos grub ni/ de la
<p>172a.6</p>sogs pa gsang sngags bsam gyis mi khyab pa gnas pa'o/ /rig sngags chen mo dang zhes bya ba ni phyi'i rig pa dang nang gi rig pa ste/ phyi'i rig pa ni rig pa rnam pa lnga'o/ /de ni lha bsnyen dang / dbyangs dang / sman dang / bzo dang / sgra'o/ /lha bsnyen ni/ rgyud la sogs pa'i
<p>172a.7</p>bye brag /sngags dang / rgyud dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / sbyin sreg dang / dkyil 'khor dang / slob ma lhag par gnas par byed pa la sogs pa'o/ /dbyangs ni ring po dang thung ba dang / drag po dang / mthug po dang / sgra chung ngu dang / de rnams byung ba ni rig byed bzhi las
<p>172b</p>
<p>172b.1</p>byung ba'o/ /de la mkhas pas na dbyangs so/ /sman ni kha dog brtag pa dang / rtsa brtag pa dang / 'byung ba brtag pa dang / dus brtag pa dang / nyi ma brtag pa dang / de'i bye brag gis/ sems can rnams la gso ba byed pa ste/ dus bzung nas sman la brtag pa ste/ de bzhin du rlung dang / 
<p>172b.2</p>bad kan dang / mkhris pa la sogs pa'o/ /zas kyi bye brag dang / rtsa'i bye brag dang / phyi'i kha dog gi bye brag dang / chu/ dri ma/ mig /dbugs/ lce la brtag pa'o/ /de la brtag pas na sman no/ /bzo ni 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad la mkhas pa'o/ /sgra ni tshad ma'i rang bzhin
<p>172b.3</p>gyi srang la gzhal ba dang / gcig mthong bas mang po smra ba dang / gcig gis gcig smra ba ste/ gcig gis gnyis smra ba dang / gcig gis gsum smra ba dang / gcig gis mang po smra ba'o/ /de yang mtshan brgyad du byung ste/ mtshan brgyad pa de yang / rig pa'i sgra/ byA ka ra Na'i
<p>172b.4</p>sgra'i gnas brgyad do/ /de la mkhas pas sgra'o/ /nang gi rig pa ni brjod du med pa kha dog dang bral ba/ gzugs dang bral ba/ mtshan nyid med pa/ gzhi med cing ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o/ /sngags ni ma man+t+ra ste/ srung ba dang skyob par byed pa/ sngags de yang sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin/ 
<p>172b.5</p>phyogs rnams dang bral ba'o/ /chen mo ni nam mkha' bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rnams khyab ste/ de yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin no/ /gsang sngags chen mo dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshig tu brjod pa'i gsang sngags dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi gsal ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rang yang
<p>172b.6</p>dang po'i rnal 'byor tshogs sogs pa/ gnyis pa rnal 'byor chen po ste/ dam tshig sems dpa' dang / ye shes sems dpa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa'o/ /rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor ye shes gtso bor bzung nas rtag chad dang bral ba de'i ngo bo nyid rtogs pas na gsang ba'o/ /sngags ni
<p>172b.7</p>sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa'o/ /de nyid gzung bas na gzungs sngags so/ /chen mo ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /so sor 'brang ma chen mo dang zhes bya ba ni thabs shes rab gnyis su med de/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su med do/ /so so ni 'gro ba rigs
<p>173a</p>
<p>173a.1</p>drug /'brang ma ni chos sku/ chos sku la yang brjod bya'i rang bzhin dper na mda' la sgro btags pa lta bu'o/ /ma ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin no/ /de bas na so sor 'brang ma'o/ /chen mo de lta bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /srung ba chen mo 'di dag gis zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin
<p>173a.2</p>gshegs pa'i rigs so sor 'brang ma dang / rdo rje'i rigs stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma dang / rin po che'i rigs rma bya chen mo dang / pad+ma'i rigs gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma dang / las kyi rigs bsil ba'i tshal dang lnga'o/ /lnga po de yang ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin zhal gcig
<p>173a.3</p>phyag gnyis pa rnams so/ /sku mdog kyang dkar po dang / nag po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu'o/ /phyag mtshan yang rim pa bzhin du/ 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ /g.yon rnams na rim pa bzhin du dung dang / zhags pa dang / 
<p>173a.4</p>rma bya'i sgro dang / bum pa'i steng na rdo rje dang / skyabs sbyin no/ /gzugs kyang zhi ba dang / khro bo dang / rgyags pa dang / cung zad khro ba dang / bzhin 'dzum pa dang ngo / /de rnams la yang sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'khor lo dang / 
<p>173a.5</p>rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / sna tshogs rdo rjes rim pa bzhin du dbu la brgyan pa'o/ /zhabs rdo rje'i skyil krung du bzhugs pa/ zla ba'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /chen mo ni ye shes lnga bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /'di dag gis ni srung ba lnga'i dam tshig go/ /bdag la
<p>173a.6</p>srungs shig swA hA zhes bya ba ni/ rten gyi gang zag dang / sems can thams cad do/ /swA hA ni de gyur cig ces pa'o/ /gshed byed rnams bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo de rnams kyis rnam par rtog pa'i las bcom pa'o/ /bsgyur ba'i las rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ da ltar
<p>173a.7</p>rkyen gyis bsgyur ba'i las rnams so/ /byad dang zhes bya ba ni/ sngon gyi las 'phro'o/ /g.yengs byed rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ dran pa g.yengs pa las byung ste/ de bzhin du rtsub par byed pa'o/ /ro langs rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ sngags kyis langs pa dang / yi dgas kyi rang bzhin
<p>173b</p>
<p>173b.1</p>gyis langs pa dang / sbod gtong gi nus pas langs pa'o/ /sems bsgyur ba rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig pa'i sems bzhag nas ma rig pa'i sems su bsgyur ba rnams so/ /sbod gtong rnams bcom mo zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dmod mo'i rang bzhin btang ba/ 
<p>173b.2</p>drang srong la sogs pa'o/ /de bcom pa ni rig sngags kyis bcom pa'o/ /skem byed rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ sdangs shing 'gyur bar byed pa'o/ /smyo byed dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sngags dang / sman dang / yi dgas rnams kyis smyo bar byed pa'o/ /grib
<p>173b.3</p>gnon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ grib ma la bzung nas gzugs kyi phung po la gnod par byed pa'o/ /brjed byed rnams bcom mo zhes bya ba ni glo bur du byung zhing sems can rnams la gnod pa'o/ /de yang rig pas bcom pa'o/ /skem byed rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ gcod gi nad bzhin du
<p>173b.4</p>yun ring po'o/ /skrag pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs par byed cing sems can la 'tshe bar byed pa'o/ /dbyig dug rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'o/ /dug rnams bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis phyi'i dug dang / nang
<p>173b.5</p>gi dug bcom pa'o/ /bza' nyes rnams dang zhes bya ba ni nye ba la sogs pa'o/ /skyug nyes rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ sman dug tu song ba'o/ /gnod sgrib rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lta ba log par byed pa'o/ /gnod ltas rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lta ba log pa rnams gyis lta ba'o/ /

<p>173b.7</p>ba ni/ nyin gcig gis rdzogs pa long med pa rnams so/ /nyin gnyis pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ de bas ring ba ste nyin gnyis kyis rdzogs pa rnams so/ /nyin gsum pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ nyin mo gsum par rdzogs pa rnams te/ de gsod bar byed pa'o/ /nyin bzhi
<p>174a</p>
<p>174a.1</p>pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ nyin bzhi lon nas phan pa med pa'o/ /nyin bdun pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ rims tshad pa ste drug ma bzlog na bdun pa la 'chi ba'o/ /zla ba phyed pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan tshes grangs rnams ma bzlog na dus der 'chi ba'o/ /zla ba gcig pa
<p>174a.2</p>rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ rims nar ma ste/ dus gzhan la ma bzlog na/ zla ba gcig lon nas 'chi ba'o/ /nyin mo pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ snga dro nas dgongs ka la phan med par 'gro ba'o/ /yud tsam pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ glo bur gyi nad gang gis kyang phan med pa'o/ /rtag pa'i
<p>174a.3</p>rims rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lo nas lor 'gor ba ste gzhi tshad pas ma btang pa'o/ /rims ldang dub pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ gso ba dka' ba res 'byung zhing res drag pa'o/ /rlung las gyur pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ rlung las gyur pa bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa
<p>174a.4</p>rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ mkhris pa la nad mi gcig pa bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'o/ /bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ bad kan las gyur pa bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'o/ /'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ de gsum 'dus pa ste/ 'dus pa'i nad rigs mi gcig pa yang bzhi brgya
<p>174a.5</p>rtsa bzhir gnas so/ /mi'i rigs rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ rkun ma'am rgyal po'am de la 'jigs skrag gi rkyen gyis byung bas na mi'i rigs so/ /mi ma yin pa'i rims bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang rlung bad kan du bstan/ bad kan rlung du bstan/

<p>174b</p>
<p>174b.1</p>gsum de gsum gyis bsgyur nas yan lag na ba nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ de yang de la sogs pa nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi bcom mo/ /gdon thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i gdon la sogs pa bgegs rigs mi gcig pa stong phrag brgyad cu'o/ /dug thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ phyi'i dug
<p>174b.2</p>gsum dang nang gi dug gsum phyi'i bsdad pa dang 'gro ba dang byed pa'o/ /bsdad pa ni btsan dug la sogs pa rtswa dang lo ma'i dug go/ /'gro ba la yang bsam pa reg pa mthong ba kha rlangs so/ /byed pa yang dbyig dug la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /nad thams cad dang
<p>174b.3</p>zhes bya ba ni/ nad rigs mi gcig pa brgya rtsa bzhi rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyis bcom pa'o/ /bdag la bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gang dag dang sems can rnams la bde legs su 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs/ /zhes bya ba ni rig sngags
<p>174b.4</p>kyi gzi brjid kyis/ lus ngag yid mi bde ba'i rkyen byed pa mtshan mo dang nyin mo bde bar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma'i gung gis bde legs dang / /zhes bya ba ni nyi ma phyed na yang mi bde bar mi gnas pa'o/ /nyin mtshan kun gyi bde legs dag /ces bya ba ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i bar nas rtag tu
<p>174b.5</p>bde ba ste/ rgas nas ma shi ba'i bar du yang bde ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la stsol/ /zhes bya ba ni gang zag dag gis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar ba rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byang chub phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas ni snga
<p>174b.6</p>ma bzhin du bshad pa rnams te/ gzhi ma grub rkyen gyis ma gos pa rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /byang chub ni sems can rnams kyi don byed pa/ sa bcu la ni 'thob pa ste/ /de rnams la ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /grol gyur phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni grol gyur
<p>174b.7</p>ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams te/ grol ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bden pas rig sngags kyi bka' las grol ba'o/ /zhi gyur phyag 'tshal zhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni zhi gyur ni yang dag pa'i don mi 'gyur te/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las grol nas nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /zhi la
<p>175a</p>
<p>175a.1</p>ni sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin/ shAkya thub pa lta bur stong gsum gyi stong chen por snying rjes khyab pa'o/ /rnam grol phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshal lo/ zhes bya ba ni rnam grol ni 'grol byed de rnam par grol bar byed pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'o/ /'grol ba ni

<p>175a.3</p>gis kyang bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag rig sngags la gus par byed pa dag la gang yang de rnams kyis srung bar byed pa dag go/ /pha bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ bskyed pa'i sa bon gtong ba'i pha'o/ /ma bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ skyes
<p>175a.4</p>pa'i ma lan gyis mi 'khor ba'o/ /mngal bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ ma'i mngal na yod pa yang bde ba'o/ /rkang gnyis pa rnams bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ sems can mi la sogs pa'o/ /rkang bzhi pa rnams bde legs su gyur cig ces pa ni/ stag dang

<p>175a.6</p>pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i sngags bshad pa'i gnas skabs te bcu gnyis pa'o// //kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa'o/ /khyod kyis klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi ming zung shig ces bya ba ni/

<p>175b.1</p>rigs/ dmangs rigs so/ /rigs bzhi las byung ba ni de'i 'og ma ni/ bram ze'i bram ze/ rgyal po'i rgyal po/ rje'u'i rje'u/ dmangs rigs kyi dmangs rigs/ de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /dug bzhi la bsams pa las tshor ba byung ngo / /mthong ba la yang gnyis te/ mngon

<p>176a.1</p>po dang / dkar ser dang / dmar ser dang / dung gi mdog go/ /de rnams kyang zhi ba'i tshul du gnas pa/ dbu la sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang bcas pa/ sbrul gyi mdud pa'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /g.yas rnams na rin po che dang / bum pa dang / rin po che myu gu dang / rin

<p>176b.1</p>bsnams pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /de rnams ni cung zad khro bor gnas pa'o/ /dbu la sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang bcas pa/ sbrul gyi mdud pa'i steng na bzhugs pa/ gnod sbyin gyi tshul du gnas pa/ bram ze'i rigs bsam pa'i dug
<p>176b.2</p>can snga dro'i dus can no/ /klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyang sbrul gyi gdengs ka bco lnga bco lnga yod pa/ bram ze bram ze'i rigs la ni/ sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang / g.yon rnams na gnas pa'i sbrul gyi zhags pa ni dkar po'o/ /klu'i rgyal po bram ze bram ze'i rigs nyi shu rtsa gsum po
<p>176b.3</p>'di dag ni/ gzhan yang gang dag sa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dus dus su 'brug sgrogs pa/ dus dus su lo tog smin pa/ dus dus su char 'bebs pa/ dus dus su lo tog sgrub pa/ sangs rgyas mthong ba/ bslab pa'i gzhi gzung ba/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'am/

<p>176b.7</p>dpal 'phel dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal bzangs dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs bzangs dang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / 
<p>177a</p>
<p>177a.1</p>ljang gu dang / sngon po'o/ /g.yas rnams na dpal be'u dang / gdugs dang / 'khor lo dang / dung dang bum pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na sbrul zhags bsnams pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyang lha'i cha byad du bzhugs pa/ dbu la sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang bcas
<p>177a.2</p>pa/ sbrul gyi mdud pa'i steng na bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po chu skyes dang / klu'i rgyal po stag re dang / klu'i rgyal po lag bzangs dang / klu'i rgyal po ri rab dang / klu'i rgyal po nyi 'od dang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs

<p>177a.4</p>g.yon rnams na sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po de rnams ni dbu la sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang bcas pa/ sbrul gyi mdud pa'i steng na bzhugs pa/ dri za'i cha byad du yod pa/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po zla 'od dang /

<p>177a.7</p>bcas pa/ sbrul gyi mdud pa'i steng na bzhugs pa/ mi'i cha byad can no/ /rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po rgyas byed dang / klu'i rgyal po char 'bebs dang / klu'i rgyal po dri med dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs can mgo dang / 
<p>177b</p>
<p>177b.1</p>klu'i rgyal po lcang lo can gyi mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po rta mgo can dang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / ljang gu dang / nag
<p>177b.2</p>po'o/ /g.yas rnams na 'khor lo dang / rin po che dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / ral gri dang / rdo rje dang / gos sna tshogs pa bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /mthong
<p>177b.3</p>ba'i dug can/ rgyal po'i rgyal rigs/ dus nyi ma phyed na rgyu ba/ sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang bcas pa/ sbrul gyi steng na bzhugs pa/ sbrul de yang sbrul mgo bcu gsum bcu gsum du yod pa/ sbrul gyi kha dog ser por gnas pa/ g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa'i sbrul yang ser po'o/ /
<p>177b.4</p>klu'i rgyal po nyi shu rtsa gcig lho phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyis kyang gzhan yang gang dag sa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ dus dus su 'brug sgra sgrogs pa/ dus dus su lo tog smin pa/ dus dus su char 'bebs pa/ dus dus su lo thog sgrub pa/ sangs rgyas
<p>177b.5</p>mthong ba/ bslab pa'i gzhi gzung ba/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba/ nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang / me dang bye ma'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba/ rgyal po'i las kyi 'jigs pa las thar ba/ sa 'dzin pa/ rin po che'i gzhal yas khang chen por gnas pa/ tshe ring ba/ bskal
<p>177b.6</p>par gnas pa/ dbang che bar grags pa/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ longs spyod che ba/ 'khor phal che ba/ dgra dpung rab tu 'joms pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'od zer dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul dag
<p>177b.7</p>kyang myong bar byed pa dag go/ /klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyang chung ma dang bcas pa/ bu dang bcas pa/ tsha bo dang bcas pa/ spun dang bcas pa/ blon po dang bcas pa/ ded dpon dang bcas pa/ pho nya dang bcas pa/ mngag pa dang bcas pa/ g.yog dang bcas pa/ de dag ni lho
<p>178a</p>
<p>178a.1</p>phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po ba lang mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po ri dgas mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po glang po che'i mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po rlan stobs can dang / klu'i rgyal po skye bo 'tshe dang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba/ dkon mchog gsum la
<p>178a.2</p>skyabs su 'gro ba/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni dmar po dang / ser po dang / dmar ser dang / dkar po dang / ljang gu'o/ /g.yas rnams na rdo rje dbyug to dang / pad+ma'i dbyug to dang / rdo rje'i tho ba dang / rdo rje lcags kyu dang / rdo rje'i dgra sta'o/ /g.yon rnams na sbrul zhags
<p>178a.3</p>bsnams pa'o/ /lha'i cha byad du bzhugs so/ /dbu la sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang bcas pa'o/ /sbrul gyi mdud pa'i steng du bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po ris bkra dang / klu'i rgyal po mig bkra dang / klu'i rgyal po sna
<p>178a.4</p>tshogs sde dang / klu'i rgyal po mi gtong ba dang / klu'i rgyal po gtong ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dmar ser dang / ljang gu dang / ljang nag dang / dkar po dang / ser po'o/ /
<p>178a.5</p>g.yas rnams na pad+ma dmar po dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ut+pal dkar po dang / ut+pa la ser po dang / nA ga puSh+pa bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na sbrul zhags so/ /dri za'i cha byad du bzhugs pa/ dbu la sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang bcas pa/ sbrul gyi mdud pa'i steng na bzhugs pa'o/ /
<p>178a.6</p>rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang / klu'i rgyal po sgra sgrogs kyi bu dang / klu'i rgyal po rtogs pa'i bu dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal can dang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba/ dkon
<p>178a.7</p>mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni dmar po dang / ser po dang / ljang gu dang / sngo skya dang / dkar po'o/ /g.yas rnams na pad+ma dmar po dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / rin po che dang / ut+pa la dang / me tog ku mu ta bsnams so/ /g.yon rnams
<p>178b</p>
<p>178b.1</p>na sbrul gyi zhags pa'o/ /mi'i cha byad du bzhugs pa/ dbu la sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang bcas pa/ sbrul gyi mdud pa'i steng na bzhugs pa/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po 'phyang ba dang / klu'i rgyal po srin bu dang / klu'i rgyal po
<p>178b.2</p>mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po gser dang / klu'i rgyal po glang po'i rtsal dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' gsal dang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dkar po dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / 
<p>178b.3</p>nag po dang / ljang gu dang / dung gi mdog go/ /g.yas rnams na ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / nA ga puSh+pa dang / a so ka'i lo ma dang / tsam pa ka'i me tog dang / me tog kun+da bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na sbrul zhags bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi cha byad du bzhugs
<p>178b.4</p>pa'o/ /dbu la sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang ldan pa'o/ /sbrul gyi mdud pa'i khri la bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /sbrul bcu gcig bcu gcig tu gnas pa/ sbrul dmar por gnas pa/ g.yon na bsnams pa yang dmar
<p>178b.5</p>po'o/ /klu'i rgyal po de rnams ni rje'u rigs kyi rje'u rigs/ reg pa'i dug can/ dus phyi dro na rgyu ba'o/ /klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyis kyang gzhan dag sa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dus dus su 'brug sgra sgrogs pa/ dus dus su lo tog smin pa/ dus dus su char 'bebs pa/ dus
<p>178b.6</p>dus su lo tog sgrub pa/ sangs rgyas mthong ba/ bslab pa'i gzhi gzung ba/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba/ nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang / me dang bye ma'i 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i las kyi 'jigs pa las thar pa'o/ /sa 'dzin pa rin po che'i gzhal yas khang
<p>178b.7</p>chen po na gnas pa tshe ring ba bskal par gnas pa/ dbang che bar grags pa/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ longs spyod che ba/ 'khor 'phel ba/ dgra'i dpung rab tu 'joms pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul
<p>179a</p>

<p>179a.4</p>pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na sbrul zhags so/ /lha'i cha byad du snang ba'o/ /sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang ldan pa/ sbrul gyi mdud pa'i steng na bzhugs pa/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po nag po dang / klu'i rgyal po nye nag po dang /

<p>184b</p>
<p>184b.1</p>su 'brug sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sam/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yang dus dus su 'brug sgra sgrogs pa'o/ /dus dus su glog 'byin pa zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyis kyang nam mkha' la glog yang dag par 'byin

<p>184b.3</p>sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la sogs pa'i/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang yang zhal mjal te/ ma 'ongs pa'i byams pa la sogs pa rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /da ltar shAkya thub pa dang zhal mjal nas skyabs su 'gro ba'o/ /bslab pa'i gzhi bzung ba zhes bya

<p>184b.7</p>rnams gar bsdad pa'i sar lo legs pa'am/ char che ba'am/ chu bzang ba'am/ mu ges tshugs par mi 'gyur te/ sems can rnams la dpal 'phel ba'am/ klu'i 'jigs pas tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po na gnas pa zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>185a</p>
<p>185a.1</p>shar phyogs na gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang ni gzhi dngul las byas nas rin po che sna bdun la sogs pas byas pa'o/ /lho phyogs kyi gzhal yas khang ni gzhi gser las byas te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /nub phyogs kyi gzhal yas khang ni
<p>185a.2</p>gzhi pad+ma rA ga las byas pa ste/ rin po che sna bdun la sogs pas brgyan pa'o/ /byang phyogs kyi gzhal yas khang ni/ gzhi ma ra ka tas byas pa las rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /mtshams bzhi yang phyogs bzhi dang mthun pa'o/ /blta na sdug pa'i gzhal yas
<p>185a.3</p>khang gi nang na bzhugs pa'o/ /tshe ring ba bskal bar gnas pa zhes bya ba ni/ bar gyi bskal pa gcig tu gnas pa'o/ /dbang che bar grags pa zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan klu rnams kyang dbang che ba ste/ 'jig rten khams na grags pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba zhes bya ba ni/ sa 'og
<p>185a.4</p>sa steng sa bla rnams na gzugs sna tshogs sprul zhing / gong nas gong du rgyu ba'o/ /longs spyod che ba zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i longs spyod yod pa ji bzhin du de rnams kyang longs spyod pa'o/ /'khor phal che ba zhes bya ba ni/ sa srin nam sa bdag gam/ klu btsan nam/ klu la sogs pa'i
<p>185a.5</p>'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa gnas pa'o/ /dgra'i dpung rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams ni gzhan gyis mi thub ste/ gang du 'gro ba na yang rgyal ba rnam par rgyal ba'o/ /rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ skad cig mas stong gsum khyab pa'o/ /'od dang ldan pa
<p>185a.6</p>zhes bya ba ni/ de'i 'od kyis rang gi yul khyab pa rang rang gi 'od kyis rang gsal bar byed pa'o/ /yang na rin po che sna bdun gyi 'od kyis khyab pa'o/ /kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ rang rang gi kha dog blta na sdug pa mdzes pa'o/ /grags pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ klu byang
<p>185a.7</p>chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don byed par grags pa'o/ /lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa dag ste zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyis kyang blta bar nus shing / lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul bkye ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po chung
<p>185b</p>
<p>185b.1</p>ma dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po de rnams re re la chung ma brgya brgya dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la longs spyod pa'o/ /klu mo de rnams kyang skye legs pa blta na sdug pa/ rigs ji bzhin du klu mo rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /bu dang bcas pa tsha bo dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>185b.2</p>de rnams la bu dang tsha bo yang brgya brgya yod de/ longs spyod la sogs pa yang de bzhin no/ /spun dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du spun brgya brgya yod de rgyal po rnams kyi gcung po'o/ /longs spyod la sogs pa yang gong bzhin no/ /blon po dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>185b.3</p>blon po yang de bzhin no/ /ded dpon dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'khrug pa'i dus yang ded dpon de rnams kyis lag tu len pa'o/ /pho nya dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po re re la pho nya re re yod de/ pho nya'i dus su pho nya gtong ba'o/ /mngag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba
<p>185b.4</p>ni/ klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyi 'phrin no/ /g.yog dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams ni nang na yod pa ste/ g.yog brgya brgya dang ldan pa'o/ /'khor dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni/ nang 'khor phyi 'khor gnyis yin te/ de yang bsam gyis mi khyab par gnas pa'o/ /'khor
<p>185b.5</p>dang g.yog dang mngag pa dang / de rnams ni mi'i cha byad la smad sbrul du 'dug pa'o/ /sems can la gnod pa skyel ba nad sna tshogs gtong ba'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ thabs shes rab gnyis
<p>185b.6</p>su med pa'i rang bzhin sgro 'dogs med pa gnyug ma'i rang bzhin ngo bo nyid dang bral ba/ de lta bu'i rig sngags la gang zag gang dang gang gis gus par byed par gyur na/ klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyis kyang srung ba dang skyob par 'gyur ro/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs pa las sba
<p>185b.7</p>ba'o/ /yongs su skyob pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa'o/ /yongs su gzung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs pa las yongs su gzung ba'o/ /yongs su bskyang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs pa las thar nas bskyang ba'o/ /zhi ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ klu
<p>186a</p>
<p>186a.1</p>nad thams cad zhi ba'o/ /bde legs su gyur pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i nad kyi sdug bsngal las thar nas bde ba'o/ /chad pa spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ klu rnams kyi chad pas mi tshugs pa'o/ /mtshon cha spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyis kyang mtshon
<p>186a.2</p>cha'i 'jigs pa spong bar byed pa'o/ /dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug bzhi spang ba'o/ /dug gsod pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i dug bzhi rtsa ba nas med pa'o/ /mtshams gcad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ de'i nus pas mtshams las 'gal mi nus pa'o/ /sa bcing ba dang zhes bya
<p>186a.3</p>ba ni/ sa de ni gnod mi nus pa'o/ /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ rgas pa med cing nad thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig ces bya ba ni/ bu dang tsha bo thams cad mthong ba/ tshe ring bar gnas pa'o/ /gtsang sbra ma byas pa dang / gtsang sbra
<p>186a.4</p>byas pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gtsang sbra ma byas pa ni chos nyid yin te/ de yang rig pa'i rang bzhin no/ /gtsang sbra byas pa ni kr-i ya'i tshul gyis gnas pa ste/ de ni gtsang sbra la brten pa'i rig pa'o/ /myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dran pa stor ba ste/ rab tu myos
<p>186a.5</p>pa ni de bas kyang dran pa stor ba'o/ /'gro ba dang 'greng ba zhes bya ba ni/ thag ring ba dang / thung ba dang / bsdad pa'o/ /'greng ba ni dran pa mi rnyed cing 'gro mi shes pa'o/ /'dug pa dang nyal ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ ldang bar mi nus par nad kyis thebs pa'o/ /nyal ba ni de bzhin
<p>186a.6</p>du nad kyis thebs pa'o/ /mi nyal ba dang 'ongs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'dug snying mi 'dod cing / ma rig pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa dge bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ de la sogs pa rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis bde bar gnas pa'o/ /rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang
<p>186a.7</p>zhes bya ba ni/ srog dang nor shor ba las thar ba'o/ /chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ lam du zhugs pa dang / khyim du nor stor ba'i 'jigs pa'o/ /me'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi khyim du gzhan du 'gro ba'i sar ri la sogs pa tshig pa'o/ /chu'i 'jigs
<p>186b</p>
<p>186b.1</p>pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gru dang gzings dang rab kyi dkyil lo/ /mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dgra bo dang phrad pa'o/ /gsod pa'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ srog dang bral bar byed pa'o/ /phyir rgol ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ spro thung ba gshis ngan pa dang phrad pa'o/ /dgra'i
<p>186b.2</p>'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ de ni gnod par byed pa 'ba' zhig go/ /'joms pa'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po dang gzhan dbang che ba rnams kyis 'joms pa'o/ /pha rol gyi dgra'i tshogs kyis 'joms pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan yang dpung gis bcom pa'i 'jigs
<p>186b.3</p>pa'o/ /mu ge'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ char dkon pa dang char ches pa dang / sems can rnams kyi lo 'joms pa'o/ /dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ chu dang / me dang / mtshon dang / 'byung po dang / rims dang / thog dang / lhung ba
<p>186b.4</p>dang / rdib pa dang / sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rkyen gyis g.yo ba dang / rnam par smin pas g.yo ba'o/ /gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa las bdag bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ stag dang dom la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa ste/ rig sngags kyi
<p>186b.5</p>rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyis srung ba dang skyob par byed do/ /lha'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gdon rigs mi gcig pa stong phrag brgyad cu/ lha'i gdon la sogs pa gdon rigs stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis so/ /de la sogs pa ngan song bsam
<p>186b.6</p>gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /gnon pa'i 'jigs pa las bdag bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyis kyang gdon de rnams kyi 'jigs pa la bsrung ba dang skyab par 'gyur ro/ /gshed byed dang bsgyur ba'i las la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ las bcu bzhi
<p>186b.7</p>las thar pa ste/ de'i las ni rnam par smin pa dang rkyen gyis byung ba'o/ /smad pa'i 'jigs pa las bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyis kyang gdon de rnams kyi 'jigs pa las srung ba dang skyob par 'gyur ro/ /shu ba dang
<p>187a</p>
<p>187a.1</p>zhes bya ba la sogs pa/ mdze rigs mi mthun pa bco brgyad do/ /lhog pa'i 'jigs pa las bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ klu nad de rnams ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyis kyang nad de rnams las srung ba dang skyob par byed pa'o/ /mtshan
<p>187a.2</p>mo bde legs nyin bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung gi bde legs dang / /zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis dus de gnyis kyang bde bar gnas pa nad thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /nyin mtshan kun gyi bde legs dag /sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la stsol/ /zhes bya ba ni dus tho
<p>187a.3</p>rangs ka dang / phyi dro dang / rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis dus rtag tu bde ba'o/ /sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byang chub phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni rten gyi gang zag gis de lta bu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /grol gyur phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
<p>187a.4</p>zhes bya ba ni gzhi nas grol ba ste/ gzhi ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal lo/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las grol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhi gyur phyag 'tshal zhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni gzhi ni thun mong ste/ gzhi med pa ni thun mong ma yin pa'o/ /de gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
<p>187a.5</p>rnam grol phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni rnam grol ni gzugs lta bu ste/ grol ba ni sdug bsngal te/ sdug bsngal las grol ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bram ze gang dag sdig pa'i chos rnams bsal bar gyur pa de dag la yang phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya
<p>187a.6</p>ba ni/ sdig pas mi gos pa gtsang ba'i rigs rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gis kyang bdag la bskyang ba dang srung bgyis shig swA hA zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag rig sngags kyi rgyal mo la gus par byas nas rjes su yi rang zhing kha ton byed par gyur na srung ba dang skyob pa dang / sdug
<p>187a.7</p>bsngal thams cad las skyob par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i klu'i rgyal po brgya bdun cu'i gnas skabs te bcu gsum pa'o// //kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas gsungs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi
<p>187b</p>
<p>187b.1</p>rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo zhal bzhi phyag brgyad ma sku mdog ser mo/ zhal g.yas dkar ba g.yon dmar ba/ rgyab mthing ga'o/ /spyan gsum dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa phyag g.yas rnams na ral gri dang
<p>187b.2</p>'khor lo dang zhags pa dang ngo / /g.yon rnams na rma bya'i sgro dang / dgra sta dang / rtse gsum mo/ /tha ma gnyis na mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dbu la rdo rjes mtshan pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa zhabs phyed skyil du bzhugs pa/ pad+ma sna tshogs
<p>187b.3</p>kyi gdan dang / zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis gsungs pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ nam mkha'i rang bzhin dang 'dra ba sku gsung thugs rnam par dag pa de lta bu'i rig sngags yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam
<p>187b.4</p>par gzigs kyis gsungs pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs ni sku mdog gser dang 'dra ba/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas g.yon gnyis chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad pa rdo rje'i skyil krung du bzhugs pa/ zla ba'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od dang
<p>187b.5</p>ldan pa'o/ /tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis gsungs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags blta ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni a ra De ka ra De ma de la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
<p>187b.6</p>stsal pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa/ sku mdog ser mo g.yas mthing ga /g.yon dmar ba rgyab dkar ba'o/ /spyan gsum pa/ rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ rgyan
<p>187b.7</p>thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas pa gsum na ral gri dang / rdo rje dang / 'khor lo dang ngo / /g.yon pa gsum na rma bya'i sgro dang / zhags pa dang / dgra sta bsnams pa'o/ /tha ma gnyis na mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o/ /zhabs phyed skyil du bzhugs pa/ sna tshogs pad+ma
<p>188a</p>
<p>188a.1</p>dang / zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa'o/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa/ dbu la 'khor los mtshan pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can gyis gsungs pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'
<p>188a.2</p>lta bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo de lta bu gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas gtsug tor can ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser 'dra ba/ phyag mnyam gzhag tu mdzad pa/ zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan
<p>188a.3</p>pa'o/ /tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas gtsug tor can gyis gsungs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags blta ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ iT+Te mi T+Te la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub chen pos bka' stsal pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi
<p>188a.4</p>rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni zhes bya ba ni/ zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa/ sku mdog gur kum gyi mdog go/ /g.yas dkar ba/ g.yon ljang gu/ rgyab dmar ba/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ g.yas
<p>188a.5</p>rnams na ral gri dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che'o/ /g.yon gsum na rma bya'i sgro dang / rtse gsum dang / zhags pa'o/ /tha ma gnyis na mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o/ /zhabs phyed skyil du bzhugs pa'o/ /zla ba'i gdan dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /
<p>188a.6</p>dbu la rin po ches brgyan pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob kyis gsungs pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa mi dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin de de lta bu'i rigs kyi rang bzhin ni sangs rgyas thams cad skyob pas gsungs
<p>188a.7</p>pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad skyob pa ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog ljang gu g.yas mchog sbyin/ g.yon mnyam gzhag go/ /zhabs rdo rje'i skyil krung du bzhugs pa/ zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ sangs
<p>188b</p>
<p>188b.1</p>rgyas thams cad skyob pas gsungs pa'i rig sngags kyi gsang sngags blta ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ mo ri mo ri la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ thugs rje chen po gau ta mas gsungs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni zhes bya ba ni
<p>188b.2</p>rig sngags ni zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa/ sku mdog ser po zhal g.yas dkar g.yon dmar rgyab ljang gu'o/ /spyan gsum pa/ rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ g.yas gsum na ral gri pad+ma/ rdo rje'o/ /g.yon gsum na rma bya'i sgro/ lcags kyu/ dgra sta'o/ /tha ma gnyis na mda'
<p>188b.3</p>gzhu 'gengs pa'o/ /ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs phyed skyil du bzhugs pa/ sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan dang zla ba'i gdan dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa/ dbu la pad+mas brgyan pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
<p>188b.4</p>sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis gsungs pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba/ de lta bu'i rig sngags sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis gsungs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig ni zhal gcig
<p>188b.5</p>phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dmar ser/ phyag gnyis ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis gsungs pa/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags blta'o/ /rig sngags kyi
<p>188b.6</p>gsang sngags ni/ hi Di mi Di la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni zhes bya ba ni/ zhal bzhi phyag brgyad sku mdog dkar ser/ g.yas mthing ga /g.yon dmar ba/ rgyab ljang gu'o/ /
<p>188b.7</p>spyan gsum pa/ rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas gsum na ral gri dang / sna tshogs rdo rje dang / 'khor lo'o/ /g.yon gsum na rma bya'i sgro dang / dgra sta dang / rtse gsum bsnams pa'o/ /tha ma gnyis na mda'
<p>189a</p>
<p>189a.1</p>gzhu 'gengs pa'o/ /zhabs phyed krung du bzhugs pa'o/ /pad+ma sna tshogs kyi steng du zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /dbu la sna tshogs kyi rdo rjes mtshan pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser
<p>189a.2</p>thub kyis gsungs pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis kyi rang bzhin ye shes rnam par dag pa/ nam mkha'i ngo bo de lta bu'i rig sngags sangs rgyas gser thub kyis gsungs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas gser thub ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog gser gyi mdog
<p>189a.3</p>can/ g.yas pa skyabs sbyin/ g.yon pa ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas gser thub kyis gsungs pa'i rig sngags kyi gsang sngags blta ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni 'di lta ste/ ta ta
<p>189a.4</p>le ta ta le la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub chen pos bka' stsal pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni zhes bya ba ni/ zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa sku mdog ser po g.yas dkar g.yon dmar/ rgyab mthing ga /rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan spyan
<p>189a.5</p>gsum pa/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas pa gsum na ral gri dang / rdo rje dang 'khor lo'o/ /g.yon gsum na rma bya'i sgro dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa bsnams pa tha ma gnyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o/ /zhabs phyed skyil du
<p>189a.6</p>bzhugs pa/ pad+ma sna tshogs kyi steng na zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'i dbu la mchod sbyin gyis brgyan pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis gsungs pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ rig pa'i rang bzhin nam
<p>189a.7</p>mkha' lta bu 'jig rten gyi khams khyab pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ /de lta bu'i rig sngags sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis gsungs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas 'od srungs ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog ser po phyag gnyis chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya'o/ /
<p>189b</p>
<p>189b.1</p>zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis gsungs pa/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags blta ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni aN+Da re paN+Da re la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas shAkya
<p>189b.2</p>thub pas bka' stsal pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni zhes bya ba ni/ mtshon pa mtshon byed dang ldan pa/ mtshon pa ni ye shes so/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so/ /mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bdag nyid de/ de ni thabs kyi rang bzhin no/ /de ni gnyis su
<p>189b.3</p>med par bstan pa ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis su med par rnam par dag pa'o/ /zhal bzhir bstan pa ni tshad med pa bzhi rnam par dag pa'o/ /zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa ni/ ye shes gsum gyi rang bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan ni rigs lnga
<p>189b.4</p>rnam par dag pa'o/ /ye shes lnga dang ldan pa ni/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'o/ /zhal ser po dang / dkar po dang / dmar po dang / mthing gar bstan pa ni/ las bzhi rnam par dag pa'o/ /sku mdog gser du snang ba ni dug bzhi bcom pa'o/ /phyag brgyad
<p>189b.5</p>du snang ba ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pa'o/ /phyag g.yas na ral gri ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'o/ /de'i 'og rdo rje bsnams pa ni/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'o/ /de'i 'og 'khor lo bsnams pa ni/ ma
<p>189b.6</p>rig pa'i rang bzhin 'khor ba rnam par 'joms pa'o/ /g.yon dang po rma bya'i sgro bsnams pa ni dug bzhi rnam par 'joms pa'o/ /de 'og zhags pa bsnams pa ni ma rig pa'i bdud bzhi bcings pa'o/ /de 'og rtse gsum bsnams pa ni srid pa gsum rnam par 'joms pa'o/ /tha ma
<p>189b.7</p>gnyis na mda' gzhu 'gengs pa ni/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med par rnam par dag pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ni theg pa sna tshogs bstan pa'o/ /sku la na bza' gsol ba ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spong ba'o/ /zhabs phyed skyil du bzhugs pa ni/ sems
<p>190a</p>
<p>190a.1</p>can 'dul ba'i ngo bor bstan pa'o/ /sna tshogs pad+ma kha dog drug dang ldan pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'o/ /zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa ni/ kun rdzob dang don dam par dag pa'o/ /thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa ni/ ye shes kyi rang bzhin
<p>190a.2</p>chos kyi sku'i ngo bo rnam par dag pa'o/ /dbu la rdo rjes mtshan pa ni/ nam mkha'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dag pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nas zhes bya ba ni/ chos sku longs sku sprul pa'i sku la de gsum tha mi dad pa'i rang bzhin stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
<p>190a.3</p>'jig rten gyi khams khyab pa/ nam mkha' bzhin du rnam par dag pa sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin sems can gyi don byed pa sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog 'dzam bu gling gi gser dang 'dra ba/ g.yas sa gnon gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ g.yon
<p>190a.4</p>mnyam bzhag go/ /mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa/ dbu reg gtsug tor dang ldan pa/ sham thabs dang chos gos sku la gsol ba/ zhabs rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa/ smin ma mdzod spus brgyan pa/ pad+ma'i gdan dang
<p>190a.5</p>zla ba'i gdan dang / rdo rje seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la sogs pa ni sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ji bzhin no/ /sems can la phan pa'i phyir da ltar bshad pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ de lta bu dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ dge slong
<p>190a.6</p>sa ri dang / mtha' yas kyi sems can gyi don la dug bzhi rnam par sel ba'i phyir rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo sems can rnams la thugs rje che ba dug dang bdud dang 'byung po rnams kyi gnyen po nad thams cad sel ba 'byung po thams cad 'joms pa/ sku gsung thugs kyi
<p>190a.7</p>rang bzhin rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid rig sngags kyi rgyal mo de/ sangs rgyas shAkya seng ges rig sngags gsungs pa'o/ /t+yad thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rig sngags kyi gsang sngags blta ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ hi li
<p>190b</p>
<p>190b.1</p>mi li ki li mi li i li la sogs pa'o/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bstan cing rjes su yi rangs nas zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa rnam par rgyal ba sems can thams cad la bkra shis pa/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid do/ /de lta bu'i rig sngags ni yang dag par
<p>190b.2</p>rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas da ltar gsungs pa'o/ /dge slong kun dga' bos dge slong sa ri la bde legs su 'gyur bar byas pa de bzhin du bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ kha rlangs mche ba'i dug gis zin pa ste/ klu gdol pa'i rigs kyi rang bzhin de'i dug
<p>190b.3</p>sel ba dang / sems can rnams la phan par byed pa dang / de bzhin du bdag gis kyang de ltar gyis shig ces gsungs pa'o/ /de lta bu'i rig sngags sems can rnams la phan par byed pa dug gi nad thams cad bcom pa'o/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug gi 'jigs pa
<p>190b.4</p>las sba ba'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug gsum gyi 'jigs pa las bskyab pa'o/ /yongs su gzung ba dang zhes bya ba ni mi dge ba bcu bor nas/ dge ba la gzud pa ste/ nang gi gsum dang / phyi'i dug gsum spangs pa'o/ /yongs su bskyang ba dang zhes
<p>190b.5</p>bya ba ni/ 'jigs pa thams cad bcom nas/ dge ba la bskyang ba'o/ /zhi ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug la sogs pa'i nad thams cad zhi ba'o/ /bde legs su 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ lus ngag yid bde bar byed pa'o/ /chad pa spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ klu gdol pa'i
<p>190b.6</p>rigs kyi chad pa yang spang ba'o/ /mtshon cha spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ mtshon gyi rigs su gtogs pa rnams yang dag par spang ba'o/ /dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug gi rigs kyang dpag tshad brgyad cu'i bar nas zhi ba'o/ /dug gsad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ bsdad
<p>190b.7</p>pa dang 'gro ba dang byed pa'i dug gsum yang dag par 'joms pa'o/ /mtshams gcad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o/ /sa bcing ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rdo rje'i sa'i rang bzhin no/ /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ de'i
<p>191a</p>
<p>191a.1</p>nus pas nad med tshe ring ba'o/ /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig ces bya ba ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba la brtson zhing phun sum yang dag par rdzogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bos zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang nas yang du gsungs pa'o/ /
<p>191a.2</p>rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni zhes bya ba ni/ zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ sku mdog ljang gu/ g.yas dkar/ g.yon dmar ba/ spyan gsum pa ral pa'i thor tshugs can/ dbu la rgyan dang bcas pa/ sham thabs sku 'gag dang bcas pa/ g.yas pa na po
<p>191a.3</p>ti dang / phreng ba dang / bum pa bsnams pa/ g.yon pa rnams na rma bya'i sgro dang / bum pa spyi blugs dang / skyabs sbyin no/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ bzhengs nas bzhugs pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa/ zla ba'i gdan
<p>191a.4</p>la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa/ dbu la mchod rten gyis mtshan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pas brjod cing rjes su yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi rang bzhin sems can thams cad de lta bus khyab pa'i
<p>191a.5</p>rang bzhin te/ de lta bu'i rang bzhin rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsungs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog ser po ral pa'i thor tshugs can dbu la mchod rten gyis mtshan
<p>191a.6</p>pa'o/ /g.yas mchog sbyin g.yon bum pa spyi blugs bsnams pa'o/ /phrag pa na kr-iSh+Na sa le'i pags pa yod pa/ sham thabs dang sku ang+ga rag gis sku la brgyan pa/ me tog nA ga puSh+pas phrag pa gnyis la mdzes par brgyan pa/ de lta bu'i mdzes rgyud ldan
<p>191a.7</p>pa'i byams pas kyang gsungs pa'o/ /tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsungs pa rjes su yi rang ba rig sngags kyi gsang sngags blta ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ shi ri shi ri la sogs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen
<p>191b</p>
<p>191b.1</p>mo las 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar yod pa rnams kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'i gnas skabs te bcu bzhi pa'o// //kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi don du yang nas yang du gsungs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>191b.2</p>zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog dkar mo spyan gsum pa ral pa'i thor tshugs can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /g.yas gnyis na phreng ba dang dung bsnams pa/ g.yon gnyis na rma bya'i sgro dang / sbrul bsnams pa'o/ /bzhengs nas bzhugs pa/ zla ba'i gdan la
<p>191b.3</p>nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin rig pa mthar thug pa de'i rang bzhin mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas gsungs
<p>191b.4</p>pa'o/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa ni zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa sku mdog dkar po/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs can/ tshangs par spyod pa'i rang bzhin can/ phyag g.yas pa rnams na phyag 'tshal ba dang / phreng ba dang / bum pa dang / mchog sbyin du mdzad
<p>191b.5</p>pa'o/ /g.yon rnams ni po ti dang / dbyu gu gsum pa dang / bum pa spyi blugs dang / mnyam gzhag go/ /zhabs pad+ma'i skyil krung du bzhugs pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas smras shing rjes su
<p>191b.6</p>yi rang ba'i rig sngags kyi gsang sngags blta ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni hi li hi li mi li la sogs pa'o/ /dug bcom mo dug nges par bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis nang gi dug gsum dang / phyi'i dug
<p>191b.7</p>gsum bcom mo/ /nang gi dug gsum ni gti mug zhe sdang 'dod chags so/ /phyi'i dug gsum ni bsdad pa dang 'gro ba dang / byas pa'i dug go/ /gti mug ni glo bur gyi rkyen gyis shes pa bkag nas ye shes mi 'char ba ste/ des gti mug yin no/ /de nye bar gzhag pas
<p>192a</p>
<p>192a.1</p>gti mug gi rkyen gyis zhe sdang drag po 'byung ngo / /zhe sdang gi rkyen gyis khams gsum 'dod pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags drag po byung ste/ 'dod chags des yang nas yang du dmyal ba dang byol song dang yi dgas su skye ba'o/ /de ni nang gi dug gsum mo/ /
<p>192a.2</p>phyi'i dug gsum ni bsdad pa'i dug yin te/ btsan dug la sogs pa'i dug gis gsod pa dang / brgyal ba dang / smyo ba dang / 'gas pa dang / chu bur dang / long ba dang / lce lkugs pa dang / 'on pa dang / rengs pa la sogs pa'o/ /'gro ba'i dug ni/ bsams pa
<p>192a.3</p>dang / reg pa dang / kha rlangs so/ /des ni rlung dang / bad kan dang / mkhris pa dang / chu ser bzhi gtong bar nus so/ /dngos po yod pa'i dug ni reg pa dang / kha rlangs dang / mche ba'i dug go/ /des kyang shi ba dang / rgas pa dang / rengs pa dang / chu bur dang / 
<p>192a.4</p>lce lkugs pa dang / mig mi mthong ba dang / 'on pa dang / lus rengs pa dang / de la sogs pa gtong nus pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'i dug ni bsam pa dang mthong ba'i dug yin te/ bsam pas gnod pa ni stong phrag brgyad khri tsam gyi bar nas kyang gnod pa skyel nus pa'o/ /mthong
<p>192a.5</p>ba'i dug ni dpag tshad lnga nas kyang mthong ngo / /de gnyis kyang rlung bad kan mkhris pa chu ser gyi rang bzhin du yod pa de yang sa bdag gi nad mdze rigs mi gcig pa bco brgyad gtong nus pa'o/ /de rnams kyang shu ba dang / g.ya' ba dang / mdze dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa
<p>192a.6</p>dang / me dbal dang / lhog pa dang / dmu chu dang / chu bur dang / 'brum bu dang / sha bkra dang / mdzer pa dang / skrangs pa dang / glo dang / gcong dang / wa ba dang / mig tshags dang / ling thog dang / gag pa dang ngo / /de yang de rnams kyis gtong ngo / /gzhan gyi nad
<p>192a.7</p>kyang klad pa na ba la sogs pa nad rigs mi gcig pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi gtong nus pa'o/ /rims la yang de bzhin no/ /dug des kyang shi ba dang / gas pa dang / rengs pa dang / long ba dang / lce lkugs pa dang / 'on pa dang / rkang lag zha ba dang / de rnams la sogs pa lus
<p>192b</p>
<p>192b.1</p>kyi na tsha drag po 'byung ba'o/ /bsam pa'i dug can dang / mthong ba'i dug can gyis ni lo bdun bar du phyir 'phang ngo / /de ni dngos su med pa'i dug go/ /de la byed pa'i dug ni/ phyi dug nag po dang / rin po che dbyig dug dang / bdud rtsi las byung ba'i dug la sogs pa'o/ /sbyor
<p>192b.2</p>ba'i dug de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /phyi dug nag po ni/ dngul chu dang spu dug las byung ba'o/ /rin po che dbyig dug ni gser dngul zangs las byung ba'o/ /bdud rtsi dug ni sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang / 'khar ba las byung ba'o/ /des kyang mdze dang phol mig la sogs
<p>192b.3</p>pa gtong nus pa/ tsha ba dang / grang ba dang / tshigs gzhi na ba dang / phyi na ba dang / nang na na ba dang / shi ba dang / smyo ba dang / rengs pa dang / long ba dang / 'on pa dang / lce lkugs pa dang / mkhris pa'i rang bzhin du 'dar ba dang / pho ba la sogs pa na nus pa'o/ /
<p>192b.4</p>rig sngags des ni de lta bu'i dug bcom mo/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ rgyu med pa'i rang bzhin ngo bo nyid dang bral ba nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis me long gi gzugs brnyan dang / smig rgyu dang chu'i zla ba bzhin du
