<p>192b.5</p>gnas so/ /de'i ngang las 'jig rten khams su khyab pa las dang bag chags zhes bya ba bcom nas/ sems can rnams la nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa ste/ lus ngag yid gsum sangs rgyas nas bdud bzhi bcom pa'o/ /de lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo/ /
<p>192b.6</p>rang sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid ni lhag mthong gnyis yin/ lhag ma ni stong pa nyid du bsgom pa mthong ba ni lus kyi bya ba bstan nas sems can rnams la bstan pa'o/ /de gnyis kyi bden pa'i gzi brjid kyis rang
<p>192b.7</p>sangs rgyas kyis dug bcom mo/ /dgra bcom pa'i gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ dgra ni bdud bzhi ste/ bdud bzhi ni ma rig pa'o/ /ma rig pa ni 'khor ba'o/ /de lta bu'i 'khor ba'i dgra bcom ste/ de'i gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i gzi
<p>193a</p>
<p>193a.1</p>brjid kyis dug bcom mo zhes bya ba ni rang gi don la gzhan gyi don mi byed pa ni phyir mi ldog pa rnams so/ /de rnams ni 'gog pa'i rang bzhin/ de'i gzi brjid kyis dug bcom pa'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ cung
<p>193a.2</p>zad tsam sems can gyi don byed pa ste/ bag chags kyi sgrib pa bcom nas shes bya tsam gnas pa'o/ /de lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis kyang dug bcom mo/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin sems can rnams
<p>193a.3</p>kyi don byed pa mi dmigs pa'i snying rje skye ba'o/ /de lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis dug bcom pa'o/ /bden par smra ba'i gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang ma 'ongs pa rnams dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyis kyang bka' bden par
<p>193a.4</p>smra ba gzhan yang 'jig rten pa drang srong rnams kyi bka' bden pa'o/ /de'i gzi brjid kyis kyang dug bcom pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i be con gyi gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ tshangs pa'i be con ni dbyu gu gsum yin te dbyu gu gcig ni sku brtag pa/ gnyis pa
<p>193a.5</p>gsung brtag pa/ gsum pa ni yid brtag pa'o/ /de gsum ni khams gsum gyi rang bzhin de lta bu'i bden pa'i gzi brjid kyis dug bcom pa'o/ /dbang po'i rdo rje'i gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo zhes bya ba ni dbang po'i rdo rje ni gang la 'phangs pa'i sar dgra rnams 'dul
<p>193a.6</p>zhing slar rang gi lag tu 'ong ba'o/ /de lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis kyang dug bcom pa'o/ /khyab 'jug gi 'khor los dug bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ sa 'og sa steng sa bla gsum la 'phangs pa tsam gyis 'khor lo des dbang mdzad de/ 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug tu
<p>193a.7</p>grags pa'o/ /de lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis dug bcom pa'o/ /me dbal gyi dug bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ me ni tsha ba dang sreg par nus pa/ des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams sreg par nus pa de lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis kyang dug bcom pa'o/ /chu lha'i zhags pas dug bcom
<p>193b</p>
<p>193b.1</p>mo zhes bya ba ni chu lha'i zhags pa ni sbrul zhags yin te de ni klu rigs bzhi'i rang bzhin dug bzhi'i gnas pa bcing bar nus pa dug gis dug bcom pa'o/ /lha ma yin gyi sgyus dug bcom mo zhes bya ba ni lha ma yin re res bye ba dung phyur tsam du sprul nus so/ /ji ltar sprul zhe na/ 
<p>193b.2</p>glang po che dang rta dang de la sogs pa gzugs sna tshogs ston nus pa/ /'jig rten khams la sgyu ma byas pa'o/ /klu'i rig pas dug bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ phan bya dang gnod byed do shes pa tshe phyi ma la skye ba bdun du rig pa dran pa'o/ /drag po'i mdung rtses dug bcom mo
<p>193b.3</p>zhes bya ba ni de yang rtse gsum du gnas pas te de khams kyi rang bzhin srid pa'i klu'i rig pas dug bcom mo/ /skem byed kyi mdung thung gis dug bcom mo zhes bya ba ni de ni mdung rtse gsum yin te/ de 'phangs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten khams tsam 'jig par byed pa'o/ /des kyang
<p>193b.4</p>dug nges par bcom mo/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos dug bcom mo zhes bya ba ni phyi'i rig sngags dang / nang gi rig sngags so/ /phyi'i rig sngags ni kun rdzob kyi rang bzhin thabs lta bu'o/ /nang gi rig pa ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /
<p>193b.5</p>sngags ni sems can rnams la phan par byed cing srung ba dang skyob par byed pa'o/ /de lta bu yang sgyu ma lta bu ste/ 'jig rten khams mi rtag par gnas pa'o/ /de ni dug thams cad kyi gnyen po 'byung po thams cad kyi gtso mo/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
<p>193b.6</p>dpa' thams cad kyi yum du gnas pa'o/ /de lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis kyang dug bcom pa'o/ /dug nges par bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa dang / rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis dug kyang nges
<p>193b.7</p>par bcom mo/ /dug sa'i nang du song shig ces bya ba ni sa ni yum lta bu ste/ dug gi 'byung ba ni sa yin te sa des kyang dug sel ba dug gi nus pa med par byed pa'o/ /bdag dug thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni bdag dang sems can thams cad la gzi brjid de rnams
<p>194a</p>
<p>194a.1</p>kyis dug bcom mo/ /dug nges par bcom mo/ /be'u lta bu'i lte ba'i dug dang zhes bya ba ni de la gnyis yod de nag po mi srun pa'i sdig pa dang / rgyal po lta bu'i sdig pa'o/ /nag po mi srun pa'i sdig pa ni mjug ma dang lte ba la yod pa'o/ /rgyal po lta bu'i
<p>194a.2</p>sdig pa'i dug ni reg pa'i dug bzhin du lus thams cad dug tu na ba'o/ /de gnyis kyang lo gcig lon nas mdud pa re rer skye ba'o/ /de gnyis kyi mdog kyang dmar po dang / nag por snang ba'o/ /ha la ha la'i dug dang zhes bya ba ni/ de ni 'jig rten gyi lha rnams kyi dug yin te/ 
<p>194a.3</p>de yang mthong ba'am reg pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams sreg nus pa'o/ /nag po brtsegs pa'i dug dang zhes bya ba ni/ de la gnyis su yod de/ nang gi dug gsum brtsegs pa dang / phyi'i dug gsum brtsegs pa'o/ /nang gi dug brtsegs pa ni gti mug dang 'dod
<p>194a.4</p>chags dang zhe sdang ngo / /de'i ngang las ser sna dang / phrag dog kyang brtsegs pa'o/ /phyi'i dug ni bsdad pa dang / 'gro ba dang / byed pa'i dug brtsegs pa'o/ /yang na nag po brtsegs pa'i dug ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams kyis mi thub pa lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa
<p>194a.5</p>las byung ba/ klu'i rgyal po spyan mi bzang gi mig las btang ba mig long bar gyur te/ des na spyan mi bzang du btags pa'o/ /dbang phyug chen po'i lhas rna rgyan du btags pa'o/ /de bas na tri kan tha btags pa'o/ /mche ba'i dug dang zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i kha rlangs kyi dug
<p>194a.6</p>sbrul la sogs pa'i sems can las byung ba ste/ de yang rigs bzhi la gtogs pa'o/ /rtsa ba'i dug dang zhes bya ba ni btsan dug la sogs pa las byung ba ste/ de ni bsdad pa'i dug go/ /de yang rtsa ba la sogs pa'i dug go/ /nag po dang / dkar po dang dmar po la
<p>194a.7</p>sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /phyi ma'i dug dang zhes bya ba ni de sbyor ba'i dug las byung ba ste/ de yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /lta ba'i dug dang zhes bya ba ni de ni dbang phyug chen po'am klu rnams sam/ 'byung po'am gzhan drang srong la sogs pa sems can phal la
<p>194b</p>
<p>194b.1</p>yod pa'o/ /glog gi dug dang zhes bya ba ni/ des kyang sems can rnams la 'jigs pa dang skrag par byed pa ste/ des shi ba dang / brgyal ba dang / snying phyung ba dang / na bar nus pa'o/ /sprin gyi dug dang zhes bya ba ni/ lce 'bab pa dang / ser ba 'bab pa dang / thog 'bab pa
<p>194b.2</p>dang / 'brug gis 'jigs pa dang / de rnams kyis sems can la gnod par byed pa'o/ /sbrul dang zhes bya ba ni sbrul gyi rigs kyang rigs bzhi las byung ste/ sbrul nag po ni gdol ba'i rigs/ sngon po dmangs rigs dang / dmar po rje'u rigs te/ dmar skye rje'u
<p>194b.3</p>rigs so/ /ser po rgyal po'i rigs te/ ser skya rgyal rigs so/ /dkar po bram ze'i rigs te/ dkar ser ni bram ze'i rigs so/ /de yang dug bzhi tshang ba'o/ /byi ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ mche ba'i dug yin te/ de yang dug bzhir 'dzin pa/ dug bzhir gnas
<p>194b.4</p>pa'o/ /srin bu ki ta dang zhes bya ba ni/ sems can mchu ring ba phra mo'i rigs de yang mche ba'i dug can no/ /lu ta dang zhes bya ba ni sbrang po che de ni mjug ma dang lte ba'i dug can reg pa'i dug la gtogs pa'o/ /ka na b+ha ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ de yang chu la gnas pa kum+b+hi
<p>194b.5</p>ra dang / chu srin la sogs pa'i kha rlangs dang mche ba'i dug go/ /sbal pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ mjug rings dang / sbal pa sbrul mgo can dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / nag po'i rigs kyang yod de/ de yang dus bzhi dug bzhi la gnas pa'o//
<p>194b.6</p>sbrang bu dang zhes bya ba ni chu'i sbrang bu dang sbrang bu ser po dang de yang dus kyi khyad par gyis sbrang rtsi las byung ba'i dug dang / sbrang bu'i mjug ma las byung ba dang / des kyang rengs pa dang / shi ba dang / rgas par nus pa'o/ /bung ba zhes bya ba ni bung ba las byung ba'i sbrang rgod la
<p>194b.7</p>sogs pa'o/ /ba ta ri dang zhes bya ba ni byang ba nag po'o/ /tre ma bu ka dang zhes bya ba ni de ni sems can sre mo'o/ /trai la ta'i dug dang zhes bya ba ni mche ba'i dug can la khyi dang spyang ki dang / stag dang dom la sogs pa las byung ba'o/ /mi'i dug dang zhes bya ba
<p>195a</p>
<p>195a.1</p>ni/ rig pa'i nus pas sbod gtong dang ma mo la sogs pa'i mthus rengs pa dang shi ba dang / smod pa la sogs pa'i nus pa'o/ /sdig pa'i dug dang zhes bya ba ni sems can sdig pa dang / mi dge ba'i sdig pa'o/ /mi ma yin pa'i dug dang zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>195a.2</p>mi ma yin pa'i rigs dang / 'byung po la sogs pa dang / bsam pa dang / mthong ba dang / reg pa dang / kha rlangs kyi dug can no/ /dogs pa'i dug dang zhes bya ba ni de yang rnam par rtog pa'i dug ste/ 'jigs pa dang 'tshe ba dang / yid 'phrig pa'o/ /sman
<p>195a.3</p>pa'i dug dang zhes bya ba ni drod btang ba bsil du song ste bsil ba drod du song ba'o/ /yang na rtse'u chung la sogs pa rtsa la lag nyes su song ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi dug las bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ sngags dang 'khrul 'khor dang / gshin rje dang / ma
<p>195a.4</p>mo la sogs pa'i rig pa'i dmod mo las byung ba'o/ /bde legs ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi dug nad thams cad bcom pa/ sdug bsngal thams cad las bde ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni stong gsum
<p>195a.5</p>gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la sman par grags pa'o/ /dug thams cad las bdag bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni dug rigs mi gcig pa sum cu rtsa gnyis las thar pa dang / phyi'i dug dang / nang gi dug thams cad kyang sa las
<p>195a.6</p>byung zhing sa la song ba'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni zhes bya ba ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog ljang gu spyan gsum pa rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ rgyan thams cad kyis
<p>195a.7</p>brgyan pa/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa g.yas gnyis na rdo rje dang ral gri'o/ /g.yon gnyis na rma bya'i sgro dang / sbrul bsnams pa'o/ /zhabs rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa/ zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa dbu la
<p>195b</p>
<p>195b.1</p>rdo rje rgya gram gyis mtshan pa'o/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba ni gzi brjid che zhing mthu dang ldan pa'o/ /dug nad thams cad bcom pa las dang bag chags shes bya'i sgrib pa sel ba/ ma rig pa thams cad las rgyal ba de lta bu'i rig
<p>195b.2</p>sngags ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rjes su yi rang zhing gus par byas pa'o/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog ser po spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas gnyis na rdo rje dang mdung rtse gsum pa'o/ /g.yon gnyis
<p>195b.3</p>na gdugs dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /glang po che la zhon pa'o/ /tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rig sngags kyi gsang sngags rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa la blta'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ dza lA dzan tu le la sogs pa'o/ /
<p>195b.4</p>kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas gsungs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni zhes bya ba ni/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog dkar mo spyan gsum pa rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ 
<p>195b.5</p>rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas na 'khor lo g.yon na rma bya'i sgro bsnams pa'o/ /zhabs phyed skyil du bzhugs so/ /zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa dbu la 'khor los mtshan pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po
<p>195b.6</p>bzhis smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ nad rigs mi gcig pa bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi bcom pa/ bgegs rigs mi gcig pa stong phrag brgyad cu/ de'i gnyen po thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa stong pa nyid nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /de lta bu'i rig
<p>195b.7</p>sngags ni rgyal po chen po bzhis gsungs pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi bzhir gnas pa sku mdog ni dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu'o/ /phyag g.yas pa rnams na go rims bzhin du
<p>196a</p>
<p>196a.1</p>'khor lo dang / mda' dang / dbyug to dang / mda' dang / sbrul zhags dang / mda' dang / ral gri dang / mda' dang g.yon rnams na pi wang dang gzhu/ rin po che dang gzhu/ pad+ma dang gzhu/ bum pa dang gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /shar phyogs
<p>196a.2</p>zhi bar gnas pa nub phyogs cung zad khro ba lho dang byang ni khro bas te bzhin mi sdug pa pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /de rnams kyang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /dbu la rim pa bzhin du 'khor lo dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ /tad+ya thA zhes bya ba
<p>196a.3</p>ni 'di lta ste/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni rgyal po chen po bzhis gsungs pa blta ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni dz+wa la dz+wa la na la sogs pa'o/ /sbod gtong dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dmod mo'o/ /gshin rje'i pho
<p>196a.4</p>nya dang zhes bya ba ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i glo bur gyi 'jigs pa'o/ /mtshan mo nag mo dang zhes bya ba ni bdud kyi zhags pa'i rang bzhin ma mo'i rigs so/ /dus kyi zhags pa dang zhes bya ba ni bdud kyi rang bzhin dus las 'dren pa'o/ /'chi bdag gi chad pa dang
<p>196a.5</p>zhes bya ba ni 'chi bdag gi bdud ni dbang phyug chen po ste de'i chad pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i chad pa dang zhes bya ba ni phung po'i bdud ni tshangs pa ste de'i chad pa'o/ /dbang po'i chad pa dang zhes bya ba ni lha'i bu'i bdud de de'i chad pa'o/ /khyab 'jug gi chad pa dang zhes bya ba ni nyon
<p>196a.6</p>mongs pa'i bdud de de'i chad pa'o/ /drang srong gi chad pa dang zhes bya ba ni drang srong ni mngon par shes shing rdzu 'phrul dang ldan te de'i dmod mo'i chad pa'o/ /lha'i chad pa la sogs pa ni lha'i gdon pa la sogs pa gdon rigs mi gcig pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul
<p>196a.7</p>che ba nad rigs mi gcig pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi nyi shu rtsa bzhi phrag gi chad pa'o/ /rgyal po'i chad pa dang zhes bya ba ni rgyal po'i chad pa nor dang srog dang yan lag bcad nas chad pa gcod pa'i 'jigs pa'o/ /chom rkun gyi chad pa dang zhes bya ba ni nor dang srog
<p>196b</p>
<p>196b.1</p>gi chad pa'o/ /me'i chad pa dang zhes bya ba ni rang gi yul dang gzhan gyi yul du 'gro ba'i bar du mes 'jigs pa'o/ /chu'i chad pa dang zhes bya ba ni gzings dang rab la sogs pa'o/ /chad pa thams cad las bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni chad pa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis kyi
<p>196b.2</p>'jigs pa las thar bar gyis shig /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gzi brjid kyis chad pa de rnams kyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba/ bdag dang sems can rnams sdug bsngal las thar ba'o/ /rig sngags 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/ /bsam pa'i dug dang mthong ba'i dug /reg pa'i dug dang kha
<p>196b.3</p>rlangs dug /de ni de bzhin klu yi dug /de ni 'jig rten phyi yi dug /'gro ba'i dug tu grags pa'o/ /rtsa ba dang ni lo ma dang / /'jig rten phyi yi bsdad pa'i dug /sbyor ba yang dag sman sbyor ba/ /'jig rten phyin ci log pa ste/ /de ni sbyor ba'i dug tu grags/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun
<p>196b.4</p>gsum/ /rig sngags gzi brjid yang dag gis/ /dug ni gsum po 'joms byed pa/ /dug ni pha dang ma yin no/ /dug ni sa la 'gro bar 'gyur/ /rig sngags rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid dang dug gi mtshan nyid bshad pa'i gnas skabs te bco
<p>196b.5</p>lnga pa'o// //kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o/ /khyod kyis klung gi rgyal po rnams kyi ming zung shig ces bya ba ni/ khams gsum la gnas pa/ klung gi rgyal po'i gtso bo bzhi bcu rtsa gcig tu gnas pa'o/ /
<p>196b.6</p>'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ klung gi rgyal po rnams kyi ming blta ba'o/ /klung gi rgyal po gang+gA dang zhes bya ba ni/ /shar phyogs nas glang po che'i kha nas 'bab ste/ 'di ni mtsho chen po'i chu zhes bya ba/ g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu
<p>196b.7</p>shar phyogs kyi rgyal mtsho chen por 'gro'o/ /klung gi rgyal po sin+d+hu dang zhes bya ba ni/ lho phyogs khyu mchog gi kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po'i chu zhes bya ba g.yas phyogs nas bskor nas/ klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por
<p>197a</p>
<p>197a.1</p>'gro'o/ /klung gi rgyal po pak+Shu dang zhes bya ba ni nub phyogs nas rta'i kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtshan chu zhes bya ba g.yas su bskor nas/ klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu nub phyogs su rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o/ /klung gi rgyal po sI ta dang zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>197a.2</p>byang phyogs nas seng ge'i kha nas 'bab po/ /de ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chu zhes bya ba ni/ g.yas phyogs su bskor nas klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o/ /byang phyogs kha gur gyur pa yi/ /chu mtsho yod de gzhan dag kyang / /de ni
<p>197a.3</p>mtsho chen chu zhes bya/ /tha dad rgyu rnams byung nas yod/ /chu klung gang+gA sin+d+hu pak+Shu dang sI ta dba' rlabs dbu ba'i phreng ba can/ /'bab cing thams cad gsal ba'i chu yin te/ /phyogs bzhi kho ra khor yug dag nas 'byung / /chu klung rab mchog bzhi po 'di dag ni/ /mchog
<p>197a.4</p>tu bzang zhing so sor 'bab pa ste/ /re re zhing yang lnga brgyar khyer nas ni/ /chu yi rgyun rnams rgya mtsho chen por 'gro/ /zhes bya'o/ /klung gi rgyal po mda' 'byung dang / klung gi rgyal po khyim ldan dang / klung gi rgyal po gshin rje sel dang / klung gi rgyal po gya gyu dang zhes
<p>197a.5</p>bya ba ni/ lho'i 'dzam bu'i gling bzhin du/ nub kyi ba lang spyod la yang chu bo chen po bzhi 'bab ste/ rim pa bzhin du shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs so/ /g.yas su bskor nas shar gyi rgya mtshor 'bab pa'o de bzhin du lho la sogs pa yang / lho'i rgya mtsho dang / 
<p>197a.6</p>nub kyi rgya mtshor dang / byang gi rgya mtshor 'bab pa'o/ /'dzam bu'i gling bzhin du chu klung lnga brgya lnga brgyar khrid pa'o/ /klung gi rgyal po rgyas 'bab dang / /klung gi rgyal po zhags bral dang / klung gi rgyal po zhi ba 'dzin dang / klung gi rgyal po sa ldan dang zhes bya ba ni/ nub kyi ba lang spyod
<p>197a.7</p>bzhin du/ byang gi sgra mi snyan la yang mtsho chen por yod de/ de la yang chu chen po phyogs bzhir 'bab ste/ shar dang lho dang / nub dang / byang du'o/ /de g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ rim pa bzhin du shar gyi rgya mtsho dang / lho'i rgya mtsho rgya dang / nub kyi rgya mtsho dang / byang gi rgya mtsho'o/ /chu
<p>197b</p>
<p>197b.1</p>klung de yang lnga brgya lnga brgya khrid nas 'bab pa'o/ /klung gi rgyal po zla ba'i cha dang / klung gi rgyal po dbyangs chen dang / klung gi rgyal po rus sbal can dang / klung gi rgyal po chu dron can dang zhes bya ba ni/ byang gi sgra mi snyan bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags gling na yang mtsho chen po
<p>197b.2</p>yod de/ mtsho de la yang chu klung chen po bzhir 'bab pa/ de yang shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi ngos su 'bab pa'o/ /de yang g.yas phyogs su bskor nas shar gyi rgya mtsho dang / lho'i rgya mtsho dang / nub kyi rgya mtsho dang / byang gi rgya mtsho'o/ /chu klung chen po de bzhis kyang / chu klung lnga
<p>197b.3</p>brgya lnga brgya khrid nas 'bab pa'o/ /klung gi rgyal po chu mchog can dang / klung gi rgyal po zangs 'dab dang zhes bya ba ni/ lho'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi g.yas ngos na yod pa/ gling phran rnga yab ces bya ba yod de/ mtsho de la yang chu klung gnyis 'bab ste/ shar dang nub nas bab nas/ 
<p>197b.4</p>shar gyi rgya mtsho dang / nub kyi rgya mtshor 'bab pa'o/ /klung gi rgyal po sbrang rtsi can dang / klung gi rgyal po dpa' ldan dang zhes bya ba dang / lho'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi g.yon na/ gling phran rnga yab gzhan zhes bya ba ni/ snga ma bzhin du mtsho chen po yod de/ mtsho chen po de la yang byang dang
<p>197b.5</p>lhor 'bab ste/ de yang lho'i rgya mtsho dang byang gi rgya mtshor 'bab pa'o/ /klung gi rgyal po bu ram shing ldan dang / klung gi rgyal po ba lang ldan dang zhes bya ba ni/ ba lang spyod kyi shar na/ gling phran g.yo ldan gnas te/ de la yang snga ma bzhin du mtsho chen po gnas pa/ mtsho chen po'i kha nas yang / 
<p>197b.6</p>chu klung chen po shar dang nub nas 'bab po/ /chu klung chen po de yang / shar gyi rgya mtsho dang / nub kyi rgya mtshor 'bab po/ /klung gi rgyal po 'phags pa can dang / klung gi rgyal po rtse 'byin dang zhes bya ba ni/ ba lang spyod kyi g.yon na gling phran nye ba'i g.yo ldan yod de/ snga ma bzhin du mtsho
<p>197b.7</p>chen po yod de/ mtsho chen po'i kha nas yang chu klung chen po gnyis 'bab ste/ de yang lho dang byang phyogs su 'bab ste/ lho'i rgya mtsho dang / byang gi rgya mtshor 'bab pa'o/ /klung gi rgyal po mdza' bzangs dang / klung gi rgyal po kun gyi bshes dang zhes bya ba ni/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi
<p>198a</p>
<p>198a.1</p>g.yas na/ gling phran sgra mi snyan gnas te/ de la yang snga ma bzhin du mtsho chen po gnas te/ mtsho chen po de'i kha nas yang chu klung chen po shar nas nub tu 'bab pa'o/ /chu klung chen po de yang shar gyi rgya mtsho dang / nub kyi rgya mtshor 'gro ba'o/ /klung gi rgyal po 'chi med dang / klung gi
<p>198a.2</p>rgyal po me tog pad+ma dang zhes bya ba ni/ sgra mi snyan gyi g.yon na/ gling phran sgra mi snyan gyi zla ba rnams gnas te/ de la yang snga ma bzhin du mtsho chen po gnas pa/ /mtsho de'i kha nas yang chu klung chen po lho dang byang nas 'bab pa'o/ /chu klung chen po de yang lho'i rgya mtsho dang / byang gi rgya mtshor 'gro
<p>198a.3</p>ba'o/ /klung gi rgyal po lnga len dang / klung gi rgyal po ngos bzangs dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus 'phags po'i gling g.yas na/ gling phran lus dang bya ba gnas te/ de la snga ma bzhin du mtsho chen po gnas so/ /mtsho chen po de la yang chu klung chen po gnyis gnas te/ shar dang nub nas 'bab ste/ 
<p>198a.4</p>shar gyi rgya mtsho dang nub kyi rgya mtshor 'gro ba'o/ /klung gi rgyal po dka' thub sbyin dang / klung gi rgyal po dri bral dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus 'phags kyi g.yon na/ gling phran lus 'phags gnas te/ de la yang snga ma bzhin du mtsho chen po gnas te/ mtsho de la yang lho dang byang du 'bab pa/ /chu klung
<p>198a.5</p>chen po de yang lho'i rgya mtsho dang byang gi rgya mtshor 'gro'o/ /klung gi rgyal po skyon bral dang / klung gi rgyal po klung chen dang / klung gi rgyal po gser ldan dang / klung gi rgyal po ba lang sbyin mchog dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'og klu'i yul ni 'dzam bu'i gling ji bzhin du/ mtsho chen po yod de/ klu rnams
<p>198a.6</p>longs spyod byed pa/ mtsho de'i kha nas chu klung chen po bzhi 'bab pa/ de yang shar dang lho dang nub dang byang du 'bab ste/ chu de yang rigs bzhi'i klu'i mtsho'i nang du 'bab po/ /klung gi rgyal po gsang srung dang / klung gi rgyal po ba lang can dang / klung gi rgyal po dri ma med pa dang / klung gi rgyal po 'od gsal
<p>198a.7</p>dang zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi steng na sum cu rtsa gsum na gnas te/ de yang 'dzam bu gling gi ma dros bzhin du mtsho chen por gnas pa/ mtsho chen po'i kha nas chu klung chen po 'bab pa/ chu klung de yang g.yas phyogs nas bskor nas/ shar dang lho dang nub dang byang dang / rdzing bu chen por 'gro ba'o/ /shar
<p>198b</p>
<p>198b.1</p>phyogs kyi rim pa bzhin du lho dang nub dang / byang yang shes par bya'o/ /klung gi rgyal po 'dul med dag ces bya ba ni/ lho'i 'dzam bu'i gling na rdo rje gdan gyi lho phyogs na gnas te/ mtsho chen po de'i byang phyogs nas 'bab pa/ rdo rje gdan gyi 'og nas bab nas chu bo gang+gA la 'gro ba'o/ /chu de yang kha'i
<p>198b.2</p>ngos nas med pa 'og tu 'dzul te/ des na chu chen po nai rany+dza na zhes bya'o/ /mtsho chen po bco lnga po de ni srid pa gsum la gnas pa'o/ /ri'i rgyal po spos ngad ldan nas/ de nas dpag tshad bcu'i tshu rol na mtsho chen chu zhes bya ba yod de/ ma dros pa zhes kyang bya'o/ /mtshon chen de'i tshad ni/ chur dpag
<p>198b.3</p>tshad lnga bcu zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mthar skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya/ 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la/ mdzes pa/ chu bsil ba/ sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ba/ mtsho de'i nang du me tog pad+ma dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / ku mu ta dang / ut+pa la sngon
<p>198b.4</p>po la sogs pa/ chu las skyes pa'i me tog sna tshogs yod pa'o/ /chu de'i nang du yang bya sna tshogs yod de/ khrung khrung dang / ngang skya dang / chu bya nag po dang / chu bya rke rings dang / ngang ser dang / dang skya dang / ngang skya'i rgyal po dang / de la sogs pa chu bya sna tshogs pa gnas pa'o/ /
<p>198b.5</p>mtsho chen po ma dros pa bzhin du gzhan yang de bzhin du gnas pa'o/ /de dag dang gzhan yang gang dag sa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir 'bab pa'i chu klung de dag thams cad la zhes bya ba ni/ srid pa gsum na gnas pa'i chu klung gi rgyal po bzhi bcu rtsa gcig la gnas pa'o/ /gang dag rgyun du gnas
<p>198b.6</p>pa zhes bya ba ni/ chu la gnas pa/ lha dang lha ma yin/ gnod sbyin 'byung po ma rungs pa la sogs pa'o/ /gzugs tha dad pa zhes bya ba ni/ rkang mangs dang / rkang gnyis rkang bzhi rkang drug rkang brgyad la sogs pa'o/ /gzugs mi sdug pa zhes bya ba ni bzhin mi sdug cing / sbrul dang / sbal
<p>198b.7</p>pa dang / nya dang / bya dang / khyi dang / wa dang / spyang ki dang / chu srin dang / kum+b+hi ra la sogs pa'i mgo brnyan no/ /gzugs mang ba zhes bya ba ni/ sems can la la chu srin gyi gzugs su yod pa/ rta'i gzugs su yod pa/ phag gi gzugs su yod pa/ glang po che'i gzugs su yod pa/ sbrul gyi
<p>199a</p>
<p>199a.1</p>gzugs la sogs pa/ sems can gzugs mi gcig pa mang po yod pa'o/ /gzugs mtha' yas pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ chung ba dang / che ba dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod pa'o/ /'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can gzugs sna tshogs pa'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ srid
<p>199a.2</p>pa gsum na gnas pa'i lha la sogs pa'i 'byung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'o/ /zas su gzi brjid 'phrog pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ zas su gzi brjid 'phrog pa nas/ rigs mi gcig pa sum cu rtsa gcig /srid pa gsum na gnas pa'i chu klung chen po gnas pa'o/ /de yang
<p>199a.3</p>gzugs mi gcig pa mang por gnas pa/ srid gsum skad cig rgyu ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gang gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di la gus par byas par gyur na/ chu klung chen po de rnams la yod pa rnams kyis
<p>199a.4</p>kyang yang dag par srung ba dang skyob par 'gyur ro/ /sbra ba la sogs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyis kyang snga ma bshad pa bzhin du byas pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las chu klung bshad pa'i gnas skabs te bcu drug pa'o// //kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par
<p>199a.5</p>rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas gsungs pa'o/ /khyod kyis ri'i rgyal po rnams kyi ming zung shig ces bya ba ni/ srid pa chags pa'i dus su chags pa/ ri rab la sogs pa ri'i rgyal po chen po lnga bcu rtsa bzhi'i ming zung shig ces pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni ri'i rgyal po rnams
<p>199a.6</p>kyi ming blta ba'o/ /ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang zhes bya ba ni/ dpag tshad brgyad khri ni thur du gser gyi sa gzhi la brten to/ /dpag tshad brgyad khri ni chu las gyen du 'phags pa'o/ /'phang du dpag tshad 'bum drug khri yod do/ /rngams su dpag tshad brgyad khri/ zheng du dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pa/ 
<p>199a.7</p>mtha' skor du dpag tshad sum 'bum nyi khri'o/ /dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa rin po che sna bdun las grub pa/ de la sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams gnas so/ /ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi ngos bzhi ni/ shar phyogs ni shel las grub pa/ lho phyogs ni bai DUr+ya las grub pa/ 
<p>199b</p>
<p>199b.1</p>nub phyogs ni dngul las grub pa/ byang phyogs kyi ngos ni gser las grub pa'o/ /ri'i rgyal po ri rab la rtse mo bzhi yod de/ shar phyogs kyi rtse mo ni chur dpag tshad brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga/ zheng du dpag tshad brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa/ dpag tshad phyed dang lnga ni ri'i
<p>199b.2</p>rgyal po ri rab las gyen du 'phags te/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la/ mdzes pa shel las grub pa/ de na gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje rnams gnas so/ /lho phyogs kyi rtse mo ni/ chur dpag tshad brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga zheng du dpag tshad brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga mtha' skor du dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa/ 
<p>199b.3</p>dpag tshad phyed dang lnga ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab las 'phags te/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ bai DUr+ya las grub pa/ de na gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje gnas so/ /de bzhin du gnyis po la yang shes par bya'o/ /dngul las grub pa dang / gser las grub pa'o/ /ri'i rgyal po
<p>199b.4</p>ri rab ni/ bang rim bzhi yod de/ bang rim dang po ni chur las dpag tshad khris gyen du 'phags pa la ri'i rgyal po ri rab las dpag tshad khri drug stong phyir 'phags te/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa/ de ni lag na yol go thogs kyi lha rnams so/ /
<p>199b.5</p>bang rim gnyis pa ni/ bang rim dang po las dpag tshad khris gyen du 'phags pa/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab las dpag tshad brgyad stong phyir 'phags te/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa/ de na phreng thogs kyi lha rnams gnas so/ /bang rim gsum pa ni/ 
<p>199b.6</p>bang rim gnyis pa las/ dpag tshad khri gyen du 'phags pa/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab las dpag tshad bzhi stong phyir 'phags te/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa/ de ni rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams gnas so/ /bang rim bzhi pa ni/ bang rim gsum pa
<p>199b.7</p>las/ dpag tshad khri gyen du 'phags la/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab las dpag tshad nyis stong phyir 'phags te/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes shing / rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa/ de'i phyogs bzhi na rgyal po bzhi rnams gnas so/ /ri'i rgyal po gangs can
<p>200a</p>
<p>200a.1</p>dang zhes bya ba ni/ sgra mi snyan nas ri nag po dgu 'das pa'i byang phyogs na ri'i rgyal po gangs zhes bya ba yod de/ /ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang dang zhes bya ba ni/ ri nag po dgu 'das pa'i pha rol na yod do/ /ri'i rgyal po rtse brgya pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ phyi'i rgya mtsho'i
<p>200a.2</p>'gram gyi dpag tshad ldan srin po'i yul gyi byang ngos na rtse mo brgya yod pa/ zheng du dpag tshad sum brgya yod pa/ dpangs su dpag tshad brgya yod pa/ rtse mo de rnams kyang dpag tshad gsum gsum mo/ /ri'i rgyal po seng ldeng can zhes bya ba ni/ gshol mda' 'dzin nas dpag
<p>200a.3</p>tshad nyi khri bor te/ dpag tshad brgyad khri ni chu'i 'og gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la brten/ dpag tshad khri ni chu las gyen du 'phags so/ /zheng du yang de dang 'dra ste/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser las grub pa/ de na rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi grong
<p>200a.4</p>dang grong khyer ljongs gnas so/ /ci'i phyir ri'i rgyal po seng ldeng can zhes bya zhe na/ ri'i rgyal po seng ldeng can gyi phyogs de dang de dag na/ ji ltar gser gyi seng ldeng yod pa bzhin du gzhan la med de/ de'i phyir na ri'i rgyal po seng ldeng can zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po gser logs dang
<p>200a.5</p>zhes bya ba ni/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi byang ngos kyi cha na ri'i rgyar dpag tshad gsum/ dpangs su dpag tshad gnyis pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gyi gser de na gnas so/ /ri'i rgyal po 'od 'dzin dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi lho phyogs na dpal gyi ri zhes
<p>200a.6</p>bya ba yin te/ de la mtha' skor du dpag tshad lnga brgya yod do/ /dpangs su dpag tshad phyed dang sum brgya de'i gnas na yang dngos grub can thams cad gnas pa'o/ /ri'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin dang zhes bya ba ni/ ri'i rgyal po rnam 'dud nas dpag tshad stong nyis brgya lnga bcu bor te/ 
<p>200a.7</p>dpag tshad brgyad khri chu'i 'og gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la brten pa/ dpag tshad drug brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga ni chu las gyen du 'phags pa'o/ /dpangs su yang de dang 'dra ste/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes te/ gser las grub pa/ de na rgyal chen bzhi'i grong dang grong
<p>200b</p>
<p>200b.1</p>khyer dang ljongs gnas so/ /ci'i phyir mu khyud 'dzin zhes bya zhe na/ ri'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin gyi rtse mo/ /dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ni/ dper na shing rta'i mu khyud bzhin te/ de bas na ri'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po 'khor yug dang zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>200b.2</p>phyi'i rgya mtsho bor te/ dpag tshad brgyad khri ni chu'i 'og gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la brten/ dpag tshad sum brgya rtsa phyed dang bcu gsum ni chu las gyen du 'phags so/ /rngams su yang de dang 'dra ste/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ lcags las grub pa/ de na
<p>200b.3</p>gnod sbyin gos sngon po can rnams gnas so/ /ci'i phyir ri'i rgyal po 'khor yug ri zhes bya zhe na/ ri'i rgyal po 'khor yug ri de dang de dag na/ ji ltar gser gyi 'khor lo yod pa bzhin du/ ri gzhan dag la med pa dang / gzhan yang ri'i rgyal po 'khor yug ris gling bzhi pa 'di
<p>200b.4</p>'khor lo'i tshul du bskor te/ de'i phyir ri'i rgyal po 'khor yug ri zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po 'khor yug chen po dang zhes bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong 'jig rten khams rnams bskor ba/ 'og ni gser gyi sa gzhi yan chod yod pa/ steng ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad yod pa'o/ /gzhi
<p>200b.5</p>ni lcags las byas pa/ des bskor ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhing khams su shes par bya'o/ /khyab pa che bas na 'khor yug chen por btags so/ /ri'i rgyal po dbang po'i brag dang zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab kyi steng gi sa gzhi na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
<p>200b.6</p>grong khyer blta na sdug ces bya ba/ chur dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya/ rgyar yang de dang 'dra ste/ mthar skor du khri yod pa/ gser gyir bas bskor ba ste/ ra ba de la 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa ste/ rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa'i lcog bzhi yod de/ lha'i grong khyer de na sgo dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu
<p>200b.7</p>yod do/ /sgo re re la 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang gsum zheng du phyed dang gnyis pa/ sgo re re la rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i gzer skar ma'i gzugs su byas pa bzhi bzhi yod do/ /sgo re re la sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i srung ma go cha gon zhing mtshon cha thogs pa lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/ /
<p>201a</p>
<p>201a.1</p>grong khyer de'i dbus na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ rgyar yang de dang 'dra ste/ mtha' skor du stong yod pa/ lha'i grong khyer las dpag tshad phyed dang lnga gyen du 'phags so/ /rmang rten du yang rin po che sna bzhi
<p>201a.2</p>las byas pa/ de'i phyir dbang po'i brag ces bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po tshangs pa ldan dang zhes bya ba ni/ de yang bsam gtan dang po la gnas te/ tshangs pa gang na gnas ba na tshangs ldan no/ /ri'i rgyal po dpal ldan dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas te/ dpal gyi ri'i byang
<p>201a.3</p>phyogs na rgyar dpag tshad sum brgya yod de/ dpangs su yang sum brgya'o/ /de'i sa gzhi ni dpal dang ldan pas na dpal ldan no/ /ri'i rgyal po blta na sdug dang zhes bya ba ni/ ri'i rgyal po seng ldeng can nas dpag tshad khri bor te/ dpag tshad brgyad khri ni chu'i 'og gser gyis
<p>201a.4</p>gzhi chen po la brten te/ dpag tshad lnga stong ni chu las gyen du 'phags so/ /zheng du yang de dang 'dra'o/ /dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser las grub pa de na rgyal chen bzhi'i grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs gnas so/ /ci'i phyir ri'i rgyal po blta na sdug ces
<p>201a.5</p>bya zhe na/ ri'i rgyal po blta na sdug gi rtse mo ji ltar dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa bzhin du ri gzhan dag med de de'i phyir na ri'i rgyal po blta na sdug ces bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po shin tu rgyas dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar yul dang bod yul bar na ri'i rgyar dpag tshad gsum
<p>201a.6</p>yod pa/ dpangs su yang de bzhin te/ sa'i rir grags pa/ mtha' skor du gling bzhir bskor ba'o/ /ri'i rgyal po rin chen 'byung gnas dang zhes bya ba ni/ zangs kyi gling dang rin chen gling gi bar na gnas te/ rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa/ rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus na yod pa/ 
<p>201a.7</p>mtha' skor du dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa/ dpangs su dpag tshad sum brgya/ rgya mtsho'i rin po che thams cad kyang de nas byung ngo / /ri'i rgyal po srin bu can dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar dang bal yul gyi bar na yod de/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad sum brgya/ dpangs su dpag tshad lnga'o/ /sems
<p>201b</p>
<p>201b.1</p>can thams cad gnas pa'i phyir na srin bu can zhes btags so/ /ri'i rgyal po nor bu'i rdza dang zhes bya ba ni/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling gi byang ngos na yod de/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad drug brgya/ dpangs su bzhi brgya'o/ /de'i sa na yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du yod pas na
<p>201b.2</p>nor bu'i rdza zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po thags bzangs ris dang zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab kyi steng gi byang ngos na/ lha ma yin gyi gnas kyi dbus na lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thags bzangs ris kyi bzhugs sa/ de bzhugs pa'i phyir na thags bzangs ris zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po rdo rje 'byung
<p>201b.3</p>gnas dang zhes bya ba ni/ bal yul gyi nub ngos na spre'u'i rgyal po ha lu ma d+ha'i lag gi bar nas shor ba'i ri/ de la mtha' skor la dpag tshad lnga/ 'phang du dpag tshad gnyis/ brag rdo rje lta bu yod pa'i phyir na/ rdo rje'i brag ces bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po 'gram ldan dang zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>201b.4</p>bal yul gyi shar phyogs na spre'u'i rgyal po ha lu ma d+has bor ba/ mtha' skor la dpag tshad lnga bcu/ 'phang du dpag tshad drug go/ /'gram pa bzhin du snang ba'i phyir na 'gram ldan zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po lha min 'bab dang zhes bya ba ni/ ri spos kyi ngad ldan de'i byang phyogs
<p>201b.5</p>dpag tshad nyi shu na/ gser gyi brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos bya skyibs zhes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya/ 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes
<p>201b.6</p>pa'o/ /ri'i rgyal po glog 'od dang zhes bya ba ni/ nub phyogs ba lang spyod kyi shar phyogs dpag tshad lnga brgya'i bar na ri bo yod de/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad sum brgya/ 'phang du dpag tshad nyis brgya/ rgyu gser las byas pa/ glog gi 'od bzhin lhan ne lhang nge yod pas
<p>201b.7</p>glog ces bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po khyab gnas dang zhes bya ba ni/ lho'i 'dzam bu'i gling bskor ba mtha' skor du 'dzam bu'i gling tsam yod de/ 'phang du dpag tshad khri yod pa/ rgya che bas khyab gnas zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal zla 'od dang zhes bya ba ni/ shar gyi lus 'phags kyi nub/ 
<p>202a</p>
<p>202a.1</p>dpag tshad lnga brgya na shel las grub pa'i ri yod de/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad khri yod pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad lnga stong ngo / /zla ba bzhin du bsil bas na zla 'od ces bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po brag bzangs dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar gyi nub byang
<p>202a.2</p>mtshams na ka ling+ga'i 'gram na gnod sbyin ku be ra'i gnas yin te/ rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i mtha' skor dpag tshad lnga brgya/ 'phang du sum brgya/ gzhan pas bzang ba'i phyir na brag bzangs zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po nyi ma mdzes dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnya' shing
<p>202a.3</p>'dzin yang zer ri'i rgyal po ri rab nas dpag tshad brgyad khri bor te/ dpag tshad brgyad khri ni chu'i 'og gser gyi sa gzhi la brten te/ dpag tshad bzhi khri ni chu las gyen du 'phags so/ /zheng du yang de dang 'dra ste/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser las grub pa ste/ 
<p>202a.4</p>de na rgyal chen bzhi'i grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs gnas so/ /ri'i rgyal po thigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ zangs gling gi mdun na ri bo chen po yod de/ srin mo'am srin po rgyu ba/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad brgyad pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad lnga yod pa/ thigs pa bzhin du snang bas na thigs pa
<p>202a.5</p>zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po 'bigs byed dang zhes bya ba ni/ de yang gser gling na yod de phyi'i rgya mtsho'i 'gram mtha' skor du dpag tshad phyed dang nyis brgya yod de/ 'phang du dpag tshad brgya'o/ /ri de ni mtshon bzhin du yod de/ de'i phyir 'bigs byed ces bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po zla ba'i brag dang
<p>202a.6</p>zhes bya ba ni/ o D+yan gyi yul gyi shar phyogs dpag tshad gsum na/ ri de'i mtha' skor du dpag tshad drug yod de/ 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis so/ /de'i rtse mo la zla ba bzhin du gnas pa zla ba'i brag ces bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po sna tshogs brtsegs dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgya nag po'i
<p>202a.7</p>ngos na ri bo rtse lnga ba mtha' skor du dpag tshad lnga brgya pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang sum brgya/ dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / sngon po dang / kha dog mdzes shing snang bas na sna tshogs mdzes zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po ma la ya dang zhes bya ba ni/ zangs gling gi lho ngos na tsan+dan gyi
<p>202b</p>
<p>202b.1</p>nags gseb yod de/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad brgya/ 'phang du dpag tshad brgya'o/ /de'i lho phyogs na bya khyung yod pa ste/ shin tu drang ba'i phyir na ma la yar btags so/ /ri'i rgyal po gser gyi rtse mo dang zhes bya ba ni/ gshol mda' 'dzin zhes bya ba'o/ /ri'i rgyal po gnya' shing 'dzin
<p>202b.2</p>las dpag tshad bzhi khri bor te/ dpag tshad brgyad khri ni chu'i 'og gser gyi sa gzhi la brten/ dpag tshad nyi khri chu las gyen du 'phags so/ /zheng du yang de dang 'dra'o/ /dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser las grub ste/ de na rgyal chen bzhi ba'i grong dang grong khyer dang
<p>202b.3</p>ljongs gnas so/ /ci'i phyir ri'i rgyal po gshol mda' 'dzin zhes bya ba ni/ ri'i rgyal po gshol mda' 'dzin gyi rtse mo dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ dper na gshol mda' bzhin te/ de'i phyir na gshol mda' 'dzin zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po kun nas 'gro dang zhes
<p>202b.4</p>bya ba ni/ ti se gangs kyi ri'i byang ngos na/ tha mal pa'i yul gyi so mtshams/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad lnga brgya/ 'phang du dpag tshad lnga'o/ /'dzam bu'i gling du khyab pa'i phyir na kun nas 'gro zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po lag bzangs dang zhes bya ba ni/ gser gyi ri ste rgya mtsho'i dbus na
<p>202b.5</p>gnas te/ 'og gser gyi sa gzhi la thug pa/ chu las 'phags pa ni dpag tshad brgyad stong 'phags so/ /lag pa bzhin du gnas pas na lag bzangs zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po nor bu ldan dang zhes bya ba ni/ sgra mi snyan gyi shar phyogs na nor bu rin po che sna tshogs yod pa/ mtha' skor
<p>202b.6</p>du dpag tshad lnga brgya/ 'phang du dpag tshad lnga brgya'o/ /nor bu rin po che thams cad de la ldan te/ de lta bas na nor bu ldan zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po sde bzangs dang zhes bya ba ni/ ba lang spyod kyi nub ngos na/ dpag tshad khri mtha' skor du yod pa/ dpag tshad lnga stong 'phang du'o/ /
<p>202b.7</p>shin tu dbyibs legs pa blta na sdug pa'i phyir na/ sde bzangs su btags pa'o/ /ri'i rgyal po tshangs pa'i mchu dang zhes bya ba ni/ chu gang+gA'i 'gram ga ya zhes bya ba na/ ri bo rked sum nyag yod de/ mtha' skor dpag tshad brgyad yod do/ /rked nyag la dpag tshad re re/ 'phang
<p>203a</p>
<p>203a.1</p>du yang lnga bcu'o/ /de na tshangs pa gnas pa'i phyir/ tshangs pa'i mchu zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po rig byed srung dang zhes bya ba ni/ de yang de'i rtsa na yod de/ dbyibs dang rgya dang 'phang yang de bzhin no/ /de la tshangs pa gnas shing rig byed bzhi gnas de nas byung
<p>203a.2</p>bas na rig byed ldan zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po ba lang sna dang zhes bya ba ni/ bal yul gyi byang ngos na khyab 'jug gi lha gnas pa/ dpag tshad bzhi ni mtha' skor 'phang du ni gsum mo/ /ba lang gi sna bzhin du rtse mo yod pa'i phyir na ba lang sna zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po sna tshogs
<p>203a.3</p>phreng dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'dzam bu gling gi byang ngos na rgya nag po'i byang shar mtshams na gnas pa/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad khri yod pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad lnga stong yod pa/ rtse mo la phreng ba bzhin du gnas pas na sna tshogs phreng zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po mi 'jigs sna tshogs dang zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>203a.4</p>de ni nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi nub ngos na gnas te/ mtha' skor ni dpag tshad lnga brgya/ 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang sum brgya'o/ /gzhi lcags las grub pa/ de la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la 'jigs pa med pas na mi 'jigs sna tshogs zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po ral gri dang
<p>203a.5</p>zhes bya ba ni/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi lho ngos na/ yul spyi bo gtsug na ri ral gri'i dbyibs su yod pa/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad brgya/ 'phang du nyis brgya'o/ /ral gri bzhin du rtse mo rno bas na/ ral gri zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po gdung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus na
<p>203a.6</p>yod de/ dbyibs tho ba dang 'dra ba/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad drug yod pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad brgyad do/ /gdung ba'i tshul du yod pa'i phyir na gdung ba zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po mig bsku dang zhes bya ba ni/ sgra mi snyan gyi shar phyogs na ri chen po mig bsku zhes bya bar grags pa/ 
<p>203a.7</p>mtha' skor du dpag tshad brgya pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad sum brgya'o/ /mi mi thar ba/ mi ma yin gnas pa'o/ /ri'i rgyal po muny+dza dang zhes bya ba ni/ mnga' ris kyi shar ngos gangs kyi ri rtse gcig tu yod pa/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad sum
<p>203b</p>
<p>203b.1</p>brgya gnas pa/ rtse mo rno ba'o/ /de na gnas pa ni dbang phyug chen po'i bu gzhon nu gdong drug gnas so/ /ri'i rgyal po ri dgas can dang zhes bya ba ni/ bal yul gyi byang ngos na gnas te/ dbyibs ri dgas shar na bzhin du gnas te/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad lnga pa/ 'phang
<p>203b.2</p>du dpag tshad gsum mo/ /ri dgas bzhin du yod pas na ri dgas can zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po 'joms byed dang zhes bya ba ni/ bal yul dang rgya gar gyi mtshams na/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad bzhi yod pa/ 'phang du gnyis so/ /ri'i rgyal po ti se dang zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>203b.3</p>gangs kyi ri yin te/ de yang rtse gsum du yod pa/ lha ma hA de ba yod pa/ mtha' skor dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa/ 'phang du yang lnga brgya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po mi mjed dang zhes bya ba ni/ ti se'i byang ngos na dpag tshad lnga yod pa'i bar na/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad brgya/ 'phang du dpag tshad sum
<p>203b.4</p>cu'o/ /ri'i rgyal po tsan+dan phreng dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma la ya'i shar phyogs kyi bar na dpag tshad lnga yod de/ tsan+dan gyi nags gseb sbrul gdug pa can yod pa/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad brgya yod pa/ 'phang du yang brgya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po stobs 'dzin khyam dang zhes
<p>203b.5</p>bya ba ni/ rgya nag po na gnas te/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad khri yod pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa/ ri'i rgyal po dbang chen dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgya bod kyi bar na ri bo chen po/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad brgya/ 'phang du dpag tshad lnga bcu'o/ /ri'i rgyal po dus
<p>203b.6</p>'bri byed dang zhes bya ba ni/ bal yul dang rgya gar 'khor nas yod pa/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad khri yod pa/ 'phang du lnga brgya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po skem byed dang zhes bya ba ni/ dus 'bri byed kyi byang ngos dpag tshad gcig na/ mtha' skor yang de bzhin no/ /'phang du
<p>203b.7</p>dpag tshad drug brgya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po ba lang srung zhes bya ba ni/ bal yul gyi nub ngos na/ dbang phyug chen po'i lha gnas pa/ dpag tshad lnga mtha' skor ro/ /'phang du dpag tshad gsum mo/ /ri'i rgyal po bya rog sgra can dang zhes bya ba ni/ zlum pa rgya che ba mtha'
<p>204a</p>
<p>204a.1</p>skor du dpag tshad bcu pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad bcu'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing khams su grags pa'o/ /ri'i rgyal po brten pa 'dzin dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas pa/ rgya che ba gser gyi sa gzhi la thug pa/ rgyu yang gser las byas pa'o/ /
<p>204a.2</p>ri'i rgyal po rta rna ri dang zhes bya ba ni/ ri blta na sdug pa dpag tshad lnga stong bor te/ dpag tshad brgyad khri ni chu'i 'og gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la brten te/ dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya chu las gyen du 'phags te/ zheng du yang de dang 'dra ste/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes
<p>204a.3</p>pa/ de na rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs gnas so/ /ci'i phyir ri'i rgyal po rta rna ri zhes bya na/ ri'i rgyal po rta rna ri'i rtse mo dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ni/ dper na rta'i rna ba bzhin te/ de'i phyir ri'i rgyal po rta rna ri zhes bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal
<p>204a.4</p>po rnam 'dud dang zhes bya ba ni/ ri'i rgyal po rta rna ri nas dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya bor nas/ dpag tshad brgyad khri chu'i 'og nas gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la brten te/ dpag tshad stong nyis brgya lnga bcu ni chu las gyen du 'phags so/ /rngams su yang de dang 'dra ste/ dbyibs
<p>204a.5</p>legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser las grub pa/ de na rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs gnas so/ /ci'i phyir ri'i rgyal po rnam 'dud ces bya ba zhe na/ ri'i rgyal po rnam par 'dud kyi rtse mo dma' zhing 'dud pa ni/ dper na gnyan ru bzhin te/ 
<p>204a.6</p>de'i phyir na ri'i rgyal po rnam par 'dud ces bya'o/ /sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di na/ ri'i rgyal po 'di dag dang zhes bya ba ni/ ri'i rgyal po de rnams la sogs pas gtso bo byas pa'o/ /gzhan dag kyang yod pa de la lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
<p>204a.7</p>rten gyi khams la gnas pa'i ri'i rgyal po la sogs pa rnams so/ /lha la sogs pa'i 'byung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi/ bgegs rigs mi gcig pa ri de rnams la gnas so/ /rig sngags 'chang grub pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ ri de rnams la gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chang
<p>204b</p>
<p>204b.1</p>gi rgyal po la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gnas pa'o/ /rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa gang dag rgyun du gnas pa zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po bzhi yang ri de rnams la rgyu'o/ /gzhan yang rgyal po rnams kyang ri de la rgyu ste/ de'i 'khor rnams kyang de la rgyu'o/ /ri de rnams la yang
<p>204b.2</p>gzugs sna tshogs pa dang / gzugs tha dad pa dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs dang / gzugs mngon pa dag ri de rnams la gnas pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gang yang rung ba 'di la
<p>204b.3</p>gus par byas na/ ri'i rgyal po de rnams la yod pa'i lha la sogs pa srung zhing skyob par 'gyur ro/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ snga ma gong du song ba bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /sdig pa thams cad sol cig /dge ba rnams la snang bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ sdig pa
<p>204b.4</p>ni mi dge ba bcu ste/ mi dge ba bcu ni/ lus la gsum/ ngag la bzhi/ yid la gsum mo/ /lus la gsum ni srog gcod pa/ ma byin par len pa/ mi tshangs par spyod pa'o/ /ngag gi bzhi ni/ brdzun dang / ngag 'khyal dang / tshig rtsub mo dang / 'phra ma'o/ /yid kyi
<p>204b.5</p>gsum ni brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba gsum mo/ /gzhan yang las dang / bag chags dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa sel ba'o/ /yang na mtshams med pa lnga byas kyang sel ba'o/ /de rnams las log pas na sdig pa thams cad sel ba'o/ /mi
<p>204b.6</p>dge ba sol cig /don rnams la snang bar gyur ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di'i gzi brjid kyis sdig pa de dag thams cad sol cig /don rnams la snang bar gyur cig ni/ thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i dngos grub snang ba'o/ /thun mong yang las bzhi la sogs
<p>204b.7</p>pa'am/ gzhan yang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub bo/ /yang na srid pa gsum la sbyor ba'i sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i dngos grub bo/ /thun mong ma yin pa'i dngos grub ni/ rig sngags kyi ngo bo nyid nam mkha' lta bu ste/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob
<p>205a</p>
<p>205a.1</p>pa'o/ /gnod pa rnams sol cig ces bya ba ni/ ma rig pa'i dbang gis/ mi dge ba bcu las bdud bzhi 'byung ngo / /bdud bzhi las kyang lha'i gdon la sogs pa bgegs rnams byung ba/ lus kyi na tsha rims la sogs pa 'byung ba'o/ /de rnams rig sngags kyi
<p>205a.2</p>gzi brjid kyis sel ba'o/ /mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yum/ de'i gzi brjid kyis bde ba'o/ /nyi ma'i gung gi bde legs dang / /zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
<p>205a.3</p>khams kyi lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa 'byung po rnams kyi gnyen po rig sngags 'di'i stobs kyis bde pa'o/ /nyin mtshan kun gyi bde legs dag /ces bya ba ni/ ri'i rgyal po de rnams kyis kyang / rig sngags 'di'i stobs dang byin gyi rlabs kyis 'byung po la sogs pa de
<p>205a.4</p>rnams kyis kyang srung ba dang skyob par byed pa'o/ /yang na bde bar 'gyur ba ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal spangs nas rig sngags kyi ngo bo thob pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la stsol/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par gzigs dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dad sel dang / 
<p>205a.5</p>gser thub dang / 'od srungs la sogs pa 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa byams pa la sogs pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /da ltar shAkya thub pas bde legs byin pa'o/ /swA hA zhes bya ba ni bde bar 'gyur ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen
<p>205a.6</p>mo las ri'i rgyal po rnams bshad pa'i gnas skabs te bcu bdun pa'o// //kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o/ /khyod kyis rgyu skar gang dag nam mkha' la rgyu zhing snang bar byed pa rnams kyi ming zung shig ces bya ba ni/ dge
<p>205a.7</p>ba dang mi dge bar byed pa/ bde ba dang mi bde bar byed pa/ lo legs pa dang lo nyes par byed pa/ tshe ring ba dang tshe thung bar byed pa/ spro ring ba dang spro thung bar byed pa/ phyug pa dang ltogs par byed pa/ na ba dang mi na bar byed pa/ bzhin sdug pa dang mi sdug par byed pa/ gzugs
<p>205b</p>
<p>205b.1</p>bzang ba dang ngan par byed pa/ de rnams ni nam mkha' la rgyu zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams tsam la gnas pa'i lha mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad do/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad blta ba'o/ /rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi lus kyi tshad bstan pa/ che ba la ni rgyang grags bco brgyad/ 
<p>205b.2</p>chung ba la rgyang grags gsum mo/ /phal cher ni rgyang grags bcu gnyis so/ /smin drug dang zhes bya ba ni/ de las skyes pa'i mtshan ma ni 'di lags so/ /de yi gdong gi sor bzhi na/ g.yas phyogs na ni sme ba yod/ /spu can nag la mdog kyang dmar/ /longs spyod che zhing
<p>205b.3</p>grags dang ldan/ /mkhas shing rab tu dpal 'bar te/ /smin drug la ni skyes pa'i mtshan ma de yin no/ /snar ma dang zhes bya ba ni/ gang zhig brla yi sor bzhi na/ sme ba 'di nyid gda' ba ste/ /snar ma las ni skyes pa ste/ /shes shing rtag tu chos la dga'/ /mkha' la longs
<p>205b.4</p>spyod phun sum tshogs/ /rnam pa kun du mdzes dang ldan/ /dpa' zhing rgyal ba phun sum tshogs/ /dgra rnams rtag tu rab tu 'joms/ /mgo dang zhes bya ba ni/ /mgul pa yi ni mdzub phyed na/ /gang la tshig pa 'dra ba yod/ /de ni mgo las skyes pa ste/ /dpa' zhing
<p>205b.5</p>longs spyod ldan pa ste/ /lag dang zhes bya ba ni/ mdzub kyi phyed po gnyis pa la/ /g.yon na sme ba gang yod pa/ /lag las skyes pa khro ba ste/ /de ni blun zhing na ba so dang / /zhes bya bzhi/ mchan khung g.yon na sme nag yod/ /nab so las ni skyes pa ste/ /nor dang 'bru rnams
<p>205b.6</p>'byor bar 'gyur/ /de ni shes pa rgya yang chung / /rgyal ni bkra shis phun sum tshogs/ /zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan mchog dag ni rab tu dga'/ /phyag gi mthil la 'khor lo ni/ /nyi ma lta bur rab tu mdzes/ /dbu skra dag ni thams cad kyang / /gyen du g.yas 'khyil legs par
<p>205b.7</p>yod/ /sku ni chu zheng gab pa ste/ /'dren pas khyod kyi nyon mongs thul/ /de ni rgyal las skyes pa'o/ /de bzhin skag ste bdun pa yin/ /zhes bya ba ni/ tshig 'dra gang gi snying gar mchis/ /skag las skyes te 'thab la dga'/ /tshul khrims 'chal zhing 'grogs mi bde/ /de ni
<p>206a</p>
<p>206a.1</p>g.yem la dga' ba'o/ /de ltar rgyu skar bdun po dag ni shar phyogs kyi sgo na gnas pa dag ste/ skar ma bdun po de dag ni chos kyi dbang du byas na/ /sa'i khams su gyur pa ste/ /lha mo'i gzugs su snang ba'o/ /smin drug ni dmar mo ste/ me'i dbyug
<p>206a.2</p>to thogs pa/ me la zhon pa/ snar ma sngo skya/ lug thogs pa nya la zhon pa'o/ /mgo ljang gu lag na ut+pa la thogs pa/ kha sha la zhon pa'o/ /lag dkar po lag na sbrul thogs pa/ sbrul la zhon pa'o/ /nab so ser mo lag na rdo rje dril bu thogs pa/ lug la zhon
<p>206a.3</p>pa'o/ /rgyal dmar po lag na dbyug pa thogs pa/ gdan bum pa la 'dug pa'o/ /skag sngon mo lag na lcags kyu thogs pa/ bya rog la zhon pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug pa'o/ /gang dag shar phyogs srung zhing yongs su
<p>206a.4</p>skyong bar byed pa dag go zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing / rig sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis khyab pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang
<p>206a.5</p>zag gang gis de la gus par byed pa de la/ shar gyi skar ma bdun po dag gis kyang srung zhing skyob ste/ shar phyogs kyi 'jigs pa thams cad las skyob par byed pa'o/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /mchu ni mi mdza' 'joms pa dang / /
<p>206a.6</p>zhes bya ba ni/ 'og gam brang ngam rgyab cig na/ /gang la byi sran 'dra ba yod/ /mchu las skyes te nor dang ldan/ /btsun zhing chos dang ldan pa'i mi/ /de bzhin gre dang zhes bya ba ni/ lte ba'i g.yas g.yon gnyis ka na/ /gang la rma 'dra yod pa de/ /de ni gre las skyes pa ste/ 
<p>206a.7</p>ser sna che zhing tshe yang thung / /dbo gnyis dang zhes bya ba ni/ lte ba man chad sor bzhin/ /gang la sme ba rab yod pa/ /dbo las skyes te longs spyod che/ /khrims ldan shi 'phos mtho ris 'gro/ me bzhi zhes bya ba ni/ sme ba dmar po chu so na/ /rku zhing g.yo ngan sgyu ma ste/ /
<p>206b</p>
<p>206b.1</p>bsod nams chung zhing shes pa zhan/ /me bzhi las ni skyes pa'o/ /nag pa zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan ma la ni sme ba yod/ /'da' bar gyur par nges pa yang / /nag pa las ni de skyes te/ /'dod chags glu gar rtag tu dga'/ /sa ri dang zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan ma'i 'og gam steng na ni/ 
<p>206b.2</p>sme ba ser po rab tu gda'/ /mi mkhas skam zhing mang po sdang / /sa ri las ni skyes pa'o/ /sa ga la ste bdun pa zhes bya ba ni/ brla gnyis kyi ni mdzub gang na/ /sme ba dmar po de bzhin te/ /sa ga las skyes shar pa mchog /skyes pa bud med rnams kyis bskor/ /mkhas shing dpa' la dgra yang thul/ /
<p>206b.3</p>rtag tu bde la gnas pa ste/ /ngo tsha shes shing brtan dang ldan/ /shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris skye/ /de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni/ /lho phyogs kyi sgo na gnas pa dag ste zhes bya ba ni/ skar ma bdun po de dag ni chu'i khams su gnas pa'o/ /lha mo'i tshul du gnas pa ste/ /lho ngos dag na
<p>206b.4</p>gnas pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ mchu dkar po gri gug thogs pa glang la zhon pa/ gre ser po pad+ma thogs pa gdan rdo/ dbo dkar mo lag na rdo rje thogs pa glang po che la zhon pa'o/ /me bzhi sngon mo lag na rma bya'i sgro thogs pa rma bya la zhon pa/ nag
<p>206b.5</p>pa ser mo lag na rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ba la zhon pa/ sa ri mdog dmar skya lag na 'phang mdung 'dzin pa thag pa'i gdan la zhugs pa/ sa ga dud ka dgra sta thogs pa mi'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /gang dag lho phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go zhes
<p>206b.6</p>bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung zhing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar/ lho phyogs yongs su skyong ba'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang
<p>206b.7</p>zag gang gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di la gus shing 'chang ba de/ srung ba dang skyob par byed do/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jigs pa thams cad las skyob pa'o/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /lha mtshams gzi brjid chen mo dang / /
<p>207a</p>
<p>207a.1</p>zhes bya ba ni/ brla gnyis kyi ni mdzub do na/ /gang la byi sran 'dra ba yod/ /lha mtshams las skyes tshul khrims can/ /chos dang longs spyod ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin snron dang zhes bya ba ni/ gang gi brla 'og gnyis na ni/ /sme ba yod pa snron las skyes/ /mi sdug tshe thung
<p>207a.2</p>tshul khrims 'chal/ /dbul zhing snying rje ma mchis so/ /snrubs dang zhes bya ba ni/ pus mo gnyis kyi gong na ni/ /gang la sme chung yod pa ste/ /snrubs las skyes pa dbang thang can/ /myur du bdag khyim 'jig par byed/ /chu stod dang zhes bya ba ni/ sme ba pus mo'i lha nga na/ /sbyin pa
<p>207a.3</p>bgyid cing chos lam shes/ /shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris 'gro/ /chu stod las ni skyes pa'o/ /chu smad dang zhes bya ba ni/ dku do la ni sme ba yod/ /de ltar 'dug pa shes dang ldan/ /longs spyod ldan zhing sems can byams/ /chu smad las ni skyes pa'o/ /de ltar byi bzhin zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>207a.4</p>srin po lang+ka mgrin bcu'i skar ma yin te/ lha rnams la gnod pas sbas nas 'dir ma bshad do/ /rtsis las ma bshad/ rgyu skar la bshad pa'o/ /gro bzhin no zhes bya ba ni/ /gro bzhin las skyes longs spyod rtag /de bzhin nad med sems can byams/ /sme ba gnyis po yod pa ni/ /
<p>207a.5</p>shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris 'gro/ /de ltar rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/ nub phyogs kyi sgo na gnas pa dag ces bya ba ni/ rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/ /nub phyogs na gnas pa/ lha mo'i tshul du snang ba/ me'i khams so/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ lha mtshams chen mo
<p>207a.6</p>mdog dkar mo/ lag na ngang pa dkar po 'dzin pa'o/ /ngang skya la zhon pa/ /snron dmar mo lag na tri shU la thogs pa/ /rus sbal gyi gdan la yod pa/ snrubs dkar mo lag na la phug thogs pa/ gdan la phug la 'dug pa/ chu stod ljang gu lag na me tog gi phreng ba thogs
<p>207a.7</p>pa'o/ /gdan rdo rje la 'dug pa/ chu smad mthing ga /lag na pad+ma thogs pa/ gdan rdo rje las byas pa/ byi bzhin nag mo lag na zhags pa thogs pa/ bya khyung las gdan byas pa/ gro bzhin ser mo lag na rdo rje thogs pa/ seng ge la zhon pa gang dag nub phyogs srung zhing yongs
<p>207b</p>
<p>207b.1</p>su skyong bar byed pa dag go zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/

<p>211b.3</p>bdun pa gzhu'i dus/ cha brgyad pa mda'i dus/ cha dgu pa glang po che'i dus/ cha bcu pa rgyal mtshan gyi dus/ cha bcu gcig pa la seng ge'i dus/ cha bcu gnyis pa la khyi'i dus so/ /dus tshod bcu gnyis la/ chu tshod sum cu yod do/ /de la dus tshod re re la chu tshod phyed dang
<p>211b.4</p>gsum gsum yod do/ /nub mo la yang glang nas khyi'i bar dus tshod bcu gnyis nyin mo bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /chu tshod kyang phyed dang gsum gsum du shes par bya'o/ /dbyar zla 'bring po'i tshes gcig nas gnam stong gi bar du/ nyi ma re re la dus tshod bcu gnyis
<p>211b.5</p>bcu gnyis yod de/ nyi ma shar nas cha gcig la rus sbal gyi dus/ cha gnyis la bong bu'i dus/ cha gsum la chu srin gyi dus/ cha bzhi pa dung gi dus/ cha lnga pa rnga mo'i dus/ cha drug pa gzhu'i dus/ cha bdun pa mda'i dus/ cha brgyad pa glang po che'i dus/ cha dgu pa
<p>211b.6</p>rgyal mtshan gyi dus/ cha bcu pa seng ge'i dus/ cha bcu gcig pa khyi'i dus/ cha bcu gnyis pa glang gi dus so/ /dus bcu gnyis kyi nyi ma re re la chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa la/ dus tshod re re la chu tshod phyed dang gsum gsum dang / skad cig ma brgya lnga bcu
<p>211b.7</p>lnga bcu yod do/ /dbyar zla 'bring po'i tshes gcig nas gnam stong gi bar du nub re re la dus tshod bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod do/ /nyi ma nub nas cha dang po rus sbal gyi dus nas/ glang gi bar du bcu gnyis po'i nyin mo'i dus tshod bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de'i dus tshod
<p>212a</p>
<p>212a.1</p>re re la chu tshod gnyis gnyis dang / skad cig ma sum brgya sum brgya yod do/ /dbyar zla tha chungs kyi tshes gcig nas gnam stong gi bar du/ nyi ma re re la dus tshod bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod pa la/ nyi ma shar nas cha gcig gi bar du bong bu'i dus/ cha gnyis
<p>212a.2</p>pa chu srin gyi dus/ cha gsum pa dung gi dus/ cha bzhi pa rnga mo'i dus/ cha lnga pa gzhu'i dus/ cha drug pa mda'i dus/ cha bdun pa glang po che'i dus/ cha brgyad pa rgyal mtshan gyi dus/ cha dgu pa seng ge'i dus/ cha bcu pa khyi'i dus/ cha bcu gcig pa glang gi dus/ cha bcu
<p>212a.3</p>gnyis pa rus sbal gyi dus/ nyi ma re re la chu tshod sum cu rtsa bzhi rtsa bzhi yod pa la/ dus tshod re re la chu tshod gsum gsum du skad cig ma sum brgya sum brgya ma ldang ngo / /dbyar zla tha chungs kyi tshes gcig nas gnam stong gi bar du/ nyi ma nub nas bong bu nas rus sbal yan
<p>212a.4</p>chad kyi dus bcu gnyis nyin mo'i bzhin shes par bya'o/ /nub re re la chu tshod nyi shu rtsa drug yod pa la/ dus tshod re re chu tshod gnyis gnyis dang / skad cig ma brgya lnga bcu brgya lnga bcu yod do/ /ston zla ra ba'i tshes gcig nas gnam stong gi bar du/ nyi ma re re la dus tshod bcu
<p>212a.5</p>gnyis bcu gnyis yod pa/ nyi ma shar nas cha gcig pa chu srin gyi dus/ cha gnyis pa dung gi dus/ cha gsum pa rnga mo'i dus/ cha bzhi pa gzhu'i dus/ cha lnga pa mda'i dus/ cha drug pa glang po'i dus/ cha bdun pa rgyal mtshan gyi dus/ cha brgyad pa seng ge'i dus/ cha
<p>212a.6</p>dgu pa khyi'i dus/ cha bcu pa glang gi dus/ cha bcu gcig pa rus sbal gyi dus/ cha bcu gnyis pa bong bu'i dus so/ /nyi ma re re la chu tshod bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod pa la/ dus tshod re re la chu tshod gsum gsum yod do/ /nub mo la yang nyi ma nub nas chu srin nas bong bu'i bar du dus
<p>212a.7</p>tshod bcu gnyis nyin mo bzhin shes par bya'o/ /nub mo chu tshod nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod pa la/ dus tshod re re la yang chu tshod bcu gnyis bcu gnyis su shes par bya'o/ /ston zla 'bring po'i tshes gcig nas gnam stong gi bar du/ nyi ma re re la dus tshod bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod pa la/ 
<p>212b</p>
<p>212b.1</p>nyi ma shar nas cha gcig la dung gi dus/ cha gnyis la rnga mo'i dus/ cha gsum pa gzhu'i dus/ cha bzhi pa mda' dus/ cha lnga pa glang po che'i dus/ cha drug pa rgyal mtshan gyi dus/ cha bdun pa seng ge'i dus/ cha brgyad pa khyi'i dus/ cha dgu pa glang gi dus/ cha bcu pa rus sbal gyi dus/

<p>212b.4</p>gnyis bcu gnyis yod pa la/ nyi ma shar nas bcu gnyis kyi cha dang po rnga mo'i dus/ cha gnyis pa gzhu'i dus/ cha gsum pa mda'i dus/ cha bzhi pa glang po che'i dus/ cha lnga pa rgyal mtshan gyi dus/ cha drug pa seng ge'i dus/ cha bdun pa khyi'i dus/ cha brgyad pa glang gi
<p>212b.5</p>dus/ cha dgu pa rus sbal gyi dus/ cha bcu pa bong bu'i dus/ cha bcu gcig pa chu srin gyi dus/ cha bcu gnyis pa dung gi dus so/ /nyi ma re re la chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis rtsa gnyis yod pa la/ dus tshod re re la chu tshod phyed dang gsum gsum dang / skad cig ma brgya lnga
<p>212b.6</p>bcu lnga bcu yod do/ /nyi ma nub nas rnga mo nas dung gi bar du/ dus tshod nyin mo bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /chu tshod nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod pa la/ dus tshod re re la chu tshod gnyis dang / skad cig ma sum brgya sum brgya yod do/ /dgun zla ra ba'i tshes gcig nas gnam
