<p>216a</p>
<p>216a.1</p>drug la pa ba sangs/ nyi shu bdun la phur bu/ nyi shu brgyad la spen pa/ nyi shu dgu la lag pa/ gnam stod la nyi ma'o/ /dgun zla tha chungs kyi tshes gcig la zla ba/ gnyis la mig dmar/ gsum la pa ba sangs/ bzhi la phur bu/ lnga la spen pa/ drug la
<p>216a.2</p>lag pa/ bdun la nyi ma/ brgyad la zla ba/ dgu la mig dmar/ bcu la pa ba sangs/ bcu gcig la phur bu/ bcu gnyis la spen pa/ bcu gsum la lag pa/ bcu bzhi la nyi ma/ bco lnga la zla ba/ bcu drug la mig dmar/ bcu bdun la pa ba sangs/ bco brgyad
<p>216a.3</p>la phur bu/ bcu dgu la spen pa/ nyi shu la lag pa/ nyi shu gcig la nyi ma/ nyi shu gnyis la zla ba/ nyi shu gsum la mig dmar/ nyi shu bzhi la pa ba sangs/ nyi shu lnga la phur bu/ nyi shu drug la spen pa/ nyi shu bdun la lag pa/ nyi shu brgyad la nyi ma/ nyi shu dgu la zla ba/ 
<p>216a.4</p>gnam stong la mig dmar ro/ /tshes grangs kyis zla ba mi thub ste/ zla bas skar ma mi thub/ de bzhin du gza' rnams kyang lhag ste/ de bas na lo lnga lnga na zla ba re re bsnan pa'o/ /de'i khongs su brtsis na/ zla ba dang tshes grangs dang / skar ma dang / gza' tshad ba'o/ /'grib
<p>216a.5</p>pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gza' dang skar ma tshes grangs la rgyu ste/ de gsum gyi bye brag gis/ bzang ba dang ngan pas 'grib pa'o/ /'phel ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du gza' dang skar ma gsum gyis bzang ngan gyis 'phel ba'o/ /bde ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ de la yang gsum
<p>216a.6</p>ka 'dzom pa'i dus su/ skyes par gyur na bde ba phun sum tshogs ba'o/ /sdug bsngal ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ skyes pa'i tshes grangs kyi khyad par yin te/ de yang gza' dang skar ma'i khyad par ro/ /lo legs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gza' dang skar ma lo dang zla ba bzang po'i khyad par
<p>216a.7</p>gyis so/ /lo nyas ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du gza' dang skar ma lo zla ba ste/ de ngan pa'i skyon gyis de bas lo nyes pa dang / tshe thung ba dang / ltogs pa dang / nad mod pa dang / 'gro mi shes pa dang / de la sogs pa byung ba'o/ /de bzhin du bzang ba la yang shes par bya'o/ /
<p>216b</p>
<p>216b.1</p>dag kyang ston pa rnams kyi ming zung shig ces bya ba ni/ gza' chen po dgu dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lo bcu gnyis dang / zla ba bcu gnyis dang / dus drug dang / ra shi bcu gnyis dang / de rnams kyi khyad par gyis legs nyes ston pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ gza'
<p>216b.2</p>dgu po lta ba'o/ /gza' nyi ma dang zhes bya ba ni/ me'i khams yin te/ de'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog dmar po/ g.yas na sba lcag /g.yon na pad+ma dmar po thogs pa'o/ /rta la zhon pa go cha gon pa'o/ /gza' zla ba zhes
<p>216b.3</p>bya ba ni/ chu'i khams te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar po/ /go cha gon pa g.yas na pad+ma dkar po/ g.yon na ri bong gi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa/ ngang skya la zhon pa'o/ /gza' mig dmar zhes bya ba ni/ sku mdog dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ 
<p>216b.4</p>g.yas na dbyug to mig can/ g.yon mi mgo dang sdigs mdzub/ ra dmar po la zhon pa/ me'i khams so/ /gza' pa ba sangs zhes bya ba ni/ sa'i khams sku mdog ser po/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas na bum pa/ g.yon na rin po che'i phreng ba'o/ /
<p>216b.5</p>pad+ma la bzhugs pa'o/ /gza' phur bu dang zhes bya ba ni/ shing gi khams so/ /sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas g.yon mda' gzhu thogs pa/ glang po che la zhon pa'o/ /gza' spen pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ chu'i khams so/ /sku mdog ser po
<p>216b.6</p>zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas na pu ste/ g.yon na bum pa/ rdo'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /gza' lag pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ lcags kyi khams so/ /sku mdog ljang nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas ral gri/ g.yon sdigs mdzub rus sbal la
<p>216b.7</p>zhon pa'o/ /rA hu la dang zhes bya ba ni/ khams lnga ka'o/ /mdog nag po/ /smad sbrul du 'dug pa/ dbu skra ser po/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ nyi ma dang zla ba phyag gnyis na bsnams pa/ sprin gyi gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /gza' du ba mjug rings/ 
<p>217a</p>
<p>217a.1</p>dang zhes bya ba ni/ mdog dud ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon na zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /khams lnga ka la gnas pa'o/ /gza' de rnams kyi dus su rig pa slob par 'dod na bzang ngan gyi khyad par brtags la bya'o/ /
<p>217a.2</p>chos dang slob ma 'dzin pa bo/ /slob dpon 'dzin pa de bzhin no/ /gza' chen phur bu'i dus su ni/ dbu 'dzugs de ni bzang ba yin/ /de bzhin rig pa gzhan la yang / /de yi dus su bzang bar bshad/ /skra mdud gos ni gsar ba'am/ /zas dang gsar pa gang byed pa/ /
<p>217a.3</p>de yi dus su bzang bar bshad/ /skra 'jar sen mo 'breg pa dang / /de bzhin gos bzo byed pa dang / /rta dang glang po sogs pa'i nor/ /de yi dus su phyir mi gtang / /gal te btang bar gyur na ni/ /khar ce log par 'gyur ba'o/ /nyi ma spen pa'i gza' gnyis la/ /mgo 'dzugs de ni
<p>217a.4</p>'bring por bshad/ /dmag dang 'khrug pa gang byed pa/ /de yi dus su 'dren pa na/ /rab tu yang dag bshad par bya/ /skra dang sen mo gos la sogs/ /de yi dus su byas na ni/ /nad dang rims la sogs pa 'byung / /shi ba'i dus la bab pa'o/ /lam 'gro dbang bskur la
<p>217a.5</p>sogs dang / /nyi ma'i dus su bzang bar bshad/ /spen pa'i dus su de byas na/ /shin tu ngan par de bshad do/ /gal te de dus byas na ni/ /nad 'byung khar ce log par 'gyur/ /mig dmar dang ni lag pa la/ /rig pa gang gi mgo 'dzugs pa/ /slob ma slob dpon
<p>217a.6</p>'brel byed pa/ /lam 'gro nye tshong byed pa dang / /dbang bskur la sogs gang byed pa/ /de ni 'chi bdag thebs par 'gyur/ /ngan pa'i las ni gang byed pa/ /de yi dus su bzang bar 'gyur/ /zla ba dang ni pa ba sangs/ /de dus rig pa slobs gyur na/ /go ba ma rnyed
<p>217a.7</p>gti mug nas/ /las ni gang dag byed pa na/ /de yi dus su 'grub mi 'gyur/ /de ltar gza' bdun po'i dus su khrus la sogs pa byed pa ni gza' lag pa la bya'o/ /gos gsar pa 'drub pa dang gcod pa ni/ zla ba dang ba ba sangs la bya'o/ /chos la sogs pa'i rig pa
<p>217b</p>
<p>217b.1</p>ni/ /gza' phur bu la bya'o/ /khang pa brtsigs pa'am/ bag ma len pa'am/ bza' gsar pa byed pa ni/ nyi ma dang spen pa la bya'o/ /nyi ma las skyes pa'i bu ni shin tu grags pa mis mi thub pa'o/ /zla ba las skyes pa'i bu ni 'jam zhing dbang po zhen pa'o/ /mig
<p>217b.2</p>dmar las skyes pa'i bu ni sdig la dga' zhing drag por skyes pa'o/ /pa ba sangs las skyes pa ni/ ser sna che zhing 'dod chags la dga' ba'o/ /phur bu las skyes pa ni shin tu grags la yon tan ldan pa'o/ /spen pa las skyes pa ni 'bring du shes par bya'o/ /gza' lag
<p>217b.3</p>pa las skyes pa ni ltogs par 'gyur zhing sdig pa la dga' ba'o/ /nad thams cad 'byung ba'o/ /de rnams ni gza' brtag ba'o/ /gza'i la nye brtag pa ni/ nyi ma'i dus su ni mdze pho dang nad 'gos pa'i mi dang 'phrad par 'gyur ro/ /yang na btsun pa dang phrad do/ /zla ba'i
<p>217b.4</p>dus su bud med rgan mo gos nag po gon pa dang phrad do/ /mig dmar gyi dus su ni sngags pa gos dmar po gon pa'am/ bud med sham bu dmar po btags pa dang phrad do/ /pa ba sangs kyi dus su ni/ btsun pa 'am bud med gos ser po gon pa dang phrad do/ /phur
<p>217b.5</p>bu'i dus su ni/ mda' thogs pa'i mi ral pa can dang phrad do/ /spen pa'i dus su ni/ zhar ba dang phrad do/ /lag pa'i dus su rkang pa 'theng ba'am/ lag pa zha ba dang phrad do/ /gza' bdun gyi la nye brtag pa'o/ /gza' rA hu la dang du ba mjug rings ni/ 
<p>217b.6</p>khams lnga'i rang bzhin gzhan gyis mi thub pa drag shul che ba'o/ /dpyid zla ra ba'i tshes bzhi la srod la shar nas nub tu rgyu/ tshes brgyad la srod yol nas lho nub mtshams nas byang shar mtshams su rgyu ba'o/ /tshes bcu gnyis la byang nas lhor rgyu ba'o/ /bcu drug la
<p>217b.7</p>nyi ma phyed na shar lho mtshams nas byang shar mtshams su rgyu'o/ /nyi shu tham pa la nub nas shar du nam phyed na rgyu'o/ /nyi shu bzhi la tho rangs ka shar lho nas nub byang du rgyu'o/ /nyi shu brgyad la nyi ma mdung gang na byang nas lhor rgyu'o/ /gnam stong la nyi ma nub
<p>218a</p>
<p>218a.1</p>nas lho nub mtshams nas byang shar mtshams su rgyu'o/ /dpyid zla 'bring pa'i tshes bzhi la srod la nub nas shar du rgyu'o/ /de bzhin du zla ba lhag ma bcu po la yang spel mar shes par bya'o/ /las dang bya ba ci byed kyang gza' rgyu ba dang / gdong thug tu mi bya bar kho dang
<p>218a.2</p>'grogs la bya'o/ /zla ba gang yang rung ba la/ hal khyi rgyu ba ni/ zla ba gang yang rung ba'i tshes gcig la ni snga dro chu tshod lnga la kho gnas pa'o/ /tshes bdun la chu tshod bcu tham pa/ nyin phyed nas kho'i dus so/ /tshes brgyad la nyi ma mdung gang la chu tshod bzhi kho'i dus so/ /tshes bcu
<p>218a.3</p>bzhi la nyi ma dros nas chu tshod nyi shu kho'i dus so/ /tshes bco lnga la nyi ma phyed nas chu tshod drug kho'i dus so/ /tshes bcu drug la srod 'khor nas chu tshod bdun la kho'i dus so/ /nyi shu gnyis la nam phyed nas chu tshod gsum kho'i dus so/ /nyi shu gsum la nam phyed nas chu tshod gsum
<p>218a.4</p>'das nas chu tshod lnga kho'i dus so/ /nyi shu dgu la byang drang po nas chu tshod brgyad kho'i dus so/ /gnam stong la nyi ma phyed nas nam phyed du rgyu'o/ /de'i dus su las dang bya ba ci byed kyang / sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung bas/ de'i phyir na las bya ba ci yang mi bya'o/ /hal khyi na lnga yod do/ /hal khyi nag po dang / 
<p>218a.5</p>dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang lnga po de zla ba dkar po dang nag po/ stod smad du spel nas rgyu ba'o/ /khyi'i gzugs su yod pa/ mjug na yang gdong pa yod pa/ kha nas me 'bar ba de dang 'phrad par gyur na gang gis kyang mi thub cing sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
<p>218a.6</p>rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni/ de ltar phyogs na bdun bdun no/ /zhes bya ba ni/ smin drug ni me'i khams/ snar ma ni chu'i khams/ mgo ni sa'i khams/ lag ni shing gi khams/ nab so lcags kyi khams so/ /rgyal chu'i khams/ /skag me'i khams so/ /bdun po de dag
<p>218a.7</p>ni shar phyogs na gnas so/ /mchu ni sa'i khams/ /gre ni chu'i khams/ dbo ni shing gi khams/ me bzhi ni lcags kyi khams/ nag pa me'i khams/ sa ri sa'i khams/ sa ga chu'i khams so/ /de dag bdun po ni lho na gnas so/ /lha mtshams chu'i khams/ snron
<p>218b</p>
<p>218b.1</p>me'i khams/ snrubs sa'i khams/ chu stod shing gi khams/ chu smad lcags kyi khams/ /byi bzhin me'i khams/ gro bzhin sa'i khams so/ /bdun po de dag ni nub kyi phyogs na gnas sa/ /mon gru chu'i khams/ mon gre lcags kyi khams/ khrums stod sa'i khams/ 
<p>218b.2</p>khrums smad shing gi khams/ nam gru me'i khams/ tha skar sa'i khams so/ /bra nye shing gi khams so/ /bdun po de dag ni byang gi phyogs na gnas so/ /skar ma gza' bdun de dag de bzhin te zhes bya ba ni/ gza' de yang bdun bzhir rgyu ste/ bdun bdun pho mo
<p>218b.3</p>'brel nas/ bzang ba dang ngan par ston pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul che zhing dka' thub che/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas par bskor ba'o/ /'jig rten gyi mi rnams la bzang ba dang ngan par ston pa ste/ de'i dus tshod shes par gyur na/ bzlog par btub
<p>218b.4</p>pa'o/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang / /sum cu rtsa gsum tshang ba dag /ces bya ba ni/ zla ba re re la gza' dgu dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad tshang ba'o/ /nyi ma dang zla ba mig dmar dang / pa ba sangs dang / phur bu spen pa lag pa/ rA hu la du ba mjug rings/ shar gyi phyogs
<p>218b.5</p>nas go rims bzhin du rgyu ba'o/ /skar ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /rA hu la dang du ba mjug rings ni/ tshes grangs mi 'dzin te/ gzhan gyi tshes grangs la gza' gnyis po thod rgal du rgyu'o/ /'char ba dang ni nub pa ni/ /zhes bya ba ni/ phyi mngon pa'i dbang du bshad pa dang / 
<p>218b.6</p>nang gas bsngags kyi dbang du bshad pa ni/ shar ba ni 'jig rten khams kyi mi rnams/ skyes pa la ni nyi ma shar ba zhes bya'o/ /dper na 'jig rten du nyi ma shar ba bzhin no/ /nub pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi rgas nas shi ba la nub pa zhes bya'o/ 'khor lo mtshon
<p>218b.7</p>cha bzhin du rgyu/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rgyu lugs rnam pa gsum yod de/ 'khor lo bzhin du rgyu ba dang / mtshon cha bzhin du rgyu ba dang / dbyu gu'i gros kyis rgyu ba gsum yod pa las/ 'khor lo bzhin du rgyu ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri rab la/ zla ba 'khor lo'i
<p>219a</p>
<p>219a.1</p>'gros su rgyu ba'o/ /mtshon cha bzhin du rgyu ba ni/ nyi ma'i 'gros te tha skar rgyu ba'o/ /dbyu gu'i 'gros ni chu tshod la brtsis te/ gcig bor nas gcig len pa dbyu gu'i 'gros so/ /de bzhin du gza' rnams kyang rgyu ba'o/ /da ni rnal 'byor gyi dbang du
<p>219a.2</p>byas na sna bug g.yas g.yon gnyis na rgyu ba'i dbugs ni/ nyin mo dang nub mo rgyu ba ni rgyu skar bzhin no/ /nyin zhag gcig la chu tshod drug cu yod pa la/ dbugs kyang de bzhin du rgyu ba'o/ /'jig rten du ni zad 'phel byed/ /ces bya ba ni/ zla ba ni tshes stod la
<p>219a.3</p>'phel te/ smad la 'gribs nas zad de/ dbugs kyang phyir 'gro ba ni ring ste/ nang du rngub pa ni thung ste/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la yang zad pa dang 'phel bar byed pa'o/ /de bas na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
<p>219a.4</p>rnams la yang / tshe'i 'phel 'grib 'byung ngo / /yang na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi rnams nor 'phel ba dang / nor 'grib pa yang 'byung ngo / /zla ba ji bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams kyang 'phel 'grib byed do/ /gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul chen po dag /ces
<p>219a.5</p>bya ba ni/ rdzu 'phrul ni gling bzhi dang ri rab la rgyu ba ste/ gzhan rnams kyang zil gyis gnon pa'o/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi sgyu ma bzhin du snang bas na/ 'jig rten gyi khams na gzi brjid che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba'o/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis su/ /rig
<p>219a.6</p>sngags rjes su yi rang byos/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten khams na gnas pa'i gza' dang rgyu skar rnams kyis kyang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la gus pa'i sems kyis rjes su yi rang bas te/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o/ /de dag
<p>219a.7</p>gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis/ bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ nam mkha' bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams la khyab ste/ de yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis brjod du mi btub pa/ rgya cher sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o// 
<p>219b</p>
<p>219b.1</p>de lta bu'i rig sngags gang zag gang gis kyang gus par byas nas 'chang bar gyur na/ gza' dang rgyu skar ngan pa yang zlogs te/ de rnams kyis srung ba dang skyob par byed do/ /tshe phyi ma la yang gza' dang rgyu skar bzang po las skyes nas/ rig sngags 'di dran par 'gyur ro/ /sba ba dang
<p>219b.2</p>zhes bya ba ni/ snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las/ gza' dang rgyu skar gyi gnas skabs te bco brgyad pa'o// //kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig
<p>219b.3</p>rten gyi khams yan chad/ man chad kyi lha rnams kyi ming zung shig ces bya ba ni/ gling bzhi na gnas pa'i lha dang / 'dod lha ris drug dang / gzugs med skye mched mu bzhi'i lha'o/ /de rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ ming dang / gzugs dang / 
<p>219b.4</p>tshe dang / longs spyod dang / gnas so/ /'di lta ste ni 'di rnams lta ba'o/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha rnams kyi lus tshad ni/ rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha gcig go/ /tshe tshad ni mi lo lnga bcu la/ rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha
<p>219b.5</p>rnams kyi zhag gcig /nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig /zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig /rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe tshad mtha' ni/ lo de ltar brtsis pa'i lha'i lo lnga brgya ste/ bar mdor 'chi ba yod do/ /mi ltar brtsis na lo sa ya phrag dgu yod do/ /nyon
<p>219b.6</p>mongs pa ni dbang po gnyis sbyor bas tshim pa'o/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni rgyang grags phyed do/ /tshe tshad ni mi rnams kyi lo brgya la/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]zhag gcig go/ /de sum cu la zla ba gcig go/ /zla ba bcu
<p>219b.7</p>gnyis la lo gcig /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo stong thub bo/ /mi lo ltar brtsis pa'i bye ba phrag 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang bye ba phrag dgu khri drug stong yod do/ /bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/ /nyon mongs pa spyi dang 'dra'o/ /
<p>220a</p>
<p>220a.1</p>'thab bral gyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni rgyang grags bzhi cha gsum mo/ /tshe tshad ni mi lo nyis brgya la 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi zhag gcig go/ /de sum cu la zla ba gcig /zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi
<p>220a.2</p>tshe tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lo nyis stong thub po/ /mi lo ltar brtsis pa'i bye ba phrag bcu bzhi dang / sa ya bzhi yod do/ /nyon mongs pa ni 'khyud pa tsam gyis zhi ba'o/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus kyi tshad ni rgyang grags gcig go/ /tshe
<p>220a.3</p>tshad ni mi lo bzhi brgya la/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi zhag gcig go/ /de sum cu la zla ba gcig go/ /zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig go/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi tshe tshad kyi mtha' ni/ de ltar brtsis pa'i lo bzhi stong thub po/ /mi lo ltar brtsis na bye ba phrag
<p>220a.4</p>lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang / lo sa ya phrag drug yod do/ /nyon mongs pa ni lag pa nas bzung ba tsam gyis tshim mo/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni rgyang grags gcig dang / de'i bzhi cha gcig go/ /tshe tshad ni mi lo brgyad brgya la/ 'phrul
<p>220a.5</p>dga'i nyin zhag gcig /nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig /zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig /de ltar brtsis pa'i 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi tshe tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lha'i lo brgya stong thub/ mi lo ltar brtsis na/ bye ba phrag nyis brgya sum cu dang / lo sa ya phrag
<p>220a.6</p>bzhi thub bo/ /nyon mongs pa ni bgad pa tsam gyis tshim mo/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni rgyang grags phyed dang gnyis/ tshe tshad ni mi rnams kyi lo stong drug brgya la/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi zhag gcig
<p>220a.7</p>go/ /nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig /zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi tshe'i mtha' ni/ lo de ltar brtsis pa'i lha'i lo khri drug stong thub/ nyon mongs pa ni bltas pa tsam gyis tshim mo/ /mi lo ltar brtsis pa na/ bye ba phrag
<p>220b</p>
<p>220b.1</p>dgu brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / lo sa ya phrag drug yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus kyi tshad ni dpag tshad phyed do/ tshe tshad ni bskal ba phyed do/ tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar du 'dod chags med do/ /tshangs pa mdun na 'don gyi
<p>220b.2</p>lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus kyi tshad ni dpag tshad gcig /tshe'i tshad ni bskal ba gcig go/ /'di ni bsam gtan dang po'i lha ste/ tshangs pa mdun na 'don gyi lha'i nges tshig ni/ gong ma'i tshangs pa chen po'i spyan sngar 'og ma'i las dge sdig snang 'don
<p>220b.3</p>pas na/ tshangs pa mdun na 'don zhes bya'o/ /yang na tshangs pa chen po la phan 'dogs pas/ tshangs pa nye phan zhes bya/ yang na tshangs pa chen po la 'khor bas tshangs pa kun 'khor zhes bya'o/ /tshangs pa chen po'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad
<p>220b.4</p>gnyis/ tshe tshad ni bskal pa phyed dang gnyis yod de/ tshangs pa chen po'i nges tshig ni/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'khor ba gyod drin las tshangs pas tshangs pa chen po'o/ /'od chung gi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad gnyis yod do/ /tshe tshad ni bskal
<p>220b.5</p>pa gnyis thob po/ /nges tshig ni gong ma gnyis pas 'od chung bas so/ /tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad bzhi/ tshe tshad ni bskal pa bzhi/ nges tshig ni 'og ma ltos nas lus dang gzhal med khang tshad med pa'i phyir ro/ /
<p>220b.6</p>tshad ni dpag tshad gnyis yod do/ /'od gsal gyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad brgyad do/ /tshe tshad ni bskal pa brgyad thub/ nges tshig ni 'og ma gzhan gyi 'od kyang / 'di'i 'od kyis gsal bar byed pa'o/ /dge chung gi lha rnams dang
<p>220b.7</p>zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad bcu drug /tshe tshad kyang bskal pa bcu drug thub/ nges tshig ni bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / don gong ma gnyis pas chung bas na dge chung zhes bya'o/ /yang na 'dod pa'i yon tan dang bde ba gnas ris gong ma
<p>221a</p>
<p>221a.1</p>gnyis pas chung bas so/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi zas la spyod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis/ tshe tshad bskal pa sum cu rtsa gnyis/ nges tshig ni 'og ma pas gong ma'i rtags tshad mi spobs pas ni
<p>221a.2</p>tshad med dge'o/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad drug cu rtsa bzhi/ tshe tshad ni bskal pa drug cu rtsa bzhi/ nges tshig ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba ma lus par rdzogs par byed pas dge rgyas so/ /'og ma gnyis kyi ting nge 'dzin 'dis
<p>221a.3</p>gsal bar byed pa'o/ /sprin med kyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad drug cu rtsa lnga/ tshe tshad ni bskal pa nyi shu rtsa lnga/ yang na bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin gyi tshad gzugs med par 'od dang / byin rlabs 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /nges tshig ni sprin
<p>221a.4</p>yang med pas so/ /yang na gnas kyi gzhi sprin dang 'dra bas so/ /bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ tshe tshad kyang bskal pa nyis brgya lnga bcu/ nges tshig ni bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa bsgoms pas/ 
<p>221a.5</p>'bras bu bsod nams chen po bskyed la/ bsod nams skyes so/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i lha/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad lnga brgya/ tshe tshad kyang bskal pa lnga brgya/ nges tshig ni bsam gtan dang / zag pa med pa spel mar
<p>221a.6</p>bsgoms pas/ 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'o/ /'du shes med pa'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus kyi tshad ni gong ma dang 'dra'o/ /tshe tshad ni bskal pa lnga brgya'o/ /nges tshig ni 'du shes de shes pa nad du 'khyil bas ngan par shes pa skyes te/ da dung skye ba mang po
<p>221a.7</p>len pa mthong bas/ khos thar pa mya ngan las 'das pa gtan med pa 'dra snyam nas skur pa btab pas/ dmyal bar ltung ba yod do/ /kha cig blo rno bas 'phar te 'gro ba yang yod/ bsam gtan bsgoms pa nor ba yin zer lus 'od che la dran pa mi rgyu/ mdor na 'du
<p>221b</p>
<p>221b.1</p>shes med pa'i lha/ gzugs su rags la tshor ba zhan pa'o/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad stong / tshe tshad kyang bskal pa bzhi stong ngo / /nges tshig ni rtog pa gong ma tsam du mi che'o/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad
<p>221b.2</p>kyang dpag tshad nyis stong / tshe tshad kyang bskal pa nyis stong / nges tshig ni khams gsum gyi gdung ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad bzhi stong / tshe tshad kyang bskal pa bzhi stong thub po/ /nges tshig
<p>221b.3</p>ni bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa bsgoms pas/ 'bras bu bde zhing gya nom pas gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad brgyad stong ngo / /tshe tshad kyang bskal pa brgyad stong thub po/ /nges tshig ni gnas de na
<p>221b.4</p>thar pa dang / bde ba thob pa ni ma yin/ gtan du mya ngan las 'das pa bgrod pa'i gnas su mthong bas shin tu mthong zhes bya'o/ /'og min gyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad khri drug stong / tshe tshad bskal pa khri drug stong thub po/ nges tshig
<p>221b.5</p>ni gzugs khams bcu bdun gyi bla mar gyur pas/ 'og min la bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin gsal bas/ 'og min gsal zhes bya'o/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshe tshad ni mtha'i bskal pa nyi khri thub/ nges tshig ni
<p>221b.6</p>chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar stong pa yin par shes nas/ nam mkha' la yang kun du mtha' yas par bltas nas/ de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ skye mched nye bar blang ba'i phyir ro/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams
<p>221b.7</p>dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshe tshad ni bskal pa bzhi khri thub/ nges tshig ni gzugs khams kyi ting nge 'dzin la bltas nas/ chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar mtha' yas so snyam pa ni/ rnam par shes pa yin la/ de yang ma zad de/ rnam par shes pa de dang
<p>222a</p>
<p>222a.1</p>'grogs pa'i 'du shes kyang / nam mkha' ltar kun du mtha' yas par brtags nas/ skye mched nye bar blangs pa'i phyir ro/ /yod min med min skye mched kyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshe tshad bskal ba brgyad khri nges tshig ni 'og ma ltar
<p>222a.2</p>shes pa bkag nas/ rmongs pa ni ma rung ngo snyam nas/ 'du shes yod pa ma yin te/ shes pa 'gags nas med pa yang ma yin te/ 'di ni 'du shes cha phra mo tsam la brten pa'i phyir/ yod min med min zhes bya'o/ /ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams dang
<p>222a.3</p>zhes bya ba ni/ tshe tshad bskal pa drug khri ste/ nges tshig ni 'og ma ltar thos pa thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa nam mkha' ltar mtha' yas pa'i 'du shes ni/ zug rngu'i skye mched yin par rtogs nas/ 'du shes je phra bkag nas ni/ 
<p>222a.4</p>'du shes cung zad kyang mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ci yang med pa'i skye mched ces bya'o/ /skye mched mu bzhi po 'di la spags pa'i lus ni med/ nam mkha' mtha' yas dang rnam shes mtha' yas gnyis la skye mched nye bar blangs pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i khams la
<p>222a.5</p>gzugs cung zad yod do zhes brjod do/ /de dag thams cad la bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/ /rgyal chen rigs bzhi nas 'og min gyi bar du thams cad kyang rin po che'i gos gon no/ /nyi zer gyi rdul bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i cha gcig ni/ rdul phra rab yin no/ /rdul phra
<p>222a.6</p>rab bdun la rdul phra mo gcig yin no/ /rdul phra mo bdun la nyi zer gyi rdul gcig go/ /nyi zer gyi rdul bdun la ri bong gi rdul gcig go/ /ri bong gi rdul bdun la/ lug rdul gcig go/ /lug rdul bdun la ni glang rdul gcig go/ /glang rdul bdun la sro ma
<p>222a.7</p>gcig /sro ma bdun la a ba ga na gcig /a ba ga na bdun la ba ti ka gcig /ba ti ka bdun la nas gcig nas bdun la sor gcig /sor nyi shu rtsa gnyis la khru gang / 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi rnams kha cig ni/ gos khru tshad 'di lta bu brtsis pa'i khru brgyad ba gon
<p>222b</p>
<p>222b.1</p>no/ /kha cig ni khru bcu pa'o/ /lus 'phags po rnams kyi khru nyi shu'o/ /ba lang spyod rnams kyi ni khru bzhi bcu pa/ sgra mi snyan pa rnams kyi ni dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos khru brgyad cu pa gon no/ /rgyal chen bzhi nas 'og min gyi bar du ni/ lus ci ran pa'i gos
<p>222b.2</p>gon no/ /'dzam bu gling pa'i mi rnams nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar du pho'i mtshan ma dang mo'i mtshan ma yod do/ /tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar du/ pho'i dbang po dang mo'i dbang po med do/ /'dzam bu gling dang / lus 'phags dang / ba lang spyod gsum nas bag ma
<p>222b.3</p>gtong ba dang len pa yod do/ /sgra mi snyan pa la ni med do/ /rgyal chen bzhi nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams la yang yod do/ /tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar du gtong ba dang len pa gnyis ka med do/ /'dzam bu gling nas gling gsum la shin tu grang ba dang / tsha ba yod do/ /sgra mi snyan
<p>222b.4</p>na med do/ /rgyal chen bzhi nas 'og min gyi bar du tsha grang gnyis ka med do/ /'dzam bu gling pa la dgun dang dpyid dang dbyar dang ston yod pa bzhin du gling gsum dang rgyal chen bzhi nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do/ /tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar
<p>222b.5</p>du dus bzhi med do/ /ji ltar 'dzam bu gling nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gyi bar du/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo yod do/ /tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar du nyin mo dang mtshan mo med do/ /'dzam bu gling nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar du pha ma yod do/ /tshangs ris
<p>222b.6</p>nas 'og min gyi lha rnams la pha ma med do/ /'dzam bu gling nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la rje dang bran yod do/ /tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar du rje dang bran med do/ /'dzam bu gling nas gling gsum na ni/ 'bru dang nor yod do/ /sgra mi snyan na 'bru ni
<p>222b.7</p>yod nor ni med do/ /rgyal chen bzhi nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar du 'bru ni med nor ni yod do/ /tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar du nor yang med 'bru yang med do/ /'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la pha ma'am bu mo'am bran po'am/ rje'am 'bru la mngon par zhen pa
<p>223a</p>
<p>223a.1</p>yod pa bzhin du/ gling gnyis po la yang yod/ /sgra mi snyan pa rnams la ni/ mngon par zhen pa med do/ /rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams la ni/ 'bru ma gtogs pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yod pa bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
<p>223a.2</p>kyi bar du/ 'bru ma gtogs pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yod do/ /tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar du ci la yang zhen pa med do/ /gling bzhi pa'i mi rnams la bud med zla mtshan can dang / sbrum pa dang bu btsa' ba yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi ni/ 'dzam bu gling
<p>223a.3</p>gi mi rnams kyi bu tsha lo lnga lon pa tsam mam/ lha'am lha'i bu mo'i phrag pa'am/ pang bar rdzus te skye ba'o/ /lha'am lha'i bu mo rnams ni/ bdag gi bu'am bu mo yin snyam du sems pa'o/ /khye'u dang bu de dag ni/ 'di dag ni bdag cag gi pha'o/ /ma'o snyam du sems so/ /
<p>223a.4</p>sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams ni/ lo drug lon pa tsam/ 'thab bral ba rnams kyi lo bdun lon pa tsam/ dga' ldan pa rnams kyi lo brgyad lon pa tsam/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi lo dgu lon pa tsam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi lo bcu lon pa tsam/ lha'am lha'i bu mo'i
<p>223a.5</p>phrag pa'am pang bar rdzus te skye'o/ /lha'am lha'i bu mo dag 'di ni bdag gi lha'i bu mo snyam du sems so/ /khye'u dang bu mo de dag kyang bdag cag gi pha'am ma snyam du sems so/ /tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar du/ thog ma nas lus kyi yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad
<p>223a.6</p>rdzogs par skye zhing / 'chi ba na yang de kho na bzhin no/ /gzugs med pa rnams la ni lus med do/ /de bas de dag la skye ba yang mi mngon/ 'chi ba yang mi mngon no/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba zhes bya ba ni/ lha de rnams ni rang gi sa nas steng du 'gro mi nus par/ de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
<p>223a.7</p>pa yang yin no/ /'od dang ldan pa'i zhes bya ba ni/ 'od de yang yar mi 'gro zhing rang rang khyab nas 'od du gsal ba'o/ /bsod nams che zhing longs spyod che ba zhes bya ba ni/ lha de rnams kyi rang rang gi bsod nams kyi longs spyod che chung dang ldan pa'o/ /dbang che zhing 'khor mang po zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>223b</p>
<p>223b.1</p>lha de rnams kyang bsod nams kyi dbang gis 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de bzhin du dbang che ba'o/ /lha dang lha ma yin rnams gnas pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ lha ma yin ni zhe sdang dang / ser sna'i dbang gis lha ma yin du grags te/ de med pa ni lha yin no/ /de bzhin du yon tan dang
<p>223b.2</p>ldan pa'i lha dang lha ma yin rnams gnas pa'o/ /de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ thugs rje che zhing 'jig rten gyi khams la khyab pa/ ma lus par rdzogs pa'i sems can gyi don la srung ba dang skyob par byed do/ /
<p>223b.3</p>de lta bu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gang zag gang gis kyang gus shing rjes su yi rang nas/ lha de rnams kyis srung ba dang skyob par byed par 'gyur te tshe phyi ma la yang srung ba'o/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sngar gong du bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /rig sngags kyi
<p>223b.4</p>rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las lha rnams bshad pa'i gnas skabs te bcu dgu pa'o// //kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thugs rje can rnams kyis gsungs so/ /drang srong snying rje chen po rnams kyi ming srung shig ces bya ba ni/ brtul zhugs kyi
<p>223b.5</p>dbang gis drang srong nyi ma'i lta ba dang / tshangs pa'i lta ba dang gnyis yod de/ drang srong chad par lta ba ni nyi ma'i gzhung ngo / /drang srong rtag par lta ba ni tshangs pa'i gzhung ngo / /de gnyis rtag pa dang chad par lta ba'i drang srong rnams kyi ming zung shig ces bya'o/ /brtul zhugs grub pa
<p>223b.6</p>zhes bya ba ni/ de gnyis kyang dka' thub kyi dbang gis/ rang gi lus la tshangs par spyod pa'i rang bzhin gyis rang gis dka' thub byas pa'o/ /rig sngags grub pa zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi rig pa'i ye shes kyis phyi'i rig pa grub pa ste/ phyi'i rig pa de ni mngon par shes pa'o/ /
<p>223b.7</p>grags pa 'bar ba zhes bya ba ni/ drang srong de rnams la 'jig rten gyi khams la grags pa'o/ /yang na 'bar ba ni/ de'i dmod mos bsregs pa bzhin du thal bar gtong ba'o/ /klung dang ri la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni/ mi'i sems can rnams la mi gnas pa'i sa'am/ 'bras
<p>224a</p>
<p>224a.1</p>bu rtsa ba shing gi skogs pa gon pa'o/ /sha med pa keng rus 'jigs pa'i cha byad can/ skra ring ba sen mo ring ba phreng ba dang ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa'o/ /smod pa'i mtshon cha can zhes bya ba ni/ rang mgu ba'i dus su legs par smras na/ bzang bar 'gyur te/ ngan par
<p>224a.2</p>smras pas ngan par 'gyur ro/ /dka' thub drag pa zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gzhan ma bzhin du srog gcod par mi byed la/ ma byin par mi len par/ 'dod pa log par mi g.yem zhing / mi tshangs par mi spyod pa/ brdzun du mi smra zhing / phra ma dang ngag 'khyal med de/ tshig
<p>224a.3</p>rtsub mo yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang mi dang klu dang gsum dus gcig tu rgyu nus pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ lus kyi mngon par shes pa/ ngag gi mngon par shes pa/ yid kyi mngon par shes pa/ mig gi mngon par shes pa/ 
<p>224a.4</p>rna ba'i mngon par shes pa'o/ /nam mkha' la 'gro ba de dag gi ming brjod kyis khyod zung shig ces bya ba ni ngang pa'i rgyal po gser lta bu bzhin du nam mkha' la rgyu ba'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ drang srong rnams la lta ba'o/ /drang srong chen po brgyad pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po g.yon phyogs pa
<p>224a.5</p>zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po g.yon phyogs lha zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po lha skyabs kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'od zer can zhes bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ lnga po de rnams kyang rdzu 'phrul che ba gzi brjid dang ldan te/ bsam gtan bzhi la gnas pa'o/ /de rnams sku mdog dang / 
<p>224a.6</p>phyag mtshan ni/ dkar po dang / sngo skya dang / dkar ser dang / sngon po dang / ser po'o/ /g.yas rnams na dbyu gu gsum pa bsnams pa/ g.yon rnams na phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ /de rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing / rig sngags rjes su dren
<p>224a.7</p>pa'o/ /drang srong chen po kun gyi bshes zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gnas nas 'jog ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po grog mkhar ba zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'dro ba skyong gi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'dro ba skyong gi bu rgan po zhes bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni/
<p>224b</p>
<p>224b.1</p>drang srong da rnams ni bstan bcos la mkhas pa/ gzugs tshad la mkhas pa lnga'o/ /de rnams kyi kha dog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dmar skya dang / nag po dang / sngo bsangs dang / ljang gu dang / ser po'o/ /g.yas rnams na pu ste/ g.yon rnams na phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ /lnga po
<p>224b.2</p>de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar/ srung ba dang skyob par byed do/ /drang srong chen po ngan spong zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ngan spong dga' zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'gro 'dzin zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'gro dga' zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen
<p>224b.3</p>po 'jigs can zhes bya ba dang lnga po de dag kyang 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du byed rnams spong ba'o/ /drang srong de rnams ni tshangs pa'i gzhung gis rtag par lta ba'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ser po dang / dmar
<p>224b.4</p>po dang / nag po dang / thal ba'i mdog dang / sngon po'o/ /g.yas g.yon gnyis snyoms par zhugs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar srung ba dang skyob par byed pa'o/ /drang srong chen po skal ldan shing rta zhes bya ba dang / 
<p>224b.5</p>drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mdun du bdar zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mgo bo che zhes bya ba dang drang srong chen po gshin rje'i me zhes bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig byed kyi gzhung gis rig byed gtso bor byas nas rtag par smra ba dang / rig byed bzhi ni mchod sbyin gyi rig
<p>224b.6</p>byed dang / snyan dngags kyi rig byed dang / srid srung gi rig byed dang / nyams yod kyi rig byed dang / de bzhi yang bkra shis shing tshe ring ba'o/ /nad med pa dmod mos 'dod pa'o/ /de'i sgo nas grol bar 'dod pa'i lta bas so/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ 
<p>224b.7</p>dmar po dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang / sngon po dang / nag po'o/ /g.yas rnams na bum pa spyi blugs 'dzin cing g.yon rnams na dbyu gu gsum pa bsnoms pa'o/ /drang srong de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar srung ba dang skyob par byed pa
<p>225a</p>
<p>225a.1</p>pa'o/ /drang srong chen po gnyis 'thung gi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gnyis 'thung nag po'i bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ljang sngo'i bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ljang sngo'i tsha bo zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ngag mnyam zhes bya ba dang zhes bya
<p>225a.2</p>ba ni/ nyi ma'i gzhung gis chad par lta ba ste/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram nas rkang pa g.yas pa yar blangs shing / g.yon pa sa la btsugs nas nyi ma la lta ba'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ nag po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / sngon po dang / ljang nag go/ /
<p>225a.3</p>phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas gnam la blta ba'o/ /drang srong chen po de rnams kyis kyang srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o/ /drang srong chen po 'phags po zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po yang dag 'phags po zhes bya ba dang / drang srong
<p>225a.4</p>chen po bzod pa smra zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po grags pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rab grags zhes bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshangs pa'i gzhung gis rtag par lta ba ste/ bum pa'i rang bzhin 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ /de rnams kyi
<p>225a.5</p>sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ nag po dang / dmar skya dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po'o/ /phyag gnyis bum pa spyi blugs bsnams pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar/ srung ba dang skyob par byed pa'o/ /drang srong chen po bla ma zhes bya ba dang / 
<p>225a.6</p>drang srong chen po grub pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gru 'dzin zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rta bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gangs can zhes bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'gog pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ /de rnams
<p>225a.7</p>kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang nag dang / sngo skya dang / dkar ser ro/ /phyag gnyis ni ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ /drang srong de rnams rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /drang
<p>225b</p>
<p>225b.1</p>srong chen po mig dmar zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po cha byad 'dzin gyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gos ngan zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mda' ltar snang ba zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rgyags pa zhes bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyang chad par lta ba
<p>225b.2</p>ste/ chos thams cad 'chal par rtogs nas/ ngo bo mi 'dzin pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dkar po dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / nag po dang / thal ba'i mdog go/ /g.yas rnams na rtse gsum dang / g.yon rnams na phreng ba
<p>225b.3</p>bsnams pa'o/ /drang srong de rnams ni rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar/ srung ba dang skyob par byed pa'o/ /drang srong chen po 'od ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po pa ba sangs zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po phur bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po
<p>225b.4</p>rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po spen pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong de rnams yang skar ma'i lta ba can te/ lta ba ni bar ma dor gnas shing skye ba mi 'dod pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ser po dang / dkar po dang / nag po dang / sngo skya dang / 
<p>225b.5</p>dmar po'o/ /g.yas rnams na dbyu gu gsum/ g.yon rnams na bum pa spyi blugs bsnams pa'o/ /drang srong rnams kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar srung ba dang skyob par byed pa'o/ /drang srong chen po gza' lhag ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po dug sel
<p>225b.6</p>zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po sa 'dzin zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rwa gcig pa zhes bya ba dang drang srong chen po drang srong rwa zhes bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig byed kyi gzhung gis rtag par lta ba ste/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ljang nag dang / ser po dang / dkar
<p>225b.7</p>ser dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / nag po'o/ /g.yas rnams ni bum pa spyi blugs g.yon rnams na phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ /drang srong de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /drang srong chen po gyur mid kyi bu zhes
<p>226a</p>
<p>226a.1</p>bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gar ldan gyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po sgra'i bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'jigs byed ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'jigs byed glang po che zhes bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ rtag par lta bar gnas pa ste/ bum pa'i
<p>226a.2</p>ting nge 'dzin gyis lus bems por 'dod pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ser po dang / dmar po dang / thal ba'i mdog dang / mthing ga dang / nag po'o/ /phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis mnyam gzhag gi phyag la snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ /de rnams kyis kyang
<p>226a.3</p>rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar rjes su yi rang zhing srung ba dang skyob par byed pa'o/ /drang srong chen po ser skya zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gau ta ma zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rta dmar zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po byis pa rtse zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mis sbyin
<p>226a.4</p>gyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ri bo zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po srin bu 'dzin zhes bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ drang srong bdun po de dag ni/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi bar du byas shing rtag par lta ba ste/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dkar po dang / ser po dang / 
<p>226a.5</p>dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / ljang nag dang / dmar skya'o/ /g.yas rnams na phreng ba dang / dbyu gu gsum bsnams shing / g.yon rnams na ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa'o/ /drang srong de rnams kyang rig sngags rjes su dran zhing / sems can rnams kyi don byed
<p>226a.6</p>pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang nas yang du gsungs pa'o/ /drang srong chen po rnying pa 'di dag ni/ rig byed rnams byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams ni sngon gyi drang srong chen po ste/ de rnams kyang rig byed bzhi 'don zhing / rig
<p>226a.7</p>byed de rnams kyi don ni/ bkra shis tshe ring chos sbyin dmod mos su snang ba'o/ /rig byed bzhi po de'i don la 'don pa'o/ /gsang sngags rnams byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ dngos grub thob cing rig pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas pa/ gzhan sems can rnams la skyob par byed pa'o/ /
<p>226b</p>
<p>226b.1</p>dmod pa 'dor ba zhes bya ba ni de'i dmod pa ni gang yang grub pa'o/ /brtul zhugs grub pa zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong bzhin du 'dod chags dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / de rnams spangs la bsgom pa la gtso bor byas pa'o/ /gzi
<p>226b.2</p>brjid che ba zhes bya ba ni/ drang srong de rnams kyi gzi brjid kyis mtho ris khyab pa'o/ /grub pa pha rol gnon pa zhes bya ba ni/ bum pa gang ba dang / sems bems por grub nas/ de rnams kyi gzi brjid kyis gnon pa'o/ /grub pa dag ste zhes bya ste/ de rnams kyis
<p>226b.3</p>kyang thun mong gi dngos grub thob pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di ni zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ sku mdog ser mo g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ba spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i
<p>226b.4</p>thor tshugs can/ /dbu la rin po che rdo rjes brgyan pa/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas gsum na dbyu gu gsum dang / bum pa spyi blugs dang pu sti'o/ /g.yon gsum na rma bya'i sgro dang phreng ba dang / sbrul bsnams ba'o/ /brtul zhugs kyi cha byad can/ zla ba'i gdan la
<p>226b.5</p>nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /de lta bu'i rig sngags gang zag gis gus par byas shing 'chang bar 'gyur na/ drang srong chen po de rnams kyis kyang srung ba dang skyob par 'gyur ro/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sngar
<p>226b.6</p>bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags drang srong rnams kyi gnyen po lta'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ ha ri ha ri la sogs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las/ drang srong rnams kyi
<p>226b.7</p>gnas skabs te nyi shu pa'o// //kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas gsungs pa'o/ /khyod kyi skye dgu'i bdag po gang dag ces bya ba ni/ khams kyi rigs brtag pa/ 'gro ba rigs drug gi las kyi me long 'dzin pa'o/ /
<p>227a</p>
<p>227a.1</p>lha rnams dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba nas/ lha rnams skye ba'i gtsug lag 'dzin cing / las kyi ri mo bris nas de la btang ba'i bdag po'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ skye dgu'i bdag po rnams kyi ming blta ba'o/ /skye dgu'i
<p>227a.2</p>bdag po tshangs pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag po bu can dang / skye dgu'i bdag po za tshul can gyi bu dang / skye dgu'i bdag po me dang / skye dgu'i bdag po gso ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten nas bla na med pa gnas pa ste/ de lnga po ni lha'i las kyi me long gi ri mo 'dzin pa'o/ /
<p>227a.3</p>de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / nag por gnas pa'o/ /de rnams kyi g.yas na dbyu gu rtse gsum dang / phreng ba dang / bum pa spyi blugs dang / 'khor lo dang / zhags pa bsnams pa/ g.yon
<p>227a.4</p>rnams na las kyi me long ri mo bsnams pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i brtul zhugs su zhugs pa/ khams gsum tsam la dbang ba/ de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar/ srung ba dang skyob par byed pa'o/ /skye dgu'i bdag po mdun du ba rang dang / skye/ 
<p>227a.5</p>dgu'i bdag po spu zing sel dang / skye dgu'i bdag po go byed dang / skye dgu'i bdag po mdzes gnas dang / skye dgu'i bdag po zin po dang zhes bya ba ni/ skye dgu'i bdag po de rnams kyang sa stengs kyi las kyi me long 'dzin zhing / mi dang byol song rnams kyi skye ba'i las
<p>227a.6</p>'dzin pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ser po dang / nag po dang / ljang gu dang / dmar po dang / dkar por snang ba'o/ /g.yas rnams na 'khor lo dang / zhags pa dang / dung dang / be con dang / dbyug to'o/ /g.yon rnams na las kyi
<p>227a.7</p>ri mo'i me long bsnams pa'o/ /de lta bu'i skye dgu'i bdag pos kyang / sa steng du dbang mdzad cing / rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar/ sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /skye dgu'i bdag po lus mdzes dang / skye dgu'i bdag po rab dga' dang / 
<p>227b</p>
<p>227b.1</p>skye dgu'i bdag po mkhas pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag po gus yod de zhes bya ba ni/ skye dgu'i bdag po de rnams kyang sa 'og na gnas pa'i yi dgas dmyal ba'i las kyi me long 'dzin ba'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ nag po dang / ljang nag dang / thal ba'i
<p>227b.2</p>mdog dang / mthing gar gnas pa'o/ /g.yas rnams na be con dang / lcags kyu dang / dbyug to dang / zhags pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na las kyi me long gi ri mo bsnams pa'o/ /sa 'og la dbang mdzad cing / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bka' las mi 'da' bar sems
<p>227b.3</p>can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /skye dgu'i bdag po bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyis kyang khams gsum gyi bdag por gnas shing / sems can bzang ngan
<p>227b.4</p>gyi las smra ba'o/ /gnas pa dang 'gro ba'i 'byung po'i chogs bsrung ba'i phyir gnas pa dag go zhes bya ba ni/ 'ong ba dang da ltar dang 'das pa rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa/ gzi brjid che zhing dbang che ba rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi
<p>227b.5</p>rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i ngo bo ni/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog nag mo spyan gsum pa/ dbu skra ser po dbu la rdo rjes brgyan pa/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ yan lag thams cad sbrul gyis brgyan
<p>227b.6</p>pa/ g.yas pa gnyis na be con dang 'khor lo'o/ /g.yon pa gnyis na rma bya'i sgro dang / zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /g.yas brkyang ba g.yon bskum pa/ nyi ma'i gdan dang 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /de lta bu'i rig sngags la gang zag gang
<p>227b.7</p>gis gus par gyur na/ skye dgu'i bdag po de rnams kyis kyang srung ba dang skyob par 'gyur ro/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags skye dgu'i bdag po'i gnyen po
<p>228a</p>
<p>228a.1</p>blta bar bya'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ /hi ri hi ri la sogs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las khams gsum gyi mnga' bdag skye dgu'i bdag po chen po rnams kyi gnas skabs te nyi shu gcig pa'o// //kun dga' bo
<p>228a.2</p>zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /khyod kyis dug chen po rnams kyi ming zung shig ces bya ba ni/ phyi'i dug rnam pa gsum ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams su grags shing gzhan rnams kyis mi thub pa/ thun mong gi
<p>228a.3</p>dug ces bya ba sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o/ /'gro ba dang / gnas pa dang / sbyor ba dang gsum mo/ /dug de gsum ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams la khyab ste/ sems can rnams la 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten
<p>228a.4</p>gyi dug gsum lta ba'o/ /aN+Da rA zhes bya ba ni/ sgo nga las byung ba'i dug yin te/ sbrul la sogs pa'i sems can las byung ba'o/ /kha rlangs kyi dug dang / mche ba'i dug go/ /paN+Da rA ni klu'i dug bsam pa'i dug go/ /mthong ba dang gnyis so/ /kA ra Ta ni
<p>228a.5</p>klu'i dug reg pa'i dug go/ /'dzin pa'i dug go/ /ke yU rA ni bum pa'i dug yin te/ de ni reg pa'i dug go/ /b+hU tang+ga mA ni 'byung po rnams kyi mthong ba'i dug yin te/ de yang dug bzhi gnas pa'o/ /b+hU tapa ti ni mi
<p>228a.6</p>ma yin gyi dug yin te/ de yang mthong ba dang / reg pa dang / bsam pa las byung ba'i dug yin te/ bin+du pa ti ni thigs pa'i dug yin te/ de yang bsam pa dang mthong ba las byung ba/ klu'i dug phol mig go/ /si ri pa ti ni de yang klu'i dug yin te/ 
<p>228a.7</p>dmu chu'i nang do/ /te jo ba ti ni klu'i dug me dbal gyi nad yin no/ /ya sho ba ti ni de yang klu'i nad yin te/ mdze'i bye brag go/ /ya sho gra pa ti ni sa bdag gi dug yin te/ 'bras kyi nad do/ /a ra DA ni sa bdag gi rigs g.ya' ba'o/ /ta ra DA ni sa bdag gi rigs
<p>228b</p>
<p>228b.1</p>sha bkra'i nad do/ /ta ra da ni 'brum bu'o/ /tu tu rA ni lhog pa'i nad do/ /dan+ta ha rA ni mche ba la sogs pa las byung ba sems can dug gi so'i dug go/ /ha la ha la ni 'jig rten drag po'i dug yin te/ sems can nang gi dug go/ /me lA ha la gra ni sbyor ba'i dug go/ /pA la ni 'bras bu
<p>228b.2</p>las byung ba'o/ /gu ha ni gsang ba'i dug go/ /gsang ba'i dug ni dam tshig las byung ba'o/ /tsa rI ni brtan pa ste mi 'gyur ba'o/ /dan+du rA ni btsan dug go/ /i ri ki tsi kA ni rtsa ba'i dug go/ /kam+bA ni blta ba'i dug go/ /sha ta dan+du rA ni log pa'i dug go/ /bi pu le ni
<p>228b.3</p>sprin gyi dug go/ /na ku le ni sre mong las byung ba'o/ /kirI pi ni phyi ba'i dug go/ /ta rang+gA r-iSh+Ta ni srin bu ki ti'i dug go/ /a mra ma ti ni sbrul nag po'i dug go/ /dzAm+bU ma ti ni sha dug go/ /ma d+hu ma ti ni bdud rtsi las byung ba'o/ /ka ma le ni mthong ba'i dug go/ /bi ma le ni phye ma'i
<p>228b.4</p>dug go/ /kuN+Da le ni rtsa ba'i dug go/ /a ha du hi ni sdig pa mang po'i dug go/ /a Di na Di ni sdig pa dmar po'i dug go/ /'bu ge 'bu ge ni sa dug go/ /bad sa nA b+he ni spre'u de ba'i dug go/ /ma hA ga re ni nag po brtsegs pa'i dug go/ /du lam+be ni rtsa ba nag po'i dug go/ /su lam
<p>228b.5</p>be ni zhes bya ba ni/ rin po che'i dbyig dug go/ /swA hA ni dug bcom pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /'di dag ni dug chen po dag ste zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten la grags pa'i phyi'i dug ces pa'o/ /de dag
<p>228b.6</p>gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ phyi'i dug dang / nang gi dug 'joms nus pa'o/ /rigs pa'i rang bzhin rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di la gang zag gang gis kyang gus par byas na/ dug nad thams cad kyis mi
<p>228b.7</p>tshugs shing / dug nad de rnams kyis kyang srung ba dang skyob par byed pa'o/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug nad thams cad las sba ba'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug de rnams las bskyab pa'o/ /yongs su gzung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ nad de'i 'jigs pa las
<p>229a</p>
<p>229a.1</p>gzung ba'o/ /yongs su bskyang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ de'i 'jigs pa las thar ba'o/ /zhi ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug nad de dag thams cad zhi ba'o/ /bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug nad bcom nas bde ba'o/ /chad pa spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>229a.2</p>dug can rnams kyi chad pa spang ba'o/ /mtshon cha spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ de'i mthong ba'i dug gi mtshon cha spangs ba'o/ /dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug 'ong ba rnams spang ba'o/ /dug gsod pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ yod pa yang med par byed pa'o/ /lo brgya 'tsho bar
<p>229a.3</p>gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ nad des mi tshugs shing tshe ring pa'o/ /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig ces bya ba ni/ phun sum tshogs shing / nad rnams dang bral ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las/ dug gi ming bstan pa'i gnas skabs te nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //
<p>229a.4</p>kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /khyod kyis shing ljon pa chen po rnams kyi ming zung shig ces bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi shing ljon pa chen po 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi shing rnams blta
<p>229a.5</p>ba'o/ /shing ljon pa chen po gser zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po ser skya zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po khyab gnas zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po spre'u gnas zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon po chen po ser po zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po mya
<p>229a.6</p>ngan 'tshang zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po rna ldan byed ces bya ba ni shing ljon pa de yang rim pa bzhin du/ shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang / nub dang nub byang dang / byang dang byang shar dang / de bzhin du zhing skyong la yang rim pa bzhin du shar nas bskor te/ glang po che'i

<p>229b</p>
<p>229b.1</p>gri dang / sbrul zhags dang / ba dan dang / bum pa dang / rtse gsum mo/ g.yon rnams ni sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa'o/ /de rnams kyi kha dog kyang / dkar po dang / dmar po dang / nag po dang / dmar nag dang / dkar po dang / dud ka dang / ser po dang / mthing
<p>229b.2</p>ga'o/ /de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar srung ba dang skyob par byed do/ /shing ljon pa chen po rgyas byed ces bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po bil ba zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po tsu ta zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po 'dzam bu zhes bya ba dang / shing

<p>229b.7</p>pa la yang / lha'i gdon la sogs pa 'byung po stong phrag brgyad cu rnams gnas pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ sems can rnams la
<p>230a</p>
<p>230a.1</p>thugs rje che ba ni/ de dag dang ldan pa'i rig sngags la gang zag gang gis gus par byas nas ni/ zhing skyong de rnams kyis kyang srung ba dang skyob par byed pa'o/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las shing

<p>230a.3</p>rgya/ chos rtags kyi phyag rgya gsum la grags pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun gyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba ste zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa dang da ltar yod pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas rabs bdun rnams lta
<p>230a.4</p>ba'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba ni bskal ba dang po'i dus su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis kyang su yi rang zhing sems can gyi don la gsungs shing / phyag rgya'i rgyas btab
<p>230a.5</p>pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can gyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba ni bskal pa gnyis pa'i dus su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can gyis kyang / sems can gyi don la rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi phyag
<p>230a.6</p>rgya'i rgyas btab pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba ni bskal pa gsum pa'i dus su/ sems can gyi don la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob kyis kyang / rig sngags kyi phyag rgya'i rgyas
<p>230a.7</p>btab pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ bskal pa bzhi pa'i dus su yang / sems can gyi don la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis kyang / rig sngags kyi phyag rgya'i rgyas
<p>230b</p>
<p>230b.1</p>btab pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub kyis kyang gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ bskal pa lnga pa'i dus su yang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub kyis kyang / sems can gyi don la rig sngags kyi phyag rgya'i rgyas btab pa'o/ /
<p>230b.2</p>yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ bskal pa drug pa'i dus su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis kyang / sems can gyi don la rjes su yi rang zhing rig sngags kyi phyag rgya'i rgyas btab pa'o/ /
<p>230b.3</p>sangs rgyas drug po de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mngon pa dang 'dug pa la sogs pa'i chos bstan zhing / sems can rnams 'dul ba'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ngas kyang da ltar bshad cing rjes su yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ dus tha ma 'di la sems can gyi
<p>230b.4</p>mtshan lnga'i dus su/ de bzhin du tshe lo brgya nyi shu tham pa la/ yul mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na rdo rje'i gdan la/ dge slong sa ri mche ba'i dug gis zin pa'i don dang / sems can la dmigs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya
<p>230b.5</p>chen mo 'di/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya seng ges rjes su yi rang ba rig sngags kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa/ rig sngags 'di ni thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa/ kun gzhi rnam par shes par dag pa/ chos rtags kyi phyag rgya bzhi'i sgo nas bstan pa'o/ /kun dga'
<p>230b.6</p>bo zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa dpe byad bzang brgyad cus sku la brgyan pa/ sems can gyi don la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi don la khyab pa'o/ /seng ge pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ dge slong sa ri'i don la bka' stsal pa'o/ /rig sngags
<p>230b.7</p>kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pas kyang bshad cing rjes su yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas yang bskal pa 'di'i phyi ma yang dus bzang po la/ tshe lo stong sems can rnams kyis thub pa/ gser gyi sa gzhi'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu la spyod pa

<p>231a.3</p>rjes su yi rang zhing de'i yon tan smra ba'o/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i khams la dbang mdzad pa/ lha rnams kyi dbang po sum cu rtsa gsum gyi rgyal po lha ma yin rnams 'dul ba/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang spyi gtsug tu
<p>231a.4</p>bzhag nas/ rjes su yi rang ste/ rig sngags kyi yon tan smras pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ phyogs bzhi'i mi'i mgon mdzad pa'i/ chos kyi rgyal khrims mdzad pa/ bzhi po de dag gis kyang spyi bo'i gtsug tu bzhag nas/ gus
<p>231a.5</p>par rjes su yi rang zhing smra ba'o/ /dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor skyong gis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab kyi shar phyogs na mnga' mdzad cing / dri za rnams kyi rgyal po ste/ des kyang rig sngags la rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /grul bum gyi rgyal po 'phags skyes pos kyang

<p>231a.7</p>klu rnams kyi dbang po klu'i rgyal po des kyang rig sngags la gus par byed pa'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab kyi byang ngos na mnga' mdzad pa/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi rgyal po/ des kyang gus par
<p>231b</p>
<p>231b.1</p>byas pa'o/ /dri za'i ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang zhes bya ba ni/ dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung la yang ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod de/ de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags la rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /grul bum gyi ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po 'phags
<p>231b.2</p>skyes po la yang / sde dpon de dag dang ldan te/ de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags la rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /klu'i sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang la yang sde dpon de dag dang ldan te/ de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags la rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde

<p>231b.4</p>ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ldas rtsen dang / gnod sbyin ma 'phrog ma dang gnyis kyi bu 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya ste/ de rnams kyang gzi brjid dang stobs dang ldan te/ kha dog dang grags pa dang ldan pa de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo la gus par byas shing rjes su yi rang
<p>231b.5</p>ba'o/ /de rnams kyi kha dog ni/ ser po dang / g.yas na dbyug to dang / me long bsnams pa/ g.yon na zhags pa dang / ut+pa la bsnams pa'o/ /de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags la gus par byas shing / de sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
<p>231b.6</p>rgyas kyis yang nas yang du rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i gdon la sogs pa bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cus kyang spyi bo'i gtsug tu bzhag nas rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o/ /lha'i gdon dang / 
<p>231b.7</p>klu'i gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / nam mkha'i lding gi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyis kyang rgol bar mi 'gyur zhing / rig sngags la rjes su yi rang zhing bka' las mi 'da' ba'o/ /de rnams kyi kha dog ni ser po dang / dkar po dang / dmar po dang / sngon
<p>232a</p>
<p>232a.1</p>po dang / ser po'o/ /phyag rnams na rdo rje dang / sbrul zhags dang ral gri dang ba dan dang / sbrul bsnams pa'o/ /klu'i gdon ni ro smad sbrul du 'dug pa/ lha ma yin gyi gdon ni khro bor gnas pa/ nam mkha' lding gi gdon ni bya'i gzugs so/ /gzhan ma yang lha'i cha byad du yod
<p>232a.2</p>pa'o/ /dri za'i gdon dang / mi'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / yi dgas kyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags la rjes su yi rang ste/ de rnams kyi kha dog ni dkar po dang / ser po dang / sngo skya dang /
