<p>232a.4</p>pa'i cha byad do/ /gnod sbyin dang srin po ni khro bor gnas so/ /dri za'i gdon ni lha'i cha byad do/ /sha za'i gdon dang 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo la rjes su yi rang zhing / 
<p>232a.5</p>bka' las mi 'da' ba'o/ /de rnams kyi kha dog ni/ dmar nag gi mdog dang / sngo skya dang / mthing ga dang / dmar po dang / ser po'o/ /phyag rnams na/ sbrul zhags dang / thod pa dang / dbyug to dang / zhags pa dang / phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ /de rnams kyi gdong ni phyi ba dang / byi ba dang / pha wang
<p>232a.6</p>dang / phag dang / yang phag pa dang ngo / /skem byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ gdon de rnams la sogs pa/ gdon rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o/ /de rnams kyi kha
<p>232a.7</p>dog ni/ dmar po dang / ser po dang / mthing ga dang / ljang gu dang / thal ba'o/ /de rnams kyi phyag na rgyu zhags dang / snying dang / thod pa dang / gri gug dang / dbyug to dang do/ /de rnams kyi gdong pa ni/ khyi dang spyang ki dang / pho rog dang / ra'i gdong can no/ /gdon thams cad kyis 'gal bar
<p>232b</p>
<p>232b.1</p>bya ba ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ gdon rigs stong phrag brgyad cu po de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las 'gal bar mi nus pa'o/ /gzi brjid 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su mngal za ba rnams dang / zas su srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang / 
<p>232b.2</p>zas su sha za ba rnams dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su zhag za ba rnams dang / zas su tshil za ba rnams dang / zas su rkang za ba rnams dang / zas su btsas pa za ba rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ de yang zas kyi rigs mi mthun pa za ba mi srun pa rnams yin te/ de rnams
<p>232b.3</p>kyis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo la 'tshe bar mi nus pa'o/ /de rnams kyi gzugs ni dred mo'i gzugs dang / khyi'i gzugs dang / seng ge'i gzugs dang / stag gi gzugs dang / spyang ki'i gzugs dang / sre mo'i gzugs dang / byi ba'i gzugs dang / byi la'i gzugs dang / 
<p>232b.4</p>'phyi ba'i gzugs dang / ra'i gzugs dang / lug gi gzugs dang ngo / /zas su dri za ba rnams dang / zas su me tog za ba rnams dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang / zas su bsreg bya za ba rnams dang / zas su rnag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su phyi sa za ba
<p>232b.5</p>rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su mchil ma za ba rnams dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su lhag ma za ba rnams dang / zas su skyug pa za ba rnams dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su gtor khungs nas
<p>232b.6</p>'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ gdon de rnams kyang sna tshogs kyi gzugs kyis snang zhing / mi srun pa rnams yin te/ de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las 'da' bar mi nus pa'o/ /de rnams kyi gzugs kyang ma he dang / glang po che dang glang dang rnga mo dang / sha ba dang / bong bu dang / bya
<p>232b.7</p>rog dang / 'ug pa dang / rma bya dang / khrung khrung dang / de po dang / kya ka dang / bya rgod dang / bya kang ka'i gzugs so/ /de rnams ni shin tu mi srun pa mgo brnyan gyi gzugs su yod pa dang / 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni/ zas su za ba de rnams kyis kyang / rig sngags kyis gnod par
<p>233a</p>
<p>233a.1</p>mi nus shing / rig sngags la gus par byas pa'o/ /gshed byed la sogs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ las bcu bzhi yod de/ nyes pa de rnams kyis rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis nyes pa mi nus pa'o/ /rims nyin gcig pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ rims kyi nad mi
<p>233a.2</p>gcig pa bco lnga yod de/ rig sngags kyi nus pas/ rims de rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs pa'o/ /rlung las gyur pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ /rlung la nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'o/ /mkhris pa la nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'o/ /bad kan las gyur ba nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi ste/ de gsum 'dus
<p>233a.3</p>pas na 'dus pa'i nad do/ /de gnyis gnyis dang ldan pas na ldan pa'o/ /de lta bu'i nad 'jigs pa can gyis kyang / rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis 'ong bar mi nus so/ /rims nad thams cad kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ rims kyi nad de rnams kyis kyang / rig
<p>233a.4</p>sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing / nad de rnams kyis mi tshugs pa'o/ /glad pa na ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan gsum gyis yan lag dang nying lag thams cad na ba ste/ nad de yang bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi yod de/ nad de rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs shing bde bar
<p>233a.5</p>gnas pa'o/ /shu ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sa bdag gi nad rigs mi gcig pa bco brgyad yin te/ shu ba la sogs pa'i nad kyis mi tshugs pa'o/ /nad thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ nad rigs mi gcig pa bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis mi tshugs pa'o/ /dug nad
<p>233a.6</p>thams cad dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ phyi'i dug dang nang gi dug drug go/ /dug de rnams kyis mi tshugs so/ /sdang ba thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ las kyi rnam par smin pas/ sems can rnams kyi sdang bas te/ de'i 'jigs pa las thar pa'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad
<p>233a.7</p>dang zhes bya ba ni/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa brgyad do/ /yams kyi nad thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ yams nad de ni 'go ba'i nad yin te/ nad des kyang mi tshugs pa'o/ /'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan yang dgra bo rnams dang / nye ba la sogs pa
<p>233b</p>
<p>233b.1</p>'thab pa rnams kyi 'jigs pas kyang mi tshugs pa'o/ /gnod pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po dang / rgyal po la sogs pa'i gnod pas mi tshugs pa'o/ /nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad kyi 'gal bar bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/ /nad de rkyen de
<p>233b.2</p>rnams kyis mi tshugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las/ phan yon bstan pa'i gnas skabs te nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /gang zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis
<p>233b.3</p>bdag bsrung ba byas sam zhes bya ba ni/ 'di la gus par byas nas 'chang ba dang / bsgom pa dang / rgya cher spel ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / sngags kyi tshig gcig gnyis brjod pa dang / dkyil 'khor rgya cher bri ba dang / bsrung ba bris nas btags na/ 'jigs pa thams
<p>233b.4</p>cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di las 'gal bar byas na/ lag na rdo rjes de'i mgo bo tshal ba bdun du 'gems par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos thams cad kyi gzi brjid
<p>233b.5</p>kyis/ de'i snang ba ma rungs par 'gyur ro/ /sems ma rungs par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i gang zag rnams bslus par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang / gshur zhes bya ba la thug pa'i bar gyi gsang sngags kyis de la sdug bsngal chen po byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams
<p>233b.6</p>kyi dbang po brgya byin yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor te/ rdo rjes de'i mgo 'gems par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa'i gzi brjid kyis kyang de'i 'byor ba thal bar rlog par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor dang srung ba'i bye brag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'og tu blta ba'o/ /dang po
<p>233b.7</p>sa ni brtag par bya/ /gnyis pa sa blang cho ga bshad/ /gsum pa sa ni yongs bzung ba/ /bzhi ba sa ni sbyong bar bya/ /lnga pa sa ni byin rlabs bya/ /drug pa sa ni gdul bar bya/ /de dag ni sa'i cho ga'i bye brag go/ /de yang rigs kyi snying po dang / sa'i sngags kyis byin rlabs
<p>234a</p>
<p>234a.1</p>bya'o/ /sa gzhi bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la/ /dri dang rnam lnga bsres pa'i chus/ /dkyil 'khor la ni byug par bya/ /sta gon la sogs cho ga ni/ /sngon du 'gro ba gang yin pa/ /rdo rje slob dpon bka' drin gyis/ /sngon 'gro cho ga yang dag shes/ /bcu gsum mam ni
<p>234a.2</p>yang na dgu/ /lnga dang gcig las gang yin pa/ /bum pa'i mtshan nyid brtag par bya/ /gser ram dngul lam zangs las byas/ /rdza la sogs pa gang yod la/ /gsus pa che la mgrin pa ring / /mchu 'phyang nag po ra ri med/ /de bzhin mtshan dang ldan pa la/ /rig pa mtshan ma bri bar bya/ /
<p>234a.3</p>rma bya'i sgro dang rigs lnga'i mtshan/ /de rnams la ni yang dag bri/ /gu gul a ga ru la sogs/ /dud pas yang ni bdug par bya/ /dri chu dang ni chu rnams kyis/ /bum pa la ni yang dag dgang / /mar ram zho 'am sbrang rtsi'am/ /bu ram ka ra 'o ma dang / /de rnams kyis ni dgang bar bya/ /
<p>234a.4</p>mu tig mu men byi ru dang / /gser dang dngul ni gzhug par bya/ /'bras sam til lam ma sha 'am/ /gro 'am nas sam yang dag blugs/ /mtshan ma legs pa'i bum pa la/ /dar ram ras sam ma nyams pas/ /bum pa'i mgul ni yang dag bcings/ /tsan+dan dang ni gur kum
<p>234a.5</p>dang / /gla rtsi chu dang ga bur dang / /tu ru ska ni dri dang ldan/ /des ni bum pa dgang bar bya/ /bal po shing dang u dum+WAr/ /brta dpal shing kha da'i shing / /byang chub shing ni sna lngas ni/ /de yi lo mas mdzes par brgyan/ /dar dang rgyal mtshan gdugs dang ni/ /rin chen phreng dang me
<p>234a.6</p>tog phreng / /bkra shis brgyad dang me long dang / /bum pa la ni yang dag brgyan/ /rdo rje slob dpon yang dag gis/ /dam tshig sems dang ye shes sems/ /bum pa la ni yang dag gzhug /rdo rje slob dpon mtshan nyid ni/ /shes rab dang ni snying rje ldan/ /bri ba'i las la mkhas
<p>234a.7</p>pa dang / /mi khengs gshis ni bzang ba dang / /dam tshig la sogs bsrung ba dang / /gus par sangs rgyas dkon mchog gsum/ /sems can mnyam pa nyid bsgom pa/ /slob ma dag ni skyong byed pa/ /slob dpon la ni de dang ldan/ /slob dpon dge slong lta bu la/ /tshul khrims
<p>234b</p>
<p>234b.1</p>yang dag srung byed pa/ /de bzhin bzod pa brtson 'grus ldan/ /lus ni legs par khrus byas nas/ /tsan+dan la sogs chu la bkru/ /de bzhin lus dang ngag dang ni/ /yid kyis rdo rje yang dag bkru/ /de bzhin rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /dang po'i las la yang dag 'jug /bum pa lhag pa'i cho ga
<p>234b.2</p>dang / /rdo rje slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid brtag pa'o/ /ras sam dar ram skud pa ni/ /rgyal po bu mo rje'u rigs ni/ /de bzhin bram ze'i bu mo la/ /de la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang / /lo grangs brgyad ni lon pa la/ /thig skud yang dag bsgril bar bya/ /oM badzra sU tra hUM phaT ces bya bar byin
<p>234b.3</p>gyis brlab par bya'o/ /slob dpon shar blta slob ma nub/ /de bzhin slob dpon byang du ste/ slob ma lho phyogs blta ba ste/ /rim bzhin shar lho nub byang dang / /byang shar mtshams dang lho nub dang / /nam mkha'i thig ni gdab par bya/ /oM badzra re khe hUM phaT swA hA/ dkyil 'khor sa gzhi bzang
<p>234b.4</p>po la/ /thig ni yang dag gdab par bya/ /thig ni cha chen bcu drug gdab/ /de yi log po sum cu gnyis/ /dbus kyi cha chen dang po la/ /pad+ma'i lte bar shes par bya/ /gnyis pa'i cha ni pad+mar grags/ /phyi rim cha ni bzhi cha la/ /mu khyud rdo rje ra bar shes/ /lhag ma'i cha ni sum cha dang / /de phyir phyed dang
<p>234b.5</p>ldan pa la/ /'khor lo'i cha ni yang dag yin/ /de phyir phyed na cha yod pa/ /nang gi lha rnams shes par bya/ /cha chen lnga po snang ba ni/ /nang gi lha rnams yang dag yin/ /de phyir cha gnyis yod pa la/ /nang gi sgo ni yang dag shes/ /phyi rim cha ni dgu snang ba/ /bar gyi lha rnams yin pa ste/ /bcu dang bcu gcig snang ba ni/ /bar ma'i sgor ni
<p>234b.6</p>yang dag shes/ /bcu gnyis snang ba'i cha chen la/ /phyi yi lha rnams yin pa la/ /de phyir cha chen phyed dang gsum/ /phyi yi sgor ni yang dag grags/ /de phyir phyed dang gnyis yod pa/ /rta babs su ni shes par bya/ /de phyir pad+ma rdo rje dang / /me ri mkhas pas phyi nas btsal/ /zhes gsungs so/ /
<p>234b.7</p>cha chen gcig sgor shes pa la/ /de yi logs ni sum cha dag /de yi logs ni cha chung gcig /de yi phyi rim cha chen la/ /sum cha gcig ni nang gi cha/ /sum cha gnyis ni ka bar shes/ /rin chen pany+dza ra ga dang / /da ru ska dang gsum po ni/ /cha chung gsum ni mnyam par bya/ /'dod pa'i
<p>235a</p>
<p>235a.1</p>lha rnams dra ba dang / /de gnyis cha ni mnyam pa'o/ /cha ni sum cha gnyis gnyis te/ /nang dang phyi dang sgo ru yang / /mkhas pas de bzhin shes par bya/ /thig gi cho ga gsungs pa'o/ /rin chen dngul dang be+erlur+ya/ /gser dang pad+ma rA ga dang / /de bzhin in+d+ra nI la dang / /de bzhin
<p>235a.2</p>rigs lnga'i ngo bo 'di/ /de ni rin chen phye mar grags/ /rig sngags snying po rigs lnga'am/ /de yi sngags kyis byin rlabs bya/ /oM trAM hriHkhaM hUM/ oM ma hA mA yU rI ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ des mtshon cha rnams byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /dbus su pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /zla ba'i gdan ni shes
<p>235a.3</p>par bya/ /de steng rin chen de bzhin rigs/ /rig sngags rma bya der gnas pa/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang ni/ /byang gi phyogs dang rim bzhin du/ /dmar po ser po dkar po dang / /ser po de ni byang na gnas/ /pad+ma bzhi po de bzhin shes/ /shar lho dang ni nub byang dang / /mthing ga'i
<p>235a.4</p>mdog tu shes par bya/ /lho nub byang shar mtshams su ni/ /ljang gu in+d+ra nI la'i mdog /rin chen rdo rje'i rigs dang ni/ /de bzhin rin chen rin chen rigs/ /rin chen pad+ma rigs dang ni/ /de bzhin rin chen las kyi rigs/ /shar phyogs rim pa de bzhin du/ /lha mo bzhi po
<p>235a.5</p>dgod par bya/ /me tog spos dang dri dang ni/ /mar me dang ni bzhi po dang / /shar lho mtshams na dgod par bya/ /phyi rim mu khyud ra ba la/ /rdo rje ra bar shes par bya/ /de phyir 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la/ /bzhi po rtsibs ni phyogs dang mthun/ /zur gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi ni/ 
<p>235a.6</p>phyogs bzhir phyed phyed snang ba'o/ /de phyir mu khyud zlum po la/ /rdo rje ra bas bskor bar bya/ /nyi ma zla ba gza' chen dgu/ /shar la sogs pa'i go rims bzhin/ /'khor lo'i rtsibs la dgod par bya/ /de phyir lha rnams gru bzhi ni/ /kha dog dmar pos rnam par brgyan/ /lha rnams zur
<p>235a.7</p>bzhir gnas pa ni/ /pi wang gling bu gar mkhan ma/ /de bzhin glu ma shes par bya/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi phyogs/ /lha rnams sgo dang de bzhin du/ /gser dang dngul dang pad+ma rA ga dang / /de bzhin in+d+ra nI lar shes par bya/ /lha rnams sgo dang bzhi po la/ /rgyu skar rim bzhin shes
<p>235b</p>
<p>235b.1</p>par bya/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /twa ra na bzhis rnam par brgyan/ /pany+tsa rA ga lnga po la/ /dkar dang nag dang ser dang ni/ /dmar dang ljang gu lnga snang ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bo/ /'od ni snang ba lngar shes so/ /'dod pa'i rin chen pha gu dang / /'dod chags dang ni ser sna dang / /
<p>235b.2</p>phrag dog da ru khar ni rnam par grags/ /twa ra na bzhis snang ba ni/ /mdzes mtshon du ni shes par bya/ /phyi dang nang dang bar sgo dang / /nang sgo ji bzhin mkhas pas shes/ /mu tig dra ba dra phyed dang / /rtsig pa'i logs la brgyan par bya/ /chos kyi 'khor lo ri dgas dang / /rta babs steng du gnas
<p>235b.3</p>pa'o/ /gdugs dang ba dan rgyal mtshan dang / /gzhal yas khang gi steng na gnas/ /mdzes shing blta na sdug pa ste/ /gzhal yas khang du rnam par grags/ /dkyil 'khor lha dgod cing tshon dgye ba'i rim pa'o// //bar sgo la ni gnas pa'i lha/ /phyogs skyong bcu ru shes par bya/ /sgo
<p>235b.4</p>ba bzhi la gnas pa ni/ /rgyal po bzhir ni rab tu grags/ /phyi rol lha rnams sgo dang ni/ /sngar bshad klu rgyal rigs brgyad gnas/ /rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor lha bkod rim bzhin shes/ /bkra shis mtshan dang bkra shis rdzas/ /bkra shis rtags dang gsum pa des/ /phyi nang
<p>235b.5</p>bar sgo rim pa gsum/ /de yi 'gram la dgod par bya/ /bsrung ba yan lag brgyad dang ni/ /gtor ma'i rim pa gzhan las shes/ /dam tshig sems dang ye shes sems/ /rim bzhin dkyil 'khor lta la thim/ /ar+g+ha la sogs pU dza rnams/ /rim bzhin mkhas pas dbul bar bya/ /mdo dang
<p>235b.6</p>bzlas pa sgom pa gsum/ /thun mtshams gtor ma gtang bar bya/ /mdo ni rgyun mi 'chad 'don/ /de bzhin cho ga byas nas su/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur/ /rims dang nad rnams byung ba dang / /mje dang phol mig de bzhin te/ /gzhan yang nad rnams thams cad kun/ /
<p>235b.7</p>bsgyur ba'i tshul la sogs pa kun/ /las dang shes bya bag chags kun/ /'byung po la sogs na ba dang / /gang dag sdig pa byed pa dang / /sdig pa thams cad 'dis 'joms so/ /gal te de las 'gal 'gyur na/ /sngar bshad rdo rje snying po sogs/ /de rnams kyis ni chad pa gcod/ /rid
<p>236a</p>
<p>236a.1</p>sngags 'di ni yang dag grags/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms byed pa/ /'di yi yon tan yin par grags/ /dkyil 'khor gyi bya thabs rim pa'o// //skud pa btags na zhes bya ba ni/ bsang ba'i rim pa yin te/ de yang ras sam dar ram de la
<p>236a.2</p>sogs pa gang yang rung / mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad bor la lus rdo rjes bsrung bar bya'o/ /yang na ras sam dar ram shing shun la sogs pa la gur kum dang gi wang gis ras sam shing shun la bri ba'o/ /'khor lo rim pa bcu gnyis bris la/ cha gnyis la pad+ma'i ra ba dang / 'khor lo
<p>236a.3</p>bri'o/ /de'i phyi rim cha gnyis la/ rin chen rdo rje dang phyag mtshan gyis dgod par bya'o/ /rig sngags kyi snying po lnga la/ 'khor lo rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya'o/ /'khor lo de bzhin du bris nas lus la gdags so/ /de bzhin du btags par gyur na/ nad dang sdug
<p>236a.4</p>bsngal thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las/ dkyil 'khor dang srung ba byed pa'i gnas skabs te nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de bsad pa'i rigs pa ni chad pas bral bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di
<p>236a.5</p>yi byin rlabs kyis/ /gsad par 'dod pa'i sems can yang / snying rje dang ldan par 'gyur te/ chad pa de las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /chad pas gcad pa'i rigs pas ni gzhu btsog pas so zhes bya ba ni/ chad pas gcad par 'dod pa'i sems ni/ sems de dang mi
<p>236a.6</p>ldan te/ chad pa las bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhu btsog pa'i rigs pa ni brgyad bkag pas so zhes bya ba ni/ sems can kha cig gnod pa skyel bar 'dod de/ gzhan gyis bkag nas gnod pa skyel bar mi nus so/ /brgyad bkag pa'i rigs pa ni dam bcas pa'i rigs pas so zhes
<p>236a.7</p>bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di'i nus pas/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal dang bral te/ gnod par byed pa rnams bkag ste/ dam bca' ba'i rigs pas ni spu zing zhes byed pas so zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi nus pa des kyang dam bshig nas so sor gnas so/ /spu zing zhes bya ba'i rigs pa
<p>236b</p>
<p>236b.1</p>ni/ de bzhin du thar bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ so sor gnas pa de ni/ dngos por mi gnas shing zhig par 'gyur ro/ /de la rgyal po'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po'i chad pa nor dang srog las thar ro/ /chos rkun gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhes bya ba ni chom rkun pa
<p>236b.2</p>rnams kyis kyang rku ba'i sems gtang ba de yang / sems la mi 'jog cing 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i me'i 'jigs pa de yang rig sngags 'di 'chad par 'gyur na/ 'jigs pa de dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /
<p>236b.3</p>chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ glo bur gyi nad chus 'jigs par yang mi 'gyur te/ gru dang ra ba las myur du rgal ba'o/ /de'i lus la dug gis mi tshugs te zhes bya ba ni/ dug gsum gyis mi tshugs shing rdo rje'i phung po lta bu'o/ /mtshon gyis ma yin no zhes
<p>236b.4</p>bya ba ni/ 'khrug pa'i dbus su bsdad na yang mtshon rnams kyis mi tshugs te/ de bzhin du glo bur gyi mtshon gyis kyang mi tshugs so/ /bde bar gnyid kyis log cing bde bar sad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / chags che ba dang / mtshan ma ngan pa rnams
<p>236b.5</p>log pa ste/ nyal ba na yang bde ba la sad pa na yang bde ba'o/ /bde ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ tshe da ltar dang tshe phyi ma yang de bzhin te nam skyes pa'i dus su yang / 'jigs pa de dang bral zhing bde bar gnas pa'o/ /phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang
<p>236b.6</p>zhes bya ba ni/ sngags dang / spod gtong gtang ba dang / sngags dang gshin rje'i sngags kyi nus pa dang / mngon spyod kyi las la sogs pa btang ba rnams 'joms pa'o/ /dgra choms par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ dgra bo sdang ba rnams 'joms te/ de'i 'jigs pas mi tshugs shing / dgra
<p>236b.7</p>rnams bde bar 'gyur ro/ /rmas pa med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ de'i yon tan gyi nus pas/ rig pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas shing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen nam/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'am/ sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' thob cing / sems can rnams kyi don
<p>237a</p>
<p>237a.1</p>byed pa'o/ /yang na 'di'i zil gyis thams cad gnon pa'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa dang / da ltar gyi rkyen gyi 'jigs pa dang / de la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad las thar ba'o/ /bde bar
<p>237a.2</p>yun du yang 'tsho bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni/ nad med pa tshe ring ba bza' ba dang btung ba nus shing / mya ngan gyi sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin
<p>237a.3</p>pa ni ma gtogs so zhes bya ba ni/ zag pa bzhag pa ste/ da ltar byas pa da ltar ma sbyangs na sang phod smen ldang ba'o/ /dper na gang bzhin zhe na/ dgra thu bo'i bu las pa bzhin du'o/ /de yang las rnam par smin pa'i mdo las kyang gsungs pa zag pa gzhag pa ni/ yang
<p>237a.4</p>dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang mi nus shing rang gi las kyi rnam pa las byung ba'o/ /las rnam par 'joms pa'i mdo las shes par bya'o/ /ngas kyang smras pa/ skyes ma thag tu ltogs par snang / /skyes nas lo bcu lon pa na/ /gzhan gyis bzung zhing sdug bsngal
<p>237a.5</p>thob/ /de grol rgya mtsho'i nang nas shing / /'di ni yang na sdug bsngal thob/ /de bzhin las kyi smin pa ni/ /mi 'gyur mi srid brtan pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni/ ha cang char
<p>237a.6</p>che ba 'am/ char dkon pa'i tshe bklag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ 'di ni snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor la sogs pa byas nas/ ri'i rtse mo'am chu mig gi 'gram mam/ mtsho'i 'gram la sogs par klags par gyur na/ char chung na char 'bebs shing char ches na char gcod par 'gyur ro/ /
<p>237a.7</p>des na klu thams cad spro bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di klags pa tsam gyis/ de na gnas pa'i klu rnams dga' ba/ klu de rnams kyang sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /char che na ni gcod par byed/ char dkon na ni 'bebs so zhes bya ba ni/ de na gnas
<p>237b</p>
<p>237b.1</p>pa'i klu rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur ba'i phyir na/ dus dus su char 'bebs shing dus dus su lo tog smin pa/ sa'i dkyil 'khor der mu ges mi tshugs so/ /de bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsam pa ji srid bar char 'bebs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di'i gzi
<p>237b.2</p>brjid kyis/ char che ba yang mi 'byung la/ ha cang char chung bar yang mi 'gyur te/ de bas na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di la gus par byas par gyur na/ dngos grub gang yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o/ /rig
<p>237b.3</p>sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di dran pas kyang 'jigs pa dang dgra thams cad zhi bar 'gyur na/ sus dum bur ma gyur cing rdzogs par bcangs pa'am/ bde legs su 'gyur bar byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba ni/ chos 'di la tshar brgya rtsa brgyad dam/ tshar lnga drug gam
<p>237b.4</p>gcig gam/ rgyun mi 'chad par 'dod na/ de dang de'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ste/ de bzhin du bsgom pa dang bzlas pa byas par gyur na yang tshe 'di la yang bde bar 'gyur te/ tshe phyi ma la yang bde'o/ /de bas na chos 'di la mi 'chad pa 'am 'phro gcad par mi bya ste/ yi ge gcig kyang ma nor bar bri
<p>237b.5</p>ba dang bklag par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo khyod kyis zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o/ /khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di zung shig ces bya ba ni/ lus ngag yid kyis gus par gzung zhing gzhan rnams la rgya cher spel ba'o/ /kun
<p>237b.6</p>dga' bos bzung ba'i rig sngags ni/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog ljang gu las kyi rigs la gtogs pa spyan gsum pa/ rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can dbu la rdo rjes mtshan pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri /g.yon na rma bya'i sgro bsnams pa'o/ /yan lag thams cad sbrul
<p>237b.7</p>gyis brgyan pa/ g.yas brkyang pa/ g.yon bskum pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa/ nyi ma'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /'khor bzhi po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i rig sngags 'dis kyang srung
<p>238a</p>
<p>238a.1</p>ba dang skyob par 'gyur ro/ /ta d+ya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ rig sngags kyi las kyi snying po blta ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ ya ban+ti la sogs pa'o/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /'di dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ /zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i dbang
<p>238a.2</p>gis zhe sdang skyes so/ /zhe sdang drag po des 'jig rten gyi khams gti mug tu mthong ngo / /de ni ma rig pa'i rang bzhin te/ ma rig pa des 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las mi thar ba'o/ /'khor ba 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ni/ yang nas yang du 'khor bar lhung ste/ byol song yi dgas dmyal
<p>238a.3</p>ba'i sdug bsngal lo/ /de gsum la yang phyi'i dug gsum bcom pa'o/ /de bas na 'jig rten gyi dug gsum bcom pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan dug med pa/ /sangs rgyas bden pas dug bcom mo/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan phyi'i dug gsum ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis
<p>238a.4</p>dug bcom mo/ /rig sngags 'dis kyang nges par bcom mo/ /nang gi 'jig rten dug gsum ni gzhan gyis 'joms mi nus so/ /rang rang gi 'od gsal gyi ye shes kyis/ rang rang las byung ba'i gti mug gi rang bzhin dug gsum bcom mo/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug
<p>238a.5</p>rnams/ /de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten las grags pa'i dug ni/ /gsum yin te/ dug gsum po des sdug bsngal drag po myong bar byed pa'o/ /bcom ldan chos ni dug med pa/ /chos kyi bden pas dug bcom mo/ /zhes bya ba ni/ phyi'i dug gsum po ni/ rig
<p>238a.6</p>sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos kyang bcom te/ nang gi dug gsum ni rang rang gis gzhom pa ma yin pa/ gzhan gyis gzhom mi nus pa/ de bas na nang gi dug ces bya'o/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /'di dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ /zhes bya ba ni nang gi dug gsum ni/ 
<p>238a.7</p>bltas na mi snang ste/ spyad na 'bras bu 'byung zhing sdug bsngal gyi phung po/ 'dod chags kyis zhe sdang / zhe sdang gis gti mug /gti mug gis ser sna/ ser snas phrag dog go/ /de'i 'bras bu ngan song gsum du yang nas yang du 'gro ba'o/ /de bas na nang gi dug gsum spang bar bya'o/ /bcom
<p>238b</p>
<p>238b.1</p>ldan dge 'dun dug med pa/ /dge 'dun bden pas dug bcom mo/ /zhes bya ba ni/ phyi'i dug ni 'gro ba dang / mi 'gro ba/ sbyor ba dang gsum yin te/ 'gro ba ni bsam pa mthong ba reg pa kha rlangs so/ /mi 'gro ba ni btsan dug bong dug ra dug la sogs pa'o/ /byed pa'i dug ni sbrang rtsi dang mar
<p>238b.2</p>las byung ba bzhin du sbyor ba las byung ba'o/ /dug de gsum po ni/ 'jig rten na phyi'i dug gsum ste/ de'i dug ni dge 'dun gyi gzi brjid kyis bcom pa'o/ /nang gi dug gsum ni/ gzhan gyis 'joms mi nus shing / rang rang gi ye shes kyis 'joms pa'o/ /nang gi ye shes ni yang dag par
<p>238b.3</p>rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo/ bla ma'i gdams ngag gis bcom pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs gang dang / /dgra bcom rnams kyi grags pa dang / /zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzi brjid dang stobs kyis dug bcom
<p>238b.4</p>mo/ /de bzhin du shA ri'i bu la sogs pa'i stobs dang gzi brjid kyis dug bcom pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi gzi brjid kyis/ /zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar yod pa ste/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'bum phrag gi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
<p>238b.5</p>kyi gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo/ /ngas ni bde legs 'gyur bar bya/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya seng ges dge slong sa ri'i don la stong gsum gyi stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams kyi don la bde bar byas pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>238b.6</p>yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos dug bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ sdod pa'i dug dang / 'gro ba'i dug dang / byed pa'i dug gsum bcom zhing de bzhin du nang gi dug gsum bcom pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen
<p>238b.7</p>mo las/ nang gi dug gsum bshad pa'i gnas skabs te nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// //dge slong sa ri dge bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i bkas/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ dge slong sa ri mche ba'i dug gis zin pa bde ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
<p>239a</p>
<p>239a.1</p>bos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te bya ba ni/ dge slong sa ri ni mche ba'i dug gis zin cing dran pa ma rnyed par yod pa/ lus kyang kha dog 'gyur zhing kha nas dbugs kyang mi thon pa/ kha nas dbu ba 'dzag pa/ lus rengs shing mig dkar log
<p>239a.2</p>gis song ba mthong nas/ snying rje skyes nas sangs rgyas la dris pa ste/ de'i thabs bsrung ba'i phyir na/ sangs rgyas la bde legs phul ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan nas zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags kyi gsang sngags/ 
<p>239a.3</p>sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa bzhin du lus ngag yid kyis bzung ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ dga' ba'i sems byas nas sangs rgyas kyi bka' la nyan nas/ dge slong sa ri'i don du rkang pa phyir bor
<p>239a.4</p>te/ dge slong sa ri la kha bltas pa'o/ /dge slong sa ri la ba der song ste/ phyin pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ yul mnyan yod rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge 'dun gyi bsro khang bgyi ba'i slad du shing gshegs pas shing rul ba'i sa kha na dge slong sa ri nad kyis thebs pa'o/ /rig
<p>239a.5</p>sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis/ dge slong sa ri la chad pa spang ba bya ste zhes bya ba ni/ thog ma dang tha ma dang da ltar med pa'i rang bzhin/ rig sngags kyi gtso mor gyur pa/ thugs rje can gyi rig sngags kyi gsang sngags la/ klu'i kha rlangs kyi dug las byung ba mche ba'i
<p>239a.6</p>dug gis chad pa spang ba'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug las skyabs te/ gzhan bar chad byung ba la yang bskyab pa'o/ /yongs su gzung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug gi bzung ba las phral te/ dug des mi tshugs pa'o/ /yongs su bskyang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug dang gzhan gyi 'jigs
<p>239a.7</p>pa rnams dang phral te bskyang ba'o/ /zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug nad de rnams las zhi ba ste/ de'i nad kun bor nas lus kyi na tsha med par bde ba'o/ /chad pa spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug gi chad pa spang ba'o/ /mtshon cha spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po rnams kyi
<p>239b</p>
<p>239b.1</p>mtshon cha spang pa'i/ /dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ mche ba'i dug gzhil ba'o/ /dug gsad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug byung ba gsad pas dug gzhan 'ong bar mi nus pa'o/ /mtshams gcad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyis gzhan gyi bar chod byung ba las bsrung ba'o/ /sa bcing ba
<p>239b.2</p>byas te zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du sa gzhi yang bsrung ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsrung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ byams pa dang snying rje'i stobs kyis dge slong sa ri la sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin du bsrung ba'o/ /bde legs su 'gyur bar byas pas zhes bya ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
<p>239b.3</p>dge slong sa ri la/ dug gi nad las bde bar byas pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dge slong sa ri nad de las sos so zhes bya ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa dge slong sa ri la dug gi nad kyi rkyen byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis kun dga' bo'i las kyis bde ba'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
<p>239b.4</p>bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa dge slong sa ri bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas zhes bya ba ni/ de gnyis ni lus ngag yid bde ba sangs rgyas kyi thabs bsam gyis mi khyab la/ ye shes dang gzi brjid kyang de bzhin te/ chos de'i nus pas sems can thams cad la bde ba'o/ /de'i phyi nas sangs
<p>239b.5</p>rgyas kyi spyan sngar phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni/ gus par byas nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ mgo bos phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /ji ltar gyur pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ phyogs gcig tu
<p>239b.6</p>'khod do zhes bya ba ni/ mche ba'i dug gis zin pa'i lo rgyus ni/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba phul nas/ kun dga' bo dang dge slong sa ri gnyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'khod pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las/ dge slong sa ri sbrul nag pos zin pa'i gnas skabs zhes bya ba
<p>239b.7</p>ste/ nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong sa ri bde ba'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi don la kun dga' bo la yang nas yang du bka' stsal ba'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor bzhi dang
<p>240a</p>
<p>240a.1</p>sems can gyi don la bka' stsal ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen po 'di'i mthu mthong ngam zhes bya ba ni/ sde snod bzhi'i rang bzhin/ kun brtags rnam par dag pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa/ na man tra'i rang bzhin sgyu ma lta bu ste/ gzi brjid dang stobs dang mthu dang ldan
<p>240a.2</p>pa ste/ nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa/ sems can rnams la gnyis su med par don byed pa'o/ /kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsungs pa de la phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi mtshan nyid de gsungs pas/ mgu ba'i sems kyis lus ngag yid kyis sangs rgyas la
<p>240a.3</p>mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba phul ba'o/ /'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das la kun dga' bos zhu ba phul ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ma 'tshal zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di'i nus pa
<p>240a.4</p>gang zhig yod ces pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi don la bka' stsal pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o/ /'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po bzhi ni skam yang srid ces bya ba ni/ rgya mtsho
<p>240a.5</p>ni thar pa med cing rgya che ba ste/ de yang me bdun gyi dus su bskams te/ de yang rtag pa med pa'o/ /sa ni nam mkha' la 'phar yang srid ces bya ba ni/ bskal pa chen po'i dus su bskal pa'i mes sa rnams bsreg pa'o/ /zla ba dang nyi ma ni sa la lhung yang srid ces bya ba ni/ da ltar
<p>240a.6</p>nyi ma dang zla ba snang bar 'gyur te/ de'i dus su yang nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis mes bsregs nas/ nyi zla gnyis mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /klung ni rgyun nas ldog kyang srid kyi zhes bya ba ni rkyen gyi rang bzhin gyis klung de yang med par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du sa dang rlung dang me dang chu la sogs pa/ 
<p>240a.7</p>'jig rten gyi khams kyi snang ba 'di yang med pa ste/ sgyu ma dang rmi lam lta bu'i rang bzhin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni gzhan du 'gyur mi srid do zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa rnams kyang de bzhin te/ da ltar shAkya seng ges bstan
<p>240b</p>
<p>240b.1</p>pa'i bden pa 'di bstan pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ bden pa'i tshig gi de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang nas yang du gsungs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo de lta bas na zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i yon tan ni/ 
<p>240b.2</p>bsam gyis mi khyab cing brjod du med pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la zhes bya ba ni/ thugs rje che zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /'khor bzhi po zhes bya ba ni/ nye ba'i 'khor dang nang gi 'khor dang phyi'i 'khor rnams so/ /nye ba'i 'khor ni byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
<p>240b.3</p>khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'o/ /nang gi 'khor ni nyan thos dgra bcom pa nyis brgya lnga bcu/ de la sogs pa dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'o/ /phyi'i 'khor ni lha dang mi la sogs pa'o/ /dge slong ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen
<p>240b.4</p>mo 'dis srung ba dang skyob par byed pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te zhes bya ba ni/ kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pas/ mgu nas legs so zhes zhu ba phul ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas zhes bya ba ni/ sdud
<p>240b.5</p>pa po kun dga' bo 'khor bzhi la bka' stsal pa'o/ /'khor bzhi po zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la sogs pa/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu'o/ /shA ri'i bu la sogs pa nyan thos nyis brgya lnga bcu'o/ /dge slong dang zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong sa ri la sogs pa/ rgyal bu
<p>240b.6</p>rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba'i dge slong tsam mo/ /dge slong ma dang zhes bya ba ni/ sgra gcan 'dzin gyi ma shAkya 'dzin la sogs pa brgya bco brgyad dang ngo / /dge bsnyen dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshong dpon mgon med la sogs pa dge bsnyen mang po'o/ /dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis rig
<p>240b.7</p>sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la gus par byas so zhes bya ba ni/ rgya cher spel lo/ /rjes su yi rang ngo / /klog par byas so/ /'chang du gzhug go/ /mchod par byas so/ /bla mar byas so/ /bsgom par byas so/ /de bzhin du de'i yon tan gyis sems can thams cad ni sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral zhing bde
<p>241a</p>
<p>241a.1</p>bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i chos kun dga' bo la gtad do zhes bya ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang zhes bya ba ni/ kun dga' bo la sogs pa nyan thos nyis brgya lnga bcu'o/ /tshe dang ldan pas ri dang zhes bya
<p>241a.2</p>ba ni de bzhin nyan thos la sogs pa'o/ /lha dang zhes bya ba ni lha'i dbang po la sogs pa gzugs khams dang 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams du ma 'dus pa'o/ /mi dang zhes bya ba ni mi'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la sogs pa'o/ /du ma gnas pa'i lha ma yin dang zhes bya ba ni lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thags bzangs ris
<p>241a.3</p>la sogs pa grangs med par gnas pa'o/ /rlung lha dang zhes bya ba ni rlung lha'i rgyal po grangs 'dzin la sogs pa grangs med pa du ma gnas pa'o/ /nam mkha' lding dang zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig can la sogs pa nam mkha' lding grangs med pa'o/ /dri za dang zhes bya ba ni dri za'i rgyal po zur
<p>241a.4</p>phud lnga pa la sogs pa grangs med pa'o/ /mi'am ci dang zhes bya ba ni mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa grangs med pa'o/ /lto 'phye chen po dang zhes bya ba ni lto 'phye'i rgyal po yon tan grags la sogs pa du mar gnas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin dang zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po ku be ra la sogs pa mang por gnas
<p>241a.5</p>pa'o/ /srin po dang zhes bya ba ni srin po'i rgyal po 'jigs pa la sogs pa mang por gnas pa'o/ /mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag 'khor der 'dus te 'khod pa de dag thams cad yi rangs te zhes bya ba ni rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das
<p>241a.6</p>kyi spyan sngar gnas te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo la gus par rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do zhes bya ba ni chos 'di bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thams cad kyi drung du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bden par bka' stsal pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las
<p>241a.7</p>rjes su yi rang ba'i gnas skabs te nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las brtag pa lnga pa rdzogs so// //rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i 'bum 'grel/ rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po a mo g+ha badzras rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //
<p>241b</p>
<p>241b.1\] ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA man+t+rA nu d+hA ra ni shU trAM ti sa ha ra Sha TI kA/ bod skad du/ gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma'i mdo'i 'bum 'grel/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag
<p>241b.2</p>ye shes snang bar ldan/ /rtag tu sems can don byed pa/ /de bzhin yon tan yang dag ldan/ /'jig rten gsum mgon phyag 'tshal nas/ /rab rib kyis ni mi shes pa'i/ /de yi gti mug sel byed pa/ /yang dag bsams la yang dag dgrol/ /bdag
<p>241b.3</p>gis 'bum 'grel bshad par bya/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni/ /'di skad ces bya ba ni sgro skur dang bral ba'o/ /bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni kun dga' bas so/ /grogs med dam zhe na/ nyan thos la sogs pa dang thabs
<p>241b.4</p>cig tu thos pa'o/ /su la thos na bcom ldan 'das la'o/ /gang thos na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i mdo 'di thos pa'o/ /sus thos na kun dga' bos thos pa'o/ /dus gcig na zhes bya ba'i sgra ni don gnyis la 'jug ste/ 
<p>241b.5</p>sdud pa po shes rab che bar go ba dang / dam pa'i chos 'byung bar dkon pa'i don to/ /ston pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ bcom pa ni bzhi bcom/ bzhi ni dgra ste dgra ni bdud bzhi'o/ /bdud bzhi ni phung po'i bdud dang / nyon
<p>241b.6</p>mongs pa'i bdud dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud dang / lha'i bu'i bdud do/ /gang gi dus na bcom zhe na/ rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i dus na'o/ /ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ skal ba dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das so/ /'das pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /'das
<p>241b.7</p>pa ni gang gi dus she na/ dpyid zla ra ba'i gnam stong gi nub mo'o/ /'dam bu'i khrod na gzigs pa'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs te zhes pa ni/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dbus su lha dang lha ma yin dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyis byas pa'i gzhal yas khang yod de/ 
<p>242a</p>
<p>242a.1</p>phyogs re re la dpag tshad lnga lnga yod pa gru bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi pa/ nang gi ka ba brgyad dang / phyi'i ka ba brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ sgo re re la seng ge gnyis gnyis kyis brgyan pa ste/ de bzhin du twa ra nas kyang brgyan pa'o/ /ka ba dang / skar khung dang / 
<p>242a.2</p>sgo logs dang / ya them dang / ma them dang / sgo 'gram la sogs pa rin po che rnams las byas pa yin te/ ka rten ni ma ra ka ta ljang gu'o/ /ka zhu ni in+d+ra nI la ste/ ka ba ni gser las byas pa ste/ 'phra ni byu ru la sogs pas byas pa'o/ /de bzhin du gdung
<p>242a.3</p>yang gser las byas pa ste/ phyam la sogs pa ni dngul las byas pa'o/ /rtsig pa ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ phyi logs dang nang logs gnyis ka ri mo mkhas pas bris pa bzhin du snang ba'o/ /sa gzhi ni rin po che pad+ma rA ga las byas pa ste/ ra ba
<p>242a.4</p>ni be+ai DUr+ya las byas pa'o/ /sgo bzhi ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ de yang gser dang / dngul dang / an+d+ri nI la dang / ma ra ka ta dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shel dang bdun no/ /seng ge brgyad kyang rgyu shel las byas shing / gnya'
<p>242a.5</p>ral la sogs pa ni an+d+ri nI la dang / byu ru las byas pa'o/ /mig dang kha ni an+d+ri nI la dang pad+ma rA gas mdzes shing / so dang mche ba ni dngul las byas pa'o/ /rgya phibs dang ldan zhing / rgya phibs kyi rten ni rin po che sna bdun las byas shing sna tshogs kyi
<p>242a.6</p>gzugs su snang ba'o/ /dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pas brgyan zhing / gdugs dang ba dan dang rgyal mtshan gyis phyogs phyogs su brgyan zhing / rin po che la sogs pa mar la 'phyang zhing / dril bu dang / dril bu g.yer ka dang / rlung gis btab pas skad sna tshogs 'byung
<p>242a.7</p>ste/ dper na rol mo mkhas pas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i rol mo byas pas skad sna tshogs 'byung ba bzhin no/ /de'i phyogs bzhi na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i lcags ri gcig gis bskor ba'i nang na skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de/ skyed mos
<p>242b</p>
<p>242b.1</p>tshal re re la yang rdzing bu re re yod pa'o/ /skyed mos tshal de'i ming yang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / kun du dga' ba dang / rnam par dga' ba dang / rnam pa bzhi yin no/ /de bzhin du rdzing bu'i ming yang yin no/ /rdzing bu'i 'og ni
<p>242b.2</p>bai DUr+ya las byas pa/ logs dang / skas ka ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'o/ /rdzing bu de'i chu yang shel chags pa bzhin du dngas la gsal ba/ 'thungs na yang ba/ lta na yid du 'ong ba/ tsan+dan dang / ga pur la sogs pa dri dang ldan pa/ rdzing bu de'i nang
<p>242b.3</p>na rang bzhin gyis chu las skyes pa'i me tog sna tshogs yod de/ de bzhin du kha dog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / puN+Da rI ka chen po dang / ut+pal dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / ku mu ta dang / ku mu ta chen po la
<p>242b.4</p>sogs pa/ dri sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / so so'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ lta na mdzes pa'o/ /rdzing bu de'i nang na bya'i tshogs sna tshogs yod de/ khrung khrung dang / bya ngang pa dkar po dang / bya ngang pa'i rgyal po dkar po dang / ngang pa ser po dang / sa ra sa la sogs
<p>242b.5</p>pa'i bya'i skad sna tshogs 'byung bas mdzes shing mnyan pa'o/ /de bzhin du skyed mos tshal gyi nang na yang thang las skyes pa'i me tog gi shing nags tshal yod de/ tsam pa ka'i me tog gi shing dang / kun+ta'i me tog gi shing dang / dzA ti'i me tog gi shing dang / kak+ko la'i me
<p>242b.6</p>tog gi shing dang / klu'i me tog gi shing dang / a ru ra'i shing dang / ba ru ra'i shing dang / skyu ru ra'i shing dang / ta la dang / ta la chen po'i shing dang / tsan+dan gyi shing la sogs pa rang bzhin gyis shing sna tshogs skyes te/ shing de'i me tog dang 'bras bus kyang sems can
<p>242b.7</p>thams cad la phan 'dogs shing bde bar gnas pa'o/ /skyed mos tshal dang / rdzing bu la yang / dge slong ngam/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ lha dang / mi rnams kyis kyang sgom zhing / tshogs sogs pa'i sa dang / de na gnas pa'i byis
<p>243a</p>
<p>243a.1</p>pa rnams kyang zhe sdang med cing chos dang mthun par gnas pa'o/ /de lta bu'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su rdo rje seng ge'i khri sa ya dang bcas pa yod de/ rdo rje sa la pad+ma sna tshogs dang bcas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i sa ya sna bdun dang bcas
<p>243a.2</p>pa/ rgyan rnam bzhi twa ra na dang ldan pa/ rdo rje rin po che sna bzhi'i bya khyung gi twa ra na dang ldan pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i mu tig dang / byi ru dang / mu men la sogs pas gser gyi rgyu las 'phra byas shing / klu'i zhags pa bya khyung twa ra nas khar bcug pa'o/ /ri dgas
<p>243a.3</p>shwa ra na ni rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa ste/ mdzes shing blta na sdug pa'o/ /de'i 'og tu shang shang na ra na yin te/ rdo rje rin po che sna bzhi las byas shing g.yas g.yon gnyis nas mdzes par brgyan pa'o/ /chu srin twa ra na ni rdo rje rin po che sna bdun las byas shing
<p>243a.4</p>mjug ma pa tra sna tshogs su 'khyil zhing blta na sdug pa'o/ /rdo rje seng ge'i pad+ma chen po'i khri ni/ mnan na nems byed pa/ bzhag na mtho ba/ reg na 'jam pa/ lta na mdzes pa'o/ /gzhal yas khang dang / seng ge'i khri de ni rang bzhin du yod cing sngon gyi smon lam
<p>243a.5</p>gyi stobs las byung ba'o/ /de bzhin du gdung g.yogs dang / bla re dang rdo rje rin po che'i mu tig gi phreng ba'i dra bas brgyan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rigs mi gcig pa brgya stong 'bum gyi 'khor dang bcas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
<p>243a.6</p>phyir mi ldog par mthu chen po thob pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rnam par sprul pa dang / cho 'phrul kun du ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i rjes
<p>243a.7</p>su 'jug pa'i chos bstan pa sna tshogs mnyam pa nyid du mnyam zhing rgya che la zab pa dang /[ (]sbobs [,]spobs[ )]pa dang / cho 'phrul dang / ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / gzungs dang / 
<p>243b</p>
<p>243b.1</p>ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / 
<p>243b.2</p>btang snyoms dang / byams pa'i stobs dang / dben pa dang / yongs su byas pa'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha stag go/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje gtum po dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / lag na rdo rje mda' gzhu
<p>243b.3</p>dang / rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rdo rje'i rgyan dang / rdo rje'i 'od dang / spyan ras gzigs dang / kun du bzang po dang / kun du gzigs pa dang / rdo rje dpal dang / pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / zhal rnam par mche ba gtsigs pa'i rdo rje dang / pad+ma snying
<p>243b.4</p>po dang / pad+ma'i spyan dang / 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang thabs cig go/ /nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ 
<p>243b.5</p>srid par kun du sbyor ba chad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phrul ba'i mthu chen po thob pa/ lta ba chags pa med pa/ thams cad kyang dri ma dang bral ba/ kun
<p>243b.6</p>nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon bsregs pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / 
<p>243b.7</p>tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang / de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po dang / dge slong dang / dge
<p>244a</p>
<p>244a.1</p>slong ma dang / dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ lha dang / mi dang / 'khor du ma 'dus pa'i nang du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor lo shin tu bskor/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni shin tu mthar phyin/ bsod nams dang ye shes
<p>244a.2</p>kyi tshogs ni shin tu rdzogs/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi byang chub chen po'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sa brnyes pa shin tu yongs su bzung / spyi gtsug ni sems can thams cad kyis blta bar mi mthong / bdud kyi las thams cad las ni nges par
<p>244a.3</p>rgyal/ de kho na thams cad mkhyen pa ni thugs su chud/ spyan lnga ni mnga'/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ni ldan/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni ldan/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad
<p>244a.4</p>ni bcom/ dgra dang las ni 'phags/ khyu mchog dang seng ge'i sgra ni sgrogs/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun du bsal/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa dpag tu med pa'i sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson
<p>244a.5</p>'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dka' ba spyad pas/ mngon par 'grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'i
<p>244a.6</p>sku mdzes shing / rin po che rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ gser gyi ri bo'i rgyal po ltar dpal ni 'bar/ sa phyogs ni nyi ma steng bas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par brgyan/ zla ba nya gang ba ltar 'jig rten thams cad la ni
<p>244a.7</p>sdug par snang / dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shin tu rgyas shing chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su
<p>244b</p>
<p>244b.1</p>rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'i gnas dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i skabs te gnas skabs dang po'o// //de nas zhes bya ba ni/ gnas phun
<p>244b.2</p>sum tshogs pa'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yud tsam cig ci yang ma smras par/ smin mtshams dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas 'od zer gyi dra ba 'phros te/ de bzhin du
<p>244b.3</p>yang nas yang du spros nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su khyab ste/ slar log nas 'od zer gyi dra ba de smin mtshams dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad du thim mo/ /de nas kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag
<p>244b.4</p>'tshal te/ bskor ba lan gsum byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'od zer dra ba 'di ni rgyu dang rkyen ci lags/ don med par 'od zer gyi dra ba mi 'gyed na zhes zhus
<p>244b.5</p>so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi nang na/ ma rungs par byed pa/ lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / 
<p>244b.6</p>mi'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / yi dgas kyi gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gnon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi
<p>244b.7</p>gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / de la sogs pa mkha' 'gro dang / bgegs dang / logs 'dren dang / ma rungs par byed ba gzhan gyi srog 'phrog par byed pa dang / gzi brjid 'phrog pa dang / zas su sha za ba
<p>245a</p>
<p>245a.1</p>rnams dang / gzhan yang ma rungs par byed pa'i yi dgas dang / 'byung po rnams kyis kyang yul der phyin nas/ yams kyi nad dang / rims dang / tsha ba dang / 'dus pa dang / rlung dang / bad kan dang / mkhris pa dang / shub dang / 
<p>245a.2</p>g.yan pa dang / mdze dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / 'brum bu dang / sha bkra dang / 'bras dang / me dbal dang / de la sogs pa'i nad thams cad 'byung ste/ yul der mu ge dang / klu'i tshad bas kyang mi tshugs te/ grong khyer
<p>245a.3</p>yangs pa can gyi chos thams cad dar zhing / chos kyi gzi brjid 'phrog cing chos kyi nus pa yang med par gyur to/ /de bzhin du mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / grong khyer yangs pa can du ma rungs pa thams cad byung ste/ 'jigs su rung ba byung nas sems can
<p>245a.4</p>thams cad la 'tshe bar byas so/ /de'i phyir na 'od zer gyi dra ba 'gyed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to zhes gsungs so/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa'o/ /yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon nas/ 
<p>245a.5</p>yangs pa'i grong khyer ga la ba der dong ngo zhes bya ba ni yangs pa can gyi grong khyer ni dpag tshad brgya lnga bcu yod pa/ dbyibs legs pa/ lta na mdzes pa/ phyogs bzhi'i srang bar nas/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs la sogs pas brgyan pa/ 
<p>245a.6</p>tshong dus mi gcig pa brgya rtsa brgyad yod pa/ de bzhin du 'dod pa dang / 'dod par byed pa rnams kyis nyo ba dang / len pa dang / ra ba gcig gis bskor zhing / sman gyi shing dang / me tog gi shing sna tshogs gyis bskor zhing / de bzhin du skyed mos tshal dang rdzing
<p>245a.7</p>bu bsam gyis mi khyab pas bskor ba'o/ /rdzing bu dang / skyed mos tshal de dag la thang las skyes pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog sna tshogs dang / bya rigs mi gcig pa sna tshogs dang / ri dgas kyi tshogs rnams yod de/ de lta bu'i grong khyer gyi nang du 'gro
<p>245b</p>
<p>245b.1</p>ba sems can gyi don la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/ btsun pa de ltar bgyi zhes gsol nas zhes bya ba ni/ kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan te/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la bka' stsal pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan
<p>245b.2</p>pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi don la sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ snying rje la gnas nas yang dag pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ma nor bar
<p>245b.3</p>bskor ro/ /de'i phyir na kun dga' bos kyang legs par gsan pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das yul bri dzir yul rgyu zhing gshegs zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dbus su
<p>245b.4</p>sems can thams cad 'dus pa'i sa/ de bzhin du 'byung po rnams kyang 'du ba'i sa yin no/ /gser gyi sa gzhi la rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gdan/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ ma rungs
<p>245b.5</p>par byed pa'i 'byung po thams cad 'dul ba'i sa yin no/ /yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon nas zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / lha la sogs pa 'khor rnam bzhi dang bcas nas/ grong khyer yangs pa can du zhabs kyis bcags so/ /de
<p>245b.6</p>nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i me tog bzang pos sil mar bkram ste/ spos dang / dri dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das la 'bul zhing / lha'i rol mo sna tshogs kyis mchod par
<p>245b.7</p>byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das gar gshegs pa'i sa nas kyang lha'i dar la sogs pas bting nas/ lha'i me tog man+da ra ba dang / man+da ra ba chen po la sogs pa me tog gi char 'bebs so/ /de bzhin du grong khyer yangs pa can gyi sems can thams cad kyis kyang
<p>246a</p>
<p>246a.1</p>bla na med pa'i mchod pa byas so/ /yangs pa'i grong khyer gyi a mra srung ba'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes bya ba ni/ yangs pa can gyi grong khyer gyi dbus na sems can thams cad 'du ba'i gnas a 'bras kyi shing gis bskor ba/ skyed mos tshal
<p>246a.2</p>dang / rdzing bu dang / wa chu 'dren pa'i sa dang / rdo rje'i khri'am/ pad+ma chen po'i gdan la bzhugs so/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das a mra'i tshal na bzhugs pa'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
<p>246a.3</p>stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi sems can gyi don la gdon ma rungs pa rnams 'dul ba'i phyir na/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa'o/ /kun dga' bo yangs pa'i grong khyer du song la/ phyi nas sgo'i them pa la rkang pa zhog ste zhes bya ba
<p>246a.4</p>ni/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dbus su yul lha'i thog tu dbang po'i dus su rkang pa g.yas pa bzhag la/ seng ge'i sgra bsgrags la/ khyu mchog dang bcas shing gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma chen mo/ yams kyi nad dang / gdon ma rungs pa
<p>246a.5</p>thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir ro/ /gsang sngags tshigs su bcad pa smras pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i/ gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smros shig ces bya ba ni/ gzhan gyis mi thub
<p>246a.6</p>pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nad thams cad dang / gdon thams cad rlag par byed pa/ mtshon pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'o/ /rigs ni pad+ma'i rigs so/ /phung po ni 'du shes kyi phung
<p>246a.7</p>po/ khams ni me'i khams/ skye mched ni ro'i skye mched do/ /rig sngags de'i sku mdog dang / phyag mtshan ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zhal gsum pa/ phyag bcu gnyis pa/ sku mdog dkar mo/ g.yas ser ba/ g.yon dmar ba spyan
<p>246b</p>
<p>246b.1</p>gsum pa/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa/ pad+ma'i steng na zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa'o/ /phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i 'og ma
<p>246b.2</p>gnyis ni mnyam gzhag go/ /g.yas pa'i gsum pa ni ral gri/ /bzhi pa na rdo rje/ lnga ba na 'khor lo/ /drug pas mchod sbyin no/ /g.yon pa'i gsum pa ni rin po che'i steng na rdo rje'o/ /bzhi pa na pad+ma/ lnga pa na bum pa'i steng na rdo rje/ drug pa na lcags
<p>246b.3</p>kyu/ maM yig 'bras bu sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa'o/ /rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis dbu la brgyan pa ni ye shes lnga rnam par dag pa'o/ /spyan gsum ni sku gsung thugs rnam par dag pa'o/ /zhal gsum ni ting nge 'dzin gsum rnam par dag pa'o/ /
<p>246b.4</p>rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnam par dag pa'o/ /phyag bcu gnyis ni rten 'brel bcu gnyis rnam par dag pa'o/ /rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa ni mi shigs pa rdo rje'i gdan rnam par dag pa'o/ /zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od ni/ thabs shes
<p>246b.5</p>rab zung du 'brel ba'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad pa ni sangs rgyas dang sems can gnyis su med pa'o/ /mnyam gzhag ni/ rdo rje'i rang bzhin ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa'o/ /ral gri ni shes rab rnam par dag pa'o/ /rdo rje ni stong pa nyid rnam
<p>246b.6</p>par dag pa'o/ /'khor lo ni 'khor ba gcod pa'o/ /mchod sbyin ni sbyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /rdo rje dang rin po che ni thabs shes rab rnam par dag pa'o/ /pad+ma ni rigs rnam par dag pa'o/ /bum pa dang rdo rje ni nang gi dug dang / phyi'i dug rnam par
<p>246b.7</p>dag pa'o/ /lcags kyu ni ma rig pa'i sems can rnams yar la 'dren pa'o/ /de lta bu'i rig sngags tshigs su bcad pa smras shing / ma rig pa thams cad bcom ste/ mun pa'i nags tshal bsal bar byed cing / rig sngags kyi tshigs su bcad pa smras pa'o/ /
<p>247a</p>
<p>247a.1</p>bi sa ra bi sa ra bi sa ra ta la sogs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni/ thugs rje che zhing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya seng ges/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
<p>247a.2</p>'jig rten gyi khams la sprul pa'i skus khyab cing / sems can gyi don la gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa bka' stsal pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa zhes bya ba ni/ bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu rtsa bzhis gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'das pa'i sangs
<p>247a.3</p>rgyas kyang rjes su yi rang ba'i phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung bas de bzhin no/ /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam pa zhes bya ba ni/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis kyang sku'i sgo nas chos bstan te/ de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal
<p>247a.4</p>mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma rang bzhin gyis ngo bor gnas pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa thams cad kyi bsam pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten nas yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / lan cig phyir mi ldog
<p>247a.5</p>pa rnams yin te/ de'i sgom pa ni dbugs 'byung ba dang / dbugs rngub pa rnams yin te/ sems dran pa med cing bum pa gang ba bzhin du 'gog pa'i rang bzhin gyis lus bems po'i rang bzhin du gyur pa ni ting nge 'dzin yin te/ de bzhin du rig sngags
<p>247a.6</p>kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma de'i ngo bo nyid kyis kyang bsams pa'o/ /nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa zhes bya ba ni/ ngag gi sgo nas bstan pa'i chos 'di rtags mngon du byas nas/ de bzhin du mi rtag par bsgoms te/ lta ba ni 'phags pa'i
<p>247a.7</p>bden pa bzhi 'dzin zhing / de bzhin du ngo bo nyid 'dzin pas kyang / rig sngags kyi lam gyi ngo bo nyid yin no/ /bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang
<p>247b</p>
<p>247b.1</p>dgra bcom pa rnams yin te de rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing phyag 'tshal te/ phyag rgya'i rgyas btab pa'o/ /chos kyis bsams pa zhes bya ba ni/ kun rdzob dang / don dam pa gnyis yin te/ kun rdzob kyang log pa'i sgyu ma mi dmigs pa dang / yang
<p>247b.2</p>dag pa'i sgyu ma'i don byed nus pa gnyis so/ /don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral zhing dmigs pa med pa/ gnas pa med pa sdig pa dang / dge ba dang bral ba yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin pa'i gnas yin no/ /tshangs pas bsam pa zhes bya
<p>247b.3</p>ba ni/ bsam gtan dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa yin te/ tshangs par spyod pa'i ngo bo nyid 'dzin zhing / lus po bems por btang nas/ mi dmigs pa bsgoms te/ de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i ngo bo nyid
<p>247b.4</p>kyi ngo bo yin no/ /tshangs pas so sor bsams pa zhes bya ba ni tshangs rigs kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyi 'bras bu dang / bsam gtan bzhi'i lha rnams yin te/ tshangs pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sems bkag nas bems por
<p>247b.5</p>gnas te/ mi dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin du gnas so/ /de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gnas pa yin no/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa zhes bya ba ni/ khams gsum tsam la dbang mdzad de/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas sems can la dbang mdzad de/ 
<p>247b.6</p>de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i lam nas yin no/ /dbang pos bsams pa zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la dbang mdzad pa ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin ma ngo bo nyid kyis thob pa'o/ /lhas
<p>247b.7</p>bsams pa zhes bya ba ni rigs bzhi dang / rigs bdun gyi rnam pa yin te/ 'dod pa thams cad la spyod cing bde ba la gnas te/ de yang rig sngags kyis bde bar gnas pa'o/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa zhes
<p>248a</p>
<p>248a.1</p>bya ba ni/ thag bzangs ris yin te/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad cing / byang chub kyi sems bskyed de/ khams gsum tsam la dbang mdzad cing / lha rnams kyis kyang mi thub cing rig sngags grub
<p>248a.2</p>pa'o/ /lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa zhes bya ba ni/ lha ma yin rnams ni zhe sdang skyes shing / lha rnams kyi rtsod pa ni/ rig sngags kyi stobs kyis rtsod pa'o/ /lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas sgra gcan 'dzin
<p>248a.3</p>rnams yin te/ nyi ma dang zla ba 'dzin nus shing / 'jig rten gyi bya ba la stobs dang ldan pa 'jig rten pas thub pa tsam med de/ de yang rig sngags kyi stobs kyis byas pa'o/ /'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas dang / chos

<p>248a.5</p>na/ mgo bo ardza ka bzhin du tshal pa brgyar 'gas te/ lhog pa dang / sha bkra dang / 'bras rnams kyi nad kyis btab cing / rig sngags kyi dmod mos sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi tshig ni yang
<p>248a.6</p>nas yang du bklag cing phyir rbad par bya'o/ /de yang bi sa ra ta la sogs pa smras pa'o/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhal nas sprul te/ de yang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog dmar mo/ /
<p>248a.7</p>khro mo spyan gsum pa/ dbu skra ser po gyen du 'bar ba/ kha gdangs pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ yan lag sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ zhabs g.yon brkyang pa/ g.yas bskum pas/ klu gtum po'i rigs mnan pa/ phyag g.yas pa na pad+ma dbyug to can
<p>248b</p>
<p>248b.1</p>bsnams pa/ g.yon na zhags pa dang sdigs mdzub bsnams te/ gdug pa thams cad rlag par byed cing / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes mtshon zhing / mtshon byed ni rig sngags so/ /me'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid dang ldan zhing / dbang ni lce la byas pa'o/ /ye shes lnga'i
<p>248b.2</p>ngo bo nyid dang ldan zhing / nam mkha' bzhin du thams cad la khyab pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi tshig ni muny+tsa ta la sogs pa'o/ /yams kyi nad phyir song cig ces bya ba ni/ ma rungs par byed pa'i gdon dang 'byung po rnams dang / gong du bshad pa'i nad rnams phyir bskrad cing /

<p>248b.4</p>nas gsungs pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin ma/ yams kyi nad dang / rims kyi nad la sogs pas mi tshugs te/ gzhan yang ma rungs par byed pa/ sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / drag shul gyi
<p>248b.5</p>sems dang ldan pa dang / gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / 'tshe bar byed pa'i 'byung po dang / nad thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o/ /lha chen po'i tshogs ni 'byung po'i tshogs yin te/ de yang phan gnod byed pa'i phyir na/ rig sngags kyi rgyal
<p>248b.6</p>mo'i gzi brjid kyis phyin te/ gnod byed gang zhe na/ lha chen po'i 'khor la bgegs rnams kyi bdag po 'byung po'i tshogs kyi rgyal po dbang ldan gyi mtshams na gnas pa'o/ /skyer mi ster zhing ma'i mngal nas gnod par byed pa ni/ 'di rnams yin no/ /ri dgas
<p>248b.7</p>rgyal dang skem byed dang / /brjed byed dang ni khu tshur can/ /nam gru srul po dza mi ka /'dod pa can dang ma dga' byed/ /bzhin rgyal can dang gnya' lag can/ bya gzugs mi 'chang 'joms pa mo/ /ma mo dang / de rnams 'byung po gnod byed pa/ /
<p>249a</p>
<p>249a.1</p>lo grangs bcu gnyis bar du ni/ /byis pa rnams la 'jigs par byed/ /gzhan yang gang gis mi mthong ba/ /de rnams 'byung po sa la rgyu/ /lha yi lha ni gnyis yod do/ /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/ 'jig rten las

<p>249a.4</p>dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bla ma'o/ /gnod par byed pa dang / phan par byed pa dang / lo legs par byed pa dang / lo nyes par byed pa rnams ni/ nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang / phur bu dang ni ba bsangs/ /spen pa dang ni lag dang ni/ /sgra gcan 'dzin dang mjug

<p>249b</p>
<p>249b.1</p>klu'i rgya mtsho dang / rgya mtsho'i bu dang / dug med dang / mtsho chen rnams so/ /gnod sbyin gyi dbang po la ba dang / /chu lha dang ni skye dgu'i bdag /ba ra d+h+wa dza dbang ldan dang / /tsan+dan 'dod pa'i gtso bo dang / /mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nyes dang / /bi Di dang

<p>249b.5</p>byang shar mtshams na gnas pa'o/ /skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / byed pa'i bdag po yin te/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye dang / gnod sbyin

<p>249b.7</p>dang / bzang po la sogs pa yin te/ de dag gis kyang mngon par shes pa'o/ /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni/ me dang bden bral dang / rlung dang / gshin rje'o/ /me'i 'khor rnams ni/ me zhing dang ni nag pa dang / /yang dag
<p>250a</p>
<p>250a.1</p>shes dang mdun bdar dang / /gya gyu gyur mid a gur dang / /g.yo 'dod dang ni shar lho gnas/ /lang ka mgrin bcu me dang / bum pa mgrin rna bum sna dang / gzigs shing gsod byed la sogs lho nub mtshams na gnas/ /
<p>250a.2</p>sum rtse dang ni rab shim dang / /lha min he ron ke ru dang / /kun du sna tshogs la sogs nub byang mtshams na gnas/ /rdo rje gzhon nu ma dang ni/ /nam gru dang ni nag mo dang / /rdo rje lu gu rgyud sogs dang / /lho yi phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /lha 'bum phrag
<p>250a.3</p>du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin 'bum phrag du ma rnams kyang 'ong zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha ris drug dang / gzugs khams kyi lha ris bco brgyad kyang dad pa skyes nas byung ste/ gnod sbyin rnams song shig ces pa'o/ /bcom
<p>250a.4</p>ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po 'bum phrag kyang / sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ong ste zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / rlung lha dang / dri za dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po
<p>250a.5</p>dang / 'byung po rnams dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / brjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / grib gnon dang / gnod byed dang / gnon po rnams yin te/ gzhan yang mdangs 'phrog pa dang / lo tog za ba rnams
<p>250a.6</p>yod de/ de la sogs pa 'byung po'i rigs mi gcig pa stong phrag nyi shu yod de/ de rnams kyang dad pa skyes nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag khyed rnams la gnod pa chen por byed par 'gyur du 'ong gis zhes bya ba ni/ de lta bu'i rigs kyis kyang gnod pa byas te/ des mi tshugs
<p>250a.7</p>par bya ba'i phyir rig sngags kyi tshigs su bcad pa gdon par bya'o/ /rig sngags ni nir gats+tsha ta la sogs pa'o/ /myur du byer cig ces bya ba ni/ snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dang sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams so sor song cig /bzang ba dang / ngan pa ma 'grogs
<p>250b</p>
<p>250b.1</p>shig /rig sngags kyi dmod mos ngan byed rnams mgo tshal pa tshal par 'gas shing / sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'o/ /khyed cag la gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ gzhan yang srog 'phrog par 'dod pa
<p>250b.2</p>dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / drag shul byed 'dod pa ste/ rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i mtshon gyis/ dum bu dum bur brlag cing rig sngags kyi mes thal bar btang ba'o/ /gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / nyes par mi 'dod la/ srung
<p>250b.3</p>bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag kyang khyed cag ces bya ba ni/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang / chos skyong ba rnams yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin ded dpon chen po la sogs pas kyang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i gzi
<p>250b.4</p>brjid dang / stobs kyis srung zhing skyob pa'o/ /lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ sku dang gsung dang / thugs rnams srung ste/ sku srung ba ni/ tshon skud sna tshogs la mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad bor zhing lus la btags pa'o/ /yang na dar ram/ shing
<p>250b.5</p>shun nam/ gro ga la gi waM ngam/ gur gum la sogs pas bris na/ gzhan ngan byed thams cad dang / glo bur gyi sdig pas mi tshugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
<p>250b.6</p>shAkya thub pa'i thugs ka nas sprul te/ gzi brjid dang ldan zhing / stobs che ba/ nam mkhas khyab pa bzhin du/ grags pa yang de bzhin no/ /ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ cung zad khro ba/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog
<p>250b.7</p>nag mo/ spyan gsum pa zhabs phyed skyil du bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje g.yon na sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /sems can thams cad grol bar byed pa'i
<p>251a</p>
<p>251a.1</p>rig sngags kyi tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ su mu su mu la sogs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ spyi bo gtsug nas sprul te/ rig sngags sku'i
<p>251a.2</p>rang bzhin zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog dkar mo zhi ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin/ sangs rgyas lngas dbu la brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag g.yas na 'khor lo/ g.yon pa na zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /zla ba'i gdan la zla
<p>251a.3</p>ba'i 'od dang bcas shing / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /sems can thams cad la phan par lhag pa/ dgongs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro ba ris drug gi sems can la dgongs te/ rig sngags 'di'i gzi brjid kyis/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag
<p>251a.4</p>tu med pa la gsod pa dang / sreg pa dang / rdeg pa dang / dum bur gtub pa dang / tshig pa dang / rengs pa'i sdug bsngal las/ yongs su thar ba'o/ /dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal ni/ bya dang ce spyang la sogs pa rnams kyis gcig la gcig za ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi
<p>251a.5</p>rgyal mo 'dis/ de lta bu'i 'gro ba las thar bar byas shing / gcig la gcig za ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral ba'o/ /yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal ni/ btung ba dang / bza' ba med pa'i sdug bsngal yin te/ mthong ma thag tu zhe sdang gis gcig la gcig phrag dog byed cing 'thab
<p>251a.6</p>rtsod byed pa'o/ /de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di'i gzi brjid kyis btung ba dang / bza' ba med pa'i sdug bsngal 'joms pa'o/ /lha ma yin gyi sdug bsngal ni/ phrag dog gis spyod pa zhe sdang gi sems skye ste ser sna'i rang bzhin gyis 'dod pa la ma mthun nas/ de
<p>251a.7</p>yang g.yul 'gyed pa'i sdug bsngal lo/ /de'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i dpung gis 'joms pa'o/ /lha'i sdug bsngal ni/ 'chi 'pho'i sdug bsngal yin te/ byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams zad pa dang lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang de'i
<p>251b</p>
<p>251b.1</p>'chi 'pho ba tshor te/ dper na sngon gyi dus su lha'i bu dga' byed ces bya ba/ sum cu rtsa gsum nas mar la ltung ba tshor te/ gar 'pho ba tshor zhe na/ yul bA rA Na sIr phag pa'i phru gur skye bar tshor ro/ /de tshor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis lha'i bu de yang ngu zhing / lha'i me tog gam
<p>251b.2</p>lha'i rdzas la sogs pa la lta zhing yang nas yang du sdug bsngal skye'o/ /lus las kyang dri ma 'byung ste/ me tog de kun yang skams so/ /lha'i grogs po rnams kyis bor te/ 'od kyang med do/ /zhag bdun bar du lha'i longs spyod bor nas/ mi gtsang ba
<p>251b.3</p>za'o snyam nas yang nas yang du sdug bsngal dran zhing ngu'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin skyed mos tshal du rtsed mo la 'ongs pas skad mi snyan pa thos te/ de nas de'i rtsar phyin nas/ de nas lha'i bu de la dris pa dang / lha'i bus smras pa/ lha'i lha zhag bdun pa 'dzam
<p>251b.4</p>bu'i gling dbus su/ grong khyer bA rA Na sIr bdag zhag bdun na phag pa'i phru gur skye'o zhes smras so/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dga' ba khyod kyis/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba gyis shig /des phan par 'ong ste/ 
<p>251b.5</p>gzhan gyi thabs ni med do zhes gsungs so/ /lha'i bu des de'i gdams ngag thos pa dang / skyabs su 'gro ba nyin mtshan med du byas pa dang / zhag bdun gyi nang par gnas gtsang ma'i lhar skyes so/ /lha'i longs spyod dang ldan zhing lha'i bu gser 'od ces bya bar
<p>251b.6</p>skyes so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin skyed mos tshal du lha'i longs spyod la 'ongs te/ lha'i bu de dran nas lha'i spyan gyis 'dzam bu'i gling du bltas pas/ der yang ma mthong ngo / /dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi dgas dang / gzhan yang mi'i yul shar lus
<p>251b.7</p>'phags po dang / ba lang spyod dang / sgra mi snyan du bltas pa dang / de rnams su yang ma mthong ngo / /de nas rang gi yul dang / lha ma yin dang / rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha'i yul dang / ri bdun gyi lha la sogs pa rnams su bltas te/ de rnams na yang ma mthong
<p>252a</p>
<p>252a.1</p>ngo / /de nas de rnams su yang nas yang du bltas kyang ma mthong ste/ de ngo mtshar che bas/ lho'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su/ grong khyer mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
<p>252a.2</p>shAkya seng ge bzhugs te/ de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ lha'i me tog dang / lha'i spos dang / lha rdzas kyi mchod pa khyad par 'phags pa khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i
<p>252a.3</p>bu dga' ba zhes bya ba 'chi 'phos nas phag pa'i phru gur skyer 'gro ba'i dus su/ ngas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba byin te/ de'i byin rlabs kyis gar skyes cha med pas bdag gis dbang tshad la bltas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka khyod kyis mthong bar mi 'gyur
<p>252a.4</p>te/ khyod kyis longs spyod pas mtho ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gser 'od ces bya bar skyes so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la/ lha rdzas kyi mchod pa yang nas yang du byas nas/ yid ches shing ngo mtshar che bar yang nas yang du skyabs su 'gro
<p>252a.5</p>ba byas so/ /de bzhin du rig sngags kyi rgyal mos lha'i 'chi 'pho ba'i sdug bsngal yang 'joms pa'o/ /mi'i sdug bsngal ni/ skye ba dang / rgas pa dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal yin te/ de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin
<p>252a.6</p>ma'i gzi brjid dang stobs kyis/ 'di 'chang ba tsam gyis sdug bsngal thams cad las bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i phyir na/ thugs rjes bskyab pa zhes bya'o/ /byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs
<p>252a.7</p>rje dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can la bu gcig pa lta bur byas nas/ de la bsnyen bkur byed cing 'tshe ba'i sems mi skye zhing / khams gsum gyi sems can la de lta bu'i sems bzhag cing byams pa ste/ de bzhin du 'khor ba la gnas pa'i sems can
<p>252b</p>
<p>252b.1</p>la snying rjes khyab ste/ de 'dod pa'i sems nye bar bzhag pa snying rje'o/ /dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa'o/ /gshegs kyis zhes bya ba ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba la dga' ba ste/ 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can yar la thon pa dang / mun pa mun nag bcom
<p>252b.2</p>pas dga' ste/ de bzhin du mnyam pa nyid dang / bsgom zhing sems can thams cad la khyad par med pas na/ btang snyoms so/ /ye shes kyi mchog dang / chos nyid kyis lha thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdo rje lta bu yin
<p>252b.3</p>te/ gang la yod ce na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi lta ba'o/ /de'i ye shes ni rig pa'i lha rnams yin te/ rig pa'i lha rnams ni gang zhe na/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma dang / rma bya chen mo dang / bsil ba'i tshal dang / so sor 'brang ma dang / 
<p>252b.4</p>gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin ma rnams yin no/ /mtshon pa ni ye shes rnams yin no/ /mtshon byed ni rig pa'i lha mo rnams so/ /so so'i ye shes ni/ me long lta bu'i ye shes dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi ye
<p>252b.5</p>shes dang / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang lnga'o/ /rigs ni rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / las dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / pad+mo'i rigs so/ /phung po ni rnam shes dang / tshor ba dang / 'du byed dang / gzugs dang / 'du shes so/ /khams ni nam mkha'
<p>252b.6</p>dang / chu dang / rlung dang / sa dang / me'o/ /skye mched ni/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lus dang / mig dang / lce'i rang bzhin te/ yid kyi rang bzhin ni stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'o/ /zhal gsum gsum/ phyag drug drug /sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ zhal
<p>252b.7</p>re re la spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs g.yas bskum pa/ g.yon brkyang pas/ pad+ma'i steng na zla ba'i stan la nyi ma'i 'od zer dang bcas pa'o/ /zhal rnams ni khro ba dang / sgeg pa dang / 'dzum pa dang / zhi ba dang / cung zad khro
<p>253a</p>
<p>253a.1</p>ba'o/ /sku mdog ni/ nag po dang / ser po dang / ljang gu dang / dkar po dang / dmar po'o/ /g.yas pa'i zhal rnams ni/ dkar po dang / mthing ga dang / dkar po dang / dkar ba'o/ /g.yon pa'i zhal rnams ni/ dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / ser po dang / 
<p>253a.2</p>dmar po dang / mthing ga'o/ /dang po'i phyag gnyis na rdo rje 'dzin zhing / g.yon pa na dril bu dkur brten pa'o/ /g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri ste/ gsum pa na mda' bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon pa gnyis na/ sdigs mdzub zhags pa ste/ gsum pa na gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /lha mo
<p>253a.3</p>rnams ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin du ldan pa ste/ chos nyid ni stong pa nyid do/ /lha mo ni dngos po'i rang bzhin thabs so/ /'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal ba'i gsang sngags kyi bzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin ma 'di
