<p>253a.4</p>'byung po thams cad kyi bdag mo/ /gsang sngags kyi tshig gis khams gsum tsam yang 'dar bar byed de/ 'byung po rnams kyis mi tshugs so/ /'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba grub ste/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di grub na yang dag pa'i ye shes thob pa'o/ /
<p>253a.5</p>tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ tshe 'di la yang bkra shis te/ phyi ma yang de bzhin no/ /de bzhin gang bsgrub par 'dod pa yang 'grub ste/ rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs te the tshom med do/ /gang la ser sna rnam chags pa/ /rnam bcom dri ma sel mdzad
<p>253a.6</p>cing / /zhes bya ba ni/ nga rgyal spangs shing 'tshe bar mi byed pa ste/ yang dag pa'i ye shes shar nas/ dri ma de yang spong byed pa/ /gang yang grub ste the tshom med/ /thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' ste/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ nga rgyal spangs shing
<p>253a.7</p>'tshe bar mi byed pa ste/ de'i sems nye bar bzhag na/ rig sngags 'di ni 'grub ste/ gnyis pa'i sems med pas na/ phun sum tshogs shing bkra shis 'di 'grub ba'o/ /'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ /thar pa'i lam du 'dzud byed cing / /zhes bya ba ni/ theg pa yang
<p>253b</p>
<p>253b.1</p>dag par bstan pa ste/ mun pa mun nag la ye shes kyi mar me bstan pa'o/ /mtho ris thar pa'i lam 'di ni rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs pa 'di la ser sna la sogs pa gang yang med do/ /chos rnams thams cad ston pa ste/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /zhes bya
<p>253b.2</p>ba ni/ rig sngags 'di ni bstan pas na/ grub par 'gyur te/ gnyis pa'i sems spangs shing gzhi dad pa'i sems kyis 'dir ni bkra shis te the tshom med do/ /ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyis bsten/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gang yang sangs
<p>253b.3</p>rgyas kyi chos la mos pa skyes na/ byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems ni rtag tu bzhag pa ste/ rig sngags 'di la gzhi dad pa bskyed na 'khor ba'i dra ba gcod pa'o/ /gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor
<p>253b.4</p>ba'i sdug bsngal 'di bor la dge ba'i sems ni yongs su bzung la/ bde ba yang dag thob ste/ gnyis pa'i sems ni mi 'dzin pa/ bkra shis 'di ni yang dag par thob pa'o/ /skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/ /thugs kyi 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>253b.5</p>'khor ba'i sems can la/ de'i sems nye bar bzhag ste/ snying rjes ni thams cad la khyab ste/ mun pa'i mun nag bcom pa'o/ /bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs des/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro ba ris drug ni mnyam par
<p>253b.6</p>bzhag ste/ byams pa'i stobs kyis skyob pa'i sems bzhag nas/ rtag tu sems can la snying rje'i sems dang ldan na/ tshe 'di la bkra shis par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/ /sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing / /zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor ba ni
<p>253b.7</p>ma rig pa ste/ 'khor ba'i byed pa ni gti mug gis 'khor te/ gti mug gi steng du ser snas bcings te/ ser sna'i steng du zhe sdang byung ngo / /zhe sdang la 'dod chags 'khor ro/ /de'i rting la ma rig pa'i snying rje skyes te/ des na 'khor ba'i 'khor ba zhes brtags pa'o// 
<p>254a</p>
<p>254a.1</p>de brten pa/ gcod par byed pa ni/ rig pa ste/ rig pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes so/ /ye shes de ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin ma'i ngo bo nyid yin te/ des 'khor ba rnams 'joms pa'o/ /gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa
<p>254a.2</p>ste/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du de la bsnyen zhing grub pa ste/ gzhan la snying rje yang dag par skye ste/ tshe 'di la bkra shis par 'gyur te/ yang dag par grub pa'o/ /gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ /gtsang zhing slu ba mi
<p>254a.3</p>mnga' la/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa 'di la/ chos la the tshom med de/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi the tshom med pa'i sems ni bzhag par gyur na/ chos kyi rtsa ba yang dag par thob pa'o/ /gsum gtsang gtsang bar
<p>254a.4</p>mdzad pa ste/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ brdzun dang / phra ma dang / ngag 'khyal pa dang / tshig rtsub pa dang / gzhan gyi rna bar mi snyan pa'i ngag gi smra ba'o/ /yang na ngag 'khyal pa spangs shing / gzhan la dga' ba'i gtam byin te/ mi
<p>254a.5</p>dge ba spangs shing dge ba 'di byas na/ tshe 'di la yang bkra shis par 'gyur/ dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pas/ /phun sum tshogs don 'byor 'gyur zhing / /zhes bya ba ni/ bdud dang / bdud kyi ris bcom pa la/ chos skyong ba la ni dpa' ba'i sems dang / brtson 'grus
<p>254a.6</p>ni yang dag par skye ste/ de bzhin du/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /don grub tshogs kyang grub pa ste/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de la de bzhin du byas par gyur
<p>254a.7</p>na/ rig pa 'di yang 'grub ste/ don 'grub cing 'di la the tshom med de/ gang yang bkra shis 'di las 'byung ngo / /gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni/ /nags tshal bcas pa rab g.yos shing / /zhes bya ba ni/ 'di'i chos kyis nyams su myong ba thob pas na/ sa rnams
<p>254b</p>
<p>254b.1</p>thams cad g.yo zhing 'dar te/ de'i gzi brjid kyis sems can thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad dga' ba des/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin ma 'di sgrub na/ dga'
<p>254b.2</p>ba smos ci dgos te/ yang dag pa'i byang chub thob pa'o/ /bkra shis shing chos grub par 'gyur ba ste/ tshe 'di dang / phyi ma la yang de bzhin no/ /byang chub snying por gang dag gis/ /sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing / /zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
<p>254b.3</p>'jig rten gyi khams kyang 'dar ba ste/ de yang 'di 'grub pas/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pas na/ /sa ni de bzhin du g.yo ba'i phyir ro/ /bdud yid mi bder gyur pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub kyi sa
<p>254b.4</p>gzhi la bzhugs pa'i dus su/ gti mug dang / 'khor bar 'khor ba rnams yid mi dga' ste/ de yang de'i nus pas/ mi dga' ba rnams gcod pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis bkra shis shing bde bar gnas pa'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /'phags
<p>254b.5</p>pa'i bden pa rnams gsung ba/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag pa'i bden pa bdar te chos kyi 'khor lo lan bdun bskor zhing / de yang gsum du 'dus te/ sku'i bden pa dang / gsung gi bden pa dang / thugs kyi bden pa dang / de bzhin du 'dul ba'i ngo bo nyid yin te/ 
<p>254b.6</p>de yang 'phags pa rnams kyi lam yin no/ /de yang bden pas na bkra shis par 'gyur te/ the tshom med do/ /'di la gang yang grub pa'o/ /thub pa'i mnyan pa gang byung de/ /khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag pa'i chos yin te/ chos
<p>254b.7</p>ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo de'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab ste/ 'di yis gzi brjid gang byed pa de ni bkra shis/ phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed/ /thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing / /zhes bya ba ni/ lta ba mi gcig pa bsam gyis
<p>255a</p>
<p>255a.1</p>mi khyab pa yod de/ de rnams kyang / rtag par lta ba dang / chad par lta ba la bsdu'o/ /de rnams gang du yang mi gnas shing / chos kyi rang bzhin gsal la bzhag pa'o/ /de yis de 'dul bar byed pas na/ mu stegs kyi chos kyang
<p>255a.2</p>pham par 'gyur ro/ /tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'di'i nus pa dang / gzi brjid kyi chos kyi nyams myong yang dag par skyes te/ de yis de kun 'dul ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i gzi brjid kyis 'dir ni/ 
<p>255a.3</p>bkra shis shing phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/ /brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang / /zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can la/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las thar bar byed pa'i bde ba
<p>255a.4</p>chen po skye bar byed pa ste/ yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi mar me phye bzhin bkra shis par byed do/ /yang dag pa'i byang chub la 'god pa'o/ /de bzhin du lha'i sems can rnams kyang bkra shis par 'gyur te/ lha rnams kyi ltung ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral ba'o/ /'byung po kun kyang bde
<p>255a.5</p>legs ni/ /khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig /ces bya ba ni/ ltung ba med pas sems can la 'tshe ba med de/ 'di'i nus pas 'tshe bar mi byed cing / rtag tu bza' ba dang / btung ba rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /bza' ba la lcags kyi thu lum du mthong ba rnams dang / 
<p>255a.6</p>btung ba la zangs kyi khu bar mthong ba rnams ni/ de dag gis kyang rtag tu mchod pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / /lha rnams kyis ni bsam pa yis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / ye shes kyi
<p>255a.7</p>tshogs gnyis yin te/ bsod nams kyi tshogs ni shAkya thub pa bzhin du/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis yang dag pa'i ye shes thob pa'o/ /ye shes kyi tshogs ni/ ngo bo dang bral zhing / ngag gi brjod du med pa'o/ /de gnyis gzi brjid kyis
<p>255b</p>
<p>255b.1</p>kyang bkra shis shing bde ba ste/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams kyis kyang de bzhin no/ /khyed rnams 'dod don gang yin pa/ /don de de ring grub gyur cig /ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma 'dis/ dngos
<p>255b.2</p>grub thams cad 'grub ste/ lha dang / mi dang / 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kyang 'di las don grub pa'o/ /rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog /ces bya ba ni/ mi dang / bya dang / lha dang / 'byung po rkang gnyis pa la
<p>255b.3</p>sogs pa ste/ 'dir ni bkra shis shing sdug bsngal dang bral ba'o/ /rkang bzhi ni/ byol song gi rigs las gyur pa dang / yi dgas dang 'byung po dang / lha rnams yin te/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ de bzhin du bkra shis pa'o/ /khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs
<p>255b.4</p>shog /phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog /ces bya ba ni/ gang yang lha dang mi dang / 'byung po la sogs pa 'gro ba'i dus su yang bkra shis te/ phyir ldog pa'i dus su yang bkra shis pa'i phyir ro/ /nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung la bde legs shog /ces bya ba
<p>255b.5</p>ni/ nad rnams med cing sdug bsngal dang 'bral ba ste/ rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa rnams mi mthong zhing / srog dang mi 'bral bar bde zhing bkra shis te/ tshe phyi ma yang de bzhin no/ /khyed cag kun du bde legs shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /ces
<p>255b.6</p>bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad kyang bkra shis shing bde ba ste/ rig sngags 'di yang grub pa'o/ /sdig pa thams cad dang bral zhing sngon gyi dus dang / da ltar dang / shes pa dang / mi shes pa 'joms pa'o/ /sems can
<p>255b.7</p>kun dang srog chags kun/ /zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can dang / srog chags bde bar 'gyur zhing / yang dag pa'i byang chub thob pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyi sems can yang de bzhin no/ /'byung po
<p>256a</p>
<p>256a.1</p>kun dang khyed cag kun/ /bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig /ces bya ba ni/ 'byung po ni sngon gyi las kyis bde ba cung zad kyang med pa dang / bde ba bag tsam yod pa dang / mchod par 'os pa ste/ de bzhin du khyed cag kun kyang / sems can mi
<p>256a.2</p>gtogs te/ de bzhin du rab 'bring tha ma gsum la gnas nas/ de kun yang bkra shis shing bde bar gnas te/ yang dag pa'i bde ba thob pa'o/ /thams cad nad rnams med par shog /kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig /ces bya ba ni/ 'di la nad rnams
<p>256a.3</p>kyis mi tshugs te/ nad thams cad bcom zhing / bde ba 'ba' zhig la gnas te/ yang na bde ba yang dang yang du thob pa'o/ /gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /ces bya ba ni/ sngon du byas pa dang / da ltar byas pa'i sdig pa ci byas kyang / 'dir ni mthol lo bshags
<p>256a.4</p>so zhes bya ba'o/ /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing / /sa dang bar snang dag la gnas pa rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i chos 'di la yang byon zhing / sems can la 'tshe bar ni mi byed do/ /de bzhin du gang dang gang la gnas pa'i
<p>256a.5</p>'byung po rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi bka' las mi 'das pa'o/ /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ /ces bya ba ni/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la 'god pa ste/ gzhan dang
<p>256a.6</p>byang chub kyi snying po dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du shel bzhin du gsal ba ste/ bag chags dang / shes bya'i dri mas ma gos pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas 'di gsungs pa/ gang dang gang du yang
<p>256a.7</p>'jig rten kyi khams la spyod cing dar bar shog cig ces pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin pa'i/ /grong khyer yangs pa can la 'jug pa'i gnas skabs te gnyis pa'o// //de nas zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer yangs pa can la
<p>256b</p>
<p>256b.1</p>'jug pa'i de nas so/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang bcas pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gtan dang po'i lha dang bcas pa rnams byung ste/ tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa chen po dang bzhi'o/ /
<p>256b.2</p>de ni bsam gtan dang po'o/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa'i lha rnams byung ste/ 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang gsum mo/ /de ni bsam gtan gnyis pa'o/ /bsam gtan gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang byung ste/ dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / 
<p>256b.3</p>dge rgyas so/ /de ni bsam gtan gsum pa'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyang gnas te/ sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che ba'o/ /de gsum ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'o/ /de yang de'i gnas su 'du shes med pa'i lha gnas so/ /gnas gtsang
<p>256b.4</p>ma'i lha rnams kyang byung ste/ de yang mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / 'og min dang lnga'o/ /de yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la gtogs te gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 
<p>256b.5</p>bskor ba lan gsum byas te/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas dbu byas shing phyogs gcig tu bsdad pa'o/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang bcas pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan
<p>256b.6</p>'phrul dbang byed dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / brgya byin la sogs pa dang thabs cig tu'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang bcas pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gshol mda' 'dzin dang / gnya' shing 'dzin dang / phreng thogs kyi lha
<p>256b.7</p>rnams dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa/ rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha dang / shar phyogs kyi rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / lho phyogs kyi rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / nub phyogs kyi rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang / byang phyogs kyi rgyal po lus ngan
<p>257a</p>
<p>257a.1</p>po la sogs pas dbu mdzad pa dang thabs cig tu'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang zhes bya ba ni/ dbang po dang / zla ba dang / chu lha la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu'o/ /'phrog ma bu
<p>257a.2</p>dang bcas g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas zhes bya ba ni/ lngas rtsen dang 'phrog ma'i bu dga' byed la sogs pa brgya dang ngo / /'phrog ma'i bu mtha' ltag dbang phyug la sogs pa brgya dang ngo / /'phrog ma'i bu
<p>257a.3</p>dbu ma khyab 'jug lan la sogs pa brgya dang ngo / /'phrog ma'i bu gang ba dang 'og la sogs pa brgya dang ngo / /'phrog ma'i bu skye dgu dag la sogs pa brgya ste lnga brgya dang bcas pa thabs cig go/ /nag po dang / nag mo dang / grul bum dang / dung la sogs
<p>257a.4</p>pa so so'i 'khor dang bcas te/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi a 'bras kyi tshal na so so'i kha dog bstan zhing rdzu 'phrul yang de bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni/ lan gsum bskor ba bya ba nas/ lha so so'i mchod
<p>257a.5</p>rdzas bla na med pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i mdun du thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'o/ /phyogs gcig 'khod de zhes bya ba ni/ so sor mi smra zhing mgrin pa gcig gis smras pa'o/ /
<p>257a.6</p>phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas zhes bya ba ni/ mi mjed kyi bdag po yin te/ stong spyi phud kyi bdag po 'khor de rnams kyi dbu byas shing bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba phul ba'o/ /bcom ldan ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de
<p>257a.7</p>zhes bya ba ni/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas gus par byas shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyis phyogs gcig tu smras te/ phyogs gcig tu skad cig tu tshangs pas smras pa'o/ /
<p>257b</p>
<p>257b.1</p>btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs kyi khams dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang / bgegs kyi bdag po rnams yin te/ de bzhin bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis so zhes pa'o/ /stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su zhes bya ba ni/ bsam
<p>257b.2</p>gtan bzhi pa stong / bsam gtan gsum pa stong / bsam gtan gnyis pa stong / bsam gtan dang po stong / de bzhin du so sor bgrangs pa stong stong brtsi ste/ de ni gzugs kyi khams kyi rtsi lugs so/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed stong / 'phrul dga' stong / 'thab bral stong / 
<p>257b.3</p>sum cu rtsa gsum stong / rgyal chen rigs bzhi stong / rim pa bzhin du lha'i rigs drug ni 'dod pa'i khams la de bzhin du stong stong brtsi bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du ri rab kyang yin te/ nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma la sogs pa'o/ /shar gyi lus 'phags stong / lho'i 'dzam bu gling
<p>257b.4</p>stong / nub kyi ba lang spyod stong / byang gi sgra mi snyan stong / de bzhin tsha ba'i dmyal ba dang / grang ba'i dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas rnams yin te/ de ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi stong rtsi lugs so/ /gzugs med kyi khams kyang de bzhin du yin no/ /dbang phyug chen po la dbang bgyid pa
<p>257b.5</p>lags te zhes bya ba ni/ stong spyi phud kyi khams la dbang mdzad pa'o/ /yang na de ni stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yin te/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po dbang sdud mdzad pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'tshal na/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su srung bar
<p>257b.6</p>bgyid ces bya ba ni/ tshangs pas dbu mdzad cing / lha dang / 'byung po rnams kyis kyang phan par byed pa dang / gnod par byed pa'i nges tshig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshig zhus pa'o/ /srung bar bgyid ces pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o/ /yongs su skyob
<p>257b.7</p>par bgyid cing / yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyid lags so zhes bya ba ni/ bkra shis shing sems can thams cad la bde bar gnas par byas pa'o/ /btsun pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spangs shing / tshul khrims la sogs pa
<p>258a</p>
<p>258a.1</p>bsrungs te/ sems can thams cad kyi don la sprul pa'i skus khyab pa'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi mnga' bdag ces bya ba ni/ bag chags kyi sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pas ma gos te/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi gos shing / lus
<p>258a.2</p>dang ngag dang / yid bde ba ste/ de bzhin du gti mug dang / zhe sdang dang / 'dod chags dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog rnams kyis mi tshugs shing bde bar gshegs te/ lus pa med pas na bde bar gshegs pa ste/ de bas na chos rang bzhin ni dngos po med cing rnyog pa
<p>258a.3</p>med pa ste/ rang bzhin med cing / rtag chad gnyis dang bral te/ brjod pas kyang mi khyab pa ste/ nam mkha' bzhin du sems can thams cad la khyab pas na/ dbang phyug ces bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su dbang
<p>258a.4</p>phyug la mnga' mdzad pa lags te zhes bya ba ni/ bzhi bcom skal ba dang ldan pa ste/ ri rab la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'di stong stong brtsi ste/ de ni stong spyi phud gyi 'jig rten gyi khams yin no/ /de bzhin du nyis 'gyur du brtsis pa ni stong bar ma'o/ /stong gsum gyi stong
<p>258a.5</p>chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni/ de de'i sum 'gyur du brtsis pa ni stong gsum mo/ /chen po ni sems can thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams ni mnyam por gzigs shing mnyam por bsten te/ dge sdig la sogs pa gnas shing sems
<p>258a.6</p>can gnas pa'o/ /de la sprul pa'i skus khyab ste/ sems can rigs mi gcig pa'i phyir na rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan pa'o/ /yang na sems can gyi don la der dbang mdzad de/ theg pa sna tshogs bstan zhing yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi lam bstan pa'o/ /de ni tshangs
<p>258a.7</p>pa'i tshig go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhed na zhes bya ba ni byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms bsgom zhing sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'o/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su zhes bya ba ni/ sprul pa'i skus
<p>258b</p>
<p>258b.1</p>kyang skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis kyang / sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar mdzad pa lags na zhes bya ba ni/ mi dge ba bcu la 'gro bar yang srung ste mtho ris kyi
<p>258b.2</p>lam bstan pa'o/ /'khor ba'i 'jigs pa dang / 'jig rten dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyi 'tshe ba dang / ngan song gsum las 'thon par byed pa'o/ /mi dge ba bcu la 'gro ba yang bzung ste/ de las ldog nas dge ba bcu la 'jug pa'o/ /dper na shing skam po 'gugs
<p>258b.3</p>te/ khengs pa'i rang bzhin thabs kyis 'gugs pa bzhin du/ khengs pa khro bo'i rigs kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi gzi brjid kyis kyang 'dul bar byed pa'o/ /yang na zhi ba ni bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi byin rlabs kyis zhi bar byed pa'o/ /sdug bsngal dang
<p>258b.4</p>bral zhing / bde ba la bkod de/ yang dag pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'o/ /yang na 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid bde zhing phun sum tshogs pa yi dgas rnams kyis kyang 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o/ /mdzad lags na zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das
<p>258b.5</p>la tshangs pas yang nas yang du zhus pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ lan gcig mngon du zhugs te/ lan gnyis pa ni da ltar zhu ste/ phyi ma yang zhus pa'o/ /lan gcig lan gnyis lan gsum du/ tshangs pa rnams kyis yang dang yang du zhus pa'o/ /de nas bcom
<p>258b.6</p>ldan 'das mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo zhes bya ba ni/ de nas ni tshangs pas smras pa'i de nas so/ /sems can rnams la dmigs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma zhal nas byung ste/ maM gyi yi ge'i rang bzhin las nam mkha' bzhin
<p>258b.7</p>du khyab pa/ 'od zer sna tshogs pa 'phros nas/ 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal dang bral ba dang / stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa/ ngo bo dang bral zhing gang gis brjod du med pa de ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas
<p>259a</p>
<p>259a.1</p>byung ngo / /zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ sku mdog dmar mo/ gzhon nu'i cha byad can/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan dang bcas pa/ spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhal g.yas dkar po/ g.yon mthing ga /rgyab ser
<p>259a.2</p>po'o/ /phyag dang po'i g.yas g.yon gnyis na chos kyi rgyal po'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/ de'i 'og ma gnyis kyis byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ de'i 'og ma gnyis kyis mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ g.yas pa'i tha mas mchod sbyin gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ g.yon
<p>259a.3</p>pas skyabs sbyin phyag rgya'o/ /zhabs pad+ma skyil krung du bzhugs pa/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin/ shes rab kyi ngo bo na so sor rtog pa'i ye shes thabs kyi ngo bo yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'o/ /'du shes kyi phung po pad+ma gsung gi rigs me'i khams ro'i skye mched do/ /pad+ma
<p>259a.4</p>dang / zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'khor dang bcas shing / rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang dang bcas nas byung ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung zhing sems can gyi don la tshangs
<p>259a.5</p>pa la sogs pas zhus pa la ting nge 'dzin gnang ba'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gnang ba de nas so/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to zhes
<p>259a.6</p>bya ba ni/ stong spyi phud kyi rgyal po tshangs pas mngon par shes pas ting nge 'dzin gyis gnang bar shes so/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni tshangs pas mngon par shes pa'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs
<p>259a.7</p>nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dgra bcom pa dang / gzhan yang dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen pha dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / de la sogs pa mi dang / lha dang lha ma yin dang / 'byung po mang po 'dul ba'i 'khor gyi nang du bcom ldan
<p>259b</p>
<p>259b.1</p>'das shAkya seng ges bka' stsal to/ dge slong dag stong spyi phud kyi rgyal po tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang bcas pa dang zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi khams kyi lha gnas ris bcu bdun dang ngo / /lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang bcas pa dang zhes bya ba ni 'dod
<p>259b.2</p>pa'i khams sum cu rtsa gsum nas yar la bgrangs pa lnga dang bcas pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang bcas pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris nas mar la bgrangs pa/ lha ma yin dang / gser gyi ri bdun phreng thogs kyi lha rnams la sogs
<p>259b.3</p>pa'i 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu rnams dang thabs cig go/ /rgyal po bzhi ni ri rab kyi lcog la gnas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / 'phrog ma bu dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rnams zhes bya ba ni/ gdon gyi rigs nyi shu rtsa drug dpon
<p>259b.4</p>re re dang bcas pa stong phrag brgyad cu lha'i gdon la sogs pa re re yang stong phrag brgyad cu brgyad cu'o/ /de rnams dang thabs cig tu'o/ /ngag la ba der 'ongs nas/ mi mjed kyi bdag pos nga la 'di skad ces smras so zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi don la rig sngags kyi tshig smras
<p>259b.5</p>so zhes pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la lan gcig lan gnyis/ lan gsum zhus pa'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bshad pa'o/ /mnga' mdzad pa lags te zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi rang
<p>259b.6</p>bzhin gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sprul pa'i skus khyab pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhed na zhes bya ba ni/ tshangs pas yang nas yang du zhus pa'i tshig dge slong rnams la smras pa/ lan gsum zhus pa'o zhes smras pa'o/ /bde legs su gyur par mdzad du
<p>259b.7</p>gsol zhes gsol to zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi don la sprul pa dang / bde legs su gyur cig ces pa'o/ /dge slong dag ngas kyang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can don la/ skad
<p>260a</p>
<p>260a.1</p>cig ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rig sngags 'phros pas 'gro ba ris drug gi don mdzad pa'o/ /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig /nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i de nas te/ 
<p>260a.2</p>de mngon par shes nas tshangs pa la sogs pas kyang / de rig par shes pa'o/ /dge slong dag rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa 'di zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi nges tshig smras te/ rig ni shes rab ste/ sngags ni thabs so/ /
<p>260a.3</p>rgyal mo ni bdud rnams kyis mi tshugs te/ 'khor ba rnams 'joms ba'o/ /gsang ba ni stong pa nyid yin te/ khyab che ba mi dmigs pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin yin te/ ngag gis kyang smra bar mi nus te/ ngo bo rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes mi dmigs pa ste gsang
<p>260a.4</p>ba'o/ /sngags ni skyob pa/ srung ba/ man+t+ra'i rang bzhin/ sgyu ma lta bu/ chos thams cad kyang sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi
<p>260a.5</p>khams kyang sgyu ma lta bu ste/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bu ste/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun yang / rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes gsungs so/ /yang na sngags ni
<p>260a.6</p>thams cad la khyab ste sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin gyis sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'o/ /rjes su 'dzin pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyas btab ste/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / dgra bcom pa dang / lha dang / mi la sogs pa rjes su 'dzin te/ de'i ye shes kyi
<p>260a.7</p>lam gyis/ thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i 'bras bu thob ba'o/ /rig sngags 'di ni yang dag pa'i ye shes yin no/ /'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs so zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gyis
<p>260b</p>
<p>260b.1</p>mi khyab pa/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mar me mdzad la sogs pa sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa'o/ /rjes su yi rang ste 'di'i lam nas sangs rgyas pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
<p>260b.2</p>rnams kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ ma 'ongs pa rnams ni bcom ldan 'das byams pa la sogs pa yin te/ de bzhin du de'i lam nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'o/ /da ltar byung ba na yang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub nyid la phan par bya
<p>260b.3</p>ba'i phyir da ltar nga nyid kyis bshad do zhes bya ba ni/ smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'di'i tshe 'di la sems can gyi don la/ shAkya seng ges kyang gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ste/ 'di'i lam yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags
<p>260b.4</p>rjes su 'dzin pa'i tshangs pa la sogs pas rig sngags zhu ba'i gnas skabs te gsum pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi nges tshig gi rtags dang po rdzogs so// //de nas zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pas gsungs pa'i de nas so/ /
<p>260b.5</p>bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di zung shig ces gsungs nas/ kun dga' bo la bcom ldan 'das kyis gtad pa'o/ /kun dga' bo khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su
<p>260b.6</p>'dzin ma 'di zung shig ces bya ba ni/ sku gsum gyi rang bzhin la sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa gsang sngags kyi tshig gis/ ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal te/ srid pa gsum yang 'joms pa/ sku gsung thugs kyis bzung nas sems can rnams kyi don mdzad do zhes pa'o/ /
<p>260b.7</p>chongs shig /lhogs shig /shod cig /kun chub par gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ nga'i bka' las ma 'das par byas shing / sems can gyi don la nga mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / gsungs shig /rjes su yi rang zhing sems can thams cad la ston cig ces bya ba'o/ /yang na de
<p>261a</p>
<p>261a.1</p>ltar khyod kyis de ltar bzung nas sems can gyi don la tshig gzung bar gyis shig ces pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dang yang du gsungs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma 'di ni zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ 
<p>261a.2</p>ngan song gsum 'joms pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa/ 'khor ba nas log pa/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /'khor bzhi po rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bde bar reg par gnas par 'gyur ro zhes
<p>261a.3</p>bya ba ni/ med pa yod par byed de/ yod pa rnams kyang med par byed pa'o/ /bkra mi shis pa bkra shis pa ste/ brjed pa rnams kyang dran pa rnyed de/ shes rab chung ba rnams kyang shes rab dang ldan pa/ 'jigs pa rnams kyang mi 'jigs pa'o/ /tshe thung ba rnams kyang tshe ring bar byed de/ nad
<p>261a.4</p>thams cad 'joms shing / mi bde ba yang bde bar byed de/ ma rungs pa'i gdon rnams kyis/ dge ba dang / chos byed du mi ster ba'i gdon rnams 'joms shing / tshig tu brjod pa tsam gyis kyang / lha dang / lha khang dang / khyim dang / pu sti dang / glegs bam dang / lugs
<p>261a.5</p>sku la sogs pa rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /yang na 'khor bzhi la sogs pa la bar chod med cing bde bar bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'di'i tshig ni/ pad+ma'i rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs te/ mtshon pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so/ /mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi
<p>261a.6</p>rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'o/ /phung po ni gzugs kyi phung po'o/ /sa'i khams ni mig gi skye mched/ ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ sku mdog dkar po/ /zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
<p>261a.7</p>pa/ zhal g.yas mthing ga /g.yon dmar ba/ phyag g.yas pa gsum na/ ral gri dang / be con dang / 'khor lo bsnams so/ /g.yon pa gsum na rin po che dang / zhags pa dang / lcags kyu rnams so/ /g.yas brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum pas pad+ma'i steng na/ zla ba'i
<p>261b</p>
<p>261b.1</p>mtshan nyid/ nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa ste/ zhi ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi tshig 'di lta ste/ u bud+d+he/ ne bud+d+he zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bka' stsal to/ /yun ring po nas spyad pa'i gsang sngags
<p>261b.2</p>stobs dang / mthu rtsal dang ldan pa 'di ni zhes bya ba ni/ dpag tshad lnga brgyar gnas pas kyang / 'di nas bsrungs na/ bskyab pa dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ro/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du yang dag par gsung bar
<p>261b.3</p>bya'o/ /'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs so zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / kun skyobs dang / log par dad sel dang / gser thub dang / 'od srungs rnams yin te/ 
<p>261b.4</p>de la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ rin chen zla ba dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / 
<p>261b.5</p>kun du bzang po dang / chos 'byung ba dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / zhal rnam par gzigs ba'i ut+pa la dang / de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la sogs pas dbu mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa sangs rgyas te/ de rnams kyis kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /da ltar byung ba na yang / 
<p>261b.6</p>'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di nyid la phan par bya ba'i phyir/ da lta rang nyid kyis bshad do zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba rigs drug gi don la sprul pa'i skus khyab ste/ mi bde ba bde bar byed pa'i phyir da ltar byang chub bsgrub pa'i phyir rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa gsungs
<p>261b.7</p>pa'o/ /ngas zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sems can rnams bsrung bar byas pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa 'di'i ming 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad dang bdag ces bya ba srung bar
<p>262a</p>
<p>262a.1</p>byed do/ /rig sngags 'di 'chang zhing gus par byed pa gang yin pa la/ tshe 'di la yang srung ste/ de bzhin du tshe phyi ma la yang yin no/ /mtshams bcad do zhes bya ba ni/ mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / ma rungs pa'i nad byung na/ yul 'khor mtshams gcad
<p>262a.2</p>par bya ste/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyis seng ldeng gi phur pa la bris nas/ phyogs mtshams su btags te/ dbus su gcig gdab pa'o/ /tshon skud sna tshogs kyis bskor zhing / rgyal bas gsungs pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor yang dag par bzhengs te/ de bzhin du phyogs mtshams su gang ba'i bum
<p>262a.3</p>pa bzhag nas/ chu de yang rigs kyi bu pho'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pas gtor bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du byas na phyugs nad dang / mi nad dang / ma rungs pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon byung ba rnams kyang phyir 'byung ste/ phyi nas 'ong ba rnams kyis mi tshugs so/ /
<p>262a.4</p>shar phyogs su rgyang grags gcig tshun chad mtshams gcad do zhes bya ba ni/ ring na rgyang grags gcig tshun chad du mtshams gcad do/ /gal te phyed tshun chad do/ /tha ma la rang gi yul 'khor tsam mo/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad kyi bar du yang rgyang grags gcig
<p>262a.5</p>mtshams gcad do zhes bya ba ni/ sngar bshad pa'i rdzas dang / sngags kyis kyang mtshams gcad par bya ste/ de bzhin du phyogs dang mtshams kyang shes par bya'o/ /de bzhin du byas par gyur na/ yul de bkra shis par 'gyur te/ nad rnams kyis mi tshugs shing / lo legs te
<p>262a.6</p>ser ba la sogs pas kyang mi tshugs so/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa pad+ma'i rigs kyi rin po che'i rigs ma/ mtshon pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo/ phung po ni tshor ba'i phung po/ chu'i khams
<p>262a.7</p>sna'i skye mched do/ /ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ sku mdog ser mo/ zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ zhal g.yas dkar po g.yon dmar po/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag dang po g.yas g.yon gnyis
<p>262b</p>
<p>262b.1</p>kyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa/ bar ma na rin po che tha ma na be con no/ /g.yon pa'i bar ma na dgra sta/ tha ma na zhags pa'o/ /zhabs g.yas brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum pa/ pad+ma'i steng na zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa/ gzhon nu'i cha byad can/ sgeg pa'i tshul dang
<p>262b.2</p>ldan pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi tshig ni 'di lta ste/ sa mu tsa/ bi mu tsa la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dang yang du bka' stsal pa'o/ /yun ring po nas spyad pa'i gsang sngags kyi stobs dang / mthu rtsal dang ldan pa 'di dag ni zhes bya
<p>262b.3</p>ba ni/ yul 'khor mtshams gcod pa dang / nad rnams bcom pa dang / 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya'i bar du yang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'di 'dzin pa gang yang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma yang bde ba thob cing
<p>262b.4</p>yang dag pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro/ /'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs so zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa nyi ma phyag mtshan dang / tshe dpag med dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rgya mtsho
<p>262b.5</p>rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni
<p>262b.6</p>de bzhin du 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / rdo rje snying po la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o/ /da ltar byung ba na yang ngas bshad do zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi don la sprul pa'i skus khyab ste/ bcom
<p>262b.7</p>ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sems can gyi don la rjes su yi rang zhing yang dag par gsungs pa'o/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas kyang bshad do zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di'i lam nas tshangs pa'i ngo bo thob cing / gus pas mchod par byas te/ tshangs pas kyang rjes su yi rang
<p>263a</p>
<p>263a.1</p>zhing gsungs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa 'di bzung nas zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di bzung na ni pha rol tu phyin pa
<p>263a.2</p>bcu thob ste/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de bzhin du 'di'i lam nas sa bcu'i byang chub thob pa'o/ /
<p>263a.3</p>ji ltar bstan pa dang / ji ltar kun chub par byas pa bzhin du shes sam zhes bya ba ni/ mi 'gyur ba rdo rje bzhin du brtan te/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bzhin du sems can la khyab pa'o/ /nam mkha' bzhin du kun la khyab ste/ 'jig rten gyi
<p>263a.4</p>khams thams cad la yang ma lus par chos kyis khyab pa'o/ /ye shes kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs te/ de bltas pa'i phyir na shes par grags pa'o/ /mthong ngam las byed pa de la ni ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su
<p>263a.5</p>gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar byas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ ye shes med par ye shes thob cing / dper na mun pa'i nang na me mar btang ba bzhin du bstan te/ yang dag pa'i ye shes thob cing 'jig rten 'di yang bsrung zhing skyob ste/ shing ljon pa nyi ma shar
<p>263a.6</p>ba'i dus su sems can der song ba rnams bsil bar byed de/ ji srid ma shi'i bar du/ nad dang 'bral zhing dpal dang ldan te/ mya ngan la sogs pa bor zhing bde ba la gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin du tshe phyi ma la yang chos 'di dran zhing bde bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom
<p>263a.7</p>ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ mar me mdzad dang / byams pa dang / shAkya thub pa la sogs pas kyang gsungs te/ rjes su yi rang zhing rig
<p>263b</p>
<p>263b.1</p>sngags kyis rgyas btab pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma 'dis ming 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag dang / sems can thams cad dang / 'di 'dzin par byed pa gang yang rung ba la/ bsrung zhing yongs su bskyab pa dang / 
<p>263b.2</p>yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ro/ /shi 'phos nas kyang de bzhin te/ bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba ni gong du bshad pa bzhin du/ zhi ba dang / bde legs yin te/ sems can de yang ma shi'i bar du bde zhing / tshe
<p>263b.3</p>phyi ma yang de bzhin no/ /mtshams gcad do zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i gdon rnams yi ge la bris la mnan par bya ste/ de'i steng du yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzugs 'di bris la bum pa chen po byas te/ rab tu gnas pa byas nas/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags bris nas mchod
<p>263b.4</p>rten gyi rtse mo la btags te/ de mthong ba tsam gyis kyang gdon gdug pa can rnams kyis kyang 'ong mi nus so/ /ring na rgyang grags gcig ste/ bar ma la rgyang grags phyed/ thung ba la yul 'khor tsam mo/ /shar phyogs mtshams bcad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ gong du bshad pa
<p>263b.5</p>bzhin du phyogs mtshams la rig sngags bris pa mchod rten gyi rtse mor gdags par bya'o/ /de ltar byas na 'jigs pa thams cad dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas yang dang yang du bka' stsal pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi'i
<p>263b.6</p>lam dang / lam ma yin pa nas gnas pa bzhi yod de zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po bzhi'i lam ni yul 'khor srung gi lam nas gnas pa dang / 'phags skyes po'i lam nas gnas pa dang / spyan mi bzang gi lam nas gnas pa dang / lus ngan po'i lam nas gnas pa dang / de
<p>263b.7</p>bzhi yang / sku mdog dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu ste/ de bzhin du phyag mtshan ni/ 'khor lo dang / dbyug to dang / sbrul gyi zhags pa dang / ral gri ste/ de yang phyag g.yas pa rnams na rim pa bzhin du'o/ /pi wang dang / rin po che dang / 
<p>264a</p>
<p>264a.1</p>pad+ma dang / bum pa rnams ni/ phyag g.yon pa rnams na bsnams pa'o/ /glang po che dang / rus sbal dang / chu srin dang / seng ge rnams yin te/ de rnams kyi don zhes bya'o/ /yang na rgyal po bzhi'i lam ni/ rgyal po bzhi po rnams kyis srung
<p>264a.2</p>ba'o/ /lam ma yin pa ni/ rgyal po chen po rnams kyi bu yin te/ de bzhis kyang rgyal phran dang / 'khor la sogs pa bskul zhing / sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byas so/ /de dag gang zhe na zhes bya ba ni/ shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang rnams gnod pa skyel
<p>264a.3</p>te/ bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu yang de bzhi la 'dus pa'o/ /de ni 'di lta ste/ bkra shis ldan dang / kun shes dang / gang po dang / dga' ba'i dpal rnams te zhes bya ba ni/ nag po dang / ljang nag dang / dmar nag dang / thal ba'i mdog rnams yin te/ 
<p>264a.4</p>de'i gzugs kyang rim pa bzhin du bshad de/ seng ge dang / stag dang / spre'u dang / byi la'o/ /phyag mtshan yang / gtun shing dang / dbyug to dang / mdung dang / ral gri'o/ /de ni g.yas pa rnams yin te/ g.yon pa na zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /bzhon pa
<p>264a.5</p>de yang gzugs ji bzhin du zhon pa yang de bzhin no/ /gang de dag gi ming shes pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'i sngags 'don zhing de ngo bor 'dzin par bya'o/ /de ngo bor 'dzin par shes na/ rgyal po rnams kyi 'jigs pa dang bral bar
<p>264a.6</p>'gyur ro/ /rus shes pa de la zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po bzhi'i 'khor gyis nad btab pa bzhin du/ de rnams kyis kyang nad pa la nad kyis btab pa'o/ /rgyal po bzhi'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis 'khor dang / g.yog rnams kyis
<p>264a.7</p>kyang mi nus pa'o/ /chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis chom rkun rnams kyang mi 'byung ste/ gal te 'ong bar gyur na/ nor mi rnyed cing long bar 'gyur ro/ /me'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyis srung ba'i gzi brjid kyis grong tsam la
<p>264b</p>
<p>264b.1</p>yang mi tshugs so/ /chu'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ chu'i nang na gzings chen po la yod par gyur na/ gar btang na yang ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /mi yi 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po dang / mi rgod la sogs pa yin te/ de'i nyes pas kyang 'jigs pa de mi 'byung ste/ 
<p>264b.2</p>mi rgod kyi nang du 'gro yang mi choms so/ /yang na de kun dang phrad par mi 'gyur ro/ /mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni lha'i gdon rnams yin te/ de la sogs pa gdon phran tshegs ngan byed la sogs pa yod de/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis 'jigs pa mi 'byung
<p>264b.3</p>ba'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dang yang du gsungs pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje'i bu pho lag myur zhes bya ba/ grong khyer khor yug ces bya ba na gnas pa yod de zhes bya ba ni/ stobs che zhing gzi brjid che ba/ gnod sbyin thams cad kyi ded dpon/ /sems
<p>264b.4</p>can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa/ sku mdog mthing nag /zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa ste/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje be con 'dzin zhing / g.yon pa na sdigs mdzub dang / zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /de bzhin du grong khyer yang rin po che sna bdun las grub pa/ gnod sbyin pho mo mang
<p>264b.5</p>po 'du zhing des sde dpon mdzad pa'o/ /gang de'i ming shes pa dang / rus shes pa de la ni zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ gnod sbyin de rnams kyis kyang de la bsrung bar byas so/ /de srung bar byed ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags dang / rdo rje slob dpon la sogs pa'i
<p>264b.6</p>dam las ma 'das na/ grogs byed cing / dpal dang ldan par byed do/ /yongs su skyob par byed/ /yongs su 'dzin par byed/ chad pa zlog par byed/ zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar byed ces bya ba ni/ phun sum tshogs par byed de/ de'i byin rlabs kyis/ zhi ba dang / 
<p>264b.7</p>rgyas pa'i las thob cing / nad thams cad las thar zhing / bkra shis par gnas pa'o/ /ming 'di zhes bya ba'i phyir/ lag na rdo rje'i bu pho lag myur la gsol lo zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi cho ga bzhin du byas te/ bu de yang gnod sbyin la bcol bar gyur na/ byis pa'i
<p>265a</p>
<p>265a.1</p>gdon rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs te/ gzhan rnams kyis ci smos te/ tshe ring zhing nad med pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral zhing / 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsol ba 'debs so zhes bya ba ni/ rjes su mthun pa'i
<p>265a.2</p>gtor ma dang / spos dang / zhal zas la sogs pa/ mngar gsum dkar gsum la sogs pa byin nas/ gsol ba yang nas yang du gsol lo/ /de bzhin byas nas mngon sum du skad cig mas 'khod par 'gyur ro/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
<p>265a.3</p>sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bkas/ gang ming 'di zhes bya ba la skabs tshol ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa rnams ni sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yin te/ ma 'ongs pa ni byams pa la sogs pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab
<p>265a.4</p>pa'i da ltar yod pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa yin te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma 'di la sus gus par byas sam/ 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba la sogs pa byas na/ sangs rgyas de rnams kyis
<p>265a.5</p>kyang byin gyis brlabs shing / nad rnams med cing bde bar 'gyur te/ gzhan gyis kyang klags tshol bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ming 'di zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad dang / gang zag bdag rnams yin no/ /glags lta ba'i gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'am/ yi dgas
<p>265a.6</p>sam/ sha za 'am/ grul bum mam/ srul po'am/ lus srul po rnams kyis bdag la glags rnyed par ma gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ sems can la gnod par byed 'dod pa'i yi dgas rnams kyis kyang rig sngags 'dis bsrungs pas mi tshugs so/ /gnod sbyin gyi gdon bzhin
<p>265a.7</p>mi sdug pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam pa ngan pa de rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs shing sems can thams cad dang / gang zag 'di la gnod par mi byed de/ de bzhin du srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / srul po dang / lus srul
<p>265b</p>
<p>265b.1</p>po rnams kyis kyang gnod par mi byed do/ /glags tshol bas kyang glags mi rnyed do/ /bdag dang klan ka rnyed par ma gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag dang / sems can thams cad la klan ka ci smos te/ rtsar nye bar yang mi nus so/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs
<p>265b.2</p>pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas sems can gyi don la yang nas yang du bka' stsal pa'o/ /srin mo chen mo bcu bzhi yod do zhes bya ba ni gzi brjid che zhing stobs dang ldan pa/ dbyibs dang kha dog dang ldan pa ste/ lha dang / lha ma yin gyi 'thab rtsod la rtsod par nus pa sha stag go/ /de dag ni
<p>265b.3</p>byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa na yang srung zhes bya ba ni/ rgyu'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te/ rgyu'i byang chub sems dpa'i ci'i phyir yin zhe na/ rig sngags 'di'i lam nas yang dag pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur te/ bslab pa dang / slob pa yod de
<p>265b.4</p>byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyu yin te/ dang po ma rig pa'i mun pas bkab nas mi snang bar 'gyur te/ de yang de bsal nas rin po che shel bzhin du phyi nang med par gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dang / sangs rgyas la yang gnyis su med cing so so ma yin te/ sems can gyis sangs
<p>265b.5</p>rgyas sgrub pa yang byang chub kyi sems yod pas 'grub ste/ sems can la yang byang chub sems dpa' zhes grags so/ /'o na sems med pa'i bems po rnams sangs rgyas te/ de'i phyir na sems can dang / sangs rgyas gnyis su med pa'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ma'i
<p>265b.6</p>lhums na bzhugs pa la bsrung ba zhes bya'o/ /bltams pa'i tshe yang srung / bltams zin pa'i 'og tu yang srung zhes bya ba ni/ skye ba'i bar yang bde ba ste/ skyes pa nas kyang bde ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di la gus par byed na/ tshe ring zhing gzi brjid dang ldan par 'gyur
<p>265b.7</p>ro/ /sku 'khrungs na yang srung ste zhes bya ba ni/ tshe la bar gcod med cing / 'chi ba la ma thug gi bar du bde ba byas shing srung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcu bzhi gang zhe na zhes bya ba ni/ de'i sku mdog dang / phyag mtshan ni nag mo dang / ser mo dang / dkar mo dang / dmar mo dang / 
<p>266a</p>
<p>266a.1</p>ljang gu dang / sngo bsangs dang / dmar ser dang / dkar ser dang / ljang nag dang / mthing nag dang / thal ba'i mdog dang / dkar po/ dmar po/ ser bo'o/ /phyag mtshan ni 'khor lo dang / gshol dang / gtun shing dang / mdung dang / mda' gzhu dang / 
<p>266a.2</p>shak+ti dang / to mar dang / zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / rtse gsum dang / rdo rje dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / ral gri bsnams pa'o/ /bcu bzhi ni 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ stobs ldan ma la sogs pa'o/ /gang de dag gi ming shes pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ ming ni gong du bstan te/ rus shes
<p>266a.3</p>pa de la ni de dag srung bar byed ces bya ba ni/ sku mdog dang / phyag mtshan dang / mtshan nyid shes pa'o/ /yongs su skyob par byed pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ nad med cing bde ba ste/ bar chod kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi
<p>266a.4</p>tshig bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dang yang du gsungs pa'o/ /srin mo chen mo brgyad yod do zhes bya ba ni/ gzi brjid che zhing stobs dang ldan pa ste/ longs spyod dang ldan zhing / lha dang / lha ma yin gyi 'khrug pa la yang rtsod par nus pa'o/ /de dag ni skyes pa dang / bud med gnyid
<p>266a.5</p>log kyang rung / gnyid ma log kyang rung ste/ gzi byin 'phrog par byed do zhes bya ba ni/ sems can la 'tshe bar byed cing glags tshol te/ sdang ba'i sems dang / drag shul gyi sems dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / srog gcod par byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /
<p>266a.6</p>de dag kyang gang zhe na zhes bya ba ni/ kha dog dang / dbyibs bstan pa ste/ kha dog ni ljang nag dang / sngon po dang / nag khra dang / stag re dang / mthing ga dang / nag po dang / dmar nag dang / thal ba'i mdog go/ /dbyibs ni/ khyi dang / wa dang / spyang ki dang / 
<p>266a.7</p>stag dang / phag dang / 'ug pa dang / pho rog dang / ra dang ngo / /phyag mtshan ni/ ro dang / thal ba dang / zhags pa dang / sbrul gyi zhags pa dang / me mgal dang / hom khung dang / snying dang / thod pa'o/ /'di dag ni mi srun zhing sems can rnams la 'tshe
<p>266b</p>
<p>266b.1</p>bar byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ brgyad pa'i grangs dang / mi bstan te/ de ni ra la sogs pa'o/ /gang de dag gi ming shes pa dang / rus shes pa de la ni zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'i stobs dang / gzi brjid dang / mthu rnams kyis
<p>266b.2</p>kyang srung ste/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing srung ste/ 'on kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis ming rus shes par byed pa'o/ /de dag srung bar byed ces bya ba la sogs pas ni/ gnod par mi nus shing / bde ba la bkod de/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis sems can rnams
<p>266b.3</p>la/ sdig pa can rnams kyis kyang 'tshe bar mi byed cing / nad thams cad dang bral bar byed pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ kun dga' bo la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang dang yang du bstan pa'o/ /srin mo chen mo bdun yod de zhes bya ba ni/ gzi brjid che zhing kha dog
<p>266b.4</p>dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs dang ldan te/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi 'thab rtsod la yang rtsod par nus pa'o/ /de dag ni khrag gi dri mnams na dpag tshad lnga brgyar rgyug go zhes bya ba ni/ skad cig mas gang na yod pa'i sha khrag tshor te/ de bzhin du skad cig mas len nus te/ sems can
<p>266b.5</p>rnams la 'tshe bar byed pa'o/ /de dag kyang gang zhe na zhes bya ba ni/ kha dog dang / dbyibs bstan te/ de'i kha dog ni/ ser mo dang / dmar mo dang / sngon mo dang / ljang gu dang / sngo bsangs dang / nag mo dang / mthing ga ste/ gzugs ni khra bo dang ldan pa ste/ skra ser po
<p>266b.6</p>gyen du 'bar zhing / drag po'i tshul du yod de/ zhags pa 'dzin pa sha stag go/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ bdun pa'i grangs dang / ming bstan pa ste/ gzi brjid mchog dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /gang de dag gi ming shes pa dang / rus shes pa de la ni zhes bya ba ni/ srin mo bdun
<p>266b.7</p>gyi ming dang / rus ni rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis shes par 'gyur te/ de rnams kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da'o/ /de dag srung bar byed ces bya ba la sogs pa ni rig sngags kyi stobs kyis/ nor dang / 'bru dang / phyugs rnams kyang 'phel te/ de bzhin du bu rnams kyang yin
<p>267a</p>
<p>267a.1</p>no/ /nad med cing 'byung po rnams kyi 'tshe ba yang mi 'byung ngo / /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa'o/ /srin mo chen mo nag mo zhes bya ba ni/ gzi brjid che zhing stobs che ba ste/ ri rab kyi rtse mo yang sgul nus pa ste/ 
<p>267a.2</p>de'i dbyibs dang / kha dog la sogs pa ni/ ming dang mthun te/ phyag mtshan ni/ gri gug dang / thod pa bsnams shing ral pa ring po gcig tu 'khyil pa yod de/ mi srun zhing sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o/ /bu stong yod pa rgya mtsho'i 'gram na gnas pa zhes bya ba ni/ ma
<p>267a.3</p>bzhin du bu rnams kyang yin te/ sems can la 'tshe bar byed cing zas 'tshol bar byed pa ste/ lang ka'i lho phyogs na rgya mtsho'i 'gram na tshal cig na gnas pa'o/ /mtshan gcig gis dpag tshad brgyad khrir phyin pa cig yod do zhes bya ba ni/ sha dang / khrag yod pa'i sar
<p>267a.4</p>gnas kyang tshor nas/ bslangs nas khyer nus pa ste/ de bzhin du sha dang / khrag gi phyir sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o/ /sha khrag 'thung zhing srog 'phrog pa'o/ /gang de'i ming shes pa dang / rus shes pa de la ni zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
<p>267a.5</p>gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'i gzi brjid kyis/ ming dang rus shes par 'gyur te/ de'i gzi brjid kyis kyang / de rnams kyis gnod mi nus shing / 'thab rtsod yod na nam yang rgyal bar byed cing grogs kyang byed pa'o/ /de srung bar byed ces bya ba la sogs pa ni/ rig
<p>267a.6</p>sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ 'tshe bar mi nus shing snying rje dang ldan te/ gang gi yang sdug bsngal yang 'bral zhing bde bar byed pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dang yang du bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /srin mo chen po lnga zhes bya ba ni/ stobs dang ldan zhing gzi
<p>267a.7</p>brjid che ste/ kha dog dang ldan zhing grags pa che ba/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing snying rje che ba ste/ skad cig mas 'dzam bu'i gling du/ sems can gyi don la bskor nus pa'o/ /gnod sbyin 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun dang lhan cig 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams srung zhing skyob pa yod de
<p>267b</p>
<p>267b.1</p>zhes bya ba ni/ rnam thos sras kyi chos rnams yin te/ de rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams la srung ba dang / skyob par byed de/ sems can gyi don la gnas shing / gzhan sdig pa mi dge ba'i las la mi 'jug cing / sems can gyi don 'ba' zhig la gnas pa'o/ /de dag
<p>267b.2</p>kyang gang zhe na zhes bya ba ni/ gtso bor gyur pa lnga yin te/ de dag gi kha dog dang / dbyibs ni/ kha dog legs shing 'dzum bstan pa ste/ rtag tu zhi bar gnas pa'o/ /de'i sku mdog ni/ ser po dang / dkar po dang / sngo bsangs dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu'o/ /phyag
<p>267b.3</p>mtshan ni/ 'khor lo dang / dung dang / dgra sta dang / rtse gsum dang / ral gri dang / zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ lnga po 'di dag la sogs pa thams cad de bzhin yin te/ rtag tu myos dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyi jo bo ni
<p>267b.4</p>de rnams yin no/ /gang de dag gi ming shes pa dang / rus shes pa de la ni zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ ming dang / rus kyang shes te/ rig sngags kyi mthus/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da'o/ /de dag srung bar byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ 
<p>267b.5</p>sems can de yang bde bar gnas te/ nad med cing / de rnams kyis rtag tu skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na zhes bya ba ni gzhan bzhin du lo mi rtag pa ma yin te/ de la bcol bar 'gyur na tshe ring zhing nad med de/ gzhan rnams kyis kyang mchod par 'os pa'o/ /bdag gi ming 'di zhes
<p>267b.6</p>bya ba'i phyir srin mo lnga po gnod sbyin 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun dang bcas pa de dag la gsol lo zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag dang / sems can thams cad 'di la bcol bar byas na/ gang yang sdug bsngal dang bral zhing bde bar gnas so/ /gsol ba 'debs so zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin
<p>267b.7</p>du sems can rnams kyis kyang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma dang / srin mo de dag dang gnod sbyin de rnams la gus par byas shing mchod par bya'o/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas/ ming 'di zhes
<p>268a</p>
<p>268a.1</p>bya ba ni/ 'das pa ni mar me mdzad la sogs pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa la sogs pa rnams yin te/ da ltar bzhugs pa ni shAkya thub pas rig sngags kyi bka' 'di gsungs shing / sems can gang zag rnams la srung zhing skyob pa'o/ /bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya
<p>268a.2</p>ba la sogs pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ 'khor ba bcom zhing bde ba la gnas te/ yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi lam la 'god pa'o/ /rig sngags 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs yin te/ mtshon pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so/ /mtshon byed ni
<p>268a.3</p>rig sngags kyi rgyal mo nyid do/ /phung po ni 'du shes kyi phung po/ khams ni me'i khams/ skye mched ni ro/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ sku mdog dmar mo/ zhal g.yas dkar ba g.yon
<p>268a.4</p>mthing ga /phyag g.yas pa gsum na bsnams pa ni/ ral gri dang / pad+ma dang / dung bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon pa gsum na zhags pa dang / lcags kyu dang / rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /zhabs g.yas brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum pa/ pad+ma'i steng na zla ba'i gdan nyi ma'i 'od
<p>268a.5</p>dang bcas shing cung zad khro bo'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi tshig ni 'di lta ste/ bi mu ku te/ bi mu ku ta/ ba te la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang sems can gyi don la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal
<p>268a.6</p>mo gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma 'dis zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ ye shes kyi rang bzhin te/ rdo rje lta bus khyab cing / srung ba dang / skyob pa yang yin no/ /'di lta bu'i rig sngags kyis kyang phyogs mtshams thams cad du khyab pa'o/ /gang la srung
<p>268a.7</p>ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams mnyam pa nyid du lta zhing srung ba'o/ /sba ba byas pa dang zhes bya ba ni gsang sngags mchog tu gsang ba ste/ 'jig rten khams kyi sems can thams cad gsang bzhin du srung ste/ sems can thams cad kyang gzhan gyis mi tshor
<p>268b</p>
<p>268b.1</p>zhing / sangs rgyas pa'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa byas pa dang / yongs su gzung ba byas pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ ngan song gsum nas mtho ris su btang ste/ ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal las bskyab pa'i phyir na/ bskyab pa zhes bya ste/ mtho ris su btang nas bzung ba'o/ /zhi ba dang
<p>268b.2</p>bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ chos 'di'i nyams myong gis zhi ba ste/ ji ltar zla ba bzhin du sems can rnams zhi bar bya ste/ chos 'di'i don rtogs pas sems can lus ngag zhi ba'o/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams bde bar gnas pa'o/ /chad pa
<p>268b.3</p>bzlog par byas pa de la ni zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten 'di'i chad pa dang / bdud bzhi rnams kyi chad pa ste/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid 'dis gang gi chad pa yang 'ong bar mi nus so/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
<p>268b.4</p>khams kyi gzugs kyi khams dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang bcas pa rnams kyi 'byung po rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su skad cig mas rgyu ba stong phrag brgya brgyad cu phrag nyi shu rtsa drug /de'i g.yog dang bcas pa yang de bzhin te/ de dag kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
<p>268b.5</p>rten gyi khams su rgyu ba'o/ /glags lta ba dang / glags tshol ba rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams la bar chod nas/ dge ba byed pa yang mi byed pa'i glags dang / mi 'jigs pa yod pa 'jigs par byas te/ phyug po de yang ltogs por btang ba/ mi na ba na ba'i
<p>268b.6</p>glags dang / dga' ba mi dga' bar byed pa'i glags dang / mthun pa rnams bar du bcad nas so sor byas te sdom pa srung ba mi srung bar byed pa'i sems dang ldan par byed pa/ gti mug la sogs pa'i 'dod pa rnams khong du zhugs shing / sred pa dang / 'dod chags la dga' zhing / 
<p>268b.7</p>zhe sdang la gnas te/ 'thab rtsod la dga' bar byed pa'i glags dang / tshe ring ba thung bar byas te/ dge ba byed pa la rtag tu bar chod byed pa rnams 'di yin te/ klan ka rko ba dang / glags tshol bas kyang glags mi rnyed de/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis glags tshol ba'i skabs kyang
<p>269a</p>
<p>269a.1</p>mi rnyed pa'o/ /yang na glags tshol ba rnams kyis rnyed pa'am/ bgegs kyi rigs lta bu'am/ pha'am/ ma'am/ sring mo'am/ bu'am/ nye ba la sogs par skyes nas glags tshol te/ de'i glags kyis kyang mi tshugs so/ /glags rnyed
<p>269a.2</p>pa'am klan ka rnyed pa'i sems can gang nas kyang med la zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i ngo bo nyid rtogs na/ glags mi rnyed do zhes bya ba'o/ /ngo bo nyid gang zhe na/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med cing bsod nams kyi
<p>269a.3</p>tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par bsgoms te/ a las gnas shing ngo bo nyid bral ba'o/ /mi'i 'jig rten gyi khams sgyu ma lta bur bsgoms te/ de bzhin du mas khyab pa'o/ /tra sprul sku ste sems can gyi don la gnas pa'o/ /de lta bur sems kyis rtogs na
<p>269a.4</p>glags kyang ga la rnyed de/ rnyed par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /ngas yang dag par ma mthong ste/ de ni gnas med do zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags lta bu 'di rtogs na de rnams kyis glags kyang mi rnyed cing / gnod pa gang yang skyel ba med de/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis de rnams kyis de gang
<p>269a.5</p>yang ma grub pa'o/ /yang na de rnams kyi gzi brjid 'phrog pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i 'byung po rnams kyi mtshan nyid bshad pa'i gnas skabs te bzhi pa'o// //las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni/ sngon bsags pa'i
<p>269a.6</p>las dang / sngon du mtshams med pa lnga byas na/ sngon du bshags dgos te/ sngon du ma bshags par gyur na/ las kyi rnam par smin pa de yang shing tog bzhin du smin par 'gyur ro/ /smin pa'i 'bras bu ni gang zhe na/ khyi dung dkar po bzhin du bram ze'i rigs su skyes nas kyang nga rgyal chen
<p>269a.7</p>po'i las kyi rnam par smin pas byol song gi nang na khyi dung dkar por skye ba'o/ /mchod sbyin byas pa'i phyir na/ 'bras kyi thug pa 'khar sder du blugs nas za zhing / nga rgyal che zhing khri la bsdad pa'o/ /dung gi mdog tu gyur pa ni sngon bram ze lus bsrungs shing / khrims bsrungs pa'i
<p>269b</p>
<p>269b.1</p>phyir ro/ /'di'i nges tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro chos gos dang sham thabs bsnams/ lhung bzed bsnams te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs nas thar chags su mnyan yod du bsod snyoms bzhes te/ tau de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne
<p>269b.2</p>tso'i khyim gal ba der gshegs so/ /de'i tshe tau de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso'i khyim na ras go ni ka bting ba'i khri'i steng na/ khyi dung zhes bya ba 'dug ste/ 'khar gzhong rdo ba'i khar blangs pa la 'bras chan dang / sha bsres pa'i khrud ma 'thung ba las/ khyi dung gis bcom ldan 'das sgo drung
<p>269b.3</p>na bzhugs pa mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang 'a 'u zhes zugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyi dung la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khyi dung khyod kye zhes bya ba las/ 'a 'u zhes zugs par gyur na/ des kyang ma dul lam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / khyi dung khros
<p>269b.4</p>'khrugs tshig pa zos te/ yi ma rangs nas/ ras go ni ka bting ba'i khri las babs te/ khri'i 'og na stor khung gi shing gi wa la 'dug go/ /de'i tshe tau de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso bya ba zhig gis phyi rol du byung ba las/ de nas tau de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso slar log pa
<p>269b.5</p>dang / tau de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tsos/ khyi dung 'og na stor khung gi shing gi wa la 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang nang mi la smras pa/ khyed kyis khyi dung 'di la ci zhig smras/ jo bo bdag cag gis kyang / khyi dung la ci yang ma smras so/ /de ltar lags mod kyi dge sbyong gau
<p>269b.6</p>ta ma byon par gyur te/ khyi dung gis dge sbyong gau ta ma sgo drung na bzhugs par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'a 'u zhes zugs pa dang / dge sbyong gau ta mas/ de la 'di ces bka' stsal to/ /khyi dung khyod kye zhes bya ba las/ 'a 'u zhes zugs par gyur na/ des kyang ma dul lam/ de skad ces
<p>269b.7</p>bka' stsal pa dang / khyi dung khros 'khrugs tshig pa zos te/ yi ma rangs nas ras go ni ka bting ba'i khri las babs te/ khri'i 'og na/ stor khung gi shing gi wa la 'dug go/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u bu ne tso khros 'khrugs tshig pa zos te/ yi ma rangs nas/ mnyan yod
<p>270a</p>
<p>270a.1</p>nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor gyi mdun na chos ston cing bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tau de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso rgyang
<p>270a.2</p>ring po nas 'ong ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis tau de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa de lta lags so/ /gal te tau de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso 'di 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na
<p>270a.3</p>ni/ lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu/ dper na mda' ste'u ka ma 'phangs pa bzhin du/ ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ltar 'di nga la sems rab tu khros pa'i phyir ro/ /sems rab tu khros pa'i rgyus/ de ltar na 'di nas
<p>270a.4</p>sems can kha cig lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'di na gang zag kha cig ni/ /rab tu sems khros gyur gzigs nas/ /ston pa dge
<p>270a.5</p>slong tshogs rnams la/ /don de nyid ni lung bstan to/ /kye ma gso ba'i ma 'di ni/ /da ni 'chi ba'i dus byed na/ /de yi sems ni khros pa'i phyir/ /sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye/ /de bzhin gshegs la sems khros pa/ /de yi rgyus ni sems can rnams/ /dper na mda'
<p>270a.6</p>ni 'phangs pa bzhin/ /de ltar ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de nas tau de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bder song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu mngon du kun dga' bar bya ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i gtam/ rnam pa
<p>270a.7</p>mang por byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /tau de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gau ta ma khyod bdag gi khyim du byon tam/ bram ze'i bu phyin to/ /gau ta ma khyod kyis bdag gi khyi dung la ci zhig ma gsungs sam/ 
<p>270b</p>
<p>270b.1</p>bram ze'i khye'u nga 'dir snga dro chos gos dang sham thabs bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te/ mthar gyis mnyan yod du bsod snyoms blangs nas/ khyod kyi khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin pa nas/ sgo drung na 'dug pa dang / de'i tshe khyi dung ras
<p>270b.2</p>go ni ka bting ba'i khri'i steng na 'dug cing / 'khar gzhong rdo ba'i khar blangs pa la 'bras chan dang / sha bsres pa'i khrud ma 'thung ba las khyi dung gi nga sgo drung na 'dug pa mthong ste mthong nas kyang zugs pa dang / ngas de la smras pa dang / khyi dung khyod kyi zhes bya ba las 'a 'u zhes zugs par
<p>270b.3</p>gyur na/ des kyang ma dul lam zhes de skad smras pa dang / khyi dung khros 'khrugs tshig pa zos te/ yi ma rangs nas/ ras go ni ka bting ba'i khri las babs te/ khri'i 'og tu stor khung gi shing gi wa la 'dug go/ /gau ta ma khyod kyis khyi dung tshe snga ma la bdag gi cir mchi mkhyen
<p>270b.4</p>tam/ bram ze'i khye'u kha rog 'dug la nga la don 'di ma 'dri shig /khyod kun du gnod sems su 'gyur ba dang / mi bzod pa dang / sems mi bde bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo / /lan gnyis lan gsum du tau de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tsos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
<p>270b.5</p>to/ /gau ta ma khyod kyis khyi dung tshe snga ma la bdag gi cir mchis mkhyen tam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lan gnyis lan gsum du/ tau de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bram ze'i khye'u kha rog la/ nga la don 'di ma dri shig /khyod kun du gnod
<p>270b.6</p>sems su 'gyur ba dang / mi bzod pa dang / sems mi bde bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo / /bram ze'i khye'u khyod lan gsum gyi bar du don 'di la nges par ma mthong bas de'i phyir bram ze'i khye'u legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyi pha tau de'i gang
<p>270b.7</p>yin pa de lus zhig nas dman pa'i khyi'i skye gnas su skyes so/ /kye gau ta ma bdag gi pha tau de'i ni/ mchod sbyin bgyis pa/ sbyin sreg bgyis pa mchod sdong sgreng ba lags na/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar 'gyur/ de ni lus zhig nas nges par tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bzang por skye bar 'gyur
<p>271a</p>
<p>271a.1</p>ro/ /bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyi pha tau de'i ni/ nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal de nyid kyis dman pa khyi'i skye gnas su skyes so/ /bram ze'i khye'u gal te/ ngas smras pa yid mi ches na/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod de'i phyir rang gi khyim du song la phyin pa dang / khyi dung la 'di skad du/ gal te khyi dung
<p>271a.2</p>khyod tshe snga ma la nga yi pha tau de'ir gyur pa lta na/ ras go ni ka bting ba'i khri la 'dug shig ces smros shig /khri la 'dug pa dang / tshig 'di skad du gal te khyi dung khyod/ tshe snga ma la nga'i pha tau de 'ir gyur pa lta na/ 'khar gzhong rdo ba'i khar blangs pa la/ 'bras chan dang / sha bsres pa'i khrud
<p>271a.3</p>ma 'thungs shig ces smros shig /'thungs nas de la tshig 'di skad du gal te khyi dung khyod tshe snga ma la nga'i pha tau de 'ir gyur pa lta na/ khyod 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe bdag dbang ba gang yod pa nga la ma bstan pa de ston cig ces smros shig dang / ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tau de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne
<p>271a.4</p>tsos/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa bzung ste/ kun chub par byas nas/ rang gi khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / khyi dung la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gal te khyi dung khyod tshe snga ma la nga'i pha tau de'ir gyur pa lta na ras go ni ka bting ba'i khri la 'ang 'dug cig /khri la 'dug nas
<p>271a.5</p>de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gal te khyi dung khyod tshe snga ma la nga'i pha tau de'ir gyur pa lta na/ 'khar gzhong rdo ba'i khar blangs pa la/ 'bras chan dang / sha bsres pa'i khrud ma 'thungs shig /'thungs nas de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gal te khyi dung khyod tshe snga ma la nga'i pha tau de'ir gyur pa
<p>271a.6</p>lta na/ khyod 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ bdag dbang ba gang yod pa nga la ma bstan pa de ston cig /de nas khyi dung ras go ni ka bting ba'i khri las babs te/ gnas khyim rnying pa zhig yod pa ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / khri'i rkang pa bzhi'i gnas su rkang lag gi sder mos brus
<p>271a.7</p>so/ /dbus ni snas mnam mo/ /to de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tsos/ de nas gser dngul brdung ma dang / sil lcags zangs bzhi dang / dbus na gser gyi 'khar ba dang ril ba rnyed do/ /de nas tau de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tsos gser de sbas nas/ dga' mgu zhing rab tu dga'
<p>271b</p>
<p>271b.1</p>ste/ rangs nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ mnyan yod nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun na chos ston cing bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tau de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tsos rgyang ring
<p>271b.2</p>po nas 'ong ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyi tau de'i bu/ bram ze'i khye'u ne tso rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa de ltar lags so/ /gal te tau de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso de'i tshe 'chi ba'i dus byas par
<p>271b.3</p>gyur na ni/ dper na mda' ste'u ka ma 'phangs pa bzhin du bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du/ lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ltar de nga la sems dad par byas pa'i phyir ro/ /dge slong dag sems dad pa'i rgyus de ltar 'di ni sems can kha cig /lus zhig
<p>271b.4</p>nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'di na gang zag kha cig ni/ /rab tu sems dad gyur gzigs nas/ /ston pas dge slong tshogs rnams la/ /don de nyid ni lung
<p>271b.5</p>bstan to/ /kye ma gso ba mi 'di ni/ da ni 'chi ba'i dus byed na/ de yi sems ni dad pa'i phyir/ /lha rnams nang du skye bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs la sems dad pa/ /de yi rgyus ni sems can rnams/ /dper na mda' ni 'phangs pa bzhin/ /de ltar bzang 'gror 'gro bar
<p>271b.6</p>'gyur/ /de nas tau de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu mngon du kun dga' bar bya ba dang / yang dag par dga' ba'i gtam rnam pa mang po byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /
<p>271b.7</p>tau de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bram ze'i khye'u ci ngas ji ltar lung bstan pa de bzhin du gyur tam kye gau ta ma mad de ji ltar gau ta ma khyod kyis/ khyi dung lung bstan pa de de bzhin no/ /slob dpon las
<p>272a</p>
<p>272a.1</p>kyi rdo rjes kyang gsungs pa/ rnam par smin pa'i las de yang / /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las/ /ngan song dang ni mtho ris dang / /'jig rten rang gi spyod pa ste/ /dper na pad+ma chu skyes pa/ /nags la me yi 'jigs pa na/ /de bor sdong bu chu las skyes/ /der
<p>272a.2</p>skyes rgyun gyi lhags pas tshig /mi 'gul las kyi rnam smin ni/ /gang gis kyang ni thub mi 'gyur/ /de yang gsungs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i las kyi rnam par smin pa bshad pa'i gnas skabs te lnga pa'o// //de nas zhes bya
<p>272a.3</p>ba ni las kyi rnam par smin pa bshad pa'i de nas so/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la sogs pa ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs
<p>272a.4</p>pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa la sogs pa yin te/ de yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams kyis gsung ngo / /da ltar yod pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ste/ sems can gyi don la rig sngags 'di bka' stsal pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
<p>272a.5</p>gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa 'di zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'dis kyang sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byed cing mi ma yin gyis 'tshe bar yang mi nus te/ mtho ris kyi lam bstan zhing yang dag pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o/ /mi 'am mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba la
<p>272a.6</p>sogs pa ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis srung bar byed de/ de rnams kyang gzi brjid che ba/ stobs che ba/ kha dog dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba ste/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi 'thab rtsod la yang rtsod par gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin du de rnams kyis kyang srung bar byed do/ /ming 'di
<p>272a.7</p>zhes bya ba bsrung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag dang / sems can thams cad la rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis gdon de rnams kyis snying rje che zhing srung bar 'gyur ro/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ bde bar gnas shing nad thams cad 'joms te/ zhi ba
<p>272b</p>
<p>272b.1</p>dang / rgyas pa'i las la 'grub cing / phun sum tshogs shing rigs kyang byed par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma 'dis zhes bya ba ni/ ngan sems yod pa rnams kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ dge ba'i sems dang ldan zhing / sems
<p>272b.2</p>can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa'o/ /sdang bar sems pa can thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni/ rig sngags 'di'i stobs kyis sdang ba'i ming zhes bya ba yang med de/ de rnams kyang snying rje skye zhing sems can la gnod par mi byed pa'o/ /myos par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni gal te sdang ba'i
<p>272b.3</p>sems dang / gnod pa'i sems dang / sems can la 'tshe bar byed pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur na/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis de rnams kyi sems gtor zhing rang sems mi gnas shing myos par 'gyur ro/ /rab tu myos par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o/ /rengs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyi
<p>272b.4</p>sngags btang ba dang / rang gi ma rungs par byed pa rnams rengs par byed pa'o/ /gzhan gyi sngags zlog par byed pa ni/ ling+ga bris la ni ra gats+tsha ta la sogs pa'i sngags bris la mnan par bya'o/ /gzhan ma rungs pa 'dul bar yang de bzhin no/ /ling+ga'i bye brag gis dbye bar bya'o/ /
<p>272b.5</p>rmugs pa dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / sems dang / lce gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ snga ma bzhin byas te/ tha ma la bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta la sogs pas bskor zhing lam rgya gram la mnan par bya ste/ gzhan gyi sbod gtong dang / sngags dang / ro langs dang / dug
<p>272b.6</p>dang / dug sbyar ma dang / gzhan gyi bsam pa ngan pa btang ba thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i rig pa'i dam pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ gzhan rnams kyis kyang thub par mi
<p>272b.7</p>'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang du yang thar bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten 'di'i sdug bsngal dang / 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyang de bzhin te/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dang / 'khor ba nas kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/ /kye ma bram ze mya ngan 'das/ /'jig rten dag na srid las rgal/ /
<p>273a</p>
<p>273a.1</p>zhes bya ba ni/ tshangs pa khyod kyis kyang zab mo'i don 'di la gnas pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa bor zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams bor te/ de bzhin du ma rig pa la sogs pa'i 'du byed rnams spangs te/ 
<p>273a.2</p>'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho 'dra ba bsgral nas/ mya ngan las 'das te/ de bas na srid las rgal zhes bya'o/ /khon dang 'jigs pa kun spangs pa/ ring mo zhig nas bzod mthong ngo / /zhes bya ba ni/ dge ba dang sdig pa rnams kyis mi gos te/ bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa dang / 
<p>273a.3</p>'khor bar ltung ba'i 'jigs pa dang / gzhan yang 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te/ 'khor ba'i grong khyer zhig nas yang dag pa'i ye shes mthong ngo / /de'i ngo bo gang zhe na/ srid pa ma yin 'das pa de bzhin no/ /da ltar yod pa la de bzhin ma yin te/ sdun nam phyi'am dbus ma yin te/ de bzhin yang dag
<p>273a.4</p>don de yin/ /de bas na ring mo zhig nas bzod mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni/ /bzod pa dka' thub mtshog ste bzod pa ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa mchog ces sangs rgyas gsungs/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad la bzod pa sgom zhing mnyam pa nyid du bsgom pa ste/ sdug bsngal bor
<p>273a.5</p>zhing / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / bag chags kyi sgrib pa dang / bor nas yang dag pa'i ye shes thob cing ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o/ /rab tu byung ba gzhan la gnod pa ni/ gzhan la 'tshe ba dge sbyong ma yin no/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ bla ma'am/ pha
<p>273a.6</p>ma'am/ gzhan yang de la sogs pa la 'tshe ba ni/ dge ba gang byas kyang thar bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang na mig dang ldan pa yis/ /btsal bar bya ba yod pa bzhin/ /zhes bya ba ni rang gis sngon nas mthong ste/ 'jig rten pas de mthong ste/ ma rig pa'i mun pas de yang ma
