<p>273a.7</p>mthong ba'o/ /mkhas pas 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'dir/ /sdig pa dag ni yongs su spang / /zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi mar me bltam ste/ 'khor ba'i mun pa bsal nas/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mthong ste/ de mthong ba'i dran pas na/ mkhas pas
<p>273b</p>
<p>273b.1</p>'khor ba spangs pa'o/ /da ltar byung dang 'das pa dang / /ma 'ongs sangs rgyas gang yin pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa'i 'od srungs nas sangs rgyas rabs bdun la sogs pa ste/ da ltar yod pa shAkya seng ge'o/ /ma 'ongs pa yang de bzhin du byams pa la sogs pa'o/ /thams cad
<p>273b.2</p>la yang bdag phyag 'tshal/ /de dag kun la skyabs su mchi/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de lta bu'i 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bdag dang sems can rnams kyis kyang sdig pa bshags pa'i phyir phyag 'tshal te/ 'jigs pa
<p>273b.3</p>thams cad sgrol ba'i phyir na skyabs su mchi'o/ /'jig rten dgra bcom bde gshegs la/ /zla ba skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten 'di'i sdug bsngal 'joms shing / mun pa mun nag bsal bar bya ste/ chos kyi nyams myong gi bdud rtsis/ sems
<p>273b.4</p>can rnams 'tsho bar byed pa ste/ thugs rje che zhing bdud rtsi snang ba rnams la skyabs su mchi'o/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten thugs brtse rnams/ /zla ba thar mdzod sgra gcan las/ /zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sprul pa'i skus khyab ste/ rig
<p>273b.5</p>sngags 'di'i chos nyid kyi nyams myong gis ma rig pa'i mun pa zla bas gsal ba bzhin du bsal te/ de yang chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa'o/ /sgra gcan zla ba mun sel ba/ /nam mkha' dag la 'od byed cing / /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten khams la grags pa dang
<p>273b.6</p>ldan pa zla ba yin te/ zla ba des kyang mun pa bsal zhing gsal bar byas so/ /de bzhin du rig sngags kyi chos kyi nyams myong gis ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal ste/ 'khor ba 'joms so zhes bya ba sgra gcan zhes bya'o/ /lam mer 'dug la dkar ba dang / /rnam par dag pa'i 'od
<p>273b.7</p>ldan pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ chos nyid gzhan gyis mi gos te/ gzhan gyis ma byas pa rang gis rang bsal te/ rnam par dag cing dngos po med de/ dngos pos kyang ngo bo nyid dang 'bral lo/ /de lta bu'i 'od kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams la khyab pa'o/ /bar snang dag la ma bzung bar/ /
<p>274a</p>
<p>274a.1</p>skye dgu'i sgron me myur du thong / /zhes bya ba ni/ sdig dang dge ba skye zhing mi bya ste/ gang yang dge ba dag la gnas pa ste/ de bzhin du byas par gyur na mtho ris myur du thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rings bzhin sgra gcan de/ /lus kyang rdul zhing skrag gyur la/ /zhes bya ba
<p>274a.2</p>ni sdig pa byed par 'gyur na dmyal ba'i mes ni skrag par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na sdig pa spang bar bya ste/ sdig pa'i ming yang mi bya'o/ /nad pa bzhin du brtad pa yin/ /zla ba rnam par gtong bar byed/ /ces bya ba ni/ dper na sgra gcan zin gyis zla ba 'dzin pa bzhin du/ ma rig
<p>274a.3</p>pa'i mun pas sems can 'dzin pa'o/ /zla ba sgra gcan gyis btang ba bzhin du/ rig sngags kyi chos kyi nyams myong / ma rig pa'i mun pas kyang btang ba'o/ /ci yi phyir na sgra gcan khyod/ /lus kyang rdul zhing skrag gyur la/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par smin pa'i las kyis skrag par 'gyur
<p>274a.4</p>te/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis kyang thar bar byed pa'o/ /nad pa bzhin du brtad pa yis/ /rings par zla ba gtong bar byed/ /ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid des/ zla ba sgra gcan zin gyis bzung ba gtang ba ste/ nad pa de yang sman bzang pos sos par byas te/ 
<p>274a.5</p>de bzhin du rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis sems can thams cad bde bar gnas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas tshigs bcad 'di brjod pas/ /gal te zla ba ma btang na/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sgra gcan zin gyis zla ba bzung ba bzhin du myur du ma btang na gza' de yang nyes par 'gyur ro/ /
<p>274a.6</p>de bzhin du ma rungs pa'i gdon rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das na mgo tshal pa tshal par 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi mgo ni tshal bdun 'gas/ /gson kyang bde bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang / mi dang / 'byung po la sogs pa rnams
<p>274a.7</p>kyang / rig sngags kyi dam tshig las 'das par gyur na/ nad rnams thams cad 'byung zhing 'chi ba'i dus su mgo tshal par 'gas te/ shi nas kyang dmyal ba mnar med du skye'o/ /rig sngags kyi dmod mo yin pas gang gis kyang mi phan par 'gyur ro/ /kye ma
<p>274b</p>
<p>274b.1</p>bde ba gzigs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba smad/ /ces bya ba ni/ smig rgyu dang / sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / chu bur dang / dbu ba dang / chu shing dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang brgyad do/ /de bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
<p>274b.2</p>kyang yin te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa yang de bzhin no/ /de kun yang yod par shes sam/ med par shes pa'ang ma yin te/ med pa yang ma yin/ gnyis ka yang ma yin no/ /sgyu ma tsam du gnas te/ de yang sems can gyi don
<p>274b.3</p>la gnas pa'o/ /de bas na sangs rgyas kyi chos smad du med pa ste/ skyon rnams kyis kyang mi gos pa'o/ /de dag gis ni tshigs su bcad pa/ brjod na sgra gcan zla ba gang / /zhes bya ba ni/ de lta bu'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyis ni/ sgra gcan zin gyis zla ba btang ba bzhin
<p>274b.4</p>du/ nad kyis kyang btang ba ste/ bden pa'i tshig 'dis kyang sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis/ 'jig rten du sems can brjed ngas pa med pa'i chos can 'byung ba ni zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyang brjed ngas
<p>274b.5</p>pa yin te/ dang po ma rig par byung / ma rig pa las 'du byed byung ste/ 'du byed kyis rnam par shes pa byung ngo / /rnam par shes pas ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyis skye mched drug /skye mched drug gis srid pa/ srid pas reg pa/ reg pas sred pa/ sred pas skye ba/ 
<p>274b.6</p>skye bas len pa/ len pas rga shi de ni 'jig rten gyi chos can brjed ngas pa ste/ de las de 'khor bar nyon mongs pa skye bar byed pa'o/ /brjed par mi 'gyur ba'i chos can ni/ ma rig pas rga shi 'gag pa'o/ /rga shis len pa 'gag go/ /len pas skye ba 'gag go/ /
<p>274b.7</p>skye bas sred pa 'gag go/ /sred pas reg pa 'gag go/ /reg pas srid pa 'gag go/ /srid pas skye mched drug 'gag go/ /skye mched drug gis ming dang gzugs 'gag go/ /ming dang gzugs kyis rnam par shes pa 'gag go/ /rnam par shes pas 'du byed 'gag go/ /
<p>275a</p>
<p>275a.1</p>'du byed kyis ma rig pa 'gag go/ /de 'gags pas na skye ba ste/ rig pa shar ba de ni brjed ngas pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes yang dag par smras pas smra ba ni tshig kyang mi mnga' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mig gi yang dag pa'i ye shes thob
<p>275a.2</p>cing / rig sngags 'di yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dus su yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rkyen med par nga mi smra ste/ sems can gyi don la rig sngags 'di yang dag par bstan pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni yang dag
<p>275a.3</p>par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas smras pa'o/ /gzhan yang tshangs par spyod pa la/ phan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni/ tshul khrims ma dag pa dag par byed pa dang /sdom pa med pa sdom pa la 'jug pa dang / bden pa'i tshig 'di dag gis sdom pa la gnas par 'gyur
<p>275a.4</p>ro/ /yang rig sngags 'dis sdom pa srung bar byed pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig gsung ba gang yin pa de dag dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'o/ /bden pa'i tshig bden pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yang dag
<p>275a.5</p>par gsungs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas yang dang yang du bka' stsal pa'o/ /gzhan yang tshig de dag gis bya ba gang byed pa'i don dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i tshig 'dis gang yang rung ste/ 'jig
<p>275a.6</p>rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyang 'grub pa'o/ /phan pa dang / bde ba yang 'dis byed par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'dis kyang / gang yang gang gi sdug bsngal yang 'dis 'joms par 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad mtho ris 'dren
<p>275a.7</p>pa la mthu che bar rigs pa'i dam pa'o/ /pad+ma'i rigs kyi rdo rje'i rigs ni/ mtshon pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bdag nyid do/ /phung po ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste/ khams ni nam mkha'i khams so/ /skye mched ni
<p>275b</p>
<p>275b.1</p>yid kyi skye mched do/ /de yang ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ sku mdog mthing ga /zhal g.yas dkar ba/ g.yon dmar ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas pa gsum
<p>275b.2</p>na/ rdo rje dang / ral gri dang 'khor lo'o/ /g.yon pa gsum na/ pad+ma dang / zhags pa dang / dgra ste/ zhags g.yas brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum pa/ pad+ma'i steng na/ zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa/ khro bo'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi tshig ni
<p>275b.3</p>gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ swa ti ma ti la sogs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i bden pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i gnas skabs te drug pa'o// //kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la yang bka' stsal
<p>275b.4</p>pa'o/ /sa bon gyi rtsa ba bcu dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa bon gyi rtsa ba bcu ni/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bcu'o/ /
<p>275b.5</p>de ni sa bon bcu zhes bya'o/ /sa bon gyi rtsa ba'i tshig bcu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa yod do zhes bya ba ni/ rim pa bzhin du sa bcu'i byang chub kyi lam yin te/ de yang rab tu dga' ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / 'od 'phro ba dang / shin tu sbyang dka'
<p>275b.6</p>ba dang / mngon du gyur pa dang / ring du song ba dang / mi g.yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin dang bcu'o/ /de bas na sa bon gyi rtsa ba'i tshig bcu zhes bya'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis smras pa'o/ /tshig de dag de bzhin
<p>275b.7</p>gshegs pas gsungs par 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i 'bras bu dang / sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnams ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma la brten zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
<p>276a</p>
<p>276a.1</p>gsungs pa'o/ /ston par 'gyur ba yang yod de zhes bya ba ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu thob cing / sa bcu dang / de'i lam gyis sa bcu gcig thob pa'o/ /de dag bstan pa 'di la zhugs pa'i mi rnams kyi khar brjod na zhes bya ba ni/ bstan pa ni rig sngags kyi
<p>276a.2</p>rgyal mo'i bstan pa ste/ de la zhugs par gyur na gang yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams kyang bran bzhin du las byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ 'di'i lam nas byang chub thob ste khams gsum gyi gtso bor 'gyur zhing / de rnams kyang dbang du
<p>276a.3</p>'dus par 'gyur ro/ /bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i tshig bden pa rnams la 'jig rten gyi ming gi mchog dang zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi sems kyang gzhan med de/ sa'i 'bras bu thob pa yang rang bzhin du gnas shing / rig sngags
<p>276a.4</p>nyid kyang logs na med do/ /de bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu yang yin te/ 'jig rten pa dang / sangs rgyas gnyis su med cing / gnyis su yang dbyer med do/ /de nas bden pa'i tshig dge sbyong rnams kyi nang na dge sbyong skyid de ba zhes bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>276a.5</p>dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la gtogs na bde ba chen po thob ste/ bde ba'i nang na yang dag par rdzogs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni 'jigs pa mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di'i lam sbyong zhing / de bzhin gshegs
<p>276a.6</p>pa'i yang dag pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ bdud bzhi rnams kyis mi thub cing dri ma thams cad dang 'bral ba'o/ /bag tsha ba mi mnga' ba ste zhes bya ba ni/ mnyam pa nyid bsgom zhing nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral zhing / yang dag pa'i ye shes thob pa'o/ /mi skrag mi 'bros pa 'jigs pa
<p>276a.7</p>med cing zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po yang med cing / ngo bo yang gang na gnas pa med do/ /de yang 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas te/ de bzhin du 'jigs pa spangs shing / sdig pa dang dge ba la yang mi gnas pa'o/ /'jigs par byed pa dang bral ba
<p>276b</p>
<p>276b.1</p>zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs pa ni sems yin te/ 'jigs par byed pa ni rnam par rtog pa'o/ /'jigs pa spangs pa ni rang gi sems kyi rtog pa yang dag pa'i ye shes yin te/ de yang sems kyi rang bzhin no/ /yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ bsams te bsam gyis mi
<p>276b.2</p>khyab pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab bsgom byas na/ /bsam pa'i 'bras bu de thob cing / /sems nyid kyis ni gang yang 'grub/ /'jigs pa dang 'jigs pa spang bar byed cing zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs pa ni sems kyi rang bzhin no/ /'jigs par byed pa ni ma rig pa'i rang
<p>276b.3</p>bzhin nyon mongs pa yin te/ spangs pa ni sems kyi rang bzhin rtogs shing / gnyug ma'i rang bzhin shes pa'o/ /skyi bung zhes byed pa med pa'o zhes yang dag par smra bas smra'o zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor ba la 'jigs pa'i bdud bzhi'i rang bzhin nyon mongs pa shas che
<p>276b.4</p>zhing / de la zhal ta byed par 'gyur ba ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo yin te/ de rnams 'joms shing yang nas yang du 'joms par byed pa dang / dus su yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin te zhes bya ba ni/ de yang bdud rnams ni dge ba byed pa'i dus su bar du gcod de/ 
<p>276b.5</p>de'i dus su ya mi nga bar byed pa ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'o/ /bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des ming 'di zhes bya ba la bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i bka' dang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i chos kyang ldan
<p>276b.6</p>pas/ gang zag dang / sems can thams cad 'jigs pa med cing bde ba ste/ yang dag pa'i byang chub thob pa'o/ /bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang zhes bya ba ni/ bde bar gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i bka'
<p>276b.7</p>dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'i chos kyi bden pas/ tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / tshul khrims med pa rnams tshul khrims thob ste/ skus gdul gsung gis 'dul te/ de 'dul ba'i phyir na brtul zhugs zhes bya'i/ dka'
<p>277a</p>
<p>277a.1</p>thub dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gang ci yang rung ba de dag gi nang na ni zhes bya ba ni/ bka' des kyang tshangs par mi spyod pa tshangs par spyod de/ sems can nyon mongs pa rnams la sdom par mi gnas pa sdom par gnas shing / rig sngags kyi bden pa
<p>277a.2</p>'dis kyang sems can thams cad bde bar gnas shing / sdig pa thams cad kyang spong bar byed pa'o/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims mchog /ces bya ba ste/ de bzhin du rig sngags kyi bden pa 'dis kyang 'phags pa'i tshul khrims mi thob pa thob
<p>277a.3</p>par byas te/ sdig pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs shing tshul khrims la gnas te/ sems can thams cad las 'phags pas na 'phags pa zhes bya'o/ /bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des ming 'di zhes bya ba la bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' dang / rig
<p>277a.4</p>sngags kyi bden pas/ gang zag dad pa can dang / sems can thams cad la tshe 'di la bkra shis shing phun sum tshogs shing phyi ma la yang de bzhin te/ phyin ci ma log pa'i rig sngags kyi phyag rgya thob cing / yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi lam la 'jug pa'o/ /gnas brtan
<p>277a.5</p>rgyal po'i bu thu bo dang 'dra bar rab tu byung nas ring du lon pa zhes bya ba ni/ gnas la dbang byas shing gzhan dge slong rnams la dbang byed de/ de bzhin du byas pa'i phyir na thu bo zhes bya'o/ /tshangs par spyod pa/ mngon par spyad pa rnams kyi mchog /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ zag
<p>277a.6</p>pa zad pa/ tshul khrims la gnas nas sems can gyi don byed pa/ skad cig mas kyang mngon par shes pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa sha stag go/ /dge slong kun shes kauN+Di n+ya'i dang zhes bya ba ni/ sngon shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpar skyes tsam na/ srin po kauN+Di n+ya lnga yod
<p>277a.7</p>do/ /de'i dus su yang chu med cing skom nas yod pa la byang chub sems dpa' des kyang tse chung gnyis gtar nas/ kauN+Di n+ya lnga la byin nas 'thung du bcug ste/ da ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi nyams myong gis khams gsum tsam yang kun du shes nas dge slong dgra bcom
<p>277b</p>
<p>277b.1</p>pa thob pa'o/ /'dod pa nyung ba sbyongs ba'i yon tan la gnas pa/ chog shes pa rnams kyi mchog 'od srungs chen po dang zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi don byas shing / snying rje chen po dang / byams pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa ste/ theg pa chung ngu'i sgo nas 'od srungs chen po yin te/ 
<p>277b.2</p>'dir dgra bcom pa thob cing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /shes rab che ba dang / spobs pa che ba rnams kyi mchog sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang zhes bya ba ni/ phyi'i rig pa sbyongs shing / blo dang ldan te nyon mongs pa bcom zhing nyan thos kyi gtso bor gyur cing / sems can gyi don
<p>277b.3</p>byas pa'o/ /ma'i ming nas kyang bos pa'i phyir na sha ra dwa ti'i bu zhes bya'o/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams kyi mchog /shA ri'i bu dang / rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / mthu che ba rnams kyi mchog /maud gal gyi bu chen po dang zhes bya ba ni ri rab re re la rkang pa gzhag cing / 
<p>277b.4</p>bdun bdun la 'god nus te/ de bzhin du yang mthu dang ldan pa/ bram ze'i rigs su skyes nas/ chos kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pa'o/ /de yang ma'i ming nas btags pa'o/ /lha'i mig dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog ma 'gags pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ mthong ba la ni ma 'gags pa
<p>277b.5</p>yin te/ khams gsum gyi bya ba thams cad dus gcig tu mthong ba'o/ /mthong ba la 'gag pa med pa'i phyir na ma 'gags pa'o/ /mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog kun dga' bo dang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ma lus par thos te/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i
<p>277b.6</p>chos la sogs pa ni kun dga' bo la gtad pa'o/ /sems can thams cad dga' ba'i phyir ni kun dga' bo zhes bya'o/ /'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog nye ba 'khor dang zhes bya ba ni/ sku dang gsung dang thugs thul bas 'dul ba 'dzin pa ste/ de 'dul ba'i phyir na nye ba
<p>277b.7</p>'khor zhes bya ba'o/ /chos smra ba rnams kyi mchog byams pa'i bu gang po dang zhes bya ba ni/ sems can la mi 'dzin ngag nas smra ba thogs pa med de/ ma'i ming nas bos pa'i phyir na byams ma'i bu gang po zhes pa'o/ /bslab pa la gus pa rnams kyi mchog sgra gcan zin pa dang
<p>278a</p>
<p>278a.1</p>zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i gdon la sogs pa bcom pa dang dgra bcom pa thob ste/ nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su skyes pa'i phyir sgra gcan zin zhes bya'o/ /mal cha dang stan bsko ba rnams kyi mchog gyad nor bu dang zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das dang dgra bcom pa rnams
<p>278a.2</p>la gus par byas na tshogs sogs par bya'o/ /seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa rnams kyi mchog ba ra d+h+wa dza bsod snyoms len dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs pa med cing khams gsum tsam la yang sgra sgrogs te/ sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod snyoms blangs pas 'phel ba'i phyir na/ 
<p>278a.3</p>bsod snyoms len zhes bya'o/ /khyim pa dad pa skyed pa rnams kyi mchog nag po 'char ka dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig pa rnams rig par 'jug ste/ khams gsum gyi sems can rnams ma lus par/ ma dad pa dad par byed pa'i phyir na nag po 'char ka zhes bya'o/ /lha dang mis mchod
<p>278a.4</p>pa rnams kyi mchog legs mthong bden pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ de'i rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang khams gsum tsam yang dag par bya ste/ dad pa des kyang yang dag par mchod par 'os pa/ de rnams kyis mchod pa'i phyir na legs mthong gi bden pa zhes bya'o/ /bden pa'i tshig des ming
<p>278a.5</p>'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i bka' dang / rig sngags kyi bden pa dang / nyan thos dgra bcom pa rnams kyi yon tan gyi nges tshig dang / gang zag dang / sems can thams cad bde bar gnas shing / nad
<p>278a.6</p>thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ de rnams kyi bden pa dang / sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral zhing / rig sngags kyi phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /rgyal po'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gis de rnams
<p>278a.7</p>kyi 'jigs pa med cing / bde ba la gnas te kun kyang bde ba'o/ /bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis sems can zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya seng ge thugs rje can gyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'i
<p>278b</p>
<p>278b.1</p>bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / nyan thos rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul rnams kyis bde legs su 'gyur ro/ /rkang pa med pa'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rigs mi gcig pa rnams la bden pa nges bde bar byas shing / 
<p>278b.2</p>sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral te/ sems can de rnams kyang byang chub kyi lam la 'god pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchog ces bya ste zhes bya ba ni/ bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs nas 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rabs bdun la
<p>278b.3</p>sogs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa la sogs pa yang de bzhin no/ /da ltar yod pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas kyang / rig sngags kyi phyag rgyas btab cing bden pa bka' stsal ba'o/ /bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des ming 'di zhes bya ba bsrung bar bya'o/ /
<p>278b.4</p>sangs rgyas de rnams kyi bden pa dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i chos kyi bden pa dang / bden pa de dag gis kyang sems can rnams la bde bar byas te/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'bral zhing / yang dag pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang
<p>278b.5</p>zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyang bde ba la bkod de/ nam skye ba'i dus su phun sum tshogs par skye chos 'di dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin
<p>278b.6</p>pa thugs rje che zhing sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa/ de rnams kyi yang gang dang gang 'dod pa 'grub pa'o/ /'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos ji snyed yod pa de dag gang gi nang na/ 'dod chags dang bral ba mchog ces bya ste zhes bya ba ni/ 'du byed kyis ma rig
<p>278b.7</p>pa bkag ste/ ma rig pas rga shi la sogs pa bkag nas/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la sogs pa'i ming yang med de/ des na nyon mongs pa la sogs pa dang bral zhing / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / bag chags kyi sgrib pas ma gos pa'o/ /bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig
<p>279a</p>
<p>279a.1</p>des ming 'di zhes bya ba bsrung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ de lta bu'i rig sngags dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yin te/ bden pa ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka'o/ /bden pa'i tshig ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo nyid do/ /gang zag dang
<p>279a.2</p>sems can rnams la rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bden pa'i tshig gis yang dag par bsrung bar byas pa'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ bde ba la gnas shing sems da lta dang / tshe phyi ma rnams kyang sdug bsngal dang bral zhing / yang dag
<p>279a.3</p>pa'i byang chub thob pa'o/ /bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bden pa'i tshig gis gang yang 'grub cing / rig sngags kyi ngo bo thob pa'o/ /tshogs sam/ 'dus pa'am/ mar po'am/ 'khor ji snyed
<p>279a.4</p>cig yod pa de dag gi nang na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mchog ces bya ste zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dgra bcom pa dang / lha dang bram ze dang / rgyal po la sogs pa'i mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
<p>279a.5</p>tshogs pa'i bden pas kyang bde bar gnas pa'o/ /bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bden pa'i tshig smras pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' tshogs 'dus pa dang / de'i bden pas bde legs
<p>279a.6</p>shing bkra shis te/ dgra'i tshogs rnams kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal khams dang / yul 'khor ram zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ bden pa'i tshig de dag gis kyang yul 'khor rnams la srung ste/ mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / nang du ma rungs ba 'dre gdon
<p>279a.7</p>zhugs pa dang / de la sogs pa nad thams cad 'byung ba de med cing brlag par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du zhing la gnod pa dang / sad dang / ser ba dang / 'bru dang / 'brum bu dang / btsa' dang / ne tso dang / ri bong dang / ri dgas dang / byi ba la sogs pa zhing la
<p>279b</p>
<p>279b.1</p>gnod pa dang sems can rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs shing sems can rnams la bde bar byas pa'o/ /nad pa 'di la bsrung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni cho ga dang / bsrung ba gnyis kyis bsrung ste/ srung ba ni gang zhe na/ srung ba'i 'khor lo dang / dkyil 'khor gyi chogs bsrung ba'o/ /bdag
<p>279b.2</p>gis 'dir bshad pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po sa gzhi la/ /ba yi rnams lngas byugs pa ste/ /chu dang lcib sar bsres la/ /lci ba dang ni sngags kyis ni/ /maN+Dal legs par byugs par bya/ /tshon ni sna tshogs legs bris la/ /dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid du bri/ /
<p>279b.3</p>gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bzhi/ /dra ba phyed kyis mdzes pa la/ /mu tig phreng bcas rnam par brgyan/ /rin chen lnga yi gzhal yas khang / /mdzes pa de ni mkhas pas bri/ /dang po nam mkha' rlung chags pa/ /me dang chu dang sa chags te/ /de bzhin ri rab rtse mo la/ /pad+ma'i
<p>279b.4</p>steng du rgya gram ste/ /'og dang steng dang logs rnams su/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i gur du bsam/ /de phyir rdo rje'i ra ba la/ /rlung dang me sa'i yul du 'khyam/ /phyi rgya kho ra khor yug dang / /de rtsar mda' yi dra ba 'bar/ /de phyir 'og dang steng dag dang / /phyogs bzhi
<p>279b.5</p>mtshams su me yis bskor/ /'og ni rdo rje'i sa gzhi ste/ /de steng rdo rje bla res brgyan/ /de 'og rdo rje sa gzhi la/ /gzhal yas khang gi dbus su shes/ /dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma ste/ /phyir ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad do/ /de phyir lha snam zlum po ste/ /gza' dang
<p>279b.6</p>rgyu skar gnas pa'o/ /phyi rol lha snam gru bzhi la/ /phyogs skyong yang ni der gnas so/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang ni/ /byang gi sgo bzhi dang po la/ /rgyal po bzhi yang der bzhugs so/ /dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma la/ /ye shes lha mo lnga yang bzhugs/ /mtshams
<p>279b.7</p>bzhi pad+ma stong pa la/ /mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi gnas so/ /dbus su lte ba zla ba'i gdan/ /gsang sngags 'dzin ma der bzhugs so/ /dkyil 'khor gyi bya thabs so/ /rig sngags bum pa lnga po ste/ /mtshan ma ldan zhing nag po med/ /rtsa ba yangs pa mchu
<p>280a</p>
<p>280a.1</p>'phyang ba/ /dbyibs ni legs shing lto ba che/ /de lta bu yi mtshan ldan la/ /a ka ru 'am gu gul bdug par bya/ /rin chen lnga dang 'bru lnga dang / /dri lnga sman lnga de bzhin te/ /'bras bu can gyi shing lnga yi/ /lo mas kha la rnam par
<p>280a.2</p>brgyan/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang snying po lnga/ /de bzhin mgul chings gdugs kyis brgyan/ /rim bzhin dkyil 'khor dgod par bya/ /yan lag dang ni gtor ma dang / /bdag gis 'dir ni ma bshad de/ /gzhan la ltos la shes par gyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon dge slong
<p>280a.3</p>gis/ /kha zas dkar po bsten nas su/ /cho ga yang dag bsam par gyis/ /khengs pa med cing nga rgyal spang / /nyon mongs shas ni mi che zhing / /byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang / /btang snyoms la ni yang dag 'jug /yi ge bzhi pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /dgug pa
<p>280a.4</p>gzhug pa bcing ba dang / /ye shes lha ni dgyes par 'gyur/ srom mkhan la sogs bsang gtor bya/ /bsnyen pa cho ga yang dag bzung / /mchod bstod la sogs byas nas su/ /thun gtor la sogs gtang bar bya/ /phyogs skyong bcu dang rgyal po dang / /
<p>280a.5</p>gza' dang skar ma 'byung po rnams/ /rjes mthun gtor ma byin nas su/ /de la mchod pa bstod pa bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon bka' drin gyis/ /nad pa yul 'khor yang dag bsrung / /sems can la ni snying rje'i phyir/ /rim gro'i cho ga yang dag bshad/ /de ni dkyil
<p>280a.6</p>'khor byed pa'i thabs so/ /'khor lo rim pa bcu bris la/ /sngar bshad las kyi snying po dgod/ /phyi rol 'khor lo'i ra ba la/ /phyag mtshan phyag rgya dgod pa ste/ /mnyam gzhag byang chub mchog dang ni/ /chos 'chad skyab sbyin mchog sbyin dang / /sa gnon chos sbyin
<p>280a.7</p>phyag skor ba/ /bum rten rdo rje rin chen dang / /ral gri'i steng na rdo rje dang / /de bzhin pad+ma de bzhin no/ /'khor lo lcags kyu rdo rje dang / /de bzhin 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas bskor/ /pad+ma'i steng na phyag mtshan gnas/ /sdong bu dar gyis bcings pa la/ /rgyas par yang ni bri
<p>280b</p>
<p>280b.1</p>bar bya/ /'khor lo gnyis po zlum po la/ /pad+ma rdo rje yang dag bri/ /bde bar gsang sngags yi ge dgod par bya/ /de nang gsum po mu khyud la/ /sngar bshad sngags kyis bskor bar bya/ /de nang mu khyud gcig pu la/ /'khor lo'i rim pa de bzhin shes/ /'khor lo'i nang du ma khyud de/ /sngar
<p>280b.2</p>bshad sngags ni bri ba'o/ /de yi nang na 'khor lo la/ pad+ma'i ra ba shes pa'o/ /'khor lo'i lte bar mu khyud dang / /snying po yi ni sngags bzhin no/ /lte sngags yi ge bri ba ste/ blo dang ldan pas bri bar bya/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor
<p>280b.3</p>dang / srung ba'i 'khor lo bshad pa'i gnas skabs te bdun pa'o// //yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi bden pa dang / srung ba de rnams kyis kyang / sdug bsngal thams cad dang
<p>280b.4</p>bral zhing bde bar gnas te/ srung ba des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'o/ /'byung po thams cad bzlog par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bden pa 'dis lha'i gdon la sogs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs shing / bde bar gnas shing 'jigs pa med par gnas pa'o/ /gzi
<p>280b.5</p>brjid 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i byis pa'i gdon rnams yin te/ ma'i mngal nas 'dzin zhing / skyes nas lo bcu gnyis bar du 'dzin pa'o/ /de'i phyir nas sems can la gzi byin 'phrog pa yin te/ bden pa de yis bde bar gnas
<p>280b.6</p>shing / mngal na yang 'di lta ste/ skyes nas kyang bde ba'o/ /lo bcu gnyis nas kyang bde bar 'gyur ro/ /bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig ces bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi bden pas bde bar gnas te the tshom med de/ /
<p>280b.7</p>gang gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams yin te/ 'das pa rnams ni mar me mdzad la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ ma
<p>281a</p>
<p>281a.1</p>'ongs pa rnams kyang de bzhin du byams pa la sogs pa'o/ /da ltar yod pa'i shAkya thub pas kyang bdud bzhi bcom nas ston par byas pa'o/ /ngas 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug zad par bya ba'i phyir ni zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod chags ni phung po'i
<p>281a.2</p>bdud de/ zhe sdang ni nyon mongs pa'i bdud do/ /gti mug ni 'chi bdag gi bdud yin te/ de 'joms pa ni lha'i bu'i bdud do/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdud bzhi bcom zhing / 'khor ba ma lus par bcom zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o/ /chos kyi phung po brgyad
<p>281a.3</p>khri bzhi stong bstan pa dang zhes bya ba'i bdud bzhi bcom nas/ sems can gyi don la/ sprul pa'i skus khyab nas chos ston pa'o/ /bshad pa dang brjod pa'i zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bstan nas/ sku mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /de yang sems can
<p>281a.4</p>gyi don la yin no/ /bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des ming 'di zhes bya ba'i nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi zad par gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ de bzhin du de'i bden pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur zhing / nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /nad med par gyur
<p>281a.5</p>cig /zhi bar gyur cig /rab tu zhi bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa 'dis/ nad thams cad 'joms par byas te/ gdon thams cad brlag par byas nas/ rlung dang / bad kan dang / mkhris pa dang / 'dus pa dang ldan
<p>281a.6</p>pa la sogs pa'i nad rigs mi gcig pa bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi bcom nas/ nad pa rnams la bde bar gnas par byed pa'o/ /bden pa 'di yis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i
<p>281a.7</p>bden pa'i tshig gis nad pa gso ba'i gnas skabs te brgyad pa'o// //de skad ces bka' stsal nas zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i tshig 'di bka' stsal pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ btsun pa de bzhin
<p>281b</p>
<p>281b.1</p>bgyi'o zhes bya ba gsol to zhes bya ba ni/ kun dga' bos thugs su chud nas/ gro ga'am/ shing shun nam/ ras la bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te zhes bya ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du song ste zhes bya ba ni/ tshe
<p>281b.2</p>dang ldan pa kun dga' bos sems can thams cad dang / yangs pa can gyi sems can rnams kyi/ mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / mu ge dang / chos rnams kyang bshad du mi btub cing / ma rungs pa 'byung po rnams kyis khyer ba'i phyir ro/ /sgo yi them pa la rkang pa
<p>281b.3</p>bzhag nas zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dbus su yul lha'i them pa la gnas nas/ rig sngags kyi nga rgyal byas nas/ rgyal mtshan lag na thogs nas/ seng ge'i sgra bsgrags so/ /gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang
<p>281b.4</p>smras so zhes bya ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i zhal nas/ nyi ma stong phrag brgya shar ba bzhin du/ 'od zer re res rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma khro bo'i tshul gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phros te/ grong khyer yangs pa can du zhugs pa'i lha
<p>281b.5</p>'dre rnams de'i 'od zer gyi khro bos lha 'dre rnams phyir phyung ste/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos mi theg pas gzugs sna tshogs ston cing bros so/ /rig sngags kyi tshig ni/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ zhes pa la sogs pa las so/ /de'i sngags yungs kar bsres
<p>281b.6</p>la phyogs bzhir gtor bas lha 'dre thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /nir gats+tsha ta nir gats+tsha ta la sogs pa'i sngags kyis/ seng ldeng gi me phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir sbar la mtshams bzhi nas blangs la/ yungs kar dang / skye tshe dang / shing tsher ma can bsres la me'i nang du gtor ro/ /
<p>281b.7</p>phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi nas chu gtor ro/ /de na zhugs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis mi tshugs shing 'byung ngo / /sum su la sogs pa'i sngags kyis srung skud sna lnga bsngags shing mdud pa bor te/ de bsrung bar byas na nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs shing / 'byung po
<p>282a</p>
<p>282a.1</p>rnams kyang 'bros so/ /su mu ru su mu ru zhes bya ba'i sngags ni rig sngags kyi snying po bstan to/ /de yang pad+ma'i rigs kyi lam rigs so/ /mtshon pa ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so/ /mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi bdag nyid do/ /phung po ni 'du byed
<p>282a.2</p>kyi phung po ste/ khams ni rlung gi khams so/ /skye mched ni lus kyi skye mched do/ /ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa sku mdog ljang gu/ zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ zhal g.yas dkar ba/ g.yon dmar ba'o/ /
<p>282a.3</p>phyag g.yas pa gsum na/ ral gri dang / rdo rje rgya gram dang / skyabs sbyin no/ /g.yon gsum na bsnams pa ni/ 'khor lo dang / zhags pa dang / rdo rje'o/ /zhabs g.yas brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum pa/ pad+ma'i steng na zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan
<p>282a.4</p>pa/ 'dzum pa'i zhal dang ldan par bzhugs so/ /rig sngags kyi rigs ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ su mu ru su mu ru la sogs pa'o/ /de dag sngags rnams grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gsang sngags kyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa la sogs pa'o/ /
<p>282a.5</p>sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin rlabs dang / rig sngags gsang sngags rnams kyis byin brlabs pa/ rnam par dag pa 'di 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar yod pa rnams kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi chos bden pas/ grong khyer yangs pa can srung zhing
<p>282a.6</p>skyob pa dang / sba ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>282a.7</p>byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la sogs pa/ bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad do/ /nyan thos kyang de bzhin du shA ri'i bu la sogs pa nyis brgya lnga bcu dang ngo / /gzhan yang dge slong pha'am/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen pha'am/ dge
<p>282b</p>
<p>282b.1</p>bsnyen ma la sogs pa mang po dang thabs cig tu'o/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams dang thabs cig go/ /lha dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / 
<p>282b.2</p>rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thags zangs ris la sogs pa lha ma yin mang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / dri zar bcas pa'i zhes bya ba ni/ dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa g.yog du ma
<p>282b.3</p>dang bcas pa dang 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten yi rangs te zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub
<p>282b.4</p>sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / dge slong pha dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen pha dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'o/ /grong khyer yangs pa can na zhugs pa'i 'byung
<p>282b.5</p>po rnams phyir btang ba'i phyir gnas skabs te dgu pa'o// //pad+ma'i rigs lnga bstan pa'i brtags pa ste gnyis pa rdzogs so// //rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i mdo'i 'bum 'grel slob dpon chen po las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa
<p>282b.6</p>rdzogs so// //rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i mdo'i 'bum 'grel paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po mi mnyam rdo rje'i sras/ paN+Di ta don yod rdo rjes/ jo mo sgrol mas zhabs kyis bcags pa/ tshangs pa'i 'byung gnas rdo lung dgon par rang 'gyur mdzad
<p>282b.7</p>pa'o// //'di bsgyur bsod nams gang thob pa/ /de yis khams srid gsum du ni/ /gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma yi/ /dngos grub go 'phang myur thob shog/ //
<p>283a</p>
<p>283a.1\] ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA shI ta ba ti bi d+yA rA dza sU trAM ti sa ha ra Sha TI kA nA ma/ bod skad du/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo'i 'bum 'grel zhes bya ba/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo bsil ba'i tshal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
<p>283a.2</p>bder gshegs yang dag rdzogs pa'i sku/ /skyon gyis ma gos yongs rdzogs pa/ /gzhan yang sems can don mdzad de/ /thub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo sde 'di/ /yang dag bsams la ston byed pa/ /rab rib kyis ni mi shes pa'i/ /
<p>283a.3</p>bdag gi bsams la yang dag bshad/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni/ 'di skad ces bya ba ni/ sgro skur dang bral ba'o/ /bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni kun dga' bos so/ /grogs med dam zhe na/ nyan thos la sogs pa dang thabs cig
<p>283a.4</p>tu thos pa'o/ /su la thos na/ bcom ldan 'das la'o/ /gang thos na bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo 'di thos pa'o/ /sus thos na kun dga' bos thos pa'o/ /dus gcig na zhes bya ba'i sgra ni don gnyis la 'jug ste/ sdud pa po shes rab che bar go ba dang / dam pa'i
<p>283a.5</p>chos 'byung ba dkon pa'i don to/ /ston pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ bcom pa ni bzhi bcom/ bzhi ni dgra'o/ /dgra ni bdud bzhi'o/ /bdud bzhi ni phung po'i bdud dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud dang / lha'i
<p>283a.6</p>bu'i bdud dang bzhi'o/ /gang gi dus na bcom zhe na/ rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i dus so/ /ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ skal ba dang ldan pas na/ bcom ldan no/ /'das zhes bya ba ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /'das pa ni gang gi dus she na/ dpyid zla ra ba'i gnam stong
<p>283a.7</p>gi nub mo'o/ /rgyal po'i khab ces bya ba ni/ dan ta ka'i grong khyer dang / ka ling ka'i grong khyer dang / ma ga ta'i grong khyer dang gsum po yod pa las/ ma ga ta'i grong khyer na/ drang srong sgom chen gcig yod pa las/ byis pa gcig gis gnod pa byas pas/ drang
<p>283b</p>
<p>283b.1</p>srong gi kha nas me byung bas/ grong khyer gsum po tshig pas dur khrod gsum du gyur/ de'i tshe lha'i bu shed las skyes dang / shed bu grogs gnyis byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi mi rnams byung ste/ dang po sa'i bcud za/ gnyis pa bdud rtsi'i zhag za/ gsum pa myu gu
<p>283b.2</p>za/ bzhi pa 'bras sA lu'i ljang pa za ba la/ sems can de rnams ma mthun nas/ sems can de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag tshogs shing 'dus pa la/ bdag cag gi nang nas sems can lhag par gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par lta na sdug pa/ lhag par
<p>283b.3</p>mdzes pa/ lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de ni/ bdag cag gi zhing rnams kyi bdag por bskos dang / des bdag cag chad pa gcad par bya ba ni chad pas gcod par 'gyur/ phan gdags par bya ba rnams la phan 'dogs/ bdag cag gi zhing
<p>283b.4</p>dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las/ de chos bzhin du thog shas sbyin par bya'o zer nas/ de rnams kyi nang nas lhag par gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par mdzes pa/ lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de zhing rnams kyi bdag por bskos te/ 'di skad ces kyi
<p>283b.5</p>sems can khyod tshur shog /kho bo cag las chad pa gcad par 'os pa rnams la chad pa chod cig phan gdags par bya ba rnams la ni phan thogs shig /kho bo cag gi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las/ khyod la kho bo cag gis chos bzhin du thog shas sbyin no/ /
<p>283b.6</p>des de rnams la chad pa gcod par bya ba la ni chad pa gcod/ phan gdags par bya ba rnams la ni phan 'dogs par byed cing de la de rnams kyi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las/ chos bzhin du thog shas 'bul te/ skye bo'i tshigs chen pos bkur zhing / 
<p>283b.7</p>skye bo'i tshogs chen po mang pos bkur bas mang pos bkur ba zhes grags so/ /zhing de rnams kyi bdag por gyur pa na/ nyams pa las skyo bar byed pas rgyal rigs rgyal rigs zhes bya bar grags so/ /chos kyis mgu bar byed cing / tshul khrims nyams su blangs
<p>284a</p>
<p>284a.1</p>te gnas/ shes rab nyams su blangs te gnas pas/ rgyal po rgyal po zhes bya bar grags so/ /mi rnams ni bsod nams rtag par bya ba'i phyir/ 'bras sA lu ljang pa dgos so/ /'jag ma'i spyil bo la me mi gtang ba'i khrims bcas so/ /de nas dus nam zhig
<p>284a.2</p>na rgyal po'i btsun mos me shor bas rgyal po na re rang gi khrims rang gis bshig tu mi btub pas/ bya rgod phung po'i ri'i nub phyogs su nga'i khyim cig rtsigs shig gsungs so/ /de nas brtsigs pas/ nyin mo brtsigs pa nub mo zhig pa la/ rgyal po'i zhal nas nga bsod nams
<p>284a.3</p>khyad par du 'phags pa yin pas/ phyogs bzhir rgyal po'i khab yin no/ /bris shig gsungs pas/ phyogs bzhir rgyal po'i khab yin no zhes bris pas/ mi ma yin gyi gnod pa zhi'o/ /de nas pho brang bai DUr+ya zhes bya bar kyang grags so/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi tshad ni gzhan du

<p>284a.5</p>grub pa'i phyir ro/ /gser dang / dngul dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / in+d+ra nI la'o/ /ri rab de de bzhin du brgyan pas gzhal yas khang ngo / /ri rab de'i tshad ni 'di lta ste/ mtho ba zlum pa/ gnam 'phang dang / rgyar yangs pa/ lo tog thams cad kyi sa 'dzin me tog
<p>284a.6</p>dang / phreng ba dang / spos rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'o/ /dge slong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang zhes bya ba ni/ nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po thams cad dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ srid par kun du sbyor ba/ chad pa/ yang dag pa'i ye shes
<p>284a.7</p>sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu chen po thob pa/ lta ba chags pa med pa/ thams cad kyang dri ma dang bral ba/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon
<p>284b</p>
<p>284b.1</p>bsregs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang / 
<p>284b.2</p>tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang / de dag la sogs pa nyan thos rab tu mang po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / mi dang / 
<p>284b.3</p>lha ma yin dang / dri za la sogs pa mang po 'dus pa'o/ /thabs cig tu zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ bla na
<p>284b.4</p>med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa mthu chen po thob pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po kun du ston pa dang / sems kyis skad cig thang cig yud tsam
<p>284b.5</p>cig la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i chos bstan pa sna tshogs mnyam pa nyid mnyam zhing rgya che la zab pa dang / spobs pa dang / cho 'phrul dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis
<p>284b.6</p>mchod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang
<p>284b.7</p>snyoms dang / byams pa'i stobs dang / dben pa dang / yongs su byang ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug
<p>285a</p>
<p>285a.1</p>dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / kun du bzang po dang / nyi ma grags pa dang / zla ba'i grags pa dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / rdo rje grags dang / 'jam dpal grags dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la
<p>285a.2</p>sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang thabs cig tu'o/ /bzhugs te zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya seng ges 'dir chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa shin tu yongs su rdzogs par mthar
<p>285a.3</p>phyin pa dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu yongs su rdzogs/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi byang chub chen po'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sa mnyes pa ni shin tu yongs su gzung / rin po che rdo rje pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri la ni bzhugs te/ seng ge'i khri
<p>285a.4</p>ni gang zhe na/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang du gshegs pa'i sa na yod pa'o/ /rin po che dang / rdo rje pad+ma'i khri bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri mdzes pa dang / rin po che dang / mu tig dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma si li si li'i sgra 'byung ba/ 
<p>285a.5</p>rdo rje dang / rin po che du ma'i stegs bu la/ rtsa ba legs par brtan pa/ rdo rje dang / rin po che du ma'i chu srin gyi kha nas byung ba'i mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba dang / 'dab ma'i rnam rten bcug pa/ rin po che du ma'i pad+ma'i snying po la chags pa'i rin po che ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru
<p>285a.6</p>chen po dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / in+d+ra nI la chen po dang / mdun nas 'od zer chen po bar snang la khyab pas kun du mdzes pa dang / rin po che dang / rdo rje'i thur mas brgyan pa'i gdugs yu bas bstod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas grib mar bsgribs shing bskyabs
<p>285a.7</p>pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing du mas brgyan par mdzes pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i khri bya rgod kyi phung po'i rtse mo la bzhugs te/ gser gyi ri bo'i rgyal po ltar dpal ni 'bar/ sa phyogs ni nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par brgyan/ zla ba
<p>285b</p>
<p>285b.1</p>nya ba ltar 'jig rten thams cad la ni sdug par snang / dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shin tu rgyas shing chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ 
<p>285b.2</p>ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /spyi gtsug ni sems can thams cad kyis blta bar mi mthong / bdud kyi las thams cad las ni nges par rgyal/ de kho na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thugs su chud/ spyan lnga ni mnga'/ 
<p>285b.3</p>rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ni ldan/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad ni bcom/ grags pa dang / sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa ni 'phags/ khyu mchog dang seng
<p>285b.4</p>ge'i sgra ni sgrogs/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun du bsal/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa/ dpag tu med par sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs
<p>285b.5</p>dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dka' ba spyad pas mngon par grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku brgyan par mdzes shing / rin po che rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri la bzhugs
<p>285b.6</p>pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi gnas dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas skabs te dang po'o// //de'i tshe na zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs pa'i tshe'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sgra
<p>285b.7</p>gcan zin zhes bya ba ni/ gzhon nu la rab tu byung ba/ 'dul ba'i bya ba mang po mi shes pa/ nga rgyal gyis khengs shing sangs rgyas kyi sras yin sems nas chos la ma chud do/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i nags na zhes bya ba ni/ dpag tshad brgya yod
<p>286a</p>
<p>286a.1</p>pa/ 'jigs su rung ba/ ro dang / ro langs dang / ce sbyang dang / stag dang / sbrul dang / seng ge dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / 'byung po rnams kyis ro la ma mthun zhing / phar 'grad tshur 'grad byas shing skad rnam pa sna tshogs
<p>286a.2</p>'don pa dang / ce sbyang rnams 'thab pa'i skad 'jigs su rung ba dang / keng rus dang / mgo dang / pags pa dang / lag pa'i sor mo dang / rkang pa'i dum bu dang / ro'i dum bu dang / gsal shing la bskyon pa dang / shing la btags nas mgo gzhug
<p>286a.3</p>zlog pa'i ro dang / man mkhal lcags kyus phigs nas shing la bka' ba'i ro dang / mtshon gyis dum bur byas shing / kha yo ba dang / mig yar la bltas shing shi ba dang / ro mi gcig pa sna tshogs kyis khengs te/ dur khrod shar na ba tra'i nags tshal yod de/ nags
<p>286a.4</p>tshal gyi nang na lha'i gdon ma rungs pa thams cad gnas pa'o/ /lho phyogs na ka rany+dza ka'i nags tshal yod de/ gshin rje dang / grul bum dang / mkha' 'gro gnas te/ nub phyogs na la da'i nags tshal yin te/ 'dab chags bya dang / nam mkha' lding dang / klu'i
<p>286a.5</p>gdon gnas pa'o/ /byang phyogs na brang ki TI'i nags tshal yod de/ nags tshal de'i nang na/ gnod sbyin dang / sha za dang / gdon ma rungs pa thams cad gnas pa'o/ /shar lho mtshams na tsu ta'i nags tshal yod de/ me lha dang / brjed byed dang / smyo byed la sogs
<p>286a.6</p>pa'i gdon rnams gnas pa'o/ /lho nub mtshams na u dum+WA ra'i nags tshal yod de/ de'i nang na srin po'i gdon dang / ma mo'i gdon la sogs pa'o/ /nub byang gi mtshams na n+ya gro d+ha'i nags tshal la rlung gi gdon dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa gnas pa'o/ /byang shar
<p>286a.7</p>gyi mtshams na ta la'i nags tshal yod de/ de'i nang na dbang ldan gyi gdon dang / 'byung po thams cad gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin du de dag la sogs pa shing sna tshogs kyis khengs shing 'byung po dang / sha za dang / ro langs dang / bar snang la rgyu ba'i bya dang / bya rog
<p>286b</p>
<p>286b.1</p>dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rgod dang / khrung khrung dang / de bzhin du ka raN+Da la sogs pa yang / rtag tu 'gyur zhing ro la rgod de/ gzhan yang bya la sogs pa skad sna tshogs 'don pas 'jigs su rung ste/ sa srin dang / sa bdag la sogs pa yang de bzhin te/ dngos grub
<p>286b.2</p>thob pa dang / rnal 'byor pa'i tshogs mang po dang / ro la rgod cing za 'dod pa'i tshogs dang / dngos grub 'dod pas sgom pa yang sha stag go/ /yi dgas dang / sha za dang / bya dang / rnal 'byor ba'i tshogs kyis hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing / hi hi dang ha ha dang / kI li
<p>286b.3</p>kI li'i sgra sgrogs shing / 'jigs su rung ba dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal na 'byung po rnams gnas so/ /de nas dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal gyi shar phyogs na/ de nas dpag tshad lnga na/ na len+d+ra'i grong khyer chen po'o/ /de'i lho phyogs dpag tshad gnyis na/ grong khyer
<p>286b.4</p>yangs pa can gnas pa'o/ /de'i nub phyogs dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis na ka ling+ka'i grong khyer gnas pa'o/ /de'i byang phyogs na/ dpag tshad gcig la bya rgod kyi phung po dang / rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'o/ /bya rgod phung po dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi bar na rgyang
<p>286b.5</p>grags gcig go/ /de bzhin du grong dang grong rdal dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / gzhan yang mang po'o/ /bud shing chen po su'i phyogs na 'dug go zhes bya ba ni/ nga rgyal che zhing nyan thos tsam la 'gran te/ nga yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
<p>286b.6</p>sras yin sems nas/ thos pa mi byed cing / bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba mi 'bul zhing / rang mthong gi nga rgyal gyis/ ngas ni dgra bcom pa grub par bya yi snyam nas dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du phyin to/ /der 'di lta ste zhes pa ni/ bsgom mo snyam nas bsdad pa
<p>286b.7</p>dang / ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis 'tshe bar byas so/ /lha'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang drang srong gang gnas pa/ de dag thams cad mi bzad cing / /'jigs pa'i sems kyis nyan byed pa/ /bye ba stong gi lha dag dang / /
<p>287a</p>
<p>287a.1</p>bye ba phrag brgya'i lha rnams dang / /lha yi bu mo skal chen dang / /thags bzangs ris dang sgra gcan dang / /lha min bye ba phrag stong dang / /lha min bye ba phrag brgya dang / /de dag bu mo 'phrul ldan pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs sprul la/ /de bzhin
<p>287a.2</p>skad kyang sna tshogs 'don/ /gzhon nu sgra zin rtsar bsdad nas/ /'tshe bar byas te sdig pa rnams/ lha'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams kyis kyang / 'dug tu mi ster zhing drag shul bstan to/ /klu'i gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon
<p>287a.3</p>rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ rab tu gnas na rgya mtsho dang / /klu yi rgyal po gzi can dang / /klu yi rgyal po ma dros dang / /dga' bo nye dga' gnyis po dang / /rdo rje blo gros pak+Shu dang / /gang+gA dga' bo sin d+hu mtsho/ /bya yi rgyal po 'dab bzang dang / /rgya mtsho chen po
<p>287a.4</p>'khrug byed dang / /rigs ni klu ni klu bzhi dang / /sa srin sa bdag za byed dang / /ma rungs byed cing khro ba dang / /gdug pa byed cing 'tshe byed dang / /stong phrag bye ba'i klu yi gdon/ /bye ba brgya yi klu dag dang / /de yi bu mo skal chen rnams/ /rtag tu sems can
<p>287a.5</p>gnod par byed/ /gnod sbyin ma rungs mdangs 'phrog pa/ /snying rje med cing khrag 'thung ba/ /gsus chen 'jigs pa chen po ste/ /stobs po che la sgra yang che/ /mgrin bcu po la mig stong po/ /gdon chen mig ni dmar po rnams/ /'khor ni mang po rnams gtang ste/ /
<p>287a.6</p>lag na mtshon thogs rab tu 'jigs/ /sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs pa dang / /lag bzhi lag na sgron ma thogs/ /lag na mtshon dang mi lpags thogs/ /rdo rje mdung rtse lag na thogs/ /rab tu grags pa'i gtam brgal nas/ /phyogs kun
<p>287a.7</p>du ni grags par byed/ /de yi gnas na 'god pa yi/ /zab mo yi ni rtag tu bskyang / /mi yi 'jig rten 'di dag tu/ /skyes pa bud med rnams kyang 'dzin/ /sha khrag dron mor bcas pa la/ /rnam par 'khrul cing 'dod pa'i gzugs/ /gnod sbyin de dag ma rungs pa/ /
<p>287b</p>
<p>287b.1</p>sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed/ /gzhon nu sgra zin bsgom pa la/ /drag shul gyis ni gnod pa byas/ /klu'i gdon dang gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis bsgom par mi ster zhing drag shul gyis 'tshe bar byas so zhes bya ba'o/ /srin po'i gdon rnams dang mi'am ci'i gdon
<p>287b.2</p>rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ /mi 'am ci dang srin po dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs bstan pa/ /kha cig mtshon gyis rab tu 'tshe/ /lus dang 'bral ba dag tu snang / /rnam par 'khrugs shing 'dod la mos/ /rgyu ma'i phreng bas kun du dkris/ /rtse gsum
<p>287b.3</p>mdung gis rab 'debs shing / /srog chags rnams la gnod par byed/ /mi bzad pa yi dbugs 'byin cing / /skye dgu 'di dag skrag par byed/ /srog chags rgyud ni ji snyed pa/ /sna tshogs kyi ni gzugs su snang / /kha cig dag ni ri yang thogs/ /la la
<p>287b.4</p>ral gri 'khor lo thogs/ /bgegs ni brgya phrag stong rnams te/ /dbyug pas bsdigs shing kha drag po/ /mig phyung ba la bzhin mi sdug /srin po so ni rno ba dang / /sna dang rna ba bcad pa dang / /lce bcad gdong ni gnyer ma can/ /rkang lag dag ni 'khums pa dang / /
<p>287b.5</p>mgo bo bcad pa'i srin po rnams/ /skabs ni rab tu 'tshol bar byed/ /sdig pa can rnams gzi brjid 'phrog /mi dag gi ni lus rnams la/ /rab tu phra ba'i gdon du snang / /spu yi bar dang gnad rnams dang / /de bzhin rma yi kha rnams zlum/ /srin po mi'am ci'i gdon rnams
<p>287b.6</p>kyis/ /'tshe ba rab tu byas pa'o/ /srin po dang mi 'am ci'i gdon gyis/ gzhon nu sgra gcan zin la rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs bstan zhing gnod pa skyel ba'o/ /lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lto 'phye dri za'i gdon rnams kyis/ /
<p>287b.7</p>snying rje med cing 'tshe byed pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sgra 'byin nas/ /gzhon nu de la 'tshe bar byed/ /rdza rnga dag ni brdungs nas su/ /la las rnga zlum dag ni brdungs/ /pi wang gling bu 'khar rnga dang / /stobs chen rnams ni sgra 'byin te/ /rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs dang / /
<p>288a</p>
<p>288a.1</p>glu dang gar rnams byas nas su/ /gzhon nu de la 'tshe bar byed/ /lto 'phye'i gdon rnams dang / dri zi'i gdon rnams kyis kyang / gzhon nu sgra gcan zin la sgra sna tshogs kyi skad kyis 'tshe bar byed pa'o/ /mi ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i
<p>288a.2</p>gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ de yi mdun na 'jug pa yi/ /mi ma yin dang rlung lha'i gdon/ /lag pa bzhi pa ma rungs pa/ /rkang mangs dang ni rkang gcig pa/ /rkang pa bzhi dang rkang pa gnyis/ /rkang pa sgreng la spyi gtsug dang / /lus mangs mgo bo gcig
<p>288a.3</p>pa dang / /lus gcig pa la mgo bzhi dang / /mig mangs po la lus phyed dang / /mig gcig lto ba bcu gnyis dang / /bong bu rnga mo glang chen mgo/ /lag pa sgreng la mgo btud dang / /mtshon cha'i so dang mtshon cha'i lag /mtshon cha'i rkang pa mi ma yin/ /zangs kyi skra dang zangs kyi so/ /
<p>288a.4</p>zangs kyi mig dang zangs kyi lag /zangs kyi sna dang lcags kyi kha/ /rkang lag kun du 'bar ba dang / /mi yi lus su gnas pa rnams/ /sgur zhar lba ba gsum yod pa/ /mig mi sdug la kha glal ba/ /chu srin dag gi gzugs dang ni/ /gzugs mi sdug la kha
<p>288a.5</p>ral po/ /mchu 'phyangs po dang so yon po/ /rab tu gdug pa khro gnyer can/ /gsus po che dang bum sna bo/ /rna 'phyangs pa dang rna ba med/ /lag rings dang ni rna ba ring / /sna yi rtse dang lag rtse ring / lus bskams lus ni ring ba dang / /skra ring rab tu brgyan pa dang / /rkang
<p>288a.6</p>pa mid pa phra ba dang / /dri ba dang bum lto bo/ /yan lag chu srin 'dra ba dang / /mi ma yin dang rlung lha'i sde/ mdun la rgyu zhing ltas ngan bstan/ /sems can thams cad 'tshe byed pa/ /gzhon nus lus la 'tshe bar byed/ /mi ma yin gyi gdon dang rlung lha'i gdon rnams kyis kyang / sna tshogs kyis
<p>288a.7</p>gzugs bstan zhing gzhon nu'i lus la 'tshe bar byas so/ /yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ yi dgas 'byung po'i gdon rnams kyis/ /phyogs bzhi la ni gnod byed pa/ /mi sdug gzugs ni bstan nas su/ /drag po'i tshul gyis sgra
<p>288b</p>
<p>288b.1</p>yang 'byin/ /shin tu 'jigs pa'i tshul bstan nas/ /gtun shing tho ba 'dra ba'i lto/ /rnam lto ba la rna bo che/ /gyen du brdzes skra rab tu dmar/ /mgo bo che la mjug rings po/ /skem po sgrur bo bum lto bo/ /ri rab rtse mo 'gul nas su/ /me mdag gi ni char pa
<p>288b.2</p>'bebs/ /ldon shing ri rab rdo ba dang / /sprin gyi tshogs kyi mdog 'dra ba/ /dung dang rnga chen rdza rnga dang / /'byung po yi dgas rnams kyis rdung / /shin tu mi srun thal mdog 'dra/ /mgal pa chu la bcug pa'i mdog /khrag la dga' zhing sha la dga'/ /bzhin mi sdug

<p>289a.1</p>dang / /mkhal ma snying dang nang grol gyis/ /snyim pa shin tu gang ba dang / /byin pa dag ni za bzhin du/ /mer mer po dang srog chags kyi/ /rkang lag rnams kyi stobs kyang 'phrogs/ /keng rus kyi ni lus kyis su/ /skye bo mang po skrag par byed/ /khrag gis rab tu

<p>289a.4</p>'khrul zhing 'dod pa'i gzugs/ /seng ge dang ni stag dang rta/ /ma he ba lang bong bu dang / /glang po che yi gzugs 'dra dang / /dom dang lug dang spyang ki dang / /khyi dang wa dang ra dag dang / /byi la byi ba spre'u'i gzugs/ /bse dang phag dang dred mo dang / /nya dang rus sbal dag gi gzugs/ /

<p>289b.1</p>can rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni/ zhags pa ral gri 'dzin rnams dang / /mda' gzhu mdung rnams thogs nas su/ /skra 'dzings skra mdud spyi gtsug tu/ /khro bo'i tshul du bstan pa ste/ /zhi ba'i tshul du mi ston to/ /mi rgod mang po der byung nas/ /bsdigs shing 'tshog par byed pa ste/ /
<p>289b.2</p>khrid pa'i tshul ni bstan nas su/ /mtshon gyis brdegs shing bsdigs par byed/ /sems can thams cad gnod byed pa/ /mi rgod de rnams sdig pa can/ /lha dang klu dang dri za dang / /gnod sbyin srin po lha ma yin/ /nyin gsum pa yi smyo byed dang / /de bzhin du ni ri dgas
<p>289b.3</p>dang / /'jig rten 'tshe ba gang yin pa/ /gdon sbyin srin po ma rungs rnams/ /'dir ni 'khod de gzhon nu la/ /drag shul gyis ni gnod byed do/ /gzhan yang bya rog 'ug pa dang / /bya gag bya la sogs pa yis/ /bar snang dag la 'tshe bar byas/ /gdon rnams de
<p>289b.4</p>rnams dag gis ni/ /log par bstan nas 'tshe byed pa/ /bud med dag dang skyes pa dang / /de bzhin bu pho bu mo dang / /mngal na gnas pa'ang 'jig par byed/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas gtogs pa'ang 'tshe/ /skar ma dag dang nyi zla dang / /gtum pa'i gza' rnams gnod par
<p>289b.5</p>bgyid/ /lo tog sa bon 'bras bu dang / /me tog sman dang zas skom dang / /mi rnams kyi ni dpal 'phrog cing / /mthon po rnams ni dma' bar byed/ /'jig rten dag na snang ba rnams/ /dmag dang 'thab mo sha gnyer dang / /tshig gam gzhig gam gsang bya ba/ /de
<p>289b.6</p>kun 'byung po'i rnam par sgyur/ /sbed cig gtong bar byed pa dang / /log par byed cing dgad par 'gyed/ /'jig par byed cing lta bar bgyid/ /dgrar 'gyur ba yang ston par bgyid/ /sdig pa'i rmi lam mthong bar bgyid/ /nyal ba dag la gnod par bgyid/ /sgo nas
<p>289b.7</p>se gol sgra phyung zhing / /mi snyan brjod de za bar bgyid/ /mdza' bo gnyen bshes gzugs dag tu/ /dga' zhing dka' mchid smra bar bgyid/ /bu mo sdu gu'i gzugs dag tu/ /'dod pa spyod par dga' bar bgyid/ /nyi ma skar ma'i gzugs dang ni/ /zla ba'i gzugs
<p>290a</p>
<p>290a.1</p>su gda' bar bgyid/ /rlung dang skar mda' lce gzugs su/ /de la gnod pa byed par gda'/ /skar ma'i tshogs dang 'dra ba dag /'jigs par bgyid pa wa dang khyir/ /rnam par sprul nas ljon shing dang / /mchod rten dag gi gnas na gda'/ /skyes
<p>290a.2</p>pa gzhon nu'i gzugs mdzes las/ /'bar zhing shing rta'i sgra yang 'byin/ /nad rnams dang ni shul dag tu/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rjes kyang ston/ /grong khyer dag dang khyim rnams kyi/ /sgo yang gdon chen de dag 'byed/ /srog dang lus kyang blangs bgyis shing / /lam
<p>290a.3</p>ngan kun du skor bar bgyid/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs sgra rnams dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs nad kyi rnams/ /lus la na ba gnas par ston/ /nad rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang / /phyin ci log tu ston par bgyid/ /ji snyed 'jig rten
<p>290a.4</p>rang bzhin dag /thams cad log par de dag ston/ /de bzhin log par ston byed pa/ /'jig rten la ni 'jigs par byed/ /'tshe ba sgra zin gzhon nu la/ /phyin ci log cing gnod par byed/ /gzhon nu sgra gcan zin la gnod pa de rnams kyis/ zhe sdang byas shing 'tshe
<p>290a.5</p>bar byas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la ni shin tu gtses so zhes bya ba ni/ dug lnga khong du shar bas zhe sdang byas shing nga rgyal che ba dang / ma shes par shes par smra ba/ ma snyan par snyan par smra ba/ rang gi rig pas bsgrubs pa byas pa/ rang gi rig pas smra zhing
<p>290a.6</p>gzhan la ston pa/ bla ma la mi zhu zhing / rang rig gis bstan pa dang / bla ma'i rig pa bzhag cing rang rig smra ba dang / lung dang bka' la mi brten cing / rang gi nga rgyal gyis rang bzo byas pa dang / tshe phyi ma la mnar med du skye ste/ tshe 'di la yang gdon de rnams
<p>290a.7</p>kyis 'tshe bar byed cing srog 'phrog pa'o/ /de bzhin du gzhon nu sgra gcan zin yang / skad sna tshogs 'byin cing gzugs sna tshogs ston cing gdon rnams kyis phar 'then tshun 'then byas shing rang gi lus la rang dbang med do/ /gzhon nu sgra gcan zin de
<p>290b</p>
<p>290b.1</p>'jigs par byed cing 'dar te/ lus la yang na tshas thebs te/ bcom ldan 'das dran zhing skad sna tshogs 'byin zhing kyi hud kyi hud zer zhing sangs rgyas la skyabs su gsol lo/ /chos la skyabs su gsol lo/ /dge 'dun la skyabs su gsol lo/ /de skad ces
<p>290b.2</p>gsol ba dang / gdon rnams kyis lan cig gzhag go/ /bzhag ma thag tu bsil ba tshal nas bros te/ bros ma thag tu gdon rnams kyis ded pa dang / gzhon nu sgra gcan zin mdog shor zhing / ba spu yang gyen la log ste/ hag zad cing 'jigs pa'i sdug
<p>290b.3</p>bsngal nyams su myong ngo / /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi gzhon nu sgra gcan zin gdon gyis zin pa'i gnas skabs te gnyis pa'o// //de nas zhes bya ba ni/ gdon gyis zin pa'i de nas so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i
<p>290b.4</p>rig la ba dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas zhes bya ba ni/ gdon thams cad kyis 'tshe bar byas pas/ 'jigs shing mdog kyang shor te/ ba spu rnams gyen du log cing / g.yengs te phar lta tshur lta byas shing / gdon rnams kyis phyir 'brang ngo sems
<p>290b.5</p>so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni/ bag chags shes bya'i dri ma thams cad 'joms pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa/ de kho na nyid kyi ye shes khong du chud pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ces pa rdo rje'i
<p>290b.6</p>seng ge pad+ma chen po'i gdan la bzhugs te/ bya rgod phung po'i ri gzhal yas khang gi rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi la/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen pha dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / mi dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs
<p>290b.7</p>pa'i spyan sngar 'jigs shing lus po thams cad 'dar ba dang kha nas dbugs kyang 'thon to/ /bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhes bya ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gdon gyis btab pa'i 'jigs pas bcom ldan 'das la gus par bya'o/ /bcom
<p>291a</p>
<p>291a.1</p>ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ mchi ma blags so zhes bya ba ni/ gdon gyis btab pa'i yus kyis/ kyi hud kyi hud zer zhing dbyar gyi char bzhin du gdong gi mchi ma mi thub po/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ gzhon nu sgra gcan zin yus che ba de nas so/ /bcom
<p>291a.2</p>ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsgom pa'i sems dang ldan pa sngon gyi bya ba dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi lo rgyus thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ sems can thams cad kyi don la tshe dang ldan pa sgra
<p>291a.3</p>gcan zin la bka' stsal pa'o zhes sgra gcan 'dzin khyod ci'i phyir nga'i mdun du 'dug nas mchi ma blag ces bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad skad cig mas thugs su chud nas/ des tshig gi gtam dris pa'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>291a.4</p>bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la smras pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar des tshig gi gtam smras shing zhus pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi dur khrod
<p>291a.5</p>chen po bsil ba'i tshal na zhes bya ba ni/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri dang rgyal po'i khab dang / bsil ba'i tshal gyi bar na dpag tshad gcig yod de/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i lho phyogs na ro thams cad bskyal ba'i sa/ rnam rtog gsum bcom pa'i bsil ba'i tshal lo/ /
<p>291a.6</p>rnam rtog gsum dang / bsil ba'i tshal ni nges tshig gang gi phyir zhe na/ bsil ba'i tshal de yang / 'jigs pa'i sgra'i rnam par rtog pa byung ste/ sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid sgom zhing / byams pa'i stobs kyis 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o/ /rnam par rtog pa de
<p>291a.7</p>spangs pas 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin de mi 'byung ngo / /ngo tsha'i rnam par rtog pa ni yi dgas dang / ro yang gcer bur gnas te/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can yang mi rtag ste/ de'i ngo bor bzhag nas 'jig rten gyi khams sgyu ma lta bu yin te/ de'i
<p>291b</p>
<p>291b.1</p>rang bzhin gyis ngo tsha ba'i rnam rtog dang 'dral ba'o/ /skyugs bro ba'i rnam rtog ni dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal de la yang 'byung ste/ ro'i rnam pa mi gcig pa dang sha dang khrag dang klad pa la sogs pas khengs pa'i sa gzhi yin te/ de bzhin du rang gi lus las rnag dang
<p>291b.2</p>mchil ma dang rgyu ma dang gci ba la sogs pa yang 'byung ste/ de bzhin du mi rtag cing rnam par rtog pa med do/ /bsil ba'i tshal ni rnam par rtog pa gsum dang bral zhing / yang dag pa'i ye shes de nas de byung ste/ dngos grub thams cad kyis gzhi/ byang chub
<p>291b.3</p>thob pa'i lam/ sgyu ma thams cad bstan pa/ mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin du bstan pa/ sems can thams cad dug gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi rnam par rtog pa dang bral bar byed pas na bsil ba'i tshal yin te/ de bzhin du lus ngag yid zhi bar byed pas na/ 
<p>291b.4</p>bsil ba'i tshal yin zhes/ yang na bsil ba'i tshal ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang 'bral ba'i phyir ro/ /bud shing chen po lta bu'i phyogs na mchis na zhes bya ba ni/ dug lnga'i rang bzhin gyis nga rgyal dang zhe sdang byas te/ de bzhin du gti mug kyang shas che zhing / bcom
<p>291b.5</p>ldan 'das la mi zhu zhing bdag dgra bcom pa thob par bya snyam nas bsil ba'i tshal du mchis so zhes smras so/ /der zhes bya ba ni dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi dbus su bdag gis sdug bsngal thams cad myong ba zhes pa'o/ /lha'i gdon rnams dang lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams
<p>291b.6</p>dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi gdon yang gzugs sna tshogs ston cing / lha'i 'khor pho dang lha'i 'khor mo sna tshogs pa bye ba stong gi lha dang / bye ba phrag brgya'i lha rnams dang / de bzhin du lha ma yin gyis kyang 'tshe bar byas so zhes bya ba'o/ /klu'i gdon rnams
<p>291b.7</p>dang gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i nad thams cad gtong zhing / gnod sbyin gyi gzugs sna tshogs bstan te/ de bzhin du bye ba stong gi klu dang / bye ba stong gi gnod sbyin dang bye ba phrag brgya'i klu'i g.yog dang thabs cig tu 'tshe bar byas so/ /srin
<p>292a</p>
<p>292a.1</p>po'i gdon rnams dang / mi'am ci'i gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ sha khrag la dga' zhing / gdon de gnyis ni dpon g.yog dang bcas shing / bye ba stong dang bye ba phrag brgya'i gdon rnams kyis kyang bdag la 'tshe bar byas so zhes pa'o/ /dri za'i gdon rnams dang / 
<p>292a.2</p>lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ glu len zhing bro rdung zhing sgra sna tshogs ston te/ gdon de gnyis ni bye ba phrag brgya 'khor g.yog dang bcas pa byung ste/ de bzhin du bdag la gnod pa bskyal zhes bya ba'o/ /mi'i gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang
<p>292a.3</p>zhes bya ba ni/ dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi nang na/ gzugs dang sgra sna tshogs byas shing byung ba ste/ de bzhin du g.yog dang 'khor mang po 'dus shing sgom du mi ster ba'o/ /yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ gdon de gnyis kyang bzhin mi sdug
<p>292a.4</p>cing / mdun du ltar byung ste/ gzugs sna tshogs ston cing sgra sna tshogs ston pa'o/ /sha za'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ gsus po che la mgo che ba mang po 'dus nas byung ste/ gdon de rnams kyis kyang phyogs bzhi nas 'tshe bar byas pa'o/ /gzig
<p>292a.5</p>rnams dang bya rog rnams dang 'ug pa rnams dang grog sbur rnams dang sdig sbrul rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa dang bar snang la rgyu ba'i sems can thams cad kyis kyang lus la 'tshe bar byas shing bdag la na tsha byung ngo zhes pa'o/ /mi dang mi ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyis/ bdag
<p>292a.6</p>shin tu gtses pa lags mod kyi zhes bya ba ni/ mi rgod mtshon sna tshogs thogs pa dang / gzhan yang bgegs ma rungs pa rnams kyis kyang / gzhon nu sgra gcan zin la sdug bsngal thams cad myong zhing 'tshe bar byas so zhes pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ sgra gcan
<p>292a.7</p>zin gyis smras pa'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad kyi don du dmigs la 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i nang du khyu mchog dang seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'o/ /sgra gcan zin khyod kyis zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>292b</p>
<p>292b.1</p>gti mug gi rang bzhin gyis nga rgyal dang / phrag dog byas te da yang khyod kyis ma byed cig ces rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal be con chen po zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo ni chos kyi sku ste/ bsil ba ni longs sku'o/ /tshal ni sprul sku ste/ be con ni chang
<p>292b.2</p>pa thams cad dang bral bar byed pa'o/ /de bzhin ci'i phyir zhe na/ rig pa ni stong pa ste/ ngo bo nyid dang bral zhing brjod du med pa'o/ /sngags ni ma man+t+ra ste skyob pa dang srung ba'o/ /de yang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /bsil ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin te/ /
<p>292b.3</p>longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin/ yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin/ gnyis ka yang ma yin no/ /tshal ni sprul sku ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la dus gcig tu nam mkhas khyab pa bzhin du khyab pa'o/ /be con
<p>292b.4</p>gyi lha'i gdon rnams kyi chad pa dang 'jig rten 'di'i rgyal po dang / rkun po dang chu dang me la sogs pa'i chad pa dang / gzhan yang gshin rje dang 'khor ba na 'bral te/ de sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bas na be con zhes pa'o/ /yang na bsil ba'i tshal ni lus ngag yid zhi bar byas
<p>292b.5</p>te/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byed pa'o/ /gzungs kyi rig sngags zhes bya ba ni/ gzungs ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gzungs te/ de yang dag par gzung zhing / stong pa nyid la sems bzhag nas/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rjes
<p>292b.6</p>khyab pa'o/ /'khor bzhi po zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das gar gshegs pa'i sar 'khor ba'o/ /dge slong rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / dgra bcom pa la sogs pa'o/ /dge slong ma rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ sgra gcan zin gyi ma dang / 
<p>292b.7</p>dge slong ma lnga brgya la sogs pa'o/ /dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po ma skyes dgra dang / btsun mo la sogs pa'o/ /bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba dang / yun rings po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar
<p>293a</p>
<p>293a.1</p>'gyur ba zung shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di 'chang bar gyur na/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'bral zhing bde ba thob pa'o/ /lha dang mis kyang de bzhin du zung shig ces bya ba ni/ gzugs khams kyi lha dang 'dod khams kyi lha dang / 
<p>293a.2</p>sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la gus par byed pa'i mi rnams kyis/ rig sngags 'di zung shig ces pa'o/ /rigs kyi ngo bo nyid gang zhe na shes rab dang thabs yin te/ 'dir ni shes rab kyi ngo bo las/ thabs kyi ngo bor mi snang ngo zhes pa'o/ /slob dpon
<p>293a.3</p>las kyi rdo rjes gsungs pa ni/ mtshon pa dag ni ye shes te/ /mtshon byed rig sngags rgyal mo la/ /phyag mtshan sku mdog bstan pa ste/ /thabs kyi ngo bo de bzhin no/ /de bzhin du bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes mtshon pa ni shes rab po/ /rig sngags nyid sgom pa ni thabs
<p>293a.4</p>kyi ngo bo nyid yin te/ de yang mtshon par byed pa'o/ /de'i phyir na thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /de'i phyag mtshan dang sku mdog ni gang zhe na/ zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa sku mdog ljang gu sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa zhal g.yas
<p>293a.5</p>dkar po/ g.yon dmar ba lo bcu drug pa'i gzugs su bzhugs pa phyag g.yas pa gsum na/ ral gri dang / skyabs sbyin dang / rin po che'i steng na rdo rje'o/ /g.yon pa gsum na bum pa'i steng na rdo rje dang / zhags pa dang lcags kyu'o/ /zhabs rdo rje'i skyil
<p>293a.6</p>krung du bzhugs pa/ pad+ma'i steng na zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid las kyi rigs rlung gi khams lus kyi skye mched traM gi yig 'bru las ye shes lnga 'phros sems can thams cad kyi don byas so/ /rig
<p>293a.7</p>sngags kyi ngo bo nyid sems can gyi don byed pa'i tshig ni las kyi snying po ste/ 'di lta ste/ ang gA bang gA b+haM gA la sogs pa'o/ /rgyal po dang dbang po dang zhes bya ba ni/ brgya byin yin te/ zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa sku mdog ser po/ spyan gsum pa la dpral
<p>293b</p>
<p>293b.1</p>ba'i mig phred la yod pa/ lha'i dbu rgyan la sogs pas brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na rdo rje dang mda'o/ /g.yon pa gnyis na gdugs dang / gzhu bsnams pa/ glang po che la zhon pa'o/ /rgyal po gshin rje dang zhes bya ba ni/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog
<p>293b.2</p>nag po khro bo'i tshul du bstan pa dbu skra thor tshugs can g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang be con 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa gnyis na zhags pa dang lcags kyu bsnams pa'o/ /ma he la zhon pa zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa ste/ sku mdog dkar po go cha gyon pa/ /g.yas g.yon gnyis
<p>293b.3</p>na pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa/ g.yas pa na ral gri g.yon pa na ri bong gi rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/ /rnga mo dkar po'i shing rta la zhon pa'o/ /rgyal po chu lha dang zhes pa ni/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog dkar po sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang bcas pa phyag g.yas pa'i dang po na
<p>293b.4</p>pad+ma dmar po ste/ 'og ma ni rin po che'o/ /g.yon pa dang po na sprul gyi zhags pa 'og ma na bum pa bsnams pa ste/ chu srin la zhon pa'o/ /rgyal po dang nyi ma dang zhes bya ba ni/ zhal gcig sku mdog dmar po phyag bzhi pa g.yas g.yon gnyis na pad+ma dmar po 'dzin pa/ 
<p>293b.5</p>g.yas na ral gri g.yon pa na lcags kyu bsnams pa'o/ /shing rta dang bcas shing nam mkha' la rgyu ba'o/ /rgyal po rlung lha dang zhes bya ba ni/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog sngo skya phyag g.yas pa gnyis na ba dan dang lcags kyu bsnams pa g.yon pa gnyis na rlung
<p>293b.6</p>'khyil ba dang / bum pa bsnams shing sha ba la zhon pa'o/ /rgyal po gzi can dang zhes bya ba ni/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa ste/ sku mdog ser po phyag g.yas na sbrul zhags 'dzin zhing / g.yon na a 'bras 'dzin pa ku be ra la zhon pa'o/ /rgyal po sems zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>293b.7</p>pa bsangs yin te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dkar po/ /phyag g.yas na bum pa spyi blugs g.yon pa phreng ba bsnams pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la zhugs pa'o/ /rgyal po gshin rje'i dbyug to can zhes bya ba ni/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog dmar nag phyag
<p>294a</p>
<p>294a.1</p>g.yas pa gnyis na/ ral gri dang tho ba bsnams pa/ g.yon pa gnyis na zhags pa dang sdigs mdzub mdzad cing / ro langs la zhon pa'o/ /rgyal po me'i dbyug to can zhes bya ba ni/ me lha'i dbang po yin te/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog dmar po/ 
<p>294a.2</p>phyag g.yas pa gnyis na rtse gcig dang bum pa spyi blugs bsnams pa/ g.yon pa me 'bar ba dang phreng ba bsnams pa ra skyes la zhon pa'o/ /rgyal po dbyug to can dang zhes bya ba ni mig dmar yin te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dmar po khro bo/ g.yas na dbyug to mig
<p>294a.3</p>can 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa ni mi mgo sdigs mdzub bsnams pa/ ra dmar po la zhon pa'o/ /rgyal po rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni spen pa yin te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dkar po phyag g.yas na bu sti bsnams pa/ g.yon na bum pa bsnams pa/ brag gi gdan la zhugs pa'o/ /
<p>294a.4</p>rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni/ phur bu yin te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog mthing nag phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis mda' gzhu bsnams shing glang po che la zhon pa'o/ /rgyal po 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ lag pa yin te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku
<p>294a.5</p>mdog ljang nag phyag g.yas na ral gri g.yon na sdigs mdzub rus sbal la zhon pa/ rgyal po rnam par gzigs dang zhes bya ba ni/ rA hu la yin te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog nag po ro smad med pa phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis na zla ba dang nyi ma bsnams pa/ sprin gyi
<p>294a.6</p>gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /rgyal po 'byung po zhes bya ba ni/ dbang ldan yin te/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ thal ba'i mdog can spyan gsum pa phyag g.yas pa gnyis na rtse gsum dang bum pa spyi blugs bsnams pa/ g.yon gnyis na phreng ba dang / a 'bras bsnams pa
<p>294a.7</p>glang la zhon pa'o/ /rgyal po yul 'khor srung zhes bya ba ni/ dri zi'i rgyal po yin te/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog dkar po phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis na 'khor lo dang / mchod rten bsnams pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /rgyal po 'phags
<p>294b</p>
<p>294b.1</p>skyes po dang zhes bya ba ni/ grul bum gyi rgyal po yin te zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog mthing ga /phyag g.yas pa gnyis na dbyug to dang tho ba bsnams pa/ g.yon pa gnyis na rin po che dang rtse gsum bsnams pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /rgyal po mig mi
<p>294b.2</p>bzang zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po yin te/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog dmar po phyag g.yas pa na pad+ma/ gnyis pa na dgra sta/ g.yon dang po na sbrul gyi zhags pa gnyis pa dung bsnams pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /rgyal po lus ngan po zhes
<p>294b.3</p>bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po yin te/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog ljang gu/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po na ral gri/ 'og ma dbyug to/ /g.yon pa na ne'u le/ 'og ma na bum pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /rgyal po mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa zhes bya ba ni/ zhal
<p>294b.4</p>bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa sku mdog ser po/ /spyan gsum pa phyag g.yas na dbyu gu rtse gsum/ 'og ma na mchod sbyin/ g.yon dang po na phreng ba/ 'og ma na bum pa spyi blugs/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje/ chos kyi rgyal po 'jig rten
