<p>294b.5</p>la thugs brtse ba bla na med pa zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa rnams yin te/ de yang chos sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / sprul sku yin te/ 'dir yang sprul sku'i rang bzhin ni thugs rje che zhing sems can gyi don la bshad de/ zhal gcig
<p>294b.6</p>phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog 'dzam bu gling gi gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba/ sa gnon gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ rdo rje'i seng ge pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ rab tu byung ba'i cha byad du bzhugs pa/ dus gcig tu sems can gyi don la snying rjes khyab pa'o/ /bdag dang sems can
<p>294b.7</p>thams cad la srung du gsol/ srung du gsol zhes bya ba ni/ rig pa 'chang ba gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang srung zhing sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral te/ bla na med pa yang dag pa'i bde ba thob pa'o/ /sems can thams
<p>295a</p>
<p>295a.1</p>cad kyang de bzhin no/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang yongs su gzung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su gyur pa dang / chad pa spang ba dang mtshon cha spang ba dang dug bsad pa dang dug gzhil ba dang mtshams bcad pa dang sa bcing ba mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba
<p>295a.2</p>ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di la gus par byas nas/ 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa la sogs pa byas te/ de bzhin du de ni 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang bar bya'o zhes pa'o/ /rig sngags ni gang zhe na/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa ste/ mtshon pa
<p>295a.3</p>ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bdag nyid do/ /de yang thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rnam par dag pa'o/ /gzhi bstan pa ni rnam par thar pa'i ye shes lnga dang ldan pa ste/ mtshon pa ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags
<p>295a.4</p>kyi bdag nyid do/ /de yang thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rnam pa zhal bzhi bstan pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi'i rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan ni gti mug la sogs pa dug lnga bcom nas/ ye shes lnga shar ba'i rnam par dag pa'o/ /spyan gsum dang ldan pa
<p>295a.5</p>ni ye shes kyi spyan gyis mun pa mun nag bcom nas 'khor ba thams cad las thar bar byed pa'o/ /zhal nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po dang ser po bstan pa ni/ mngon spyod dang zhi ba dang dbang dang rgyas pa'i las bzhi bstan pa'o/ /khro bo dang / zhi ba dang / sgeg pa dang / dgod pa ni sems
<p>295a.6</p>can mi gcig pa'i theg pa sna tshogs bstan pa'o/ /sku mdog nag po ni byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'i rnam par dag pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnam par dag pa'o/ /phyag brgyad ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rnam par dag pa'o/ /g.yas dang po na
<p>295a.7</p>ral gri ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin blo dman pa rnams la blo 'phel bar byed pa'o/ /'og ma na rdo rje rgya gram bsnams pa ni/ sems can ma rig pa'i las las thar bar byed pa'o/ /de'i 'og ma na dgra sta bsnams pa ni/ 'khor ba rnams la gcod par byed pa'o/ /tha ma na mda'
<p>295b</p>
<p>295b.1</p>bsnams pa ni/ thabs kyi rang bzhin brtan pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i dang po na zhags pa bsnams pa ni 'khor ba na gnas pa'i sems can 'dren pa'o/ de'i 'og mas 'khor lo bsnams pa ni/ gti mug la sogs pa'i dug lnga gcod pa'o/ /de'i 'og ma na rtse gsum bsnams
<p>295b.2</p>pa ni/ srid pa gsum 'joms par byed pa'o/ /tha ma na gzhu bsnams pa ni/ shes rab kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'o/ /zhabs phyed skyil du bzhugs pa ni/ bdud bzhi rnam par bcom pa'i brda'o/ /pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni/ chos de'i
<p>295b.3</p>nyams myong 'khor ba thams cad las thar ba'o/ /nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa ni/ rig sngags kyis bya ba bstan nas/ khro bo'i tshul du sems can ma rungs pa rnams 'dul ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi snying po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bA la bA ti tsa ra ma ti la sogs pa'o/ /
<p>295b.4</p>sgra gcan be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags zhes bya ba ni gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa/ chad pa thams cad 'joms pa/ las thams cad las kyang thar ba ste/ rig sngags 'di ni gzi brjid che zhing stobs che ba/ mthu che zhing dpa' ba/ sangs rgyas
<p>295b.5</p>thams cad kyi rigs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rig sngags 'di bzung na sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar byed pa'o/ /brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di skud pa la btags sam zhes bya ba ni/ skud pa sngon po bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje rigs la sogs pa'i bu mo lo brgyad nas bcu
<p>295b.6</p>gnyis lon pa'i bar gyis gos gtsang ma gon zhing khrus legs par byas te/ kha zas dkar po la brten cing kha lho phyogs su bstan la bkal bar bya'o/ /rig sngags re re la mdud pa re re bor te/ rig sngags dang mdud pa ni brgya rtsa brgyad du bya'o/ /de bzhin du byas na/ gdon
<p>295b.7</p>thams cad las thar ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /mgul lam lus sam lag pa la btags na zhes bya ba ni/ gro ga'am/ shing shun nam/ ras sam/ dar la sogs pa la bris nas mgul du btags te/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'am/ mchod
<p>296a</p>
<p>296a.1</p>rten gyi rtse mo'am/ rnga la sogs pa la btags bas kyang / thos pa tsam gyis kyang bsrung bar 'gyur te mthong ba tsam yang bsrung ngo / /kun nas dpag tshad brgya khor yug tu zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyi yul du 'gro na yang rang gi yul gyi srung ba byas pas kyang
<p>296a.2</p>srung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rig sngags 'di mthu che zhing gzi brjid che ba ste/ thugs rje che zhing sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'o/ /dri'am me tog rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung bzhin du mchod par byas te cho gar byas te/ 
<p>296a.3</p>gzung bar byas te/ 'chang ba la sogs pa gus par byas na/ de 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya rnams kyis de bsrung bar byas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma rnams la yang
<p>296a.4</p>srung bar byed de/ 'di'i lam las yang dag pa'i byang chub thob pa'o/ /de la zhes bya ba ni rig sngags 'di 'chang ba ste/ bla na med pa'i byang chub thob cing / da ltar yang chad pa la sogs pa thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur
<p>296a.5</p>ro zhes bya ba ni/ mi ni rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / mi rgod dang gnyen bshes la sogs pas lto byed pa'i chad pa dang gzhan yang 'jigs pa thams cad dang 'bral ba'o/ /mi ma yin pa rnams ni lha'i gdon la sogs pa ma rungs pa rnams yin te/ chu dang me'i 'jigs pa
<p>296a.6</p>la sogs pa dang bral ba'o/ /mtshon dang dug dang zhes bya ba ni/ g.yul 'gyed pa dang glo bur du 'thab pa ste/ des mi tshugs shing dug rnam pa gsum gyis kyang mi tshugs so/ /nad dang rims rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ mdze las gyur pa la sogs pa dang bad kan dang mkhris
<p>296a.7</p>pa dang rlung dang ldan pa dang / 'dus pa la sogs pa'i nad do/ /rims drag po dang zhes bya ba ni bzhi 'dus pa yin te/ de bzhin du rlung shas che zhing gzhu bzhin du gug ste/ mda' btang ba bzhin du rengs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags dang gsang sngags dang zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>296b</p>
<p>296b.1</p>gzhan gyi sbod gtong btang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi rig pa rbad pa dang / de bzhin du gsang sngags gshin rje dang / ma mo dang / 'jig rten gyi ngan sngags kyis kyang mi tshugs pa'o/ /ro longs dang / khro dug dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig pa mkhan pos ro langs
<p>296b.2</p>bsgrubs nas btang ste/ de yang de'i khro dug gis kyang mi tshugs so/ /me dang chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams yin te/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis de'i 'jigs pas kyang mi tshugs so/ /rig sngags dang gsang
<p>296b.3</p>sngags dang / sbyor bas legs par sbyor ba thams cad kyi ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ bri nyes dang / smra nyes dang / sgom nyes pa dang / gtam nyes pa dang / tshul nyes pa dang / de la sogs pa nyes pa thams cad ni/ rig sngags 'di'i
<p>296b.4</p>gsang sngags kyis nyes pa thams cad kyang gso bar byas pa'o/ /rig sngags 'di'i gsang sngags kyi tshig tsam gyis bar chod byed pa'o/ /gdon rnams kyis mi tshugs pa'o/ /ma grub pa rnams grub par byed/ /grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed do/ /gzhan yang dngos
<p>296b.5</p>grub nyams par gyur na/ rig sngags 'dis 'grub par 'gyur te/ thob pa rnams gzhan la ma btang ste/ glo bur gyi bar chod kyis mi tshugs pa'o/ /pha rol gyi sbyor ba 'ching ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ sngags dang 'jig rten gyi skyon rnams yin te/ de'i 'jigs pas
<p>296b.6</p>kyang mi tshugs pa'o/ /pha rol gyi bcings pa las grol bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyis sbyor ba'i sngags btang ste/ des kyang mi tshugs shing bar chod dang bral ba'o/ /nad dang mya ngan dang bgegs rnams 'jigs par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ bzhi brgya brgyad cu'i nad
<p>296b.7</p>rnams dang mya ngan gyis mi phog cing / bgegs [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]rigs stong phrag brgyad cu las thar ba'o/ /'thab pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ phra ma dang gcugs dang 'thab rtsod kyi rgyu rnams rna bas mi thos shing / bde ba dang dge ba'i gtam thos te/ 'thab rtsod dang
<p>297a</p>
<p>297a.1</p>nyag nyog gi sdug bsngal dang bral ba'o/ /gdon thams cad zlog par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ sgom pa la sgom du mi ster ba dge ba dang dge ba byed pa de rnams kyang bgegs rigs te/ de rnams kyis mi tshugs shing / rig pa'i gzi brjid kyis mi tshugs
<p>297a.2</p>pa'o/ /gdon gang gis mi gtong ba de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyis srung ba dang 'chang ba dang sgom pa dang / kha ton byed pa la sogs pa la gnod par byed na/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos mgo
<p>297a.3</p>tshal pa tshal par 'gyur ro/ /srog dang bral zhing dmyal ba mnar med du skye'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po lag na rdo rje yang rdo rje 'bar ba kun du 'bar ba/ kun du rab tu 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur pa/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun
<p>297a.4</p>du 'gas so zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa dang / rig sngags 'di 'chang ba la bar chod byed pa dang / gzhan yang 'di'i sgo nas dge ba la bar chod byed na/ phyag na rdo rje'i gzi brjid kyis dum bur byas shing / dngos po mi snang bar byed pa'o/ /rgyal
<p>297a.5</p>po chen po bzhis kyang lcags kyi 'khor lo spu gri'i so lta bu'i mtshon gyis phung bar byed do zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi dam las 'das shing / gdon rnams kyis sems can la 'tshe bar byas te/ de'i rig sngags kyi dmod mos rgyal po bzhi rnams kyis kyang lcags kyi 'khor lo me
<p>297a.6</p>lce 'bar bas dum bu dum bur byas shing / chad pa gcod par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin gyi 'jig rten de nas shi 'phos nas/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gnas pa mi thob po zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa'i gdon de shi ba ni rgyal po
<p>297a.7</p>bzhi'i chad pas shi ste/ gal te 'byung po'i tshogs su skyes na/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang du mi tshud do/ /sgra gcan zin zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu la bka' stsal pa'o/ /rgyal po dang mi rgod dang me dang chu dang mtshon dang 'brog dang dgon pa dang / 
<p>297b</p>
<p>297b.1</p>mya ngam du song ba zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'dis chad pa thams cad gcod par byed pa ste/ gzhon nu sgra gcan zin gyis kyang sgoms shig /yid la zung shig /mchod par gyis shig /kha ton du bya zhing sems can thams cad la phan par
<p>297b.2</p>gyis shig ces bya'o/ /de bzhin du byas na de dang de'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o/ /yang na bdud bzhis mi tshugs te/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'o/ /gang gi be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig pa 'di lan cig brjod na/ sdig pa thams cad
<p>297b.3</p>las thar bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ da ltar byas pa yang dag ste/ sngon du byas pa yang 'dag pa'o/ /de bzhin du mthu che zhing gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal dang bral bar byed pa'o/ /sgra gcan zin zhes bya ba ni/ sgra gcan zin gyi rkyen gyis sems
<p>297b.4</p>can gyi don la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang nas yang du bka' stsal pa'o/ /be con chen po'i gzugs kyi rig sngags 'di/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa rig sngags kyi
<p>297b.5</p>rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'dis chad pa thams cad 'joms pa/ byang chub kyi lam yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khams bsam gyis mi khyab cing ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o/ /gsung ba gsung bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa rnams kyis kyang gsungs
<p>297b.6</p>pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa rnams gyis kyang gsungs te/ de bzhin du da ltar bzhugs pa rnams kyis kyang gsungs pa'o/ /phyag 'tshal rjes su yi rang 'di'i lam gyis 'bras bu grub pa'o/ /grub mchog tu grub pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba ni/ thun mong gi dngos grub
<p>297b.7</p>pa zhes bya ba ni/ thun mong gi dngos grub kyang 'grub ste/ thun mong ma yin pa yang de bzhin no/ /thun mong gi dngos grub ni/ 'jig rten 'di'i sa la spyod pa dang / nam mkha' la spyod pa dang sa'i 'og na spyod pa'o/ /de la sogs pa phra mo'i dngos grub kyang yod de/ 
<p>298a</p>
<p>298a.1</p>de yang zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang mngon spyod la sogs pa'o/ /thun mong ma yin pa'i dngos grub ni/ sa la spyod pa la sogs pa ni mgo mnyam ste/ nam mkha' 'jig rten gyi khams la khyab pa bzhin du 'khor ba bor zhing / srid pa ma
<p>298a.2</p>yin 'das pa yang ma yin te/ da ltar yod pa yang ma yin no/ /de'i dngos grub thob pa'i phyir na mchog tu grub pa'o/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pa ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi thub ste/ de bzhin du gdon la sogs pas kyang mi thub pa'o/ /lha dang / klu dang / 
<p>298a.3</p>dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye la sogs pas bstod pa zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di la rtag tu rjes su yi rang ste/ mchod par byas shing rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bka' las mi 'da'o/ /'byung
<p>298a.4</p>po'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba ste zhes bya ba ni/ gnod pa skyel ba'i sems yod pa rnams kyang rig sngags kyi srung ba yod par gyur nas/ gzhan yang de'i rtsar bsdad nas/ de rnams kyang srung bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu 'byung po rnams kyis phyag 'tshal
<p>298a.5</p>zhing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /bdag dang sems can thams cad gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa gzhon nu sgra gcan zin gyis kyang / rig sngags 'di lus la btags par byas so/ /yid la bzung zhing kha ton du byas
<p>298a.6</p>so/ /bsgoms par byas so/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pa rig sngags kyi go cha gon nas gti mug la sogs pa dug lnga bor te/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu bsgrub par dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal 'jigs su rung ba'i nang du song ngo / /sems can thams cad kyis kyang rjes su
<p>298a.7</p>yi rang zhing bsrung ba'o/ /nad med pa dang 'jigs pa med par gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ lha'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / mi'am ci'i gdon
<p>298b</p>
<p>298b.1</p>rnams dang / lho 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang / mi ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang / yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / gzig
<p>298b.2</p>rnams dang / bya rog rnams dang / 'ug pa rnams dang / grog sbur rnams dang / sdig sbrul rnams dang / gzhan yang mi dang mi ma yin gyi sems can rnams kyis kyang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la gus par byas te phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod par byas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa
<p>298b.3</p>gzhon nu sgra gcan zin yang dgra bcom pa yang dag pa thob cing / zag pa zad pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ cho 'phrul ston nus pa'o/ /bkra shis te/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi lam la 'jug pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyis/ gzhon nu sgra
<p>298b.4</p>gcan zin gyi gdon 'dul ba'i gnas skabs te gsum pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi snying po brtag pa dang po rdzogs so// //de nas rgyal po chen po lus ngan po dang / yul 'khor srung dang / mig mi bzang dang / 'phags skyes po bu dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi
<p>298b.5</p>rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / dri za'i rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / grul bum gyi rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / klu'i rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang bcas pa/ de bzhin du bu dang yang bcas pa'o/ /blon po dang bcas pa/ 'khor dang
<p>298b.6</p>bcas/ mngag gzhug pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / grul bum dang / klu stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / thabs cig tu ste/ de bzhin du chung ma dang / bu dang bu mo dang / tsha bo dang yang tsha bo
<p>298b.7</p>la sogs pa dang thabs cig tu'o/ /kha dog 'phags pa dag nam phyed na lhags nas/ gros mthun par dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du dong ste zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyang bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri nas/ sems can gyi don la 'khor bzhi po dag dang bcas
<p>299a</p>
<p>299a.1</p>shing 'jigs su rung ba bsil ba'i tshal gyi nang du phyin nas zhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyang so so rang rang gi gzi brjid dang mthu dang kha dog dang stobs dang rdzu 'phrul dang bcas shing dur khrod bsil ba'i
<p>299a.2</p>tshal la kha bltas pa'o/ /rang bzhin gyi kha dog dang mthus 'od chen po snang bar byas nas zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan rnams kyi kha dog ma yin te/ rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa'i gzi brjid kyi so so rang rang gi rang bzhin mthu'i kha dog ces bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
<p>299a.3</p>ga la ba der song ste phyin nas zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen pha dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang mi dang / 'khor mang po 'dus pa'i nang du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du'o/ /bcom
<p>299a.4</p>ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te thal mo sbyar te zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang 'khor de dag rnams dang bcas shing bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas nas so so rang rang gi me tog dang spos la sogs pas mchod par
<p>299a.5</p>byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das la lus ngag yid gsum gyis gus par byas nas/ yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal te/ de rnams kyang thabs cig tu 'khod pa'o/ /phyogs
<p>299a.6</p>gcig tu 'khod nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyis kyang dbyangs gcig skad cig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas pa'o/ /'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /
<p>299a.7</p>dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa/ ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i chos sku dang sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin me long gi gzugs brnyan bzhin du snang ba/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang ldan pa dang ngo / /mtshan bzang po sum
<p>299b</p>
<p>299b.1</p>cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan zhing / sems can gyi don la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sprul pa'i skus khyab pa'o/ /sprul pa'i sku de yang dpa' ba dang zhing bdud bzhi bcom pa la stobs dang ldan te/ bag chags dang shes bya'i sgrib pas
<p>299b.2</p>ma gos shing / nyon mongs pa lnga bcom zhing / 'khor ba'i ming yang med de/ de bzhin nyid du ldan pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dud pa'o/ /gau ta ma khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/ /de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to/ /zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi
<p>299b.3</p>stong sems can gyi don la thugs la gzung ba/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la skad cig mas khyab pa/ sems can lta ba mi gcig pa rnams la so so rang rang gi chos ston pa ste/ de lta bu'i sangs rgyas la 'jig rten dag gis mi 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'o/ /
<p>299b.4</p>lan gnyis lan gsum du yang rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa zhes bya ba ni/ lan dang po 'bul ba ni chos sku'i rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i sku ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs la dbul ba'o/ /lan gnyis pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'i rang
<p>299b.5</p>bzhin gyi ste/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung la 'bul ba'o/ /sems can don la rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul gyi rang bzhin dang ldan te/ stong gsum la skad cig mas sprul pa'i skus khyab ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la bstod pa'o/ /
<p>299b.6</p>'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer ra ba rim pa bdun dang / 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor nas grong khyer gyi sgo 'phar lcags las byas shing / sgo 'phar rnams la dril bu
<p>299b.7</p>shin tu sgra gsal ba btags te sgo phyen de'i sgras dpag tshad gcig khor yug tu grags par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po zas gtsang ma yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan nas sgyu ma chen po'i mngal du zhugs te de skyes nas rab tu byung nas ma ga d+hA'i dbus su rdo rje gdan
<p>300a</p>
<p>300a.1</p>la yang dag pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bdud la sogs pa bcom zhing / de rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral te/ de lta bu'i rang bzhin du shAkya'i bu sangs rgyas te/ gau ta ma'i rigs su skyes pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
<p>300a.2</p>shAkya seng ge la phyag 'tshal/ bstod cing 'dud do zhes bya'o/ /gau ta ma khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/ /de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas mkhyen pa/ lha rnams kyis ci smos zhes te/ rgya mtsho'i nang na nor yod pa
<p>300a.3</p>bzhin du'o/ /rgyal po bzhi la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni rgyal po bzhis bstod pa'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol te zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhu ba dbul
<p>300a.4</p>ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das yul dang spro lags sam/ 'tsho ba dang ldan lags sam zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor bzhi po de dag kyang bde bar gnas sam zhes bya ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi sku bde lags sam/ snyun mi mnga' lags sam/ 
<p>300a.5</p>nyam nga ba ma mchis sam zhes bya ba ni/ bdud bzhi po rnams kyis bar du ma chod dam/ 'jig rten gyi dug gsum po ma shar ram zhes bya ba yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la/ gnod pa mi mnga' lags sam zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa bdud bzhi'i rigs kyi 'byung po
<p>300a.6</p>rnams kyis chos la bar chod ma byas sam zhes bya ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni chos la bar chod byed cing / sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa rnams yin te/ yid mi bde bar byed pa yang de rnams yin te/ lus la na tsha drag pos
<p>300a.7</p>thebs par byed pa yang de yin no/ /sems can mngal na 'tshe ba ni/ mi'i khong du zhugs nas/ mer mer po dang / nur nur po rnams kyang 'chags su mi ster te/ gal te chags nas kyang ma la na tsha drag pos thebs nas 'chi ba dang shi ro dang skyes nas shi ba dang / der ma nus
<p>300b</p>
<p>300b.1</p>na glags gar rnyed pa'i dus su gnod pa skyel ba'o/ /mngal du zhugs pa'i dus su yang gzi brjid 'phrog cing / skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs kyang 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /chung ba la 'ju ba ni ba spu'i rtse mo brgya stong tsam gnas zhes bya ba'o/ /che ba ni ri rab bas
<p>300b.2</p>kyang che ste/ stobs btang na ri rab kyang 'gul lo/ /rgyu ba'i dus khams gsum skad cig mas rgyu'o/ /de lta bu'i 'byung po rnams kyis gnod par ma byas sam zhes bya ba'o/ /rims drag po dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nad bzhi brgya brgyad cu de las 'du ba yin
<p>300b.3</p>te/ nad de rnams kyang mi mnga' 'am zhes pa'o/ /mi dang mi ma yin pa sdang bar sems pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ rkun po dang mi rgod dang rgyal po la sogs pa yin te/ mi dang mi ma yin pa ni ma rungs pa'i sdig can gyi rigs sems can la 'tshe bar byed pa rnams so/ /de rnams
<p>300b.4</p>kyis kyang gnod pa ma byas sam zhes bya'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po bzhis snyun gsol pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal
<p>300b.5</p>po chen po bzhi las snyun gsol ba ni lan bka' stsal pa'o/ /kye rgyal po chen po dag nga la ni thams cad yod de zhes bya ba ni/ rgya mtsho lta bu ste/ de'i nang na rin po che sna tshogs zad mi shes pa yod pa bzhin du nga la yang de bzhin no/ /yul dang yang sprod/ 'tsho
<p>300b.6</p>ba dang yang ldan/ lus kyang bde/ nad kyang med/ nyam nga ba yang med do zhes bya ba ni/ mngon sum du 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang de bzhin te/ dang po phung po'i bdud bcom pa ste/ /gnyis pa nyon mongs pa'o/ /de bzhin du gsum pa 'chi bdag gi bdud bcom pa ste/ 
<p>300b.7</p>bzhi pa lha'i bu'i bdud bcom pa'o/ /de bas nyam mi nga ba zhes bya ba'o/ /kye rgyal po chen po dag nga'i lus la ni gnod pa yang med do zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phung po'i rang bzhin gyi sku la smos ci dgos te/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa yang mi tshugs so/ /kye rgyal po
<p>301a</p>
<p>301a.1</p>chen po dag ngas ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sangs rgyas rnams la gnod pa skyel bar 'dod pas kyang gnod pa skyel ba'i skabs ma rnyed cing / gnod pa rnams kyang mi snang ba'o/ /gal te gzhan gyi sems ma dad pa skyes par gyur na/ 'jig rten 'di la sdug
<p>301a.2</p>bsngal drag pos thebs shing shi nas kyang mda' 'phangs pa bzhin du dmyal bar 'gro'o/ /dmyal ba nas kyang ngan song nas ngan song du mi thar te/ thar pa'i dus kyang mi 'ong ngo / /de bas na bde bar gshegs pa bla ma dang / nyon mongs pa la sogs pa dang / pha ma la sogs pa la yang gnod par mi bya'o/ /
<p>301a.3</p>de'i phyir na gnod par byed par sems pa yang dag par ma mthong ngo zhes bya ba'o/ /kye rgyal po chen po dag de lta mod kyi khyed kyi 'khor rnams pa'i 'khor la gnod par byed par sems so zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon par bltas pas
<p>301a.4</p>ma rungs pa'i gdon rnams kyis gnod par bya bar sems so/ /de sems ma thag tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas smra ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal
<p>301a.5</p>po chen po bzhi la bka' stsal ba zhes bya ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 'bul ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gsol ba mchis te zhes bya ba
<p>301a.6</p>ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhis sems bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas nas srung ba dang sba ba dang yongs su bskyab pa dang zhi ba dang bde legs kyi tshigs ni bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa'o/ /de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la blta ba pa dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi
<p>301a.7</p>ba dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid la zhu ba'i slad du/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis pa lags so zhes bya ba ni/ gnod pa'i sems ni ci mchis te/ /zhes bya ba dang rgyal po chen po bzhi dang 'khor rnams kyang bsrung bar 'dod cing / rig sngags kyi
<p>301b</p>
<p>301b.1</p>rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyis grags pa thos pa dang / srung ba dang bde bar 'dod pas bcom ldan 'das nyid la gus par byas shing / zhu ba dbul ba'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis
<p>301b.2</p>sems can thams cad bde bar gnas shing nad med de/ ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad bcom zhing yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi lam la 'jug pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgon pa dang bas mtha'i gnas mal 'di dag na zhes bya ba ni 'jigs su rung ba dur khrod bsil
<p>301b.3</p>ba'i tshal na ro langs dang ro dang ce spyang la sogs pa dang / bya'i tshogs mang po 'dus pa'i sa/ khyi dang ce spyang 'thab pa'i sgras 'jigs su rung ste/ de bzhin du ro langs dang yi dgas kyang skad 'don zhing 'jigs su rung ste/ de bas na bas mtha'i gnas mal zhes btags
<p>301b.4</p>pa'o/ /shin tu sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / /zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sa gzhi der gnas pa'i gdon rnams ni shin tu mi srun zhing ro la dga' ste/ gson pa'i sha khrag la dga' zhing sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed de/ gzugs sna tshogs ston cing gzi brjid 'phrog
<p>301b.5</p>pa dang / skad sna tshogs 'don zhing skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs la 'jigs par byed pa dang / gdon rigs mi gcig pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gnas shing 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can la gnod pa'o/ /rims dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ nad bzhi
<p>301b.6</p>brgya rtsa bzhi de rims de dag la 'dus te/ nad de rnams kyang ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis btang zhing sems can rnams la gnod pa skyel ba'o/ /mi dang mi ma lags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sa gzhi der mi rgod la sogs pa 'gyur ba ste/ gzhan yang rgyal
<p>301b.7</p>po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang mi dang mi ma yin pa ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ma nus pa'o zhes bya ba'o btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag kyang de la gnas lags te zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan
<p>302a</p>
<p>302a.1</p>'das kyi 'khor bzhi po yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal la sbyor zhing da la gnas pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni/ srod dang tho rangs la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas so zhes bya ba ni da lta bar chod kyi rkyen zlog
<p>302a.2</p>pa dang / tshe phyi ma'i don la byang chub kyi lam bsgoms pa dang / de ltar mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin bsgom ste/ nyan thos de rnams kyang rig sngags yid la byed pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin dang srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar gang dag bcom
<p>302a.3</p>ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di la dad pa'i sems dang ldan zhing cung zad cig mchis par bas so zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan yang sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong ma thag tu dge ba'i sems la brtson zhing sems can gzhan rnams la yang sdang
<p>302a.4</p>ba dang sdig pa'i sems dang mi ldan zhing byams pa dang snying rje la brtson zhing chos kyi sems dang ldan te/ sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o/ /de'i yon tan gyis ni cung zad cig mchis bas so zhes bya ba'o/ /gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di la ma dad
<p>302a.5</p>pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni/ ches mang lags te zhes bya ba ni/ gang dang gang dag sems can rnams ni dge ba la mi brtson zhing sdig la brtson par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa'i sems dang sdang ba'i sems dang gcig gis gcig la 'tshe bar byed pa'i sems dang ldan
<p>302a.6</p>pa'o/ /byams pa dang snying rje'i sems dang ldan zhing chos la rtsom pa nyung ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis nyon mongs pa 'phral du skye ste/ phal cher sems can de rnams ni mtho ris su 'gro ba nyung zhing ngan song gsum du skye ba'o/ /de bas na 'byung
<p>302a.7</p>po yi dgas kyi lus thob nas kyang gzhan la gnod par byed pa'i sems dang ldan par skye ba'o/ /de dag ni zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i gdon dang 'byung po rnams glags btsal zhing / dge ba dang bsgom pa la sogs pa la bar chod byas nas mtho ris thob tu mi ster
<p>302b</p>
<p>302b.1</p>ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos srod dang tho rangs la mi nyal zhing sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa rnams la gnod par byed par sems lags te zhes bya ba ni/ phung po la gnod par byas nas rlung dang mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang 'dus pa'i nad
<p>302b.2</p>btang zhing dge ba'i sbyor ba de yang mi nus par byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa mang po 'dus pa'o/ /sems la gnod par byed cing mi dga' bar byed pa ste/ bsgom snying mi 'dod cing log par byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa mang po yod pa'o/ /bsgom pa'i dus su srog la
<p>302b.3</p>zhugs shing 'chi bar byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa mang po sha stag yod pa'o/ /bsgom pa'i dus su ltas ngan pa dang rmi lam ngan pa bstan zhing phal cher dngos por 'byung zhing sgom du mi ster ba ste/ bsgom pa'i gang zag la 'jigs par byas shing / nam sgom pa'i dus su
<p>302b.4</p>bar chod byed cing sgom du ster ba'o/ /de bas na gdon de dag gis gnod par bgyid pa lags te zhes bya'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor bzhi po la/ gdon gyis glags btsal ba'i gnas skabs te bzhi pa'o// //de dag dgag pa'i
<p>302b.5</p>slad du zhes bya ba ni gdon ma rungs pa rnams dang sdig can bdud kyi rigs dang sa dang bar snang dang sa 'og la rgyu ba'i 'byung po rnams stong phrag brgyad cu ste/ de phrag nyi shu rtsa drug go/ /de bzhin du g.yog dang chung ma dang bu dang bu mo la yang yin no/ /gnod sbyin ma rungs pa rnams dad par bgyi ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du
<p>302b.6</p>ma rungs pa'i gdon rnams mi dad de sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis dad par byed pa'o/ /dad pa rnams slar zhing dad par bgyi ba dang zhes bya ba ni phyi bzhin nas yod pa'i sems ni yang dang yang du dad pa skyes pa ste/ de 'ong bar mi byed pa'i sems ni brtan par mi byed
<p>302b.7</p>pa'o/ /'khor bzhi po rnams bde legs dang zhes bya ba ni sngar gnod par byed 'dod pa'i sems dang sdang bar 'dod pa'i gdon de rnams ni dad pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur na/ 'khor bzhi po de dag dang sems can thams cad bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /bde bar gnas
<p>303a</p>
<p>303a.1</p>par bgyi ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ bsgom pa dang nyan pa la yang bar chod med cing de bzhin du spyod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba la bar chod med cing de rnams la bde bar bgyi bas na bde ba'o/ /ma lus par shin tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ba'i slad du zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par
<p>303a.2</p>rtog pa ma lus par 'joms te/ de 'joms na bar du gcod pa'i bgegs kyang smos ci dgos te/ shes bya dang bag chags kyi dri mas mi gos pa'o/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di bshad par 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar yod
<p>303a.3</p>pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa thabs shes rab gnyis su med de/ de'i chos kyi nyams myong gis zla ba sems can rnams la bsil bar byed pa bzhin du des kyang sems can rnams la bde bar byas pa'o/ /rig sngags des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams
<p>303a.4</p>cad la nam mkhas khyab pa bzhin du khyab pa'o/ /mi ma yin pa sdang sems can/ /rgyal ba'i bstan la ma dad pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas sems can rnams la phan par bgyid pas mi ma yin gyi gdon dang / 
<p>303a.5</p>lha'i gdon la sogs pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa yang sdig pa'i sems med cing srog gcod pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyang srog mi gcod cing / bstan pa yang srung bar byed pa'o/ /de dag bdag gis bzlog par
<p>303a.6</p>bya/ /rgyal chen rnams ni bdag la nyon/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis ma dad par byas pa ste/ dad pa rnams kyang spang bar mi byed pa'o/ /rgyal chen bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang sems la zung shig ces
<p>303a.7</p>bya'o/ /mdo chen 'di ni thos nas kyang / /mi rnams la ni gnod ma byed/ /ces bya ba ni/ sdig pa thams cad rlag par byed pas na mdo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dod pas na mdo'o/ /yang na sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan dang chos kyi nges tshig dang / dge ba dang mi
<p>303b</p>
<p>303b.1</p>dge ba thams cad de nas 'byung zhing bshad de gsal bar bshad pas mdo zhes bya'o/ /chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ de lta bu'i ye shes kyi don thob pas na thob pa ste/ da lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi don gyis 'jigs pa med
<p>303b.2</p>cing gnod pa yang mi mnga' ste/ sems can rnams la phan par byed pa'o/ /gnod sbyin srin po klu rnams dang / /nam mkha' lding dang gsang ba pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa thams cad de rnams kyis byed de/ sdig pa yang de rnams kyis byed pa/ sems
<p>303b.3</p>can la gnod par byed cing za ba dang 'thung ba tshol ba'o/ /phan par mi 'dod gang yang rung / /de dag thams cad bzlog par bya/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang rig sngags kyi dmod mos/ ma rungs pa thams cad rlag par byed cing thal bar btang ste/ ma dad pa
<p>303b.4</p>rnams kyang snang bar mi byed do/ /lha dang lha min rlung lha dang / /ma mo'i tshogs kyis gang ba yi/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs kyi khams kyi lha dang / /'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams dang / /phyogs skyong ba la sogs pa dang / dam tshig la gnas pa'i lha mo rnams
<p>303b.5</p>yin te/ de yang ye shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi lha mo rnams so/ /gzhal med khang mdzes de dag ni/ /me dang 'dra bar 'od gsal zhing / /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal yas khang la gnas te/ ye shes pa yang de bzhin yin te/ so
<p>303b.6</p>so rang rang gi 'od zer gyi snang bas nam mkha' la mdzes par snang ba'o/ /nyi ma zla ba'i tshul 'dra bar/ /rin chen las byas shin tu snang / /zhes bya ba ni/ mun pa mun nag gi nang na/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches mi snang ste/ de bzhin du nyi ma zla bas gsal bar byas
<p>303b.7</p>shing rin po che mthong ngo / /de bzhin du glo bur gyi skyon nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bkag cing / bla ma dam pa rnams kyi gdams ngag bstan pas ye shes de snang ba'o/ /bsod nams byas pa dag gis gang / /rab sdang gdon rnams rnam par spangs/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>304a</p>
<p>304a.1</p>de bzhin de'i dge ba byas pa'i bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /gnod par byed pa dang / sdig ba bsags pa thams cad des de'i 'joms par byed pa'o/ /mi la gnod byed gang yin pa'i/ /'byung po grul bum srin po dang / /zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>304a.2</p>khams gsum tsam yang skad cig gis khyab ste/ /la la bza' rgyu yod cing mchod par 'os te/ la la sems can rnams kyis kyang sdang zhing dmod mos pa'o/ /de 'byung po rnams kyis kyang mi'i sems can la gnod par byed pa'o/ /yi dgas srul po de dag gis/ /rmad
<p>304a.3</p>byung de dag mi mthong ste/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi ye shes sdig can de dag gis mi mthong zhing de dag rnams kyang bde bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzi brjid ldan pa'i lha rnams kyis/ /grong khyer du yang mi 'gro'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig
<p>304a.4</p>rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams te/ sems can la gnod par mi byed cing / byams pa dang snying rjes 'tsho ba'o/ /de rnams kyi gzi brjid kyis ma rungs pa'i gdon rnams kyang rtsar 'gro bar mi nus shing / /gnas kyang thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /'byung po chen po 'du ba
<p>304a.5</p>na/ /der yang de dag 'dur mi dbang / /zhes bya ba ni/ sems can la gnod par byed pa 'byung po de kun yang / lcang lo can gyi pho brang ci smos te/ de'i ra ba'i phyi rol yang mi thob cing / rig sngags kyi dmod mos bde bar mi gnas pa'o/ /stan nam yang na chu
<p>304a.6</p>yang rung / /zas dang skom yang mi dbang ngo / /zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin de la dam las 'das pa rnams 'thung ba dang za ba ci smos te/ 'thung ba'i skom yang zangs [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]chur mthong ngo / /bza' ba'i zas kyang lcags kyi thu lum 'bar bar mthong / lus ngan gyi ni pho brang du/ /
<p>304a.7</p>nam yang de dag 'gro mi 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lcang lo can gyi pho brang du sdig can 'byung po gnod byed rnams dang / gzhan yang gnod sbyin rnams kyis srung zhing pho brang nang du stan yang thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po rnams kyi tshig /'byung
<p>304b</p>
<p>304b.1</p>po gang zhig mi nyan pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis smras pa ste/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po ni/ yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / spyan mi bzang dang / lus ngan po rnams yin te/ de'i rig sngags kyi dmod mo dang rgyal po bzhi'i chad pas/ 'byung
<p>304b.2</p>po de rnams bde bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de yi kha nas khrag dron dag /myur du rab tu 'bab par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po de rnams rgyal po chen po bzhi'i chad pas myur du nad kyis thebs te/ kha nas khrag dron skyug cing srog gi dus la bab ste/ mda'
<p>304b.3</p>'phangs pa bzhin du myur du dmyal bar skyes so/ /de yi brla yi g.yas rol nas/ /phol mig dag kyang 'byung 'gyur te/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyi brla g.yas rol nas ma rungs pa'i nad 'byung ste/ de ci'i phyir 'byung zhe na/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa
<p>304b.4</p>dang / sems can la gnod par byas pa'i phyir ro/ /de ni nad kyis 'chi 'gyur zhing / /gdon sbyin gzugs kyang ston par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ nad de rnams kyis btab na 'chi ste/ tshe phyi ma la ngan song gsum du skye zhing / 'byung po'i lus blangs par gyur kyang
<p>304b.5</p>gzhan rnams kyis bsnyen du mi btub cing / /de bas kyang sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten skyong gis bshad pa yi/ /mdo las gang zhig 'gal byed pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten skyong ba bcu po ste/ brgya byin dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / gnod
<p>304b.6</p>sbyin dang / me lha dang / srin po dang / rlung lha dang / dbang ldan dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / tshangs pa dang / sa bdag dang ngo / /de rnams kyis kyang chad par gsungs so/ /yang na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba ni thabs la mkhas pa/ sems can la
<p>304b.7</p>snying rje che ba/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ /de rnams kyis kyang bden pa'i bka' gsungs pa'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad de la'o/ /mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa dang / me'i char 'bab pa dang / gnod sbyin
<p>305a</p>
<p>305a.1</p>'byung po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang / za ba dang skom med cing rig sngags kyang dmod mos 'chi ba'i dus su mgo tshal par 'gas nas 'chi'o/ /rgyal po chen po rnams kyi tshig /gnod sbyin gang dag ma nyan pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po rnams
<p>305a.2</p>thos kyi bu la sogs pas gsungs te/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'da' ba dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bka' ma nyan par gyur na/ de rnams kyis sdug bsngal chen po thob pa'o/ /'byung po srin po gang yod pa/ /ngan phreng lhag pa'i ngan phreng rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>305a.3</p>'byung po de rnams ni gcig la gcig gi phrag dog gis ngan sems skye ste/ de'i ngan pa yang nas yang du ngan pa'o/ /lcags las byas pa'i 'khor lo yi/ /mtshon cha spu gri so 'dra bas/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de yis de ngan pa rnams ni rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das te/ 
<p>305a.4</p>mtshon cha lta bu'i las kyi spu gris yang nas yang du gcod cing sdug bsngal chen po thob pa'o/ /gnod sbyin de dag brlag par 'gyur/ /rgyal po chen po dpal dang ldan/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' las 'das pa dang / rig sngags kyi
<p>305a.5</p>bka'i dmod mos rlag par byed pa ste/ de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis kyang / dpal dang ldan pa ni gzi brjid che zhing stobs che ba ste/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /go cha sra zhing mtshon rno la/ stan rnams la ni 'khod pa dag /ces bya ba ni/ 
<p>305a.6</p>sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa la ni/ de dag dang 'khod par byas nas/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs nas phyogs phyogs su bsdad pa'o/ /shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung / /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>305a.7</p>dri za'i rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor g.yog dang bcas pa ste/ de bzhin du grul bum gyi rgyal po 'khor g.yog dang bcas pa'o/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang / /byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/ /zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad
<p>305b</p>
<p>305b.1</p>'khor g.yog dang bcas pa ste/ de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnams kyang yin no/ /go cha gon zhing mtshon sna tshogs pa stobs dang ldan pa sha stag go/ /de dag de na 'khod pa yi/ /nyen skor gnod sbyin 'di rnams gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni phyogs bzhi nas bu dang 'khor
<p>305b.2</p>g.yog dang chung ma la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang phyogs phyogs nas srung zhing gnas pa'o/ /seng ge'i gzugs dang stag gi gzugs/ /mi sdug pa dang 'gro zhing rgyu/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyang 'dul bar byed pa'i rgyal po rnams ni seng ge dang stag gi mgo can du gnas
<p>305b.3</p>pa'o/ /skad cig mas stong rgyu zhing 'khor bar gnas pa'o/ /glang chen gzugs dang rta yi gzugs/ /kha cig ma he'i gzugs can te/ /zhes bya ba ni stobs dang ldan zhing gzi brjid che ste/ skad cig mas ri rab rtse mo dang bar snang dang sa steng dang sa 'og tu dus gcig tu rgyu'o/ /
<p>305b.4</p>dred mo dang ni ba yi gzugs/ /lug dang spyang ki phag rgod rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyang sna tshogs kyi gzugs su sprul zhing sems can rnams la bstan pa'o/ /rna ba 'phyang dang rna bo che/ /rna ba gcig pa tha dad pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ glang po che bzhin du
<p>305b.5</p>rna ba 'phyang ba ste/ rna ba gcig pus gos byas shing / /lus po thams cad khebs pa ste/ /de bzhin du gzugs bstan zhing sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o/ /skad cher 'byin cing 'jigs byed pa/ /sa gzhi rab tu g.yo bar byed/ /ces bya ba ni/ bum pa'i nang du skad
<p>305b.6</p>smras pa bzhin du sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byas shing 'jigs par byed de/ bar chod byed pa dang / gnod par byed pa'i dus su sa g.yo zhing skad sna tshogs 'don par byed pa'o/ /bong bu dang ni rnga mo che/ /cha lugs gzhan yang nye 'khor 'khod/ /ces bya ba ni/ mi'i lus la rnga mo
<p>305b.7</p>bong bu'i mgo bo dang / gzhan yang sems can gyi gzugs su sprul nas/ gzugs dngos su bstan pa dang / rmi lam du bstan pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po stobs po che/ /de dag phan tshun 'du ba ni/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du stobs dang ldan pas 'byung po ma rungs pa rnams kyang / 
<p>306a</p>
<p>306a.1</p>rgyal po chen po rnams kyis 'dul zhing sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'o/ /lha yi shing rta bcas pa yis/ /nam mkha' las ni 'gro bar byed/ /ces bya ba ni/ sna tshogs pa'i mtshon cha thogs shing dpung dang bcas shing 'gro ba ste/ de bzhin du bar
<p>306a.2</p>snang dang sa 'og dang sa stengs la rgyu ba'o/ /gnod sbyin dag gi bdag po yang / /mi rnams la ni bde legs byed/ /ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing / gnod sbyin 'khor g.yog stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bdag po ste/ 
<p>306a.3</p>rnam thos kyi bu de yang sems can la gnod par mi byed cing / snying rje la gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin du rig sngags la mchod par byed cing / gus par byed pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni gang zhe na/ las kyi rigs las/ las kyi rigs ma yin te/ mtshon pa ni bya ba nan tan
<p>306a.4</p>gyi ye shes/ /mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'o/ /ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum zhal gsum phyag drug pa sku mdog ljang gu'o/ /zhal g.yas mthing ga /g.yon dmar ba ste/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na
<p>306a.5</p>ral gri dang rdo rje rgya gram mo/ /g.yon pa gnyis na/ skyabs sbyin dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /phyag 'og ma'i g.yas g.yon gyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa ste/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'o/ /zhabs g.yas bskum pa/ g.yon brkyang ba/ pad+ma dang zla
<p>306a.6</p>ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing / nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan zhing bzhad pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ b+ha ga hu mu le b+ha ga hu mu le/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu/ /mi la zhon pa sde bcas
<p>306a.7</p>pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos pa tsam gyis lus 'dar zhing 'jigs par gnas te/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyang de bzhin no/ /'di smras nas ni tshub ma langs/ /de bzhin ri yang
<p>306b</p>
<p>306b.1</p>g.yos par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di'i gzi brjid dang stobs kyis rlung tshub sna tshogs 'byung ste/ sa ni lan drug tu g.yos shing / dril bu'i skad bzhin du rings par snang ngo / /rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu'i/ /rin chen
<p>306b.2</p>shing rta bcas pa na/ /zhes bya ba ni/ byang ngos kyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu de yang gzugs sna tshogs bstan zhing / rin po che'i gdan la bzhugs nas/ skad sna tshogs smra ba'o/ /lha dang mi yi sgra skad bsgrags/ /rgyal po chen po mchis pa na/ /zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang mi'i
<p>306b.3</p>gzugs su sprul zhing rdzu 'phrul chen po bstan te/ skad sna tshogs kyang de bzhin du smras pa'o/ /dngos po rnams kyang 'bar 'gyur ro/ /srin po 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gsang sngags kyi dmod mo dang / gnod sbyin
<p>306b.4</p>gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu'i stobs kyis kyang / ma rungs pa'i srin po 'byung po rnams kyang dngos po rnams ni skrag par 'gyur ro/ /de yi mdun na rgyug par bgyid/ /mi ma yin pa'i gzugs rnams kyis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gzi brjid de mthong zhing 'jigs par byed cing phyir
<p>306b.5</p>'gro ba'o/ /'jigs shing skrag pa skyed par bgyid/ /che zhing gtum la mi bzad pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni/ sems can la 'tshe bar byed cing / rmi lam nyams pa la yang gzugs bstan zhing / 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs te rtag tu sems can la
<p>306b.6</p>gnod par byed pa'o/ /drag cing mthong na mi sdug la/ /spu yang ring la sen mo ring / /zhes bya ba ni/ bzhin mi sdug cing lus dang gdong pa khra bor gnas te/ khab dang 'dra ba'i spus ni lus la khengs shing de bzhin du sder mo yang mtshon dang 'dra ba'o/ /lag na ral gri tho
<p>306b.7</p>ba thogs/ /so ni zangs can 'jigs par bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams ni khrag khrug la dga' zhing / phra ma byed pa la dga' ba ste/ de bzhin du khrag khrug byed pa'i sha khrag la dga' zhing 'jigs pa'i ral gri dang 'jigs pa'i zangs kyi so rnams
<p>307a</p>
<p>307a.1</p>kyis sems can la 'tshe bar byed pa'o/ /sna che rnga mo stag gi 'dra/ /drag cing lag pa khrag dmar ba/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po 'di rnams kyis kyang sna tshogs kyi gzugs bstan zhing / mi'i lus la mgo gcig pa bstan zhing bud med kyi mngal
<p>307a.2</p>khrag la dga' zhing byis pa rnams la gnod par byed pa'o/ /yan lag ma tshang phyed tshal lus/ /mig ser lus kyang shin tu ser/ /zhes bya ba ni/ la la mgo bo med cing brang la gdong pa yod pa ste/ la la lag pa gcig med cing / mgo la gnas pa'o/ /tshan
<p>307a.3</p>gcig la yang rkang pa gcig med cing / /lte ba nas res snang res mi snang bar byed de/ la la phyed gzugs su snang zhing sems can rnams skrag par byed pa'o/ /dri ma can la lus skem pa/ /skra brdzes lcags kyi mchu can la/ /zhes bya ba ni keng rus la pags
<p>307a.4</p>pas g.yogs pa dang 'dra ba yod de/ de la drag pa chags shing bzhin mi sdug pa ste/ khab kyi rtse mo tsam gyi mchu la gsus pa yang ri tsam mo/ /de lta bu'i lus la skra bzang brdzes pa'o/ /mtshon cha tshabs cher 'debs par bgyid/ /rna ba gzhu 'dra stobs po che/ /zhes
<p>307a.5</p>bya ba ni/ 'thab mo la sbyar te/ gcig la gcig 'dzugs shing / 'khrug pa dpung dang bcas pa byas te/ de la mtshon cha tshabs cher 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'o/ /rna ba gzhu 'dra ba yod cing bzhin mi sdug pa yin te/ de lta bu'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams la
<p>307a.6</p>drag por gnod pa'o/ /sbrul gyi gzugs can be'u'i gzugs/ /phag gi gzugs can lto bo che/ /zhes bya ba ni/ mi'i lus la mgo brnyan mi gcig pa ste/ rtag tu ltas dang rmi lam la yang de'i gzugs bstan la/ rnam par rtog pa skye bar byed pa'o/ /de skyes pa dang nad drag
<p>307a.7</p>pos mi tshugs te/ nad kyis srog dang bral bar byed pa'o/ /mgo bo che la lag ring ba/ /rna 'phyang po la nu ma 'phyang / /zhes bya ba ni/ tshan gcig 'dre mo'i gzugs yod de/ dpag tshad brgya'i bar nas kyang 'tshe bar byas shing sha khrag len nus te/ bzhin mi sdug cing
<p>307b</p>
<p>307b.1</p>lag pa ring ba'i sbar mos 'debs pa'o/ /de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yi/ /g.yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor/ zhes bya ba ni/ de dag ni rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i 'khor yin te/ stobs che zhing mi srun te/ khams gsum tsam la 'gyur zhing dur khrod
<p>307b.2</p>bsil ba'i tshal na gnas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams/ /de dag ma ni lam log can/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de dag ni byang phyogs na gnas pa ste/ byang gi phyogs nas 'ongs nas/ tshan gcig phan bya dang gnod bya gnyis byed par 'ongs pa ste/ tshan gcig snying rje
<p>307b.3</p>med cing sems can la 'tshe ba/ tshan gcig snying rje dang ldan zhing sems can la grogs byed pa'o/ /g.yog 'khor de dag lhan cig tu/ /bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de dag lta bu'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu
<p>307b.4</p>'khod cing gus pas phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed de/ chos dang ldan zhing snying rje skye ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis 'tshe bar mi nus
<p>307b.5</p>pa'o/ /drag cing rgod la gtum pa dang / /lto bo che la skra ring ba/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de lta bu'i tshan gcig byung ste/ sdig la mi 'dzem zhing sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa drag po'i tshul bstan nas/ phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir 'gyu ba'o/ /mi rnams dang ni ri
<p>307b.6</p>dgas dang / /bya rnams gzi brjid 'phrog par bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni/ tshan gcig grong ngam grong khyer du phyin cing mi rnams kyi lus la zhugs nas gzi brjid 'phrog pa ste/ tshan gcig ni ri dgas la sogs pa'i sems can la 'tshe bar byas nas srog 'phrog ste/ sems
<p>307b.7</p>can rnams la ma rungs par byed pa'i 'byung po'o/ /me 'bar za dang mang du za/ /mig gcig pa dang mig ser dang / /zhes bya ba ni/ bzhin mi sdug cing gzugs sna tshogs bstan te/ sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed cing ma'i mngal nas zhugs nas gzi brjid
<p>308a</p>
<p>308a.1</p>'phrogs pa rnams so/ /sna dang rna ba bcad pa dang / /chad pa mang pos bcad pa dang / /zhes bya ba ni/ tshan gcig kyang sna dang rna ba bcad pa'i gzugs su byas nas/ sems can 'tshe bar byas te/ de rnams kyis kyang mi rnams kyi lus la zhugs
<p>308a.2</p>nas ma rungs pa thams cad byed pa'o/ /gzhan rnams kyis kyang de'i 'bras bu sna dang rna ba dang / rkang pa dang / lag pa gcod pa'i chad pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /de yang 'byung po rnams kyis skyon byas pa yin no/ /mgo ma mchis dang mgo bcad dang / /lus kyang sgur la gnyer
<p>308a.3</p>ma gdong / /zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams tshan gcig gis kyang sems can rnams la rmi lam dang / ltas dang / dngos por mthong bar byas te/ de'i rtog pas nad sna tshogs btang zhing sems can gyi srog 'phrog pa'o/ /de rnams ni ltas ngan gyi 'byung po rnams yin no/ /
<p>308a.4</p>mig la me 'bar rkang phyed pa/ /mi rnams 'jigs par bgyid pa ste/ /zhes bya ba ni/ nags tshal lam/ dur khrod dam/ ri dang / lung stong la gnas pa ste/ sems can mi rnams kyis mthong bar gyur pa na ngo sbed pa ste/ 'byung po des sems can mthong na nyin mo
<p>308a.5</p>gnod mi nus shing / mtshan mo'i rigs la cis kyang phan pa med cing srog 'phrog pa'o/ /'phel ka che la rgod bag can/ /de bzhin 'gro zhing rgyu bar bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni/ 'phel ka che zhing mtshan rnams rgyu ba ste/ pho mo nyal ba'i dus su mnyan nas glags rnyed par
<p>308a.6</p>gyur na lus la 'jug ste/ bdud kyi rigs su skyes nas pha ma rnams skrag par byed pa'o/ /de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yi/ /g.yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ga la der 'byung po rnams kyis bskor te/ phyogs gcig tu
<p>308a.7</p>'khod de/ 'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar bsdad pa'o/ /gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams/ /de dag ma ni rkun ma lags/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de dag kun kyang dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal na gnas shing / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i 'khor yin te/ de rnams
<p>308b</p>
<p>308b.1</p>kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis 'khod pa'o/ /g.yog 'khor de dag lhan cig tu/ /bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dpon g.yog de rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas phyag
<p>308b.2</p>'tshal ba'o/ /gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi spyan sngar sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed cing snying rje dang ldan te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi dmod mos 'tshe
<p>308b.3</p>bar mi nus pa'o/ /bdag cag gi ni gnas 'di na/ shing rta zhes bgyi srin po mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ lho nub kyi mtshams na lang ka na gnas pas srin po'i tshogs mang po 'byung ste/ de rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams la gnod par byed cing 'bru gu'i nad rnams
<p>308b.4</p>gtong ba'o/ /de la bu mo stobs ldan pa/ /stong phrag bcu yi grangs snyed mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ srin mo'i tshogs kyang de rnams 'byung ste/ stobs dang ldan zhing rang gi kha dog tu snang ba de rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod pa'o/ /de
<p>308b.5</p>dag bdag gi g.yog lags te/ /de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar g.yog du ma dang bcas nas mchis te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o zhes bya ba'o/ /gau tam dpa' bo khyod
<p>308b.6</p>la ni/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten bla ma'i spyan snga ru/ sems can rnams la snying rje dang ldan zhing 'tshe bar mi byed de/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o/ /bdag cag gis ni gnas
<p>308b.7</p>rnams na/ /mgrin rings zhes bya'i srin mo mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ lang ka mgrin bcu'i rigs mgo bcu gcig yod pa 'jigs su rung ba rnams 'byung ba'o/ /srin mo shin tu gnag pa dag /srin mo nag mo zhes bgyi dang / /zhes bya ba ni/ dpal lha mo dang / 'khor
<p>309a</p>
<p>309a.1</p>g.yog yin te/ srin mo ral pa gcig pa rnams/ 'khor g.yog du ma dang bcas pa byung ste/ de rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga ru'o/ /srin mo rab gnas rnams mchis te/ /de dag gau tam mthun par lta/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram
<p>309a.2</p>na zangs gling zhes bya ba'i yul na gnas te/ de bas kyang gnag pa lnga brgya yod de/ de rnams kyis kyang sems can la 'tshe bar byas shing / bud med du brdzus nas gnod pa skyel ba'o/ /sa yi gnod sbyin bdag nyid che/ /de dag sa stengs gnas pa lta/ /zhes bya ba
<p>309a.3</p>ni/ nor rgyun ma'i 'khor g.yog yin te/ de yang ljang ma mo dang / kun du bzang mo dang / 'od ldan ma la sogs pa yin te/ de rnams kyis kyang sems can la gnod par mi byed cing / phan pa sha stag ste/ sa la gnas shing sa la bdag byed pa'o/ /g.yog 'khor de
<p>309a.4</p>dag rnams kyis ni/ /yongs su bskor te 'dir mchis lags/ /zhes bya ba ni/ srin po dang / srin mo dang / sa bdag mo la sogs pa 'khor g.yog du ma dang thabs cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ro/ /de dag kun dang lhan cig tu/ /bdag ni phyag
<p>309a.5</p>'tshal slad du mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags dang / sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su mchi'o/ /sems can la gnod par mi byed cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig tu 'khod pa'o/ /gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ /chos bzhin mthun par
<p>309a.6</p>lta zhing mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug la bdag cag sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed cing spyan sngar mchis pa'o/ /bdag gi mdun na rgyug pa yi/ /yi dgas gnod sbyin srin po rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>309a.7</p>lus ngan po'i spyan sngar rgyug pa'i ma rungs pa byed pa la dga' ba'i 'khor tshan gcig yod de/ sdig la dga' zhing snying la mi sdug pa sha stag go/ /lus chen shugs kyang drag po ste/ /so yang che la lto bo che/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten g.yo bar nus shing yud tsam
<p>309b</p>
<p>309b.1</p>gyis gang la yang khyab ste/ gzi brjid che zhing rbad pa la dga' ste/ /de'i gzugs kyis sems can la gnod par byed pa'o/ /rna 'phyang 'jigs pa chen po ste/ /slob ma sna la rab tu 'phyang / /zhes bya ba ni/ glags btsal te dam tshig nyams pa la smad
<p>309b.2</p>cing gnod pa che bar byas pa ste/ de rnams kyis kyang chad pa gcod cing drag shul bstan pa'o/ /yan lag drug pa so bstan pa/ /gur gum mdog can tho ba 'dra/ /zhes bya ba ni/ mgo bo drug phyag drug /rkang pa drug de bzhin du sprul pa ste/ mdog mdzes pa ste/ 
<p>309b.3</p>mche ba gtsigs shing so gtsigs shing sems can rnams la ston par byed pa'o/ /so yang rtsub cing rno ba dang / /mdung thung gsal zhing 'jigs par bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni/ sems can la gnod pa byed pa'i dus su ni mtshon cha sna tshogs bstan te/ /so rno zhing
<p>309b.4</p>sems can smad pa la dga' ba'o/ /glang chen mgo dang bum rna can/ /mgo bo seng ge stag dang 'dra/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs sna tshogs par sprul zhing sems can rnams la 'jigs par byed pa ste/ de rnams mi srun zhing gnod par byed pa la dga' ba'o/ /
<p>309b.5</p>lcags kyi so can lcags kyi skra/ /gdon rnams rnam par skrag bgyid pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ mtshon gyi so dang khab kyi skra ste/ de bzhin du lus po'i ba spu rnams kyang yin no/ /nang la nang 'thab 'dod cing sems can gyi lus la zhugs nas kyang de bzhin no/ /lag
<p>309b.6</p>na lcags kyi gtun bu thogs/ /lag na lcags kyi tho ba thogs/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gdon de rnams kyang 'thab pa'i dus su de bzhin te/ de'i tshul gyis bstan zhing sems can la 'thab rtsod rngod par byed pa'o/ /so rnon lag pa ring ba ste/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs
<p>309b.7</p>can lcags kyi mchu/ /zhes bya ba ni/ /za ba'i dus su so rno ba/ /gnod par byed pa lag ring ba/ /yang na lag pa ring ba ni phyogs gcig na bsdad nas dpag tshad brgyar slebs pa'o/ /drag po'i tshul du bstan zhing mtshon gyi mchu dang ldan pa'o/ /mgo
<p>310a</p>
<p>310a.1</p>bo che la skra g.yengs pa/ /nag cing mig ser sna zhom pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yan lag phra zhing bong thung ba ste/ mgo bo che la bzhin mi sdug ste/ sol ba'i mdog la mig la me 'bar te/ sna med cing sug sug byed pa de'i gzugs kyis gnod par byed
<p>310a.2</p>pa'o/ /bum pa'i mgrin dang mig dmar ba/ /mig gcig pa dang lto bo che/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bum pa 'dra ba'i lba ba gsum yod pa ste/ de'i lus la mig dmar ba'o/ /mig gcig sbrul gyi mgo can te/ stobs dang ldan zhing sa bdag gi gzugs su gnas pa'o/ /
<p>310a.3</p>mchu 'phyang po dang lag gcig pa/ /rkang gcig pa dang rkang gnyis pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ chu srin gyi mchu dang ldan pa/ lus la lag pa gcig med cing 'jigs su rung ba ste/ la la yang rkang pa re re yod cing gnyis gnyis 'grogs nas 'gro ba'o/ /
<p>310a.4</p>gzhan yang khro bo'i tshul du yod pa la rkang pa gnyis dang ldan pa'o/ /kha med kha gnyis drag po ste/ /mi rnams rab tu 'jigs par bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni/ khab kyi kha la gsus po che ste/ kha yang kha ltag khung na yang kha yod pas kha gnyis yod pa ste/ 
<p>310a.5</p>de bzhin du mi rnams la yang gnod pa ste/ drag po'i tshul gyis gnod par byed pa'o/ /lag na 'khar ba dbyug pa thogs/ /mdud rtse gsum pa drag cing 'jigs/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gdon ma rungs pa rnams la ni/ mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs shing mi rnams la
<p>310a.6</p>'jigs par byed pa ste/ de bzhin du 'tshe ba drag po byed pa'o/ /skrag cing 'jigs par byed pa ste/ /gdon rnams rnam par skrag bgyid pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ drag po'i tshul gyis gnod par byed de de bzhin du gdon sna tshogs kyis nad sna tshogs btang nas 'tshe
<p>310a.7</p>bar byed pa'o/ /skrag par bgyid cing smra bar bgyid/ /sems kyang 'khrugs par byed pa ste/ /zhes bya ba ni/ nad kyis thebs shing lab lob smrar 'jug pa ste/ yang na sems can de smyos par byas nas sems gtong zhing kha'i kha bden smra ba'o/ /smyo bar
<p>310b</p>
<p>310b.1</p>bgyid cing rmongs par bgyid/ /de nas gzi brjid 'phrog par bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni/ gdon gyis btab pa de ni 'bog ste/ sems kyang gtong / de bzhin du ngag kyang med do/ /lus de yang nyon mongs shing dpal dang mi ldan te/ de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis
<p>310b.2</p>btab pa'o/ /de dag 'jig rten 'jigs pa ste/ /stobs po che la brten par dka'/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la sems can gyis sems can la gnod par byas te/ 'jigs shing skrag par byed pa'i phyir na/ rig sngags kyi rgyal
<p>310b.3</p>mo bsil ba'i tshal la brten pa'o/ /stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi po/ /rgyal po chen po'i mdun na rgyug /ces bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lus ngan po'i mdun du rgyug ste/ de dag 'jigs nas skyabs gsol ba'o/ /de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yi/ /g.yog
<p>310b.4</p>'khor dag gis yongs su bskor/ /zhes bya ba ni/ lus ngan po dang thabs cig tu/ /sangs rgyas ga la ba der 'khor de/ gus par bskyed nas thabs cig tu'o/ /gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag rnams/ /de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/ /zhes bya ba
<p>310b.5</p>ni/ 'khor g.yog bdag cag sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis te/ gus par byas nas rig sngags la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bdud bzhi
<p>310b.6</p>bcom pa la dpa' bo ste/ de bzhin du mun pa mun nag bsal te/ 'jig rten las 'das nas sems can rnams kyi don byed pa ste/ bdag cag gi sems kyis sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed de/ rig sngags bdag gis gzung bar bya/ /sa ga
<p>310b.7</p>lngas rtsen zla ba dang / /seng ge sde dang rab gnon dang / /zhes bya ba ni/ de yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa gnyis yin te/ de rnams kyi ming grangs ni gsang sngags che dang la ba la sogs pa'o/ /rig pa stobs chen nor bu dang / /zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>311a</p>
<p>311a.1</p>gsang sngags chen dang / la ba la sogs pa'i bar nas 'di dag yin te/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa gnyis de yang stobs dang ldan zhing gzi brjid che ba ste/ kha dog dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi rtsod pa
<p>311a.2</p>las rtsod par nus te/ gnod sbyin de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung zhing / rig sngags la rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /'jog po nag po chen po dang / /la ba can dang rje'u gnyis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po klu rigs bzhi yin te/ de dag
<p>311a.3</p>kyang sa dang chu la gnas shing bstan pa bsrung ba'o/ /klu yi rgyal po sa srung bu/ /yan lag chen po rdzu 'phrul che/ /zhes bya ba ni/ stobs dang ldan zhing kha dog dang ldan te/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung zhing 'jigs pa med cing / gnod par mi byed pa'o/ /
<p>311a.4</p>nam mkha' lding ni shugs chen ldan/ /'dab chags kun gyi mchog gyur pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig can yin te/ 'dab chags bya ba la gzugs che zhing stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /bya yi shugs kyis 'chi bgyid cing / /
<p>311a.5</p>rgya mtsho kun du 'khrug par bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni/ sems can des klu'i sems can rnams la 'jigs par byed de/ de yang de dag rnams kyis kyang / /'tshe bar byed pa'i rgyu la gnas pa'o/ /lha dang lha min dri za rnams/ /'jigs bgyid pa dang dge ba'ang
<p>311a.6</p>rung / /zhes bya ba ni/ phan byed dang gnod byed gnyis nus te/ de rnams kyis kyang phan par byed pa dang / gnod par byed pa la gnas pa'o/ /ma dad pa dang dad pa rnams/ /de dag thams cad 'dir mchis te/ /zhes bya ba ni/ chos la gnas pa dang mi gnas pa gnyis
<p>311a.7</p>sdig la 'dzem pa dang mi 'dzem pa gnyis yin te/ de dag rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis so/ /gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das la dpa' ba nyon mongs
<p>311b</p>
<p>311b.1</p>pas mi tshugs shing thugs rje dang ldan pa ste/ gdon de rnams kyang rig sngags kyi mthus chos dang ldan par gnas pa'o/ /'phrog ma zhes bya gnod sbyin mo/ /'jigs par bgyid pa stobs chen mo/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi bu tsha ni snying du sdug ste/ gzhan gyi bu tsha rnams
<p>311b.2</p>'jigs par byed cing / gnod byed nus pa ste/ des kyang byis pa rnams la 'jigs par byed cing srog 'phrog pa'o/ /de yi bu ni lnga brgya rnams/ /'jigs bgyid gnod sbyin mthu rtsal can/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'phrog ma'i bu ste/ de rnams kyis kyang sems can la gnod
<p>311b.3</p>par byed cing mngal nas rlag par byed de/ ma dang bu rnams kyang srog 'phrog pa'o/ /bdag nyid kyi ni g.yog lags te/ /de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya dang / 'phrog ma dang bcas pa 'khor g.yog du ma gnas te/ 
<p>311b.4</p>de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol te/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyogs gcig tu gnas pa'o/ /gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ nyon mongs
<p>311b.5</p>pa rnams bcom zhing / de bzhin du de bcom ldan 'das la dpa' bo zhes bya ste/ sdig dang / dge ba dang bral zhing sangs rgyas pa'o/ /bdag cag gis kyang chos dang mthun par dge ba la gnas te/ sems can la snying rje bya zhing spyan sngar mchis pa'o/ /ma ga d+hA na
<p>311b.6</p>thams cad mthong / /ka shi na ni pad+ma 'chang / /zhes bya ba ni/ mngon sum du 'jig rten gsum la rdzu 'phrul gyis mthong ba ste/ stobs de dang ldan pa'i gnod sbyin ni rgya gar gyi dbus su'o/ /yul ko shi ka nas kyang pad+ma 'chad gnas te/ pad+ma bzhin du spyan yod
<p>311b.7</p>pa'i phyir na pad+ma 'chang ba'o/ /yangs pa can na rgyal mchog gnas/ /gyad yul na ni grags 'dzin gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni/ ma ga d+hA na gnod sbyin rgyal mchog gnas te/ de bzhin du gyad yul na yang de dang 'dra bar gnas pa te/ stobs che zhing gzi brjid dang ldan
<p>312a</p>
<p>312a.1</p>pa'o/ /rgyal po'i khab na ku m+b+hi ra/ /ser skya'i gnas na drag po ste/ /zhes bya ba ni/ ri'i rgyal po'i khab kyi ded dpon ni gnod sbyin chen po ku m+b+hi ra la sogs pa'o/ /de bzhin du ser skya'i yul na grags pa dang ldan pa'o/ /ta ma la ni 'byor
<p>312a.2</p>pa gnas/ /mi thi la dang kun du rgyal/ /zhes bya ba ni/ mi thi la dang ta ma la gnyis ni ma ga d+hA'i lho phyogs yin te/ gnod sbyin chen po 'byor pa dang kun du rgyal gnas pa'o/ /ma mo chen mo 'di brgyad ni/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyi sde dpon mchog /ces bya
<p>312a.3</p>ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi ma mo brgyad yin te/ de yang 'di dag gi ming ni 'joms pa'i dngos grub dang / keng rus can dang / tshangs chen ma dang / nag mo chen mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / rnam rgyal mo dang / drag mo dang / khyab 'jug mo dang brgyad do/ /de rnams
<p>312a.4</p>ni 'jig rten gyi mar gyur cing mi srun gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag mo'o/ /rdzu 'phrul chen mo skal ba che/ /stobs chen de dag thams cad ni/ /zhes bya ba ni/ skad cig mas 'jig rten khams la 'gyu ste/ kha dog ldan zhing gtor ma rnams len par byed
<p>312a.5</p>pa'o/ /gzhan rnams kyis kyang mchod par 'os shing gtor ma len du gtang ba'o/ /yid dge dad pa'i sems dang ldan/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la skyabs mchis pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ glo bur gyi dad pa ma yin pa snga nas kyang dad pa dang ldan te/ sangs rgyas kyi
<p>312a.6</p>bstan pa bsrung zhing rig sngags kyi chos la gus par byas te/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun la rjes su yi rang zhing skyabs su 'gro ba'o/ /de dag dang ni 'dus nas kyang / /rgyal po chen po stobs chen gyis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos
<p>312a.7</p>kyi bu yang stobs dang ldan te/ de dag kyang dbang du 'du zhing sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas bstan la/ /mi rnams la ni snying brtse slad/ /ces bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gzi brjid la brten nas/ rig sngags kyi dmod
<p>312b</p>
<p>312b.1</p>mo'i 'jigs pas 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi rnams 'jigs par mi byed cing / snying rje skye ba'o/ /gnod sbyin 'byung po yi dgas dang / /sdang ba'i gdon rnams bzlog pa dang / /zhes bya ba ni/ sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang rig
<p>312b.2</p>sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis gnod sbyin 'byung po'i gdon rnams zlog par byed cing / /de rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs pa'o/ /mi ma yin rnams bzlog pa yi/ /bsrung ba 'di ni legs par bgyis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ srung ba'i dam pa sbod gtong dang / rig pa dang / sngags
<p>312b.3</p>dang / de rnams bzlog pa ste/ de bzhin du 'byung po dang / yi dgas la sogs pa zlog par byed pa'o/ /de nas rgyal po rnam thos bu/ /thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der rgyal po chen po rnam thos bus/ pus mo g.yas
<p>312b.4</p>pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar nas zhus pa'o/ /khon dang 'jigs pa kun 'das pa/ /rnam grol zag pa mi mnga' ba/ /zhes bya ba ni/ shes bya'i dri ma dang / bag chags kyi dri ma mi gnas shing / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad
<p>312b.5</p>bcom ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar byed pa dam pa'i dam pa'o/ /gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams la dbang mdzad cing / bgegs thams cad bcom pa ste/ de bcom pas na/ 
<p>312b.6</p>dpa' bo zhes bya ba'o/ /gau tam la phyag 'tshal skyabs su 'gro ba'o/ /khyod la lha dang grub pa dang / /bram ze thams cad phyag 'tshal te/ /zhes bya ba ni/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal te/ 'jig rten pa'i stong spyi phud kyi bdag po yin te/ yang na bram ze
<p>312b.7</p>phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni/ tshangs par spyod pa'i dbang po de la phyag 'tshal skyabs su mchis zhes bya'o/ /gnod sbyin bye ba drug khri dang / /bzhi stong dag kyang lhags nas ni/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs sna tshogs bstan pa/ sna tshogs kyi lta ba yod pa/ gnod byed dang
<p>313a</p>
<p>313a.1</p>phan byed gnyis yod pa/ sdig pa dang / dge ba byed pa sha stag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mang po 'dus pa'o/ /kho ra khor yug yongs bskor nas/ /thal mo sbyar te 'khod gyur lags/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyis gzhi la/ gnod
<p>313a.2</p>sbyin 'byung po rnams pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs nas bskor zhing thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /bdag ni rgyal po rnam thos bu/ /byang phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po rnams thos kyi bus kyang gnod sbyin chen po 'khor
<p>313a.3</p>g.yog dang bcas shing byang phyogs na srung bar bgyid pa'o/ /'jig rten mgon po'i nye skor du/ /gnod sbyin rgyu ba smyo byed dang / /zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der gza' dang rgyu skar dang bcas shing bzhin sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa rnams kyis bskor te/ 'byung po mang
<p>313a.4</p>po spyan sngar 'dus pa'o/ /brjed byed dang ni mi'am ci/ /skem byed dang ni rims drag dang / /zhes bya ba ni/ glo bur du nad gtong ba dang / glo bur du bar chod byed pa 'di rnams yin te/ gzi brjid 'phrog pa 'di rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin
<p>313a.5</p>rims rnams zhag bzhi pa/ /de dag bdag gis bzlog par bgyi/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi gzi brjid kyis/ rims nad la sogs pa nad rigs mi gcig pa bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi zlog par byed pa'o/ /rig sngags
<p>313a.6</p>kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi/ 'byung po mang po rigs brtag pa'i gnas skabs te drug pa'o// //bsil ba'i tshal gyi rig sngags zhes bya ba 'di ni/ gang zhe na/ las kyi rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ni/ mtshon pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so/ /mtshon
<p>313a.7</p>byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal lo/ /gzugs kyi phung po ste/ khams ni sa'i khams so/ /skye mched ni mig ste/ rang bzhin ni ye shes lnga'o/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhal gsum
<p>313b</p>
<p>313b.1</p>pa/ phyag drug pa/ sku mdog dkar mo/ /zhal g.yas mthing ga /g.yon dmar ba/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang / 'khor lo/ g.yon pa gnyis na dgra sta dang rtse gsum/ 'og ma'i g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa/ zhabs g.yas bskum pa/ 
<p>313b.2</p>g.yon brkyang ba/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa ste/ zhi ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ u ha haM zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu lus ngan lcang lo
<p>313b.3</p>can gyi bdag po phyogs skyong bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' rig sngags kyi byin rlabs kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa srung ste/ byang phyogs skyong zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te zhes bya ba
<p>313b.4</p>ni/ sems can rnams la don byed cing / rnam thos kyi bu la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin 'byung po rnams kyis kyang skyabs su mchi zhes bya'o/ /de la bdag kyang phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams kyis phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de yang bcom ldan 'das
<p>313b.5</p>nyid la phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten dbang phyug sems can gyi don la sprul pa'i skus khyab pa de la bdag gis phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba'o/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/ /kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud/ /ces bya ba ni/ shes bya dang bag
<p>313b.6</p>chags kyi sgrib pa 'joms shing / 'jig rten gyi rnam par rtog pa grol zhing / rgyal ba rnam par rgyal na sangs rgyas so/ /'jig rten kun 'jigs skyob pa khyod la 'dud do zhes bya'o/ /yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>313b.7</p>phyin ci ma log cing nges par bdud bzhi bcom pa ste/ yang dag pa'i ye shes thob cing / sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /de lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis bdag kyang sems can la snying rje byas shing spyan sngar mchis so zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ rnam thos kyi bu'i tshig gi de
<p>314a</p>
<p>314a.1</p>nas so/ /rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung / /thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni/ /zhes bya ba ni/ shar phyogs kyi rgyal po dri za thams cad la dbang mdzad pa/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas zhu ba'o/ /
<p>314a.2</p>chos kyi rgyal po 'od mdzad pa/ /sangs rgyas dpal la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong 'jig rten la bshad nas sku mya ngan las 'das te/ chos de'i 'od zer 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la khyab ste/ de bzhin du de sangs rgyas shing snying rje
<p>314a.3</p>che la bdag gis phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'o/ /gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad spangs shing bdud rnams btul ba ste/ de bzhin du 'khor ba'i mun nag sel zhing sangs rgyas pa'o/ /de lta bu'i
<p>314a.4</p>chos kyi gzi brjid kyis bdag cag dri za rnams ni sems can rnams la snying rje byas shing spyan sngar mchis so/ /gau tam khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/ /de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi ye shes de ni bdag cag rnams kyis mi shes
<p>314a.5</p>te/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rang bzhin dang bral ba/ skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin no/ /srin po mthong na rab 'jigs pa/ /stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bzhin mi sdug pa dang / sdug pa rnams dri za srin po mang po 'dus pa'o/ /kho ra khor yug yongs
<p>314a.6</p>bskor nas/ /thal mo sbyar te 'khod gyur lags/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs su rung ba dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal la/ srin po'i gdon dang dri za'i gdon rnams kyis phyogs bzhi nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'jig rten mgon po la'o/ /bdag ni
<p>314a.7</p>rgyal po yul 'khor srung / /shar phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung zhing / rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ste/ rig sngags 'di 'chang ba'i gang zag la shar phyogs skyong bar bgyid cing sems can gyi
<p>314b</p>
<p>314b.1</p>don byed pa'o/ /'jig rten mgon po'i nye 'khor du/ /srin po rnams dang sha za dang / /zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis sangs rgyas kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing / de rnams kyis kyang skyong bar byed pa'o/ /dri za dang ni rlung lha rnams/ /de dag bdag gis
<p>314b.2</p>bzlog par bgyi/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung gis kyang / sbod gtong dang rig pa dang / sngags dang ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams bzlog cing rig sngags la gus par byed pa ste/ rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni gang zhe na/ las kyi rigs kyi rin chen rigs/ 
<p>314b.3</p>mtshon pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal lo/ /ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ sku mdog ser mo/ /
<p>314b.4</p>phyag g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang rin po che/ g.yon pa gnyis na pad+ma dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /de'i 'og ma g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o/ /zhabs g.yas pa bskum pa/ g.yon pa brkyang ba/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs
<p>314b.5</p>shing / nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan zhing sgeg pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ i Te mi Te la sogs rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung phyogs skyong bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ shar phyogs su skyong ba ste/ rig sngags
<p>314b.6</p>'di la bka' stsal zhing / sems can don la skyong ba'o/ /srin po dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ shar phyogs na gnod par byed pa de rnams ni/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis de rnams shar phyogs nas byung ba zlog pa'o/ /lha'i
<p>314b.7</p>nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te zhes bya ba ni/ dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung la skyabs su mchi ste/ shar phyogs kyi mnga' bdag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/ shar phyogs na yod pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis phyag 'tshal
<p>315a</p>
<p>315a.1</p>ba'o/ /de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal ba ste zhes bya ba ni/ bzhi bcom drug ldan/ de lta bu'i sangs rgyas la bdag cag rnams kyis phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa'o/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/ /kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la
<p>315a.2</p>'dud/ /ces bya ba ni/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga bcom ste/ de lnga dang bral nas mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kun nas kun du gzigs pa bcom ste/ de yang 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa bcom pa'o/ /yang dag
<p>315a.3</p>dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ phyin ci ma log cing rig sngags kyi ngo bo nyid bstan to/ de'i ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad bcom ste/ de lta bu'i chos la mthun par byas shing sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed
<p>315a.4</p>pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ yul 'khor srung gi tshig gi de nas so/ /rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po'o/ /thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos kyang stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i
<p>315a.5</p>lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te zhes bya ba'o/ /'jig rten mgon po skyabs mdzad pa/ /'jig rten kun la phan par mdzad/ /ces bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sprul pa'i skus khyab ste/ de rnams la byams pa dang snying rjes
<p>315a.6</p>gzigs nas sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'o/ /gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa rnams bcom zhing dpa' ba ste/ sku gsung thugs thams cad ma lus par sangs rgyas pa de'i
<p>315a.7</p>chos bzhin grul bum bdag cag gis mchis te/ sems can la 'tshe bar mi byed cing snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /grul bum yi dgas srul po rnams/ /stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi ni/ /zhes bya ba ni/ lho phyogs na grul bum gdon rigs mi gcig pa 'byung ste/ srun
<p>315b</p>
