<p>315b.1</p>pa dang mi srun po sha stag mang po 'dus pa'o/ /kho ra khor yug yongs bskor nas/ /thal mo sbyar te 'khod gyur lags/ /zhes bya ba ni phyogs phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das la gus pas thal mo sbyar
<p>315b.2</p>ba'o/ /bdag ni rgyal po 'phags skyes po/ /lho phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ste/ gang zag rig sngags 'chang ba'i de la lho phyogs skyong bar byed pa'o/ /'jig rten mgon po'i nye 'khor du/ /
<p>315b.3</p>'byung po rgyu ba gzi brjid 'phrog /ces bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang bar du gcod cing gzi brjid 'phrog pa ste/ drag shul gyis ni gnod pa byed pa'o/ /grul bum yi dgas srul po rnams/ /de dag bdag gis bzlog par bgyi/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>315b.4</p>sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis grul bum gyi gdon bzlog pa dang sbod gtong dang / sngags dang / rig pa rnams bzlog ste/ de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i rig pas bzlog pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i ngo bo ni gang zhe na/ las kyi
<p>315b.5</p>rigs kyi pad+ma'i rigs so/ /rig sngags 'di'i mtshon pa ni/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so/ /mtshon byed ni rig sngags bdag nyid do/ /phung po ni 'du shes kyi phung po ste/ khams ni me'i khams so/ /skye mched ni lce ste/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no/ /sangs
<p>315b.6</p>rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa/ sku mdog dmar mo/ /phyag g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang pad+ma/ g.yon pa gnyis na lcags kyu dang zhags pa/ 'og ma'i g.yas g.yon gnyis
<p>315b.7</p>kyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o/ /zhabs g.yas bskum pa/ g.yon brkyang ba/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa ste/ cung zad khro bo'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ a
<p>316a</p>
<p>316a.1</p>le i le le la sogs pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po phyogs skyong bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi tshig gis rig sngags 'dzin pa'i gang zag dang sems can thams
<p>316a.2</p>cad la rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos rig sngags kyi dam las ma 'da' bar bsrungs pa'o/ /grul bum dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos kyang lho phyogs skyong zhing nad thams cad 'joms shing grul bum la sogs pa'i yi dgas
<p>316a.3</p>zlog par byed cing / rig sngags 'chang gi gang zag la skyong bar byed pa'o/ /lha'i nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po lho phyogs skyong bar mchis te/ de la bdag gis phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su 'gro ba'o/ /
<p>316a.4</p>de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/ grul bum gyi gdon la sogs pa 'byung po rnams kyis phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni/ bdud bzhi bcom zhing sangs rgyas te/ ye shes mnyam pa nyid kyis sems
<p>316a.5</p>can thams cad la snying rjes khyab ste/ de lta bu'i ye shes ldan pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba'o/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/ /kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud/ /ces bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa rnams 'dul zhing 'jig rten gyi bya ba
<p>316a.6</p>bor nas mun pa'i mun nag sel te/ de lta bu'i 'khor ba bzhag nas sangs rgyas te/ lus ngag yid yang dag par rdzogs pa'o/ /de'i ye shes kyis kun nas kun du nyon mongs pa rnams la sprul ba'i skus 'jig rten gyi khams la khyab ste/ de rnams kyis 'jigs pa
<p>316a.7</p>thams cad dang bral bar byed cing 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'o/ /yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa lnga bcom zhing dpa' ba ste/ phyin ci ma log pa ye shes thob cing / yang dag
<p>316b</p>
<p>316b.1</p>par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la 'dud pa ste/ bdag cag grul bum gyi gdon la sogs pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo ba'i tshal gyi gzi brjid kyis sems can la 'tshe bar mi byed cing snying rje dang ldan pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'phags skyes po'i tshig gi de nas so/ /rgyal po
<p>316b.2</p>chen po mig mi bzang / /thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po de yang stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa'o/ /mun par gyur pa'i 'jig rten
<p>316b.3</p>la/ /bcom ldan lam rnams ston mdzad pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis ye shes de yang nus te/ de'i ye shes brtan par byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas bsten pa'o/ /gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing
<p>316b.4</p>mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bdud bzhi bcom pas na dpa' bo ste/ de bcom zhing ye shes thob pa ste/ bdag cag klu rnams kyang sems can gyi don byed cing snying rje la gnas pa'o/ /'jig rten dag na nyi zla 'dra/ /rin chen snying po stobs po che/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi
<p>316b.5</p>ye shes shar te/ de'i ye shes kyang thams cad la khyab pa'o/ /de bzhin du nyi zla yang rang gi 'od zer gyis snang ba'o/ /de'i 'od zer thob cing yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de yang / 'jig rten gyi khams so/ /klu dang mkha'
<p>316b.6</p>lding gsang ba pa/ stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang dang / klu'i gdon sa bdag la sogs pa nub phyogs nas mang po 'dus te/ de rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ro/ /kho ra khor yug yongs bskor nas/ /thal mo
<p>316b.7</p>sbyar te 'khod gyur lags/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gdon de rnams kyis kyang / dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal la bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyogs bzhi nas bskor nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas zhu ba
<p>317a</p>
<p>317a.1</p>'bul ba'o zhes bya ba'o/ /bdag ni rgyal po mig mi bzang / /nub phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis kyang klu'i gdon srung ba'i don du/ 
<p>317a.2</p>nub phyogs skyong bar bgyid do zhes bya ba'o/ /'jig rten mgon po'i nye 'khor du/ /klu dang mkha' lding gsang ba pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der rgyal po mig mi bzang dang / srin po'i gdon dang / sa bdag la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
<p>317a.3</p>'khod nas/ sems can rnams la gnod par bgyid do zhes pa'o/ /lha min dbang po stobs po che/ /de dag bdag gis bzlog par bgyi/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sa bdag gi gdon la sogs pa/ gsang ba po dang klu rnams kyang rig sngags kyi dmod mos gnod par byed
<p>317a.4</p>pa'i gdon dang / sbod gtong dang / sngags dang / gzhan gyi rig pa dang / de rgyal po mig mi bzang gis kyang de rnams zlog par byed pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rdo rje ni gang zhe na/ las kyi rigs kyi rdo rje'i rig ma ste/ mtshon pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te/ mtshon
<p>317a.5</p>byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bdag nyid do/ /phung po ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste/ khams ni nam mkha'i khams so/ /skye mched ni yid kyi skye mched do/ /rang bzhin ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa rgyan thams cad
<p>317a.6</p>kyis brgyan pa/ zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ sku mdog mthing ga /zhal g.yas dkar ba/ g.yon dmar ba/ phyag g.yas gnyis na ral gri dang rdo rje/ g.yon gnyis na zhags pa rdo rje rgya gram/ de'i 'og ma gnyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o/ /zhabs g.yas bskum
<p>317a.7</p>pa/ g.yon brkyang ba/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa/ khro bo'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ Ta ka ge Ta ka ge zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang phyogs skyong
<p>317b</p>
<p>317b.1</p>bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ rgyal po spyan mi bzang gis kyang / nub phyogs skyong zhing sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /klu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ klu'i gdon rnams kyis kyang nad sna tshogs btang zhing
<p>317b.2</p>sems can rnams la gnod pa skyel zhing srog gcod pa ste/ de'i gzi brjid 'phrog 'dod pa dang / rig sngags kyi dmod mos rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang gis de rnams 'joms par byed pa'o/ /lha'i nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te zhes bya ba ni/ nub phyogs
<p>317b.3</p>kyi rgyal po spyan mi bzang dang / yang dag thabs cig tu gzi brjid che zhing stobs che ba/ kha dog dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul dang ldan te/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi rtsod pa la yang rtsod par nus pa de rnams la yang bdag gis skyabs su mchi/ de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i gdon dang / 
<p>317b.4</p>gsang ba po rnams kyis phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni/ bzhi bcom zhing phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams la khyab cing thugs rje'i spyan gyis lta ba'i bcom ldan 'das la phyag
<p>317b.5</p>'tshal zhes bya ba'o/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/ /kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud/ /ces bya ba ni/ shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / bag chags kyi sgrib pa de nyid spangs pa'o/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rdzogs pas na rdzogs pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad
<p>317b.6</p>spangs nas sangs rgyas pa'o/ /gau tam yang bdag cag gis kyang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang dang gdon de rnams kyis kyang snying rje dang ldan zhing / sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /de
<p>317b.7</p>nas zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang gi tshig gis de nas so/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs su rung ba dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi nang du yul 'khor
<p>318a</p>
<p>318a.1</p>srung dang / 'phags skyes bo dang / spyan mi bzang dang / lus ngan po dang / rgyal po bzhi po dag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der bcom ldan 'das la bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 'bul ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la phyag 'tshal zhing zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>318a.2</p>rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang / bskor ba lan gsum byas nas yang nas yang du phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /gros mthun pa dang / tshig mthun pa dang / skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po de dag gis dbyangs gcig tu byas nas/ bcom
<p>318a.3</p>ldan 'das la zhu ba 'bul ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 'bul ba'i tshig go/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di rgyal po chen po bzhis gsungs pa ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa/ 
<p>318a.4</p>de bzhin du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba shAkya thub pas gsungs te/ gzi brjid che zhing stobs che ba/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med cing / 'khor ba bcom pa/ rgyal po chen
<p>318a.5</p>po bzhi po dag gis kyang yi dam du bzung ba'o/ /'khor bzhi po rnams la yongs su khyab pa lags so zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ gzhan yang lha dang / mi dang de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad dang / rgyal po
<p>318a.6</p>chen po bzhi dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su zhi ba dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / dug gsad pa dang / dug zhi ba dang / chad pa gcod pa dang / bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba'o/ /gnod sbyin dang srin po
<p>318a.7</p>nas gnod pa bgyid pa'i bar du zlog par bgyid pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyi mthus ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams dang / sngags dang phyag rgya dang / gzhan gyi sbod gtong gtang ba dang / rig pa dang / khrag khrug dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams
<p>318b</p>
<p>318b.1</p>bzlog pa'o/ /de yang rgyal po bzhis kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis bzlog pa'o/ /'khor bzhi po rnams la srung ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ bde bar gnas shing yang dag pa'i ye shes thob ste/ gal te 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur na/ rig pa 'di
<p>318b.2</p>dang ma bral zhing nam skye ba'i dus su dran par 'gyur zhing / bde ba phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang de bzhin du srung ba dang / skyob pa la sogs pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ de dag ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po de
<p>318b.3</p>dag gis smras pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / btang snyoms kyis khyab pa'i sems kyis sems can gyi don la rgyal po chen po bzhi la bka' stsal pa'o/ /kye rgyal po chen po dag /rig
<p>318b.4</p>sngags kyi rgyal po chen po bzung zin no zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rgyal po chen po byin gyis brlabs nas rig sngags 'dzin du bcug pa dang / dran par byed pa dang / rig sngags kyi tshig rgyal po chen po bzhi'i zhal nas smras par bgyid pa'o/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo
<p>318b.5</p>chen po ngas yongs su bzung zin no zhes bya ba ni/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i sngon rol du rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di dag thugs la bzung ste/ de bzhin du gsung dang skus kyang yin no/ /de bas na yongs su bzung ngo zhes bya ba'o/ /kye rgyal po chen po dag ces bya
<p>318b.6</p>ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la yang nas yang du bka' stsal ba'o/ /gzhan yang ngas kyang bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po rjes su yi rang ba'i zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rjes su yi rang zhing / 
<p>318b.7</p>'di gsungs pa'o/ /de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa rnams kyang gsung bar 'gyur te/ de yang byams pa la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsung bar 'gyur ba'o/ /da ltar bdag gis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o/ /rig sngags
<p>319a</p>
<p>319a.1</p>kyi rgyal mo chen mo brjod kyis de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shing dang ngas brjod do zhes bya ba ni/ gnyug ma'i rang bzhin gzhan gyi dri mas ma gos pa ste/ rang bzhin med cing rnam par dag pa/ srid pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa med cing nam mkha'
<p>319a.2</p>bzhin du khyab pa ste/ de lta bu'i rig pa nyon mongs pa rnams kyis zung shig bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad do zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal zhes bya ba ni/ gnyug ma'i rang bzhin/ stong pa nyid kyi don 'di rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang bzung nas/ 'khor ba na
<p>319a.3</p>'khyams nas yod pa nyon mongs pa rnams la ston par bgyid do zhes bya ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la mnyan to zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di'i cho ga ni ngo bo dang bral zhing rang bzhin med de/ de lta bu'i ye shes kyi tshig ni mnyan to zhes bya
<p>319a.4</p>ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi las kyi rigs lnga bshad pa'i gnas skabs te bdun pa'o// //de nas zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po bzhi la gtad pa'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rin po che g.yas pas na bza' chos gos phye nas 'byung po'i
<p>319a.5</p>tshogs de dag la bka' stsal to zhes bya ba nas/ rdo rje seng ge'i pad+ma chen po'i khri la rdo rje skyil krung du ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa bshig nas/ skyabs sbyin gyi phyag rgya bstan pa'o/ /chos gos de phye ba'i rgyu mtshan ni/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i
<p>319a.6</p>tshal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs shing / 'byung po rnams rlag par byed pa'o/ /de'i phyir na chos gos phye ba zhes bya ba'o/ /rin chen phyag gis skyabs sbyin bstan pa ni/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bzhin du yod de/ de lta bu'i chos kyi nyams myong sems can thams cad
<p>319a.7</p>sangs rgyas shing / sdig can bdud kyi rig sngags la mi 'jigs pa bstan pa'o/ /sor mo re re la yang 'od zer sna tshogs dang ldan pa 'od zer de yang ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin du yod de/ ye shes lnga ni phung po lnga ste/ phung po lnga ni rigs lnga/ rigs lnga ni khams lnga/ 
<p>319b</p>
<p>319b.1</p>khams lnga po de yang stong pa nyid du bsam mo/ /de lta bu'i phyag rgya 'byung po rnams la ston pa'o/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rig sngags 'di bka' stsal pa'o/ /ngas 'di bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes ngo bo nyid nas dag pa ste/ dngos
<p>319b.2</p>po med pa'i rang bzhin brjod du med pa/ ngag gis 'di yin zhes bya bar brjod par mi nus so/ /rig sngags kyi phyag rgya'i phyag rgya de ni rnam thos kyi bu la bstan te/ de yang rgyal po bzhi'i gtso bo nas yin no/ /thams cad la go bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
<p>319b.3</p>po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sprul pa'i skus khyab ste/ de lta bu'i sems can rnams kyis go bar byed pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ rgyas par bshad pa de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rig sngags 'di bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>319b.4</p>bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas hUM gi yi ge las 'od zer sna tshogs 'phros te/ 'od zer sna tshogs de yang 'gro ba rigs drug gi don byas te/ 'od sna tshogs de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i hUM la thim mo/ /hUM de'i yi ges bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas
<p>319b.5</p>rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal rdo rje'i rigs su sna la 'phros pa'o/ /de'i thugs ka nas kyang hUM gi yi ge las 'od zer sna tshogs snang ba'o/ /rig sngags 'di ni zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bcu gnyis pa/ sku mdog nag mo khro mo'o/ /dbu skra ser po gyen du 'bar ba/ 
<p>319b.6</p>thod pa lnga yis dbu la brgyan pa/ dbu la rdo rje'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal g.yas dmar po/ g.yon ljang gu/ rgyab dmar po'o/ /zhal bzhi yang mche ba gtsigs pa/ khro gnyer dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad ni sprul gyis brgyan pa/ phyag dang po'i
<p>319b.7</p>g.yas g.yon gyis rdo rje snying gar 'dzin cing / g.yon gyis dril bu dkur brten zhing gnas pa'o/ /de'i 'og ma g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya dbu steng du mdzad pa'o/ /g.yas pa gsum na rdo rje/ bzhi pa na ral gri /lnga pa na 'khor lo/ /g.yon pa
<p>320a</p>
<p>320a.1</p>gsum na rin po che/ bzhi pa na zhags pa/ lnga pa na lcags kyu de'i 'og ma g.yas g.yon gyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o/ /thabs shes rab ngo bo nyid du bzhugs pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye
<p>320a.2</p>shes te/ de yang sgyu ma lta bu me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis brgyan pa'o/ /de gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes lnga rgyas btab pa'o/ /mtshon pa ni ye shes lnga yin te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'o/ /phung po ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o/ /khams ni nam
<p>320a.3</p>mkha'i khams/ skye mched ni yid kyi skye mched/ zhabs phyed skyil du bzhugs shing / klu pho mo dang / gnod sbyin pho mo mnan pa/ pad+ma dang zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing / bskal ba'i me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan zhing / ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad
<p>320a.4</p>sreg pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rdo rje'i snying po ni gang zhe na/ 'dir bstan pa ste/ gang gis bstan zhe na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas bstan pa'o/ /de yang rdo rje'i snying po'o/ /hi lI hi lI b+hi sa ni la sogs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
<p>320a.5</p>rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di bka' stsal pa na zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di'i gzi brjid dang stobs dang / dpa' bas 'di'i gsang sngags bshad ma thag tu sa g.yo ba dang / sgra chen po byung ba'o/ /sa ni kun du g.yos zhes bya ba ni/ rnam pa drug tu
<p>320a.6</p>g.yos/ ji bzhin du g.yos she na/ sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos so/ /'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg /kun du rab tu ldeg chem chem rab tu chem/ kun du rab tu chem chem/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur/ kun
<p>320a.7</p>du rab tu 'ur 'ur/ shig shig rab tu shig shig /kun du rab tu shig shig ste/ ltas chen po bco brgyad byung ba'o/ /des na sa ni kun du g.yos zhes bya'o/ /rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis sa des kyang mi theg cing g.yos pa'o/ /'byung po thams cad ni rab tu
<p>320b</p>
<p>320b.1</p>'dar nas zhes bya ba ni/ skad kyang smra bar mi nus shing / lus kyang 'thoms nas ba spu yang gyen du log ste/ 'jigs par byas nas 'bros pa'i tshul du bstan to/ /kye ma kyi hud kye ma sdug bsngal sgra chen po byung ngo zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kyang rab tu 'jigs
<p>320b.2</p>nas 'byung po rnams rlag par byed do snyam nas skad chen po bton to/ /yang nas yang du skad ngan chen po bton to/ /srin po rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces smras te zhes bya ba ni 'byung po dang bcas shing / bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 'bul ba'o/ /'di ltar yang dag rdzogs sangs
<p>320b.3</p>rgyas/ /sems can kun la thugs brtse ba/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i lam nas kyang sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin du bskal pa grangs med pa'i sngon du tshogs bsags te/ tshogs bsags pa de yang sems can thams cad kyi don du bsngo ste/ mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can kyi don mdzad
<p>320b.4</p>pa'o/ /'byung po kun 'jigs nyen pa yi/ /rig sngags 'di 'dra gsung bar mdzad/ /ces bya ba ni rig sngags kyi dmod mos ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyang bcom zhing thal bar rlog pa ste/ de lta bu'i gzi brjid che ba'i rig sngags ni sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa'o/ /
<p>320b.5</p>de nas kun mkhyen ston pa po/ /sems can kun la thugs brtse bas/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de nas ni mtshams sbyor ba'i de nas so/ /chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bstan te/ de yang sems can rigs mi gcig pas theg pa sna tshogs bstan pa ste/ 'khor ba'i sems
<p>320b.6</p>can rnams la byams pa dang snying rjes khyab pa'o/ /gnod sbyin srin po dri za dang / /klu dang mkha' lding gsang ba pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sems can las kyi 'bras bu mi gcig pas/ 'byung po'i lus su gzhan la gnod pa'i sems dang ldan par skyes te/ de yang yi dgas
<p>320b.7</p>dang / byol song gi lus su skyes pa'o/ /'byung po rgyu ba gzi brjid 'phrog /grul bum yi dgas srul po dang / /zhes bya ba ni/ rgyu ba dang sems can phrad par gyur na/ gti mug dang zhe sdang yod pas/ sems can rnams la gzi brjid 'phrog ste/ snying rje'i sems
<p>321a</p>
<p>321a.1</p>dang mi ldan pa'o/ /lha min gshed byed ro langs dang / /brjed byed dang ni mi 'am ci/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams la bza' ba med cing skom pa'i sbyin pa ma btang zhing khro ba ste/ la la yang mchod rdzas la sogs pa za bar yod pa ni sbyin pa gtong zhing
<p>321a.2</p>khro bar byas pa'o/ /skems byed dang ni rims drag dang / /de bzhin bram ze srin po dang / /zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan la grags pa 'dod pas/ sems can gyi srog gcod cing / sbyin pa zad pa med pa btang ste/ de'i 'bras bus kyang srin po la sogs par skye zhing snying rje
<p>321a.3</p>med pa'o/ /smyo byed rims nad zhag gsum pa/ /de bzhin zhag ni bzhi pa rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po dang / 'byung po ma yin pa/ rims de dag kyang rig sngags kyis 'joms shing 'byung po de rnams kyang rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'joms pa ste/ gzhan yang
<p>321a.4</p>nad rlung dang / bad kan dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa bzhi brgya brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yang 'joms pa'o/ /skrag cing rab tu 'dar gyur te/ /phyogs bcur rgyug pa gzigs nas kyang / /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid mthong bas
<p>321a.5</p>'jigs shing skrag pa ste/ phyogs bzhi nas kyang 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /de dag la ni thugs brtse'i phyir/ /rig sngags 'di ni rjod par mdzad/ /ces bya ba ni/ de dag kyang las kyi 'bras bus skyes te/ de yang sangs rgyas thugs rje'i sems kyis sems can la
<p>321a.6</p>'bros par 'gyur ro/ /de dag kyang las kyi 'bras bus skyes te/ de yang sangs rgyas thugs rje'i sems kyis sems can la mnyam pa nyid du khyab ste/ de yang rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa ste/ ye shes kyi rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings
<p>321a.7</p>kyi ye shes so/ /thabs kyi ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs te/ phung po ni gzugs kyi phung po'o/ /khams ni sa'i khams te/ skye mched ni mig gi skye mched do/ /ye shes lnga dang ldan zhing / sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams
<p>321b</p>
<p>321b.1</p>cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ sku mdog dkar mo zhal g.yas mthing ga /g.yon ljang gu /rgyab dmar pa'o/ /dbu la 'khor los brgyan pa'o/ /zhi ba'i gzugs can ma'o/ /phyag g.yas dang po na/ snying gar rdo rje brten zhing / g.yon
<p>321b.2</p>dril bu dku la brten pa'o/ /de'i 'og ma g.yas pa gsum na ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / dgra sta'o/ /de bzhin du g.yon pa gsum na/ zhags pa dang / rtse gsum dang / dung bsnams pa'o/ /zhabs rdo rje'i skyil krung du bzhugs shing / pad+ma dang zla ba'i
<p>321b.3</p>gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /rig sngags bsil ba'i tshal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ngo bo yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi tshig go/ /hi ri ma kha/ ti ri kha kha ka Ta ma TA la sogs
<p>321b.4</p>pa'o/ /gsang sngags chen mo'i rig sngags chen mo 'di las 'gal bar ma byed cig ces bya ba ni/ 'byung po la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang rig sngags las 'gal bar byed par gyur na tshe 'di la yang sdug bsngal drag po thob cing / phyi ma la yang dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur
<p>321b.5</p>ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gi chos la yang dag par rtogs shig ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' la mi bden pa mi mnga' ste/ de bzhin du rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /khyed kun lus zhig ste zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs
<p>321b.6</p>pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' las 'das shing / rig sngags la smra bar gyur na/ mgo bo dang lus tshal ba brgyar 'gas shing / ardza ka'i many+dza ra bzhin du 'gas te/ tshe 'di la yang nad kyi sdug bsngal chen po theb par 'gyur ro/ /shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro
<p>321b.7</p>log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye zhing 'khor bar 'gro ba re zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas dang rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa'i 'byung po rnams ni/ shi 'phos ma thag tu mda' 'phangs pa bzhin du mnar mes sreg ste/ gal te dmyal ba de nas
<p>322a</p>
<p>322a.1</p>'phos na yang dmyal ba gzhan du yang nas yang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ rgyas par bshad pa'i de nas so/ /rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi rgyal mo sngon ma thos pa 'di thos nas zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'khor ba'i sdug
<p>322a.2</p>bsngal thams cad bcom pa/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin/ thabs la mkhas pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyi gnyen po'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum/ sems can rnams la khyad par 'phags pa 'di thos pa'o/ /skrag cing sdangs te/ mi dga'
<p>322a.3</p>la skyi bung zhes byed nas/ thal mo sbyar te zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos rgyal po chen po bzhi yang mdog shor zhing ba sbu rnams kyang gyen du log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dad pa skyes nas thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing gros mthun pa dang
<p>322a.4</p>tshig mthun pa dang zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po de rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba'o/ /skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni dbyangs gcig tu byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 'bul ba'o/ /sdang
<p>322a.5</p>ba'i 'byung po zad bgyid pa/ /rig sngags 'di ni legs par gsungs/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sdig can bdud kyi rigs/ sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa rnams/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos rlag par byed pa'o/ /dngos po med cing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
<p>322a.6</p>kyis gsungs pa/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byed pa'o/ /mi yi 'jig rten bde bgyid pa'i/ /rig sngags bdag cag brjod par 'tshal/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di 'chang ba rnams bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs
<p>322a.7</p>su 'gyur zhing / sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byed pa'o/ /de la rig sngags 'di lags te/ /'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sha za dang / yi dgas dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon 'byung po rnams kyis mi tshugs shing / ngo bo nyid dang bral
<p>322b</p>
<p>322b.1</p>zhing mi dmigs pa'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gis kyang / rig sngags legs par gsungs shing legs par nyon cig ces gsungs pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhis bsrungs te/ rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni gang zhe na/ thabs dang
<p>322b.2</p>shes rab ma bral ba'o/ /mtshon pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags bsil ba'i tshal lo/ /rigs ni rin po che'i rigs te/ phung po ni tshor ba'o/ /khams ni chu'i khams te/ skye mched ni sna'i skye mched do/ /ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas lnga'i
<p>322b.3</p>dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /zhal bzhi pa/ g.yas dkar po/ g.yon mthing ga /rgyab dmar po'o/ /phyag brgyad pa/ sku mdog ser mo/ phyag g.yas pa na rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa dril bu dkur brten pa/ phyag g.yas pa
<p>322b.4</p>gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa rnams ni ral gri dang / rin po che dang / mda' bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon pa gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa rnams na zhags pa dang / 'khor lo dang / gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /zhabs rdo rje'i skyil krung du bzhugs
<p>322b.5</p>shing / pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing / nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa ste/ lo bcu gnyis pa'i tshul du bzhugs shing / sgeg pa'i tshul dang ldan pa'o/ /rig sngags dang gsang sngags gzhan gyis mi thub pa ni/ gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ u hu ha la ku li dzi pa la
<p>322b.6</p>sogs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa 'di gzung bar gsol zhes bya ba ni/ sngags dang / sbod gtong dang / gzhan gyi rig pa dang / ma rungs par byed pa'i 'byung po rnams/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid dang / stobs kyis zlog par byed
<p>322b.7</p>pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi ngo bo 'di yang stong pa nyid yin te/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /shes rab kyi ngo bo ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes yin te/ thabs kyi ngo bo ni rig sngags nyid do/ /de yang thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med cing / mtshon pa dang mtshon byed kyang
<p>323a</p>
<p>323a.1</p>gnyis su med do/ /rig sngags de'i rigs ni pad+ma'i rigs te/ phung po ni 'du shes kyi phung po'o/ /khams ni me'i khams te/ skye mched ni lce'i skye mched do/ /ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid ni rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis
<p>323a.2</p>brgyan pa/ zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ sku mdog dmar mo/ /phyag g.yas pa dang pos rdo rje snying gar brten pa/ g.yon pa dang pos dril bu dkur brten pa'o/ /g.yas gnyis pa na ral gri/ gsum pa na pad+ma/ g.yon gnyis pa na dgra sta dang / gsum pa na rtse gsum
<p>323a.3</p>mo/ /de'i 'og ma g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o/ /zhabs rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs shing / pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing / nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan te/ zhal g.yas dkar po/ /g.yon mthing ga /rgyab ser po/ /bzhad pa'i tshul du
<p>323a.4</p>bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags pad+ma'i snying po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ i li i li la sogs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni lo gcig gi bar du mtshams gcod pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ lo gcig gi sngon du yang srung ba byed par 'gyur/ /srung ba dang / 
<p>323a.5</p>sba ba dang / bskyab pa dang / mtshams gcod pa dang / dug zhi ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur zhing / rig sngags kyis yongs su bskyab par 'gyur ro/ /'byung po thams cad bzlog pa dang / don thams cad sgrub pa lags so zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>323a.6</p>de bzhin du byas par gyur na/ sdig can gyi rigs ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad kyang mi 'ong ste/ gal te 'ong bar gyur na/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos brlag par 'gyur ro/ /bya ba thams cad grub cing bde bar gnas pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ bar du gcod pa'i de nas
<p>323a.7</p>so/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za nas gnod par byed pa'i bar rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni/ de dang de ma slebs pa'i mtshams su 'byung po de rnams kyis kyang bar du gcod par byas te/ rig sngags 'di byung ba tsam gyis kyang / bar du gcod par mi nus
<p>323b</p>
<p>323b.1</p>pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo sngon ma thos pa 'di yang thos zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dis chad pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ nor bu rin po che lta bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi'i srung ba/ sngon
<p>323b.2</p>ma thos pa 'di yang thos nas/ skrag cing dngangs la mi dga' ste zhes bya ba ni/ khyad par du 'phags shing sems can gyi don mdzad pa ste/ de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kyang yin te/ ma rungs pa rnams la 'jigs par byed pa ngan song gsum nas 'byin pa'i gzugs
<p>323b.3</p>'di yang dag pa'o/ /skyi bung zhes byed nas sa la 'dzul/ kun du 'dzul/ kun du rab tu 'dzul bar byed do zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid dang / dmod mos sdig can gyi rigs 'byung po rnams/ de yang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid mthong bas ma tshugs par skad ngan grag
<p>323b.4</p>ste/ de rnams kyang sa la 'dzul zhing bying bar 'gyur ro/ /mthong bar mi gnas shing so so rang rang bros so/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams 'jigs pa'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sa gzhi rdo rjer sprul nas zhes bya ba ni/ sdig can bdud kyi rigs de rnams rdzu
<p>323b.5</p>'phrul sa la 'dzul du mi ster zhing / rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje'i sa gzhir snang ba'o/ /de dag phyogs bzhir rgyug go zhes bya ba ni/ sdig can 'byung po bdud kyi rigs de rnams ni/ sa la 'dzul ma nus shing phyogs phyogs su bros te hag zad do/ /
<p>323b.6</p>de nas zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams bros pa'i de nas so/ /rgyal po chen po bzhis phyogs bzhir me lce'i phung po mngon par sprul to zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis kyang / phyogs mtshams thams cad du me sna tshogs
<p>323b.7</p>sprul zhing / sdig can de rnams 'gror mi ster ba'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ tshig sbrel ba'i de nas so/ /de dag nam mkha' la rgyug go zhes bya ba ni/ sdig can rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la rgyug ste/ phyogs mtshams bzhi la 'dzul ba med cing nam mkha' la rgyug
<p>324a</p>
<p>324a.1</p>pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ nam mkha' la bros pa'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' gser du sprul to zhes bya ba ni/ nam mkha'i phyogs na rdo rje'i gser gyi sa gzhir byin gyis brlabs te/ sdig can de rnams kyang 'gro dbang med cing
<p>324a.2</p>rdugs pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ rdugs pa'i de nas so/ /'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu lta bu dang / dri zas bskor zhing mdun du bdar te/ steng gi bar snang la 'phags nas zhes bya ba ni/ sems can la gnod par byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 
<p>324a.3</p>sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ gzhan la srog 'phrog pa'i sems dang ldan pa sha stag /sdig can gyi 'byung po de rnams 'gro sa mi rnyed cing mar log nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la skyab tshol ba'o/ /
<p>324a.4</p>gnod sbyin dang srin po nas gnod pa byed pa'i bar rnams gzhom pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dpa' zhing gzi brjid che ba ste/ stobs dang ldan zhing sdig can bdud kyi rigs/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'joms pa'o/ /sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / 'byung
<p>324a.5</p>po thams cad bzlog pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can gyi don du byams pa dang / snying rje dang btang snyoms kyis khyab ste/ de lta bu'i thugs rjes khyab nas/ byad dang / ro langs dang / dug dang / dug sbyor dang / dug 'thung ba dang / gzhan gyi rig pa dang / sngags
<p>324a.6</p>dang / sbod gtong dang / 'jig rten gyi ma mo dang / ngan sngags sbyor ba dang / sdig can bdud kyi rigs de rnams la sogs pa rig sngags kyi gzi brjid 'joms pa'o/ /'khor bzhi po rnams bsrung ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ de bzhin du bdud kyi rigs 'byung
<p>324a.7</p>po la sogs pa bcom zhing / bar chod med cing bde bar gnas te/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byed do/ /rig sngags 'di brjod do zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rang bzhin gzhan gyis ma bcos par gnyug ma ste/ phyogs dang bral zhing rang bzhin med
<p>324b</p>
<p>324b.1</p>pa de lta bu'i ye shes brjod pa'o/ /de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo las kyi rigs ni las thams cad rdzogs par byed pa/ las kyi gdon thams cad 'joms pa/ las thams cad grub pa/ sna tshogs kyi rigs su snang ba'o/ /de yang rig sngags kyi mtshon pa ni bya ba nan tan
<p>324b.2</p>gyi ye shes so/ /mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi bdag nyid do/ /phung po ni 'du shes kyi phung po'o/ /khams ni rlung gi khams so/ /skye mched ni lus kyi skye mched do/ /ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad
<p>324b.3</p>pa/ sku mdog ljang nag /zhal g.yas dkar po/ g.yon dmar po/ rgyab ser po/ phyag g.yas dang po na rdo rje gdengs pa/ gnyis pa na ral gri/ /gsum pa rdo rje rgya gram mo/ /g.yon dang po na dril bu/ gnyis pa na zhags pa/ gsum pa na 'khor lo'o/ /
<p>324b.4</p>'og ma'i phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis mda' gzhu 'gengs shing / zhabs g.yas pa pus mo btsugs pa/ g.yon brkyang ba/ bdud bzhi'i rang bzhin 'byung po rnams mnan pa'o/ /pad+ma'i steng na nyi ma'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /yan lag
<p>324b.5</p>thams cad sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ khro bo 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs so/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags las kyi snying pos ni/ las thams cad 'grub cing bdud thams cad 'dul ba ste/ sems can thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/ /gsang sngags kyi
<p>324b.6</p>tshig ni 'di lta ste/ gi ma gi ma la sogs pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs skyong bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gang zag rig sngags la gus pa dang / sems can thams cad dang / de la
<p>324b.7</p>srung ba dang / skyob par byed cing / rig sngags kyi chos kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'o/ /lha rnams kyi nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa/ nor thams cad gzhan gyi don du byin pa/ sems can
<p>325a</p>
<p>325a.1</p>thams cad kyi don byed pa ste/ de lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa/ nor lha lta bu 'byung ba'o/ /de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/ de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' la rgyal po rnams dang / 'byung po rnams kyis phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de yang
<p>325a.2</p>bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni/ bdud rnams las rnam par rgyal zhing dgra rnams kyang ma lus te/ phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas pa ste/ de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das la/ bdag cag rnams kyis phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /rdzogs pa'i
<p>325a.3</p>sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/ /kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud/ /ces bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad bcom zhing dpa' ba ste/ sku gsung thugs rdzogs par byas pas na rdzogs pa ste/ dug gsum dang bral zhing / sangs rgyas pa'o/ /de lta bu'i sangs rgyas la
<p>325a.4</p>'dud ces bya ba'o/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog /shes rab chen po khyod la 'dud/ /ces bya ba ni sngon bskal ba grangs med pa'i dus su tshogs rdzogs te/ da ltar ma lus par sems can thams cad rdzogs par 'dod nas/ theg pa sna tshogs dang / 
<p>325a.5</p>thabs sna tshogs bstan pa ste/ rkang gnyis kyi tshogs kyi dam pa/ phyi nang gi tshogs la mkhas pa/ thams cad mkhyen zhing thams cad la byams pas khyab pa'o/ /de lta bu'i thub pa chen po la 'dud pa'o/ /gau tam khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/ /de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to/ /zhes bya ba
<p>325a.6</p>ni/ yang dag pa'i ye shes ni rgya mtsho lta bu ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang de bzhin no/ /de lta bu'i ye shes shes pa ni lta ci smos te/ rang nyid kyis rang gi rig pa yang mi shes pa'o/ /rang gi rig pa ci'i phyir ma shes na/ rang la skyes pa'i ma rig pas ma shes pa'o/ /yang dag
<p>325a.7</p>dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par bdud bzhi bcom ste/ de 'dul bas na dpa' bo ste/ de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa la yang dag par 'dud de/ bdag cag kyang snying rje dang ldan zhing mchis pa'o zhes bya ba'o/ /gnod
<p>325b</p>
<p>325b.1</p>sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za nas gnod par byed pa'i bar rnams ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lus la babs pa las gud du dengs shig ces bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i sdig can 'byung po rnams ni/ gang zag rig sngags 'chang ba dang / sems can rnams la gnod pa byas nas/ 
<p>325b.2</p>rig sngags kyi dmod mos mgo bo ardza ka'i many+dza ra'i rdog pa bzhin du tshal par 'gas pa'o/ /gal te ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lus la myur du ma dong na zhes bya ba ni/ rig pa mi 'chang ba'i gang du/ sdig pa can ma rungs pa rnams kyis gzung bar gyur na/ de nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis
<p>325b.3</p>gsungs pa bzhin du rig pa 'chang ste/ de'i chos bzhin du gang zag dang sems can la bsrung bar bya ste/ myur du ma thon na nyes pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /de dag la myur du 'jigs pa chen po dang / nad drag pos 'debs par 'gyur la zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bka'
<p>325b.4</p>las 'das pa sdig can gtum po'i rigs 'byung po rnams ni nad drag po mdze dang / phol mig dang / 'bras dang / lhog pa dang / sha bkra dang / me dpal dang / chu sbur dang / 'brum bu dang / lus thams cad rul zhing g.yan pa la sogs pa'i nad kyis thebs
<p>325b.5</p>shing srog dang 'bral te/ shi 'phos nas kyang mnar med du skye ba med pa'o/ /de'i rkyen gyis mgo dang snying tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag ji bzhin du gnod par byed bzhin te sdig can de yang sdug bsngal drag po ste/ nad chen pos btab
<p>325b.6</p>pa'o/ /de'i mod la sdug bsngal bu ma byung ba dang brlag pa dang / mtha' med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos sdug bsngal drag po 'byung ste/ gar yang 'gros med cing lcang lo can gyi pho brang yang mi thob ste/ de'i lus kyang zhig cing rul bar 'gyur
<p>325b.7</p>ro/ /'brum bu'i gdon gang yin pa dang / skya rengs 'char ka'i gdon gang yin pa dang / grib gnon gyi gdon gang yin pa de dag kyang bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di thos nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'di 'don pa dang sgom pa dang yid la byed pa dang gdams ngag byin pa
<p>326a</p>
<p>326a.1</p>dang / bshad pa dang / rjes su yi rang zhing 'chang ba ste/ de dag la gnod par 'gyur na/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa'o/ /yang na rig sngags 'di mnyan nas/ sems can la 'tshe bar mi bya'o/ /ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lus las myur du gud du
<p>326a.2</p>dengs shig ces bya ba ni/ gnod par byed pa de rnams gang zag dang sems can thams cad kyi don la myur du thon cig ces bya'o/ /yang na rig sngags kyi dmod mos sdug bsngal myur du thob po zhes bya'o/ /gal te myur du ma dong na 'jigs pa chen po dang / nad drag pos 'debs
<p>326a.3</p>par 'gyur la zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das shing ma btang bar gyur na/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i chad pa'i 'jigs pa dang / g.yan pa'i nad la sogs pas myur du thebs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i rkyen gyis mgo bo dang snying tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur
<p>326a.4</p>zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi dmod mos ardza ka'i mardza ri'i dogs pa bzhin du 'gas pa'o/ /de'i mod la sdug bsngal du ma 'byung ba dang / brlag pa dang mtha' med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du rig
<p>326a.5</p>sngags kyis kyang dmod mos 'gros mi rnyed cing / de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal drag po thob ste/ shi nas kyang mnar med kyi mes bsreg cing / dmyal ba nas dmyal bar 'khor bar 'gyur ro/ /gzi byin dang ni khrag za ba/ /nyin mtshan rgyu ba gang yin pa/ /zhes
<p>326a.6</p>bya ba ni/ zas su khrag za ba dang sha za ba la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang gzi brjid 'phrog pa dang / sems can la 'tshe bar byed pa dang / nyin mo dang mtshan mo la sogs pa rgyu zhing ma byed cig ces bya'o/ /de dag gis kyang legs gsungs pa'i/ /mdo bshad thos nas spang bar
<p>326a.7</p>gyis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ rig sngags 'di yang yang dag par gsungs te/ de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis kyang / rjes su yi rang zhing srung ba ste/ de bzhin du khyad par du 'phags pa'i mdo 'di thos par gyur
<p>326b</p>
<p>326b.1</p>nas/ sems can la gnod par byed pas sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa thob pa'o/ /de bas na spang bar gyis zhes bya ba'o/ /sha za lus 'phags skem byed dang / /'byung po 'jigs byed srul po rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyis kyang sems can la gnod par
<p>326b.2</p>byas te/ de yang dam la btags nas gnod par byed pa spangs pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang legs gsungs pa'i/ /mdo 'di bshad pa thos nas mthong / /zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs te/ de bzhin rgyal po bzhi po
<p>326b.3</p>rnams kyis kyang dam tshig bsrung ste/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis sdig can 'byung po de rnams kyis kyang gzhan la 'tshe ba spangs pa'o/ /lha dang lha min rlung lha dang / /dri za dang ni gdon gyi bla/ /zhes bya ba ni/ zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis sems can thams cad la gnod par byas te/ 
<p>326b.4</p>de yang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid dam pa thob pa'o/ /'byung po dang ni sha za dang / /de bzhin gnod sbyin srin po rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ ser sna dang / zhe sdang dang / 'dod chags kyi sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byas te/ de yang rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i 'jigs pas gnod mi
<p>326b.5</p>nus pa'o/ /kun du 'khrugs shing kun du g.yos/ /skrag cing kun du rab tu 'gul/ /zhes bya ba ni rig sngags 'di'i gzi brjid dang / stobs kyis sa lan drug tu g.yos te/ de bzhin du ltas chen po bco brgyad byung ba'o/ /kun du 'khrugs shing kun du g.yos pa ni shar dma'
<p>326b.6</p>ste/ nub mtho ba'o/ /nub dma' na shar mtho ba'o/ /phyogs phyogs rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /mgo 'khrugs shing phyogs rnams gtor ba'o/ /de bas kyang skrag cing kun du 'gul ba ste/ yun ring zhing drag pa'o/ /gdon dang gnod pa byed pa rnams/ /lhung zhing rab tu pham
<p>326b.7</p>par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sdig can bdud kyi rigs kyi 'byung po rnams ni/ sems can la gnod par byed bas rang pham ste/ sdug bsngal chen po thob cing rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'joms pa'o/ /sa gzhi dag kyang rab tu g.yos/ /sgra bo che yang sgrogs par byed/ /ces bya
<p>327a</p>
<p>327a.1</p>ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sa g.yo zhing 'byung po rnams skrag par byed de/ sa de yang rnga bo che dang cha lang dang dril bu'i skad 'byung ngo / /kun du rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya'o/ /yi dgas dang ni grul
<p>327a.2</p>bum rnams/ /sdang ba'i gdon ni zlog byed pa'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyang sems can drag pos gnod par byas te/ gzhan gang gis kyang mi thub cing de'i gnyen po lta bu rig sngags kyi rgyal mo yin te/ mdo 'di dag ni thos gyur na/ /'jigs pa
<p>327a.3</p>drag po 'bebs par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gnod byed sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / sems can gyi srog 'dod pa rnams/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'dis rlag par byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge
<p>327a.4</p>'dun la/ /dad pa'i gnod sbyin gang yin pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yod de/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / chos dang dge 'dun la dga' zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnams skyong bar byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi
<p>327a.5</p>bstan pa bsrung zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di la rjes su yi rang zhing rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o/ /de dag mgu zhing yid dga' nas/ /legs par rjes su yi rang ngo / /zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems
<p>327a.6</p>dpa'i rigs 'byung de rnams kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi chos la dga' zhing snga nas kyang chos la dad pa yod do/ /de ltar dad pa kun du rab tu skyes nas/ dga' bas rab tu dga' ste/ chos la mchod pa legs par mchod nas/ /de rnams kyis rjes su yi rang ngo
<p>327a.7</p>zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi 'byung po dam la btags pa'i gnas skabs te brgyad pa'o// //de nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po dam la btags pa'i de nas so/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi bar snang las babs nas zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po de yang
<p>327b</p>
<p>327b.1</p>chos la rab tu dga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das la snga nas kyang dad pa skyes te/ da ltar yang rab tu skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas zhes bya ba ni/ so so rang gi 'od zer yang 'phags te/ 
<p>327b.2</p>bsil ba tshal gyi chos 'di la dad pa yang nas yang du skyes te/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la yang de bzhin no/ /de bas na rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang legs lhags pa zhes bya ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po
<p>327b.3</p>chen po bzhi rab tu dga' nas zhabs kyi pad+ma la gus pas phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ de nas bcom
<p>327b.4</p>ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /gros mthun pa dang / tshig mthun pa dang / skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni dbyangs gcig tu byas shing / rgyal po chen po rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi chos la gus pa'i sems kyis bcom
<p>327b.5</p>ldan 'das la zhu ba 'bul ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni zhes bya ba ni srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa dang / sems can thams cad la rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyis khyab ste/ sdang ba'i sems zhi bar byed pa
<p>327b.6</p>'khor ba rnams bcom zhing yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi lam bstan pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhis zhabs la phyag bgyi ba dang zhes bgyi ba ni gus par bya ba phyag 'tshal te/ rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang rang bsrung zhing / ngag gis 'don pa dang / yid kyis bzung ba
<p>327b.7</p>dang / lus kyis bcang bar byas te/ rig sngags 'di yang btags nas kyang / ngan song gsum du mi 'gro zhing byang chub kyi lam bstan pa'o/ /'khor bzhi po rnams la bsrung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen
<p>328a</p>
<p>328a.1</p>ma la sogs pa'i sems can rnams kyang bsrung ba'i dam pa'o/ /yongs su skyob pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan las kyang khyad par du 'phags te/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /gnod sbyin dang srin po nas
<p>328a.2</p>gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams 'joms pa lags so zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa bdud kyi rigs rnams kyi 'byung po de yang 'joms shing rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi dmod mos rlag par byed pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po
<p>328a.3</p>chen po bzhi dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la rig sngags 'di 'dri bar byed pa ste/ de yang 'khor bzhi la rtag tu srung bar byed pa'o/ /dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma de dag gis kyang zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das la
<p>328a.4</p>rtag tu 'khor ba'i 'khor bzhi yin te/ rig sngags kyis kyang de dag srung zhing bar gcod bsal te rtag tu bde ba thob pa'o/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ brjod par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi
<p>328a.5</p>rgyal mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di dur khrod chen po yi dgas dang / 'byung po rnams kyi gnyen po/ mi'i sems can rnams kyi ston pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams skyong bar byed pa ste/ 'khor bzhi po dag gis kyang 'chang ba dang / bzung
<p>328a.6</p>nas kyang sems can thams cad la bstan nas/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'bral bar byed pa ste/ 'khor bzhi po dag gis kyang lus ngag yid gzung ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po bzhis kyang bcom ldan 'das la yang dang yang
<p>328a.7</p>du zhu ba 'bul ba'o/ /dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor bzhi po dag dang / sems can thams cad la bsrung zhing sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'bral bar byed de/ 'di'i lam nas kyang byang chub
<p>328b</p>
<p>328b.1</p>kyi tshogs bstan pa'o/ /bdag bsrung ba dang / bdag sba ba dang / gzhan bsrung ba dang / gzhan sba ba'i slad du zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag rig sngags 'chang ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i sems can rnams srung ba ste/ byams pa dang / snying rje'i lam nas bdag gis
<p>328b.2</p>kyang sems can gyi don la bstan par bya'o/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / brjod pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa de la ni zhes bya ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa ste/ chos dang / 
<p>328b.3</p>longs spyod dang / sprul pa'i skus khyab pa ste/ de bzhin du 'di la gus pa byas pa'i gang zag ni/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'bral ba'o/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams nye 'khor yang gnas par mi 'gyur na/ gnod par bgyid
<p>328b.4</p>pa ltag la sems lags zhes bya ba ni/ mthu che zhing gzi brjid che ba ste/ dpa' ba stobs che zhing sems can rnams la byams pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa ste/ gang zag 'di 'chang ba la da lta'i rkyen lta ci smos te/ tshe phyi ma la yang de bzhin no/ /de gang du
<p>328b.5</p>mtshan gcig tsam gnas pa der yang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di yang grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs la sogs pa la yi ge gcig tsam yang dag par gyur na/ de bzhin du 'byung po'am/ yi dgas
<p>328b.6</p>la sogs pas gnod par mi 'gyur te/ grong de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la yang khrag khrug dang / rtsod pa dang / rims drag po'i nad mi 'byung ste/ gzhan gyi rgyal po'i chad pa yang mi 'byung ngo / /gnod sbyin dang / srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar
<p>328b.7</p>rnams nyen kor du yang gnod par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan de yang lus la btags pa'am/ yid kyis 'dzin pa'am/ ngag gis 'don pa'am/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'am/ mchod rten gyi rtse mo la btags nas/ de thos pa dang / de mthong ba tsam gyis
<p>329a</p>
<p>329a.1</p>de'i 'od zer gyi gzi brjid kyis rgyang grags kyi bar tshun chad du yang nye bar mi nus so/ /de gang du rtag tu gnas pa der lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di yang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams kyis
<p>329a.2</p>rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o/ /de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa rnams kyis kyang gsung bar 'gyur ba'o/ /da ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ sems can gyi don la gsungs pa ste/ gnyis pa'i sems med cing / nges par the tshom
<p>329a.3</p>med do zhes bya ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la mi ma lags pa'i gnod pas thebs pa'i mdun du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di brjod na zhes bya ba ni/ yul 'khor bsrung ba dang / byad dang / ro langs kyi nad kyis btab pa dang / bsgom
<p>329a.4</p>nyes pa dang / bri nyes la sogs pa gso ba dang / bkra mi shis pa bkra shis par byed pa dang / gzhan yang de la sogs pa thams cad la sngags te/ gzhan yang mkha' la rgyu ba'i yi dgas rnams bzlog pa'i cho ga yang dag par bshad par bya'o/ /lci ba chu dang
<p>329a.5</p>'dres pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag byug par bya/ /nad pa'i mdun du yang dag tu/ /de bzhin gzhan yang mkhas pas shes/ sa tshon lngas ni yang dag tu/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par bris/ /dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma la/ /phyi rim rdo rje ra ba ste/ /
<p>329a.6</p>de phyir 'khor lo sna tshogs rtsibs/ /de phyir lha snam zlum por bri/ /de yi phyi rim gru bzhi la/ /lha snam pad+ma rA ga'i mdog /gru bzhi sgo bzhi ka ba brgyad/ /twa ra bzhi yis yang dag brgyan/ /dra ba la sogs brgyan pa la/ /rin chen sna bdun gzhal yas
<p>329a.7</p>khang / /gdugs dang ba dan de bzhin rgyan/ /mdzes pas yang dag rnam par brgyan/ /pad+ma 'khor lo lha rnams dang / /ye shes lha dang 'jig rten lha/ /gzhan yang gsungs pa de bzhin du/ /mkhas pa'i blo yis shes par bya/ /bzhi ba'i dbus su yang
<p>329b</p>
<p>329b.1</p>dag tu/ /rnam par rgyal ba dbus su gzhag /lto ba ldir ba rke ba ring / /mchu 'phyangs mtshan ma legs pa la/ /nag po ra ri rtsa ba spangs/ /de lta bu yi bum pa la/ /gu gul la sogs bdug par bya/ /rin chen 'bru lnga sman lnga dang / /dri lnga byang chub
<p>329b.2</p>shing lnga dang / /mgul chings dang ni gdugs dang ni/ /me tog phreng dang rin chen phreng / /gzhan yang ji snyed yang dag brgyan/ /de bzhin rgyal ba'i bum pa'i gzugs/ /gzhal yas khang gi dbus su gzhag /rims nad phyugs nad gang yin pa/ /
<p>329b.3</p>de ni bkra shis la sogs dang / /dbang bskur sbyin sreg de bzhin te/ /lha dang rab gnas de bzhin shes/ /rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pa yis/ /dkyil chog blo yis yang dag shes/ /grog shing shun dar sogs la/ /gur gum gi wang la sogs bri/ /phyi rim mu
<p>329b.4</p>khyud ra ba la/ /rgyal ba'i mtshan ni yang dag bri/ /dar gyis bcings pa'i pad+ma la/ de steng phyag mtshan rgyas pa bri/ /ral gri skyabs sbyin rin chen dang / /rin chen steng du rdo rje gnas/ /zhags pa lcags kyu bum pa dang / /de steng rdo rje yang dag gnas/ /
<p>329b.5</p>mtshams bzhi rdo rje rgya gram yin/ /be con dang ni ut+pal dang / /pad+ma la sogs 'khor lo dang / /gzhan yang phyag mtshan gang yod pa/ /mkhas pas brtags nas bri bar bya/ /de nas mu khyud zlum po la/ /rdo rje rgya gram yang dag bri/ /rdo rje rgya gram bar du ni/ /
<p>329b.6</p>las kyi snying po yang dag bri/ /phyag mtshan bar du rdo rje rigs kyi yi ge dgod/ /de nas mu khyud gsum po la/ /sngar gsungs las kyi snying po bri/ /de nas mu khyud 'khor lo bri/ /'khor lor bri ba'i yi ge ni/ /rig sngags skyed byed yang dag tu/ /hUM dang phaT
<p>329b.7</p>kyis rnam par brgyan/ /de nas mu khyud gsum po la/ /rig sngags snying po yang dag bri/ /de nas pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /yang snying snying po bri bar bya/ /de bzhin mu khyud bskor ba la/ /gzhan gyis mi thub snying po bri/ /de dbus yi ge gnas pa ni/ /bsil
<p>330a</p>
<p>330a.1</p>ba'i tshal gyi bskyed yig bri/ /yi ge'i nang du mkhas pa ni/ /yang dag gis ni bri bar bya/ /de bzhin rig sngags 'chang bris la/ /mgul lam phyag sogs gdags par bya/ /de bzhin btags par gyur na ni/ /nad dang 'jigs pas mi tshugs te/ /mya ngan la sogs
<p>330a.2</p>de bzhin du/ mi rigs thams cad mi tshugs so/ /tshe ring sdug bsngal thams cad med/ ngan song gsum yang de bzhin no/ /rgyal ba'i bsrung ba yang dag tu/ /nga yis yang dag bshad par bgyi/ /rdo rje'i ra ba gur dang ni/ /bla res sa gzhi dra ba dang / /rdo rje'i rang bzhin shes
<p>330a.3</p>par bya/ /de phyir me ri sna tshogs kyis/ /yang dag gis ni bskor ba'o/ /nad pa'i drung du dkyil 'khor 'di/ /de bzhin yang dag bri bar bya/ /ring bsrel gdung rten lugs ma'am/ /tsha tsha la sogs mchod rten gang / /nad pa'i mdun du yang dag mchod/ /rig sngags bsil ba'i tshal gyi gzungs/ /
<p>330a.4</p>cho ga'i dus su yang dag gdon/ /bar gyis mi chod de bzhin du/ /bzlas pa la sogs de bzhin bya/ /phyogs skyong gza' dang rgyu skar dang / /de bzhin 'byung po la sogs la/ /rjes su mthun par dbul bar bya/ /dri dang me tog spos dang ni/ /arga la sogs yang dag dbul/ /de bzhin mkhas pas
<p>330a.5</p>thun gtor du/ /yang dag gis ni dbul bar bya/ /nad pa la sogs khrus byas la/ /rig sngags gtad pa'i cho ga bya/ /dbang bskur la sogs gzhan yang mthun/ /de bzhin sdom pa 'bogs pa dang / /gzhan dang la sogs mthun pa ste/ /de bzhin la sogs byas na ni/ /gang yang las kyang 'grub
<p>330a.6</p>par 'gyur/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi dkyil 'khor dang bsrung ba bshad pa'i gnas skabs te dgu ba'o// //de myur ba kho nar bde legs dang nad ma mchis pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du dkyil 'khor la sogs pas bsrung ba byas na/ /sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral te/ ma rungs
<p>330a.7</p>pa'i gdon thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /bde bar 'gyur zhing thar bar 'gyur la zhes bya ba ni/ tshe da lta dang phyi ma la yang bde bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar ba'o/ /mi ma lags pa rnams de la log pa mi bgyid cing / myur du 'chi bar 'gyur lags te zhes bya ba ni 'di 'chang
<p>330b</p>
<p>330b.1</p>ba'i gang zag rnams la 'byung po de rnams grogs mi byed na 'byung po de rnams kyang rig sngags kyi dmod mos sdug bsngal drag po thob par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa'o/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni/ de ltar don
<p>330b.2</p>che ba lags so zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la/ /sems can rnams la bde bar gnas par byas shing tshe da ltar dang phyi ma'i sdug bsngal zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong ngam dge slong ma gang la la sogs pa ni yang nas yang du
<p>330b.3</p>bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po bzhis zhu ba 'bul ba ste/ de yang 'khor bzhi'i don la zhu ba 'bul ba'o/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen mo 'di 'dzin pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ grong ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal lam/ /de la sogs pa la yod pa tsam gyis kyang 'jigs pa thams cad dang 'bral bar
<p>330b.4</p>'gyur te/ 'chang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ mgul du btags nas gus par byas par gyur na/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di'i nus pas sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar 'gyur te/ tshe da lta dang tshe phyi ma de bzhin no/ /brjod pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ klog pa bsgom pa rjes su yi rang ba de la bshad par byed pa/ de
<p>330b.5</p>la sogs pa byas par gyur na de bzhin du sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /kun chub par bgyid pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gyi don la khyab pa'o/ /yang na rig pa ni nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa ste/ sems can gyi don la khyab pa'o/ / 
<p>330b.6</p>sbyor bar bgyid pa de la ni zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar yod pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di ni rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o/ /de dag gi gang zag ni sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral zhing de bzhin dus gsum du yin
<p>330b.7</p>no/ /dad pa can gyi gnod sbyin dge bsnyen rnams/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gan du mchis nas/ ming smos par bgyid do zhes bya ba ni/ mi ma yin pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang / tshes brgyad dam/ bcu dgu'am/ nya'am/ stong la sogs pa la/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / de bzhin du byas par
<p>331a</p>
<p>331a.1</p>gyur na/ gdug pa can gyi gnod sbyin rnams kyang dad par 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal po chen po dag ces bya ba ni/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di la rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang 'di la 'chang bar 'gyur na/ dad par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du yang dag pa'i don yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /
<p>331a.2</p>dge slong ngam zhes bya ba nas dge bsnyen ma zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor bzhi la yang bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo 'dis bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /che ge mo zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad do/ /yang na ni gang zag sems
<p>331a.3</p>can 'di 'chang ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la yang nas yang du zhus pa'o/ /dad pa can gyi gnod sbyin dge bsnyen rnams/ rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du mchis nas zhes bya ba ni/ sngon du bshad pa bzhin du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo
<p>331a.4</p>'di'i bka' bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi po de mchod pa byas na/ nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i mdun du gnod sbyin rnams 'dus shing / 'byung po thams cad tshogs pa'i nang du yang bsgrags nas zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis dang
<p>331a.5</p>sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu rnams kyi mdun du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo 'di bsgrags na/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ der de dag mngon par dga' bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi byin gyi rlabs
<p>331a.6</p>kyis/ de rnams kyis kyang grogs byed par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen mo 'di ni de ltar don che ba lags so zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /yang dag pa'i don thob ste/ mi'i yul du skye bar gyur nas kyang / chos 'di dang mi 'bral ba'o/ /
<p>331a.7</p>btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi don la rgyal po chen po bzhis yang nas yang du zhu ba phul ba'o/ /dge slong ngam zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sde ba bzhi dang / mi dge ba bcu dang / dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa lnga'o/ /sde ba bzhi ni/ phal chen pa dang / thams cad yod par smra ba dang / 
<p>331b</p>
<p>331b.1</p>gnas brtan pa dang / mang pos bkur ba'i sde'o/ /mi dge ba bcu ni/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / tshig rtsub mo dang / ngag 'khyal pa dang / phra ma'o/ /brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba'o/ /dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa ni/ srog
<p>331b.2</p>gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / chang dang lnga ste/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo 'di bton pa tsam gyis kyang / de rnams kyi sdom pa nyams kyang / de'i sdig pa las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /chang mi btung ba dang / dran pa dang / shes
<p>331b.3</p>bzhin du mchis pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ chang mi btung ba ni/ sgog pa dang / sha dang / bud med la sogs pa bkag pa kr-i ya'i gzhung ngo / /dran pa ni rig sngags 'di dran pa ste/ de dran pa tsam gyis kyang zas nyams pa las kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/ /shes bzhin du mchis pa ni/ sdig pa'i rang bzhin du
<p>331b.4</p>shes pa yin te/ de bzhin du dge ba'i rang bzhin du yang shes par bya'o/ /dge dang mi dges mi tshugs shing / de dran pa tsam gyis thar bar 'gyur ro/ /zas rnam pa lnga la 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis zhus pa'o/ /bu ram dang / sbrang rtsi dang / til dang / 
<p>331b.5</p>sha dang / nya sha rnams yongs su spang bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po rnams kyi zas yin no/ /de yang sdig par 'gyur ba'i zas yin pas/ bu ram ni 'bu rnams kyi zas yin no/ /sbrang rtsi ni bung ba'i zas so/ /til ni srog chags rnams kyi zas so/ /sha ni srog bcad pas sdig par
<p>331b.6</p>'gyur ba'i zas so/ /nya sha yang de bzhin no/ /de'i phyir na zas rnam pa lnga yongs su spang ba'o zhes gsungs pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhen zhes bya ba ni zas lnga po de sdig par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhis zhu ba'i phyir bos pa'o/ /gnod sbyin dang srin
<p>331b.7</p>po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams zhes bya ba ni/ zas rnam pa lnga po de spangs par gyur na/ dpag tshad lnga brgya'i nang tshun chad du/ gdon de rnams kyis mi tshugs so/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa la sogs pa ni/ bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ sangs rgyas
<p>332a</p>
<p>332a.1</p>rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang ste/ de bzhin du 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang ba ste/ de rnams bka' bden pas sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'o/ /de dag gzhom pa'i slad du yi dam 'di bgyi 'tshal lags so
<p>332a.2</p>zhes bya ba ni da ltar gyi shAkya thub pas gsungs te/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byed cing 'khor ba las thar te/ de bzhin du yang dag pa'i don thob nas rig pa'i don gyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po bzhis sems can gyi don du yang
<p>332a.3</p>nas yang du zhu ba'o/ /dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad do/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen mo 'di zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la khyab ste/ de bzhin du sems can
<p>332a.4</p>thams cad bsil bar byed pa'o/ /'dzin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dad par byas shing rjes su yi rang bar gyur na/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral te/ sems can thams cad thar pa thob pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni gong du bshad pa'o/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po
<p>332a.5</p>'di ni de ltar don che ba lags so zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa ste/ me long gi gzugs brnyan bzhin du sgyu mar snang bas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la khyab pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan mu stegs can zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ /bdud
<p>332a.6</p>kyi rigs sdig can/ bstan pa 'jig pa'i lta ba log pa'i rigs/ de rnams kyi don mi 'grub cing the tshom gyi dus su yang pham par 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir na mdo 'di la dad pa la don che ba'o/ /mi ma lags pa rnams kyis bar ma dor 'gum pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ 'di 'chang ba'i gang zag
<p>332a.7</p>de la/ chu dang / me dang / rkun ma dang / chom rkun dang / seng ge dang / glang po che dang / dug dang / thog dang / rgyal po'i chad pa la sogs pa zhi bar byed pa yin te/ yang na ni mi rigs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis rims kyis gsad pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa de rnams rlag par byed pa'o/ /
<p>332b</p>
<p>332b.1</p>de ni de dag la gnod par 'tshal ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bar du gcod pa'i bgegs rnams glags tshol te/ gang zag de gus par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing bar du gcod par mi nus so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na sems can rnams bsrung ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
<p>332b.2</p>snying rje che zhing sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab pa ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di chad pa thams cad dang bral zhing bde bar gnas pa'o/ /de nas zhes ba ni bsil ba'i tshal gyi yon tan bshad pa de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis tshigs su
<p>332b.3</p>bcad de gsol ba zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi phan yon rgyal po chen po bzhis tshigs su bcad de bshad pa'o/ /mi mchog gang zhig mdo 'di dag /yongs su rdzogs pas bsrungs pa dang / /zhes bya ba ni gling bzhi na gnas pa'i 'jig rten 'di gang zag gang gis kyang gus par
<p>332b.4</p>byas shing 'chang ba de la bsrung ba gzhan gyis mtshungs pa med do/ /bde legs bgyid pa de la ni/ /srin po rnams kyang 'tshe mi bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni gzi brjid che zhing stobs dang ldan te/ tshi phyi ma yang ngan song gsum las grol zhing / da ltar yang dpal dang ldan te/ de de dag 'dzin pa'i gang zag
<p>332b.5</p>yang dag pa'i byang chub thob pa'o/ /yang na stong gsum gyi stong chen po na yod pa'i bgegs rnams kyis kyang 'tshe bar mi nus shing srin po rnams kyang lta ci smos pa'o/ /su yang rung ste mdo 'di dag /mi mchog gis ni gsungs pa bzhin/ /zhes bya ba ni/ lha'am/ mi'am/ lha ma yin nam/ yi dgas
<p>332b.6</p>la sogs pa gang zag 'di la gus par byas pa de la sogs pa'i sems can gzhan la yang phan thogs pa ste/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / kun skyob dang / log par dad sel dang / gser thub dang / 'od srungs rnams kyis kyang bsrung ba'o/ /ma 'ongs
<p>332b.7</p>pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bsrung ste/ de yang phyag na rdo rje dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs dang / byams pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /da ltar yang sems can gyi don la rig sngags la rjes su yi rang zhing bsrungs pa'o/ /yongs
<p>333a</p>
<p>333a.1</p>su rdzogs shing ma chad par/ /shin tu chang bar 'chang bgyid pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang / shes rab la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ de yang de'i 'khor gsum dag pas 'chang ba'o/ /yang na pha rol tu phyin pa bcu
<p>333a.2</p>dang / sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /de la gnod sbyin yi dgas dang / /'byung po grul bum srin po dang / /mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gdon rnams kyis kyang rig sngags 'di la rjes su yi rang zhing bstan pa bsrung ba ste/ 'di la tshig gcig kyang smras par gyur na/ 'byung po rnams kyi
<p>333a.3</p>'jigs pa dang bral ba'o/ /smyo byed rgyu ba klu rnams dang / /de lta bu dag 'tshe mi bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni smyo byed kyi gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yod de/ de bzhin klu'i gdon yang yin no/ /de rnams kyis kyang / srod tho rangs nam phyed la rgyu zhing sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed pa ste/ de rnams kyis kyang mi
<p>333a.4</p>tshugs shing sems can rnams la bde bar byed pa'o/ /de la mi ma lags dang gdon/ /myur du gud du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' dang rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'tshe bar byed pa'i 'byung po de rnams mgo tshal pa brgyar 'gas shing 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi ma
<p>333a.5</p>thag tu mda' 'phangs pa bzhin du mnar med par skye'o/ /de la cis kyang mi tshugs te/ de la rtse bar yang mi nus zhes bya ba ni u du wA ra'i me tog bzhin/ shin tu dkon pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di yang mthu che zhing gzi brjid che ste/ 'di'i nus pas gang gis kyang 'tshe bar mi nus pa'o/ /
<p>333a.6</p>rgyal po chen po bzhi po yis/ /bcom ldan phyag 'tshal zhes brjod de/ /zhes bya ba ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dri za rnams dang / de bzhin du grul bum dang / klu dang gnod sbyin rnams so/ /de rnams kyi gdon kyis kyang 'tshe bar mi nus shing / /phyogs rnams kyang bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs
<p>333a.7</p>rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ /de nyid du ni mi snang 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du bcom ldan 'das la bar chod byed cing glags lta ba rnams glags mi rnyed cing / bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas na/ sems can la 'tshe bar mi byed cing mi snang bar 'gyur ba'o/ /de nas zhes pa ni tshigs
<p>333b</p>
<p>333b.1</p>su bcad pa'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan mo 'das te zhes bya ba ni 'jigs su rung ba bsil ba'i tshal gyi nang na bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi dang bcas pa bzhugs pa'i nam la 'das pa'o/ /nam langs nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la bzhugs te zhes bya ba ni rnam rtog gsum dang
<p>333b.2</p>bral ba'i dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi dang bcas pa'o/ /dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ de'i tshe de'i dus su bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gyi don la bka' stsal pa'o/ /dge slong dag
<p>333b.3</p>mdang sum dag rgyal po chen po bzhi bu dang bcas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'khor rnams dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du 'ongs te/ de dag gis kyang glags tshol ba ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi gzi brjid kyis glags tshol mi nus par gnas pa'o/ /nga'i
<p>333b.4</p>rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po bzhi dang / 'byung po de rnams kyis bskor ba lan gsum byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal la rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'byung
<p>333b.5</p>po thams cad phyogs gcig tu 'khod/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhis nga'i thad du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di brjod nas dong ngo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor bzhi la bka' stsal zhing / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi don yang dag par bstan
<p>333b.6</p>pa'o/ /khyed kyis de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad do zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /rig pa mthar thug pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa'o/ /btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te zhes
<p>333b.7</p>bya ba ni/ dge slong la sogs pa'i 'khor rnam bzhis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba mnyan nas zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di la rjes su yi rang zhing / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / bsgom pa la sogs pa
<p>334a</p>
<p>334a.1</p>byas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni chad pa med cing tshig la yang dag pa khyab pa ni nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa/ rig pa phyi nang yang dag par bstan pa thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>334a.2</p>gzhon nu sgra gcan 'dzin gyi sems can thams cad kyi don la bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di rgyas par bka' stsal te/ de yang bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas kun dga' bos bsdus pa'o/ /dge slong dang zhes bya ba ni sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs pa nyis brgya lnga bcu'o/ /dge slong ma dang zhes
<p>334a.3</p>bya ba ni grags 'dzin ma la sogs pa'o/ /dge bsnyen dang zhes bya ba ni rgyal po ma skyes dgra la sogs pa'o/ /dge bsnyen ma de dag yi rangs te zhes bya ba ni/ ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo la sogs pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di la rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /gzhan yang rgyal po chen po bzhi
<p>334a.4</p>dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams dang / gzhan yang lha dang / lha ma yin la sogs pas rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo'i 'bum 'grel/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //smon lam
<p>334a.5</p>stobs kyis grong khyer mu gyer btsas/ /mkhas par grags pa mi mnyam rdo rje'i sras/ /skye ba lnga brgyar sbyangs pa'i 'bras bu yis/ /rig pa'i gnas lnga dag la ma rmongs shing / /gsang sngags gdams pa ma lus thugs la mnga' ba can/ /mtshan yang don yod rdo rje zhes par grags/ /sngon gyi smon lam
<p>334a.6</p>dbang gis bod yul dbus su byon/ /smon lam stobs kyis dam pa 'bro lo'i bla mar gyur/ /'dzam gling byang phyogs brag dmar dpal gyi bsam yas su/ /rgyal po khyad par 'phags pa khri pa'i gdung rgyud sras/ /lha gcig khyad par 'phags pa lha lcam dar sgron gyis/ /bkra shis pho brang rdo lung
<p>334a.7</p>dgon pa ru/ /lo paN zhabs nas bteg nas dam chos 'di bsgyur ba/ /bsgyur ba'i bsod nams gang thob bsags pa des/ /bdag dang mtha' yas sems can kun/ /bla med byang chub thob par shog/ //
